1b1(rgyud): rgyu gar skad du/sar+b+ba durga to pa ri shr-idz+nyA nA ti dzo rA dza ta thA ga tu
1b2(rgyud): ar+d+ha te samya ka saM bud d+ha kalpa nA ma/bod skad du/de bzhin gshegs pa dag
1b3(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yong su sbyong
1b4(rgyud): ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa zhes bya ba/dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la
2a1(rgyud): /phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das lha'i
2a2(rgyud): tshogs thams cad kyi dga' ba'i tshal mchog tu yid du 'ong ba na/nor bu dang /gser dang /gser gyi
2a3(rgyud): shing yal ga dang lcug mar bcas pa dang /shing gel ba dang /sman dang /me tog ka ma la dang /ud
2a4(rgyud): pa la dang /ka ra ni ka dang /bkul dang /ti la ka dang /oM shro ka dang /man du ra ba dang /mnad
2a5(rgyud): ra ba chen po la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang /dpag bsam gyi shing rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/
2b1(rgyud): masa sams mam/athasamathaHSha satha thaka thama ma/
2b2(rgyud): rgyun sna tshogs kyis brgyun pa/byA sna tshogs mang pos skad 'byin pa/rtswa dang /cang te'u dang /ker ko dang /gling bu dang /
2b3(rgyud): rje bo che la sogs pa'i sgra grag pa brgya byin dang /tshungs pa la sogs pa'i lha dang /lha'i bu mo sna tshogs rnam par rtsen pa/
2b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa na/brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dang /rig
2b5(rgyud): 'dzin dang /lha'i bu mo 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang /ga ni do sbyin dang //srin po dang /lha ma yin dang
2b6(rgyud): dri za dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto'i phye chen po dang /klu le sogs pa 'khor du ma dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
2b7(rgyud): chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe'i chen po blo gros tshad med pa dang //
3a1(rgyud): tho gros ga //thog+sas yangs pad+mad/kun tu sh+lo gas dang/zlogasus yu /
3a2(rgyud): blo gros ka mA la dang //blo glos chen po dang /blo gros lha rdzas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros sna
3a3(rgyud): tshogs la sogs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i tshon po'i dge 'dun mtha' thug pa med pa rnams kyis
3a4(rgyud): sti stang du byed/bla mar byed/mchod cing brjod la rab tu mchod cing spel te/'khor mang po'i dbus na tshangs pa chen po
3a5(rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan lnga bzhugs te/ngan song gri rgyud thams cad yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ngan
3a6(rgyud): song gsum gyi rgyud las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od zer 'phro
3b1(rgyud): ba dang /sdud pa mang po'i phreng ba nyid kyi dpral ba'i mdzod pu nas byung nas/des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad
3b2(rgyud): kun tu snang bar byaso//kun tu snang bar byas nas sems can thums cad kyi sems nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol te/bde ba so sor
3b3(rgyud): thob nis dge bo'i'o tshal thams cad kun tu snang bar byas pa'i mtsho bI sprin sna tshogs kyis mngon par mtshad/lan pa rgyu phragra stong du bskor ba byas nas/
3b4(rgyud): mgo bos lan brgya phrag stong du phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod te 'di skad ces gsol to//kye
3b5(rgyud): ma'o sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas /kye ma'o sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs//gong phyir ngan song bdag cag sbyang //byang chub spyod pa nyid la bkrod//de
3b6(rgyud): nas lha rnams kyi dbyung po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas te/phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
3b7(rgyud): gsal to//bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer kun tu snang bas ngan song gi rgyud las rnam par grol zhing /rnam par grol ba'i lam
4a1(rgyud): /la bkod pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lag so//bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar 'gaso//bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal
4a2(rgyud): pa/lha'i dbang po 'di ni ngo mtshar mi che'o//lha'i dbang po 'di ni ngo mtshar mi che ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi
4a3(rgyud): tshogs rnams yang dag par byasags pa'o//lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas ni tshad med po'i yon tan rin po che'i 'byung khungs su gyur pa'o//
4a4(rgyud): lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni tshad med pa'i thebs yang dag par rdzogs pa'o//lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
4a5(rgyud): rnams ni shes rab tshad med pa bsags pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod pa ni tshad med pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
4a6(rgyud): gdul ba'i skye bo tshad med pa rnams snod du gyur par mdzad pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa
4a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni minyam pa dang mnyam
4b1(rgyud): pa'i smon lam gyi stobs dang ldan pa ste/klu'i dbang po de lta bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang /ji
4b2(rgyud): ltar 'dul ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa dang /mos pa ji lta bzhin du sems can gyi do ni mdzad pa yin par rig par bya ste/'di la the tshom dang
4b3(rgyud): sdom nyi dang /yid gnyis ma byed cig/gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnas ni medado//de nis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
4b4(rgyud): byin rang gi bstan las lang snga nos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa che ba rgya tshe byas te/phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dri skad ces gsol to//sems can
4b5(rgyud): thams cad la phan pa nyid du bgyi ba dang /sems can thams cad lo snying brtse ba nyid du bgyi ba dang //snying brtse ba can nyid bgyi ba dang /snying brtse ba can chen po
4b6(rgyud): can du bgyi ba dang /bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi bar bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs pa skyid par gsol/bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs
4b7(rgyud): pa bskyed par gsol/bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris 'di nyid nis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba zhig shi 'phos te/dus yas
5a1(rgyud): 'das nas dgung bdun lon lags na/bcom ldan 'das de gang du skyes/bde ba dang /sdug bsngal ni ci zhig myong bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'dra//
5a2(rgyud): lung bstan du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyi bko' stsal pa/lha'i dbang po de'i dus la bab par shes na nyon cig/lha'i dang
5a3(rgyud): pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dus ni 'di lagaso//bde bar gshegs pa dus dang tshod ni 'di lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/lha'i dbang po lha'i/
5a4(rgyud): bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas mtsham med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes nas/des der lo stong phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du
5a5(rgyud): sdug bsngal ma rungs shing mi bzod pa myong nus sems can dmyal ba chung ngu rnamasu yang lo brgya phrag brgyar sdug bsngal myong //byol song ye rigs kyi skye gnasu yang
5a6(rgyud): lo brgya phrag brgyar sdug bsngal myong //de nas yul mtha' 'khob kyi mir skyes nas kyang 'on pa dang /dag pa dang //lkug pa'i rang bzhin can+da dang /smra ba mi
5a7(rgyud): gsal bar lo stong phrag drug cu'i bar du myong nas la stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir nad rnag khrag 'dzag pa dang /mdze dang /phol mig rnams kyis gzir ba dang /
5b1(rgyud): mnaN/sa sas mtha/athas nathaHSha sa mama thammama/aH
5b2(rgyud): skyo bo mang pos smad pa dang /yongs kyis spangs pa dang /rigs dman pa'i rigs can rjesu myong zhing sdug bsngal ba dang /sdug bsngal brgyad pa dang /gzhan la gnod pa rgyad
5b3(rgyud): dang /las kyis sgrib ba par chad med pa rnam pa ste tshogs byed pa dang /gzhan yang sdug bsngal gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa de ni myong bar 'gyur//de nas /
5b4(rgyud): byin la sogs pa lha'i bu thams cad kyis thos nis shin tu sngags shing skrag ste/skyo nas kha bub tu 'gyel to//de n-i sa yang langs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/
5b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal brgyud pa 'di las ji ltar na 'di thar par 'gyur/bde b.raro gshegs pa ji ltar thur par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang sdug bsnga
5b6(rgyud): gyis phung po 'di las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba 'di bskyab du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa 'di skyab du gsol/bcom ldan 'dres kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i
5b7(rgyud): daphung po sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang ba shad pa 'di ngas kyang bshad kyis nyon cig/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis yang bcom ldan 'das
5b8(rgyud): la me tog man dar ba dang /mon de rab chen po dang /me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang /rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang /phyag gdub dang /dpung rgyan dang /snyan
6a1(rgyud): rgyu dang /do shal dang /se ma do la sogs pa'i rgyun gyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mngon par mchod de/lan brgya stong phrag du mar/
6a2(rgyud): bskor ba byas shing phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das legaso//bde bor grwa shogs pa legaso zhes bya bas mnyes par byas nas/bcom ldan 'das lha dang
6a3(rgyud): bcas po'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang /bde bar bgyi ba dang /ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud gsumo las rnam par thar par bgyi ba'i slad du
6a4(rgyud): legs par bshad du gsol/de nas yang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha mang po rna kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das legaso/bde bar ga shi gas
6a5(rgyud): pa ldeg s+ho//ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis mtshan tsam thos pas kyang ngan song gsum gyi lam las rnam par grol te/bde 'gro
6a6(rgyud): lha'i 'jig rten las me'i 'jig rten du skyes nas bla ni med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi ba'i slad du bA shi du gsol/de nas bcom
6a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'dis brlabs par bya ba'i phyir don
6b1(rgyud): yod gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la bsnyoms par bzhugasaso//de nas yang thugs ka nas sngags 'di byung nas lha de dag kyang dam
6b2(rgyud): tshigs can du byin gyis brlobaso//aM sarba pi d+yA badz+ro a d+hiSh+ThA na dz+nyA na sa ma yi hUM/de ltar ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas kyang gdo ni mi zla bar mi tshams pa'i rdo/
6b3(rgyud): byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs
6b4(rgyud): ka nas phyung /o sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sar+b+be pA paM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na bi shud d+he swA hA/rigs pa chen mo 'di bshad ma thag tu saM mA can thid kyi ngan song gi
6b5(rgyud): rgyud kyi bcing pa thams cad rnam par chadado//ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par sbyang so//sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rnams rab tu zhi te/skye bo mang po rnams bde ba
6b6(rgyud): deng ldan par gyur to//de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i snying po 'di gsungs//oM sho d+hi ne sho d+ha ya sar+b+ba a pA yAM sAr+tha sa hA b+h+yo hUM/lha'i dang bri gzhan yang
6b7(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'o//oM sarba a bA ya bi sho d+ha ne hUM phaT/lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi
7a1(rgyud): tsham maHsasamams mtham/samathas mamamasamatham mamam tham bam ma mabs tham ma' bams ba mamamam mayam gam
7a2(rgyud): snying po dang nye ba'i spyong du'o//oM tar+tha/lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i snying po'o//hU~M/lha dbang
7a3(rgyud): gzhan yang mdor na dran pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nam chung ba'i sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las bde blag du rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba ni 'di yin//oM na mo b+ha ga
7a4(rgyud): twe sar+b+ba durga ti pa ri she d+ha na rA dz+nyA ya/ta thA gA tA ya/ad+ha te sa myag saM bud+d+hA ya/tad+ya thAM/oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/bi shro d+hi ni bi she d+hA ni/sar+b+ba pA b+h+yAM bi shwo d+ha ni shud+d+he b+hi nra
7a5(rgyud): d+d+he/sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/oM sar+b+ba bid+yA sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi sho d+hi ya ha na hU~M phaT/oM sarba bid hUM/oM sarba bid phaT/oM sar+b+ba bide a/oM sar+b+ba bid traT/oM
7a6(rgyud): sar+b+ba bid oM/oM sar+b+ba bid swa/oM sarba bid a oM sar+b+ba bid+yA hUM/oM sar+b+ba bid tAn+da/oM sha/oM d+ha/lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i gzi
7a7(rgyud): brjid kyi rgyal po gsang ba'i snying po 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas ming tsam yang nyan tam/bcangs sam/klags sam/bris nas kyang /mgo bo/
7a8(rgyud): gtsug pud dam/dpung ba 'am/mgul du btags te 'chang na tshe 'di nyid la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dam/dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang 'brel pa rmi lam gyi rnam
7b1(rgyud): pa 'am/ngan sang dang 'brel ba'i mtshan ma de dag thams cad rming ma tsam du yang mi 'byung na/dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs la/zhugs nas kyang dbang bskur
7b2(rgyud): lha snying po yang bzlas/sdug kyi don yang sbom po gang yin pa lci smos kyang ci dgos te/de dag la ni sdig pa gang yang nye bar mi 'gyur/ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur/
7b3(rgyud): skyes pa 'am bud med dam/lha 'am klu 'am/gnod sbyin na mi/srin po 'am/byol seng ngam/yi dgas sam/sems can dmyal ba la sregs te
7b4(rgyud): gang yang rung ba shi ba'i lus dkyil 'khor du bcug te dbang bskur na/de sems can dmyal bar skyes na yang de ma thag tu rnam par thar nas/lha'i rigasu skye
7b5(rgyud): par 'gyur//lha'i rigs der skyes nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid mngon sum du byed/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur lnga
7b6(rgyud): sogs pa yang byed/phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur/rgyud nges pa can du yang 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pA rigasu yang ste/sgrib pa rnams rab tu spangs nas de
7b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs sam/lha'i rigs sam/gzhan gang yang rung bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur//lha'i dbang po mdor na 'jig rten nam/'jig rten las
8a1(rgyud): 'das pa'i phan pa dang bde ba thams cad myong bar 'gyuraro//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du bskor ba byas te/phyag
8a2(rgyud): 'chal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams la phan pa dang /bde bar bgyi ba dang /ci nas kyang sems can de
8a3(rgyud): dag ngan song thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyi ba dang /bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ba de blag tu rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du
8a4(rgyud): gsol/rje cig bshad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i ye shes rdo
8a5(rgyud): rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya
8a6(rgyud): be'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungaso//sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems//bla na med pa rtogs gyur pa//rgyal po'i gsungs pa'i ye shes gang //de ni
8a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la thug rtse ba'i slad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungaso//gtsug
8b1(rgyud): lag khang drang skyed mos tshul//mchod rten lha khang kun dga' sogs//ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis//gnas ni byin gyis brlab pa brtsam//byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas de
8b2(rgyud): ni//phyi yid kyil 'khor bri bar bya//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa dang //them ska bzhi yi phreng ba dang //seng ge bo glang rnams kyis rgyun//der nga
8b3(rgyud): lnga ldi do shal phreng /dril bu dang ni rnga mas rgyan//rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang //rgya gram pa yi phyag rgyas rgyan//srad bu brgyad dang ldan pa dang //phyi yi sgo khyud rnams kyis
8b4(rgyud): brgya ni//dgu yi char ni bgos pa las//sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya//rdo rje srad bus thig gdab po//dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa//chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra
8b5(rgyud): ba liM//lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug/rim pa gsum dang ldan po la//rtsibs na nyes 'gyur nyid du bya//dbus kyi phyogasasu kun rig ni//dung dang kun da zla 'dra la//
8b6(rgyud): zhal bzhi pa la rdo rje yis/seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa dang //ting 'dzin phyag rgyar ldan pa dang //rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri//de yi spyan sngar ngan song
8b7(rgyud): kun//skyong ba'i rgyal po bri bya ste//phyag gnyis ting 'dzin tshul du bsgrol//zla ba rgyas dang pad+ma'i mdog/rgyan rnams kun gyis legs rdzogs la//rgyal mchog
9a1(rgyud): sa dus pad+maSh+TA na//rgyun du gyu dang //gcog rgyun zla ga//gzhon dngag su ston sun rnan//rgyun mnan
9a2(rgyud): rin chen me tog gnyis//lo ca na dang mA ma ki/de bzhin dkar mo sgrol ma rnams//rang gi rigs kyi mtshon ma bzhin//grwa yi phyog ni kun tu bri//rtsibs kyin zhirnam
9a3(rgyud): cadu//rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i skems dpa' rnams//go rims bzhin du bri bar bya//mkhas pas le s+ye la sogs pa//
9a4(rgyud): mchod pa grwa yi phyogasu bri//sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du//sgo ba bzhi ni bri bar bya//rta baHsa khyams ni thams cad du//byams pa lnga sogs bri bar bya//nyan
9a5(rgyud): thos rgyal bye thams cad dang //de bzhin rang rgyal gtso bo rnams//khro bo mdagro bo pho nya sogs//bri bya yang na ming yang rung //phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du//
9a6(rgyud): gling bzhi po ni bri bar bya//'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs pa bri//byang phyogasu ni dbang phyug che//shar dang nub kyi gling du ni//brgya byin gtogs 'dod thams
9a7(rgyud): cing ni//'khor dang bcas par bri bar bya//gzhan dag rnams kyang de bzhin te//lce min dri za na mkha' ldeng //gnod sbyin srin po lta 'phye che//'byung po
9b1(rgyud): yi dgas 'dre rnams dang //klu dang grul bum rI rnams dang //rgyal po bzhi rnams bri bar bya//bza' dang skar mA rgyu skar dang //blo bo ma rungs 'tsho ba yo//bgogs dang b+h+r-i nA
9b2(rgyud): ya ka rnams//sems can kun la phan byed pa'i//drang srong skal ba chen po rnams//'phro men ma dang bud med b+hi//de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma//'byung ba bzhi yi lha
9b3(rgyud): chen po//khyim dang ri la gnas pa dang //shring dang kun dga'i nags la sogs//dur khrod grong khyer gnas pa'i rnams//ming dang brda' 'am yang na ni//thig
9b4(rgyud): le rnam kyang bri bar bya//de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor la//bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang //gdugs dang rnga ma lnga lnga dang //'phrin dang sna tshogs na bzas
9b5(rgyud): mchod/gser los byas pa'i bya rnams ni//brgyad dang bcu drug lhag kyang rung //dbang bskur rin chen chus bkang ba'i//bum pa lnga ni bzhag par bya//mar me
9b6(rgyud): gtor ma bum pa dang //mdzes pa'i bshos rnams bzhag bya ste//bza' ba btung ba spyir legs dang //bca' ba sna tshogs bzhag par bya//gnod sbyin
9b7(rgyud): srin po'i kha zasu//gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag/'byung po dag dang klu dag dang //mi da mi min de bzhin te/mi tag dri rnams sna tshogs dang //'o ma
10a1(rgyud): mar dang kha ra ru bcas//rnam rgyal bum pA dro yi chus//rab tu bkang pa bzhug par bya//do nus khrus la sogs byas la//dri dang phrod mchod
10a2(rgyud): brephreng ba can//dri zhim kha bkeng mchog mdzes pa//rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas kyang //me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug/gtso bo rgyal ba sras kyi 'dra/
10a3(rgyud): meng po rnams ni spyan drangs te//phyag rgya sngags dang bdag ldan zhing //ljag+sa k+Shu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis//dzAHhUM ba~M ho//thugs rje bdag/tshur gshegs
10a4(rgyud): ces ni brjod nas kyang //gsang ba'i bcing ba bcings nas ni//mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du bya//zhags pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang //de nyid lcags sgrog tshul
10a5(rgyud): du bya//mtho ba gnyis nang du bkugs nas ni//bskyed par gyu nas dpung du 'gyur//de nas mtshan ma skyes nas ni//thog ma med pa mngon sum mthong //
10a6(rgyud): oMn mchog brtags bsang la sogs pa yi//dbyangs snyan pa yi bstod dang lha rdzas kyi//mchog dam pa rnams kyis legs par mchod//de nas
10a7(rgyud): 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bya//sems can bkres shing skom pas gdungs pa dang //phyogs na gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtag/de yi gtor ma rdza
10b1(rgyud): sgyurar+ya 'thun par b+hu//de nas sngags pas zla mod byang chub kyi//gnas slob ma yongasu skyon bya zla//'gro la phan phy-ir myur du bya chub par//nga dag byang chub sems
10b2(rgyud): mchog bskyed gzhug/de rnams byin brlabs byang chub smon lam gad //zab cing rgya che bo yi chos bsgrags lo//srung bar byas nas brtul zhugs sdom
10b3(rgyud): gnas pa/d+h+r-i gau khi nas sngags brjod gzhug par b+h+yo//dar la sogs pas mig gnyis g.yogs nas nI/rdo rje 'dzin mo dApa lo ni lug g+henyiswA b+h+yo//me tog
10b4(rgyud): rin chen lha sogs de//rgyan la yon gyise lag pa bkang ste gzhug par bya//sngags ni 'di rnams yino////oM badz+ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha hUM/oM badz+ra sa ma ya
10b5(rgyud): hUM/oM badz+ra pra be sha hUM/a sa me tri sa mA ma hA sa ma yo hUM//de nas sngags 'dis me tog la sogs pa dor bar bya'o//sbyangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i
10b6(rgyud): badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/me tog rin chen la sogs gang //bab par gyur pa'i rigs kyi lha//gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrubs na ni//dngos grub 'gyur te the tshom med
11a1(rgyud): rlo nas sngags pa mkhas pa y-is//sngags 'dis dum tshogs sbyin par bya//oM badz+rI sa ma ya hU~M phaT/oM dz+ras mya ya dzad yas ga dra d+hA
11a2(rgyud): de nas 'dis dam tshugs bye sgrug par bya'o//'di ni khyod kyis dmyal ba'i chu//dam tshig 'dus na sreg par byed//dam tshig bsla sa na dngos grub ni/rdo rje lu
11a3(rgyud): 'dis 'grub//ci ste dam tshig 'das na ni//de mo thug tu bkas nas gshegs//rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nos kyang //bdun brgyad rigs ni d+mag par mdzad//
11a4(rgyud): rtag tu bu khyod kyis//rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang //sdom pa dang ni bla ma'i bka'//shin tu mos pas bsrung bar bya//khyod kyis srog chags byasad ma
11a5(rgyud): /mo byin par yang blang me b+h+ya//bairdzun dang 'dod la spyod pa rnams//dngos grub 'ang pas byu ma yin//chung 'di btung bar mo bya zhing //shal sogs
11a6(rgyud): pa bza' mi bya//sems can gnod par sbyod pa ni//nam kyang bya ba ma yin te//dkon mchog sum ni yongs mo spangs//dus kun tu ni byang chub sems
11a7(rgyud): snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang //lha dang bla ma de bzhin no//sdig la sogs pa gang yin dang //bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bye/lha la phul ba'i
11b1(rgyud): tshan ga na.aN/sasamam sa ma tham/amaHthas mnathaHSha sa naThathamathamamatham tham bal thamamamaHtham ba mtham ma/thamams mams am lam
11b2(rgyud): rlung pa dang //do yi br-ibA ma 'gom ma bya//phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang de bzhin te//sdug sa dang lha la'ang r+m+mad mi bya//dA dang rtsa la sogs bla ma yin//mu
11b3(rgyud): stegs can la'ang smad me bya//mdor no yid gnyis som gnyis the tshom mi bya ste//bdag gi de nyid dang ni sngags de bzhin no//mos pa brtan dang ldan pos dam bcas
11b4(rgyud): nas//sarba bid+yas ji bzhin dbang bskur te//bum pa la sogs ji snyed mang thogs pas//bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu ci dgar bskur//de na sa lag tu dril dang rdo tsA byin//
11b5(rgyud): 'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun thogs la//mi dbang dbang phyug 'khor lo thob pa dang //sdig pa gzhom phyir dbad+d+ha ra bya//sngags sgrub phyir ni mos ldan slong ma la//sngags
11b6(rgyud): pas bka' ni rab tu bsgo bar bya//des kyang mos pas skye bos phyag 'tshal te//ci ste nor yod bla ma dbul bar ba//nor dang gter dang 'bru dong datib/dang gser//gzhon
11b7(rgyud): dang khyim gdan bu pha bu mo rnams//skyes pa dag dang bud med yod na ni//grong dang gong khyer de bzhin ci bzhed rnams//rang gi sems ni rab tu dang po yis//yon gyi mchog nyid
11b8(rgyud): dngul ba nyid du bya//myur du 'grub phyir mos pas bla ma la//mdor na rang gi lus kyang dbul bar bya//tshe 'di'i bde ba ma lus dang //'jig rten phyi ma'i bde mchog dang //sangs
12a1(rgyud): rgyas nyid kyang 'dzu 'gyur na//lha snyi bde ba smos mi dgos//snas rgyas kun dang bla mar mAHma//rdo rje sgru dpon brnyas nan+te//d+hAr+m+ma smug pa
12a2(rgyud): 'gyur bas//cung zad tsam yang brnyas mi bya//rdo rje spun dang srid mo dang //rdo rje ma rnams nyid la ni//rnal 'byor can gyi brnyas ma yin//rtag tu kho na gyi gtsug mr-i k+Sha~M/da/
12a3(rgyud): mchog gsum la snang byed dang //bla ma snod byed ma rungs pa//dam tshig les ni 'das pa dang /de la sogs pa'i gnod byed la//bzod pa bsgom par mi bya ste//de ltar
12a4(rgyud): gyur na kun rig gis//gsungs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur//sems can kun la phan pa dang //brtser ldan dngos grub thob par 'gyur///de nas
12a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang lha'i 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams kyi don dang //phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsungaso//ras
12a6(rgyud): la bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de bzhin du bros la/g.ya su ni de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po//g.yon phyogs
12a7(rgyud): ni shAkya thub pa ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i 'og tu ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdog zla ba lta bu phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o//shAkya thub pa'i 'og tu ni phyig
12b1(rgyud): nardo rje de gnyis kyi bar du sman gyi bla mdog sngon po phyag gcig na 'bras bu a rung bsnams//phyag gcig ni mchog sbyin dugarta 'grin pad/'jig rten gsum la spu rnam par rgyal
12b2(rgyud): ba ma rungs pa 'jom pa tha brtson pa gnyis ni rang gi lho la rten par bri/de gnyis kyi dbus su lo tsi nA dang mA ma kI dang /gos dkar ma~M dang /sgron ma rnams rang rang gi mtshan mo phyag
12b3(rgyud): na bsnams par bri/de dag gi 'og tu pad+ma'i rdzing bu chu dang /chu srin dang /nya dang /rus sbal dang /sbal pa dkar po dang /nya khar ba la sogs par bcas pa dang /chu lbos
12b4(rgyud): skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa du mas yong su gang bar bri/bdug pa dang /mur me dang /dI dang /phreng ba dang /bshos dang /me tog dang /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bai tri/
12b5(rgyud): dri'i 'og tu sgrub pa po nyid thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par bri/de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs de mngon par mchod/bdag nyid kyi spyan dbye bra bya zhing bden pa la byin
12b6(rgyud): gyis brlabs par dmigs par bya'o//de nas ci ste mtshan ma zhig mthong na ni myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur//'on te ma mthong na ni ring mi zhig nas dngos grub tu
12b7(rgyud): 'byu ra ta/bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang //dril bu'i sgra dang 'bru sgra dang //dge slong bram ze pho mo dang /'bras bu mthong na myur du ni//mchog dang bA ma tha ma 'grub//de nas
13a1(rgyud): 6/gzugs de gsang sngags dang //byug rgyu mngon par na brlabs nas//ni bdog pas ni mchod pa b+ha//rtag tu mngon sum 'dug nas kyang //'jog rten gtu/
13a2(rgyud): las rnam rgyal gyi/bdag srung lnga sogs byas nas kyang //bdag go de nyid bsams nas//dngos grub mtshan mo byung bar du//'drim phyag gsum mam dru
13a3(rgyud): bzlas//de nas dben pa'i gan su ni//brgyad brgya nyid du tshang bar bya//sngags ni 'khrul pa med par bzlas//de nas bzlas pa'i mjug tu ni//dkyil 'khor sngam bzhin pa
13a4(rgyud): //mchod pargya chen byas nas kyang //mtshan gcig theg thag bzlas par bya//tsi ste gtso 'am de yi sras//yang na lha rnams mthong gyur na//bsod nams snang la
13a5(rgyud): ci dga' bar//dngos grub mchog ni gsol bar bya//lha ni drangos grub 'bras bu ni//de la rtag tu dgyes nas stsol//phyag 'tshul dngos grub la sogs blang //
13a6(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma la//skal ba re ri phul nas ni//de nis rtag tu bdag sbyang cing //mdu na mkhas pa bdag nyid kyis//blangs nas bdag nyid spyad
13a7(rgyud): par bya//sems can kun la phan brtson par//bskab pa du mar gnas par 'gyur//ci ste dngos grub ma gyur na/las rnams thams cad nu
13b1(rgyud): par 'gyur//gnod sbyin skar mnga'i gdong la sogs//chad pas bcad cing bka' tsam gyis//zhi ba la sogs las kun ni//dran bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur//
13b2(rgyud): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sdig paM gyis byas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang
13b3(rgyud): du gyur pa rnams ji ltar na sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur ba'i sdug bsngal spang po'i slad du sgrib par bgyi//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i
13b4(rgyud): dbang po nyon cig/sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa byed pa/sdig pa chen po byed pa de dag ci nas kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug
13b5(rgyud): bsngal las thabs slabs grol bar 'gyur ba nyon cig/de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/snga ma bzhin du bum po la//brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni//dbang
13b6(rgyud): bskur ba ni rab tu brtag/de nas sdig pa kun sbyangs te//dmyal ba la sogs/sdug bsngal lase/da ni myur du rnam par tharo/sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid
13b7(rgyud): do//dag par gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi//rigasu skyes por gyur nas kyang //de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas dang /chos 'gro ba ni thos par 'gyur//de yi gzugs brnyan
14a1(rgyud): zla ba 'am//gur gum gyis ni ming yang rung //ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las//sems can rnams na sgrol ba'i phyir//sngags
14a2(rgyud): mkhan gzhan la phan brtson zhing //snying rje can gyis dbang bskur ro//de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni//sngags dang phyag rgya de dbang bskur//lha yi gzugs brtag
14a3(rgyud): nas kyang //mchod brten dbusu bzhag par bya/rang gi lha 'am lha gzhan gyi//snying po snying kAr dris nas kyang //lha 'dra bar na sems bskyed der//khyim gyi nang
14a4(rgyud): du bzhag par bya//de yi mIng yang smos nas ni//gur gum bzang pos sngags bris la//rim gyis 'bum ni tsheng tsam du//mchod rten las ni rab tu bya//
14a5(rgyud): sdig can sdig ni zas bya'i phyir//phye ba snyed ni chung bere bya//de ltar byas nas nges par ni//dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur//yi dgas byol song sdug bsngal
14a6(rgyud): les//grol te lha yi gan su skye//de nas ming yang brjod nas ni//ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags bzla zhing /'bum phrag snying ngam yang na ni//brgya phrag stong
14a7(rgyud): du zang ba dang //byi ba sdong du rab bzlas ni//lha yi gnasu nges par skye//de yi ming nas brjod nas kyang //mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya'am no//yang
14b1(rgyud): na brgya phrag stong spyad du//sbyin sreg byas par gyur na ni//dmyal ba chen por 'gyur ba yin//sdig+sa de las gyur bar 'gyur//ji srid mtshan ma shin tatu na//'bar ba
14b2(rgyud): gnaso ni skyes gyur par//til-i dang yungs kar 'dras rnams dang //ra ye 'o ma ldan pa dang //dr-i yi bslus pa'i lam shing gis//cho ga bzhin du sbyin bsregs bya/
14b3(rgyud): dA naswa de no nges par yang //lha yi gan su skyes gyur nas//de yi mtshan ma ston par byed//yang na lha yi mchog tu 'gyur//yang na hU~M 'ung na dadu ni//me yi lhas rdo ston
14b4(rgyud): byed cing //lha yi gnasu skyes pa drang //sdig pa bcom pa'i mtshan maMr ni//dkar po nyid dang ga yasu 'bar//gyen du 'bar zhing dri ma med//zlum zhing rnam par
14b5(rgyud): mi 'phro la//brtan la gro lo bzhin dri ma med/yang na me lha nyid kyis ni//bdag nyid de bzhin ston byed de//zla ba dri med dkar 'dra la//bzhin mdog dkar
14b6(rgyud): zhing lem mer 'bar//de ni mtshan ma 'di dag gis//dmyal ba la sogs rnam grol zhing //sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni//skyes pa yin par shes par
14b7(rgyud): byad/khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni//cho ga bzhin du khung brkos la//rdo rje mtha' ma bskor ba yi//'khor lo dbus su bro bar bya//rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya
15a1(rgyud): dun rgyun du na rmA tu du/unan na rgyu rgyu nga gag na
15a2(rgyud): mas snod rnams bkang ba dang //brgyad skad tsam du bzhag pa'am//yid nA bcu drug skad du bzhag/bzla ba dang ni brertse'abo'i bshes//me tog phreng sogs
15a3(rgyud): de bzhin te//bla re rgyal mtshan drang lo sogs//gdugs mchog rnams kyis legs par rgyan//sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor dam par ni//sbyin sreg pa
15a4(rgyud): tu bya ba ni//tshig shes pas bris nas kyang //lha rnams mang po sbyin drangs la//sngags shes pas ni sngags phyag rgyas//ar+tha phul bas shes nas
15a5(rgyud): khyo/mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni//lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la//ga bur gung gum la sogs pa ste//mdo dang 'i ma til bsngos la//til dang
15a6(rgyud): yungs kar 'bras rnams dang //dI yi chus ni logs bkang ste//'bras chen yis dang l+r-i du dang //sbrang d+hi sha ka rang ldan pa//brgyu phrag du mar yongs
15a7(rgyud): bzlas la//yam shing la yang de bzhin te//rang gi sngags kyis btab pa'i shing //khung bu'i nang du bzhag par bya//ro le sngags kyis btab nas kyang //
15b1(rgyud): rgyu mchog gis nI bkrus nasu//bzlas pa'i dri yi byug par bya//bosna dang rgyun gyis klubs nas kyang //sngags kyis btab pa'i 'dug pas bdug/me tog phreng la
15b2(rgyud): sogs pas mchod//gtsug phud da pung par de bzhin du//sngags bris nas ni gang gis par bya//snying ka lkog ma kha phyogasu//sarba bi d+yes byin gyis brlab/
15b3(rgyud): dpral ba mdzod spurna ba gnyis//mgo bos bcug pus dpung pa gnyis//sna dang rked pa dbus mo bo la//long bu sna yi rtse mo dang //mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi/
15b4(rgyud): dbang bo rnams kyi gnas la ni//de ltar gzhan du yi ge sngags//mchog tu dge ba rnams bzhag/de nas ngan song sbyang ba'i phyir//stan dang bcas te thab dbus
15b5(rgyud): bzhag pa nyid du bya ba yin//de nas sngags 'chang sngags kyis ni//btab pa'i gos kyis g.yog par bya//dri nas byin za dge ba rab sbar la//mo lce stong
15b6(rgyud): gis 'khrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus//zla dkar kun de'i zhi la zhi ba'i lus//mtha' yas pa yi gzugs kyi me bklog la//sarba bul bar brtags nas de bzhin du/
15b7(rgyud): blo mchog ldan pa'i mdun drug rnags tse ba nas/de bzhin gshegs tshogs de bzhin spyan drangs la//argal sogs btogs te de bzhin du//bde gshegs gsung ba'i
16a1(rgyud): dz+nyAnamachod pa la sogs rgya//donas sbyin zla la n+na rtag byag//stog b+h+yas klung snod yang srung ba skyo//donas srog zlus gang /
16a2(rgyud): ni//rgyal la sogs la bad+d+ha d+hU brgyad dro d+d+hag/denas sbyong ba'i hUMgapo kyi rgyal po lo//bsreg pa b+he shU n+ya go ga brtag/denas spyan dngas byung
16a3(rgyud): yin gsum dang //at+pa la sdigs pad+d+hi daMkar zhal mchod//phyugan rdo NAM pad+ma zhags bsnams pa'o//'jig rten gsum la pa rnam par rgyal ba'i bzun
16a4(rgyud): zhabs kyi pad+mas sdig mnan cing //rgyu ni rnams kun ni rab rdzogs la//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyun mtho//bsams som yang ni bris kyang rung //
16a5(rgyud): yi skyed pas de bzhin du//brgya phrag steng ngam yod na ni//bye ba'i tshad du sbyin bsgrog tu//ci ste mtshan ma la sogs 'byung //de banod sdig
16a6(rgyud): rgyuts+tshas+t+raig+h+ra/de nas thal ba n+te pa //rdo rje bsgre ba'i sngags sa ni/shin du bsdu bar bya//thal ba da da sa pa'i dzil//sngags kyi
16a7(rgyud): pa'i dri chu //bskyes ngo ma la sogs sdes//sbyang ze'i sngags kyis blo ldan gyis// 'brim dro bzlas pas brjes nas ni//gzung dro
16b1(rgyud): sgos pa yis//'jim pa dang ni bsres nas kyang //gzugs bya ba'am yang na ni//mchod rten gyi ni ltar byas la//gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am lnga//yang /
16b2(rgyud): na brgya rtsa brgyad bar du//sngags dang phyag rgyas btab na su//'bum phrag gnyis kyi bar du bzlas//de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam//yang na gzugs kyi zhal
16b3(rgyud): 'dzu mo 'am//dri dang bdug pa 'od kyang rung //snang ngam yang na ngad ldeng ngam//lha la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni//sna tsho Da pA ni snod gyur tam//rdzu 'phrul rnam
16b4(rgyud): par 'phrul pa dang //me tog la sogs 'dor ba dang //dung dang rje la sogs pa'i sgra//gling bu pi bring la sogs rnams//ci skye mtshan ma 'di dag ni//sdig
16b5(rgyud): can blos ni ma mthong na//'bum gyi phrag ni brgyad stong ngam//ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du//de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni//mnyam par gzhag
16b6(rgyud): pas bzlas par bya//de yi mthar ni mkhas pas kyang //mtshan gcig thog theg mi nyal bzlas//de nas de yi sdig pa ni//drag pa nyid du nges par mthong
16b7(rgyud): lha yi lus kyi gzugs byungar la//rang gi rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur//mtshan ma 'di ga shes nas ni//rnam par mi rtog sems kyis kyang //byams dang
17a1(rgyud): snying rjer ldan pa yis//las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur//yang na med par gyur na yang //bzlas shing sgom pa'i tshul gyis ni//ming tsam lag/
17a2(rgyud): par dris nas kyang //mchod rten phreng ba bya ba dang //yang na gzugasu bris kyang rung //sbyin sreg mngon par dbang bskur na//gdon mi za bar bad 'gror skye//thal
17a3(rgyud): ba yungs kar bye ma sogs//rang gi ming smos sngags btab nas//bzlas pa byas te song nas kyang //rgya mtsho 'bab pa'i klung du dor//de ltar na ni sdig can yong //ngan
17a4(rgyud): song las ni thor 'gyur na//dge ba'i mchog ni bskyes pa dang //byang chub sa bon bskyed pa'i bdag/sangs rgyas 'bras bu'i rgyu ldan pa//sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par
17a5(rgyud): ldan//tshul khrims rgyud dang rab ldan pa//bzod pa brtson 'grus mnyam bzhag dang //shes rab rnams kyi rgyu sgom pa'o//'jig rten bsod nams ldan
17a6(rgyud): ci smos//myur du de yi ngan song ni//bcom par gyur te the tshom med//dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed la//med par lta ba gang yin dang //byang chub lam las
17a7(rgyud): rnam log pas//bstan pa zhe sdang gnod byed cing //sdig pa'i rang bzhin ma mthong la//ma dang pha la snying ring zhing //byang chub sems la rten pa dang /
17b1(rgyud): 'dod chags bral ba bsad pa'i rnams//ci ste lha rnams med gyur tam//sangs rgyas dge 'dun chos de bzhin//sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs//shes rab thabs
17b2(rgyud): rnams med na ni//sdig can de dag mi thar zhes//bde gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs//de nas brgya byin la sogs lho//pad+ma lta bu'i mig phye nas//legs
17b3(rgyud): shes bya bas mnyes byas te//rab tu mgu nas mchod byas nas//brgya byin gzhan la phan brtson pas//ji skad gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du//shAkya'i gtso bos
17b4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa//bden pa nyid du byas gyur nas//de nas de ni dmyal ba yi//sdug bsngal las ni thar nas kyang //dga' ldan gan su sems can kun//phan phyir
17b5(rgyud): bde gshegs 'dra bar skyes//de nas dbang por bcas pa yi//grangs che lha rnams gar byed cing //mchod pa'i sprin ni mtha' yas pas//de bzhin gshegs la
17b6(rgyud): mchod bya'i phyir//lho yi tshogs kyis mdun byas te//tshe 'di nyid la mchod pa'i phyir//byang chub tu yang sems bskyed nas//lha rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi//me
17b7(rgyud): tog bdug pa byug pa dang //gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs//rgyan la sogs pa rab mdzes dang //na bza' rin chen char la sogs//dga' ba'i tshal
18a1(rgyud): ni grang bar byas//de na sa ya mtshan rjer gyur te//lha rnams kyis kyang phyag 'tshal nas//dbanga' ba'i chal ni yid 'ong ba//kun nas gong bar gyur pa yang //
18a2(rgyud): sna tshogs 'byung ba 'di ci lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//grogs pa dog shes par gyisra shig/rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa 'di ni lce'i bu nod du rim
18a3(rgyud): med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de yin no//mtshams med pa'i dbang du gyur pa yang myong zhing mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la bde'i 'gro'i dang du gyur pa gang lags pa de ni bcom
18a4(rgyud): ldan 'das ngo tshar log so//de bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags//de nas brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu thams cad kyi mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smraso//
18a5(rgyud): rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med//chos dang 'dra ba'i dge ba med//dge 'dun 'dra ba'i snod med de//sngags dang 'dra ba'i 'dren pa med//de nas lha'i bu de dag gis
18a6(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigasu skyes pa'i lha'i bu de ci 'dra ba zhig/de'i rdzu 'phrul dang
18a7(rgyud): mthu ni ji lta bu legs pa lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de bdag cag lta bar 'tshalo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha thams cad kyi snying
18b1(rgyud): bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'o 'od zer gyi phreng ba nyid kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo gnyis las phyung //byung nas kyang nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i lus tha~Md sdang bar byas nas
18b2(rgyud): snying khar zhugs te bskul nas yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas lha'i bu de nyid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas lus kyi 'od zer gyis dpag tshad brgya phrag steng tshun chad
18b3(rgyud): kyi namakha'i ngos thams cad gsal bar byis te/lha'i bu stong phrag du ma'i 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas nas lha'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos mi snang bar byas te 'ongs nas
18b4(rgyud): dga' ba'i tshal thams cad gsal zhing snang bar byas te/bcom ldan 'das dang /brgya byin gnyis me gtogs pa lha rnams kyi 'od zil gyis mnan to//de nas lha'i bu
18b5(rgyud): des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag tshul nas ched brjod pa dzang brdo//kye ma shAkya mgon po yi//sangs rgyas mdzad pa ya mtshan che//gang phyir ngan sang
18b6(rgyud): lhung ba yi//sems can myur du klog bzhin grol//de nas skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam kyi pad+mo tha~Md rin po che las byas pa/dpag tshad brgya phrag
18b7(rgyud): stong du dra'i ngad ldang ba/lho'i glu snyan pa'i sgra grag pa//ya mchen du ma yang dag par ston pa/lha rdzas kyi gru dang /gar dang //brdung ba dang /gling bu dang /rnga dang /
19a1(rgyud): kle ra ka rnams kyi sgra snyan pa 'dzin pa nag ma ldan 'das kyi s+thAn+da snar d+hung ste/mthong nas kyang shin tu yu mtshan skyes te 'di skad ces smras//de banan/
19a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i chos ni bsam mi khyab//sngags kyi yon tan sna tshogs bsam mi khyab//byang chub rten pa rnams kyang bas mi khyab//tshangs spyod tshul khrims dri med skya ba
19a3(rgyud): yas//de nas lha'i bu de dag gi bau lta bar 'tshalo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to//lha'i bu do dang de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams blta
19a4(rgyud): bar 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'tsha lo//bde bar gshegs pa blta bar 'tshal//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lnga the bo gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste/'od
19a5(rgyud): zer dri ma med pa des lha'i bu de dang lha'i 'khor de dag kun snang bar byas te bskul nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de la
19a6(rgyud): sogs pa gnas gtsang miHs+thi lha'i bu rnams kyi bac+doM me ljin 'das dang /bairgya byin gnyis kyi gdin ma gtogs par dga' ba'i tshel thams cad g.yos par
19a7(rgyud): byas te//lan brgya stong du mir bskor ba byas shing bskor ba byas nas yang 'di skad ces gsol to//kye ma'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni//sngags kyi byin
19b1(rgyud): rlangs ya mtshan cha//gang phyir mtshams med lhung ba yi//sems can lha gnas myur du skyes//de nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa'i lha/
19b2(rgyud): bu dag gis bcom ldan 'das la nor bu dang /gser dang /dngul dang /de shal dang /si mau da dang /gang blo dang /dpya D+yan dang /snyun cha la sogs pa rgyun gyi khyad
19b3(rgyud): par rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /'phen dang /lda ldi dang /snga ma la sogs pa ye byad kyo khyod par sna tshogs pa dang /seng gi'i gangan
19b4(rgyud): dang /gzim tshwa dang /pho brang dang /gzhal med khang dang /khang bu brtsegs pa la sogs pa gnas kyi khyad par sna tshogs pa dang /me tog dang spos la sogs pa mtsha
19b5(rgyud): pa'i khyad par sna tshogs pa dang /rang gis lus dang ngag dang /sems rnams kyang phul te/ba lang dang /rta dang /seng ge dang /stag dang /spre'u dang /rdo ba dang //
19b6(rgyud): thug ro dang /mi he dang /bong bu dang /rnga mo dang /chu srin dang /phag dang /ra dang /glang dang /ba dang /'dod pa'i ba bzhon lnga sogs pa bzhin pa'i khyad
19b7(rgyud): bair du ma yang phul nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang mngon par mchod/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
20a1(rgyud): kyang mngon par mchod de/logaso zhes bya tu gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das dang /brgya byin gnyis la bla ma dang /ste stang du byas te
20a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas de bzhin du song ngo //de nas brgya byin dang tshad pa la sogs lha rnam mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/bcon ldan 'das la yang dang yang du logaso zhes bya
20a3(rgyud): bis bstod cing mchod phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang gi slang du ma 'ongs pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'chang ba dang klog pa
20a4(rgyud): la spro bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod pa'i ston bshad du gsol/brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i bu rnams ngas bshad kyis//
20a5(rgyud): legs par nyon la yid la bzung shig/lha'i bu rnams dge ba bcu dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du thos par 'gyur gyi//sems can ma rabs
20a6(rgyud): rnams kyi ne ma yin no//pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/son phal pa ma rabs kyi ni ma yin no//
20a7(rgyud): sems can bsam pa nges pa rnams dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan mang po mngon par 'dod pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du 'gro ba 'gyur//mdonan
20b1(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shrIs la brten pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du 'gro bar 'gyur//de nas brgya byin dang /chang pa la so//'i lha'i bu de dag yang dag par dga' ba
20b2(rgyud): skyes nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sno du gyur pa'o//bde bar gshegs pa bdagra cagra ni slad du gyur pa ste/glang gri slad du
20b3(rgyud): bodag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sengs ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mtshan
20b4(rgyud): brjod pa 'di bcom ldan 'das pad+mo'i zhal nyid nas thos pas bdag cag ni don song gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur/dus ma lags por 'chi bas 'jig par mi
20b5(rgyud): 'gyur/'chi ba dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa la sogs pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
20b6(rgyud): ni gdon mi 'tshal bar sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i snod gyur pa lag so//bcom ldan 'das brtag pa'i rgyal po 'dis sems can rnams kyi dron pa gyid
20b7(rgyud): pa gang lags pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag go 'bras bu ni cir 'gyur/rnam par smin pa ni cir 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i dbang
21a1(rgyud): po de dag ni skyes bu dam pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i stangs rgyas nyid du lta bar bya ste/lha'i dbang po gang gi phyir 'jig
21a2(rgyud): rten pha rol tu phyin nas mchi mos med pa la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs rab
21a3(rgyud): tu spong bar byed pa dang /byang chub la gdon mi za bar ston par byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa phyir mi ldog pa la ba tu 'jog pa'i phyir te//lha'i dbang po dper
21a4(rgyud): na khyod kyi lho'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba mtshams med pa'i semaso can dmyal ba chen poro skyes pa'i don byas pa bzhin no//lha'i dbang po de ltar
21a5(rgyud): gzhon yang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i sems can de dag ci so so'i skye bo yin snyom sems som/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
21a6(rgyud): ma lag so//bde bar gshegs pa ma lag so//lho'i dbang po sems can de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po/gzhan la phan 'dogs pa ste/de bzhin
21a7(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang phyag bya ba mchod pa brjed pa sti stang du bya ba/'phrag la bskur bor bya ba yin na/lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta smos kyang ci
21b1(rgyud): dkris/de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /phyogs skyong ba bcu dang /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /gnod sbyin
21b2(rgyud): chen po nor bu bzang po dang /nor bu bzang po chen po la sogs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas po rnams dang /klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /bsnyen dga' bo gnyis
21b3(rgyud): dang /'phrog ma bu lnga brgyas bskor ba rnams dpaganod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po pAny+tsi kA dang /pAny+tsi ka chen po la sogs pa dang /gang gzhan dag kyang rgya che zheng rgya che ba'i lha
21b4(rgyud): dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /lha ma yin dong /na mkha' lding dang /dri za dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /'byung po dang /yi dgas dang /
21b5(rgyud): 'dra dang /rimra dang /gdon dang /dug dang /skar mA la sogs pa thams cad kyis 'grin cig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'dus shing
21b6(rgyud): tshogs pa thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa chen po de'i rkang pa gnyis mgo bos blang bar bgyi'o//mdor na rtag pa rgyun dus thams cad du srung ba dang /bskyab pa
21b7(rgyud): dang //sba bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gang du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dang pos 'chang ngam/klog gem gzhan lo rgya
22a1(rgyud): char yang dag par 'chud par 'gyur ram/gdun sa dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan la sogs pas mchod par 'azuram/rgyal rabyas sam/bram ze'i ra
22a2(rgyud): s+yam/rje'u rigs sam//de mangs rigs sam/gzhan yang rgyal po ngom/rgyal po'i bu 'am/rgyal po'i bu mo 'am/rgyal po'i btsun mo 'am/rgyal po'i 'khor
22a3(rgyud): po 'am/rgyal po'i 'khor mo 'am/gang su yang rung bas 'chang zhing klog pa dang /gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par 'chad cing ston pa'i bar du bgyid na/bcom
22a4(rgyud): ldan 'das bdog cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad de'i bran du gyur pa lagaso//rang gi skye bo dang /gnyen gyi skye bo dang /grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong
22a5(rgyud): rdardul dang /ljongs dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams yongasu brkyang bar bgyi/dus dus tshor dbab par bgyi/'bru la sogs pa bskyed par bigyi/skye bo mang pa
22a6(rgyud): la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du sgrub pa ru bgyi/pha rol gyi bla ma meng po gzhom par bgyi/sems can ma rungs pa gnod cing 'chab pos de la mi phan pa'i soms bsgyung
22a7(rgyud): ba gang yin pa de dag brlag po'i gyi ba'i slad du sgrub par bgyi/ma rungs par bgyi/de la bdud kyi las kyang bai gyi/gnod par bgyi ba la yang nye bar gnas par ba
22b1(rgyud): ste/bcom ldan 'das mdar na ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnam la brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lta bur gnas pa lags pas/bcom ldan 'das
22b2(rgyud): bdag cag gis bu bzhin du bskyang rdzabagyi'o//lha'i dbang po khyod kyis ji ltar smras pa de de bzhin te/rtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin du blta bar bya'o//lha'i dbang po leg
22b3(rgyud): kyis/'dzam bu'i gling ni gnos pa'i sems can sdig pa'i chos la kun tu spyod pa/sems can dmyal ba'i dbang du gyur pa/'khor ba mi gtsang ba'i dong du bying ba'i
22b4(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring por 'gro yod por byos la bsgrubs shig///bam po gnyis pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das byang
22b5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus brtog pa'i rgyal po brtag pa phyi ma 'di bshad//dpa' bo gdan las bzhengs nas ni//dgyes shing
22b6(rgyud): rdo rje gsor nas kyang //shAkya'i dbang po dgyes mdzad pa//thub pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal nas/sgrib pa thams cad rnamapar dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
22b7(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas ngan song thams cad las rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba rang gi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung //oM sar+b+ba pA ba da ha ni badz+ra hU~M phaT/oM sar+b+ba pA pa/
23a1(rgyud): bau shau d+ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/oM bad+d+ha kArma A ba rar+t+ta nI b+hUsmiM ku ru hUM phaT/oM b+hU be nA sha ya A ba rAr+t+ta ni hUM phaT/oM b+hU be sho d+ha ya A bA rA NA ni hU~M phaT/oM d+ha
23a2(rgyud): la dz+wa la/d+ha kA d+ha ka/ha na ha na/sarba A ba ra NI ni hUM phaT/oM skr-i saM ra sau re pra sa ra mra sai ra/A ba rA NA ni hU~M phaT/au hUM hA ri sar+b+ba A ba ra NA nI hU~M phaT/oM hUM phaT/
23a3(rgyud): sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/oM b+h+r-i ta b+h+r-i ta/sarba I ba ra NA ni hU~M phaT/oM trAT tAT sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni hUM trA/oM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+de sarba A ba ra NA ne hUM phaT/oM bi dra ba bi
23a4(rgyud): dra ba sar+b+ba A pA ya tat+t+wa NA ni hU~M phaT/oM da he da ha sar+b+bA na ra ka ga to hi hUM hUM phaT/oM pa tsa pe tsaM sar+b+ba pre ta ga ti he hUM hUM phaT/oM ma tha ma tha sar+b+ba tir+ya ga ga ti ha tAM hU~M phaT/de nas
23a5(rgyud): de dag rnams kyi yo byAs+yAb shad//oM sar+b+ba pA paM bi sho d+ha na d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hU ba ya hUM phaT/oM sar+b+ba durga ti bi sho d+he ni puSh+pa bi lo ka nI hUM phaT/oM sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha nidz+nyA nA A
23a6(rgyud): lo ka ka ri hUM paT/oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ga ti gan+d+ha sha na gAn d+ha bi tAM hUM pheMT/sgo ba rnams kyi sngags la/oM sar+b+ba na ra ka ga ti uD+ha ni hUM phaT/oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ban+thi ni bi
23a7(rgyud): mo tsa ni hUM bi phaT/oM sarba a pA ya b+han d+ha na mau tsa na hUM phaT/oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ga ti ga he na bi nA sha ni hUM ho phaT/de nas dkyil 'khor bshad 'khor lo 'dra ba'i
23b1(rgyud): tshan ga na aN/sa samaman sa ma tham/amaHthas mnathaHSha sa naThathaH thamathamamatham tham thal ma la tham rtsamamaHtham pa mtham ma/thamasas mamatha.am kam
23b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la//shin tu mdzes par rtsibs brgyad can//lte bar bcas shing rtsibs rten ldan//nang gi rim pa bris nas ni//tsA ba'i nang du shAkya yi//bdag po thub pa bzhag par
23b3(rgyud): bya//lag na rdo rje stobs chen ni//dpe' de yi spyan mngar bri//rgyub tu 'khor los bsgyur ba bri//g.yas phyogs rgyal ba'i gtsug tor l-I//g.yon par rnam par rgyal ba bri//
23b4(rgyud): badz+rad phung po me'i phyogs//dbang po'i phyogasu gdugs dkar po//rnam par 'thor po rlung gi phyogs//rnam par 'jom pa nai ri t+ya ra//bris nas phyi rol bri bya ste//gru bzhi pa la
23b5(rgyud): sgo bzhi pa//sing+go rta babs brgyan par bya//dpa' bos lcags kyu zhags pa dang /lcigas+t+r-i sgrog dril bu snyan rnams bzhag/glu yi phyogs ni thams cad du//bdug pa la
23b6(rgyud): sogs bri bar bya//de nas dri zhimadri la sogs//rang gi lus ni bskus nas kyang /rdo rje 'dzin ma zhugs nas ni//oM dzany+tsa hU ba~M hoHb+ha ga ban/e h+ye hi ma hA ka ru Ne ke dri
23b7(rgyud): sh+ya to//so ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes pas lha rnams thams cad spyan drang //de nas gshegs par mos pa skyed de mchod pa byas nas/de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na
23b8(rgyud): ngan song thams cad las rnam par grol te//bde 'gro mitha ris kyi ris kyi 'jig rten dang /gong nas gong dus rnamasu yod skye bar 'gyuraro//dngos grub thams cad kyang
24a1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur//sangs rgyasu yang gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur//snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med par/
24a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro//bya ba byis pas ni rims nang thaMd dang /gdon dang /dug la sogs pa las zer par 'gyur ro//phyag na rdo rje'i hUM zhes bya bas las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro//
24a3(rgyud): brtag pa gzhan gyi cho ga thams cad kyang sgrub par 'gyuraro//lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi rgyud kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi
24a4(rgyud): shrI nga'i ro 'am gzugs brnyan nam/ming la sogs pa byis te bzlas pa dang /sbyin srogs dang /dbang rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du ngan song thams cad las yongasu
24a5(rgyud): grol bar byeda'o//den bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes seng gi'i lta stangs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//
24a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya dme pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bgyi'o//thugs rjes bsku le ba'i thugs gsang ba'i//rgyal po kun gyi byin gyis rlobs//mnyam par gzha
24a7(rgyud): pas dpral bar ni//phyag 'tshal ba la thal mo sbyar//sangs rgyas bde gshegs skyes rnams kyi//phyag 'tshal ba yi phyog brgyar bshad//rnal 'byor
24b1(rgyud): rigs pas mgrin phyogasu//thal mo snyam par sbyar ba ni//rtag tu pad+ma'i rigs nyid kyi//pad+ma'i phyag rgya yin par bshad//rdo rje thul mo sbyar nas kyang //snying kar gung mo
24b2(rgyud): mtha' sbyar ba//rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya 'di//dam tshig thams cad 'dzin byed pa'o//log pa g.yon pa'i thal mo gan rgyal du dpya du bzhag la/do yaM steng du
24b3(rgyud): g.yas po bzhag ste/mthe bo'i ngos gnyis spyad la zhi ba'i lta bas lta ba 'di ni de bzhini gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste//dam tshig yin par bshad///
24b4(rgyud): de nyid las bzlog ste lha 'og bsnol la mthe bong dang /mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig lug gu rgyud kyi tshul du bsnol te slong kar baM zhag pa 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs
24b5(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//thal mo rdzogs par sbyang ba las mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsnyams pa le lhag mi rnams rkyang ba 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig
24b6(rgyud): gi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bsdams pa bsdams pa los/gung mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bskams la/mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag
24b7(rgyud): rgya'o//de nyid la se mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis de bzhin du byas la/mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag pad+mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni ngan song thams cad yongasu
25a1(rgyud): skyong ba'i phyug rgyu'o//de nyid las mdzub mo dung smon lag gnyis rlan po tshe 'dra bar b+h+yas pa ni dbyung bsgyur ba phyug+sa d+hA'o//maH
25a2(rgyud): chung dang mthe bos so sor bsnams lo//lcug ma rnams bting ba ni sdig pa thams cad sgregs pa'i b+hak+kar+b+ha'o//lag pA ka yin pas de bzhon du rgyang zhing bye
25a3(rgyud): bo ni lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//sbyin pa bzed la gyen du 'thor ba ni ba dug pa'i phyag rgya'o//de las 'og nas gyen du 'byor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o//
25a4(rgyud): nyid lus mthe byo gas rkyen du bsnams la mdun du 'dzin h+ne nI mar me'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las dung 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las rab tu byu
25a5(rgyud): 'dzin pan gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni ar+g+ha'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bcings pa las grong mo gnyis bstan te/tshogs
25a6(rgyud): dang po bcag la sor mau thams cad brkyang ba ni rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o/de nyid las mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam par 'joms
25a7(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las 'od zer 'bar ba 'dra ba'i gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las skye bor bskor ba ni gdugs kar po'i phyag rgya'o//
25b1(rgyud): rdorjekhu tshur gan+d+hes lngas mA mo gnyis dang thedu chung gnyis bsnol to/mdud la byon du bsko bu ni 'khor nga phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bsdams pa las bung myo gnyis dza d+hA
25b2(rgyud): byas lo mdzub mo gnyis rin po che lta bur byas te//lkog ma rnams 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyog rgyu'o//de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la/
25b3(rgyud): mo lhag ma rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dro bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i'o//g.yas pa mchog sbyin du byas lo g.yon pa sbyin pa ni de bzhini gshegs pa'o yin//
25b4(rgyud): rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mdzubo mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni lcogs kyu'i'o//de nyid las me tog 'dre bar
25b5(rgyud): byas pa ni 'di'i'o//de nyid las slaro bkug ste/mtho'o gnyis rtse mo sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i 'o//de nyid las tshigs bar ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i'o//de nyid
25b6(rgyud): las sor mo las 'od zer 'dre bar 'gyed pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o//de nyid las spyi bor bzhig pa dpal gyi'o//de nyid las mdun du bzhag pa bzhad pa'i'o//de nyid las bud
25b7(rgyud): 'dra bar byas pa ni pad+ma'i'o//de bzhin nyid las rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni ralo gri'o//de nyid las gdu bu 'dra bar byas po ni 'khor lo'i'o//de nyid las pad+ma'i 'ad
26a1(rgyud): mU 'dra byur byas pa ni lpA'i'o//de ny-id lasad+d+hi mo yang tsam bkyod pa ni d+h+ya dram//de ny-id las shin tu bskyed pa ni srung ba'o//de nyid las rtse mo gnyis sgyur
26a2(rgyud): bkug pa ni banod sbyin gyi'o//dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'i'o//bsdams pa nyid mdun du dkug pa ni bdug pa'i 'o//de nyid gyen du bstod pa ni phreng ba'i'o//mdun du mithe'o
26a3(rgyud): gnyis bsdams te bskor ba ni mar mo'i'o//de nyid byug pa ltar byas pa ni 'dri'i'o//de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lha rgyu'i'o//de nyid las rtse mo gnyi sa spring pa ni
26a4(rgyud): zhugs pa'i'o//de nyid las gcig la gcig mdud pa ni/phyogs sgrog gi'o//de nyid las bskyod pa ni mnyes pa'i'o//sku gzugs kyi chog yang 'dir de bzhin du d+h+ya
26a5(rgyud): te/cung zad du na bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs bri'o//yang na sku gzugs ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul bzhin du bris la mi tog
26a6(rgyud): la sogs pas mchod de/de'i spyan sngar 'bum tsam zhig sngar ston pa byas nas las thams cad bya'o//de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i cho gas rnams kyis
26a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das las kyi rnam par smon pa gang gi lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de
26b1(rgyud): dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du gyur/de nus bcom ldan 'das phyug na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i rkyen gyi brlabs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
26b2(rgyud): lha'i dbang po nyon cig/'di ni sngon gyi lus kyi sgrib pa yin te//'dzem du'i gling gi ris 'di nyid na mtha' 'khob pa'i rig so ngan du gtogs pa'i rgyal po lus mi bde ba
26b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/des mi shes pa'i dbang gos mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pas rgyal po 'dod pa'i phyir rang gi pha 'tsho ba dang bral bar gyur pa dang
26b4(rgyud): mdo'i mya ngan gyis gzir bas mA yang dus las 'das//lhan cig ci zhig rkyen gyis nags tshol stug po gzhan zhig du rtse zhing dga' ba'i phyir nye bar song ngo //den drang srong dgos
26b5(rgyud): pa med por byams pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/de mthong ba dang rgyal po shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas/kye ma 'di lta bu seng ge dang /stag dang /ri dgra dang /bag rgod dang /
26b6(rgyud): ba lang dang /ma he la sogs pa dang /sbrul dang /sre mo dang /sbrang bu dang /sbrang bu mchu rengs dang /sbrul gdug pa can rnams kyis gtso ba/bza' ba dang /
26b7(rgyud): btung ba dang /mgo ba dang /longs spyod rnams dang rnam par bral ba/rlung dang grang bas yongasu gdung zhing 'i tshe ba de na bdag nyid chen po 'di gnaso snyam par sems kyi
27a1(rgyud): brtags nas de'i rung du nye bar sring sgra sbyin pa dang /de la 'di skad nas smras//drung sro chen po khyoda'i sbyinarlung dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bdag la gnang /
27a2(rgyud): par byed/drang srong gi smras pa/skyes bu chen po bskal pa brgya stong phrag du mar sgrib pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba las/sdug bsngal gyi khur bu cung zad
27a3(rgyud): tsa mo zhig blang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur pas 'di ni sdug bsngal ma yin gyi/skad cig tsam
27a4(rgyud): mam/yum tsam zhig yul gyi bde ba rje su myong bas bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma mtha' thug pa med pa dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rje su myang bar 'gyur
27a5(rgyud): ro//yul gyi bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir pha me lo sogs pa yang gsod par 'gyur na srog chags gzhan lta co smos te/sangs rgyas dang /ches dang dge 'dun
27a6(rgyud): yongasu mi shes pa'i phyir sdig pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//drang srong gis smras pa'i tshig de skad ces thos pa dang shin tu 'jigs skrag skyo ste/sdug
27a7(rgyud): bsngal thams cad kyiso gzir nas 'di skad ces smra so//sangs rgyas dang /chos dang dge 'dun zhes bya ba de ci zhig/de'i rang bzhini ji lta bu yin
27b1(rgyud): bo dka' thub chen po smras shig dang /de la kho bo yang skyangasu 'chi'o//pha ma lnga gtses pa dang /srog chags rnams kyi srog bcung na sdig pa ji lta 'u zhig thob par
27b2(rgyud): 'gyur//sangs rgyas dang /chod dang dge 'dun zhes bya ba ci zhig/de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa yongasu shes ni bsod nams ci 'dra ba zhig yongasu 'thob/pha ma
27b3(rgyud): ma bsad pa dang /srogs chags rnams kyang ma bsad no bsod nams ci 'dra ba cig 'thob//'bras bu ji lta bu zhig 'thob/'dod pa'i longs spyod spangs na bsod nams/
27b4(rgyud): dang 'bras bu ci 'dra ba zhig 'thob/de nas drang srong des dri la 'di skad ces smraso//ci ste sems can chen po khyod//nga yi tshigs 'di nyan 'dod na//thal mo sbyar te phyag/
27b5(rgyud): 'tshal la//gus par nyon dang bshad par bya'o//de bzhin bgyi zhes bsgrubs nas ni//ci mdog pas ni mchod byas te//sangs rgyas sbyong yul sangs rgyas kyi//zab/
27b6(rgyud): me'i chos ni nyin par 'gyur//sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs drag la//thos nas kyang ni skyabasu song //sangs rgyas rnams kyi slob mong chos//rgyal pos thos nas//
27b7(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur//yi dgas byol song dmyal Da rnams//sdig pa kun gyi 'bras bu ste//yul spyod pa dang srog chags rnams/bsod cing shin tu mi zad dang /
28a1(rgyud): pha mu gtses pa'i rgyu las byung //bskal pa du mar rab sdug bsngal//dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi zad pa//mngon mod sgyubs kyang med pa ste//thos nas
28a2(rgyud): mya ngan zug rngu yis//rang gi yid la gdung ba ni//ji ltar rlung gis mer me bzhin//de nyid du ni dus las 'das//las kyi rnam smin de yis ni//dga' dang ldan pa'i
28a3(rgyud): lhor skyes na//brgya byin lha yi dbang po yi//blon po gzugs dang ldan pa la//lha rnams kun dang yid 'thun zhing //rab dga' bde dang ldan par skyes//bde
28a4(rgyud): bo'i mchog ni myong gyur nas//ngan song du yang ltung bar 'gyur//de nas da ltar lha dbang po//khyod kyi mthus kyang de nyid ni//dga' ldan gnas ni dgo' ba'i mchog
28a5(rgyud): bde mang kun gyi gan su skyes//lha yi dbang po nyon cig dang //gang gi tshe 'byung ba de'i dus na byung ba'i drang srong du gyur pa de ni gzhan yin par khyed kyis shes par
28a6(rgyud): mi bya'o//bcom ldano 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid do//par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni
28a7(rgyud): gzhan yin pa khyod kyis shes pa ri mi bya ste/lci'i dbang po de'i tshe de'i dus na khyod de'i phar gyur to//me gang yin pa de gzhan yin par mi blta ste/de'i tshe de'i dus
28b1(rgyud): na sha tso ka nyid yin no//'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin par mi lta'o/lha'i 'khor 'di dag nyid yin no////de nas brgya byin dang /
28b2(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams yid rab tu mgu zhing rangs te/ba spu'i bu gnas spu rnams langs shing rgyal ba rgyal ba zhes skang chen por bos nas bcom ldan
28b3(rgyud): 'das phyag na rdo rje la ming bracu pa 'dis mngon par bstod de gsol ba bta ba po/ko Te ko Ta k+Sha/ko TAHko TAHko TA bash+tsa kau TI ra ka/ko la k+Sha ko lA baHko la ko l+yA
28b4(rgyud): bak+ku/ka lasta tha i ti zhes byas nas/brgya byin la sogs lha mchog rnams//sems can kun la phan pa dang //tshe dang nad med spel ba'i phyir//mgron
28b5(rgyud): bo khyod la gsol ba 'debs//bcom ldan 'das tshe thung ba dang /bskal pa chung brnan kyi don dang /phan pa dang /bde ba dang /tshe sring ba'i srad du bshad du gsol//gsang ba'i
28b6(rgyud): bdag po bsha du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje brgya byin dang //tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor mang po de dag la gzigs nas leg so zhes
28b7(rgyud): bya ba las mgu bar byas te/tshangs pa la sogs po lha'i bu rnams gang khyed kyis 'di lta bu'i spong pa yang dag par bskyed pa de ni legaso//leg so legs par sgrub
29a1(rgyud): nga ga pang phyu//danas bcom ldan 'dus rgyun du sems na kyis dag tu med pa ba pa byu rdo rdzun s+yA da 'dzin na
29a2(rgyud): sa par zhugs nas ni da/sa rnams dang /s+ye shrIs kyi tshogs dpag tu med par 'dul bas bya ba'i de bzhin ga shegs kyi snang po 'di
29a3(rgyud): mA.A k+Sha nA~M dz+nyAn maung sa da na/mas rten de m+b+hal bdang/ yid la hUM 'i
29b1(rgyud): mtshan ka \u0f7fsa sasamatham/thasamams ma mamams ma mabal tham ba mam mams
29b2(rgyud): mau ta ud d+hU bo/a mo ta so b+ha ho/a mi tA ba krAn+d+ha/u mr-i ta bi grAn+ta/grA mi ni/sar+b+ba kar+m+mak+saM shak+Sha yo kar s+yAt+ma//donas d+mo ba shad ma thag tu ngo bzhin du sems can
29b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de
29b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams tsakyi sgrib pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzung 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo //oM ki ka ni kaM kra ni/ro tsa ni ro tsa ni te Ta ni tro Ta ni/d+h+we sA nI trA sa ni
29b5(rgyud): prati ha na pra ti ha na/sAr+b+ba kar+m+ma ba ra parA Ni ma~M s+yAd+g+ha satwA nots+tshu swA hA//'di bshad ma thAg tu yid thams cad de bzhin du gyur to//de nas rang bcom ldan 'das kyi sgrib pa
29b6(rgyud): thams ca de dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyom pa zhu nAs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi slob pa rnams ma lus par 'joms pa zhes
29b7(rgyud): bya ba'i snying pa'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung //oM rat+na raSh+pe ma hA rat+ne/rAt+na sa~M b+ha be/rat+na ki ra Ne/rat+na m+b+ha lA bi shud+d+he shod+d+ha yA/sar+b+ba pA pa ni hU~M phaT/
29b8(rgyud): de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom/rnam par bcom par gyur te//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gdon mi za bar mi chems pa'i sgrib
30a1(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di
30a2(rgyud): rang gi thug+ma ka nAs phyung ngo //oM a mo g+ha a pra te he ta/sod+d+ha a da ra Na/bi sho d+ha ni/ha re ha ra hUM phaT/gsang sngags 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi Sha
30a3(rgyud): thams cad g.yos//rab tu g.yos/yang dag par rab tu g.yoso//bskyod rab tu bskyod/yang dag par rab tu bskyod do//bskul/rab tu bskul/yang
30a4(rgyud): yang dag par rab tu bskul nas rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig rten du snang bar gyur to//dri nas dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin d+he/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//sgo ba
30a5(rgyud): rnams dang ldan pa skye//rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya//lte ba dang ni sgo khyud ldan//de yi dbusu 'khor lo yi//dkyil 'khor dam pa bi bya ste//rtsibs bzhi dag dang
30a6(rgyud): ldan pa la//lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan par bya//ngo yi dbusu gtso bo ni//phyag na rdo rje stobs chen po//phyag na rdo rje dril bsnams shing //zla ba rgyas pa'i zhal
30a7(rgyud): 'dzum bri//shar gyi rtsibs kyi steng du ni//mgon po mi bskyod bri bar bya//lho yau phyogasu rin chen bri//nub phyogs chu skyes pad+ma la//byang phyog su ni gdon mi za//da
30b1(rgyud): bo stobs rgyan sro bArar+ya b+h+yo//de bzhin gA shwe nus pa thams cad ni//'khor los bsgyur bachas pa dang /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdog 'dra zhing //rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang /
30b2(rgyud): phyag ni mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa//rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gzugs bri//grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du//de bzhin bdug sogs thams cad bri//skye ba dag kyi khros pa la/
30b3(rgyud): ba'i dbang du gyur pa bri nas rnal 'byor can nyid zhugs//sngags kyi lha rnams skyon drangs te//dza hU~M ba~M haM//b+ha ga bi badz+ra ai N+ya hi sa ma ya s+t+waM//de nas gtso bo byon pa dang //mdor na
30b4(rgyud): mchod pa byas nas kyang //'chi bo dag sbrul gyis 'jig sde ldan rnams//'chi byadag gzhom+b+ha phyir gzhugs par bya//oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM//rdo rje ti rini tau ri bcings la//lag na
30b5(rgyud): rin chen thog te gzhug/yang na me tog phreng ba ste//de ni dkyil 'khor nyid du dor//oM br-i tits+tsha badz+re hUM/de nas mA ni'i dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/
30b6(rgyud): nas 'dis gdong gi yogs dgrol bar bye ste/oM bAdz+ra hwA s+yA ud g+hA Ta ye hU~M//de nas 'das bstan par bya ste/oM badz+ra dr-i sh+ye ho//de nas 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o//
30b7(rgyud): oM dz+ra a bi Shiny+tsa hUM/oM bud+d+ha a bi Shany+tsa yau/yau rat+na ya bi Sheny+tsa d+hI/oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM karmo oM b+hi Shiny+tsa a/de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o//oM
31a1(rgyud): d+hug na sar+g+ha trA r+N+Na ma ts+tshakA rAdz+nyAn sgyu ny+dza na/s+ho kAl shA na d+hA d+hA/oM rAg k+Shag+sa mam+b+han//rAka snga ga sa /
31a2(rgyud): a/de nas drang ba'i dbang tu ba /t+ma la sa//d+de Sh+Ta USh+Ta pa na /trang+gas+yA d+hA
31a3(rgyud): /ya~M s+yA twA sa.oM d+him+be d+hA akAn m+'ud+h+ya ASh+T+rI na / r+m+ma
31a4(rgyud): /It+ta thAg+hA tAd+hAr/ Sh+T+r-its+tsharmA/ ny+tsa sar+b+ba tA
31a5(rgyud): d+h+waM d+b+hin+yA/au dzAM bu d+h+ya a gai hU~Md+hA/I h+nA guMd+b+ha A Sh+NIn+ditr-IH/ai r+b+hiklAr+N+Na a/\u0f7fai/r+m+ma gud+d+ha AHau pradz+nyA pa yis ma
31a6(rgyud): yo ga ya b+hi Shiny+tsa d+hU ya/de myur dbang bskur nas tshe sring po'i rig pa 'di sbyin par bya'o//oM b+h+rUM badz+ra A yuM Shi hUM aHder sgrub pa ni 'di yin te//bcom ldan 'dra/
31b1(rgyud): rnamatsho zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/phyug gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin du mdzad pa pas bdud rtsi mdzag pa
31b2(rgyud): bri'o//de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po'i lag pa thal mo brkyang la/gdong byin du bcom ldan 'odas la blta bar bris la mchod pa rnam pa lnga mchod de/de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas
31b3(rgyud): par bya'o//de nas zla ba nya ba dang mchod pa chen po byos te ba dmar ser gyi mar snod sar par bcug la rdo rje g.yon pas mnan te/bcom ldan 'das rab tu sems shing mtshan
31b4(rgyud): thog thog tu bzlas par bya'o//de nas dri ma mnam zhing mngon ma byung ba'i driSh+Ti ldang li rlangs pa 'am/du ba 'am/me byung ngam/'od zer ma me sgron nam/'od byung ngam/de la
31b5(rgyud): sogs pa'i mtshan mo byung na mar de 'am/mar sar ram/til mar ri me/chu 'am/'o ma 'am/zho 'am/chang ngam/khrag glame/zhag ma/klad pa 'am/sha 'am/
31b6(rgyud): gang yang rung ba la rab tu smras te/nang par sngar srung ba la sogs pa byas nus bdag nyid sbyangs te thungs sum zos na mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du byung na ni nam zla ba dang nyi ma
31b7(rgyud): dang yod kyi bar du tshe ring zhing rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/tha mos ni tha ma 'grub pas 'di la the tshom ni med do//mtshan ma byung na yang 'jig rten na nad med/
32a1(rgyud): lngab skyon/lus la sgra kar dang gnyer ma med par 'gyur//lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur//gzhan yang bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis
32a2(rgyud): zhi ba dang /rgyas pa dang /dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'gyur te the tshom medo/don rgyal po che bo bzhis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag
32a3(rgyud): 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang seM ni thams cad kyi don dang /phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad por
32a4(rgyud): 'tshal gyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal du gsol/rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' stsal du gsal/rgyal po chen po rnams legs kyi shod shog dang /ngas kyang
32a5(rgyud): rjesu yi rang zhing byin gyis rlob par bya'o//de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyi gnang zhing rje su yi rang ste/byin gyis brlabs pas
32a6(rgyud): rang gi snying po 'od bshad de/oM ba~M nas dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad//en+d+he/de nas grul dum gyi rgyal po 'phagos skye bos kyang rung gi
32a7(rgyud): snying pa 'di bshad //e ze/da nas klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang ba kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad//oM k+Sha/de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad do//klu bzhi pa
32b1(rgyud): s+yan//dal 'khor rdzas nA dz+nyAn paste//da yo dadus su gan na//phyugan rjeb gyid baHsa//de y-i garan phyugs//rnamathos bu dag lag pa na//
32b2(rgyud): tsun na nul zag pa da//naHne rgyan gyi brgyan pa dang // m+b+ha ni na'i gdan la bzhugs//gseng ma dag ga zichen ldan par bri//mkhas pas bum po ts+tshed lasags
32b3(rgyud): chen nu nga 'bar bar blo/mdun du yul la khor snang nyid ni//pi bang len pa brdzun pa dang //mdzes shing kha dag ljang ku ste//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri//gsas rgyan
32b4(rgyud): dpa' bo lus 'phags po//deste kye+e lag na thigs pa bri//nub phyog su ni mig mi bzung //rdo rje zhag pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/sbrul mge bdun gyi bskor ba la//min kyi
32b5(rgyud): dmar zhing shin tu 'bar//sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du//sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin//de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes byu bas//sngags mkhyen padag nyid zhugs nas kyang //bcom
32b6(rgyud): ldan 'das ni /dang yA tA//nga nas rgyam po sbyin drung //spyan drang nas ni mkhas pas mchod//tshig bzhin du yon da // sngags mi na 'di dang /rje'i dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'dris
32b7(rgyud): slob ma rgyal rin mo rje'u rigs//bram zal sogs de bzhin tI//me ho//rid chen thogs te zhugs//oM badz+ra sa ma yai hUM/de nas me tog ga marin po che 'dis dor bar byal
33a1(rgyud): oM badz+ra prad+d+hAd+hA twA ma ho/ta ma//gang la bab pa'i rgyal pa ni//de ni 'dis 'byung gzhan du med//de nas grwa la bzhag pa yi//bum pa bzhis ni dbang bskur
33a2(rgyud): te//dang po phyag na rdo rje yi//phyag rgyas dbang ni bskur bar bya//de la sogs pa go rims kyis//dkyil 'khor nyid du dbang bskur na//rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur//
33a3(rgyud): rgyal po yin no che bar 'gyur//'dzam bu gling dbang dpal dang ldan//gling bzhi pa la dbang ba'i mchog/lan bzhi dbang ni bskur ba dang //lan bzhir gzhug par byas nas ni//de
33a4(rgyud): la rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag/bu sdug bzhin du bskyang ba dang //bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis//bran dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang //pho brang dang ni 'khor bcas pas//rgyal po
33a5(rgyud): rtag tu bskyang bar bgyi//de ge nid gzhan gyi phye ma dang //de yind dang 'chi bdag gi/'jigs dang mu ge la sogs pa'i//gnod pa rnams ni gzhom par bgyi//rnam thos
33a6(rgyud): bus ni rgyas par bgyi//yul 'khor srung gi zhi bar bgyi//phyag dang gnyen bcasu drus min pa'i//'chi bdag srus phags po yis 'joms//mig mi bzang gis bkra
33a7(rgyud): shes shing //mu ge la sogs rnam par 'joms//mdor na bdag gis de yi ni//re dang bsam pa kun bgyi ste//ji ste nges pa ma lags na//phyag na rdo rje la 'dres
33b1(rgyud): 'gyur///de nas phyogs sbyong ba rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang sems can thams rgyud la
33b2(rgyud): phan pa dang /bde ba'i slad du rong rang gi snying po rnams dbul bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkud stsal pa/'jig rten skyong gi rnams lcogaso leg so//legs kyi phul
33b3(rgyud): ts+tshi/de nas 'byung po rnams kyi bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi snying po rnams phul ba/oM I/oM i au yaM/au ya/au r-i/oM baM/ai ya/oM ku/oM a
33b4(rgyud): oM pra/de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la//mgon po dbu su de bzhin bzhag/phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnasu//bzhag bya spyan sngar
33b5(rgyud): ma dang //bag gi gzugs dang gnyis bzhag ste//skyo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no//de nas spyan drangs de kun la//mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya//de nas bdagro nyid zhugs
33b6(rgyud): nus kyang //slob ma rnams ni bzhug bya zhing //phyogs skyong rang gi sngags btab pa'i//bum pa rnams kyis dbang bsgyuraro//de nas phan par 'dod pa yis//bsgrub phyir snying
33b7(rgyud): sbyin par bya//phyog skyengs rang gi phyogs gan so rnamaso//brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur//de nas de dag mgu nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
34a1(rgyud): /glang rgyal rig kyi sbyi nas dbang bskur zhing //rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs te/dbang bskur ba thob pa'am//gzhan yang ri kyi bu'am/r-i kyo bu mo dang dang/
34a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par dus thams cad du srung ba dang /bsgrub pa dang /sba bar bgyi'o//pha rol gyi phru ma kun gzhon par bgyi//dus du su char pa dbab par bgyi/'bra
34a3(rgyud): me tog dang /'bras bu rnams bskyed par bgyi'o//de nas chos kyi rgyal po chen po gshin rjes bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
34a4(rgyud): bdag gis kyang rgyal po chen po de'i tshe srid par bgyi'o//dus ma lags par 'chi ba brgyad po so so dgag par bgyi'o//srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po ni ri tis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//
34a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po dang /rgyal po'i bu dang /bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /mi 'am/gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad dang /yi dgas dang /'dres
34a6(rgyud): mi 'jigs par bgyi/srin po la sogs pas 'jigs par mi bgyi/dus ma lags pa'i 'chi bdag gis 'jigs par mi bgyi ste/dus thams cad du srung ba dang /bskyab
34a7(rgyud): pa dang /sba bar bgyi'o///de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po ba ru nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rtag par dus thams cad du rgyo
34b1(rgyud): pad/ mra thams dngas sor bsgra par bcoM/kun tu smad bar ts+tsha/'brurnams bapyod par /klu nyos pa rnams med mar //ga yo / ma yan
34b2(rgyud): ngotsho ba rnam sa gag lnga gyi//de nas rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsal to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du rlung gi 'jigs pa ma'i byung
34b3(rgyud): bar bgyi/dus me legs pa'i rlung mi 'byung bar bgyi/'bru dang /me tog dang /'bras bu thams cad bskyed par bkye/'jigs pa thams cad seM sa dngagag par 'gyi'o//
34b4(rgyud): nas gnad sbyin gyi rgyal po chen pokri ba ras bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gnod sbyin gyi ste dpon
34b5(rgyud): \u0f7f brgyad dang lhan cig du mchis te/stabs drung ldan pa sna sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par ba gyi/nor dang /'bru
34b6(rgyud): rnams the mas cad legs par 'gyur bar bgyi/rang gi skye bo dang /yongs kyi skye bo dang /yul dang /gnas dang /bran dang /ga gi gnyen dang /rus kyi
34b7(rgyud): dang /grogs dang /bu dang /bu mo dang /chung ma la sogs pa srung bar bgyi/gling dang /ba lang dang lo dru /dza mo dang /lug dang /mi hA dang /bklung dang /NA dang /
35a1(rgyud): la sogs pa la yang srung bar bgyi'o//de nas 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang byed kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad
35a2(rgyud): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag bris kyang rgyal po de dang /rgyal po de dag gi bu dang /rgyal rigs dang /bram ze rnams 'di dang pha rol tu bskyab pa dang /pin
35a3(rgyud): gdags pa dang /yongasu bskyeb pa dang /zhi ba dang /bkra shis pa dang /chad baspang ba dang /mtshon cha spang ba dang /dug bzhil ba dang /dug gzhom pa dang /mtsha
35a4(rgyud): bcad dang /sa'i 'og gi mtsha mos bcad pa dang /phyogs kyi mtshams bcad pa dang /rdo rje ra bas bskor ba dang /rdo rje phur bus gdab pa dang /rdo rje dra ba rnams bre
35a5(rgyud): par bgyi/dgos pa rnams thams cad la nye bar gnas par bgyi//dgos pa dang /dgos pa ma laDa pa rnam kyi mtshan ma nye bar bstan par bgyi/dge bla dang /mi dge ba thams cad
35a6(rgyud): rmi lam du yang bsgo bar bgyi/sgrub pa yang bgegs ma mchis par bgyi/dngos grub thams cad stsol bar bgyi'o//de nas yang na mkha' lding gi bdag po na mkha' la
35a7(rgyud): spyod pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang dus thams cad du rgyal po de dang /rgyal
35b1(rgyud): bo'i bu dang /rgyal po'i blon po dang /bram ze dang /rgyal rigs rnams 'dzegs pa thams cad las bdag nyid 'khor thams cad dang bcas par mchis la srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /
35b2(rgyud): smra bar bgyi/mchog thams cad rab tu bstabs par bgyi/nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/dus thams cad du phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o//de nas sa 'ogo gi bdag
