35b3(rgyud): bo phrag chen pos bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang mi'i bdag po de dang /mi'i bdag po'i bu dang /yang na lan
35b4(rgyud): gnyi su byung ba 'am/lan gnyi su byung ba'i bu dang /rgyal rigs dang /rje'u rigs dang /dmangs rigs dang /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams
35b5(rgyud): kyis dus thams cad don thams cad grub par bgyi'o//'jigs pa thams cad las dus thams cad yang srung bar bgyi'o//bdag nyid kyang yongasu bskyab par bgyi'o//
35b6(rgyud): de nas bza' chen po brgyad dang /'khor rgyu skar du bcas pa rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'khor dang bcos pa rnams kyis
35b7(rgyud): kyang rang rang gi sngags kyi snying po rnams 'bul bar 'tshal na/de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs par gsol//legaso legaso//ngas byin gyi brlabs
36a1(rgyud): /m+b+ha ba rnon po rnams shod tsig+sa/de nas ny-im+b+ha la sogs pa bza' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshul nas 'di skad ces gas
36a2(rgyud): oM m+b+ha/oM so/oM ya~M/oM Ta/oM bri/oM shre/yu~M sa/oMr/de nas de dag gi dkyi 'khor bshad de/dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das phyags
36a3(rgyud): rdo rje nyid 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzug su bri'o//ngos rnams phyag rgya chen po bzhi bri'o//pa ba spangs ni mdun du la//zla ba rgyad du bri bor bya//
36a4(rgyud): me su phur bu bri bya zhing //g.yon par bzo' lhag bri bar bya//me yi phyogasu mig dmar dang //rlung gi phyogasu nyi ma ste//dbang ldan phyogasu spen pa'o//srin
36a5(rgyud): po'i phyog su sgra ga tsan bri//dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug du//rgyu skar thams cad bri bar bya//sgo skor de bzhin spro ba rnams//khros pa'i yid du
36a6(rgyud): bar bya//rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas ni//rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas//thams cad kyang ni spyan drang //de na sa slob ma rnams zhugs te//oM badz+rA tIni
36a7(rgyud): Ta/oM badz+ra pra ta sa ma e hUM phaT/oM badz+ra gr-i haM pra tits+tsha sa ma ye hUM/de nas bza' brgyad sdigs btab pa'o//bum pa brgyad kyis dbang skuro//
36b1(rgyud): nas rdo rje'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur to//bza' rnams pa bsgrub par bya'o//de nas gza' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tsholdan pa 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag
36b2(rgyud): cag gze' chen po brgyad kyis kyang rgyal po chen po de dang /rgyal po'i bu la gtogs par dus thams cad du de bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o//de nas rgyu skar dang /skad cig dang /yud
36b3(rgyud): tsam dang /thang cig dang /dus dang /zla tshigs dang /sbyor ba dang /khyim dang /dus sbyor dang /chu tshod la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du
36b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gos kyang dus thams cad du sems can chen po de dag gi bka' mi bcog ste/dpon po bzhin du bskya
36b5(rgyud): bar bgyi'o//grong khyer dang /grong brdul dang /ljongs dang /rgyal po dang /phra brang dang /'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi gnas thams cad so sor skyeng bar
36b6(rgyud): dkyi'o//'jig pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe yang nges bdag cag mchod na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'jig pa mi 'byung ngo //de nas klu chen po brgyad kyis phud ces bya ba'i sgras bcom ldan
36b7(rgyud): 'di gnyis par byas te 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang de dag thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po 'di dbu'o//klu chen po rnams legs kyi gsang ba'i snying
37a1(rgyud): po rnams phul cig/de nas de dag mAT nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad rjes gsol to//oM pra/oM da/oM hU/oM bA/oM thAM/oM ga nas d+ha
37a2(rgyud): de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/pad+ma chen po mdab brgyad le//kha dog dkar po bri bar bya//de yi dbus su gtso bo ni//phyag na rdo rje rab gnas pa//sbrul mgo mtha
37a3(rgyud): yas gdengs pa yi//ltos 'gro chen po bsdigs pa bri//mtha' ya ma 'jog po de bzhin du//karko Ta dang u la ka/nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang //pad+ma chu lha de bzhin du//
37a4(rgyud): mdor na mdab ma re re la//de dag sbrul mgo 'bar ba bri//sbrul mgo bdun bdun chung ma yis//mgul nas 'khyud dang bcas pa bri//bum pa brgyad dang gtor ma dang /
37a5(rgyud): bshos mdzes pa dang 'byung po yi//mar dang 'o ma smad rtsir bcas//byas pa rnams ni bzhags par bya//de nas rdo rje bdag nyid zhugs//sbrul mgro ma sbrul mgo can
37a6(rgyud): rnams dgug/bud ces bya dang lhan cig tu/dzaHhU~M baM ho//zhes brjod de//de nas bu ni rgyal po dang //rgyal rigs thams cad rab decug nas//dug gi nyes skyon bsal
37a7(rgyud): ba'i phyir//phud ces bya ba'i dbang bsku ro//de nas ming tsam brjod pas kyang //klu gnas de dag thams cad 'grub//de nas de dag kun mgu nas/bcom ldan 'das
37b1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal to//spyan sngar thal mo sbyar 'khod nas//smon lam rab tu 'di bsla par gyur//bcom ldad+hA das bdug cag gis bcom ldan ladas kyi stan pA las mngon par dga' ba rnams grul te//
37b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs po rnams la bslu bor gyur na/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid la srus par gyur cig/de'i tshe bdag cag gi gnas bye masre par gyur cig/rdo rje kun 'bar bas bdag cag mgo
37b3(rgyud): bkras par gyur cig/rtag pa dus thaMd du sems can chen po de srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba ba bgyi/byin chen po dang /stobs dang /brtson 'grus bskyed par bgyi/de'i yul du dug ma
37b4(rgyud): mchis par bgyi/dus du su char dbab par bgyi/pha rol po'i g.yul thams cad la dus dang /dus ma yin pa'i char dbab par bik+Sha/'jigs pa thams cad rnam par gzhom
37b5(rgyud): bar bgyi/rgyal ba'i bka' dang /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' rab tu sgrub par bgyi'o//de nas sgrub pa bshe lha rdzas 'od phyed dkar po yis//dbul sbrul mgo bzhis bskor ba'i//
37b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin gtso bsam na su//phud ces bya ba 'bum bzlas la//de nas dug blangs phud ces ni//bya ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas kyang //lha rdzas 'od zer phreng bas gang /
37b7(rgyud): de la phud ces bya ba bsam//lag pa sgrol mgo zhags 'dra dang //phud ces bya ba'i rlung gi gtoro//lpags pa sha dang rus gnas pa'i//dug rnams thaMd ma lus par/
38a1(rgyud): /du ces bya ba'i lag pas drang //de nas las rnams kun byed cing //dug rims dug sbyar la sogs pa//khu tshur gyis kyang kun byin na//sbrul mgo'i phyag rgya thos cad
38a2(rgyud): de nas lha chen po rnams kyi bdog po 'jigs par byed pa chen po bud med chen po brgyad kyis bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
38a3(rgyud): 'das de dag cag gi skrag pa dang /bud med rnams kyis skrag pas lha dang klu la sogs pa thams cad skrag/rnam par skrag/rab tu skrag te/kha sbub du 'gyel nas gos dang bral te/sem
38a4(rgyud): kyang stor nas kun tu 'phyin pa de dag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bdag cag snying po 'bul bar 'tshal gyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis de leg par byin gyis brlab du gsol/'jigs par byed
38a5(rgyud): pachen po legs leg so//rab tu 'jigs par byed pa bdag nyid dang /lha'i bud med thams cad kyi snying po rnams shod cig/de nas 'jigs par byed pa chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i
38a6(rgyud): sgra phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to//oM bai ra bau ra bi swA hA/oM b+hi swA hA/oM b+hi swAhA/oM b+ha swA hA/oM b+he swA hA/oM b+h+rU~M swA hA/oM b+h+yo swA hA/oM b+hi swA hUM/oM b+ha swA hA/bcom ldan 'das/
38a7(rgyud): 'dzegs byed chen po ni brgyad po de dag bdag gi ngag nyin/de nas de dag dkyil 'khor bshad//'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad pa//bris nas dbusu rdo rje 'dzin//khro chen 'jog rten
38b1(rgyud): mnaHsa sams mtham/aHthas mthaHthas ma thaHTham tham/mayamaH
38b2(rgyud): gsum las ni rnam rgyal zhes bya zhag par bya//de yi zhabs drung 'jigs byed pa'i//bdag po chen po khros pa ni//'jigs byed ma dang bcas par bri//rtsibs kyi nad ni thams cad du//gnan
38b3(rgyud): yang 'jigs byed brgyad po ni//bud med rnams dang ldan pa la//khros pa'i bzhin dang yid khros pas//ci bde bar ni bri bar bya//'dir ni sgo sgor de bzhin du//sgo ba shin tu khros ldan bri//de nas
38b4(rgyud): lcags kyu la sogs pas/bkug ste mgo yi thos pa ni//khrag gis bkang ste mchod nas kyang //sha chang gtor ma bzang po dang //snong rnams khrag gis bkang ba dang //mgo thos mgo
38b5(rgyud): yi dum bu dang /khrag gas chang bskad bus pa brgyad//dkyil 'khor der ni bzhag par bya//de nas 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba'i//mchog slob ma gzhug par bya//bum pa'am mgo yi thod
38b6(rgyud): pa ni//de ltar brgyad kyis dbang bsku ro//de nas las rnams sbyin bya ste//bud med khyim 'o ma mtshan gcig par//'jig rten gsuM ni 'dul ba'i mchog/tshul bzhin du ni mchod nas kyang //
38b7(rgyud): 'bum phrag bzhir ni bzlas par bya//de nas 'jigs por byed pa yi//bdag nyid chen po'i sgra thos nas//ma 'jigs par ni mgo thod par//khrag mchog bkang ste arga dbul//
38b8(rgyud): de nas khro bo 'jigs byed pa//ma rungs yid can bud med kyi//tshogs kyis bskor cing 'jigs byed pa//brgyan gyi bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur//de mthong 'jigs pa med gyur
39a1(rgyud): la/hU~M zhes bya ba dran byed cing //sha'am yang na chad mchog gis//thod pA bkang ste dbul bar bya//de nas 'jigs byed ma rungs 'joms//mgu nas rab tu grub
39a2(rgyud): gyur nas//ci 'dod ces ni smras nas kyang //mgu ba'i yid kyis de sbyin byed//sa rnams sbyin pa me tog par//bde chen hUM gi tshul gyis gsol//khu ba bro ba'i btung ba dang //
39a3(rgyud): rdzus dang ral gri 'khor lo dang //rtse gsum pa dang mtho ris dang //ming dang sa 'og rgyal po dang //gling dang gling bzhi brgya byin dang //gnod sbyin dbang po gnod sbyin nyid//
39a4(rgyud): rig 'dzin dang ni rig 'dzin gyi//'khor lo bsgyur dang 'jig rte ni//gsum gyi bdag dang bka' nyan dang //rang gi 'khor dang bud med kyis//dngos grub gang yang rung ba ni
39a5(rgyud): ci dga' bar yang sbyin par byed/byin nas rgo de'i 'gro bar byed//skrag na de ma thag tu gsod//de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bco ldan 'das la phyag
39a6(rgyud): 'tshalanA'i skad ces ga sol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag tsog gI kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal na rang gi brtag pa bshad par 'tshal gyis//bcom ldan 'das
39a7(rgyud): kyi thugs brtse bar dgongs te byin gyis brlab par gsol/de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi snying po rnams bshad do//oM au/oM b+hi/i ru/
39b1(rgyud): oM a/a kA/oM ga/oM bri/yau ka/de nas de bdag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de//dkyil 'khor sdo ma bzhin bris la//dbus su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba//de yi
39b2(rgyud): mdun du dpa' bo ni//dbang phyug rtse gsum lag thog bre//rgyab tu tshangs pa bri bya ste//g.yon par leg na 'khor lo thogs//g.yas pa dbang po rang gi no//phyag rgya
39b3(rgyud): mtshan me lag thog bri//rang gi dkyil 'khor chung ma rnams//'dir yang sgo po de bzhin te//bya dang bum pa gang ba bzhag/dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol tu//stobs bzod
39b4(rgyud): la sogs mthu chen thogs//de nas zhugs nas lha rnams ni//mkhas pas kun nas bkug par bya//dzaHhrI'i ho/lha thams cad//dkyil 'khor dam par gzhugs par
39b5(rgyud): mdzod//de nas 'ongs par mthong ba dang //dga' ba chen pos mchod par bya//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi//phyag rgyas slob ma rnams gzhug ste/oM pra tIts+tsha tAM ma hA satAM badz+ra d+ha ra
39b6(rgyud): a dz+nyA ya hUM ha hA ha ha/me tog cho ga bzhin du dor//mig dbye nas ni bstan par bya//de nas sngags kyi btab pa ni//bum pa'i chus no dbang bskur ro//de nas lha rnams
39b7(rgyud): gang dga' ba'i//dngos grub rab tu sbyin par bya//'bum gcig gam ni 'bumo gnyis sam//da ngo po bsnyen pa byas nas kyi /dbang phyug la sogs lha mchog rnams//
40a1(rgyud): de dag sgrub pas sgrub bya ste//mtshan cig la sogs gnas sam no//phyag na rdo rje pho brang ngam//yang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'am//ring bsrel ldan pa'i
40a2(rgyud): mchod rten du//lha rnams thams cing tshe ga bzhin//sgrub pas rtag tu bsgrub byas na//nam phyed na ni lha bzhengs nas//khyod kyi 'dod pa gang yin pa//de ni ci bden sbyin bya yis//
40a3(rgyud): bzang pos myur du sems te smros//gang phyir mchog ni khyod la sbyin//de nas sngags shes dngos grub phyir//lha la mchod na gsol bya gdang //lha rdzas khu ba bro tung dang /
40a4(rgyud): mi snang ba dang mkha' 'gro dang //ril bu rdzos dang rgyal sogs//yid 'dod tshad med gsol ba gdag//de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pas//bcom ldan 'das la phyag
40a5(rgyud): 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa gang lags pa de dag/bcom ldan
40a6(rgyud): 'das bdag cag lha thams cad kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ngo //mtho ris kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o//bede 'gro'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//ngan song
40a7(rgyud): ma lags pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//dben pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//rnam par dben pa'i lam bstan
40b1(rgyud): par bgyi'o//mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//dam pa'i chos kyi lam bstan par 'gyu'o//bde 'gro'o lam bstan par 'gyi'o//spong ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//nyon
40b2(rgyud): mongs med pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid
40b3(rgyud): du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thaMd las srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba bar bgyi'o//bdag nyid kyi bu bzhin du yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o//de'i pha rol/
40b4(rgyud): gyi dgra kun gzhom par bgyi'o//grong dang /grong 'dab dang /ljongs dang /rgyal po'i pho brang dang /rgyal srid rnams srung bar bgyi'o//yul dang /phyogs dang /grong khyer dang /grong 'khor rnam srung
40b5(rgyud): bar bgyi'o//rgyal srid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o//rgyal srid thob pa rnams ni rgyal srid rgyas par bgyi'o//gling gcig pa dang /glang gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi po dang /bde 'gro
40b6(rgyud): dang /mi'i gnas dang /sa'i 'og dang /'khor los bsgyur ba rnams stsal bar bgyi'o//mdor na brgya byin nyid dang /tshangs pa nyid dang /gtogs 'dod nyid dang /dbang phyug chen po
40b7(rgyud): nyid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'ang sa phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la kun tu gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de
41a1(rgyud): ngan g.yos/yang dag par g.yas/'gul/yang dag par 'gul/'ar/rab tu 'bar/yang dag par rab tu 'bar/dgod/rab tu dgod/yang dag pa
41a2(rgyud): rab tu dgod/rtse/rab tu rdzu/yang dag pa rab tu rtse zhing smad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig rten du yang dag par rab tu snang bar gyur to//de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa
41a3(rgyud): lha'i tshogs rnams shin tu dam par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
41a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdza do na/mdzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/bcom lnga 'das de'i slad du mdzum pa mdzad pa
41a5(rgyud): rgyo gang legs lung bstan du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes lha rnams kyis gsol pa'i tshig gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal te//tshangs pa la sogs
41a6(rgyud): po lha rnams sngon gyi sangs rgyas thaMd kyis bshad pa'i 'chi bdag zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa dang /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag 'joms par byed/rig sngags gzi
41a7(rgyud): brjid chen po gang yin pa thos sam/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag yang dag par rab tu mgu sta
41b1(rgyud): tsham kanams sams mtham/samaHthasamamacan thas na ma tham tha mam thamams thas patha ma babs la tham sa ma ma pa mtham mthamasam 'ams tham yam sa
41b2(rgyud): bsgru nas rdzogs nas b+hA ba 'dug tshul te//bcom ldan 'das lags//lags//rdo 'dzin du log so//legs//gang gi slang du ma jung du sem nan srong 'grong tho ba dang /dus
41b3(rgyud): ma lags par 'chi bdag gis nyes pa rnams gang gi dus ma lags pa 'chi ba las rnam par grol bar gyi ba dang /ngan song du skyes pa rnams ngan song gi rgyud thaMd las ci nas kyang rnam
41b4(rgyud): grol bar bgyi ba dang /'khor ba'i 'jig pas skrag pa'i sems can rnams dade brag tu 'khor ba la rgyab kyi phyogs ba da kyis nas myur du bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
41b5(rgyud): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi d+hI slad du gzi brjid chen po'i stobs dang /mthu chen po'i rig pa bshad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
41b6(rgyud): tshungs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshigs gsan nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thu pas+yA cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung//
41b7(rgyud): oM pu N+ya pu N+ya/ma hA pu N+yaM A pa ri mi ta yA yuHprA N+ya dz+nyA nA saM b+ha ro pa tsi te sA hA//snying po'i rig pa'o//oM d+hI swA hA//nye bA'i snying po'i rig pa'o//oM b+hU swA hA/nye ba'i snying nge'i//
41b8(rgyud): ga 'o//oM kr-i swA hUM/snying po yang dag par duskul bI ga \u0f7f/oM tAM swA hA/snying po dam pa'o//oM hrI sANAM/gsang ba'i snying po'o//de nas dadanadakyil 'khor ba
42a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi par byas la/de'i dbus de bzhin gshogs pa tshwa dang /bsod nams dang /ma na rgya tshogs dang /gzo rjod tshad mod pa'i rgyal ba/
42a2(rgyud): des bye ba bzhag ste/hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o//de'i spyan sngar ni phyag ni rdo rje/d+hIHzhes bya ba'i snying po'o//bla mor par ni khro bo ste/kAM zhes bya ba'i snying po'i//g.yas par non pa /
42a3(rgyud): /hUM zhes bya ba'i rnyeng pa'i/chub tu ni 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'jig pa sbyin pa zhes bya ste/hU~M zhes bya ba'i snying po'o//de bzhin gshegs pa/
42a4(rgyud): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lo rishi rnams dri'o//bum pa lnga dang /rgyad 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sngags kyi btab la go zhog/bdug pa la sogs pa las thams cad pa'i khro
42a5(rgyud): bo'i sngags kyi datab pa dang /mchod pa la sogs pa gzhag s+ho/sgo tha~Md kyang deyin no//de nas sngags mkhan da dag nyid zhugs la/bde bar gshegs pa dam pa sras
42a6(rgyud): dang dbangasu bcas shing la zer gyis de skor te/rig pa dang lhan cig snyan drang //de nas bdag nyid dbang bskud ce/skyis mo krung bcas nus 'dug la stong phrag brgya bzlas
42a7(rgyud): laM/de dzin gshegs pa 'am/rdo rje 'dzin pa'am/'jigs pa sbyin ris gzigs kyi dbang phyug kyang ru ste/mngon gsum du mthong dab 'dod kyi ma
42b1(rgyud): tho par 'gyur ro//tsau sta mnyam par ma bA zhag na de'i tshe yid kyis las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro//de nas rdo 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/oM badz+ra d+ha raH/rat+na d+ha ra/pad+ma d+har/
42b2(rgyud): bi Sho d+ha ra/ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/mA ti kra ma/ta thA ga ta saM ma ya d+ha ra ko&haM/zhes nga rgyal bskyed slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o//de nas 'dis me tog der be bya'o//au sarba/
42b3(rgyud): d+hU tA thA gaM ta pra N+De ha~M sa ma yu stAM/de nas blang ba de nyid kyi mgo la bci sa la/dbang bskur bar bya'o//oM sarba tA thA ga ta a b+hi Shony+tsa d+hAr A dz+nyA ba ya hU~M buM/oM dadz+nyA oM d+hIShiny+tsa hUM b+h+rUM/
42b4(rgyud): oM rat+na a dz+ha Da~M dz+yo hU~M trAM/oM pad+ma a d+hi Shi ny+tsahUM hrIH/oM kar+m+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM a/dwe nas dmachog dang /bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o//de nas dmi tshig ni/dkon mchog gsu
42b5(rgyud): dang byang chub sems//bla ma dam pa rnams mi spangs//srog chags rnams ni bsad mi bya//ma byin par yang mi blang zhing //brdzun du smra bar bya ma yin//pha rol bud med spyad
42b6(rgyud): mi byi//bla ma smad par mi bya ste//de yi grib ma mi 'grom zhing //slob dpon mo yin mi gzung la//rdo rje slob dpon mtshan mi brjod//sngags dang phyag rgya mi smad de//
42b7(rgyud): lha rnams la lta smos ci dgos//ji ste glen pas smad na ni//nad kyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur//snying dang lha yi grib ma dang //'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi//phyag rgya yi ge'i mtshan ma
43a1(rgyud): rnams//gom pas dgom par mi bya'o//glen pas dkon mchog gsum sogs dang //sangs rgyas bstan lnga gnod byed dang //bla ma smod pa brtson pa na
43a2(rgyud): mkhas pas bsgrims te bsad par bya//chos min ldan dong sdig sgyid dang //rtag tu sa naM gnod brtson dang //dam tshig ldang rnams snying brtse ba'i//sngags mkhan gyis ni sngags kyi
43a3(rgyud): bsad//'jungs pa rnams kyis ner blangs la//sems can 'phongs la sbyin par bya//bla ma la na mchod pa dang //de ltar dam tshig sgrub pa dang //dkyil 'khor phyir dang dam tshig
43a4(rgyud): can//phan phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams la//mchod phyir mi yi dbang po dang //phyug pa rnams kyi nor dbrog/seMn rnams la phan spyod pas//rtag tu dam tshig bla ma'i nor//srog
43a5(rgyud): chags srog ni srung ba'i phyir//rdzun du yang ni smra bar bya//sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang //dam tshig rnams ni srung ba dang //sngags rig pas ni sgrub pa'i phyir//gzhan gyi bud//
43a6(rgyud): med bsten par bya//rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug nas//thams cad byas shing kun zos kyang //'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur na//snying rjer ldan pas smos ci dgos///
43a7(rgyud): de nas 'dis bka'e dbang bskur bar bya'o//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA ya de dA s+ye mi gra hA badz+ra su sid d+ha yi/oM badz+ra tiSh+Tha hUM/'dis rdo rje lag tu byin la las kyi dbang
43b1(rgyud): bsgyur ba ra b+ha'o//oM s+yAr+b+bA kAr+m+ma ku ru bud d+ha nA d+hA/de nas bla mu bla ma gyur//khyod kyis lus mchog gyon par bya//nor+ya dang dbyig dang 'bru rnams dang //spyan dang btsun pa/
43b2(rgyud): de bzhin to//dran gyi mchog dang khang pa dang //rgyal po rgyal srid de bzhino te//bu dang bu mo chung ma dang //ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang //gzhan yang ci bzhed thams cad ni//
43b3(rgyud): par bsams phyir bla ma dbul//de nas byang chub bar tu ni//sangs rgyas nyid dang gzhan dag dang //'jig rten pa yi mthu chen rnams//gang 'dod pa dag sgrub 'dod pas//
43b4(rgyud): dngos grub rnamos ni gsol bar bya//de nas bu la phan pa'i phyir//sngags mkhan ser sna med sems dang //dad pas dad pa'i sems ldan lnga//dngos grub rnams
43b5(rgyud): ni sbyin par bya//chos rnams thams cad dngos med par//sems kyis bsgom pa byas nas kyang //a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sam//rang gi sa bon de dbus//bsams
43b6(rgyud): nas dam tshig phyag rgya yang //bsam zhing de bzhin de nyid du//sgrub pa po ni bsgyur bar bya//lha yi rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur//de nas rang gi sa bon dang //phyag rgyas phyag rgya de
43b7(rgyud): byin brlabs//lho 'o go rims ji bzhin du//sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro//ngo nas nga rgyal bskyed nas kyang //mkhas pa yis ni rtsub byas na//de bzhin gshegs
44a1(rgyud): kyang 'grub 'gyur na//dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos//den tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas//'di
44a2(rgyud): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rgyal po dang /rgyal po'i bu dang /rgyal po'i blon po dang /rgyal rigs dang /bram ze dang /rje'u rigs dang /dmang rigs dang //gzhan
44a3(rgyud): yang dman zhing kho ra chung ba phyag ngar ba dang /mthu' 'khob pa'i rigs dran gyi skye bo rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs nu de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji lta bur 'gyur/bcom
44a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang ma 'ongs pa'i son rnams la phan pa'i phyir nga lo zhus pa de ni leg so leg so//lha'i bu rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'drir zhugs pa dang /dbang
44a5(rgyud): bskur ba dang /bris pa dang /'drir bcug pa dang /rje su yi rang ba dang /phyog byas pa dang /mchod pa rnams kyi 'bras bu dang //rnam par smin pa nyon cig/lha'i bu rnams
44a6(rgyud): mdo na la yA de'i yon bashrad par spobs pa med de/nga'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa de brgya phrag stong du mar bsgyu kyang grangasu yang mi tshig/bgrang bar yang mchog dben
44a7(rgyud): yang mi bzod de//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bsod nams kyi phung po kyang mi bzod do//dkyil 'kho bo 'dir bzhugs pa'i sen rnam kyi 'bras bu dang rnam par
44b1(rgyud): smin pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o//rdo rje 'dzin pa ngo mtshar tshe'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis dkyil 'khor la sogs par 'jug par smra'o//bcom
44b2(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spro'o//de nas lha de dag gis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'dza m+bu'i gling gis sen bsod nams chung zhing tshe thung ba dang /ngan seng gi rlung
44b3(rgyud): dang ldan pa dang /sems can dmyal ba dang /yi dgra dang /byel song rnamasu skyes pa dag kyang mchis na bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag cig gis ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/kye lha'i bu rnams so ni de dag
44b4(rgyud): ni dkyil 'khor 'di nyi du chug shig/chos kyi yi ge yang zlo su chug shig dang /de nas sems can de dag tshe ring par 'gyur/bsod nams dang bral ba rnams bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur/ngan
44b5(rgyud): song las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro//kye lha'i bu'i rnams ngan song du skyes zin pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming la yang dbang bskur cig/gzugs brnyan la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig/
44b6(rgyud): mchod rten la yang dbang bskur bar byas shig/rang gi lha'i sku la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig/chung ngu na de dang rigs 'thun pa dang /de'i bu dang /de dang rus 'thun pa dang /de'i ming
44b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa 'am/bran la dbang bskuro shi ga dang /zhag bdun du dkyil 'khor du bcugo ste dbang bskur na/gdon mo za bar zhag bdun gyis ngan song gis sgrib pa las rnam par
45a1(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur//lha'i bu rnams de ni ming nas smos te 'bum phra gnyis sam/'bum phrag gsum 'am/'bum phrag bzhin 'bum brag brgya phrag stong gi bar du bzlas/
45a2(rgyud): pa byas nas mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang rnam par thar par gyur na/sdig pa chung ngu byas pa nams lta smos kyang ci dgos//lha yi bu rnams zhi ba yi//hom khung tha ma khar ma
45a3(rgyud): mchog/khru gang khru do khru bzhi po'i//zlum po nyid du byas nas ni//de yi ming yang yungs kar gyis//brgya phrag stong du sreg byas na//ngan song kun las rnam par thar//de yi
45a4(rgyud): sha dang rus pa dang //skra dang thal ba la sogs pas//cho ga de dang 'dre bar ni//sbyin sreg byas nas ngan song yang //kun las rnam par thar par 'gyur//de yi dbus 'khor lo/
45a5(rgyud): ni/rtsibs brgyad 'od zer dkar 'bar bri//khor yug rdo rje rtse lnga pa//'od gzor dkar dang ldan par bri//de nas rdo rje rgya gram dang //rdo rje rin chen chu skyes mchog/de nas sdig
45a6(rgyud): ba gzhom pa'i phyir//phyag rgya sna tshogs bzhag par bya//phyi yi rdo rje rigs rnams kyi//phyag rgyu rnams ni phyi rol bri//gze' dang skar ma'i mtshan mo dang //de ltar 'jig rten
45a7(rgyud): skyong ba rnams//gtso bo ri mo lu gri ma 'ang rung //rdo rje tson dang lhan cig bzhag/bya dang bum po bkong ba dang //gtor ma lha bshos rab dkar bzhag/mdor na thig ni btab nas kyang /
45b1(rgyud): tshun rten du tho ba bya//ga na gtani dgas nas kyang //sngas rgyas gzugs can ma 'dogs pas//ngan sa nad na gnas pa la/narnas dran nod cing //rdzug pa slob pa'i
45b2(rgyud): phyir//sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin sreg ni//mar dang 'a ma smang rkye cano//'bras yos yungs kar bsres pa dang //de yi rus pa sha la sogs//yod na ming nas ts+lisi te d+ya//de nas
45b3(rgyud): 'gror skyes nas kyang //mkhas pas rgyas pa bya dgos te//khru do ba 'am khru bzhi pa//de ltar mchog ni khru brgyad par//b+h+yas nas tsam khung grwa bzhi pa//kun tu mu rin ldon par bya//de dbus
45b4(rgyud): pad+ma na tshan can//'od zer sar po ldan por bri//khar yug tu ni rin chen dang //mA ra na rnams la chu skyes bri//phyi ro la du ni rigs lnga yi//sngo sa'i phyag rgya bro bAr bya//de ltar pA ya~M
45b5(rgyud): rnams dang //lcags kyu la sogs bri ber bya//gos rnams sde bor bsgyur nas kyang //mtha ris gnos pa rjes dran zhing //de la phan phyir d+has pa'i phyir//rgyus pr-i yo ni las
45b6(rgyud): byas na/lus can de yi tshe dang drapal//gzi brjid bde ba'i long spyod 'phel//de nas phan phyir nges par yeng //dbang du bya ba'i las byos no//ho mo khung gzhi'i dbyibs 'dra la//
45b7(rgyud): khro gang pa 'am lU deb//khru bzhir byas la de'i dbus//pad+ma dam po dris nas kyang //de yi dbus mda' bcas pa'i//gzhu yang de bzhin bri bar bya//khor yug tu yang ma//
46a1(rgyud): bcas pa'i//gzhu ni kha dadog dmar por bri//sngags rdzogs pas ni rtag par yang //d+hi rol de dang 'dra bar bya//sems can de yang dran
46a2(rgyud): byas te//dmar por gyur pa'i gros gyon la//me tog dmyur ram pad+ma'am//'bras bu dmapar mtshan bslus pa'i//mar dang gur tsum bsres pa dang //n+dan den
46a3(rgyud): dmar po'i phye ma yis//sbyin sreg byas ni lha la sogs//thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur//de la glo don rnams gzhom pa'i phyir//mngon spyod kyang ni brtsam
46a4(rgyud): byA ste//phyed dang gsum 'amau khA gsum 'am/de ltar dam pa khru dgur bya//gru gsum po dang ldan par ni//dbus rdo rje rtse dgu pa//rtse gsum pa dang rgyu gam
46a5(rgyud): ba'i/rdo rje rnams dang dbyig pa dang //mgo na rdo rje rtse gsum dang //ngag sta rtse gcig mu khyud bskor//phyi rol tu ni yang re mi gsum du//snga ma bzhin du
46a6(rgyud): brgyan par bya//bya dang go tor ma bum pa dang //ba sho cha rnam pa mang du bzhag/sha dang khrag gos bkang ba yi//mgo yi thos pa ku tu bezhag/de yi lus
46a7(rgyud): can sdig sogs dang //bgegs rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir//klas nag bgos shing khros nas kyang //'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid
46b1(rgyud): bAsamA//de nas dro yi sdig btsom lus//bge glang nga bral to ci 'dro bar//mtho ras 'jig rten mi yi nang //khams gsum pa na yi dor spyod//klo rims 'di dag nyid
46b2(rgyud): kyis ni//tshe 'di'i gnas la 'du bya ba ste//de nas gang gi phyir byas pa//de yi phyir yang de bzhin 'gyur//gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams kun//sdo ma ji bzhin de ltar bya//des ni
46b3(rgyud): sems can bde la'ang //myur du bde skyir myong bar 'gyur//de nas tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams yid mgu nas//bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
46b4(rgyud): ldan 'das ngan song du skyes pa'o seni rnams kyi don dang /phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di 'dri ba dang /'drir 'jug pa'i ribs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo rnams bdag
46b5(rgyud): cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyi bu bzhin du yongasu sbyang bar bgyi/gang rgyal po dang /blon po dang /rgyal po'i blon po rnams ji ltar gsungs pa'i rjesu slob na de'i rgyal srid
46b6(rgyud): 'phel bar bgyi/yul dang /phyogs dang /rang gA skye bo dang /yongs kyi skye bo dang /bran la sogs pa srung bar bgyi/nor dang 'bru rnams mang du 'byor par bgyi/bud med dang /
46b7(rgyud): skyes pa dang /khye'u dang /bu mo rnams dang ldan par bgyi/'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /lo legs pa dang /zhi ba rnams bgyi no/ji ltar bshad pa la mi rtog par bgyi
47a1(rgyud): blta smras kyang ci 'tshal//gang gi brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di dang d+has rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la brtags te/grong dang grong khyer du gcugs la//dngan
47a2(rgyud): nyid kyis gsu ba dang /glang po che'i steng du bzhug la grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thA bskor na/nad dang gnod pa thams cad ma mchis por 'gyur la/sems can chen
47a3(rgyud): de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyi tshul la maM/bu'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o//gang du 'dir rab tu spyod pa de na/bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sgras
47a4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i skur zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po re ba thams cad yongs skyong ba de nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po
47a5(rgyud): gzugs bzhugs par 'tshal byar gyi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bAcu sa te bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o//sa phyogs de mdzad rten du gyur/
47a6(rgyud): par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/mchod par bgyi/phyag 'tshal bar bgyi/kun tu srung bar bgyi'o//bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyi brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di
47a7(rgyud): kun la rgyas par 'chad pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dko' thub chen po de'i g.yog bgyi'o//dran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi'o//bka' nyan pa'i tshul du gnas por bgyi'o//
47b1(rgyud): mtshan ka na.aHsa samamams mtham/samamamaHthas mamatham Shas nam tham thamamam tham bams yab ka thas mab mam ba mam tamamamam tham/ma amakas
47b2(rgyud): mas mnyan du /yan ra // narnams cad 'ag//dngas smra jam da //tsam ldan lam mdan de rkang pa rje ma
47b3(rgyud): blangs par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das phyag 'tshal ba bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das mchod par bgyi'o//bdag cag de'i phyi bzhin du rje su 'drang //bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor du
47b4(rgyud): zhugs te dbang bskur ba gang lagre pa de dag kyang bdag cag gi dpon po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o//phyag na rdo rje logs par 'chal bar bgyi'o//rdo rje sems dpa' lags
47b5(rgyud): par 'tshal bar bgyi'o//bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'dra
47b6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje tshang pa la sogs pa lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams chos la rim gro bya bar de ltar dam tshig la cas par gyur pa
47b7(rgyud): gling yin pa de ni leg so/legaso//legs par sgrubs shig//bam po gsum pa ste thA ma//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sngags dang /rig pa dang /
47b8(rgyud): snying po thams cad brtan par bya ba'i phyi sh+tsa kyi b+hU 'di ba shad do//maM hUM hUM badz+ra pA tIts+tshi tiSh+Thi hUM/oM d+hu ya/oM badz+ra hU~M phaT/i n+do ts+tsha badz+ra hU~M saM/oM badz+ra hU~M aHdenas
48a1(rgyud): de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/dkyil 'khor lnga ma bzhin du bris la//dbusu rdo rje bri bar bya//yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am//kun tu
48a2(rgyud): brlang ngam bde ba che//sbyin sngar phyag na rdo rje la//g.ya su phyag na rdo rje rini chen ba mas//rnam pa gsil du nub phyogs bri//phyung phyogs phyug nA n+ya bram snum
48a3(rgyud): phyi rol du ni kun bskor cing //sangs rgyas thams cad gzhag par bya//de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams//go rims bzhin du bri bar bye ba de yi phyi rol sems
48a4(rgyud): dpa' rnams//byams pa la sogs mchog chen bri//de ltar dge slong kun dga' sogs//thub na mus de yi phyi rol bri//rang go chung ma bus bskor ba'i//
48a5(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs phyi rol bri//bza' dang skar me'i lha rnams dang //rgyal po bzhi po rnams dang ni//phyogs skyongs 'jigs rten skyong ba rnams//de
48a6(rgyud): yi phyi rol dmyal kun dang /'dod chags la sogs byol song bri//sgo sgor gsungs pa de bzhin du//sgo ba stobs kyi dam pa rnams//dI rnams lha yi
48a7(rgyud): chu so bkang ba/gser gyi bum pa'o can dang /gtor ma dang ni lte bshos dang //me tog bdug pa rab mdzes dang //gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan rnams
48b1(rgyud): zla rI drung ni na mchog dang //dril bu rdo rje nor bu dang //dau sha lA ho mA la sogs rgyun/'dod can rnams kyi 'bras bu ni//'dod pa'i yon tan wAs+ya dgung du//dri nas sngags mkhan nyid/
48b2(rgyud): kyis ni//spyan drangs dag nyid 'jug par bya//bdag nyid kyis ni dbang yang bskur//sdom gnas dam tshig ldan pa dang //bla ma mos shing mi 'jug la//rig skyes skyon
48b3(rgyud): dang bral ba dang //ser sna ma lus sbyang gyur cing //yon tan mang por ldan gyur pa//gratong dang tshul khrims mang du thos//byams pa dang ni snying rje'i sems//dgo'
48b4(rgyud): ba bting bsnyoms gnas pa dang //spyod pa mtshan ma med pa'o sems//smon pa med pa'i yid ldan pa'i//slong ma dam pa sngagos 'di yis//byang chub tu ni sems
48b5(rgyud): bskyed la//sngags mkhan gyis ni gzung bar bya//oM badz+ra hUM dza/oM badz+ra sa ma ya prA be she hUM/A~M badz+ra b+hU ti pra tIts+tsha badz+ra satwA mu hA su kha hUM/hai ha ta~M sa ma ya
48b6(rgyud): s+t+waM/me tog phreng ba dor nas gang la bab pa'i sngagos dang phyag rgyas mgo bo la cing par bya'o//de nas dam tshig sbyin par bya ste//oM ci ste khyod kyi su yang rung ba la
48b7(rgyud): smras ni no//phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis rdo rje 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bas khyod kyi mgo bkas par 'gyur ro//oM badz+ra sa ma ya ta ti hUM a/de nas 'das dam tshig gi
49a1(rgyud): chu rlud la gdang ga yog dgul bar t+yA'o//a dzAr+Nak+ShA pa /Ad+b+ha pa tA yA na mak+tA ya ma nAMny+tso m+b+ha/de nas d+h+yan+tha
49a2(rgyud): la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bstan te/sangs rgyas kyi sbyin sngar dbang bskur bar bya'o//oM badz+ra pA Ni sa yAn+t+ra a nurak+to oM d+hiSh+T+rI
49a3(rgyud): d+hIHAM badz+nyA a d+hI Shiny+tsa stAr+b+ba badz+rI e b+hI She ka ta hUM A/oM dud d+he aM b+hI Shin+d+ra sarba bud d+hA a b+hiSh+TiM ka te i hUM/oM rat+na A b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+bA d+d+ha a b+hiSh+TaM ka ta ai tAM/aM pa~Mt+ma
49a4(rgyud): e b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+ba pad+ma AM b+hi She ka ta au hrIH/oM kar+m+ma A b+hi Sheny+tsa sar+b+ba kArma a b+he ShaM ka ta au AH/de nas bdag gi lus la sogs pa yon du phul le bka'
49a5(rgyud): mnod par bya'o//oM sarba ta thA ga ta A b+hi She ka tI a~M kaMn+te da s+ya mi grih+Na badz+ra pra sid d+ha ye hUM/de nas las thams cad byed du gu zhug cing dngos grub thams cad
49a6(rgyud): kyang sbyin no//bde bas bde ba bskyed nas ni//dkyil 'khor bzhi po'i dbus ni//kun tu bzad dam bde ba che//bdog nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas kyang //
49a7(rgyud): snying kar hUM zhes bya bsams nas//rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur//dpal ldan las rnams kun byed cing //kun tu bzang por bdag nyid
49b1(rgyud): gyur//du sgyur 'gyur du na tsham mod//hU~M las+yA swAngs rgyas gardza g+hu nas//phyag na ra 'gyur/ / la nga sa nasan/ R+R-i m+b+ha r+yA d+hA/rdogrog ma parnams te/sno yo du/
49b2(rgyud): ris ga/hU~M zhes bya bas bskor bsams na//khro ba stobs chen nyid du 'gyur//rdo rje bsten par bdag sbyar la//sting kar oM zhes byi'i yis//bskor ba'i d+hu dz+nyA ldan pa'i// /
49b3(rgyud): na rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur//rdo rje bsgoms la snying gi ni//dbus pa dro zhes bya ba//oM zhes bya bas bskor bsams na//phyag na pad+mo mnyam par 'gyur// kho lo r+g+ha grAm hU~M ldan d+ha/
49b4(rgyud): a zhes bya bas bskyed nas kyang //oM zhes bya bas bskor bsams na//rdo rje las dang mnyam par 'gyur//de nas las rnams bi shad bya ste//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las//de
49b5(rgyud): lhur dbang dang mngon spyod rnams//bzlas dang sbyin sreg cho ga yis//les rnams thams cang bya ba yin//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag bsgyur la//zhi ba'i las ni brtsam bya
49b6(rgyud): zhi //cho ga shes pa ning par nyid//bzlas dang sprin sri nyid byed cing //'di zer sprin gyis drilus la//'dri byer gyur par rnam bsgoms te//rtag tu sha ru bzlas
49b7(rgyud): zer gyis//nyes pa thams cad sel bar bsam//'di ni sems can phan dga' bas//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las bya//kun tu bzang po'i sku chen nam//bdes
50b1(rgyud): snron srin po bka' nyan dang //ma mtshan rgyud ni ma rungs rnams//'khor los rtswa nas 'byin par mdzad//lkugs dang zhugs pa ma yin du//glon rnams mo sgyu smra bar mdzad/
50b2(rgyud): sgo la dzaM zhes bya ba yis//ma rungs rnams kyang lkug par mdzad//rgya gram gyis ni mchod pa dang //sems can don mdzad thams cad ston//hU~M zhes bya bas 'phro mdzad
50b3(rgyud): cing //rdo rje srung bas srung bar mdzad//hU~M zhes bya ba'i so yis nirdo rje gnod sbyin nyid kyis kyang //ma rung sa rab tu ma rungs kun//za byed sdig spyod sgos ci dgas
50b4(rgyud): ma rungs snying kr-ir dam du ni//bi zhes bya ba bsamos nas kyang //dug drang rims dang gdon la sogs//rdo rje bsdams pas bcings por mdzad//bezlas dang sbyin sreg
50b5(rgyud): las rnams kyis//dgos pa tha~Md skyob par mdzad//'od zer bsil bas dngos po la//rgyas par gyur pas sgoms byed cing //zhi ba'i lha yi rnal 'byor dang /
50b6(rgyud): zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi bar bya//rang gi lus ni gser bcos dang //nyi ma gsalnga shar dge 'dra bar/bsams la rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/'od zer sprin gyis
50b7(rgyud): dgang par bya//pad+mo sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis//hrIH'dra 'od zer btang ba yis//snying la kun tu bskor byed cing //'dod pa kun gyi dbang du byed//rdo hUM
51a1(rgyud): natu 'dzinaHsa//khris na rtswa mtshan chams //sdug spyad lus la dang bya bla sun//drim thag tu brlag par 'gyu//de nas skyom mA Sh+mA sa s+yAd
51a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nAs 'di skad rjes gsol to//bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sems can tha~M lnga phyin pa'i phyir rje tshom thams cad garjod pa//ngan song bdi d+h+r-i ga yon pa rtag
51a3(rgyud): rnam pa 'ad bshad pA legs/modaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes phyag rgya'i lde'u 'di bshad//lhag pA gnyis mdun du bzhag la/a las r+b+ba
51a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab par bsdums te/hUM zhes bya ba dang /oM zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de gnyis kyis byin gyis brlobs te/gA pa
51a5(rgyud): mi gnyis pa lci sogs A la sogs pa'i yi g+na bcu drug sa bkang+ge zhing 'byo bad+mo byas te/mthe bo gnyis la oM zhes bya bo bstu/mdzub mo kla nyis la d+hi zhes bya
51a6(rgyud): banapa/phung mo gnyis la dz+haiM zhes bya ba bzhug/srin mni gnyis la hU~M nas skyob bano//mthe chung gnyis la a gas bya ba banag/de ltar yi garnams ldanan
51a7(rgyud): sa nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin par mis pa spyod/chos thams cad gcig la gcig 'dros pa dang /bdog dang yang rjesu 'thun par dran par bya /
51b1(rgyud): lag pa gnyis pad+ma lta bur sbyar ba byas nAs oM zhes bya ba gnyis brkyang pa dang /a zhes bya ba gnyis bkug ste/de bzhin du hrI zhes bya ba dang /hrI zhes bya ba gnyis pad+ma'i 'dab ma
51b2(rgyud): 'dra bar bya/trAM zhes bya ba gnyisau gshibs te brkyang ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'alas kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las thams cad dang ldan pa'i dam tshig go//de nyid rnon po dang ldan pa dang /de nyid las rab tu
51b3(rgyud): 'khor lo 'dra ba ni 'khor lo'i 'o//de nyid las khar bzhag pa ni sgra'i 'di ni phyag rgya'i cho gso//de nyid las gnyisu byas nas las kyir byas na las kyi'o//g.yon pa mgo song thogs 'dra dang /
51b4(rgyud): g.yas pa mdung thung rtse gsum dang //g.yon pa pad+mo kha 'dzums dang //g.yas pa oM zhes bya bar gzhug/g.yon pa 'khor lo bde gsum dang //a dang oM gnyis rtse sprad la//
51b5(rgyud): lhag ma gsum ni rdo rje can//oM dang hI gnyis gzhur byas la//lhag mA mda' byas mda' can gyi'o//lag pa g.yas g.yon 'khor lor bya//'od ni nyi ma zla ba'i zhal//thal mo
51b6(rgyud): dam skyar sor mo 'phro//gza' lhag rtag tu sde gol gautogs//de nyid tshig dbang gsungs pa ste//mchu la tshig 'byung 'dra bar bzhag/pa ba gsangs ni bde ldan pa//spen
51b7(rgyud): pa dbyug pa 'dzin par bya//ba lang sna ni chu srin 'dra//shes bya rgyu skar stag 'dra ba//de nyid bskor na klog phreng gi/bla 'og bzhig na sprin phyag rgya//'di dag snying po'i phyag rgya ste//
52a1(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya yang 'di dag nyid//de nyid las sran lag gnyis bcings pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las hUM zhes bya ba tshigs bar ma bcug
52a2(rgyud): pa ni dbang bskur ba sbyin par byed pa ste/na mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las hUM zhes bya ba bcings te/srin lag pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa 'di ni pad+ma las byung ba'i
52a3(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//de nyid las hUM zhes bya ba dang /hrI zhes bya ba gnyis gshibs te sgreng ba ni/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las pad+mo 'dra bar
52a4(rgyud): byos pa ni bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid nang du bkug pa ni khro bo sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya
52a5(rgyud): gzi can no//de nyid la sau shin tu bsdam pa ni rdo bsdam papo brkyang ba ni gze ca no//hUM zhes bya ba'i so ni gnod sbyin gyi'o//hUM zhes bya ba gaunyis lcags kyur byas pa ni 'gugs
52a6(rgyud): pa'o//de nyid mdar byas pa ni 'dod pa'o//hUM dang oM zhes bya ba gnyis sbyar ba ni dgyes pa'i 'o//de nyid dkyil 'khor lta bur byas pa ni gzi badz+rod kyi'o//de nyid
52a7(rgyud): nor bu 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi'o//bskor na bzhad pa'i ste/de nyid khar bzhag na ni dgyes shing 'dzum par mdzod pa'i ya mtshan no//thal mo pad+ma
52b1(rgyud): 'dra bar bkug pa na pad+ma'i 'o//A zhes byung dang o zhes bya ba nang du bkug pa ni ral pri'i phyag rgya'o//dacig la gaHpra sbyang ba ni 'khor lo'i 'o//snga ma las ai zhes bya ba
52b2(rgyud): gnyis khar bzhag pa ni tshig 'byung ba ste/mdor ni phyag rgya 'di dag ni lus thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o//de nyid bslus mdud sbrul mgor 'gyur//kun tu gnod sbyin
52b3(rgyud): mche ba 'dra//srin po yi ni khrag 'khrig pa//lag pa bskor ba rlung gi ste//dbyug tor ljon pa gnod sbyin no//bum par bzhag pa nor gyi ste//mthe bo sre mo'i rna 'ad
52b4(rgyud): bya//mgo yi thod pa nag po'i ste//b+h+ring gi ri ti lag brkyang ba//pi bad+ma g.yon thogs dri za'i 'o//log gnyis 'bar ba me 'bar ba//gung mo dbyug 'dra ga shin rje'i/
52b5(rgyud): rno la khro dang dbang bsgyur ba//mthe'u chung rel gri mdzub zhags pa//rlung gi phyag rgya rgyal mtshan yin//de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams//log las skye ba skyes par 'gyur//
52b6(rgyud): lha rnams kun gyi thun mong du//pad+mo'i phyag rgya bkra shIs te//klu rnams shes bya ud pa la//de ltar so ni gnod sbyin rnams//srin po rnams kyi mgo tsha lo ba//bud
52b7(rgyud): mede rnams kyi sor bcu bsnol//gza'i rnams kyi ni dbyug pa ste//arga dbul ba rgyu skar rnams//de dag kun gyi sems sgrib pa'o//mgo bo thod pa khar bdag
53a1(rgyud): na du rgyun rdzu na du ma// n+d+ha sgra na rmA mas bgyud//dadag kun kyang mthun dang du//phyug tu
53a2(rgyud): chen po bshad par bya//zil mo btung bar bshad pa ste//yang na thal mo pad mor bya//rdo rje khu tshur bcings na sbyin//a nus bya ba lu gu rgyang ///hUM zhes byo
53a3(rgyud): gnyis sbreng la//phyag na rdo rje brag rgyu yin//rdo rje bsdams pa bsdams nas kyang //hU~M dang ma gnyis gau shi sa te bsgreng /oM zhes bya ba ngos bcar ba'o//phyag rgya snang ba byed pa
53a4(rgyud): dgos//de las a zhes bya ba bani ngas//I zhes bya ba nang du bzhug/oM zhes bya ba sngon banini sbyar//oM dang oM dang 'dra bar bya//trAM zhes bya ba gshibs nas ni//U dang
53a5(rgyud): oM gnyis lu gu rgyud//lhag ma gshibs pa'i phyag rgya 'di//bdud rtsi 'khyil par shes par bya//trAM zhes bya ba gshibs na ni//hU~M zhes bya ba de bzhin//de ltar hUM zhes bya
53a6(rgyud): pa gshibs//sgrog ma 'di zer 'dra ba bya//rta mgron byug/rgya gang yin po//de yang las rnams kun la gsus//spyan gyi mig dang 'dri bar bshad//mA ma kI yai rdo rje 'dra//
53a7(rgyud): dkar mo pad+ma nyid dub shid//ud pa la ni sgrol mang pangs//sasas sasas sems sams sams sa/zabab po babababababababab bababri/hrIHhU~Md+hIrmAdz+dzahU~M
54a1(rgyud): sa na rnam na nan rgyu du na nan na ga smra ga kun
54a2(rgyud): /oMk+Shi sa/oMk+ShA /me d+d+hehUM/oM sa dkyi la pa dre
54a3(rgyud): rten gsum snang la sogs khwa kun//mchu kAr mA na nas pa sgrigs //ku shin tu 'ardzogs 'ardzogs lta
54a4(rgyud): blo ma sa// slo sa khyo nga gi dim na // mi khrims sa sa
54b1(rgyud): zod shas gang phyug na rdzogs//dasgyur bris nas phyi rol du//sngon ma'o tshogasan mas ga zhag par bya//skyo ba rnams ni jo ba don du//rang gi phyag rgya'i lag mtshan can//de nas
54b2(rgyud): bdud rtsis gang ba yi//bum pa bcu drug bzhog par bya//bdug pa me tog dri zhim dang //mdo me dang ni bre snod dang /kha zas bkang po'i gtor ma dang //bza' dang bca'
54b3(rgyud): bdud rtsi zhes//mgo zos gang bar gyur pa rnams//dkyil 'khor du ni meng du bzhag/de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyang //mgunas mgo zong phyag rgyas 'jug/phyag rgya de dang
54b4(rgyud): de yis na//sha rnams kun gyis dam tshig stsol//de nas 'dod ldan rnyed nas ni//hU~M zhes bya bas bsgrub par bya//de nas sngags mkhan sgo sgor yang //de nyid dran byung snyed
54b5(rgyud): par byed//de ni nges par dngos grub ste/yud tsam 'jig rten gsum dbang 'gyur//dkyil 'khor du ni tshogs rnams dang //rang gi lha yi tshogs rnams la//rgyud
54b6(rgyud): las byung ba 'i dam tshig brjod//de nis mchod de langs nas kyang //tshugs can rdo rje sems dpa' yi//tshul du gnas nas 'byung bar bya//de nas skyob ma bsdus na
54b7(rgyud): ni/lag na rin ngan thogs te gzhug/oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya n+de//mo badz+ra rAk+Sha si hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra kro d+ha a na lad smr-i Ta ra pra dz+yo hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kr-i r+d+ha na ni rak+She hU~M phaT/
55a1(rgyud): ma rgyu /nan du na na rdzu na na na bla/ dz+nyAn tu rgyu//
55a2(rgyud): 'dis dbyung bsgyur bzhin du dbyu bsgyur bar bya'o//de nis de dag gi sgrub pa 'i rgod//bdan nyid khro bar snyoms zhugs so//de nas
55a3(rgyud): // nims d+d+hi yai k+She las//tho ya dang yang 'bri zhing //dag sa gcig tu sgom par bya//de na skye b+hU'i myur bla kun du sbyin//
55a4(rgyud): las dang sa//gaskyed ma yin par bshad yod kyi//zhi da rgyas pa rnams//de nas spyod 'gyur gdon ma ga//rdo rje sems dge nga 'dzin gnas//
55a5(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas na//gdug pa'i sems can 'dzin byed cing //mdor na dug rims gdon la sogs//de bzhin de dag zad ni//thabs la sags
55a6(rgyud): bsdu 'joms byud gA/zhes nas sgyi las 'gyung 'gyur bar//bsad pa'i lam li bsam par/zlos par gyur ba'i da pa'is//shA thAg
55a7(rgyud): 'jib byed cing //de dag 'a tsha ba 'phrog byed 'a'o//thasems na nges par brlag par 'gyur//khro ba 'jig rten gsum snang mdzad//zla sa 'dra 'i dan sa
55b1(rgyud): zhing //'od zer 'byung ba mang po yis//khyab par gyur par rnams bsams la//rims dang gla don dang dug la sogs//'od zer der ni phyung nas kyang //de yind
55b2(rgyud): rgas gnod pa'i rnams//zhi bya'i phyir ni ring du dor//de nas hUM gi tshig bzhag la//rdo rje lta bu'i lus bsam zhing //hAM gis 'khor los gi char bya//'od zer chu yi
55b3(rgyud): dbang bskur ro//de nas de yi ming smros shig/bzlas pas tshul bzhin bsam par bya//de nas khung bu gsum la rnam cig ni//zla ba rgyas shing 'di zer 'phro 'dra la//
55b4(rgyud): khru gang tsama'i yang na khru do pa//mr-i rgyal mchog rnams kyi ni gnyi su bsgyur//de yis rnams rnam par sbyang byas te//'khor lo'i dkyil na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
55b5(rgyud): gyidabusu rdo rje rtse ltar gyur pa gcig/'od zer dkar po phreng bskor gzi con gzhag/phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams thams cad bri bya ste/rigs brgya la sogs phyag rgya
55b6(rgyud): zur phyir cing //rgyal po bzhi yi ji bzhin phyag 'tshan rnams//phyogs kyi bdag po rnams kyang phyogs phyogasu//lha tshon la sogs phyag rgya khyab 'jug dang //
55b7(rgyud): 'khor lo lta bu nyid du bri bar bya//dri zhim tshus bkang mdog 'od dkor gyur la//dkar pos shin tu dkrigs pa'i bum pa brgyad//dkar gsum gang ba'i gter ma
56a1(rgyud): lha bshos dang //bdug pa mar mo me tog rnams kyang bzhag/mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ni zla ro dang //gdugs dang rgyal mochen rnga ma la sogs
56a2(rgyud): bzhag/nang re ga pur bcas pa'i dri zhim pa//can dan la sogs pa yi byug pas byug/kha ni shor phyogos bltas te sbyin bsreg bya//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan
56a3(rgyud): la 'dug bya 'am//yang na rnal 'byor ldan zhing sems dpa'i gdan//gos la sogs dkar phreng ba dkar gyis brgyan//mar gyi sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang //nas kyi thug pa
56a4(rgyud): la sogs dang //til mar dang ni til nyid dang //yungs kar dang no 'bras yos dang //'bras chen nas dang gro rnams dang //me tog shin tu dri zhim rnams//ga
56a5(rgyud): pur dang ni bses nas kyang //can dan dkar pos bsgos pa dang //'dab bdun me tog 'bras bu rnams//zho dang ldan pa'i yam shong la/de dag khung bu'i khyad par
56a6(rgyud): las/rang gi sor gyis gzhal bya zhing //nyi shu rtsa bzhi yan chad mchog/sar bcu drug ni dar ma ste//tha ma bcu gnyis nyid du shes//shin tu chung na so brgya //
56a7(rgyud): bud shing zho dang ldan pa la//dri chus bskus pa shes par bya//bud shing de las byung ba'i me//sbyar nas dri chus gtor nas ni//pad+ma dkar po zhe la 'dra dag
56b1(rgyud): pad+ma nor bu ril pa thogs//lag na dbyug pa mchog thogs pa//pad+ma dkar po'i stan sted 'dug/de lha'i me lha bkug nas kyang //arga brang te dngul bar bya//de nas
56b2(rgyud): zla rgyas dkar po la//zhugs pa'i 'gro phan spyan drangs te//pad+ma da ka ri po shar phyogasu//bsams nas steng du gzhag par bya//de nas de ltar bsams nos kyang /
56b3(rgyud): bsgrub bya rtag tu mdun bzhag ste//de yi nye sngo pa drang sa nas ni//shin tu bsrings nr-i swa bar bya//nang par sngar ni gtsang 'gyur zhing //shin tu dri zhim lus byug la//
56b4(rgyud): bdud rtsi bzhin bas mi sbyin bsreg bya//dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'//lha rdzas bdud rtsi bro lnga 'di//dang por me lha brtag byas la//khro bo de ni daM lu su//
56b5(rgyud): spyan drangs nas ni zhugs par bsams//de nas dang po kho bo la//bsreg bya yan gsum dbul bar bya//de nas dkon mchog gsum la gsum//de nas
56b6(rgyud): me lho nyid lnga gsum//de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la//de nas lha rnams re re l-i//de nas bgegs la sogs la dbul//de yid 'ong pa'i lha yang rung //de nas
56b7(rgyud): dang po khro bo yi//sngags kyis yam shing sbyin par bya//de nas gcig du bsregs nas kyang //bdud rtsi sngags kyis btab nas ni//de bzhin sbyin sreg byas
57a1(rgyud): 'og tu//brgya stong stod dam yang na no//brgyartsa brgyad kyi bar du ni//khro bo nyid la dbul bar bya//de yaM lus la dbang bskur zhing //mnyam pa
57a2(rgyud): bzhug pas bsrung nas ni//mjug tu mngon par mchod nas ni//lha rnams thaMd gi shegs par gsol//'dis ni zhi ba'i las rnams kyang //'grub bsgyur 'di la
57a3(rgyud): the tshom med//ci ste de ni sdig can nam//gal te mnyam par ma gzhag pas//de tshe dngos grub ma gyur na//stong pa nyid du rnam bsgoms la//de nas de
57a4(rgyud): bzhin byas nas ni//gdon mi ze bar dngos grub 'gyur//zhi ba'i laso////'bras bur ldan pa'i nag tshal lam+ba//yang na nags sum rgyal po 'am/
57a5(rgyud): rgyal rigs khyim du rgyas pa ni//dga' ba'i sems kyis bya ba ste//khru dro yang na khru bzhi pa 'am//de ltar mchog ni khru brgyad//chu mchog bar ma rnams
57a6(rgyud): lngas gcig/rgyas pa'i las ni bya ba yin//mdor na hU~Mm khung bya ba ni//stegs bu brtsigs te dkyil 'khor ni//chung ngu la ni khru brgyad de//bar ma la
57a7(rgyud): ni bcu gnyis nyid//mchog lo bcu drug yang na ni//nyi shu rtsa bzhi shes bya//mu khyud sor brgyad bcu drug gam//sum cu gnyi su bya ba yin//phyi ma
57b1(rgyud): 'khor lo de yi phyed//pad+ma rnams kyis brgyan par bya//dkyil 'khor dbus su rin chen dang //pad+ma sna tshogs brgyan par bya//de yi dbu su brko ba ni//legs par
57b2(rgyud): bltas te phyed kyi tshod//khru bzhi pa 'am khru brgyad pa//yang na dpal bskyed pad+ma 'dra//mdor na 'ji bi ser po yis//de bzhon khung mchog brkos nas ni//gur gum
57b3(rgyud): lA sogasau bskus nas kyang //de yi dbusu bres nas ni//tshon mchog sor pos bskus nas kyang //ser 'od 'dra bar bsgom par bya//de nas tshan ni dmar ser gyis
57b4(rgyud): rin chen pad+ma la sogs pa'i//phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor khor yug tu//gnas pa nyid du bri bar bya//rims gnyis yang ni rim bzhi 'am//yang na rim pa
57b5(rgyud): brgyad ldan par//der ni sgo ba de dog nyid//phyag rgya'i gzugasu brtag par bya//bum pa khe dog go ser 'dra zhing //dri chus rab tu bkang ba la//shin tu mdzes brgyad
57b6(rgyud): nu gnyis sam//sum cu gnyis sam bcu drug ste//dkri ba'i dar ni se ro po la//kha brgyan yal ga me tog can//dri zhim me tog bdug pa dang //phreng ba mar
57b7(rgyud): mi rgyan rnams dang //rgyal mtshan 'phon la sogs pa dang //bla re gdugs rnams ser pos rgyan//bdag nyid gos dang rgyan rnams dang /me tog la sogs
58a1(rgyud): ser po sna brgyun//byung phyogs khwa ltas 'dug nas ni//'jig rten gsum 'dub wA rnga yi//nyid kyi rnab 'byor rdzas dran zhing //m+b+ha ya yid canan na
58a2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan//gtsam gser gyi 'di dang 'dro//de bzhin tithA ku pai//gnod sbyin dang nI dzam+b+ha la//gser gyi char ni rab de bros shing //yid kyi 'dod pa skyong mdzad/
58a3(rgyud): po//mdor na de yi 'od zer gyis//nges par dbang ni bskur bar bsam//de na sa rgyal srid 'tho ba 'gyur na//lus rgyas pa lta smos ci dgos//rgyas par bya phyir de ming
58a4(rgyud): nas//smos te brgya phrag brgya rtsa brgyad//yang na de bzhin stong phrag ni//brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya//de nas sbyin sreg rab bya ste//byang phyogasu ni sing+ga yi//gaudon gyi steng na rin
58a5(rgyud): chen dang //pad+ma nyi zla gdan stongs na//rdo rin chen rin chen mchog/rin chen dpal dang gizi brjid mchog/rdo rje bzhad dang rgyal ba yod//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas ni//phyag ni/
58a6(rgyud): mchog sbyin gzhil pa dang /rin chen tshar yang 'bebs brtson zhing //'od zer ser 'phro thams cad kyis//de la shin du khyab byed pasam//dung dang pi bang cang te'u dang //sal
58a7(rgyud): snyan glung gar mchogs//mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni//de yi 'og tu las brtsa mo//khung bu'i khyad par nyid las kyang //ye mo shing bud shing khyad por dbye//mdzub gang khu tshur
58b1(rgyud): sa khru gang //chung ngu nyid du bshad pa yin//bar ma khA dor shes par bya//khru bzhi pa na mchog yin te//me tog 'bras bur bcas rigs kyi//ya tog ma tog sbrang rtsir gAjun/
58b2(rgyud): 'bru rnams thaMd 'byor pa dang //me tog 'bras bu ser por ldan//mar dang spya rtsi bsrid nas ni//phal cher dpal b+hi 'bras bur ldan//me lha gser dang 'dra ba la//phyag bzhi pa
58b3(rgyud): 'dir de bzhin ni//pad+ma gdan bzhugs rnam rgyan pa//spyan drangs bsreg bya sbyin bsreg bya//de yi lusu khro rgyal po//byin can legs par bcug nas ni//sngon bzhin dran byed de zhal
58b4(rgyud): du/sbyin sreg yongasu brtag bya ste//'bum 'amo nyis 'bum tsam gyis kyang //don ni nges par rab tu 'grub//'bum phyag brgyas ni rgyal srid dmi//longs spyod phun
58b5(rgyud): sum chog pa 'grub//de nas 'jug tu 'od zer gyis//de la dbang bskur bsrung bar bya//de nas de ni rgyal 'gyur te//phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bozhin//rgyas pa'i laso//
58b6(rgyud): dbang ni chags pa'i sems kyis kyang //chags pa'i ti 'dzin b+hi sa bya//tshigs pa bcom ldan rdo rje can//rdo chags pa ngo bos byung //khams gsum tshogs par byed pa'i phyir/
58b7(rgyud): pad+ma sems dpa' rtag tu chags//de bas 'dis ni de dag ni//las 'grub pa ni bshad pa yin//chags dang 'thun pa'i sa phyogs sam//chags par byed pa'o khyim
59a1(rgyud): du shus//gtso blag can rnams zla mtshon n+dan dag gis//phyim du chags pa'i las rnams bya ba yin//rdo rje chags pa'i gnas kyang rung //phyag na pad+ma
59a2(rgyud): gnas nyid du//rtag tu rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas//dede chen gyi ni gnas chen dang //padra ud pa la rdzing bu dang //ban du ka yi me tog gnas//me tog 'bras bu dmar chel
59a3(rgyud): ni//yid 'ong sems ni chags byed pa//der ni stegs bu khru brgyad dam//de ltar bcu gnyis bcu drug rnam//byas nA de yi dbusu yang //ha ma khung dkyil 'khor bya ba ni//khwa
59a4(rgyud): gang yang na khru do 'am//de ltar khru ni bzhi bar bya//gzhu 'dra ba 'am pad+mo 'am//yang da rdo rje 'dra bar bya//mda' 'dra zla ba khim 'dra dang //de ltar pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra//zhe
59a5(rgyud): du mchu yi phyed kyi tshad//zhing gi byed kyi tsha tsam du//ho ma khung zad su brko par bya//mu khyud sor ni bzhi par bya//nyis 'gyur ba ni nyis 'gyur bya//tha ma mchog gi/
59a6(rgyud): khyad par las//yam shing so sor nges par bya//yang na yam shing sreg shing ni//tshe ni zhi ba'i lasu gsungs//shin tu dmar ba'i can dan nam//yang na shing
59a7(rgyud): dmar gzhan yang rung //me tog 'bras bu dmar po 'am//btsog dang tsan dan rgya skyeg sogs//leb rgan rtsi dang gur gum gyis//mdor na bud pa'i shing dang ni//yam
59b1(rgyud): shong la yang skus nas ni//yungs kar kha dog dmar po dang //btsog gam mtshol yang de bzhin du//zangs kyi phyi dang yungs kar du//skye tshe 'bru dang lan tshwa dang //til dang dri zhim thig le'i
59b2(rgyud): 'bru/la phug yungs rdog de bzhin te//khrag dang rdul ni chen po rnams//sreg bya phyir ni bsdus nas kyang //sngar bshad 'bras bu l-i sogs pa'i//bu bas yang dang yang bskus nas//khro
59b3(rgyud): ba'i sngags kyis byin brlabs te//ba dang ra lus bzhes pa yis//ba shiSh+Ta ma thag pa'i mar sar dang //ma re dang til mar rnams kyis pa gang //ga pur la sogs bsgos nas kyang /
59b4(rgyud): bdud rtsis btab stau bzhag par bya//de nas ho khung dmar po la//byu ru'i sdong po 'dra bar yang //bsams nas spo sa dmar la sogs dang //gur gum dmar pos byug par bya//
59b5(rgyud): de nas kha dog dmar po yis//stug po nyid du bsku bar bya//gur gum ser pos bsres pa yI//tshon gyi ri mo bri ba ni//hau khung nang du dad+ma bri//de yi steng du mnga' bcas gzhu//rtag tu
59b6(rgyud): haM khung khor yub tu//pad+ma nyid ni bri bar gyi//gA tsu yi dbus rdo rje nyid//'khor yug tu ni mnga' nyid bri//grezhu yi phyi rol pAd+me nyid//bris nas ng+ge yi steng du mda'o//de yi
59b7(rgyud): la rdo rje dang //lcags kyi ma dang bcas gzhu bris la//lci phyogs rgyal mtsho ne rini chen dang //gzi brjid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo rnams//du phyo
60a1(rgyud): tu snga ma bzhin mchod//dang ldan gos dang phreng ba dang //dmar po'i dri ni bskus nas kyang //rtag tu thub pa nub bltas la//dmar thug ma tshad las bya ste//pad+ma dmar po'i gdan bsam
60a2(rgyud): la//rab chags phyag na pad+ma bsnams//g.yon du rdo rje tshugs pa la//g.yasu bde ba chen po ste//bsams na de yi dbus ni//chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa bzhag/rdo rje
60a3(rgyud): gzhu dang g.yon bgying ma//me tog dmar rgyan rab mdzes ma//dri dmar la sogs rab mchod de//mda' dang gzhu thogs de bzhin du//pad+ma dmar dang dbyig bsnam
60a4(rgyud): pa'i//me yi lha ni bkug nas kyang //de yis lusu khro rgyal po//legs par bcug ste bzhag par bya//'od zer chags pas bsgyur nas ni//de lus rdo rje lcagos kyu dang /
60a5(rgyud): zhags pa bcings pas bkug nas ni//spyi bo zhabs kyi drung du bzhag/de ltar bsams te snyoms zhugs pas//las byas pa ni gang yin pa//desi ni lha yang dbang
60a6(rgyud): 'gyur na//mi dang lha min smos ci dgos//las rnams zin par gyur pa dang //chags pa'i semasu byas nas ni//de yi 'od zer spyi bor dgang //de ni bsrung nas btang bar
60b1(rgyud): bya//de nas rdo rje 'dod pa yis//lha rnams mtsho de gshegs par gsol//de nas srung ba byas nas ni//rdo rje 'dod pas rtag tu bzlas//dbang gi la so//de nas brgya byin tshangs
60b2(rgyud): sogs lha//phyag 'tshal yang dang yang du ni//rin chen gdugs la sogs mchog gi/mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas kyang //phyag na rdo rje rgyal can la//dga' ba'i bsam pas
60b3(rgyud): bstod byed pa//sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas//mi shes dri ma kun bcom pa//rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po//rdo rje rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje sku tre sku che bA//phyag na rdo phyag 'tshal
60b4(rgyud): bstod//rdo rje yan lag rdo'i mchog/rdo rje'i 'bar ba che 'bar ba//rdo rje shuDa te shur che ba//rdo rje mtshon che mtshon cha che//phyag na rdo rje phyag chen po//rdo rje mdo'i ste rab 'bigs pa//rdo rje rnon
60b5(rgyud): po rno ba che//che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che//rdo rje pad+ma byang chub che//byang chub sangs rgyas rab byung ba//rdo rje rgya chen rgya chen te//rdo rje sgyu ma rnam sbyor ba//rdo rje rgyu ste gnod sbyin tshe//
60b6(rgyud): pad+ma rnam skyong ba//rdo rje khro bo drag po che//rdo rje dgra sdang 'joms pa'i gtso//rdo rje srung ba srung ba tshe//rdo rje lcags kyu don yod byed//rdo rje ro langs ro langs tshe/
60b7(rgyud): rdo rje srin po zab po//rdo rje gnod sbyin gnod sbyin che//rdo rje gdon te gdon che'i mchig/'dzegs byed dga' byed drag po li//rdo rje 'jigs byed sngags byed pa//sa
61a1(rgyud): mamaHsa masamathamamathas mamathanathasan/ma thamams tham ma thams thamatham pa mam ma/ mthan tham/yam
61a2(rgyud): dka' sgrub pas legs pa ste//rdo rje lags pa dgyes mdzad pa//rdo rje dga' ba dga' brje//dag 'i rdo rje dbang byed pa//rdo rje gzi brjod gni ba na/
61a3(rgyud): 'bad 'od gshin rje mthar byed pa//rdo rje drag po drag po che//'od sdug pas na stug po che//na mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'o//re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa//rdo rje dbang /
61a4(rgyud): bskur rin chen mchog/rdo rje rgyal mtshan ston mtsho//rdo rje ye shes ye shes che//rig pa bye ba'i tshogs kyis mchod//ha la hA la nag po che//dgra che zhing ni 'joms
61a5(rgyud): pi can//rdo rje 'dod pa 'dod pa che//rnyog pa'i dus byin rnams sbyong ba//skad cig g.yo ba'i the tshom gcod//glog bzhin zhal gyi ljags las 'phro//rdo rje me ste/
61a6(rgyud): drag po'i zhal//drag po rab snang snang mdzad pa//nyi ma stong gis gdungs pa'i zhal//spyan dmar 'jigs par mdzad pa po//khro bo du ma 'odi bzhin 'phro//phyag rnams
61a7(rgyud): du ma mtshon cha h+ya/du ma'i zhil la sku yang stong //'khyil cing rgyan yang 'khyil pa la//sems kyis chosangs sku mi mnga'//rnam par rtog pa ma lus spongs//ma
61a8(rgyud): rigs joms po'i tshangs pa ste//'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzod//sgyu mo gtogs 'dod rdo rje can//rtse gsum rtse gsum 'chang 'phrog pa//'dod chags zhe
61b1(rgyud): snang gti mug che//srid dang srid min rnam sgreng ba//zhi zhing du la la dga' ba ste//sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rab rtogs pa//sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku//rdo rje rab skyes /
61b2(rgyud): sems//kun tu bzang po cher bzang ba//mtshon rnams dam pas rnam par rgyun//khams gsum bdag nyid khyab pa po//thaMd rdo rje bdag nyid gtsang //gang gis 'di bris bklag byur tam//
61b3(rgyud): rtag tu de de ni 'char byed dam//dran nam mnyan par byed kyang rung //phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas//brgya byin dang /chungs pa la sohA/
61b4(rgyud): pa/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri za dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/rjesu yi rang ngo //de bzhin/
61b5(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thaMd yongasu sbyong ba//gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogaso//
61b6(rgyud): rgya gar gri mkhan po shAn+ti gar+b+ha dang //bod kyi ljo ts+tsha ba ban d+he dzA ya rak+Shi t+yas bsgyur cing zhus//a tsAr+ya rin chen mchog gis skad gsor bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la
61b7(rgyud): phab pa///rgya gar skad du//sarba du ga ti pa ri sho d+ha na te dza rA dza s+ya ta thA ga s+ya ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud+d+ha s+yai kalpa e ka da sha nA ma//bod skad du//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
62a1(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das
62a2(rgyud): dpal shAkya seng+ge la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das lha thaMd kyi mchog dga' ba'i tsha lo na bzhugs te//nor bu dang /gser gyi shing
62a3(rgyud): lo ma dang /yal ga dang /lcug mar bcas pa'i sdong po dang /shing gel pa dang /sman dang /me tog ka maM la dang /me tog ud pa la dang /me tog kar ni ka dang /me tog
62a4(rgyud): k+Sha ku la dang /me tog ti la ka dang /me tog a sho ka dang //me tog man da ra ba dang //me tog man da ra ba chen po la sogs pa me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pas nye bar
62a5(rgyud): mdzes pa//dpag bsam gyi shing rnams kyis yang dag par rgyun pa/rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa/bya'i cho ga sna tshog skad snyan pa'i byin pa/rnga dang /rnga mu
62a6(rgyud): kun da dang /gling bu dang /rnga b+hi ra la sogs pA'i sgra sgrogs po/brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /lha'i bu rnam pa sna tshogs po rnams rnam par brtsi
62a7(rgyud): gi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa na'o//brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha thams cad dang /rig pa 'dzin
62b1(rgyud): baman mamamams mamasas mnyamamamamathasamamacamasama.am mal tham la ma ya mam ma 'amams thams ma yam
62b2(rgyud): pa dang /lha'i bu mo 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya stong rnams dang /gnod sbyin dang /sngon po dang /lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang /dri za dang /mi 'am ci
62b3(rgyud): dang /lto 'phyo chen po dang /klu la sogs pa 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad rnam la 'di lta ste//
62b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gas spobs pa dang /b+h+rUM gros mi g.yo ba dang /blo gros yangs pa dang /kun tu blo gros dang /blo gros mtha' yas
62b5(rgyud): pa dang /kun nas legs pa'i blo gros dang /blo gros ka ma la dang /blo gros chen po dang /blo gros lce rdzas dang /blo gros sna tshogs pa dang /blo gros ma lus pa dang /
62b6(rgyud): kun tu bzang po ste/de dag la sogs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun mtha'i yas shing mu med pa rnams kyi sti stang
62b7(rgyud): du byes/bla mar byas/mchod cing rjed par byos/shin tu dul du byung bar byas te/'khor gyi tshogs chen po'i dbus tshangs pa lha chen po pad+ma'i bden la zhugs shing
62b8(rgyud): ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs//de ma thag nyid du ngan song gsum gyi rgyud rnam par grol bar byed pa zhes bya ba
63a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'di ra 'phyo dang /rjud pa ma myong bar dgo na rjes ldan/byu/des skyong gsapa kyi na pa 'jogs na/nas/
63a2(rgyud): kun tu snang bar bya'o//kun tu snang bar byas pa des snrums can thams nyid kyi sems nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba lis bi k+kola~M ti/yang dge pa sa so so sor thob pa thos pa gyis shing /
63a3(rgyud): ba'i tshol yang kun tu snang bar byas te/mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs pa rnams kyi mngon par mchod nas lan brgya phrag skyong du bskor ba byas te mgo blos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom
63a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis sbyini sngar nor ze dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod de 'di skad ces gsol to//e ma'o sangs rgyas e matos kyi tshas mem nyos pa mdzad pa shin tu lini//gang phyir bdag ca na
63a5(rgyud): song yo su sbyangs//byang chub spyod pa nyid la rab tu bzhag/de nas lce'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'dral 'di skad
63a6(rgyud): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer kun tu snang bas ngan song kun las rnam par dkrol nas rnam par grol ba'i lam la rab tu bzhag pa ni
63a7(rgyud): ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o//bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar che'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' stsal pa/lha'i dbang po 'din ngo mcher mi che ste/sa sa rgyas bcom
63b1(rgyud): ldan 'angs rnams ni tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams logs par bsngags pa'o//lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dajug tu med par rkun
63b2(rgyud): rin po che'i 'byung gnas gyur pa'o//lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni tshad med pa'i thabs yongasu rdzogs pa'o//lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bam
63b3(rgyud): ldan 'das ni shes rab dpag tu med pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod pa ched med pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul bya'i skye bo tshad mod pa rnams
63b4(rgyud): snod du gyur par mdzad pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dranas ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes gang yin pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi mnyam pa da
63b5(rgyud): 'i rdzu 'phrul dang yang dag par ldan pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i smon lam dang yang dag par ldan pa'o//lha'i dbang
63b6(rgyud): po de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod ji ltar sin gyi don mdzad pa dang /gdul bya ji lta de ltar sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa dang /mos
63b7(rgyud): ji lta bo bzhin du son rnams kyi doni mdzad pa yin no zhes shes par bya ba 'di la 'dir the tshom dang so mi ho dang yid gnyis mi bya'o//gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
64a1(rgyud): /gdul bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin//de nas lha'i dbang po rung gi stan las langs nas/sbyar yang com ldan 'as la mchod bu rgya rje ni chob rgyas te phyag 'tshal nas
64a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//son thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang /rje su rtse bar bya ba'i phyir dang /snying rje dang bcas par bya ba'i phyir dang /bordzib chen po dang bcas par
64a3(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir dang /bsam pa tha~Md yongasu rdzogs pa bgyi ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das bdag cig spobs pa bskyed gsol/bde bar gshegs pa dag spobs po bskyed gsol/bcom ldan 'das
64a4(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rigs 'di nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba zhig shi 'phos shing dus las 'das nas dgung 'dun len lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis de gang du skyes shing /
64a5(rgyud): 'ad ba 'om sdug bsngal gang myong bar 'gyur ba de bcom ldan 'das lung bstan du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/lha'i dbang po
64a6(rgyud): de'i dus dang skabasu bab par shos na nyon cig/lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/bcomi ldan 'das 'di ni dus lagaso//bde bar gshegs pa 'di ni skabasu bab pa lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis
64a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/lha'i dbang po lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de 'di nas shi phos nas mnar med pa'i seMn dmyal ba chen por skyes te/der lo stong phrag bcu gnyi su sdug
64b1(rgyud): rnam dun na mo bzod pa nang par 'gyu//dun dum chus na su la cur skrag tusas rgyu par 'gyung //snang dang bya bang du mye dag sa du rgyus N+Dal sgyang na zung /
64b2(rgyud): srog+sa N+DI'i myung bar 'gyur//smrar kyi na sbyis / 'ad /dag pa /lkugs dzi ni rkyen rnams sto ge / myong 'du byung //so
64b3(rgyud): drug ba rgyud cu kyi nang dag khrag 'jig pa nga/'dzi po mig gis gnong ba dang / maung pos spyad d+hA dz+dzi/ya~M m+me ts+tsha sas pa dang /rigs pa
64b4(rgyud): na sdug gostsal nas sdug bsngal du rgyud brdzun mi chud par 'gyur te/gzhan rnams kyi yang ga rnyed pa byed cing gyis kyi sgrub pa sna tshogs pa yang dz+nyAn mdzad pa de
64b5(rgyud): ra 'gyur//slar yang rtswani bsgral bad gzhin du myong bar 'gyur//de nas rgyu byin la sogs pa stir bu rnams de thos nas sbyangs shing skyug ste skyonas kha bub tu 'tshal to//
64b6(rgyud): las nas/'diska ces gsil te//bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal brgyud modo las ji ltar thar par 'gyur/byed par gshegs rdo rje lta y-i 'gyur/bcom ldan 'a
64b7(rgyud): gang gi sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po de las grol bar 'gyur ba des yongasu skyobs mdzad/bde bar gshegs pa yongs skyobs mdzod/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lce'i de
65a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad na rtsa bzhis bshad pa 'dings kyang ba shar kyi nyon cig//de nas lha'i dbang pos slar yang bcom ldan 'das la me tog man dA ra nga nan
65a2(rgyud): rab chen po dang /me tog rnam pa sna tshogaso pa//rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang /phyag gdub dang /dpung rgyan dang /snyan rgyan dang /do shal dang /do shal phyed pa la sogs pa rgyan gyi khyad par
65a3(rgyud): du mas mngon par mcho de/lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas shing phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das legs//bde bar gaushegs pa leg so zhes bya ba legs
65a4(rgyud): so'i tshig ge mnyes par byas nas/bcom ldan 'das lho dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde bar bgyi ba dang /ma 'ong ba'i sems can ngan song gsum
65a5(rgyud): gyi rgyud las rnam par thar par bgyi ba'i slad du legs par bshad pa'i don du gsol ba 'debs lag so//de nas slar tshangs pa la sogs nga'i lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kyang 'di
65a6(rgyud): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das legasaso//bde bar gshegs pa legaso//gang gi ma 'ongs pa'i seMn rnams kyi mtshan tsam yang thos pa dang ldan na ngan song
65a7(rgyud): gsum gyi lam las rnam par grol zhing mo tha ris lha'i 'jig rten nam//mi'i 'jig rten du skyes nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par
65b1(rgyud): bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang mchod pa la sogs pa lha'i bu de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'dis byin gyi brlab pa'o//
65b2(rgyud): don du don yod rje'i byin rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//oM badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThAn dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/de ltar tI 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zil gyi me non pa dz+ra
65b3(rgyud): byin gyi brlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs nas/ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di byung //oM shi d+ha ne sho d+ha naM sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha na
65b4(rgyud): shud d+ha sarba karma au ba ra Na bai shud d+he swA hA//rig pa 'di gsungs ma thog/nyid tu sems can thaMd ngan song du mi ltung bar byas shing dmyal ba dang /byol song dang /yi dgas
65b5(rgyud): kyi 'gro ba thams cad sbyangs te/sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rnam par rab tu zhi zhing skye bo mang po rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur to//de nas gzhan yang srung ba'i snying po 'di
65b6(rgyud): gsungaso//oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ya sarba a pA ya sarba sa twe b+ho hAM/lha'i dbang po gzhon yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi snying po'o//oM sarba a pA yai bi sh+lo d+ha ni hUM phaT/
65b7(rgyud): lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'o//oM tAT/lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni ngan song thad yongasu sbyong ba'i snying pa
66a1(rgyud): lha'i dbang gzhan yang mdor na dran pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las bde blag tu rnam par grol bar
66a2(rgyud): byed pa yin te//na mo b+ha ga ba te/sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+he ni rA dzA ya/ar+yA te samyaglai bud+ha ye/tad+ya thA/oM shaM d+ha ne sho d+ha nau rkod+ha ni bi shod+ha ni/sarba pA paM sho d+ha ni shud d+hi bi shud d+he/sarba
66a3(rgyud): karma a ba ra Na bi shud d+hi swAhA/rtsa ba'i rig pa'o//oM sarba bid+ya sar+b+ba oM ba ra na bri sho d+ha ya ha na hUM phaT/oM sarba bid+ya swA hA/oM sarba bid+ya hrI phaT/oM sarba bid+yA a/aM
66a4(rgyud): sarba bid+yA tAT/sarba bid+yA oM/oM sarba bAd+hi d+hI/oM sarba bid+yA hUM/oM sarba bid+yA krI tAT/oM sarba bad+ye mA hA badz+ra uda~M b+ha ba dwe na pa ra mi ta pU dza hUM/sgeg mo'i sngagasau//oM
66a5(rgyud): sarba bid+yA ma hA badz+ra ud b+ha ba shI la pA ra mi ti pU dze d+h+waM/phreng ba mI'i sngagaso//oM saMrba bid+yA ma hA badz+ra ud b+ha ba k+ShitrI pa ri ma hA pU dze hrI/glu me'i sngagaso//AM sarba bid+yA ma
66a6(rgyud): hU badz+ra ud b+ha ba bI ma? sitA pU dza aHgar ma'i sdigaso//oM sarbe bId+yA sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni d+ha ma d+ha mo d+hu pa ya d+h+ya nA pA ra mI tA pU dze hUM hUM phaT/bdug pa ma'i sngagasau//
66a7(rgyud): oM sarba bid+yA sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ne kle shats+tsha da ni puSh+pa bi lo ki ni bA mi tA pU dze tAM hUM phaT/me tog ma'i sngagaso//aM sarba bid+hi sarba a pAM ya bai sho d+ha ni dz+nyA ne/A
66b1(rgyud): ka kA ra br-i Ni d+hi ba rA tA pU dza hrIHhUM phaT/mar me mA'i sngagaso//oM sar+b+ba bid+yA sarba a bA ya gAn d+hA banA sha ni/badz+ra gAn d+ha u pA ya mi tA pU dza aHhUM phaT/dri chab me sngags//oM sarba d+ya sa/
66b2(rgyud): na ra ke gi ti AM kaR+Sha Ni hU~M dzaHphaT/rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags//oM badz+ra dId+yA sarbaM na ra ka udad+hA ra NI hU~M hU~M phaT/rdo rje zhags pa'i sngags//oM sarba bid+yA sarba A pa~M ya ban d+ha na mo tsa ni d+hU ba~M phaT/rdo rje lcags sgrog/
66b3(rgyud): ge sngagaso//oM sarba bid+hi sarba a pA ya ge tI ga hA na bi sho d+ha ne hU~M phaT/rdo rje 'bebs pa'i sngags//oM mi tre yat+tA ra NA ya swAhA//byams pa'i 'i//oM a mo d+ha a mo d+h+yed she mthong ba don yod kyi/
66b4(rgyud): saM sarba a pA ya dze ha sarbaM a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni hUM/ngan so kun 'dren gyi'o//oM sarba sho ka ta mo nr-i re b+ha ta na me ti hUM/mya ngan dang mun pa dzad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi'o//oM gi d+hA hasti ni ts+tsha/
66b5(rgyud): spos kyi glang po'i 'o//oM shu raM ga mo hUM/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ngo// gagan dru ga nA lo tsa ni hU~M//na mkha' mdzad kyi'o//oM dz+nyAM ne ge tu dz+nyA na ba ti hUM//ye shes tog gI'o//AM aM mi te/
66b6(rgyud): pra b+h+re a mi ta ba twe hUM/'od dpag tu med kyi'o//oM tsan+da s+the tsan+na bya bA lo ki ni hUM swAhA//zla 'od kyi'o//oM b+ha dra ba tI b+ha drA pA laM sAM hA//bzang skyong gi'o//oM dzA li ma hA nAM
66b7(rgyud): e ni dz+haiM/dra bcan gyi yad kyi'o//oM dz+r-i gits+tshiN+Te/ 'o//oM a mr-i mr-i Ta/oM/yo karma A ba ra NA shaud+d+hi ni swA/blo gros mi da pa'i'o//oM br-i tit+ta na
67a1(rgyud): mtshan kan mtshas mamatshams satsham macas ma thamasamamasaca thasam can thasamatham thams mams tha mtha thams tham mams bsatham ma macam tam/thams mkham thams yamasam man
67a2(rgyud): b+hA na ku Te swA hA//spongs pa brtsegs pa'i'o//oM sam+b+han+ta b+ha dre hUM/kun tu bzung po'o//skal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
67a3(rgyud): sngags 'di dag rim pa bzhin du brjed//'di dag gis rgyudu ji skad gsungs pa'i rje su 'bring ba'i cho ga'i rims pas nyin re zhing snga ba'i dusu bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pazhin pas lha'i
67a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gsum mchog 'bad pas bsgoms te/ngan song yongasu sbyong bar grub par 'gyur ro//lha'i dbang po gzhan yang de bzhi ni gshegs pa ngan song tha~Md yongasu sbyong
67a5(rgyud): pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i gsang ba'i snying po 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo 'am/gang 'ga' zhig ming tsam nyan pa dang /'chad pa dang /klog pa dang /bris nas
67a6(rgyud): kyang mge 'am/gtsug pud dam/dpung pa 'am/mgul par btags te 'chang byed na de'i tshe 'di nyid la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dang /'chi ba dang /'brel
67a7(rgyud): pa'i rmi lam 'byung ba 'am//ngan song dang 'brel ba'i mtshan ma de dag thams cad rmi lam tsam du yang mi 'byung //gang 'ga' zhig dkyil 'khor du yang ji lte ba
67a8(rgyud): bzhin du zhugs nas dbang bskur te snying po yang zlos shing sngags kyi don sgoms par byed na lta smos kyang ci dgos te/de dag la sdig pa gang cung zad kyang nye bar mi 'gyur
67b1(rgyud): zhing ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro//skyes pa dang /bud med dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /byol song dang /yi dgas dang /dmyal ba la sogs pa
67b2(rgyud): gang yang rung ba shi ba'i lus rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug skye dbang bskur na/de dmyal bar skyes na yang de ma thag nyi du rnam par thar nas lha'i rigasu skye bar 'gyur//lha'i rig
67b3(rgyud): der skyes par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid mngon sum du byed cing phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro//rgyud nges pa can du yang 'gyur zhing de bzhin ga
67b4(rgyud): pa tha~Md kyi rigasu rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro//sgrib pa rnams rab tu spangs nas de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyi rigs sam/lce'i rigs sam/gzhan du yang bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro///
67b5(rgyud): lha'i dbang po mdor na 'dzosmin dang 'dzirten l+la 'das pa'i phan pa dang bde ba thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro//de nas lha'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la snga ma bzhin du bskor ba byas
67b6(rgyud): to/phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ngan song thod kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur pa dang /ji ltar sems can rnams
67b7(rgyud): ngan song tha~Md la rgyab kyi phyogs par bgyi ba dang /bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde blag tu rtogs par bgyi ba'i sla du chos bshad du gsol/
68a1(rgyud): /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i ye shes rdo rje nos bya ba'i ti 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin
68a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan seng thams cad yongasu spong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal pr-i zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsungs te/de mgon po shAkya thub pa nyid kyi
68a3(rgyud): gsungs pa ni/dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas skye bos deben pa'i yid dang rje su 'thun pa'i sa phyogasasu 'jam zhing shin tu 'brol ba'i stan la 'dug ste/dri bzang pos
