68a4(rgyud): maN+Dal byas nas nye bar spyod pa lnga'i mchod pa byo'o//de nas ches thams cad bdag med par bsgoms la/bdag nyid yi ge hUM gis rdo rjes 'bar ba me nyi mer sgoms
68a5(rgyud): te/de mgrin par yi ge hI las pad+ma dang de'i snying du 'bad pa'i rtse mor yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /de'i steng du yi ge hUM les rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /rdo rje
68a6(rgyud): dwe lce lA thim par bya zhing badz+re dzi hA zhes bya'o//des rdo rje'i lcer 'gyur zhing sngags zlos pa nus par 'gyur//lag pa gnyis kyi dbusu yi ge e dkare po las zla
68a7(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor dang de'i snying du yi ge hUM las rdo rje rtsi lnga pa dang /gnyis lag pa'i mthil du thim par bya ste rdo rje'i lag par 'gyur ning phyag rgya 'ching bar nus par
68b1(rgyud): /donas smra 'i rnams pa d+yAn+tu/oM b+h+yod+b+ha d+d+hosam+b+ha ya d+hAdzazhes du Ta nA sa dz+nyAn tA rA bcoM s+yA prAR+YAd+hA rmA/ bak+Sham+b+has+yA dA n+ya byas nas/
68b2(rgyud): rdo rje dam pa yis/khro bo yid kyi dag 'a b+h+yo ba//khro Ta d+hi rin ti ri ba cing //de nas rdo rje byed pa'i gdan gyis 'dug pas rdo rje te rin te dbrings le rdo phreng ba'i grong babru nga brdung chu
68b3(rgyud): oM badz+re dz+wa lA u nA la ar+ha d+h+r-i A b+hi Shiny+tsA trAM zhes pas//rdo rje bsnams pa las mthe bong blo nyis gshibs te skyong ba rdo rje bsdams pa'i steng du dge ba pa'i tshul du bzung ba ni
68b4(rgyud): rdo rje t-i ri ni ti rin+da tI ra'o//oM TuM zhes bya bor yo ge gnyis po'i go ches go chu dgos nas/oM badz+ra dz+wa la an la oMrba hUM ni sa byA ba sgrogs shing gson pa'i rdo rje khu tshur khar bya
68b5(rgyud): ste/g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gsor zhing bgegs thad la bsnan//de nas rngo ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas bgegs byaskyeg par bya ste/oM badz+ra dz+wa l+la an la tA na da ta pa tsi ma thA b+han+d+ra
68b6(rgyud): hUM phaT zhes brjod cing rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la sor mi rnams nang du 'bor ba la mthe bo rdo rje sgreng ba 'di ni rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o//de'i rjes la badz+ra ne tra bAd d+ha sarba bir+g+haM zhes
68b7(rgyud): nga'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o//rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis bskyed ste mnyam la bzung ba ni rdo rje sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o//rje
69a1(rgyud): us pa ts+tshabs tu na sna du rgyas par byu//ma mA man+ta rAg+sa sa zhes bya'o//rdo rje 'jigs byu/ phyug r+b+ha /
69a2(rgyud): bcas pas steng bcing bar bye ste/oM ho lu hu lu hUM phaT zhes pa dang /rdo rje khu tshung gnyis brji sau lnga 'dal mo'i 'a d-ir mo sbyor bsko na pa mgo bo'i snying du zung nga ni
69a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyi phyag rgya'o//de'i 'og tu rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag n+ya dang bcas byas slar snyed bcing bar bya ste/oM badz+ra yak+Sha hUM zhes pa 'di dang rdo rje thul mo mA
69a4(rgyud): tho gnyis brgyad mo mdzu mo gnyis mche ba lta bur byis pa ni rdo rje donod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o//hU~M gtsug tor gyi phyog rgyu dang bcas pas shor phyogs bcing par bya ste/
69a5(rgyud): badz+ra dAn tu hU~M zhes pa'o//druM zhes pa yong //rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mtho chung lu gu rgyud sbrel la mdzub mo gnyis rtse sbyar la bzlog nas spyi bor bzhog pa nA rdo gtsum
69a6(rgyud): byi byig rgyu'o//yang rdo rje zhags pas shar de nyid bcing bar bya ste/oM badz+rA dI sh+mid+d+ha zhes pa dang /rje rje khwa tshung gaunyis kyis 'khrig mo mdud pa byas pa ni rje rje
69a7(rgyud): zhigs pa'i phyog rgya'o//rdo rje 'den gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste/oM badz+ra pa tAM kaM pa tAM gi ni ra ta zhes bi dang /rdo rje bsdams pa las methe bong gnyis sems
69b1(rgyud): 'i sgrol krung byas la mdzub ma gnyis mnyam bIr gshungs te phye la mthe ru chung ba dan sbyar byas pa ni rdo rje bden kyang //phyogs dang mtshams dang skyong dang ngag rga
69b2(rgyud): bge gso rnams tshor bcad der bya'o//rdo rjedus kyis byung phyogs bcings te dz+dzabadz+rAkA la li ru ma/zhes pa dang / rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag tu hU~Md pa~M kAr bstan par
69b3(rgyud): byA ba pA na~M dzA rje dus kyi'o//rdo rnams lci bats+tsha sa te/oM badz+ra shrI kha re ruH miT zhes bye ba dang //rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi ri bo'i 'dogs pa'i tshul ni rdo rje rje mo'i 'o//rdo rje
69b4(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor bcing bar byas la rab byo'o//trA~M badz+ra kar+m+ma zhes pa'o//yang rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi sa nAng du rab bya s+t+waM hUM hU~M hU~M zhes pa dang /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings khri
69b5(rgyud): rdo rje 'khrig ma gnyis bkrol te mthe'u chung gnyis lcags kyu sbrel la mdzub mo gnyis bsdigs mdzub tu sbyong ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya
69b6(rgyud): birdo hUM mdzad kyi'o//'di nyid las mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis rdo ltar byas pa ni rdo rje las kyi'o//rdo rje bsdams pas rdo rje'i gur sbyin par bya ste/badz+ra ban d+hi dza nA
69b7(rgyud): pa 'dis so//de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas deni song tha~Md yangasu spong ba'i dkyil 'khor mdun du rdzogs par bya ste/oM badz+ra babyor dz+dzaHkro hU~M zhwa bya'o//rdo rje khru
70a1(rgyud): rlung na nyam d+hanas//mdzub mo mtho r+m+mang rdu dz+nyA cing sa//rdo rje 'khor lo skyes grags pa//\u0f7fla 'khor thams cad sbra byung yo///
70a2(rgyud): phyogapa thams cad du be yas banar ny-id kyis ban ba las dkyi myi 'khor zad sprul par 'gyur//'di nyidadi khur bzhig nas nges par lta bzhin du rje 'khor ma
70a3(rgyud): yon brgyad bzlas//de yis dkyil 'khor zad du zhugs par 'gyuraro//de nas mngon gsum lta bur zos dmigs la me tog la sogs pas ying dag par mchod
70a4(rgyud): phyogs thaMd du yan lag lnga pa dang /'dres phyag bya'o//oM sarba d+hAk+ShA ya~M d+h+rik+Shad+b+ha pra NA man 'dra ban d+hA nAM ka ro mI zhes pa'o//de nas phyag bzhi bya ba ste 'di ltar
70a5(rgyud): smos thams cad kyis dang /rdo rje thul mo brgyad pos byar phyogs pa blas oM sarba br-ing+ga hU~M dz+nyA u bas+thAn+d+rA yaM aits+tshin nIr+yA t+ta yA me/sar+b+ba ta thA grA trU~M badz+ra satwA ya~M
70a6(rgyud): tiSh+Tha ma zhes pa 'das//de nas de bzhin du langs la rdo thol mo snying khor b+ha ba tA/s+thi phyog sung dral ba sA la rig cod b+hag byA ste/oM sa~Mr+b+ba hU~M bad+d+hA e mr-i
70a7(rgyud): ya~M/At+ma naM nir+yA ta ya ma~M sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na e b+hi Shiny+tsa ma zhes bya ba 'das//de nas de bzhin du langs te/rdo rje thal mo skye bar po zhig ste/nu
70b1(rgyud): phyagasu khas la reg cing phyag byas te/oM sarba bad+he pa dza pra brtan ma At+man/ner+yA ta yA maM/sarba ta thA ga tA badz+ra t+tarma pra brta ya ma zhes bya ba 'dris//de nas de bzhin du langs la
70b2(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas ba~Mb ta~M/snying khar byas la byang phyogasu spyi bo sa la rag cing phyag byA ste/oM sarba bid+yA pU dza karma Na at+ma naM/nir+yA ta yA me/oM sarba ta thA ga tA badz+ri karma ku
70b3(rgyud): ru mI zhes pa 'odaso//de nas dbus mo'i lho nga gnyis so la btsugs te/rdo rje thal mo snying khar byas la sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bya ste/phyogs bcu na
70b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dang /rdo rje dang /nor bu dang /pad+ma dang /las kyi rigasu bzhug pa thams cad dang /
70b5(rgyud): snying po dang /phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /rigs pa dang /lha thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol//bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang
70b6(rgyud): chung sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan snga dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dang /rdo rje dang /nor bu dang /pad+ma dang /las kyi rig su zhugs pa thams cad dang //snyi
70b7(rgyud): dang /phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /rigs pa dang /sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi yang spyan sngar sdig pa thaM so sor bshags pa ri bai gyi'o//phyogs bcun 'das
71a1(rgyud): pa dang /ma'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /nga chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /rangs saHsa dang /thugs pa snun+dad+d+ha
71a2(rgyud): yang dag par song ba dang /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /sems can gyi rigs thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la rgya cher rje su yi rang bar bgyi'o//
71a3(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khro'u mi bskor ba thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir bskul bar bgyi'o//phyogs bcu'i sangs
71a4(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das par bzhed pa da m+b+ha na mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'dreb so//don me tog phyag rgyu bcings la 'di skad ces brjod/
71a5(rgyud): oM sarba bid+yA puSh+pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+phA ra Na sA ma ye hUM zhes pa'o//bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod/oM sarba bid+yA dwI paM pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dr-i
71a6(rgyud): ra Na sa ma yi hU~M zhes pa'o//mar mi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod/oM sarba bod+yA dI pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o//dri'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces
71a7(rgyud): brjod/oM sa rba hU~Mgad+hA pU dze me g+has mo dra s+pho ra Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes pa'o//thal mo sgrim pa m+b+hi du sbyar ba bcings la 'di skad ces brjod/oM sarba bi brgyad hA~M a oM kAr pU dzam b+ha sa mu
71b1(rgyud): man mtham mamatshams samam sas mtham/amam na thamamamacam samatham 'a mamamamam lam sa ma la ma ma bas thas la mas ma mas 'amalas payang mas yam sas
71b2(rgyud): /s+pha ra Na sa ma yau hU~M zhes pa'o//oM sarba bid+yA hA s+ya lA s+ya ra tI krI Da sau khya a nut+ta ra pu dze ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra na sa ma ye hU zhus pa dang /oM sarba bid+d+ha a nut+ta ra bo d+hi a lang kA ra bas+ya pU dza g+hA sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa
71b3(rgyud): ma ye hUM zhes pa'o//de nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thang rjesu dran par byas nas/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la/snying rje'i dbang gi sems can thaMd bsgral ba'i phyir
71b4(rgyud): byang chub kyo sems bskyed par ba ste/ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba'i phyir dang /ma grol ba rnams grol bar bya ba'i phyir dang /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir dang /yongs ma
71b5(rgyud): don las ma 'das pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya ba'i phyir dang /sen gyi khams ma lus pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho bas khang dag par bsgral ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed par
71b6(rgyud): bgyi'o//oM sarba bid+yA badz+ri d+hi tsit+ta pU dza me b+ha sa mu dwe s+pha ra Na sa mi ye hUM zhes pa'o//de nas sgeg mo'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod/semaso can thams cad dang yo byad thaMd
71b7(rgyud): yang dag par ldan zhing phun suma? tshogs pa rnams 'dod pa tsam la so sor 'byor par gyur cig/oM sarba bid+yA mA hA badz+ra ud b+ha ba dA na bA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha rA Na so ma ye
71b8(rgyud): hUM//phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjodade/sems can thaMd mi dge ba'i lus dang /ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/dge ba'i lus dang /
72a1(rgyud): /sh+ma dang /yid ts+tsholas kyimatha' thams cad dang yang ga pa/ldan par gyur //oM sa ma du ma d+h+r-ig yad+ha ra shI lA paR+Sha mir+N+Na b+hu maHsa sru /
72a2(rgyud): ra NaM sa ma ye hUM/glu mo'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod/sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad kyi yang dag par rgyan po'i lus dang ldan pa dang /rtag tu phan tshun 'jigs
72a3(rgyud): pa med pa dang /zhe 'gras po medo par zhugs shing snying dang mig mngon par dga' ba dang /chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par gyu cig/oM sarba bid+yA a nut+ta ra ma hA d+harma a ba bo d+hits+tshin+ti par mi ta b+hU
72a4(rgyud): dza me g+ha sa mr-i dra s+phA ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'i//gar ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod//sems can tha~Md byang chub kyi spyod pa dang mngon par ldan zhing sangs rgyas nyid la mchog tu
72a5(rgyud): gzhom zhing 'khor ba yongasu mi spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur cig/oM sarba bid+yA saM sA ra pa ra tI ga a nut+ta ra bI d+yaM pa ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes
72a6(rgyud): pa'o//me tog ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod/sems can thaMd nyon mongs pa da nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thId dang bral zhing bas mye tan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ti 'dzin dang /
72a7(rgyud): snyoms par 'jug po dang /mngon par shes pa dang /rig pa dang /dbang thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/oM sarba bid+yA a nut+tAr sau khya bi hA ra d+h+ya na pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu/
72b1(rgyud): d+ha s+phA rA Na sa ma yo hUM zhes pa'o//bdug pa ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod/sems can thams cad 'jig rten pas 'das pa'i shes rab dang /ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par gyur
72b2(rgyud): cig/so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang dag par thob ste bzo dang bstan bcos thaMd shes shing sgyu rtsal dang /sbyor ba dang /cho ga shes pa dang /de kho na nyid mthong ba dang /nyon mongs pa
72b3(rgyud): dang /shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig/oM sarba bid+yA a nut+ta ra kle she ts+tshe da sad+h+yarma sa man+ta dz+nyA na ma hA pradz+nyA pA rA mi tA pU dzaM me g+ha sa ma dra s+phar
72b4(rgyud): Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o//mar me ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjo de/sems can thams cad log par lhung ba tha dong bral bar gyur cig/oM sarba bid+yA sarba a pA ya bi sha
72b5(rgyud): d+ha ni dz+nyA na A lau ka pra Ni d+hi pA ra mi tA pu dzi mo g+hA sa mu dra s+phA ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o//dri chab ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod/sems can thaM mr-i shes pa dang bral ba/
72b6(rgyud): b+hu cig/oM sarba bid+yA sarba a pAM ya gan+d+ha ba ne sa ni badz+ra gan+d+ha u pA yapA ra mi tA pU dze me b+he sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o//lus kyi bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid phyogs
72b7(rgyud): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin par lhag par mos par byas la/oM sarba bid+d+ha kA ya nir+ye ta na b+h+r-i dza me b+ha sa mu dra s+phar
73a1(rgyud): Na sa ma mad+hu zhes bya'o//thams cad du lnga brgya pa'i kha yis mnyam med ma g.yo zhes bya ba la sogasngo pa'i bstod pa nye bar spyod pa lhag par mos par byas la/
73a2(rgyud): sarba bid+hi bA krA nir+yA tA na b+hU dza me g+haM sa mr-i dA skA ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' thams nad dgongs pa gcig pa'i sbyor ba nyid kyis chos mnyam pa nyid du ldog par mos
73a3(rgyud): par bya ste/oM sarba bi d+hin+tit+ti ni r+yA ta na sU dzi ma~M g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa~M ma ye hUM zhes bya'o//chos thad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
73a4(rgyud): pa'i rnam pa'o zhes lhag par mos pa byas la/oM sarba bid+yA gu h+ya pU dze me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra sma ra hUM zhes bya'o//de ltar ma ts+tshe ba rnam pa nyi shus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang du//
73a5(rgyud): par mchod la bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md la bdag nyid dbul bar bgyi'o//dag dus thaMd dang rnam pa thams cadu sor gzhes gsol//
73a6(rgyud): thugs rje chen po pA ldan pa'i mgon pa khyed rnams kyis ngo mcheg chen po'i dngos grub pa dkA la stsal du gsol zhes bya'o//dge bar rtsa ba de yang sen thams cad dang thun mong
73a7(rgyud): dubya ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis bodag dang sems can thams cad 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgud pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/'jig rten pa
73b1(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig/bde ba dang yid bde ba nyid kyis mi yi mcho/sangs rgya su tshe 'di nyid la gyur cig
73b2(rgyud): bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis//'jig rten du ni myur du sangs rgyas shog/'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing //sems can sdug bsngal mang pos/
73b3(rgyud): gzir las sgrol ma zhes bya'o//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos la sdom po bzung bar gyu ste/ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams//byang chub
73b4(rgyud): tu ni nges mdzad pa//byang chub sems ni bla na med//dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi//tshul khrims bslab pa rnam pa gsum//dge ba dang ni tshe sdud dang //seM ni doni byed/
73b5(rgyud): tshul khrims ni//bdag gis so sor brtan por bzung //sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te//dkon mchog gsum gyi chog bla na med//sdom pa sangs rgyas rnal 'byor byung //
73b6(rgyud): deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi//rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsdus la//rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang //de nyid kyis ni rab tu bzung //slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/
73b7(rgyud): rin chen chen po'i rigs mchog gi/dam tshig yid 'ong ba la//nyin re bzhin du lan drug du//sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin//pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag pa//byang chub chen
74a1(rgyud): po 'byung ba la//phyi dang gsang ba thog pa gsum//dam chos sor gzung bar bgyi//las chen rigs ni bsdus pa las//sdom pa thams cad yang
74a2(rgyud): drug ldan//mchod pa'i las ni ci nus bzhin//kun nas so sor gzung bar bgyi//se ni kun gyi don dgyid phyir//byang chub sems ni bla med pa//dam pa yang dgra bskrad
74a3(rgyud): bgyis shing //sdom pa ma lus gzung ba gyis nA//maM bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi//ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol//dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung bgyi//sin/
74a4(rgyud): myangan 'das pa dgos ces bya'o//de nas na mkhri'i dkyil 'khor la lha la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par lhag pad mos te//nye bar spyod po lnga la sogs pas mchod par
74a5(rgyud): bya'o//yang dag par mchod nas ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ston sngags par byed//e ma'o sangs rgyas i sangs rgyas /sangs rgyas mdzad pa mchog legaso//ngan
74a6(rgyud): song thed leg sbyangs nas//sems can byang chub thob mdzad phyir zhes pa'o//de nas badz+ra any+dza li zhes pa dang //rdo bsdams pa snying khar dral bar bya ste//oM sarba bid+yA badz+ra
74a7(rgyud): ban d+ha drAT zhes brjod bcing //rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la//oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra dra d+ha me b+ha be shA shwa to me b+ha ba hr-i da bi e a d+hi Sh+T+r-i sarba sid+d+ham+me pra yots+tsha ts+tsha ha ha ha ha hots+tshe bye'o/
74b1(rgyud): a dz+ra mAT+TaTA/sems na rda rna tshangs nas/u sa shan+d+haR+Sha sho dz+nyA na sarba b+hA pa ya na ya da?/rdo rdzu bsdams pa brtan btsongs nas/rdo rje drug rgyu gnyis par nas//myur du rgya
74b2(rgyud): tshul gis 'phen la//skyed pa skyed par byed pa'i mam ga zhis pa'o//oM sar+b+ba 'a dus sa b+h+yA ma zi sha N+Din du ne \u0f88\u0f90 /sdug du thams rnam par sbyong ba'i blugs//rdo da
74b3(rgyud): pU bar+d+han b+h+yas nas//bu dag ni kha spyir te//mtha' mthun po kha spyad pa//myur du sdig pa drung bar 'gyur//oM s+thArbA bad+d+hASh+TA dz+dza/sems ma rdo rje bcings la//oM sa
74b4(rgyud): bid+hi sa~MrbA oM ba na bi sho d+han hU~M /'don pa'i mtshan nyid do//de nas da'i rje sA l-i rna la 'byor bskyeng ba'i 'du bu mo ge oM li la kho dang de'i skyeng du ma
74b5(rgyud): munI m+b+ha na mA hA mA nA ye swAhA/e na maHsnyun dunatu shAd+hani shad+d+hA na~M sarba \u0f88\u0f90 b-i Ti sha dz+nyAn dz+nyobi sh+tsad+d+he sar+b+ba kar+m+ma oM b+hai raNA'i shud+d+ha s+yAt+ma//de dag kyi na meng byed ma
74b6(rgyud): ba kyil ni ra ya rdzogs par 'gyu/de ni/rdo rje lcag ma la sogs pas bkug nas drug ste bcings nas/ du rgyas nas//nam pa kyim 'khor
74b7(rgyud): nugapa dkyil 'khor gnyis kyis dkyi la'i khar gcig tu 'gyur//rdzogs pa'i rdul 'byor du gyur pa las dam tshig gi dkyil 'khar gyi sku yongasu rtogs par 'gyu
75a1(rgyud): del dkyil 'khor dbasna bdag nyid kyi ngom po 'khor chos bsgyur ba'i gzugs shAHsbyin ///de nas klu nga'i thugs yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyi
75a2(rgyud): 'khor sgom zhing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus//oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na yu~M swA hA//de napa rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor sprul te/oM sar+b+ba bid+d+ha badz+rA tsakr-i hUM
75a3(rgyud): bsod/sems ma rdo rje bcings nas de nas de nyid kyi sor mo dbus ma gnyis kyis phreng ba thogs la sa ma ya hUM zhes pa 'dis yid kyi 'jug/phred pa de yang rang gi mgo bor bzhag ste//
75a4(rgyud): pra tIts+tsha badz+ra ho//zhes pa 'dis//dwe na sA ra dA gi mgo bor bcings te/oM pra ti g+h+rih+Na staM i ma satwa ma hUM ba la zhes b+ha 'diso//bdong pa bcings la yang 'diso dgrolo//au
75a5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' ring nyid de/khyed kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson//rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med//thaMd mig ni bye bar 'gyur zhes pa dang /hwe badz+ra pa sh+ya zhes pa'o//de nas dkyil 'khru
75a6(rgyud): chene por ji srid bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de sri blta'o//yang sems ma rdo rje brji dra la thugs khor dgrol zhing rdo rjer byin gyi brlabs pa'i bum bya nas dbang bskur
75a7(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyin pa'o//oM sarba bid+d+hi badz+ra a b+h+yaShish+tsa zhes pa'o//yang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas gdang ste/oM sarba bid+ha dadz+dza d+har
75b1(rgyud): b+hU/d+h+yA mU b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/oM sarbat+kar+N+Na rAk+Shabadz+re r+t+r-i d+d+ho A r+m+mash+tsam+b+ha/oM sarba rid+hi d+har+m+ma badz+rI nid+h+ya a d+hi Shi t+ya m+b+ha/oM sur+tha dId+hA kAr+m+ma dzI.A r+d+hash+tsab+h+yAM/o na? dad+ba d+huSh+Ta
75b2(rgyud): gaM gnyis kyi go rgyas gi gos la/dwe nis rang nyid rdo rje'i dbang skur ba gzung bar bya ste/sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo yis//dbang ga di khyed dbang bskur//'di de sangs
75b3(rgyud): rgyas thams cad nyid//rdo rje rab tu grub phyir bzung //oM badz+ra a d+hi pit+taM s+m+R+YuM A b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Thi badz+ra sa ma yo s+t+waM/badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ga ti/oM badz+ra satwa s+t+waM oM b+hI Shiny+tsa mAM/'di de
75b4(rgyud): snangs rgyas thams cad nyid//rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag nA ga na pA//khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bzung //phyag nA rde'i drirtul zhugs brtan//oM sarba ta thA ga ta sed+d+hi badz+ra se ma ya tiH
75b5(rgyud): e Sha pA~M d+ha ra ya mi badz+ra satwa hi hI hi hi hUM zhes pa'o//oM sarba bid+d+ha badz+rI AM d+hiSh+ThA na sa ma ye hUM/bdag nyid byin gyi brlab pa'i sngagaso//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas
75b6(rgyud): mthe bong dang gung mo dang mthe'u gyen du sgreng ste kha sbyar nas 'dzum mo dang ming med sems dbye'i skyil krung byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste/snying khri dang /'grin pa dang dpral
75b7(rgyud): ba dang /medzod sku dang /smin mtshams pa dang /sna dang /rna ba dang /dku dang /dbus mo dang /rkang pa dag dang /byin pa dang /mig gnyis dang /gre nga bar
76a1(rgyud): mamanamamamamams samasamam/mthasamaman thasamatham la ba la a ma bas a bsamam mas sayam
76a2(rgyud): gyis brlab par yang bya'o//de nas rang gi lus la sa ma ya AHyi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sa bon las byung ba'i mtshan ma thad kyi snying po'i
76a3(rgyud): nga rgyal bskyed cing /oM sarba bid+d+he dri sh+ya dzaMhUM baM hwA/sa ma ya s+t+waM sa mA yu hoHoM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA//zhes len gsum brjod par bya'o//thun mong pa yang //
76a4(rgyud): de nas rang gi lus la rdo bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/dzaHhUM baM ho//brjod cing gnas ji lta ba rnams bkug nas bcug ste/cings la dbang du bya'o//rang gi thugs khur hUM yig
76a5(rgyud): ni//sbyor bas rdo rje rtse lnga pa//shAkya saung+ga'i dam tshig/phyag rgya rab tu bshad par bya//dbus ting 'dzin mchog gis //bzhugs pa dam tshig phyag rgya bshad//rdo rje bcing
76a6(rgyud): pa dra mo byas la//gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar//rdo rje phyag rgya ma bcas pa//rdo rje gtsug tor phyag rgya'o//de nyid gung mo rin chen dang //gung mo pad+ma'i rnam pa dang /
76a7(rgyud): de nyid gung mo rdo rje la sa//sor mo lhag ma 'o bar byas nyid//skyor mo de nyid 'bar byas pa//gtsug tar gzi brjid phyag rgya'o//de nyid las ni srin lag dang //mthe'u gnyis
76a8(rgyud): ni mnyam ste spang //mdzub mo pad+ma'i 'dab ma laso//gung mo rdo rje sgreng ba dang //de nyid mdun du bzhag nas ni//rdo rje dra ba'i tshul du bya//snying khar yang ni mthe
76b1(rgyud): mnyam//rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba ma//thal mo sbyar ba kha nas dbyung //gar byed spyi bor thal mo sbyar//rdo rje bsnams pa thur du spyan//thul ma lag sbyar gyen du gtor//mtha/
76b2(rgyud): bo mnyam ste rab tu bosnams//rab tu brkyang ba zlog pa'o//rdo rje khu chur gnyis bcings nas//mdzub mo mthe bong gung mo rnams//re re zhing yang phan tshun du//mngon du phyogs
76b3(rgyud): pa bzung bar bya//mdzub mo gcig ni cung zad bkug/mthe bo gnyis ni mdud pa bcing //mthe bo mdzub mo brnal bra bcing //rdo rje khu tshung rtse mo bsdams//'grin par pad nA
76b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du//tshod kyi phyag rgya rnam par bsgoms//sngar gyi 'byin pa'i sngags kyis ni//chos kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad//thugs khar sna tshogs rdo rje ni//bsams
76b5(rgyud): te las kyi phyag rgya bya//ji skad bshad pI chos 'khro lo shAkya'i rgyal po'i phyog rgya'o//sa mnon mchog sbyin ting 'dzin dang //mi 'jig sbyin sogs rim pa bzhin//ting 'dzin mchog
76b6(rgyud): tu gnas po ni//gau tsug tor gzi brjid phyag rgya'o//g.yos pa'i log ngar dbyug pa dang //g.yon pa snying khar ral gri 'phyar//goyon pa bajigs mdzub bsgreng bya ste//gar+m+ma/
76b7(rgyud): pa bteg te brkyang par bya//lag pa gnyis ka gar sdoms nas//gdugs kyi rnam par gzhag par bya//chos kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga gang //rdzogs sangs rgyas skyob min gyi
77a1(rgyud): yang /rdo rje bsgyings pa'i sbyor ba yis//btags pa'i bsams pas mdud par bya//phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung /gar gyis yongasu bskor ba nyid//rdo rje khu
77a2(rgyud): tshur sbyor ba yis//gdug po la sogs de bzhin sbyar//mdzub bo lcags kyu bcing pa yis//mthe chung la ni lcags sgrog che//'khrig ma mdud cing 'dzub gnyis bsnol//rgyab
77a3(rgyud): dag kyang ni nges par bsdams/de nas de phyir go rim bzhin//byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che'i las kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba yis//mtshan nyid yang dag rab tu bshad//
77a4(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas//phan tshun lhan cig gshubs nas ni//mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dgug/me tog rnam par bzung bar bya//byams pa'i phyag rgya'o//
77a5(rgyud): g.yon pa khu tshur bkur bzhag la//g.yas po'i dpung pa'i thad kar ni//mdzum mo gung ma brkyang nas ni//migi tshul du bzhag par bya//mthong ba don yod kyi'o//
77a6(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas//mdzub mo dag ni rkyang nasu//g.yas pa lcags kyu legs bzhag pa//ngan song thams cad spong ba'i yin//g.yon pa khwa
77a7(rgyud): tshur dkur bzhag la//g.yas pas dbyig pa lta bur ni//gyen du sgreng la bzhag par bya//mya ngan mun pa kun 'jom gyi'o//g.yon pa khu tshur lte bar
77b1(rgyud): man kamasasas mtham/mthasamamasam sa ma mal bamaka ma yam
77b2(rgyud): bzha/lag pa g.yas pa glang ba cha'o//rtswa yo tshul du bzhag pa ni//spos kyi blang ba'i phyag rgya'o//g.yon pa khu tshur dkakur bzhug ste//g.yas pa ral gre thogs pa yis//rlu
77b3(rgyud): du 'jog pa khyed pa ni//dpa' bar 'gro ba'i phyag rgya yin//g.yon pa khu tshur sting ker bzhag/gla yas pa steng bskor mkhar mdzod kyi//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa//rgyal mtshan
77b4(rgyud): 'dzin pa lta bur ni//g.yas kyi log su 'jog byed pa//ye shes tog phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis kyi dum 'dzin ltar//bzhag pa 'od dpag med pa'i'o//g.yon pa'i khu tshur brla stengs
77b5(rgyud): bzhag/g.yas nga'i khu tshur gzhog su ni//mthe bong mthe chung btud byas la//zla ches rnam pa zla 'od kyi'o//lag pa gnyis ni steng ka ru//pad+ma rnam par rnam phye la//rtse mo
77b6(rgyud): phan tshun sbyar ba ni//bzang skyong gi ni phyag rgya yin/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la//go cha 'dzin pa lta bur ni//nu ma gnyi su legs bzhag pa//dra ba can 'o phyog rgya yin//rkan+d+ha
77b7(rgyud): ba'i khu tshur dkur bzhag lo//g.yos po snying khur bzhag nas ni//sor mo dbus ma bsgrengs byas la//rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya yin//g.yon pa khu tshur snying khor bzhags
77b8(rgyud): g.yas pa mi 'jig sbyin rnams la//blo gros mi zad pa yi'o//g.yon pa'i khu tshur lte bar bzhag g.yas pa'i se go lo tog pa ni//spobs pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yin//
78a1(rgyud): btsun pa'i zhu nu dang gA nag s+ho//g.yas pa nan rgyu /kun d+hA dzub rgya ma//mtshan ma dang mchogasas+ho//la N+Da/
78a2(rgyud): phyag rgya bshad pa yin//snying khur rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i//gzugs can yang dag bzung bya zhing //'byin pa rnamasu dzA ltar bzung //byed rgya mtshan mo bsnams pa da//rdo rje dril
78a3(rgyud): blogro badrang nas ni//thugs khar rdo rje 'dzin pa ni//phyag rgya che zhes byang chub gang //byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che'o//'byin pa rnamasu ji ltar bzung //phyag rgya mtshan cha
78a4(rgyud): bsnams pa rnams//bdag nyid chen po gang gang gis//phyag rgyo gang dang gang bcings nas//snying po don gyi bzlas pa dang //rang gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya//phyag rgya
78a5(rgyud): bzhi rnams sgrub byed pa//lha rnams thams cad rgyas btab dang /kun khyen yon tan rdzogs pa dang //san kun gyi don bya'i phyir//ngan song tha~Md legs sbyong nas//sem+b+ha
78a6(rgyud): can byang chub thob bya'i phyir//de nas sngag rab bshad bya ste/dran song kun spyod dkyil 'khor du/phyag rgya sngags kyi rab sbyor gyis//bya ba thams cad nus par 'gyur//so suM
78a7(rgyud): so sor rdo rje gar//byas nas sngags rnams brjod par bya//oMn mo b+haM ga ba te/sarba duHti ngon d+hu no rA dz+nyA ya/tathA ga tA ya/oMn te samyak+saM bud+hA ya/tad+ya thA/oM shaM
78b1(rgyud): r+m+ma smra na rdzun su na r+m+ma DU ma du rdzun rgyu smras su na
78b2(rgyud): ju sa ning na kyis brjo daM// na \u0f7fstong ba skyeng stegs pa pa'i spyong bas gzung na rgyazhes brjod de//desu myig brgya
78b3(rgyud): ldan par bya ste/de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sa blun pa'i dbang drug dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro//de rnams bltas la mchod pa tha~Md kyis rab tu mchod do//de nas de rnams kyis bstod pa rnamos kyis
78b4(rgyud): 'ang dag par mchod pa bya ste/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa//khams gsum pa yi 'gro kun gyi//ngan song zed spyod mdzad pa//shAkya sa da phyag 'tshal//chos kyi dbyis kyir
78b5(rgyud): bzhin las//sems tshon kun la phan pa'i phyir//nga ga de nyid rten mdzad pa//jig tsug tor khrid byug 'tshal//mnyam nyid de nyid bsgo sa pa yi//khams gsum la gnas parda
78b6(rgyud): la/dbang bskur rab tu gsol mdzad do//rin chen gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal//so sor kun rtog rlung bzhin can//chos kyi bdud rje'i char 'bengs pas//sems can
78b7(rgyud): dbugs 'byin mdzad pa pa//pad+ma'i gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal//sems can sdug bsngalo zhi bya'i phyir//bya ba rjes drub rong bzhin can/phrin las sna tshogs mdzad
79a1(rgyud): mtshan mam mamatshamasas mam sacas mtham/samacathasamacan samathamam mamams bama' mas tham mas bsam ma mamam thams malam sayam
79a2(rgyud): pa po//sna tshogs gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal//khams gsum 'od kyis gsal mdzad nas/sems can kun gyis 'phags pa yi//bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa
79a3(rgyud): po//gtsug tor gzi brjid khyod phyag 'tshal//yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams//sbyin pas sems can thaMd kyi//bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa//gtsug
79a4(rgyud): tor rgyal mchen khyod phyag 'tshal//nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag/gcod cing bdud bzhi'i stobs bcom nas//sems can byang chub thob mdzad pa/gtsug tor rnyan
79a5(rgyud): po khyod phyag 'tshalo//khams gsum 'gro ba tha~Md kyis//gdugs kar b+hi ni rgyun pa yi//chos kyi rgyal po thob mdzad pa//gtsug tor gdugs kar khyod phyag 'tshal/
79a6(rgyud): sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu//gar mkhan lha mo bzhi po dang //spos dang me tog mar me ma//dri yi lha mo khyod phyag 'tshal//dad sogs ngo bo las byung ba//sgo bzhi
79a7(rgyud): dbus na gang bzhugs pa//lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dri la//sgo skyong khyod rnams la phyag 'tshal//sgo bzhi yi ni logs dag na//khyams rnamasu ni bzhugs
79a8(rgyud): mdzad pa/rab dga' la sogs bcu gnyis gnas//byang chub sems dpa' khyed phyag 'tshal//tshangs dbang drag po zla ba sogs//phyogs bzhir 'jig rten
79b1(rgyud): skyong ba rnams//ma drang srin po rlung lha dang //'byung po'i bdag pa khyod phyag brdal//bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di las ni//dkyil 'khor mdun du kun bskyed na pa//sngags pa rdo rjo nga/
79b2(rgyud): 'chang bas//bstod pa 'di dge yang dag brjod//phyi nas rang gi lus la ni// dag nyid dkyil 'khor rab tu bzhugs//de ltar nges par bsgom bzhin pa'i//dkyil 'khor dang po sbyor ba
79b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to///denas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog zhes bya ba rab tu bshad par bya ste/oM A~M kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM a d+h+ya nuta pan+d+ha twA ta/de'i don no rnam
79b4(rgyud): par thar pa las phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thad stod nyid bcu drug tu lhag par mos par bya ste/ngang 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid stong pa nyid blta'o//de ni su~M yi ge hUM las rdzogs
79b5(rgyud): pA'i rdo rjes rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang /yi ge raM las me'i dkyil 'khor dang /de'i steng du yi ge baM las chu gter chen po dang /de'i steng du yi ge kai lA gser gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
79b6(rgyud): de'i steng du dbu su hUM suM hUM zhes bya ba ste/de las ri rab gru bzhi pa rin po che'i rang bzhin rin po che tha~Md kyis rgyan pa bskyed la/oM badz+ra dr-i D+ha zhes pa la sogs pa dang rdo rje bsdams
79b7(rgyud): babyin gyis brla'o//de'i steng du rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas yi ge b+h+rUM dkar po las byung ba'i rdo dang nor bu dang rin po che'i rtse mo can gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa rta
80a1(rgyud): babs bzhi yis rnam par d+ha na//gru bzhi rnams ni thams cad du/sgra dang rmo khyung mtshams rnamasu//zla ba mtshan ma rdo rje spras//dra ba du byed kyis
80a2(rgyud): rgyan cing //thig le dang ni yang dag ldan//dar dang mi tog phreng bas brgyan//nang gi dkyil 'khar na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rdo rje phreng bas yong su bskor ba'o//de'i lte ba'i
80a3(rgyud): steng du seng+ge'i gad no//de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor//'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i nang rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te lha rnams kyi gnaso//phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams
80a4(rgyud): kyi gnas ni snam bu rnams la/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa brgyad blta'o//sang+ge'i gdan gyi steng gi zla ba'i dkyil lo bar yi ge a la sogs pa dang /yi ge ka la sog
80a5(rgyud): ba shes rab dang thabs kyi yi ge zha bar gyur ba mkha' khyab kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis sen gyi don gyi rdzogs pa'i sngags kyi
80a6(rgyud): gzungasu gyur te/oM mu ne mu ni ma hA mA na ye swA hA//sngags 'dis dpal shAkya'i rgyal po rjegs par 'gyur te/sgrib pa thams cad sel ba'i ting 'dzin lnga snyoms
80a7(rgyud): par zhugs pa'o//de nas ting 'dzin snyoms par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i phyag rgya dang sngags bshad par bya ste//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcing /
80b1(rgyud): maman ka mamamamatshams samam sacas mtham/mamamamaca thasam can tha.aH tham thas pa mamasatham ya la yamag sa rtsam bas a khams can thams 'amalas bam mams yamasas yan
80b2(rgyud): nas//rim gyis rnam par dbye bar bya//chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni/khor ba thams cad gcod byed yin//de yi dpe ni 'di lta ste//ji ltar pad+ma la tshogs pa'i//bung
80b3(rgyud): ba la sogs bsdams pa rnams//pr-ing+ga'i 'dab ma kha phye na//bcings pa'i sdug bsngal las thar byed//de bzhi ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi//srid gsum 'khor bar
80b4(rgyud): bcings pa 'di//thugs rje'i bdag nyid shAkya yi//sang+ges bcings pa las grol mdzad//de nas dpal shAkya thub pa'i thugs khar yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor//
80b5(rgyud): nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sngags thams cad kyi bskyed par bya ste/rdo rje gtsug tai ra nas brtsams te ji srid rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa 'byung ba yin//de nas sngag/
80b6(rgyud): rnams 'byung ste/oM na mo b+hA ge ba te sarba durga ti pi ro sho d+ha na r-I dz+nyA ya tA thA gi ta yaM//arbA te sa myakl-i bud d+hA ya/tad+ya thA/au sho d+ha ne shaM d+ha ne/sar+b+ba pA paM ba sho dA naM shud+d+hi
80b7(rgyud): bi shud+d+he sar+b+ba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+ha swA hA//sngags 'di nges par brjod do//de nas de'i phyir go rims bzhin yang dag/r-i me sa bzhin yang dag rab ba shang bya/aM badz+ra hUM
80b8(rgyud): phaT/khaM yi sgo nas byung nas ni//kun nas 'od zer lnga par 'thon//kun nas phyogs bcur snang byas nas//sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi//sdug bcol
81a1(rgyud): rnams ni thar mdzad do//'od zer rnams ni slar logs nas//thugs khar zhugs to ngo rjes la/sngags dang 'od zer gnyis 'dres pa las byung
81a2(rgyud): sku ni yongs rdzogs pa//nang gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rtsibs//shar phyogs pad+ma zla bar bzhugs//rdo rje gtsug gtor de bzhin gshegs//sems can kun la phan don du//thug
81a3(rgyud): khemes byung bzhugs pa ni//sku mdog dkar zhing 'od zer 'bar//sa mnon phyag rgya ying dag bzhugs//de ltar 'od zer spro bsdu ni//sngar bshad pa yi thams cad kyang //spro dang bsdu ba'o//
81a4(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//sngags dang 'od zer legs 'das dang //sku ni skyed cing yang dag rdzogs//ji banin gan su gzhugs par bya//oM ra te nota ta ma traM zhes bya bas dbyung bar bya'o//
81a5(rgyud): brtsibasu yang dag bzhugs//pad+ma zla ba'i dbus ni//rin che ni gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs//thugs kha nas ni nges ton nas//sangs rgyas mtshan gyis yang dag rgyan//sku mdog
81a6(rgyud): sngo zhing shin tu mdzes//'di'i phyog rgya mchog sbyin nyid//khams gsum pa ni mA lus pI//sems can kun la dbang bskur mdzod//sngar bzhin spro dang bsdu bo dang //gzugs
81a7(rgyud): bskyed pa yi rim pa yin//oM pad+mod ta ma hrI/zhes dbyung bar bya'o//de nas nub kyi rtsibs gnas pa'i//pad stengs zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la//sa bon 'ad zer gyis rdzogs
81b1(rgyud): 'i//pad+ma gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs//thugs kha las ni byung gyur nas//rjesu ston mdzad bzhugs pa ni//pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'bar la//bsam gtan phyag rgyas rnam par bzhugs
81b2(rgyud): oM bi sho d+ha ma aM zhes dbyung ngo //byang phyogs rtsibs gnas pad+ma yi//steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la//thugs kho nas gton sangs rgyas ni//sna tshogs gtsug tor dri bzhin
81b3(rgyud): gshegs//sku mdog ljang ku 'od 'bar ba//'di yi phyag rgyas mi 'jig sbyin//phyag rgyas phrin las sna tsho/mdzad//seMn 'khor ba las sgrol ba'o//yi ge oM gyis sangs rgyas dbyung //gtsug tor gze
81b4(rgyud): brji de bzhin gshegs//me yi mtshams gnas pad+ma gnas//yang dag zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la//g.yas pa nyi ma yang dag bsnams//phyag g.yon pa ni sku la gnas//sku mdog dkar dam
81b5(rgyud): 'od kyis ni//khams gsum pa ni snang bar mdzad//hUM gi sa bon las byung ba//gtsug tor rgyal mtshan de bzhin gshegs//thugs khaM las byung phyung nas ni//bden bral rtsibs la bzhu
81b6(rgyud): nus ni//pad gnas zla ba'i gzugs la yang //sku mdog dmar zhing gnag pa la//yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan rnams//san ser sna skyong mdzad pa//d+hIHyi ge sa bon las
81b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i//gtsug tor rnon po de bzhin gshegs//nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams//gcod mdzad rlung gi rtsibasu byung //pad+ma zla ba li bzhugs shing //'di yi phyag mtshan g.yas
82a1(rgyud): mtshan kan mamamamams mam cas mtham/samamamam thasamamacan sam thamamama' thamams sa mas yas la tham mama' bayang sa la mas ma thas sa thabs thasa' ya' yams sa tshan
82a2(rgyud): /ral gri//g.yan na glegs pam rnams pa ni//sku mdog mkha' ltar spo ba'o//pad+ma la gnas zla bar bzhugs//kr-i yig sa bon las byung ba'i//gtsug tor gdugs /
82a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs//sems can rnams kyi chos kyi rje//dbang ldan rtsibasu dbyung bar bya//kun de lta bu'i mdog lta bu//'di yi phyag mtshan gdugs rnams pa//de kun sna tshogs pad+mar gnas/
82a4(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i//oM trAM hrIHaHsngags de rnamasu brjod nas//thugs kha nas ni dbyung ba dang //mtshams kyi gnas ni bzhi po ru//pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la//sgeg
82a5(rgyud): mo la sogs lha mo bzhi//rigs kyi sku mdog 'dzin pa ste//dkar ser dmar po sna tshogs mdog/de nas phyag rgya bcing ba ni//sngar bshad ji skad bzhin du/bsngags pa nyid ni brjed nas/
82a6(rgyud): thugs kha nas kyang dbyangs bya ste//gdug pa la sogs lha mo bzhi//pad+ma la gnas zla ba yi//dkyil 'khor du ni mtshams bzhi'o//thams cad yang sku mdog ni//rigs kyi rim
82a7(rgyud): pa nyid kyis//oM sar+b+ba sau skAr pa ri shud d+he d+har+m+ma N+De/ga ga na sa mud gi taM swa b+ha ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swAhA//sngags kyi dbyung ste shar gyi sgo'i//gzhogs gnyis dag tu ga
82a8(rgyud): pa ni/dbyams pa la sogs gnas bzhi pa//pad gnas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la//thod sems dpa'i skyil krung /can//phyag rgya sku mdog rim pa yang //byams pa thug ni rnam dag
82b1(rgyud): pa//su mdo/sang po 'du zar brdung //grams pa klu shing ma tog can/rdzu lon pas spyi blugs bsnams pa'o//gnyis pa mthong ba don yod ni//sgra mngom skar po 'od byer 'bar//phyag gas
82b2(rgyud): pad+ma spyan can te//g.yon pa'i phyag ni bkur bzhag pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' gsum pa yang //mtshani ngan song spong 'joms pa//sku mdag dkar po 'od 'bar zhing //phyag rgya lcags
82b3(rgyud): bsnams pa can//bzhi pa mya ngan mun pa kun//nges 'joms blo gros de bzhin te//dkar ser 'dres pa'i mdog tu snang //de yi phyag rgya dbyug pa rnams//g.yon pa khu tshur bkur bzhag cing //
82b4(rgyud): sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs//byang chub sems dpa' bzhi rnams kyang //lho sgor rab tu bzhugs pa'o//dang po spos kyi glong po yang //dkar po sngo ba'i sku mdog can//'di yi phyag rgya
82b5(rgyud): phyag g.yas no//dri yaM dung ni rab tu bkang //g.yon pa khu tshur bkur bzhag la//sgrib pa thang rnam par skyong //gnyis pa dpa' bar 'gro ba mtshan//nyon mongs thams cad rab grol badzod//
82b6(rgyud): shel gyi mdog can 'od bzang ba//'di yi phyag rgya ral gri bsnams//g.yon pa'i phyag ni bkur bzhag nas//sems can sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa'o//gsum pa na mkha' mdzod
82b7(rgyud): nyid//rgyan ni thams cad kyis brgyan pa//dkar ser bsres de'i sku mdog 'od//sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spangs//'di yi phyag rgya phyag g.yas na//pad+ma la gnas chos kyi ma
83a1(rgyud): g.yon pa'i phyag ni dkur bzhag la// mkha' nor kun 'chang ba po//bzhi pa yang ni ye shes tog/bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzod//sngon po mdog can yang dag
83a2(rgyud): gsal//yid sbyin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams//g.yon pa'i khu tshur bkur 'jog cing //dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dgrol bar mdzad//nub sgo'i drung du pad+ma la//gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil
83a3(rgyud): 'khor du//dang po bdud rtsi 'od ces bya//zla ba'i mdog rnam par mdzes//bdud rtsi'i bum pa legs par rnams//btsod pan rin chen phyag giso//grwa yon pa khu tshur dkur 'jog cing //rgya
83a4(rgyud): chen che ni rtsol ba po//gnyis pa'i mtshani zla ba'i 'od //mi shes pa yi mun pa gsal//sku mdog dkar po mdzes pa ni//phyag rgya g.yas pa'i phyag nyid kyis//pad+ma gnas pa'i zla
83a5(rgyud): gzugs//g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag pa'o//gsum pa bzang skyong zhes bya ba//dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdog can nyid//chos rnams thaMd rab bsal mdzad//phyag rgya phyag
83a6(rgyud): ni g.yas pa yis//rin chen 'bar ba yang dag bsnams//g.yon pa khu tshur dkur gnas pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa yang //dra ba can gyi 'od mtshan can//
83a7(rgyud): sku mchog dmar po 'od 'bar ba//rdo rje gur ni bsnams pa can//byang sgo'i rtse bar pad+ma la//gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du//sangs rgyas sras po dang po nyid//mtshan
83b1(rgyud): maman kamam mtshams sams mtham/macathas macan sam thamasamal sa ma ma tam/bams mayam sa
83b2(rgyud): nadu snang po zhes//dkar zhing rdzo ba'i mdog dang ldan//phyag rgya phyag ni g.ya bA so+o//ma du pa la ni rdo rje'i ldan//g.yon pa khu tshur dkur gnas pa'o//gnyis pa zlo gros zhes pa yi//mi zang ba
83b3(rgyud): thar yang dag ldan//kun tu zla ba'i mdog ltar byas la//phyag rgya phyag ni gnyis pa yis//yi ges bum pa yang dag bsnams//sems can thams cad rab tshim mdzad//sangs rgyas
83b4(rgyud): sras po gsum pa yang //spob pa brtsegs pa'i tha snyad can//sku mdog dmar zhing 'od 'bar ba//phyag rgya phyag g.yas pad+ma la//gnas pa'i rin chen phung po nyid//g.yon pa khu tshur
83b5(rgyud): dkur gnas pa'o//rgyal ba'i sras po bzhi po ni//kun tu bzang po ces bya ste//sku mdog ser zhing 'od 'bor ba//g.yas pa'i phyag gi phyag rgya ni//rin chen+da ste ma bsnams pa la//
83b6(rgyud): g.yon pa khu tshur bstan pa'o//de lta'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan//byang chub sems dpa' brtse dag nyid//dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//
83b7(rgyud): oM mu ne mu ni ma d+hA mu na ye swAhA//na maHsar+b+ba dur+m+ma tI pa ri sho d+hA na rI dzA ya//t+ta thA gA tA ya/an+na t+te sam+b+hak+saM bud+d+hA yA//tad+ya b+hU/A~M sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne//sarbA pA pa'i d+b+ha ku ba~M d+d+hes d+ta rmA
83b8(rgyud): shud+d+he swAhA//sngags 'dis shAkya'i rgyal po la sogs pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun yongasu rdzogs par sgo mo//da nis de'i rjes la yis kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang bar bya'o//sdigaso dang phyag rgya
84a1(rgyud): mnyam ldan pas//sgo ni dbye bar byas na su//rdo khu tshur gnyis bcing su la//mdzub mo gnyis ni rab tu brkyang //mthe'u chung lugu rgyud byas la//sgro dbye ba yi byag/
84a2(rgyud): rgya yid//oM sar+b+ba bid+yA d+ha ra/ud b+ha Ta ya hUM/sgo dbye ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas sgo dbye'o//rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor yongasu gteg s+ho//oM sar+b+ba bid+yA badz+ro tsakra hU~M/
84a3(rgyud): legs ngar dag ni rdo rjer bcings//rdo rje se gol rnams grol bas//shIkya'i rgyal po sbyor bdag dpal//sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya//g.yas pa se gol brdabs
84a4(rgyud): pa yis//mnyam bir brdangs par grub par 'gyur//g.yas pa yis kyang brdob par gsungs//gnyis ka yang ni sdus pa yin//oM badz+ra sa mA dzAHdzaHhUM baM ho//
84a5(rgyud): bka' bsgo ba 'di bsgrags tsam gyis//'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs//srangs rgyas thams cad byon 'gyur te//gzhan rnams rab 'jug lte ci smos//
84a6(rgyud): de nas mdun gyi na mkhar dkyil 'khor la bltas la//rdo gnod sbyin gyi sgra ts+tshin chod yon gyi snod no gnas pa'i dri'i chu yis yang dag par bsangs te/zhabs bsil dbul//
84a7(rgyud): de nas mchod yon gyi phyag rgyas mchod yon dbul lo//de nas zhabs bsil gyi phyag rgyas zhabs bsil dbul lo//de nas oM badz+re pud+d+ho hUM oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/oM
84b1(rgyud): dz+nyATA hUM/badz+ra gan+d+ha hUM/rdo rje gnod byin gyi phyag rgyas bgrags bskrad la//dkyil 'khor du gzug/de nas yang phyag rgya drang por sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs dam
84b2(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya rnams bcing ngo //de nas sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyis chos kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga'o//de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i stogs kyis las kyi phyag rgya brji //de nas phyag rgya
84b3(rgyud): chen po'i sngags kyis phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya'o//de nas rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sems ma rdo rje mau dang /rin chen rdo rje ma dong /chos
84b4(rgyud): kyi rdo rje ma rnams smos te/dkyil gting dang sa pad+d+hi m+b+ha dpe la shAk+Sha'i rgyal po nas brtsam sna pa'i rdo rje 'babs pa'i mthor drug pa la dbang 'gyur ba sbyin pa de d+ha ste/nga
84b5(rgyud): bskur ba lnga dang /bdag po ste sa bcu'i mtha thug pa sbyin no//dbang bskur ma thag tu//oM sar+b+ba tA thA g+hA ta d+hU pa pU de me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma yai hUM/oMs ta rtag
84b6(rgyud): tA puSh+pa pu dze mai b+ha sa mu dra s+pha raM amA yai hUM/oM sar+b+ba ta thAM ga tA d+hi p+ta b+hu dzA mI g+ha sA nU das+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta gan+d+haM pu dza~M ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma au
84b7(rgyud): des sngon mo la sozhes pa bzhi yis mchod do//rdo rje gsor zhing rdo rje'i tshig yi ge brgya pa sngon du 'gro bas bsngar bzhin bstod par bya'o//de nas mnyam med mig
85a1(rgyud): mkhan kas mamacamacams samam sacas mtham/samasam thamamam can thas tham thas 'a mamam cam thas mam sa la sa byas bayang thas ba mam tham/mams 'amalas thams mams yam sas
85a2(rgyud): //ma med snying po'i chos can ni//thugs rje'i dag na ni bri ba'i sdug bsngal sel/skyon dngos grub tha~Md mtha' yas sbyin mdzad pa//de med migs mnyam med mchog
85a3(rgyud): rab chos can rnams//ston mchog ni phra mo'i cha la'ang mtshams mdo//na mkha' deng mnyam dper gyur pa nyid yod ma yin//sems can khams la grub mchog brtsol
85a4(rgyud): ba rnams la gsol//dngos grub mtha' yas rnams la dpe dang rnam par bral//dri med thugs rje brgya pa nyid kyi shugs las byung ba'i/smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i
85a5(rgyud): chos nyid can//'gro ba'i don sgrub lhur mdzad mtha' yas mnga' ba can//thug rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang //'gagi med nyid kyi thugs rje'i spyod pa mi
85a6(rgyud): g.yo ba//'jig rten gsum le mchog dngos grub brtsol ba 'jug/dpag med dpag bral rnams la shin tu rdzogs nyid rdzogs//bde ba'i gnasu gshegs/
85a7(rgyud): kyang e mdo chos nyid bzung //rtag tu mchog sbyin nyid bde 'gro nyid du gshegs//mtha' dang 'jig rten gsum le dngos gru'i mchog ni stsol ba po//bde ga she
85a8(rgyud): dus gsum bgrod nyid bsgrib pa mi mnga' nyid//dam tshig gsum mchog dngos grub mchog sbyin bdag la stsol ces pa dang /thams cad la lce brgya pa'i kha yi
85b1(rgyud): /brjod pa nye bar spyod par mos te//rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas bstod par bya'o//de nas phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md dang 'di thun dang sbyin las 'das
85b2(rgyud): pa'i phyi rol gyi lha rnams la mchod pa thams cad dang gtor ma'i tshig ny+tso bar mAkho ba dong bcas pa'i gtor mu dbu'o//dpung pa bzang po'i tshigs bcad brjod//drang por sa
85b3(rgyud): gol lo sogs sgras//khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yis//sdig pa'i phung po dgug bya zhing //yige gsum sogs yang dag ldan//'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa'i
85b4(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad mnyam po spong //dgug dang godon dang bcing ba rnam par gzhoms//sdigs bzhi po rnams legs par sbyar ba ni//bdage sogs sngags te nyung kar dkar po brjod
85b5(rgyud): shi ba'i rus pa gos la rab bkru ba//oM sho d+ha naM zhes sogs sngags kyis ni//srid gsum dri ma chu yis bkru ba bya//oM ke ka ni zhes sogs sngags kyis ni//ba ya~M rnams pa lnga yis
85b6(rgyud): raklu ba bya//oM rat+ne rat+ne zhes sogs sngags kyis ni//dri bzang rnams ni kun b+his bkru bar bya//oM a mo g+ha A ba ra Na sogs//sngags kyis ba yi 'o mas bkru bar bya//
85b7(rgyud): a mai to a ma te zhes sogs sngags kyis tshar mchog gis kyang bkru bar bya//oM pu N+yai so gso pa'i sngags kyis ni//bar dang bar du chu yis bkru bar bya/yang bkra shis kyi glu
86a1(rgyud): blang zhing dbang bskur ro//lam sbyang ba bya'o//gdugs pa la sogs lha mo ba ni'i sngagaso//de nas 'di'i thab khung ni khwa grang tsam la sbyin bsreg bya//ngan
86a2(rgyud): 'bre kun tu gnas pa yi//sems can de rjes drin byas nas//dge ba'i rgyud phyir sdigs pa dang //sgrub pa zhi phyir bsreg bya ste/mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang //'bros yos nyungs kar/
86a3(rgyud): bsres pa dang //ti ba dang 'bru dang 'bras la sogs//bus shing rnamasu lag gnyis kyis//las rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang //snga ma ji ltar de ltar gyis//de yis myur du seMn rnams//bde
86a4(rgyud): bar phun sum tshogs pa 'thag/las kyi rgyal po mchog ces pa'i ting 'dzin to//de dag kyang so ni de la byas pa de nas dang myal ba'i sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyur te//dge'/
86a5(rgyud): ldan gyi bAn su sems can tha~Md la phan par mdzad pa bde bar gshegs pa dang ldan par skyes so//de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams snyan grags dang bcas pas gar byed cing
86a6(rgyud): sngags kyis mchod pa'i sprin mtha' yas skye ba 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i phyir lha'i tshogs rnams mdun du bya ste/byang chugyis mas bskyed nas lha rdzas kyi
86a7(rgyud): me tog dang /gdug pa dang /mar me dang dri da/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang //rgyan du ma rnams kyis kyang mdzes shing na bza'i rin
86b1(rgyud): maman kamam mtshams samam cas mtham/amamasaca thasamamacan amathaH tham 'a mamamatham ya yasal tham rtsam bas a khams ma mams 'amalas tham mamatha yamasas yan
86b2(rgyud): po che'i char la sogs pas kyang dga' ba'i tshal yongasu gang par byas so//de nas ngo tshwa che bar gyur to///de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na /
86b3(rgyud): rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis brtag pa'i rgyal po brtag pa phye mar gsungs te/dpa' bo gdan las bzhengs nas ni/dgyes pas rdo rje gsor zhing shAkya'i bdag po dgyes pa
86b4(rgyud): thub po'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal nas sgrib pa tha~Md rnam par sbyong ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug nas ngan sang thams cad yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid rang gi
86b5(rgyud): thugs kha nas phyung ngo //oM sar+b+ba pA paM da hA na badz+ra hUM phaT//oM sar+b+ba a pA ya bi sho d+ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/oM sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra NA ni b+hasmi ku ru hUM phaT/oM b+h+rUM ba nAM sha ya A ba ra Na ni hUM pha
86b6(rgyud): oM d+hI bi sho d+ha ya a ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/oM dz+wa la dz+wa laM d+ha ka d+ha ka ha na ha na A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/oM suM se ra sa ra pre sa ri pre sa rA a ba re NA hUM phaT/oM hUM haM ra ha ra sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/oM/
86b7(rgyud): hUM phaT sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT//oM d+hi ta b+h+r-i ta sar+b+ba A ba ra NI na hUM phaT/oM t+ta Te tA Ta sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/oM ts+tshi na da sar+b+ba I ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/oM da ha da ha sar+b+ba nA re ka gau ti he
86b8(rgyud): hI hUM piH/oM pa tsa pe sar+b+ba pre ta ga tI two hU~M phaT/oM ma tha ma thi sar+b+ba ti ra ya ga gi ti hai hUM hUM phaT/de nas de dag gis nye bar mkho ba rnams skyed de/oM sar+b+ba pA pa bi sho d+ha ne d+ha ma
87a1(rgyud): ti hUM phaT/oM sar+b+ba na raka ga ti A kaR+Sha ni hUM dzo phaT/oM saMr+b+ba na ra ka ud+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/oM sar+b+ba a dA yA ban+da d+ha naM bi mo tsa ni hU~M baM phaT/oM sar+b+ba a ba ya ga ti ga hA ni pi nI shi ni hUM
87a2(rgyud): hoHphaT/de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/nang gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ni//rtsibs brgyad pa yis shin tu mdzes//lte ba mu khyud yang dag ldan/nang gi rim pa bris nas ni//
87a3(rgyud): bar shAkya'i dbang po yi//bdag po thub pa bri bar bya//phyag na rdo rje stobs che ni/nga lo de yi spyan sngar dri//rgyab tu 'khor lo sgyur ba yang /legs par mngon par bri bar bya//g.yasu
87a4(rgyud): rgyal ba'i gtsug tor bri//g.yon du rnam par rgyal ba bri//gzi brjid phung po yang ni mar//dbang ldan du ni gduT da/ po//rnar ma tho ba rlung nyid//nair 'jom pa bden bral bri//de nas phyi rol yang
87a5(rgyud): dag gi//gA bzhi pa yi sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhi pa shin tu merjes//dpa' bo lcags kyu zhags pa dang //lcags sgrog dril bu bsnyen rnams bzhag/ga yi phyogs ni thaMng du//
87a6(rgyud): 'dug pa la sogs bri bar bya//de nas me tog phreng ba dang //dri sogs rang gi lus la byug/slob dpon 'jug par bya ste//dziHhUM baM ho//b+ha ga d+hA//e h+ye hi ma hA/
87b1(rgyud): kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hoHzhes bya bas lha zad spyan dang //de bzhin du bdug ste dbang skur na ngan song thang+ge las rnam par grol tu bad 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang sa grongam rnams skye bar 'gyur
87b2(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyu ro//snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thang lo thogs
87b3(rgyud): pa med par 'gyuraro//bya ba byas pas rims thams cad dang gdon la stsogs pa rnams las thar par 'gyuraro//phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas wa tha~Md byed//brtag pa gzhan
87b4(rgyud): gyis tshogs kyang las thaMd 'grub par 'gyuraro//lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po la stsogs pa ngan song gi dbang du gyur po rnams 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs
87b5(rgyud): brnyan la sogs pa mngon par bris pa las bzlas pa dang sbyin bsreg dang ngo bang bskur ba rnams kyis ngan song tha~Md las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das rngo
87b6(rgyud): rje 'dzin pas song ge'i lta stangs kyis zhal du bltas te phyag 'chil nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das phrag rgya mchog gi mtshan nyid dam pa bshad par bya
87b7(rgyud): ste/thugs rje'i gdung ba'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyal ba thams cad kyi byin gyi sa brlabs par bya'o//tingange 'dzin du gnas par dpral ba thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshas
88a1(rgyud): mtshan kan mamabacam camasasamamamacas mtham/amamanamathasamamathan bsam tha thamam thamamathamatham brtsa ma maka ma rtsamabam ma kha mtha ma thamams mkham mas yamasam
88a2(rgyud): lo//sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag 'tshul ba'i phyag rgya'o//rnal 'byor reg pas 'dren pa'i phyogasu thal mo sbyar ba pad+ma'i rnam par bya'o//zla
88a3(rgyud): khar rdo rje thal mo byas sor mo dbus ma rtse mo sbyar po 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yon pa gan rkyal du dbang byar bzhug lha do'i steng du
88a4(rgyud): g.yas pa bzlog ste/bzhag la mthe bong gnyis sbyar te zhi ba'i lta bas blta'o//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshigi ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o//
88a5(rgyud): de nyid yongasu bskor te phan tshun sbyar te mthe'u chung dgo dang mthe bong dag lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par bcings la snying khar bzhago/'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshi go gi phyog/
88a6(rgyud): rgya'o//thal mo gang bar sbyar nas mthe'u chung dang mthe bong sbyar te bzung zhing lhag mo rnams rab tu brkyang ba'o//'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi pad+ma phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bsdams par
88a7(rgyud): brnyan par byas nas//phung mo gnyis rdo rje rtse mi ra bya sa la//mthe'u chung dang mthe bo rab tu brkyang ba'o//'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid kyis mthe'u chung dang mthe bong/
88a8(rgyud): gnyis de bzhin du byas la/mdzub mo dang ming mod pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i rnam par bya'o//'di ni ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid kyi
88b1(rgyud): mdzub mo dang ming med dag rin po che'i rnam par bya'o//'dri ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o//mtho'u chung drang mthe bong sa so sor sbyar nas lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang ba ni mtshon
88b2(rgyud): chathams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yon po de kho na bzhin tu rab tu 'jug pa ni las thams cad pa'i phyag rgya'o//snyim po gyen du mthor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o//
88b3(rgyud): de nyid 'og nas 'thor ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o//de nyi de mthe bong gnyis gyen du ma nyams la 'dzin pa ni mor me'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i
88b4(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//de nyid rab tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor mi'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid gung mo rnams nang du bcug pa ni arga'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo gnyis me
88b5(rgyud): tau tshig tshigs par ma btsug nos sor mo thams cad brkyang ba 'di na rnam par mthor ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam par 'dzom pa
88b6(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid kyi snyim pa 'od zer gyi rnam pa ni glo zi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid spyi bo'i gnasu bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje khu tshur
88b7(rgyud): gnyis kyi mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings la bskor ba 'od ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub
89a1(rgyud): mo gnyis rin po che ltar bya ste/lhag ma 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsun tor gyis phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la sor mo
89a2(rgyud): lhag ma rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o//g.yas pas mchod sbyin dang g.yon pa mi 'jig pa sbyin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin//
89a3(rgyud): rdo bsdams pa las 'dzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'tsho bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis pa bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las rA 'dra bar
89a4(rgyud): byas pa ni mda'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid phyag d+hA dang mthe bong rtse sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i'o//de nyid kyi tshigs par ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i 'o//de nyid sor mo rnams
89a5(rgyud): 'od zer 'dra ba gozi brjid kyi'o//de nyid spyi bor bzhag pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o//de nyid mdun du bzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i'o//de nyid pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa ni pad+ma'o//de nyid
89a6(rgyud): gung mo dang mdzub mo bkug pa ni ral gri'o//de nyid gang du 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i 'o//de nyid pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i 'o//ngo nyid skyed pi ni sna tshogs
89a7(rgyud): kyi'o//dri nyid shin tu bskyed pa ni srung ba'i'o//de rtsi mi gnyis slar bkug pa ni gno sbyin gyi'o//de nyid dam du dkug pa ni bsdams pa'i'o//de nyid mdzub mo gta
89b1(rgyud): mtshan kacamaN macam caHsa samam cas ma thatha/amam maHthasamam than thasanatha tham pa thamamacam tham ma sa yas la tham tsama' 'am tham pa mtham tham/thamasamamam thams tsam yam gam tshan
89b2(rgyud): zhug pa ni lcags kyur//de nyid rtsomo gnyis spyad pa ni zhags pa'i'o//de nyid phan tshun ma du pa ni lhag d+hAga'o//de nyid spyod da ni dril du'o//de rang tshungs pa dang
89b3(rgyud): brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsos te//bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje so rgyu rkyen dang tshangs pa la sogs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor/
89b4(rgyud): chen po de dag la/gzigs nas legaso zhes bya bas mgu bar bya ste/brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams gang khyed la 'odadi lta bu'i slob pa yang dag par skyes pa de ni legs
89b5(rgyud): so//legaso//legs par bsgrubs shig dang bshad par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag ni rdo rje thams cad che dpag tu med par khyab par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
89b6(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas tshe dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phel pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skying po 'dri rang gi thugs kA
89b7(rgyud): nas d+yungo //oM pu N+yaM pur+N+ya ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yuHpu N+ye dz+nyA na sa b+hA ra pa tsi te ya kA ra Ni swA hA//di dA zhin ga shes pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'dri ba shad pa tsam gyi
89b8(rgyud): dmang thams cad rab tu zhi ste/sems can dmyal ba dang /yi gas dang byal song gi 'gro ba rnam du skyes pa'i sems can tha~Mng grol bar bdag nyid kyis rab tu sheso//'jig rten
90a1(rgyud): kyi khams thams cad snang bar byas shing snang bar byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi badzad pa bcu gnyis byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi snying po'i
90a2(rgyud): chos kyi yi ge de nyi zhugs par gyur to//de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dbyug tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin/
90a3(rgyud): grashegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad do//oM au mi ta a mi te/i ma twod b+hA be/oM mai ti si b+ha be/a
90a4(rgyud): mi ta bi krAn+te/a mi ta bi kran+ta gA mau ni sar+b+ba kar+m+ma kli sha k+Shau yaM ka raM swA hA//de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin du sems can thaMd kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab
90a5(rgyud): tu zhi ba'o//de nas slar yang bi tsi mi ldan 'das kyis gdon mi ze bar sgrib pa thad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa
90a6(rgyud): dzad kyi sgrib pa bcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung //oM kaM kaM ni kaM ka na/ro tsa na ro tsa ni/tro Ta ni tro Te ni/trA sa ni trA swa ni/pra ti ha
90a7(rgyud): na pa ti he na/sar+b+ba kar+m+ma pa ra~M pa rA Ni sar+b+ba satwa nAny+tsa swA hA//'di bshad pa tsam gyis thaMd de kho na bzhin du 'gyuraro//de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sgrib pa thams cad
90b1(rgyud): dri ma med pa'i rnam par dag par rdo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po
90b2(rgyud): gzungs 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung //oM rat+ne rat+ne ma hA rat+ne rat+na sa~M b+hA be rat+na ki ra Ne/rat+na mA lA bi shud d+he sha~M d+ha ya/sar+b+ba pA pe hUM tweT//de nas 'di bdad ma thag tu bdud
90b3(rgyud): kyi gnas thams cad bcom zhing rnam par bcom par gyur te/de nas slar yang bcom ljin 'das kyis gdon mi za bar mi tshems par sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'arnams
90b4(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung //oM a mo g+ha a pa ti ha ta
90b5(rgyud): sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khama? 'di thams cad g.yos rab tu g.yos yang dag par rab tu g.yos bskyod rab tu bskyod
90b6(rgyud): yang dge bar rab tu bskyod/bskul rab tu bsgral yang dag par rab tu bskul zhingo mtshar che zhing rma du byung ba du ma 'jig rten du snang bar 'gyuraro//de nas de dag gri ngo
90b7(rgyud): 'khor ni 'di yin te/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//logs bzhi dang yang yang dag ldan//rta babs bzhi dang kun tu ldan//khaM khyer dang ni sgo khyad bcas//de yi dngasu
91a1(rgyud): ra ma so//la 'khor dam pa tho ba //ngas da na yang dgu rdzun//rgyud la lanan//dats+tshed su dananA
91a2(rgyud): b+hugan+d+ha rdorje stobs che zhing //phyag na rdodza rje dri la bu can//zla ba rgyas zhel 'dzum pa dri//shad kyi sgribs kyi dngos kyi rdzur//gtso ba mi bskyod pa nyid bri// ni rin che
91a3(rgyud): zhi //nub tu chu skyes pad+mo ste//byung dri gdan mi zo zhes grags//dpa' bo stabs chen bri bar bya//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni//'khor lo bsgyu
91a4(rgyud): ba'i cha lugs med//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdog 'dra zhing //rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan pa rnams//phyag na mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa//rdo rje skyil klu
91a5(rgyud): bzhugs pa bri//grA yi cha rnams thams cad//de bzhin bdug pa la sogs bri//sgo skyong rnams kyang khro bo dang //mchog tu khro byar gzhol ba bri//de nis
91a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor rang nyid zhugs//sngags kyi lha rnams spyan drangs te//dzaHhUM baM ho//b+ha ga bo/badz+ra e h+ye hi ni sa ma yAM s+t+waM/de nas mgon po byon pa la//mdor na
91a7(rgyud): mtshang po byas nas ni//'chi bdag nyid dang sbrul 'ardzogs par//'chi bdag gzhom phyir gzhug par bya//oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/rdo rje ti ran ti ri bcings/
91b1(rgyud): phyogs pa shAn+d+ha// nam tid dragan pa//dedag dkyil kA du nga //pra /ngan pa das ma tsun te/u d+has m+b+ha ba r+d+ha/ sna
91b2(rgyud): gang ga mug dgrol bar bya'o//oM badz+re hA swa ud g+heHhUM/de nas 'dis brtan par bya'o//e badz+ro kyi t+te//de nas dngabaskur ba sbyin te//oM bad+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thiny+tsahUM
91b3(rgyud): bu a/au rat+ta ad+hiShiHtAM/au dId+Ya a b+h+yAM/ts+tshed+d+hiHok+ShaHade nas dum pa'i dbang byin te/a dz+r-i kA lau sha ad+d+hits+tsha/au d+b+haka
91b4(rgyud): las/oMdz+nyA n+d+ha ts+tsha ag+h+r-iny+tsen+tu/ / mu dr-i y+YAso//au d+d+ha ma 'dis
91b5(rgyud): mung k+tha mung+gu ab+h+r-iSh+NIHs+yAd+d+ha yaM dz+nyArnam /ts+tsha/mai A~M dz+har+b+r-i saM.aHo \u0f7fdz+dziHkr-i ya /ai
91b6(rgyud): tsakr-i ad+hi d+d+has+t+wa~M/ar+g+haMhU~M hU~M hUM/oM oM oM/trA~Mdz+dzatrA~M/hrI hI d+h+we/oM a~M ya/oM badz+ra d+ha ra Ne a d+hI hU~M/oM ta thA gau tad+ha ra Ni ad+d+hiShiny+tsa me oM rat+na d+h+r-i r-i N+De a
92a1(rgyud): tr-I/oM pad+ma d+ha ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa h+ni/a kar+m+ma d+ha ra Ni A d+hi Shiny+tsa a/oM sar+b+bA ta thA gA tA gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa au/oM badz+ra gu h+yaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM//oM rat+na gu h+yaMpa
92a2(rgyud): d+hi Shiny+tsa tA/aM pad+ma guM h+ya a b+hi Shits+tsha t+ti/oM kaR+Wa gu h+ya a b+hi Shany+tsi AHoM pra dz+nyo pA ya sa mra yau ga a b+hi ShIny+tse hUM aHde ltar dbang bskur nas tshe 'phel ba'i rigi pa sbyin//oM
92a3(rgyud): badz+ra a yu She hUM oM/'di'i sgrub pa na 'di yin te/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tshe dpag med zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/phyag
92a4(rgyud): gnyis mi 'jig pa dang mchog sbyin mdzad pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bri'o//de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag pa thal mo sbyar ba brkyang ba gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'ongs la
92a5(rgyud): lta ba bris la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod pa bya ste de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlaso//de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa chen po byas la ba dmar sor gyi mar sdod sar par bcug
92a6(rgyud): la g.yon pa'i rdo rjes mnan te/bcom ldan 'das la rab tu sems shing mtshan thog thag bzlas pa bya'o//de nas bri snam zhing sngon ma byung bI'i nged kyang ldang //dro ba
92a7(rgyud): dang du ba dang me yang 'byung ngo //'od zer gyi snang ba rab tu 'phros te de la sogs pa mtshan ma byung na mor de mar gsar pa 'am/tel mar ram/chu'am//'o ma 'am//
92b1(rgyud): mtshan kan mamacan cams samam macas mnyam/samamanaca thasamam can thasanaThamama' mamamam tham bam sa thams thas mams pal tham ma mam ma thasasas mtham tham tham yam kas
92b2(rgyud): zho 'am/chad dam/khrag gam/zhog gam/klad pa 'am/sha'am/gang yang rung ba dang ldan cig tu rab tu bsgrubs ta nang par sngar srung pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te
92b3(rgyud): 'thungs sam//zos ni mtshan ma ji lta ba nyi ma ji srid pa'i cher 'gyur zhing rdo rje sems dpa'i tsher yang 'gyur//tha mas ni dngos grub tha ma ro 'gyur te 'di la the tshor med
92b4(rgyud): do//mtshan ma ma byung na yang 'jig rten na nad med pa dang yid gzhungs pa dang ldan zhing skra dkar dang gnyer ma med pa dang lus brten zhing tshe la brgya par 'gyur ro//gzhan
92b5(rgyud): yang bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'grub ste the tshom med do//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan
92b6(rgyud): 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang beng ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad
92b7(rgyud): ba 'tshal gi snying po bshad pa 'tshal gyis//com ldan 'das kyi bka' gnang par zhu/rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' gnang bar zhu/rgyal po chen po dge legaso leg saM shod cig/
92b8(rgyud): dang /ngas rje su yi rang zhing rang gi dam tshig byin gyis brlab par bya'o//de nas ge nod sbyin gyi rgyal po ngal bso pos//bcom ldan 'das kyi snang zhing rje su yi rang
93a1(rgyud): rgyu/sgro byin gyi brlab pas rang gi snying po rang gyi sbyong ka nas byung la//oM /de nas d+ma za'i rgyal po chen po yul 'khor sbyang blos de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying ba bshad pa
93a2(rgyud): oM d+hi/de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po tsA po 'a skyes pos de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying po bshad pa oM bi/dri nas klu'i rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying po
93a3(rgyud): bshad pa oM kra/de nas dgos dkyil 'khor bshad de//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//dkyil 'khor lngas ni rgyan pa ste//de yi dbus mgon po ni//phyag na rdo rje bgyid btsas bri/
93a4(rgyud): de yi bayon pa'i log su ni//ngal gso dge ba lag pa na/btson dang ni ne'u le//rin po chu rkyen gyis brgyan//sbom zhing seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs//gser mdog gzi ba
93a5(rgyud): ldan pa bri//mkhas pas bum pa bzang po sogs//rin chen tshogs char 'bab pa bri//mdun du yul 'khor skyod nyid ni//pi wang sgrogs par yang dag rtson//rol cing kha dog ljang /
93a6(rgyud): ku nyid//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bri//g.ya su dpa' bo lus 'phags po//ral gri phyug na bsnams par bri//nub tu yang ni migu mi bzang //rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin
93a7(rgyud): cingo mchog/sbrul mgo bdun gyis yongasu bskor//mig ni dmar zhing shin tu 'bur//sgo yo phyogs ni thod du//sgo skyong rnams kyang de bzhin//de nas sngags pa rang nyid 'jug
93b1(rgyud): 'khor lo'i phyag n+ya shog grags pa'o//bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan drang zhing //de nas rgyal po spyan drong //spyan dras nas ni mkhas pas mchod//mcho dra yonA zhabs bsol chog ban donas
93b2(rgyud): slob ma rgyal rigs same//rje rigs bram ze la sogs kyang //me tog phreng pos rnamo brgyan po//sngags shes pa yi sngags 'di dang //rdo 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas gzhugs//oM hrId+d+hes
93b3(rgyud): ma yi hUM/daM nA me tog gi rin po che 'dis kyang dor bar bya'o//oM badz+ra pA tIts+tshe d+haM ma hota ta ma/gang lo lhung ba'i rgyal po de//'di yis 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/de nas phrin gnas pa yi/du
93b4(rgyud): pa bzhis kyang dbang bskur te//lnga pa phyag na rdo'i'o//phyag rgya nyid kyis dbang bskur bya//de la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin//dkyil 'khor bris nas dbang bskur bas//rgyal po ma yin rgyal
93b5(rgyud): por 'gyur//rgyal po yin na chen por 'gyur//'dzam+bu gling dbang dpal dang ldan//gling bzhi pa yi bdag po mchog/lan bzhi dbang ni bskur ba dang //lan bzhir rab tu zhugs na ni//de la
93b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag/rang gi bu bzhin brkyang bar bya//bdag cag rgyal chen bzhi pas kyang //'bangs dang 'khor du bcas pa dang //yul 'khor po brang bcas pa yi//rgyal pos rtag/
93b7(rgyud): tu bebyad gyi ste//de ya mi rung ba rnams dngong //de yi pha rol sde dang nod//'chi bdag 'jigs pa mu ge dang //yams dang nyer 'tshe gzhom par bgyi//ngal bso bos ni rgyas par
94a1(rgyud): mamam kam mamamamams sam macas mtham/samamasaca thas mamacan thasam tha ma 'a mamam sa thas yam sa yas la tham mams bal tham mas tam mams samabs tham mas yas la
94a2(rgyud): bgyis//yul 'khor srung gis zhi ba nyid//phyugs dang gnyen bcas du sa min pa'i//'chi bdag lus 'phags po yis 'joms//mig mi bzang gi bde bar byed//
94a3(rgyud): mu ge la sogs rnam par 'joms//mdor na bdag gis de yi ni//ra ba kun dang bsam pa kun//bgyi ste gal te ma nges na//phyag na rdo rje bslus pa yin//de nas phyogs
94a4(rgyud): skyeng bcus bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan bdag cag kyang sems can thaMd la phan pa dang bde ba'i sla rang rang gi snying po rab tung
94a5(rgyud): /'jog rten skyong ba rnams legaso logaso//de legs pa smos shig/de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi snying po rnams phul ba//oM I/oM I/
94a6(rgyud): oM oM/oM ya/oM rI/oM baM/oM yaM/oM ku/aM aM/oM b+ha/de nas de dag gis dkyil 'khor bshad//dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la//mgon po dbusu de bzhin
94a7(rgyud): bzhag/phyog skyong rang gi phyogs kyi char//bzhag bya spyan sngar rnam pa gnyis//nyi ma dang ni phag gzugs//sgo skyong rnams kyang de bzhino//de nas de kun spyan drangs la//mchod
94a8(rgyud): ba kun gyis mchod pa bya//de nas rang nyid zhugs nas kyang //sleb me rnams ni gzhug bya zhing //phyog skyong la sog sngags bzlas po'i//buM ba rnams kyis dbang bskur//de nas phan par
94b1(rgyud): 'dod pa yis//sgrub byur snying po'i sbyin par bya//phyog skyong rang gi phyogs gnas rnams//brtag mi bgos par 'grub par 'gyur//de nas de dag mgu nas 'dri skad ces gsol to//bcom
94b2(rgyud): ldan 'das gang su zhig rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo naso dbang bskor bas dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs te dbang bsku rnaM ba 'dzin pa dang //gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang
94b3(rgyud): pa de dag bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kun nas srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba bar bgyi'o//pha rol gyi sde rnams bzhom par bgyi'o//dus dang dusu char dbab por bgyi'o//
94b4(rgyud): 'bru dang /me tog dang /'bras bu rnams bskyed par bgyi'o//de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag
94b5(rgyud): gis rgyal po chen po de'i tshe sring bar bgyi'o//dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba brgyad po so sor dag gi par bgyi'o//srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po bden bral gyi 'di skad ces gsol to//ba
94b6(rgyud): bdag gis rgyal ba chen po de dang /rgyal po chen po'i bu dang /bram ze 'am/rje rigs ma/mi gzhon gang yang rung ba dag la nad med pa dang /yi dwags dang /'dres 'jigs rmod pa dang /
94b7(rgyud): srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /dus thaM du srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba bar bgyi'o//de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po chu bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
95a1(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gis dus thams cad rgyal po de dang //yul thad kun nas so sar srung bar bgyi'o//kun tu srung bar bgyi'o//'bru rnams kyang bskyed par bgyi'o//
95a2(rgyud): klu'i nyes pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi'o//dug dang thog kyang mi 'byung bar bgyi'o//me ti/ dang 'bras bu tha~Md kyang yongasu rdzogs par ngo gyi'o//'jigs pa thaMd kyang so sor dgag par bgyi'o//
95a3(rgyud): denis rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can chen po de la dus thang du rlung gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar bgyi/dus ma lags
95a4(rgyud): pa'i rlung mi 'byung bar bgyi/'bru dang me tog dang 'bru thams cad kyang yongasu bskyed par bgyi'o//de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po lus ngan pos//bcom ldan 'das
95a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad bcu dang lhun gcig tu mchis tAM/stobs dang ldan pas sa
95a6(rgyud): chen po de la dus thed du 'jigs pa thams cad sor dgag par bgyi'o//nor dang 'bru tha~Md legs par 'byor par bgyi'o//rang gi skye bo dang /yongs kyi skye bo dang /yul dang /gnas
95a7(rgyud): dang /bran dang /rigs kyi gnyen dang /grags dang /bu dang bu mo dang /chung ma la sogs pa yang srung bar ba bye'o//glang dang /kha dang /khong bu dang /rnga mo dang /lug dang /ma he dang /glang po tshad
95b1(rgyud): man mam mtshams samamams mtham/amamasaca thamamama.am mam yam la ya sa pa masams 'ams mayams
95b2(rgyud): NA dang /rwa la sogs pa yang srung bar bgyi'o//de nas 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po dang ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag
95b3(rgyud): gri rgyal po de dang /rgyal po'i bu dang /rgyal rigs dang /bram ze rnams 'di dang pha rol tu yongs bskyab pa dang /yongasu bzungs pa dang /yongasu bskyang ba dang /zhi ba dang /bke shrI pa dang /chang
95b4(rgyud): pa yongasu spang ba dang /dug gzhil ba dang /dug gzhom pa dang /mtshams bcing ba dang /sa gzhi pocings pa dang /phyogs bcing ba dang /rdo'i ra ba dang /rdo rje'i bur bus gdab pa dang /rdo rje la
95b5(rgyud): gur yang bgyi'o//bgos pa tha~Md la nye bar gnas par bgyi'o//bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa rnams kyis mtshan ma nye bar bstan par bgyi/dge ba dang dge ba ma yin pa thams cad rmi lam
95b6(rgyud): du yang sgo bar bgyi grub pa thams cad la bgegs ma mchis par dngos grub thad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o//de nas yang na mkha' la spyod cing na mkha' la 'gro ba'i bdag pos btso//
95b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dus thams cad du rgyal po dang /rgyal po'i bu dang /rgyal po'i blon blo dang //bram ze dang
95b8(rgyud): rgyal rigs lom la gnas pa thams cad dang bcas pa mchis te/srung ba dang /bsgrub pa dang /sba ba kun nas sgrub par bgyi'o//bgegs kyi gnas thaMd sor bzlog par bgyid
96a1(rgyud): nad thams cad bsal bar 'byi'o//dus thams cad phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o//de nas sde'i 'og gi bdag po pag chen pos kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'ang
96a2(rgyud): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gri mi'i bdag po dang /rdo'i rigs dang /bram ze dang /rmangs rigs sam/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu mo dang pa rnams kyis dus tha
96a3(rgyud): du don bsgrub par bgyi'o//'jig pa thams cad las kyang srung bar bgyi'o//gzhan yang yongasu bsgrub par bgyi'o//de nas gza' chen po brgyad 'khor rgyu sker dang bcas pa rnams
96a4(rgyud): kyai 'dri skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cig 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi snying po rnams 'bul bar 'tshal na de la bcom ldan 'das kyis
96a5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs du gsol//leg so leg so//dus byin gyis brlabs kyis bza' chen po rnams shod cig/de nas nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' chen po rnams kyis bcom
96a6(rgyud): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa//oM a/oM sau/oM aM/oM bu/oM bri/AM shu/oM sa/oM rA/de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/dbusu bcom ldan 'das
96a7(rgyud): phyag na rdo nyid 'jog rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugasu bri'o//mtha' rnams ni rgya mtsho chen po bzhi bri'o//de yi mdun du pa ba sangs//zla ba'i rgyub tu bri bar bye//ga
96b1(rgyud): /su phur du br-idri bya zhing //g.yon du lhag pa bri bA bya//mo yi gan su ma bra dmar ting //rlung gi phyogasu nyi mra ste//dbang ldanA du ni smon pa nyid//srin do'i khyod su sgra gcan bri//dkyil 'khord
96b2(rgyud): phyi rol khor yug tu/rgyu skar thams cad bri bar bya//sgo sgor de bzhin sgo ba rnams//khros po'i yidu bri bar bya//rdo rje 'dzin pas 'jug bya ste//rdo rje lcogs kyi l-I sogs pas//thams
96b3(rgyud): kyang ni spyan dngo //de nas slob ma rnams gzhug ste//oM badz+ra ha na hUM phaT//oM badz+ra gra ha sa ma ye hrIM//aM badz+ra gra ha pra tits+tsha hUM//de nis gza' brgyad sngags ni sngags pa yis//bum pa//

96b5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gza' chen po brgyad kyi rgyal po chen po de dang //rgyal po'i bu la kun tu dus thams cad//de kho
96b6(rgyud): na bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o//de nas rgyu skar dang /skad cig dang /thang cig dang /yud tsamo rnams//tshes dang /sbyor ba dang /khyim dang /dus spyi re dang /mjug phod
96b7(rgyud): la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cig gis kyang duso thams cad du sems
97a1(rgyud): can chen po'i dka' mi bcug cing dpon po bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o//grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs drung /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang gi ga
97a2(rgyud): thams cad so sor bskyab par bgyi'o//'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshon yang des bdag cag mchod na gdan mi 'tshal bar 'jigs pa de mi 'byung ngo ////de nas klu chen po
97a3(rgyud): brgyad kyis phud ces bya ba'i sgras bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas te 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnams kyi gsung ba'i snying po rnams 'bru'o///
