97a5(rgyud): phreM/oM pheM/oM phu/oM bI oM bAM/oM pho/oM pheM//de nas de dag gis dkyil 'khor bshad//pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa//kha dog dkar po legs par bri//dkyil 'khor /
97a6(rgyud): yi dbus bzhugs pa//phyag na rdo rje rab tu nag/sbrul mgo mtha' yas gdengs ka mdun//ltos 'gro chen po bsdigs pa bri//mtha' yas 'jog po de bzhin du//spobs kyi rgyu
97a7(rgyud): dang rigs ldan dang //nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang //pad+ma chu bdag de bzhin du//mdor na 'dab ma re re le//de dag sbrul mgo 'bar ba bri//sgrol mgo bdun bdu ni chung ma yi//
97b1(rgyud): mgul nas khyud dang bcas pa bri//bum pa brgyad rnams bzhag bya ste//gto ma la bshos mdzes pa dang //mang dang ro ma sbrang rtsi bcas//gtses pa'i dbye ba rnams kyang //rdo rje'i bdag nyid bzhugs pa
97b2(rgyud): sgral mgo sbrul mgo can rnams dgug/bud ces bya ba lhan cig s+ho//dzaM hUM baM hoHzhes brjod//de nas rgyal po 'am rgyal rags no//de dag tshad bcug nasu//du gau haM sa skyon bsal ba'i phyir//dud ces bya bas
97b3(rgyud): dbang bskur//de nas ming tsam bzung bas kyang //klu rnams de dag thams cad 'grub pa de mA de dog kun mgu nas//bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te//spyan sngar zar mo sbyor 'khod nas//smon la/
97b4(rgyud): rab tu 'debs par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la mngon par rang dga' ba gang dag dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa de dag bsgos par gyur na de'i tshe//
97b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid la smras par gyur cig/de'i tshe bdag bye chen gyis bsregs par gyur cig/rdo rje kun tu 'bar bas bdag cag gi mgo 'gems par gyur cig/rtag par dus thams cad seMn chen po
97b6(rgyud): de srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba bar bgyi'o//gzi byin chen po dang /stobs dang /brtson 'grus bskyes par bgyi'o//de'i dug rnams dug ma mchis par bgyi'o//dus dang dus chang dbab par
97b7(rgyud): bya'o//me tog thaMd yongasu rdzogs par 'gyi'o//pha rol gyi g.yul thams cad la dus dong dus ma yin pa'i char dbab par bgyi'o//'jig rten pa tha~Md bskyed par 'gyi'o//rgyal ba'i
98a1(rgyud): bka' dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' rab tu sgrub par bgyi'o//de nas sgrub pa bshad//lha rdzas 'od 'phro dkar po can//klu rnams 'dud pas gnas pa yi//rdo rje 'dzin du
98a2(rgyud): bsams nas ni//phud ces bya ba 'bum du bzlas//de nas dugs zin pa la//phud ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ni//lha rdzas 'od zer phreng ba khrigs//bsams nas de la 'phud yig
98a3(rgyud): bsam//lag pa sbrul mgo zhags 'dra dang //phud kyis rlung gi lpags pa sha//rus gnas phud gyi rnam pa'i dug/mtha' dag drangs te gso bar bya//de nas wa rnaMs kun byed cing //dug
98a4(rgyud): rims dug sbyar la sogs pa//khu tshur gyis kyang kun sel na//sbrul mgo phyag rgyas smos ci dgos////de nas lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po 'jig byed chen po ma mo tshwa mi brgyad
98a5(rgyud): bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyogs 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jigs pa dang ma mo rnams kyis 'jigs pas lha dang klu la so//
98a6(rgyud): pa kun tu skrag rnam par skrag te kha~M bub tu 'gyel nas gos dang bral te//sems stor nas kun tu 'phan pa dag la phan gdags pa'i sla du bdag cag gi snying po 'bul bar 'tshal
98a7(rgyud): gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de legs par byin gyis brlab du gsol//'jigs byed chen po legs legs//rab tu 'jigs par byed pas rang nyid dang lha'i bu mo thaMd kyi snying
98b1(rgyud): mtshan ka na mamamacam cams samam macas mnyam/samamanatha thasamam can ShasanaThamamapa mamamam tham bam thams tham mams pas tham bamam ma/thamams samatham thama' tham yam kas ba
98b2(rgyud): po rnams sh+lo ga cig/de nas 'jigs byed chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to//oM b+hai ra ba bai ra swA hA/oM d+ha swA hA/oM b+hI swA hA/oM b+hu swA hA/oM b+he swA hA/
98b3(rgyud): /oM b+haM swA hA/oM b+hau swA hA/oM b+h+rUM s+thAh+na/oM b+h+yaHswAtA/bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po ni//brgyad po de dag gdam ngag nyan//de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad//'khor lo chen pa
98b4(rgyud): rtsibs brgyad bri//dbusu phyag ni rdo rje ni//khro bo chen po 'jig rten gsum//rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya gzhag/de yi zhabs 'og ma rungs pa//'jigs byed rnams kyi bdag po che//'jigs
98b5(rgyud): byed ma dang bces pa blo//rtsibs kyi nang rnams thad du//gzhan yang 'jigs byed brgyad po ni//ma mo rnams dang ldan pa ni//khros pa'i bzhin dang yid khros par//ci bde bar
98b6(rgyud): ni bri bir bya//'dir ni sgo sgor de bzhin du//sgo ba shAn tu khros ldan bri//de nas lcag k+Shu la sogs pas//bkug ste mgo bo'i thod pa ni//khrag gris gang bas mchod nasu//
98b7(rgyud): sha chang gau tor ma bzang po dang //snod rnams khrag gI bsang ba dang //mgo thod mgo yi dum pu dang //khrag gam chang bkang bum pa brgyad//dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bzhig
98b8(rgyud): bar bya//de nas 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal//mchog gis slob ma rnams gzhug bya//thod pa dang ni bum pa yang //brgyad po rnams kyis dbang po sku ro//de nas las rnam sbyin par bya//
99a1(rgyud): sarbA'aM rlomamam dunan gazlog pa /ga rgyun pasam na dus du mjug/tshul bzhin nan chad na sa//'dus blag panar no gazlas par // dag
99a2(rgyud): byed pa'i sgras//bdag nyid chen pos thos gyur te//mi 'jig pa ni thod pa rma//brag mchog panang po'i an dbri'i//de nas khro bo 'jigs byed po//ma rungs yid can mo mo ni//tshogs kyis
99a3(rgyud): bskor cing 'jigs byed ni//brgyad kyis bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur//de mthong 'jigs pa med byas la//hUM zhes bya ba dran byed cing //sha 'am yang na chad mchog gis//thod pa bkang ste dngul
99a4(rgyud): //de nas 'dzugs byed mo rungs 'joms//mgu zhing rab tu 'grub 'gyur nas//ci 'dod smos shigo zhes bya ba//mgu ba'i yid kyis de sbyin byed//sa rnams sbyin pa ma

99a7(rgyud): snying bar 'gyur//dngos grub gang yang rgya ni//ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya//hUM gis rnam par mngon phyogs shing //byin nas dgod cing 'gro bar byed//skrag na de mtha'
99b1(rgyud): gsod//de nas tshangs pa pa sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis
99b2(rgyud): bka' gnang na rang gi rtog pa bshad par 'tshal gyis//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te byin gyis brlab par gsol//de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams
99b3(rgyud): kyi rang rang gi snying po rnams bshad//yo a/oM bi/oM ru/oM yi/oM kaM/oM ga/oM bri/oM ka/de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad//dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la//dbu su 'jig
99b4(rgyud): rten gsum 'dul ba//de yi 'dun du dpa' bo ni//dbang phyug lag na rtse gsum phri/rgyab tu tshangs pa'i rnam par bri//g.yon du lag na 'khor lo tsA nu//g.yas ni dbang po rang nyid kyi//
99b5(rgyud): phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lag thogs bri//sgo skyong rang bzhin 'dir de rnams//chung ma rang gi dkyil 'khor du//bum pa bum pa bkang ba yang //phyi rol dkyil 'khor du ni bzhag/
99b6(rgyud): stobs bzang la sog mthu chen yang //da nos 'jug bya lha rnams yin/mkhas pas kun nas spyan drang zhing //dzaHhUM bAM hos lha tha~Md po brang dam par 'jug par mdzod//de nas de rnas
99b7(rgyud): gshegs bltas nas//dga' ba chen po mchod par bya//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi//phyag rgya slob mo rnams gzhug ste//oM pr-i tits+tsha d+hI ma hA sa twa badz+ra d+ha ra A dzI ya hUM ha ha ha ha ho//me tog
100a1(rgyud): tshal na mamamatshams samamasams mtham/amasaca thasam cam thasamathatham sa thamam mtham mal bas ka ma tsam baya a bas mam malas bas mams yamakhas
100a2(rgyud): ji lta bzhin du dor//mig phye nas ni dasnun par bya//de nas mngon par bsngags pa yi//bum pa'i chu yi dbang sku ro//de nas lha rnams gang 'dod pa//dngos grub rab tu sbyin
100a3(rgyud): par bya//'bum phrag gcig gam 'bu mo phrag gnyis//sngon du bstan pa byas nas ni//dbang phyug la sogs lha mchog ni//de rnams sgrub pa po yis 'grub//mtshan ma gcig pa la
100a4(rgyud): sogasu'am//yang na phyag na rdo rje'i gnas//de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ngam//ring bsrel ldan pa'i mchod brten du//lha rnams thaMd cho ga bzhin//sgrub pa po yis rtag tu sgrub
100a5(rgyud): denas nam phyed na ni lha//'ongs nas khyod kyi 'dod pa ci//ji ltar bde zhing phan pa ni//sbyin zhes ngas par go bar byed//bzang po nyur du sems te smos//gang phyir mtshig ni khyod la sbyin//de nas
100a6(rgyud): sngags shes mngon grub dang //mchog lha la gsol pa gdang//lha rdzas bcud dang bcud lan dang //mi snang ba dang mkha 'gro dang //ril bu rgyal srid rdzas la sogs//yid 'dod tshad med goso /
100a7(rgyud): ba gdag//de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces to//bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
100a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du zhug po de dag gi bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lha rnams kyi sgrib pa thaMd rnam par spyad//mtho ris kyi lam balhan par bgyi'o//bde 'gro'i lam bstan par babya'o
100b1(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o//sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i lam bstan par brgyu'o//rnam par 'byud pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//nges par 'byung ba'i lam bstan par gyu'o//mya ngan 'dra/
100b2(rgyud): pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//sbyong ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//nyon mongs pa med pa'i lam bstan por bgyi'o//sangs rgyas nyid 'grub pa'i lam bstan par par bgyi'o//byang chub sems da
100b3(rgyud): nyid 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//dus thams cad 'jigs pa thaMd los srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba bar bgyi'o//grong khyer dang /grong rda la da
100b4(rgyud): ljongs dang /yul 'khar dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnam srung bar bgyi'o//yul dang phyogs dang grong khyer rnams kyang srung bar bgyi'o//rgyal po yang brtsal bar bgyi'o//rgyal po thob
100b5(rgyud): ba'i rgyub po che bar bgyi'o//gling gcig dang gling gnyis dang //gling gsum dang /glo bzhi pa dang /bad 'gro dang /sa stengs dang /sa 'og 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams stsal bar
100b6(rgyud): bgyi'o//mdor na brgya byin nyid dang //tshangs pa nyid dang /khyab 'jug nyid dang /dbang phyug chen po nyid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang nyid kyi 'khor la
100b7(rgyud): gatshigs nas 'dzum pa mdzod//de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag g.yos rab tu g.yos/yang dag par rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'gul/yid dag par rab tu 'gul/'ab tu
101a1(rgyud): 'a yang dag pa ba tu 'ab pa dag rab tu dgal yang dag par rab tu //2/tsher tu rtso yang //byung nan nu zhing mtshar nad du byung ba yang da//pa ga rgyu mdzang ///
101a2(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams shin tu na mtshan skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di'i rgyu gang lags
101a3(rgyud): sas rgyas ma ldan las byu chub sems rnam na ma sa par mdzes du mi mdzad do/ldan 'as de'i khyod 'dzus pa mdzad pa /rlung sbyin du/
101a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag ni rdo rjes lha rnams kyis gsol ze'i tshig gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//tshangs pa lo sogs pa lha rnams gong sde nas sa rgyas
101a5(rgyud): cad kyiskye bshad pa pa chi bdog zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa dang /dus ma yin par 'tsho ba 'joms par byed pa'i rig pa'i sngags gzi brjid chen po nyin cig/de nas bcoM sgo nu
101a6(rgyud): na la rnyings pa la seMs bya'o lha rnams kun tu dga' zhing bstsa las shing phyag 'tshal nas legaso zhes byA bA rId+nat+yA dul ti/bcom ldan 'das legs lags
101a7(rgyud): 'dzin pa legs leg so//gtan cha rung ba'i sems can rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur po dang /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi dag gis zin pa rnams dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par
101b1(rgyud): grol ba dang /ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams ngan song las ji ltar gral ba dang /'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa'i sems can rnams bde ba'i thangs kyis 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par
101b2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing myur ba nyid du bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba gzi brdzis che ba pha rol gnon pa'i rig pa bshad du gsol/
101b3(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig gsan nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa 'di rang gi sku gsung thugs/
101b4(rgyud): /rdo rje las phyung //oM budz+nyo puN+ye ma hA pu N+ye ri ma ta A yuHpu N+ye dz+nyA na sa~M b+ha ro pa rtsi te swAhA//snying po'i rig pa'o//oM badz+ri swAhA/nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o//oM b+h+ru~M swA hA//snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'i rig
101b5(rgyud): pa'o//oM traM swA hA//snying po yang dag por bskul pa'i rig pa'i//oM trAM swA hA/snying po dam pa'o//oM hrIHswAhA/gsang ba'i snying po'o//de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de//dkyil 'khor
101b6(rgyud): rtsibs bzhi par byas la de'i dbus de bzhin gsheg pa tsha dang bsod nams dang //ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhag ste/b+h+rUM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o//
101b7(rgyud): de nas spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje ste//badz+ri zhes bya ba'i snying po'o//g.yon du ni khro bo ste//kr-i zhes bya ba'i snying po'o//g.ya su na nakho'i snying po ste/dzA zhes bya ba'i snying po'o//rgyab tu 'phang/
102a1(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba ste/hrIHzhes bya ba'i snying po'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la reg par dri'o//bum
102a2(rgyud): ba lnga dang brgyad 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags kyis btab la bzhago//las thams cad pas mngon par bsngags pa yangango //bdug pa la sogs bzha'o//mchod pa'i dang po can sgo skyong thams cad
102a3(rgyud): nyid kyang //de na sbyar pa lnga dag par 'jug pa'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa dam pa sras dang bcas pa 'khor gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba rig pa dang lhan cig spyan drang //rig pa yang bde bar
102a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i g.yon gyi log su bri'o//de nas bdag nyid dbang bskur ste//skyil mo krung gi 'dug la stong phrag brgyar bzlaso//de bzhin gshegs po mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur
102a5(rgyud): zhing rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ge ma/ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog so sor thob//gang gi tshe mnyam par gzhag pa de'i tshe yid kyis las thid nus
102a6(rgyud): par 'gyu ro//de nas slob ma rnams bzhug ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas nga rgyal 'di skyes par bya ste/oM badz+ra d+ha ra/rat+na d+ha ra/pad+ma d+ha ra/bi shwa d+ha ra/ta thA ga ta sra ma ya a na ti kra maM/
102a7(rgyud): ta thA ga ta sa ma ya d+ha ra ko&ho zhes pa'o//de nas 'das me tig dor bar bya'o//aM sarba ta thA ga ta pra tits+tsha ho sa ma ya staM//de nas phreng ba de mgo la bcings la dbang bskur/o
102b1(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga tA a b+hi Shiny+tsa d+ha ra A dz+nyo pa ya hUM b+h+rUM/oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM b+h+rUM/oM rat+na a b+hi Shits+tsha d+hu d+h+waM/oM dAdz+ra dad+ma a d+hi Shany+tsa hUM hrIHoM kar+m+ma a d+hi Shiny+tsa hUM aHde nas dmachog dang bka'i dbang bskur ba sbyin//
102b2(rgyud): de la dam tshig ni dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems//bla ma dam pa yong mi spang /srog chags rnams ni ngasad mi bya//me byin par yang me blang nyid//brdzun yang smesmra bar mi bya'o//pha rob bud med spyod ma
102b3(rgyud): byad/bla ma smad par mi bya zhing //grib ma'ang bgom par mi bya'o//slob dpon ma yin mi bzung zhing //mtshan ma slob dben spangs pa yang //sngags dang phyag rgya mi smad//lho rnams la yang g.yo na
102b4(rgyud): gal te rmongs pas smod na ni//nad kyis nges par 'chi bor 'gyur//mchod snying lha yi grib ma dang //'ad+hin 'ji rten las 'das pa'i//phyag rgya yi ge mtshan ma yang //gom pas bgom par mi bya'o//
102b5(rgyud): rgyun po dkon mchog gsum sogs dang //sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed dang //bla ma smod la brtson pa rnams//mkhas pas bsgrims te bsad par bya//chos mi ldan dang sreg pa dag/rtag tu
102b6(rgyud): sems can gnod brtson dang //dam tshig sdang rnam snying brtse bas//sngags pas sngags kyis gzhon par bya//'jungs pa'i nor yang yang dag blang //sems can sdug bsngal can la sbyin//bla ma mchod
102b7(rgyud): pa'i rgyu mtshan dang /de bzhin dam tshig sgrub pa dang //dkyil 'khor don dang rgyal sras la//mchod pa'i don phyir bsam pa yis//nor 'phrog/'jungs pa'i nor yang 'od//sems can rnams/
103a1(rgyud): rnams la phan dga' bas//dam tshig dang ni blo mi'i rdzas//sems can rnams kyi sreg srung phyir//rtag tu brdzu ni smra bar bya//sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang //dam tshig rnams ni srung /
103a2(rgyud): bya dang //sngags rig pa yi sgrub pa'i phyir//gzhan gyis bud med kyang sten bya//rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug pas//thams cad spyod ting kun byas kyang //'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur na/
103a3(rgyud): /rje ldan pas smos ci dgos//de nas 'dis bka' yi dbang bskuraro//oM sarba ta nA gA ta A dz+nyA da dA s+ya me grih+NA badz+ra su sid d+ha ye/oM badz+ri tiSh+Tha hUM/'dis rdo rje lag tu byin la phrin las kyi dbang bskur sbyin
103a4(rgyud): sarba kar+m+ma Ni ku ru bud d+ha na hUM/de nas bla ma bla mar bya ba'i phyir//khyed kyis lus mchog sbyin par bya//rdzas dang nor dang 'bru rnams dang //rta dang gzhan pa nyid dang ni//dran gyi mchog dang khang pa dang //rgyo lo srid dang /
103a5(rgyud): phyug de bzhin te//bu dang bu mo chung ma dang //mau dang srong me che mo dang //gzhan yang ci gzhod thams cad ni//phan pa'i bsam pas bla ma dbu la//de nas dngos grub sangs rgyas dang //byang chub sgrub dang gzhan yA/
103a6(rgyud): 'jig rten pa yi thu chen rnams//ji ltar 'dod pas gsol ba gdab//de nas bu la phan pa'i phyir//sngags rig ser sna med sems dang //dad pas dad pa'i sems ldan pa//dngos grub rnams ni
103a7(rgyud): sbyin par bya//chos rnams rang bzhin med par ni//sems kyis bsgom par byas nas kyang //a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam//rang gi sa bon de dbus//bsams nas dan tshig phyag rgya yang //bsam
103b1(rgyud): bzhon dbazhin na nyid kyang //lha yi rnam pa rdul myor du sgrub pa po y-i yongs bsgyur//de nas rang gis don dang //phyag rgyas phyag rgyad byin rlag//gong da /khams ji bzhin du//sangs mya rnams kyis dbang bsrur//
103b2(rgyud): ltar nga rgyal bskyed nas ni//mkhas pa ye ni bsgrub bya ste//de bzhin gshegs kyang 'grub 'gyur na//dngos grub gzhan lte smos ci dgos//de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom rjes
103b3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//btso mo ldan 'das rgyal po dang /rgyal po'i bu dang rgal po'i blon po dang /rgyapa rigs dang /bram ze dang /rje'u'i rigs dang /dmangs rigs dang /gzhan yang dman pa phye ba dang //
103b4(rgyud): pa dang /mtha' khob kyi skye bo'i gnas kyi rigasu skyes pa dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji lta bur 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs
103b5(rgyud): rnams gang ma 'ong ba'i sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa ni lagaso leg so//lha'i tshogs rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs shing dbang bskur ba dang /bris pa dang /'dir 'dug pa dang /rje su mi/
103b6(rgyud): ring ba dang /phyag byas pa dang /mchod pa byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa nyon cig/lha'i bu rnams mdor na nga la yang de phan yon bshad par spro bar med/gang nga la bsod nams kyi gung po de brgya phrag steng du
103b7(rgyud): mar bsgyur yang gra su yang /bgrang ba ro yang /dper yang mi bzed/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsod nams kyi phung po'i bar gyis kyang mi bzodado//gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i sems can rnams
104a1(rgyud): kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar cha'o//rdo rje'i 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs par zhugs
104a2(rgyud): spro'o//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spro'o//de nas lha de dag gis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jam+bu'i gling po'i sems can rnams bsod nams chung zhing tshe thu
104a3(rgyud): ba dang /ngan song gi rgyud dang ldan pa dang /dmyal ba dang /yi dgas dang /byel seng rnams skyes pa dag kyang mchis na/bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/kye lha'i bu dag de dag ni dkyi
104a4(rgyud): 'khor 'di nyid de chug cig/bcug nas kyang dbang bskur cig/chos kyi yi ge yang zlo su chug shig/de nas sems can de dag tshe ring bar 'gyur/bsod nams dang bral ba bsod nams dang ldan par
104a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ngan song las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro//lha'i bu rnams gang ngan song du skyes pa de dag gi ming la dbang bskur ba mdzod cig/gzugs brnyan la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig rang gi lha'i
104a6(rgyud): sku la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig/tha na de dang rigs 'thun pa dang /de'i bu dang do dang rus 'thun pa dang /de'i ming 'dzin pa dang /bran la yang dbang bskur cig/zhag bdun lan bdun dkyil 'khor du
104a7(rgyud): bcug ste dbang bskur bas nges par ngan song gi sgrib pa las rnam par grol par 'gyuraro//lha'i bu rnams de'i ming nas smos te/'bum phrag gnyis dang /'bum phrag gsum dang /'bum phrag
104b1(rgyud): mtshan kan mtshamacan cams samam macas mtham/samamanaca thasamam can thasanaThamams mamam tham bca sa thamag thas mams bamam tham ma macam tam thamamasas mtham thama' thams yam gas ba
104b2(rgyud): bzhi dang /'bum phrag rgya steng gi bar du bzlas na/mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur na sdig pa chung ngu byas pa rnams lta ci smos/lha'i du rnams zhi ba'i thab khungab zlum pa tha
104b3(rgyud): ma dang /bar ma dang /mchog khru gang dang /khru do 'am/khru bzhi pa byas nas/de'i ming gis nyungs kar dkar po rnams brgya phrag stong du bsags te phan song kun las thar bar 'gyur ro//de'i sha dang //
104b4(rgyud): rus pa dang /skra dang thal ba li sogs pa li tshe ga de nyid kyis sdig pa kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur//de yi dbusu 'khor lo ni//rtsibs brgyad dkar po 'od zer 'bar//'khor
104b5(rgyud): yug rdo rje rtse lnga pa/'od zer dkar po dang ldan bri//de nas sna tshogs rdo rje bya//rdo rje rin tshon chu skyes mchog/de nis sdig pa gzhon pa'i phyir//phyag rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs bya//phyi
104b6(rgyud): rol rdo rje rigs rnams kyi//phyag rgya rnams ni phyir rol bri//gza' dang skar ma'i mtshan ma dang //de ltar 'jig rten 'khor rnams kyang //gtso bo'i ri maM lugs ma dang //rdo/
104b7(rgyud): can dang lhan cig ba rgyal bu mo pa gang ba dang //gtor mi lha bshos shin tu //ra/mdor na thig ni btab nas kyang //cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya//dkar po'i gos ni gyon nasu//sangs
104b8(rgyud): rgyas gzug can mi 'jigs pas//ngan song 'gro bar gnas pa ni//sems can de rjes dran byed cing //sdig pa sgrib zhi ba'i phyir//rgyu de dag pa yi sbyin sreg ni//ma ri dang 'o ma spa
105a1(rgyud): myi bcas//bras yos cung kAr bsres pa dang //de yis rus pa sha la sogs//yang na ming tsam gyis kyang ni//de nas bde 'gror skyes nas//mkhas pas rgya
105a2(rgyud): par bya ba ni/ do pa 'am khru bzhi pa/de bzhin mchog ni bya brgyad par/byas nas thang khung khru bzhi pa/kun tu mun ran dang ldan pa//de dbus pad+ma rin tshan can//'od zer skyer
105a3(rgyud): po can bri zhing //khor yug tu ni ra ni chen dang /mu ran la ni chu skyes bri//phyi rol tu ni rigs lnga yi//dbye bas phyag rgya bri bar bye//de bzhin phyi'i lha rnam dang //lcags kyu la sogs
105a4(rgyud): bri bar bya//na gza' ser po gyon byas nas//mtho ris gnas pa rjes dran zhing //de la phan phyir rgyas pa yau//don du rgyas pa'i las byas na/lus can de yi tshe dang dpal//gzi
105a5(rgyud): brjid skol ba bzang po 'phel//de nas de la phan pa yi//dbang du bya ba'i las bya ste/thag bung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra ba//khru gang po 'ami khru do pa/khru bzhi byas la de dbusu/
105a6(rgyud): chu skyes dmar po yang dag bri//de yi dbu su mnga' bcas pa'i//gozhu nyid kyang ni bri bar bya//'khor yug tu ni mngang ba yi//gzhu ni khaM dog dmar po dri//sngags 'dzin
105a7(rgyud): pa yis rtag par yang //phyi rol de yi lha yi bya//sems can de ni dran byas la/no gza' dmar pa rgyan pa yi//me tog dmar zhing pad+ma yang /'bras bu dmar nga
105b1(rgyud): khams bcas pa/mar dang gur gum bsros pa dang /tsan dan dmar po'i phyi ma dang /spyan sreg byas nas lha la sogs/thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur//de yi gdon rnams rnam
105b2(rgyud): gnom phyir//mngon spyod yid dag brtson par bya//khyu do byed bcas khru gsum ma//de thozhin mchog ni khru dgu pa/zer gsum dang ni ldan par bya//dngos rdo rje rtse dgu pa rtse gsum pa
105b3(rgyud): yis muran gyi//sna tshogs rdo rje yang byas la//dbyug pa mgo dang rtse gsum rnams//rdo rje dgra sna rtse gcig gis//phyi rol du yang mtshan par bya//rig pa gsum pa sngar bzhin
105b4(rgyud): rgyun dbum pa gtor ma bum pa yang //zhal zlas mang po bzhag par bya//shwa dang khrag gi bagling ba yi//thod pa rnams kyang kun tu yang //de nas gros nAg bgos shing khros//rang nyid
105b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal//lus can de yi sdig la sogs//de nas de yi sdig bcom zhing //bgegs dang bral te ci bde bar//mtho ris 'dzin mi rnams nyid//ji snyed khams
105b6(rgyud): gsum 'jig rten skyed//myur du bro rims 'di nyid kyis//tshe 'dir gnas pa rnams la bya//de nas gang gi phyir byas pa//de yi bar ni de bzhin 'gyur//gzhan dag kyang ni las
105b7(rgyud): rnams kyang //snga mo ji bzhin de bzhin bya//de ni sems can rnams la yang //myur du bde skyed 'grub par 'gyur//de nas tshongs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams yang dag par
106a1(rgyud): dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dang ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang pan min dang ba nga
106a2(rgyud): slad du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di 'dra ba dang 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rig kyi du mo de bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs po lha rnams kyis bu bzhin du yongasu bskyeng bar brtse ste/yang
106a3(rgyud): jidzig+har bshad pa ma tshang ba med par bgyis pa lha ci smos//gang yang rgyal po dang rgyal po'i bu dang rgyal po'i blon po ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags rjesu slob pa de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar
106a4(rgyud): bgyi'o//yul dang phyogs dang skye ba'i gnas drung 'khor gyi skye bo'i lo thog la sog pa yang srung bar bgyi'o//nor dang 'bru rnams mang du 'byor par 'gyi'o//bud med dang skyes pa dang /khya'u
106a5(rgyud): drang bu mo rnams phun sum chog po par yang bgyi'o//'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /lo legs pa dang bde bar bgyi'o//gang zhig ban+d+he gos dbyi rgyal po 'di la dad pas rgyal mtshan
106a6(rgyud): gyikyi rtse mo le brtags te grong dang grong khyer la sogs par 'jug pa bdag nyid kyis bsdu bar yang bgyi'o//glang po che'i steng du bzhag yA grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad du bskor
106a7(rgyud): bar bya ste/dus ma lon par 'tsho ba dang /nye bar 'tsho ba thim cad zhi bar 'gyuraro//sems can chen po de'i drung na pa dag cig bran gyis tshul lam bu'i tshul du gnas pa shes pa re phyi
106b1(rgyud): gdan 'didas tu spyod pa den bcom ldan sa byugan rdo rje rang nyid las spyod rdzogs pa'i sus rnga rdza sems da'i srung bzhugs par 'tshal bye nga gyur//bcom ldan las rjes nas dpa' san
106b2(rgyud): chu bzang po rib po mas ca yongasu slong bdi ts+tsha d+h+r-ig pa'i rgyal po'i gtsug sa bzhugs pad+ma'i'atshil byar ba skye'o//sa phyogs yang mchod rten du myur ba 'tshal bar bgyi ste/mchod pa
106b3(rgyud): bgyi ba phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o//kun tu srung bar bgyi'o//gang yang brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di rab tu sbyor ba'i rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chen po li dag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams
106b4(rgyud): kyis g.yog bgyi'o//bran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi'o//mngag gzhugs pa nyid du gnas par bgyi'o//bsgo ba thams cad mnyan par bgyi'o//phan pa dang bar thams cad dngos
106b5(rgyud): grub stsal bar bgyi ste/bcom ldan 'das 'dor na de'i rkang pa'i rdul mgo bos gzung bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o//de'i phyi bzhin du rje su 'brang bar
106b6(rgyud): bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs de dbang bskur ba de kho bo cag gos mnga' bdag tu 'tshal por bgyi'o//phyag na rdo rjer 'tshal bar 'gyi'o//rdo rje sems
106b7(rgyud): dpa' lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o//bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa yogs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o//de nas bcom
107a1(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams la 'di skad ces gsol to//tshangs pa la sogs pa lha nas gang rjes la rim grog cig gnyis
107a2(rgyud): byas pas de ltar yang dge ba'i da mo bca' ni legaso legs par bsgrubs shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sngags dang rig pa dang /snying po thams cad brtan par
107a3(rgyud): byi ba'i phyir rang gi snying po 'di bshad de//oM b+h+ya druM badz+ra pA Ni dri D+hi mi tIts+tshad+h+waM/oM hUM AHoM badz+ri hU~M phaT/oM driD+hi badz+ra hUM/oM badz+ra hU~M sa/oM badz+ra hUM aHde nas de dag gi dkyil
107a4(rgyud): 'khor bshad de//dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la//dbusu rdo rje byi bar bya//yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/kun tu bzang po bde ba che//spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje nyid//g.yas su
107a5(rgyud): phyag na rin chen spyan//phyag na pad+ma nub phyogs bre//byang du phyag na sna tshogs bri//phyi rol du ni zlum por bskor//sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya//de nyid phyi rol sems dpa
107a6(rgyud): rnams//gor mo bzhin du bri bar byi//de yi phyi rol sems dpa' yang //byams pa la sogs mchog chen bri//de nas de bzhin dge slong ni//kun dga' bo sogs thub pa bri//
107a7(rgyud): rang gi chung ma dus bskor ba'i//mings pa la sogs phyi rol bri//bza' dang rgyu skar nyi ma dang /rgyal ba bzhi po rnams dang ni//phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba rnam//dkyi/
107b1(rgyud): 'khor 'dir ni yang dag bri//phyi rol du ni dmyal ba sogs//klu la sogs pa dud 'gro'i sde//sgo dang sgrar ni de bzhin du//sgo skyong stobs kyis dam pa rnams/dkar po 'dod pa'i nyi ma la/
107b2(rgyud): rab tu 'bad pas dkyil 'khor bri//gang bsngags nag po'i phyogs la yang //dkyil 'khor 'gal ba ma yin no//lnga pa dri rjes bdun pa dang //nye gang ba ni khyad par ni//sngags de phyag na
107b3(rgyud): pad+ma yi//dkyil 'khor bya ba'i tshig la'o//gang yang drag po'i las rnams la//de ni nag po la yang bri//khra bo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang //zla ba tsA ba khyad par du//rgyal ba rnams kyi dkyil la
107b4(rgyud): sdigs//gzhan yang rang gas 'dus byas pa'i//dkyil 'khor la brtson gdab bya zhing //shar nas 'char ba'i dbang bya ste//phyogs kyi ni rtag par bya/de nad kyil 'arjod/de ba ni/yid kyis yongs brtag pa skye
107b5(rgyud): dud dngapo byas 'ang shing gyi gzugs dag ning ni//rje thun rang gi slob nyid kyi//slob ma lhan cig tsam gyis spyad//de ras nang par rab sngar langs//legs bkrus gos dkar 'tshong zhing gtsang //blo ldan
107b6(rgyud): /bla mas blo mar bcas//dkyil 'khor drung du kun nas 'gro/dkyil 'khor phyogs nyid shin tu yang //nye bar byug shing legs par mnyes//khro ba chen po bzlas pa yi//dri yi chu
107b7(rgyud): yis bsems pa yis//dbusu rigs rnams snying po yis//lhag par gnas par bya ba nyid//dkyil 'khor gyis ni gtso bo yi//sngags kyi las rnams thams cad bya//sa la
108a1(rgyud): sor ni bcu gnyis du'o//dkyil 'khor bri yi byas nas su//dkyil 'khor rig pas lan bdun du//rta ga pade nas bzlas par bya//de rjes lha rnams nyid kyi yang //byang chub
108a2(rgyud): chen po zhes bya ba'i//snying pos skal pa ji lta bar//dri dang me tog sogs mchod pa//byas nas gtor ma dbul bya zhing //mngon par bsngags pa'i spos kyang //de nas tsan dan la sogs pa/
108a3(rgyud): bsres pa'i tshul mngon par bsngags//de la dbul ba'i me tog dang //bdug pa la yang tsho ga bzhin//so shing u dum ba ra dang //a shwad the sogs rma med cing //shin tu pri man sbom pa min//
108a4(rgyud): sor mo bcu gnyis tshad tsam ni//dri yi chu yis rab bskus shing //me tog phreng ba yis kyang bcings//dri bzang la sogs byugs shing bdug/lag pas reg na snying po ni//mang po yang ni bzla/
108a5(rgyud): bya zhing //rigs nyid kyi ni lan bdun na mo//slob ma rnams kyi tshad gzhal bar//so zhing la sogs yang dag gzung //gcig la sogs pas go rims bzhin//rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya//de nas/
108a6(rgyud): mkhas pas bdag nyid kyis//slob ma srung ba brtan byas nas//sbyin sregs las ni mar byug pa'i//ya ma shing rnams ni mAr dang bcas//sbrang rtsi mar dang bsres pa dang //mar gyi bsregs
108a7(rgyud): thugs sreg bya zhing //zho zan gyi yang sbyini sregaso bya//dang por bgegs ni zhi bya'i phyir//de nas thugs kyis rjes 'dzin byir//de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sregs zhing //sdig pa zhi bar bya
108b1(rgyud): phyir ram//de nas slob ma rnams brtags nas//cho ga yi ni lhag gnas bya//de yis ji ltar nus pa yis//de bzhin sdom pa bzung bar bya//de rnams cho ga 'di yin te//gtsang zhing dkar ba'i gos
108b2(rgyud): ni/mdun du bltas te 'dug pa la//lhag par gnas par brtsam par bya//brims dang por skyabs gsum sbyin//de yi rjes la byang chub sems//ma skyes pa ni bskyes bya zhing //bskyed pa slar yang rjes dran bya//
108b3(rgyud): de nas khro bo mngon bzlas pa'i//chu yi spyi bor gsang gtor bya//mgo bor kun tu reg nos ni//mnyamo par gzhag par lan bdun bzlas//rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni//'go bas dri bzang spags pa
108b4(rgyud): la/'jig pa bzlog la mkhas pa yis//lan bdun rtag tu bzlas par bya//'khor los sgyur ba rgyal po yis//rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig/rta 'grin chu skyes rigs la ni//rig pa'i rgyal po
108b5(rgyud): /yi ge bcu//suM b+ha zhes bya rdo rje rigs//rigs pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul tshe//yi ge hUM bzhi rnams dang ldan//las kun rab tu spros pa la'o//rigs gsum rnams la thun mong pa//khro bo bdud rtsi
108b6(rgyud): 'khyil po nyid//bagle gos kun rnam par gzhom po'i phyir//bsangs pa yi bdag po gsungs//las ni thams cad yi sngags//spyi bor reg cing bzlas de nas//gsang gtor yang bya de nyid
108b7(rgyud): kyis//bdug pa yis dang bdag par bya//dbang bskor ba ni bum pa bcas//'bru la sogs pa thams cad ldan cung nga cung zad gang du blugs//rig pa'i rgyal pos mngon par bsngags///
109a1(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du lhags gnas bya//dri yi chu yis mchod yon sbyin//mai kA kyang ni gzhug par bya//gdug pa yis kyang badrug par byA//dashA bsgyur ba ni bum pa btsas//mkha /
109a2(rgyud): pas yang dag yongasu bzlas//de yis dbang bskur bya ba yin//slar yang bzlas pa dkyil 'khor du//slob ma dam tshig can rnams ni//thal mo sbyar zhing mngon phyogs la//de naso shing sbyin
109a3(rgyud): par bya//slob ma rnams ni go rims bzhin//gzung shing shar du kha bltas te//phyi rol nyid du so shing bca'//mags par ni mtshos nasu//logs ma yin par dor bya ste/so shing mdun du dor byas
109a4(rgyud): pa//gang tshe mdun du rtse mo lhung //de tshe ngongos grub mchog shes bya//gang zhig steng du bltas pa yang //de bzhin shad du rtse mo bstan//dngos grub 'bring du yongasu grags//byang du bltas na thang ka nyid//
109a5(rgyud): rig pa'i dngos grub 'jig rten pa//so shing dor ba brgyal lam du//gang tshe 'og tu khu bltas pa//de tshes 'ogro dwangs grub ni//'byung ba 'di la the tsha ma med//slob ma nye bar reg pa ni//snga ma bzhin
109a6(rgyud): du bzung byas la//thams cad las byed sngags kyis ni//bla mas dri bzang chu sbyino//re re la yang btung ba'i phyir//khyor ba gsum ni sbyin par bya//de nas blo ldan langs nas//'di dge kun tu
109a7(rgyud): spyang par bya//de nas mchod pa yang byas nas//lag pas spos ni bteg na su//blo ldan gus pas lha rnams la//gsol ba gdab cing gus gnas bya//dang por sngags ni bstan gsan dbab//
109b1(rgyud): dpyod kyi 'a khyo ga ldan pa//de sa rim pa'i sbyin pa 'o//rnams spyan 'dren pa yin//maldan nag mo zhes bya//gas rgyal po spyod la 'du//narnanas parda byu //rgyud rnams la ya
109b2(rgyud): mchod pa'i phyir//nyid kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rno yi//bdag nyid kya ni bri bar 'tshal//bcom ldan de ni dag gus la//bka'adun mdzad pa rigs legaso//'jig rten mgon po rtsub cani//sangs rgyas/
109b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dang //dgra bcom gang gzhan sngags kyis lha//lha dang 'jig rten skyong rnams dang //'byung po rdzu 'phrul tshe gleng dang //sangs rgyas bstan pa mngon dga' rnams//bdag la yang
109b4(rgyud): dag dgo su gsol//che ge mo zhes bya ba dang //che ga mo yi dkyil 'khor ni//rang nyid 'byung bar bgyid par 'tshal//ji ltar gus pa'i nyer spyod kyis//slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni//rje su brtsibs nyer bcu/
109b5(rgyud): nas//dkyil 'khor dang bcas thams cad ni//nye bar byon par mdzad par rigs//de skad smras te tshig gang zhig//bcom ldan 'das lnga phyag 'tshal nas//bstong pa'i lce spyod kyang byas nas//de dag gsheg
109b6(rgyud): su gsol bar bya//chags bral so sor ldan pa yi//slob ma rnams la chos bshang bya//blo ldan shAr du mgo bstan te//dge ba'i gnyid kyi nyal du gzhug/de na sde dro nyid ni//mtshan mo'i rmi lam mthong ba bri//
109b7(rgyud): gang tshe dge ba'am mi dge ba//dogs med nyin par thos nas//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas ni//rigs bdun rnams kyi dam tshig kyang //de nas bu khyod dam chog dang //sdom pa rgyal ba yis gsungs /
110a1(rgyud): pa//dad pa'i bla ma'i bka' yang bsgyang //khyad kyi srog rgyags bsad mi bya//mra byin mi blang 'dod log dang //dngos grub 'drod byas mi bya'o//chang mi tung shing sha la sogs//bar+d+ha
110a2(rgyud): ba nam yang ma yin nyid//sems can kun la glanod mi bye dkon mchog gsum yang mi sdang zhing //dus rnams kun tu byang chub sems//snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang //bla ma lha rnams de bzhin nyi
110a3(rgyud): bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya//gang las sdig 'gyur de las 'da'//de la phul ba'i rnying pa dang //gribi ma la yang 'gram mi bya//phyag rgya'i rnam pa'ang de bzhin nyid//sngags dang lha la mi smad
110a4(rgyud): cing //gdon gyi las rnams mi bya'o//mu stegs pa yang smad mi bya//mdor na bdag nyid the tshom dang //som nyi yid gnyis mi bya ste//rgyud dang lha tshogs la de bzhin//dad pa brtan pas dam bcis
110a5(rgyud): nas//sarba bid kyis dbang de bzhin//bum pa la sogs mchog rnams kyis//dbang bsgyur bcu po 'dod rje bzhin//de nas lag na rdo rje dang //dril bu sbyin bya de rjes la//'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun//
110a6(rgyud): bzung nas 'khor los bsgyur ba yi//rgyal po dbang phyug thob phyir dang //sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang bskur zhing //sdig sgrub 'dod pa'i slob ma la/rje suM gnang ba mnyan du gzhug/de nas bstod pas mgo
110a7(rgyud): po sa//phyag 'tshal ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas//bla ma la ni dbul bya ste//rin chen gter dang 'brung dbyi//gser dang bzhon pa khyim dang gdan//bu dang bu mo skyes pa dang //bud med rnams ni dbul
110b1(rgyud): //rme pa tha~Mng byer na zhid rnams//rang gi sems na ya dang bas//yon rnamasangs padu la bya dong //ras klu rgyapa byed rnam la//da nung ga nyid sna 'dul bya//cha 'di'i bad pa myu lus da
110b2(rgyud): 'jig rten pha rol pado ba'i mchog/spangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur te//lha yi bde ba lta ci smos//rlo ma sangs rgyas kuni dang mnyam//rdo rje sleb dpon smod pa gang //de yis rtog tu sdug bsngal 'thob//de
110b3(rgyud): slob dpon slang mi bya//rdo rje spun dang sring mo dang //gang yang smad par mi bya zhing //khon par yang ni mi bya'o//do/na mchog gsum la gnod byed dang //bla ma smong byed ma rus rnams//dam tshig 'das la
110b4(rgyud): me bya/de lta bu sogs gnod byed la dang //de lta hi de byas ni//kun rig gis gsus ngos grub thog//sa ni kun la rjes brtse bas/dngangos grub myur du 'byung ba 'thob///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye
110b5(rgyud): dbang po dang //lha dang bcas pa la 'jig rten la bon pa dang bde ba'i don du sgrub pa'i cho ga gsus te/bri gzhi la 'i com ldan 'das thams cad sha~M bA de le na bzhin du bri zhing g.ya su de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song
110b6(rgyud): thams cad yongs sbyong ba'i rgyal po dang /g.yon du shAkya thub pa dang //ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku mdog zla ba lha bu phyag na pad+ma can dang //
110b7(rgyud): shAHthub pa'i 'gon phyag na rdo rje dang /de dag gis dpe su sman pa'i rgyal po phyag gcig gis oM ru ri'i 'bras bu bsnams shing de las gzhan ni mchog skyon du bya'o//rta 'grin dang 'jog rten gsum las
111a1(rgyud): /nan bur d+has dus dzums pa la ston pa da thos sa ma pang byangs pa tsun na na tu sa smras kau gas mdan b+h+yo yangs byun rdzunas
111a2(rgyud): mtshan du'o//ma kyi 'og tu rdzing bu chu srin dang /nya dang /ru sbal dang /sbal ba dkar po la sogs pa dang bcas pa chu las skyes pa'i me tog du mas yo su gang bar bri zhing 'dug pa dang /mang po dang /dri dang /
111a3(rgyud): ba dang /zhal zas dang /me tog dang /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bri bar bya'o//'og nyid sgrub pa po thal mo sbyar te rab tu 'dug cing 'dus par bri'o//de nas de rdzogs pa la byin gyis brlab pa dmigs par bya/
111a4(rgyud): sted spyan dbye ba byas nas mchod pas mchod par bya'o//de nas gal te mtshan pa mthong na myur du 'grub po//gal te me mthong ni ring mo zhig na 'grub pa'o//band pa dod ni rnga sgra dang //dril bu'i sgra dang
111a5(rgyud): 'brag sgra nyid/dge slong bram ze bu mo dang //'bras bu mthong na dngos grub ni//mchog 'bring the ma myur du 'grub//de na sku gzugs phyag rgya dang //sngags rnams kyis ni byin gyis brlabs//ji ltar bskyed
111a6(rgyud): /pabs thob bya zhing //'jig rten gsum ni rnal rgyal gyis//bdag srung la sogs byas nasu//bdag gi de nyid kyang bsgoms nas//ji srid dngos grub rtags 'byung ba/'bum phrag gsum mam drug 'du
111a7(rgyud): bzlas//de nas dben pa'i gnasu ni//sngags kyang chad lhag bkang bya ste//brgya phrag brgyad rnams bzlas par bya//de nas bzlas pa de yi mthar//dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la//mchod pa/
111b1(rgyud): rkyen yang byas nas//mtshan mo gcig ni dbus bdag/de nas gal te grotso ba 'am//sras sam lha rnams mthong gyur na//dan snod 'ad ji rgyu bar//ngos drub mchog na gsol ba gdag//lhan ma pa rtag tu
111b2(rgyud): dgyes pa yos//dngos grub 'bras bu de la stsal//phyag byos kyang ni dngos grub ni//mchog la sogs pa blang bar bya//bla ma dkon mchog gsum po la//rang rang bskul ba phul nas ni//de nas rtag tu bdag nyid spyad
111b3(rgyud): /dri rnams med na shes rab can//blangs nas rang nyid spyad par bya//sems can kun la phan brtson zhing //bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur//legs par bsgrungs na thong byed//gnod sbyin bya skar gdong la sogs//tshig
111b4(rgyud): tsam gyis ni bran bzhin du//zhi ba'i las la sogs pa ni//thams cad byed par 'gyur ba yin////de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang pos 'od skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sems can sdig/
111b5(rgyud): pa bgyis pa dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams kyis dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu spang ba'i phyir ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//lha'i dbang po byas
111b6(rgyud): ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa chen po byed pa de rnams dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams las tshegs med par grol bar 'gyur ba de nyid de bzhin du nyon cig de
111b7(rgyud): bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas pa yi//bum pa rnams ni snga ma bzhin//dbang 'byung ba ni rtag par bya//de nas sngon gyi sdig bya zhing //dmyal ba la sodam sdug 'jal ni//kun la
112a1(rgyud): malan kas mamamamamatshams samamasacas mthama.amamanam thas tsham can thasama.ata tham pasas mamamamacas 'al bangs ka sa rtsam bas ma ba mam tam thalas 'amams tham mam yams
112a2(rgyud): rnam brel 'gyur//sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid cha//de yang gnas gcod lhar skyes nas//rtag tu sangs rgyas chos bgro thos//phyir mi dri zlog pa'i sa la gnas//rims kyis byang chub mngon
112a3(rgyud): su ma byed//da yi gzugs brnyan dang na ming //gur gam gyis ni bris nasu//ngan song gsum gyis 'jigs chen las//sems can rnams ni thar pa'i phyir//sngags pa gzhan la phan gtsor zhing //brtse
112a4(rgyud): mngon par dbang bskuro//de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni//sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang bskur te//lha yi gzugasu brtags na su//mchod rten dbus bzhag par bya//rang gzhan lha yi snying po ni//snying kha de yi
112a5(rgyud): phyogs bris nas//lha mnyam par ni sems bskyed//khyim du yang ni gzhag par bya//de yi ming dang spel ba'i sngags//gur gum bzang pos bris nas ni//'bum ni yongasu rdzogs par du//mchod rte
112a6(rgyud): lolas ni rab tu bya//sdig chen sdig ni zad pa'i phyir//bye ba yang ni rdzogs par bya//de ltar byas na de nges par//dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur//de bzhin yi dgas byol song las//grol te lha dri
112a7(rgyud): rnams skyes//de yi ming dang spel nas ni/ji lhor gsungs pa'i sdug stong bzlas//gal te brgya phrag spong yang tshang //bye ba'i bar du rdzogs par bya//lho'i rigs rnam skye bar 'gyur//de yi ming nas spel ba yi//
112a8(rgyud): mkhas pas 'dum khrag brgya 'am ni//yang na brgya phrag stong sredadu//sbyin sreg byas na dmyal ba ni//chen po'i sdig pa las gol 'gyur//rnga srid mtshan mo 'bar ba yi//gan su yang dag skye bar 'gyu
112b1(rgyud): sa kar da/ po'i la dang 'bras//ra yi 'o ma yang dang ldan//de bskus yam shing da srid//cho ga rje bzhin sbyin sreg bya//de nas de ni nges par yang //lha gas rnam su skyes pa yi/mtshan mnye bar mthong bar bya//
112b2(rgyud): gal te lha yi mchog skyes dang //yang na thab khung nang du ni//dkar po g.yas bskor 'bar ba dang //gyen du 'bring ni dri ma med//'phye ba sdoms bzhin 'bar ba dang //glog bzhin dri ma med 'ong bstan//me rtags
112b3(rgyud): 'di rnams mthong bar 'gyur//yang na me lha bdag nyid ni//de bzhin khro nar ston 'gyur te//zla ba bzhi ni du dri ma med//dkar po bzhin mdog 'bar ba'o//mtshan ma 'di dag mthong ba la//de nas dmyal
112b4(rgyud): sogs rnams grol zhing sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni//skyes pa yin par shes par bya//khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni//cho ga ji bzhin thag khung ba rko//rdo rjes mtha' ma bskor ba yi//'khor lo dadu nr-i bri
112b5(rgyud): bar bya rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams//ji bzhin rang gis phyog su bri//ji bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni//'jig rten la sogs phyin nas bri//de nas bu me gang ba dang //gtor mas snod rnams bkang ba
112b6(rgyud): ni/brgyad dam bcu drug dag tu bzhag/bza' dang bcas pa zhal zas dang //me tog phreng sogs de bzhin te//bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs//gdugs mchog rnams kyi legs par brgyan//de ltar
112b7(rgyud): sbyin sog cag pung ni//mchog tu yang dag sbyin sreg bya//cho ga shes pas de bris nas//lha yi tshogs ni spyan drangs te//sngags shes pas sngags phyag rgya yi//margal sogs phul nas ni//mdod/
113a1(rgyud): /brdzus mchod par byas nasu//lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la//ga bur gur gum la sogs pas//mar dang 'o ma til dasgos la//ti la dang nyungs kar 'bras rnams dang //dri yaM chus ni legs
113a2(rgyud): bkang ste/'bras chan spos dang la du ba//sbrang rtsi sha ka rar ldan la//brgya phyag du mar yongasu bzlas//yam shing la yang de bzhin te/rang gi sngags kyis btab pa'i shing //khung bu'i nang du bzhag par/
113a3(rgyud): bya//lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //dri za sogasu gnas pa yi//ro la sngags kyis btab nasu//chu mchog gis ni dkrus nas ni//sngags bzlas dri yi byug par bya//gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan bya zhing /
113a4(rgyud): sngags kyis btab pa'i gdug pas bdug/me tog drang ba la sogs mchog/gtsug phud dpung bar de bzhin du//sngags bris na ni gdegs par bya//snying kha mgrin pa kha phyogasu//sarba bi d+has byin
113a5(rgyud): gyis brlabs//dpral ba mdzod spu rna ba gnyis//mgo bo spyi gtsug dpung pa gnyis//rna ba gnyis dang dbus mo bo la//sna yi rtse mo long bu dang //mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi//dbang po rnams/
113a6(rgyud): kyi gnas dang ni//de ltar gzhan du 'ang gnas yi ge/mchog tu dge ba de dag gzhag/de dag dran stong yod sbyangs phyir//stan dang bcas te thob dbus gzhag/de nas sngags pas sngags kyis ni//
113a7(rgyud): mngon par sngags pa'i gos kyi g.yogs//de nas byin za yang dag rab spang la//me lce stong gis dgegs shing 'bar ba'i lus//zla ba kun de bzhin du zhi ba'i yid//dpag med kun la
113b1(rgyud): mtshan kaH mtha ba mam caHsa mamam macas ma tham/anam naH thas tsham than thasan tham tham 'a thamamatham tham batha ma babs tham mamabam tham ba mthaH Tham/thamaca mkhan tham zams yamasam can
113b2(rgyud): tshod yon yongasu brtag/de bzhin ji ltar gsus pa'i mchod pa bya//de nas dang po de yi sbyin srog go//rdzogs par byas shing 'brar ba nyid la ni//yongs brta g+ha nA ni rgyal ba las//sogs pa rnams kyi brgyad ni lkog
113b3(rgyud): pa dang //bcas pa'o brgya ni yongasu brtag par bya//de nas sbyong ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po yang //bsrog bye nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu brtag/de nas zhal ras dkar po spyan drangs la//yo byad rnams sam mchod yon
113b4(rgyud): /sogs gsum mchod//phyag ni rdo rje pad+ma zhogs pa bsdoms//rkyen rnams thams cad kyis ni rab brgyan cing //rdzogs par sangs rgyas dbu rgyan can//bsam par bya zhing yang ni bri bar bya//de yi snying
113b5(rgyud): po brgya phrag stong ngam ni//ji srid bye bo'i bar du sbyin bi sreg bya//yang na mtshan ma yang dag byung nA no//de bzhin sdig rgyun spangs por shes par bya//de nas thal por 'gyur ba cho ga bzhin//rdo rje
113b6(rgyud): bsdu bas thal ba rus pa bsdu//rdo rje bdud brtsi'i dri chu dang //ba yi rnam lnga dang bcas la//sbyong ba'i sngags ni 'bum bzlas te/gong bu byas nas gra bur drang //sa dang legs par bsres byas le//
113b7(rgyud): sku gzugs mchod rten lhar bsam zhing //lan gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga 'am//yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad//sngags dang phyag rgyas byin rlabs la//'bum phrag gnyis ni bzlas par/
113b8(rgyud): bya//de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam//yang na sku gzugs zhal 'dzum mam//dri spos dang ldang 'di snang ngamo//lha la sogs pa sna tshogs pa//rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang //me tog la/
114a1(rgyud): nasogs 'dor ba dang //dung dang rnga dang gling bu dang //pi lcang la snod sgra zos 'gyur//gal te lha yi mtshan ma de//sdig mang nyid kyi mu mthong ba//de tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong
114a2(rgyud): zlas//ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du//de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni//mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par byas//de mthar chog shes pa yis//mtshan gcig theg theg mi nyal
114a3(rgyud): bzlas//de nas de yi sdig pa ni//rnam dag bdag nyid nges par mthong //lha yi lus kyis gzugs dang ni//de yoM rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur//mtshan ma 'di dag shes nas//rnam par mi tog/
114a4(rgyud): sems kyis ni//byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis//las rnams thams cad rab tu bya//gal te dri yang med gyur na//de tshe bzlas bsgom tshul gyis bya//de yi ming tsam bris nas//mchod rten
114a5(rgyud): phreng ba bya ba dang //sku gzugs kying ni byas nas su//sbyin sreg dbang bskur byas gyur na/gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye//thal ba nyung kar bye ma sogs//ming spel sngags ni mngon btab
114a6(rgyud): nas//rgya mtshor 'beb pa'i chu klung dor//de ltar byos na sdigs pa can//yin yang ngan song rnams las ni rnam por thar par gyur nas kyang //dge ba mchog sa bon+da ni//bskyed dang ldan
114a7(rgyud): pas sangs rgyas nyid//'bras bu yang dag ldan po yi//sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang //brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rgyu//rab tu bsgoms pa'i bsod nams ldan /
114b1(rgyud): 'jig rten ngan song bcom pa ni//'di ltar wA yang ci zhig smos//'odi la the tshom med pa yin//gang yang dge bu'i rtsa ma bskyed pa dang /gang yang med pa'i lta ba can dang //gang byang chub kyis lam las rnam pa/
114b2(rgyud): 'das pa'i bstan pa la zhe sdang gis gnod pa byed pa dang /sdig pa'i rang bzhin mi shes pa pa dang ma la sogs pa'i rtse ba dang /byang chub kyi sems la mi brten pa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba bsad pa dang /lha dge/
114b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun dang /sngags dang /phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa rnams la med pa nyid du lta ba la sogs pa'i sdig pa can rnams la de lta bu'i shes rab can dang thabs med na grol ba med/
114b4(rgyud): zhes pa/bde bar gshegs pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsung so//de nas brgya byin la sogs pa spyan pad+ma rgyas pa rnams legaso zhes bya bas mnyes par mdzad//mnyes par mdzad nas mchod pa mdzadado//brgya byin pa/
114b5(rgyud): la phan par brtson pas kyang ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhi du byaso//'bras bu de bzhin du thob par 'gyur to//bang ldan du 'drin pa sngon po glang khyu mchog la zhon pa/sku mdog dkar po phyag bzhi pa/g.yas pa'i
114b6(rgyud): dang po dang gnyis pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang mchog sbyin du bcas pa/g.yon pa'i gcig gis rtse gsum pa 'dzin cing gnyis pas ral gri 'dzin pa/sbrul gyis mchod phyir thogs pa can bris te/yo pa
114b7(rgyud): shu pa ti nI la kaN+Tha u ma pri ya swA hA zhes pa 'dis//de nas phyag rgya 'di yin te/lag pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la maze'u chung mthe bong gis mnan te sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo mtshan nyidu byas shing ming med
115a1(rgyud): /dang mdzub mo yang rdo rje'i rnam par cung zad mdung par bya'o//'di ni byugs bdag gi phyag rgya'o//khyab 'jug khyud bzhon pa ma na nag/de byug bani pa/phyag gams bdag na dbyug zadang rdo rje 'dzin
115a2(rgyud): cing g.yon pa dag na drong dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o//gser gyi rdo rje ma khyab 'jug lta bu gser gyi mdog can du shes par bya'o//rdo rje dril bu rma bya l-i zhon pa/dmar po g.yas pa dag na shag ti dang rdo rje
115a3(rgyud): g.yon pa dag na khyim bya dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje gzhon ma rdo rje dril bur shes par bya'o//mi smra ba rdo rje ngang pa la zhon pa/gser mdog can/zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa/bya g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'grang
115a4(rgyud): 'phreng 'dzin cing /g.yon pa dag na duHglu thaM dang /spyi lugs 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje zhi ba mchongs pa lta bur shes par bya'o//rdo rje mtshon cha glang po d+he lpa zhon pa/phyag g.yon pas rang gi rdo rje 'jan cing gAy+Ya
115a5(rgyud): bas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje lnga tshur rdo rje mtshan cha ltar shes pa bya'o//rdo rje 'khyil pa khro ba~M yang shing rta la zhon pa/mdog dmar po g.yas pa dang /g.yon pa ni pad+ma dang /ny+tsi me
115a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje bdud rtsi ma dang rdo rje'i 'khyil pa khri bo lta bu nyid do//rdo 'od zeng khro bo dkar po ngeng pa la zhon pa g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing /g.yon pas pad+ma dang /zla ba 'dzin
115a7(rgyud): pa'o//rdo rje 'od zer ma rdo khro bo lta bu'o//rdo rje dbyug pa khri ba ru sbal la zhon pa mdog sngon po phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin cing /g.yon pas dbyug pa rdo rje mchag ma rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo lta/
115b1(rgyud): //\u0f7f dmangs du ba rlung po nan pal//mdug dum dub phyag gams nA d+ha 'dzin ning /gzhan pas mi brgyang nas za sa gnas pa'o//rdo rje myu rlags mang rje dmar skyer zla ba lta bral//rdo rje chags
115b2(rgyud): bdage slong na glang po chen na btson byug g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing /g.yon pas gi shol 'dzin cing gnas pas/mdog pa///rdo rje 'dus pa ma rdo rje smang sna steng+ge'o//'dri ni khyad par ti gA ni ni/d+yan
115b3(rgyud): yi gyi TI ga ldan pa'o// sa chags kyi kyi dag pa mdo/k+Sha k+Sha/t+yA k+shali ka gA h+Na pa phyagags na 'dzin pa/ga na ngas ma tig gang 'dzin pa'o//rjeg d+hAm
115b4(rgyud): brang ba lta bu'o//'di ni khyad par ti ga nen/phyag g.yon gyis shwakA ti 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje dbang can cang shing non pa/mdag dkar sed byug g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/g.yon pas chu srin gyi rnal
115b5(rgyud): mtshan bsnams pa'o//rdo rje dbang rdo rje dang can lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par//gzhi ni/medag dmar po'o//rnam r+g+hal rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag blo thal ba zhen pa mdog dkar ba'o//phyag g.yas na
115b6(rgyud): 'i nig/gzhan pas rnyil gyi 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje gdas bla ma rnams d+ha la rnga NI m+b+ha dul/rdo rje gdun shing bri nyi mo me tog gi shing te'i khang bu rlon pa mdog smrar si b+hag das
115b7(rgyud): la na na na y-i//rgyu ga nga nyim ts+tsho ngas bri/'ang na/gadzin gyis tsug dzin pa
116a1(rgyud): rlung ga pha ta ma dag lhun por dag zhan pa/phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/g.yon byas dang 'dzin pa'o//mgyogs pa'i rdo rje ma rdo rje rlung gi panyalta bur//rdo rje mI pho nyamar skyes
116a2(rgyud): zhon pa/mdog dmar po gyen du 'bar ba'i 'od rtse gsum pa 'bar ba'i phyag g.yas pa dgen rdo rje dang go cha 'dzin pa/g.yon pa dag na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje ma lta bu'o//
116a3(rgyud): smang ba myu pa sa su nan pa d+hAn na nges pa pa dzi pa sa na sa ldan pa//rdug zhi pa ts+tsha kyid bu ste 'di byed pa// nan/
116a4(rgyud): pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje lcags kyu bran klung lhag pa zhon pa sngon po 'phag gri gdong ba can g.yas pa rdo rje 'dzin pa/g.yon pos lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje nag po bran
116a5(rgyud): mo ro langs kyi zhon pa can/phyag g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa mdog nag mo//rdo rje logs 'dren phran bra ba byi ba non pa/mdog dkar po glang po che'i gdong ba can//
116a6(rgyud): phyag yas dag na rdo rje dang dag ste 'dzin pa/g.yon dag ni rtse gsum dang ni phyug pa 'dzin pa/sbrel gyi mtshad phyir thogs pa'o//rdo rje srul mo bran mo mdog sngon mo//g.yas na rdo rje dzin phra g.yon pa phyags
116a7(rgyud): ma 'dzin pa dra ba phyi'i non par//klu rdo rje'i chu srin zhon pa gdis ka brgyad pa/mdog dkar ba g.yas pos rdo rje 'dzin pa/g.yon pa klu'i zhags pa'o//rdo rje srin ma brin mo chu srin non po maud//
116b1(rgyud): mtshan kaH a bcam cam sasamaman cas mtham/amamamaca thas mamathan Shas na tham tham la mamamatham tham batha ma thab ka ma tsama' ba ma tham ba tham ma thams mamam 'ama'amams yam gas na
116b2(rgyud): da/mo gdongs ka brgyad ma g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa//glu yon pas rdo rjes mtshan+da pa'i chu srin 'dzin pa'o//'jigs mdog ma snang ku g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing 'a yin pas ral gri po Ta ka
116b3(rgyud): pa'o//dpa' mo mdag dkar ser g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing /g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o//byangs can mdog pakar mo//phyuzla gnon pas rba dang g.yas pa sa rdo rje ma'o//dgrod ka mdog ljang ku sa~Mng+ga la/
116b4(rgyud): don pa phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa/g.yon pa dag na lde men dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o//ma mo tha~Md dang /drag po la sogs pa dang /chu bdag gi mthar thug pa rnams kyi dang /gleng byad//
116b5(rgyud): sa rdo rje gsungs pa de ni rdo rje rtse gsum par shes par bya'o//'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la mngon du bltas pa'o//de nas thun mtshams kyis dus
116b6(rgyud): rdo rje ti ri te ris dag par bcings te me tog sngon po'i phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug/yi ge hUM bzhi pa brjod cing rdo rjes rnam par snang mdzad la bskor ba bdun dang /dud dasrim bu'i sgra bsgrag N+DI/
116b7(rgyud): byaro//dkrol 'khor tha~Md kyi yang lhag pa dang chad pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba ri nges par bltas te phreng ba bcom ldan 'das la phul nas rdo rje'i gar byas la blangs te yi ge hUM bzhi pa nyid kyis rang gi
116b8(rgyud): mgo bor bcing ngo //ji ltar cho ga bzhin du yang //gang zhig chad pa yongasu bskang //mkhas pas lhag pa rnam spang phyir//rdo rje dril bu kun tog bya//'grub 'gyur nyes pa spang mi bya
117a1(rgyud): gsungs//de nas 'dug par gyur pa yi//rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas//rdo rje sgo ni ban pa rnams//yis kyi skye bar bya ba nyid//oM badz+ra mA ta d+hA TA ya sa ma yathA
117a2(rgyud): be sha hUM zhes bya'o//phyag rgya yang 'di yin to//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gshibs te//mdzub mo gan rgyal yang dag bzung //legs par drag tu rnam par dbye//smre dbye ba mi chog yin zhes pa'o//
117a3(rgyud): de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams byas la rin po che bdun las byas pa 'am/sa laso byas pa'i bum pa nag po la sogs pa med pa/'gran pa ring ba mchu 'chang ba/lha
117a4(rgyud): ba che ba/lha rdzas kyi dri'i chu dang /rin po che dang /sman thaMd dang /'bru thams cad kyis yongs rdzogs pa/yal 'dab dang ban pa mgrin pa la gos dam pas legs par bcings la byas
117a5(rgyud): pa/phyi rol kun tu lce rdzas kyi dri rje su byugs pa/me tog gi phreng ba brdegs pa'i rdo rje sa steng du mtshan pa/rdo rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa khro bo ta ri ni ti ris yongasu bzung ba'i rnga
117a6(rgyud): dang me tog gi yal 'dab kyis/oM badz+ra ud pa hUM zhes bya ba 'di stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsdigs pa'i yi ge hUM bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas la bcom ldan/
117a7(rgyud): 'das dzaM hUM mdzad kyi spyan sngar legs par bzheg/'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyi rol du bum pa gnyis pa lo yi ge hU~M bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa ban go//do
117b1(rgyud): rgyu'i bdag nyid dang slob ma dang bskur ba bya ste gzug pa b+hag rgya banings nas sa ma macings pa yang//b+hA ru de bzhinas pa sgyum//dung dang dro bzhin nor bu ni//rin chen kun to sa hA dang //N+ya zlog par/
117b2(rgyud): bidzi/sman kun til dang sran me sho/'bras dang gr-i ni lnga pa ste//sman lnga 'bru kun smras mtshon po'o//de'i rjes la phyag bzhi li sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i dzin pa thol du btsug nis rnga
117b3(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi gis sngon po la yang yosu bzlas te//sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis sgo skyong gris gdongs bcings pa rdo rje go chas stod g.yogs dang //gtsug tor la sogs pa can gyi sgrob
117b4(rgyud): dben gyis khro bo ti rin ti ris me tog sngon po'i phreng ba bzung nas//oM badz+ra sa ma ya mo pra be shA mI zhes brjod cing zhugs la de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md la gsol ba gdab ste/bcos
117b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba la sogs paso//de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs nas bdag nyid 'jug par byas la/phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por der la rang rang gi mgo la bcings te/gdong bcings pa dkrol
117b6(rgyud): la//ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor la bltas te/tiSh+Tha badz+ra zhes pa la sogs pas gzhugs pa'i phyag rgya dgrol ba yang byas chu'i dbang bskur ba dang /sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang /
117b7(rgyud): dang sbyangs dang /rdo dang /phreng ba dang /bdag pa la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dgu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas bladra pa de kho na nyid dang /chos
118a1(rgyud): dang /dam tshig dang /das grub dang rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang bzung la me tog la sogs pas kyang bdag nyid legs par mchod de tshig su bcad pa lnga phra rje su gnang ba dang
118a2(rgyud): yi ge hUM gi gzengs bstod pa dang /lung bstan pa yang smes la slar yang byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pa yang ste hUM kA re badz+ra hUM zhes pa'o//
118a3(rgyud): /rang gi mtshan brjod par bya yis rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing la de'i sngags a'i rnam pa'i mtha' can rnam snang mdzad kyi gan su de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i bdag nyid da po/dz+reH
118a4(rgyud): haM zhes bya ba yis rdo rje'i nga rgyal rnam par bsgoms la de rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms te/badz+ra d+ha tu a haM zhes pa'o//dI ltar rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la byang gi
118a5(rgyud): /sgor de'i sngags a'i rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rdo rje rdo rje dril bu bdag nyid dbab pa'o//badz+re g+hAN+Do&haM zhes pa'i nga rgyal bskyed la dai badz+ra A be sha kro d+heHhi gis sgomo//da lta dus ni rjes sgyus
118a6(rgyud): pa yino//de nas yang rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa'i rdo rje lcags kyus bcings la se gol legs par gtog pa byed code sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par bya ste//oM.i badz+ra se mA dzi
118a7(rgyud): dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu brjod//de nas myur du phyag rgya chen po dang /rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig brjod //de ma thag tu mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa mchog/de nas rdo rje
118b1(rgyud): kyu la sogs pa'i rang nas spyan drangs la bcug ste bcis nas dbang du byas la ji lta ba bzhin du byas la ji lta ba bzhin du yi ge hU~M bzhi pas mchod yon phul te dpal rnam par snang ma
118b2(rgyud): la sogs pa'i dam chog phyag rgyu rnams dang /bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa rnams bsgrubs te rang gi sngags brjod pa ji lta bur brjod cing dzAHhUM baM hoHsa ma yA s+t+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM a
118b3(rgyud): de nas rang gi sngags brjod do//de lta bus 'grub par 'gyuraro//de nas dam tshig phyag rgya rnams dbyung ste/rdo rje las gsad dam pa byung //dam tshig mchog rnams nyid du grags//khro ba'o/
118b4(rgyud): bcing pa blang med pa//de rnams bcung par rab bshad bya//lag par rdo rje kun tu bsil//mthe chung lcags kyu bcing pa nyid//mdzub mo dag ni rab tu brkyang //'jig rten gsum po
118b5(rgyud): rnams rgyale zhes//de bzhin mdzub mo kha spyad cing //nor bu nyid ni bar ma bskums//bsnyams la dbu ma pad+ma nyid//gung mo mdzub mo gnyis bsdig mjug/ sdig mdzub gni ni rdo rje yang //ga
118b6(rgyud): pa bkug pa lcags kyu'o//de dag nyid sbyar yi ge hUM//legs pa'i rnam pa de bzhi ni yang //mdzub gnyis legs gnas khro gnyer du//snying kar nyi ma mdzub gnyis zlum/
118b7(rgyud): leg pa mgo bor rab tu brkyang //mdzub mo kha ru dgod pa can//mdzub mo sen mo kun tu rig/g.yas pa mdzod kyi khu tshur yang //gung mo'i mgo bcas 'khor la nyid//khaM lnga
119a1(rgyud): su mchog rten du la//mdzung mo dbum rdo rje yong //darngub ma 'an pa bskor ba dang //mdzub mo lkog ma mcho //rdo rje rlur mtho bong bsdums//sgrog pong du//
119a2(rgyud): brnams ni rdo rje dbyi su bshad pa bzhin du bya ba 'di ltar te/rdo rje bsdams bya bcings nas//snying khar yang na mthe bo nga snyam//legs par rang rgyad phreng ba ma//thub mo sbyar mchog kha nas dbyung //8 /

119a4(rgyud): nime bu //mthe marje me snrel bab cing //rdo rje chu mchog snam nyid rnas pa'o/nga po'i dkyil la ba la rdo rje rje lnga parnam par bsams me hUM gi rnam pa nyid rjod cing phyun tu tshad

119a6(rgyud): ba rnams kyi sngags rnams 'byung ste//oM badz+ra b+h+ri ku Ti kro d+ha A no ya sarba rat+na nI d+hIHhU~M phaT/oM badz+raM Sh+T+r-iHSh+Ti krod+ha duSh+Tam+bA ra ya hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra bi shwa kro d+haM ku ru sarba bi sh+lo ru pa yA bi d+ha ya hUM

119b2(rgyud): kha~M n+da bzhin lce la rdo rje bkro de rim pa bzhin du sangs rgyas rdo rje 'tshong lA sogs bu'i chos kyai yI gai rnams dkod//de rnams kyang hUM yaM gi sangs rgyas rdo rje can//trAM yig rdo rje'i snying po yi//hriHyi ge rnam pa/

119b5(rgyud): hUM/dri bzang mchog la hUM/a bi hI dze hUM/a hI hUM hUM hUM/he s+pho Ta baM hUM g+haN+Ta ya yaHhUM/rdo sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi'o//de ma thag tu a'i yi ge las/
119b6(rgyud): snying khar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed pa las kyi phyag rgya bcing //de la khro bo'i khu tshur rnam pa gnyis byas la g.yon pa'i rdo rje sen mo g.yas pa gzung zhing sgreng ba byang chub mchog zhes bya ba'i phyag

120a1(rgyud): kyi'o//lcags kyu 'dzin par yang dgu gnas//mnga' gsor ba yi sbyor ba dang /leg so zhes bya snying kar gnas//rdo rje gnyis nyid dbang bskur ba//rin chen d+hu mdzad dang /rdo rje
120a2(rgyud): khro gnyer dang /khro bo dang /rin chen rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o//snying kar nyi ma rab tu dralta/gauyon gnas lag dur dbyug pa dang //de bzhin 'di ni yongasu bzlog/g.yas dang ga mas min rnam par bsnol/

120a5(rgyud): pi'i rab sbyor bso//bris pa g.yos pas 'dud par bye//phreng ba bcings te kha nas dbyung //ger las spyi bor thal mo sbya re//'og tu 'phyang dang gyen du 'thor//mthe bo mnyams te nges pa
120a6(rgyud): gshig/dri byug pa yi sbyor ba las//mchod pa'i phyog rgya rab tu grags//mdzum mo lcags kyu bcings pa yis//mtha chung las ni lcogs kyu che//'khrig ma mdud pa mchog dag/
120a7(rgyud): bsnol//rgyab dag kyang no nges par gshibs//zho sgo skyeng rnams kyi phyag rgya'o//las kyi phyag rgya tha~Md kyang gar las 'byung ba yino//de nas rnam par snang mdzad le sogs pa rnams kyi ba
120b1(rgyud): par bya'o//rdo rje sems dang /rin chen dang /chos dang /las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi yang ste rdo rje dang po dang /mthar gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po gangad kyi phyag
120b2(rgyud): rgya gang dang gang yin pa rnams bcing //thams cad kyi phyag rgya dam tshig phyag brgya yang yin te/g.yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gan rkyal du byas la lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong dag dang
120b3(rgyud): mthe chung nas brtsams te kha phye ba'i thal mo kha sbyar po'o//'di ni byams pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//de rnams kyis rigs pa ni sngar bshad pa nyid/de rnams kyi rig pa ljags rnams la 'godado//'di ni nga rnas
120b4(rgyud): kyekyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o//yi gau A las rang gi thugs khar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la de rnams 'dri ba'i phyir rje su 'brangs nas phyag rgya chen po bcings pa ni las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyuraro//rang gi thugs khar rdo rje/
120b5(rgyud): rtse lnga pa bosems la bI bya'i rjesu 'brangs pa nyid lus de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bci //de nyid kyis yang rig pa'i thun mong pa'o//mthe'u chung dang mthe bong bcings nas kyang g.yon pa'i sor
120b6(rgyud): mo dbus ma gsum po rtsi gsum pa la dbus ma rtse mo yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu bzung zhing rdo rje'i rigs pa mchog 'di ni rdo rje'i dpal zhes grugaso//de nas gzha ni rab bshad bya//sgyu ma rdo so DA ming

121a1(rgyud): rigs na thams da s+ho//lcug r+b+ha rnams ni dru ko par bya//mdun dang rgyub gnas ra tu byung //mtho dong rgyun po 'dzin pa zlos//a ma pa gnas/
121a2(rgyud): kyis rab tu gnas//rig pa'i rgyal po 'am byug rgya chen rje'i tshigaso//lag pa'i mngon nyid rab tu brkyang //lag pa'i mdun yang de bzhin du//sdug pa gnyis kyang khu tshur gnas//kha las yongasu
121a3(rgyud): nyid//rdo rje khro ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogaso//g.yin pa'i mthe bo legs gnas kyang //phreng ba 'dzin po nges rgyal nyid//g.yas pas nar ni sbyin pa dang //ram gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur son//tshogs
121a4(rgyud): dag po chen po'i phyog N+DI'i tshogs//g.yas pa gshol ni gzung ba dang //de bzhin lag pa rab tu brkyang //g.yas pa 'bar ba kun tu ston//rdo rje khu tshur rag tu 'dod//pho nye chen por phyag rgya
121a5(rgyud): tshog so//snyems pocas kha dang mche ba rtse//byugs pas 'joms pa rab tu sbyor//lag pa bskum po sbyar ba dang //rdo rje ga yas pa 'phrag ma'o//blon gyi phyag rgya'i tshig so//de nas oM ma la sa
121a6(rgyud): ba mtsho'i tshogs kyi phyag rngu 'byung ste//g.yon pa rdo rje bsdams pa yis//hUM gr-I sum mtshan mi dacing por bya'o//'di cings pa yis yang dag pa'i//ngos grub rig pa mchi kA /

121b6(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par sring mdzad dang //bsgral pa bzang po pa dang phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs rnams la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ma dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad la sogs sangs rgyas lnga'i con pon dang /phreng ba dang

122a1(rgyud): la sogs pa'i stegaso brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa rnams phye'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dgong par bya'o//dum pa gang ba rnams dang /gos zung 'bum dang /stong phrag bcu dang /stang dang /
122a2(rgyud): brgya'am/re re la re re 'am/thun mong pa 'am/rnam pa sna tshog pa'i bla re dang /zur bzhir rnam par bkra ba'i bden bcings pa'i gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan rnams kyang yi ge oM dang /dpal rje
122a3(rgyud): hUM mdzad yongasu bzlas la/badz+re s+pha ra Na khi zhes pa'i dis lce za de la nges par dbul//me tog gi shing brgya dang /bzhi 'am ljon shing rnams dang /me tog thaMngad la rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang /oM badz+re

122a5(rgyud): rgya dang bcas pa yiso//ga bur dang a ga ru dang /du ru ka dang /tsan dan la sogs pa la legs par bsres la/de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang /oM badz+ra d+hU pi hUM zhes pa 'dis bdug pa'i phyag rgya dang bcos

123a5(rgyud): a ka ro mu khaM zhes pa la sogs bzlas nas shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te/gsum gsum tor bar byas te dri dang /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /mar me dang /mchod

123b1(rgyud): g.yas brkyang gi gom+ba pas 'dug rdzing lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje bstan lnga/g.yas pa dku'i phyogasu bzhag ste//g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang //de'i mdzub mo lcags kyu/

123b3(rgyud): de'i sngags ni//na mo badz+ra s+ya di shi di shri badz+ra pA Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA//me'i phyogasu blta sa te lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum po'i rnam par bkug ste/gung mo sgreng pa'i tshigs gsum par ba
123b4(rgyud): la mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag pa ni me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o//spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong mdzub mo'i gzhogs la bstan pa ni mi lho'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya
123b5(rgyud): nyid lag pa'i dbusu mngon du phyogs te gcig tu sbyar bi ni gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o//de'i sngags na ag+na ye hi sau hi pI la dz+wa la thA la ha ha shi khi ti laM bi rU pAk+Sha smr-i hA/
123b6(rgyud): gshin rjer bltas te lag pa mdun du phyogs par byos la nang du rdo rje bsdums pI'o dbusu mthe bong gnyis dang phyi ru ming med gnye spyir zhing sgreng ste slar nang du bzung ba ni gi shin rje
123b7(rgyud): spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya'o//srin lag gnyis yang phyi rol du gzhabs te sgreng ba'i snying khor bzung ba ni dam tshig phyag rgya'o//de nyid las srin lag sbyar ba ni gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag/
124a1(rgyud): rgya'o//de'i sngags ni ya mA ya swAhA//bden bral du bltas te ma hAmA pa'i gom pas 'dug la lag pa glayas pa'i khu tshur bcas pa mdzub mo dang gung mo
124a2(rgyud): bkun ste bzung zhing gri'i rnam par bzhag la lag pa g.yon pa skye bzur phyogasu g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug nas bzhag pa ni bden bral spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya de nyid
124a3(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa sta zur phyogasu gnas par ral gri'i phyag rgya ni bden bral gyi dam tshig phyag rgya'o//spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang pa ni gau shogasu gsol ba'i phyag
124a4(rgyud): rgyurgya'o//de'i sngags nI saMrba b+hU ta pA yaM ku ru ku ru swA hA//tshu'i lha'i phyogasu mnyam pa'i gom pos 'dug la lag po g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs nA sa mthe bong dang mdzub mau gtsa
124a5(rgyud): tu sbyar te g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying khar bzhig la g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni chu ba dag spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya du nyid g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khru
124a6(rgyud): tshur lo sbyar te bzung ba zhags pa'i phyag rgya chu bdag gi dam tshig phyag rgya'o//spyan drang po'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang bi no gshogasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o//de'i sngags ni dwa tra
124a7(rgyud): suT tri tr-i shi Shi ti li bi ru pA kA swA hA//rlung lha'i phyogasu bltas te 'dug pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs te gung mo sgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par mdzub mo bkug pa'i rtse mo btsugs la mngon
124b1(rgyud): du phyogs te brkya ngo //lags gluyas pa yang de bzhin du byas te lta zur logasu bzhag cing mthe bos bskul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid mthe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni
124b2(rgyud): rlung lha'o dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o//sngags nau IM swA sa khA kha khu kha swA hA//ku be ra la
124b3(rgyud): mingon du bltas te 'dug nus lag po gnyis kha sbyor la rdo rje bcing ba nang du byas la mthe chung gnyis gshibs te brkyang //de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyi so sor bzhag nas gung mo dag sbreng ba
124b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i mdud pa bya ba ni ku bai ra spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya de nyid kyi grong mo granyi sgyu nang du rdo rje gung mo bcing ba'i sbyor bas bzhag pa ni ku be ra'i dam tshig 'i phyag rgya'o//spyan drang po'i phyag
124b5(rgyud): rgya las gung me gnyis brkyang bi ni gsheg su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o//de'i sngags ni oM ku be rA ya swA hA/dbang ldan gyi phyogs bltas te 'dug la lag pa dag gcig tu sbyor te thal
124b6(rgyud): mau sbyar ba bya ste/srin lag dang mthe'u chung lag 'thil du rdo rje bcing ba byas te/mthe bo zung dag gzhan la baN+Din cing nad du kug ste bsnol la/gung mo ga shi bi smr-i two s+yA

131a1(rgyud): /bya ny-id kyis 'bab par ma gyur na de'i tshe sdigs pa bral ba'i phyag rgyas de'i sdig pa rnams yang dang yang du bral bar bya'o//yam shing 'dzag ma rnams kyis ma//8

131a3(rgyud): dang /leg pa g.yas pa'i 'thil du til nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la/yi grwa hU~M dbu po bsams te/mdzub mo dang mthe bong dag gis sbyin bsreg bya'o//
131a4(rgyud): de nas sbyin sreg gi thab khung las 'byung ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje rnams kyis de'i lus la sdig pa sreg bzhin par bsams la de nas yang rdo rje babos pa de

131a7(rgyud): khu tshur dang de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dral bar bya'o//de phebs na rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo'i phyag rgya btsong bar bya'o//de'i che slob dpon gyis rdo rje khu
131b1(rgyud): tshur khro bo'i phyag rgyas bcing bar bya'o//de bzhin du ji srid du gyur na de'i tshe rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya bci //de tshe rdo chos bya blo phyag rgyub ci //de lta bus te bla blon cing dgangs par 'gyuro//de nas de'i lhang
131b2(rgyud): bsam+ba te bri ho badz+ra zhes pa brjod do//de nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur//de nas phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor te/pri tIn+tu hoHzhes bya'o//de nas gang du babs pa de 'dis 'gyur//
131b3(rgyud): bo/de nas oM pra ti grih+na tAM i maM sa tAM ma ha ba la zhes bya ba bas phreng ba de nyid kyi mgo bor ba cingango //de nas oM de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang //khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson//rdo rje'i
131b4(rgyud): mig ni bla na med//thams cad mig ni bye bar 'gyur//he badz+ra pa sh+ya zhes pa 'dis gdong g.yogs dgolo//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje lcags kyu nAs brtsams te ji srid rnam

138a1(rgyud): chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i grwanaso//zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub
138a2(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas//gti mug rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso//nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems
138a3(rgyud): dpa'i gnaso//mi khom pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas//yid sim pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub//
138a4(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnaso//snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso//lus rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byed
138a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i gnas//ngag rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lhor byang chub sems dpa'i gnas//yid rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub
138a6(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnaso//gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas//sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byed

138b2(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ste/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi

138b4(rgyud): gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba ston pa rdzi ba med pa/'khor lo sgyur ba'i snying pos dka' stsal pa/b+hu/'dzum dpal gang la las chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bsdus pa shes rab
138b5(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cig tsam yang thos na de'i byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad chod pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib
138b6(rgyud): pa dang /las kyi sgrib pa chen pa thams cad nye bar bsags kyang na mau kyang dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song rnamasu skye bar mi 'gyuraro//gzhan yang sdig pa rnams byas na yang sdug sngal
138b7(rgyud): med cing zad par 'gyuraro//gang gis 'di 'chang ba dang /nya ma re re 'don pa dang /ston pa dang /rgyun ma chad par yid la byed pa de ni skye ba 'di nyid la chos thams cad mnyam pa

139a2(rgyud): chen pa skye babacu drug na/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyuraro//hUM/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad
139a3(rgyud): kyis slar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par sgrub pa 'di ston par mdzad//rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon
139a4(rgyud): par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po rdo rje lta bur sre ba dang /don gcig pa nyid kyis don mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang /rang bzhin rnam par dag
139a5(rgyud): pas chos nyid mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang /rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par mi dog pa nyid kyis las tha~Md mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub

139b3(rgyud): spro ba mang ba'i phyir/ sdang gi spros pa med pa'o//gau ti mu gi spros pa med pa'i phyir/gti mugi spros pa med pa'o//chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir/chos thang spros pa med pa'o//
