152a1(rgyud): sgra dang /dri dang /radang ngag dang /dadugs dang /rtul mtshon dang /bdun dang /dung dang /rdzu rti dang /rnga bo che dang /dung la sogs pa dang /gar dang /klu rnams kyis legs/
152a2(rgyud): par mchod nas cod pan lnga'i dbang bskur te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi go 'phang la rab tu bzhag pa rigs dang rje su 'thun pa'i ming du byas nas sngags
152a3(rgyud): 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya ste/oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+raSh+NI Sha oM b+hi Shiny+tsa oM badz+ra satwa ya b+h+r-i Shiny+tsa/oM badz+ra rat+na a d+hi Shiny+tsa/oM badz+ra pad+ma A b+hi Shiny+tsa/oM badz+ra badz+ra oM b+hi Shiny+tsa/
152a4(rgyud): po dang /dpral ba dang /mgrin pa dang /snying kha dang /lte ba dang /rked pa nas rje ngar gyi bar du/yi ge'i phyag rgya bkod la/rang gi lha'i gzugs kyis sbyor bas byin gyis badz+ra/
152a5(rgyud): par bya'o//de nas rdo rje'i tshig rnams brlab par byas te/de la rdo rje'i gnas tshigs rnams ni 'di dag ste/rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i gan
152a6(rgyud): te/rdo rje'i gnas 'das lta ba'i thibs po thams cad nges par 'joms par 'gyur ro//ma rig pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi rig pa la 'jug pa ste/rdo rje'i gnas 'dis dmigs pa'i
152a7(rgyud): dngos po yong su shes pa la 'jug par 'gyuraro//hUM/mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir mtshams med pa'i mtha' rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba thams cad du gyur pa'i sems nges par
152b1(rgyud): rigs par 'gyuro//oM 'dod chags kyi mthu zhi ba'i phyir 'dod chags dathA ma dunaganas 'ad chu glung dang prA h+ma d+hArmA/d+mo nga des marba na dA b+h+yor byungs pa
152b2(rgyud): mtha'i rdo rje'i gnas te/rdo rje'i gnas 'dis skyon thaMd kun tu 'dral bar 'gyuraro//mAM/gti mug mtha' zhi ba'i phyir shes rab kyi sgron mo rdo rje'i mtha' ste/rdo rje'i mtho'o 'dis mun
152b3(rgyud): pa bsal bar byed par 'gyuraro//raM/sems can thams rjes ni gcig pa ste/rdo rje'i gnas 'ongs sems can mnyam pa nyid la 'jug de'i don dang sems can gyi rang bzhin
152b4(rgyud): pa'i don du 'gyur ro//hri/sems can thaMd sems can gcig pa ste/rdo'i gnas 'dis sems can nges pa la 'jug pa'i don dang /sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba
152b5(rgyud): mngon par rtog pa'i don du 'gyuraro//A/sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa ste/rdo rje'i gnas 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi rje su 'jug pa'i don dang /mnyam
152b6(rgyud): pa nyid kyi ye shes rje su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyuraro//oMd chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rdo rje'i gnas 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rje su rtogs par 'jug ste
152b7(rgyud): don dang /rdo rje lnga bu'i ting 'dzin rjes TIg pa'i don du 'gyur//e/bdud kyi las tham cad sangs rgyas kyi chos te/gnas 'dis las thams cad rjesu
153a1(rgyud): pa la 'jug pa'i don dang /las thams cad las yong su 'das pa'i don du 'gyur//hUM/ngag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung te/rdo rje'i gnas
153a2(rgyud): 'dis sgra ji bzhin pa thaMd rje su rtogs par 'jug pa'i don dang /brjod pa las 'das pa'i chos rje su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro//baM/chos thams cad ma skyes pa ste//rdo rje'i gnas
153a3(rgyud): 'dis 'chi 'pho med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang /skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba'i lam las 'da' ba'i don du 'gyur ro//maM/chos thams cad ma byung ba ste/rdo rje'i
153a4(rgyud): gnas 'dis 'gog pa med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang /chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i don du 'gyuraro//khaM/'di la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa//bdag gi de nyid rab
153a5(rgyud): rtog te/bdag gis de nyid rab brtags nas/sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur//de la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang /phun sum tshogs pa thams
153a6(rgyud): cad dang /gter thams cad dang /'khor lo thams cad dang /ji thams cad dang /rol gri dang /yid bzhi nor bu dang /dngul chu dang /bcud len rnams dang /gyen
153a7(rgyud): du 'gro ba dang /rkang 'og dang /mi snang ba dang /rig pa 'dzin pa dang /'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dang /brgya byin nyid dang /tshangs pa dang /khyab 'jug dang /dbang
153b1(rgyud): phyug chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams des myur du 'grub par 'gyur/hUM/yang ni rno gcig gyur pa yi//sangs rgyas rjes dran bsgoms nas ni/nyi ma'i dkyil
153b2(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas sku gzugs bsgoms par bya//sbyor ba de ya~M bka' drin gyis//sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
153b3(rgyud): dbus gnas par//'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab gsal ba'i//kun tu bzang po phyag rgya che//legs par mnyam par gzhig pas sgom//lo ni phyed kyi sbyor ba yis/kun
153b4(rgyud): tu bzang po 'dra bar 'gyur//rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che//legs par mnyam par gzhag par sgom//rgyal po'i dbang bskur nyid dam ni/yang na dbang phyug thob par 'gyur//
153b5(rgyud): rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che//de na rang gis brtan por sgom//'jig rten kun gyis dbang phyug kyang /thob na dngos grub gzhan ci smos//rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya gang //de bzhin nyid kyi 'od
153b6(rgyud): gsol ba//rdo rje'i sbyor bas de bsgoms pas/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor brtan por 'gyur//de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems kyi mchog sgom pa phyag rgya chen po'i yis nyid yin//
153b7(rgyud): 'khor lo sgyur ba'i phyag rgya che//legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom//phyag rgya kun gyi bdag nyid kyis/dam pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur//gzi brjid dra ba phyag rgya
154a1(rgyud): che/dam pa'i don du sgom par bya//bsrung ba'i rgyal po thob 'gyur na/dos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smros//gdugs dkar gnag tor chen po ni//dAm b+hA/
154a2(rgyud): don du bsgom par bya//gtsug tor ye shes thob 'gyur na//dngos grub gzhan la ci zhig smos//rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che//de ni yang dang yang du sgom//chos kyi rgyal
154a3(rgyud): po rnam rgyal nyid//mdor bsdu ba ni thob par 'gyur//rnal rgyal gtsug ter phyag rgya yi/dam pa'i yi ge bsgom par bya//legs par rab gnas 'od zer can//
154a4(rgyud): dngos grub yo shes thob par 'gyur//de la sogs pa mtha' ya mchog/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//gtsug tor rnams kyi legs bshad pa//phyag rgya de
154a5(rgyud): rnams bdag nyid mchog/de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na//lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid//thog ma tha ma med zhi ba//rang byung mchog tu mi 'gyur ba//sangs
154a6(rgyud): rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//rnal 'byor dbang phyug 'phang mchog/sangs rgyas yis dri mu med//bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams
154a7(rgyud): cad kyi sa tsug tor gyi dam tshig yis/phyag rgya rnam so//da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thong rgya chos kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes de la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni
154b1(rgyud): rnam pa du rjod par d+har chos thams cad kyi sgor shes par bya'o//a zhes bya ba na chos zad ma skyes pa'i phyur ban+d+ha sa cad kyi skong ba shad par bya'o//oM m+b+ha yA ya maHpa nos byang chu /
154b2(rgyud): b+h+yo den dmo par rlom thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs rtogs par bas+t+ra baur+yA b+h+yo'o//oM pa nA zhes bya ba ni tshe sna thams rgyud kyi rlung dang /gzugs dang /shes
154b3(rgyud): rab dang chos dang bcas pa yong pu shes pa'i dpung du 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do//oM ni/dA zhes bya ba ni 'du gro ba dang /zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed
154b4(rgyud): ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor brjod do//yo da/sa zhes bye ba ni thogs pa med pa las yang dag pa dang shing yong su nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par spong ba dang /zlog pa dang bcom
154b5(rgyud): dang /zag pa med pa'i sgo nas phung po dang /kham+b+has dang /skye mched la sogs pa don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas te mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag//
154b6(rgyud): oM sU/ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi rjesu 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par lta'o//oM tAM/ka zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam
154b7(rgyud): smin pa rnam por 'grod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gas yo bar bya'o//mi sa/ma nos bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid dran po med cing skye dang shes rab rno ba las byung ba'i phyir//cho
155a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bshad//oM ma/gA zhes bya ba ni zab mo la spyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sbyor ba lta bar bya'o//au ga/rdo zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang /rga ba dang 'tsho ba
155a2(rgyud): las yongasu rgal ba'i rang bzhin mi phyed pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgor po lta bar bya'o//oM dza~M/d+ha zhes bya ba ni mi spyi dbyi su mi phyed pa'i rdo rje yangasu rdzogs pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgor
155a3(rgyud): blta bar bya'o//oM d+haMHsha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongasu rdzogs pa'i phyir chos tha~Md kyi sgor blta bar bya'o//oM shaM/Sha zhes bya ba ni gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pa na mkha' ltar gsal zhing chos
155a4(rgyud): thams cad rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhago/oM ShaM/k+Sha zhes bya ba ni g.yo ba med pas mi bzad pa'i yis so sor dmigs te chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar
155a5(rgyud): bya'o//oM k+ShaM napa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i yis kyi'ang yul ma yin pa'i phyir/chos tham+bun kyi sgor blta bar bya'o//oM ngi tha zhes bya ba ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhA
155a6(rgyud): /pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyong byi chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o//oM thaM& D+hi zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa tha~Md rab tu spangs pas/zad pa'i ye shes mi skye zhing mthar thug pa'i yis dris
155a7(rgyud): nga'i phyir chos tha~Md kye sgor ba shod//oM D+haM/dz+nyA zhes bya ba ni myur du 'chi ba med pa rje su dmigs pa med pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o//oM d+h+r-i ko zhes bya ba ni lus rnam par spyod pa
155b1(rgyud): ni 'dod chags dang bral bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te rdo rje snying po'i luso sor thod par phyir/thams cad kyi skor blta bar bya'o//oM dum+b+ha zhes bya ba nas nas rnam par spyod pa na nyes pa da rmos par
155b2(rgyud): bag la nyal ba rab tu spangs nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed po rang bzhin gyis 'odra gsal ba'i phyir chos tha~Md kyi sgor blta bar bya'o//oM aM/ba zhes bya ba ni ngag rnam par spyod pa ni ngag gi spros pa chos kyi dbyings nir
155b3(rgyud): dag pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o//e go tsha zhes bya ba ni grib ma ma dmag shing rang bzhin gyis dong ba'i phyir chos tha~Md kyi sgor blta bar bya'o//oM tshaM/g+ha zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'dus pa
155b4(rgyud): ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyisu med par gyur pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o//oM g+haM/Ta zhes bya ba ni ca co dang bral ba'i rdo rje snying po 'dzin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor
155b5(rgyud): bshad//oM TaM/pha zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dbu ba gongs pa lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i yai sau gsal phyir chos tha~Md kyi sgor bshad //oM phaMr De zhes bya ba ni ngag chen po lha grol ba'i na mkha' lha
155b6(rgyud): 'gro ba grub paso sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o//oM DaM/Sha zhes bya ba ni tshe sgo mau dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o//oM ShaM/u zhes bya ba ni chos thag
155b7(rgyud): nye bar zhi ba'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhago/oM AM/ya zhes bya ba ni rkyen tu byed pa ni nges par 'byung ba'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la nye bar gnos pa'i phyir
156a1(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi skar blta bar bya'o//oM yo tu zhes bya ban sngon nyid na smras pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi bar rnam par dan na/ma N+Da
156a2(rgyud): hratrazhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i chos rnam par gral ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgor ba sha//au hUM/hrIM zhes bya ba ni yongasu bzung ba med pa ni 'thab pa
156a3(rgyud): dAdang rjod pa spangs pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgo ro blta bar bya'o//oM hriHkun nas nyon mongs pa med pa na mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir/chos
156a4(rgyud): kyi sgrar blta bar bya'o//oM ka kha ga g+ha nga /rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid bzung po'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gan so//e tsa tshA dze dz+hi nya//snang ba ni gsal bring 'bar
156a5(rgyud): ba'i phyir/cho sau thaMd kyi sgo'o//oM Ta TA DA D+ha Na/sgom pa ni chos thams cad gnyisu mi gonas pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//au ta tha da d+ha naM/gzhi med pa ni chos thad
156a6(rgyud): ma 'dres pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go//oM pa pha ba b+h+ra ma/byang chub ni chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir chos tha~Md kyi sgor blta bar bya'o//oM ya ra la tha/
156a7(rgyud): mya ngan las 'das pa'i ni blo bur pa thams cad nges par dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang chos kyi dbyings so sor thob cing mngon por shes pa lnga dang yis mkhyen pas sangs rgyas
156b1(rgyud): kyis yongasu thob pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi skor blta bar bya'o//oM sha Sha sa ha/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa tha~Md mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa
156b2(rgyud): rnam par nges pa'o//de nas rog pa thams cad kyi gas ngo'i cho ga rgyas par gyur pa ni//sngon bzhin nges par byas nas ni//phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgoms nas//ri rangab chen po gru bzhi pa/rin che//
156b3(rgyud): kun gyis rnam par rgyan//de yi steng du rdo tsha/de yi steng du pad+ma bzhag/'dab ma rgyad pa cher bkra ba//rnal 'byor ston zhes rnam par bshad/sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag rgya che//'od zer gsal ba'i//
156b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor can//dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/yongasu rdzogs par bdag nyid kyis//rnal 'byor thams cad bsgom par bya//mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs//sangs rgya
156b5(rgyud): kun bdag bsgoms nas ni//bskal mthar yang ni dag nas 'gyur//b+ha ga chen po rnal 'byor che//rnal 'byor gnas mi bzad pa//sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgoms nas ni//sangs rgyas kun dang mA
156b6(rgyud): par 'gyur//khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che//san kun la thams cad du//gang tshe rnal 'byor pos bsgoms nas//de tshe dngos grub lag na gnas//rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ches//gdong
156b7(rgyud): nas dag cing ma 'dres pa//gang tshe yis mthong ba ni//de yi tshe ni dag par 'gyur//sangs rgyas thaMd mad+mo bsdus pa//sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis//gang tshe rnal 'byor pa sgoms na/sna tshogs las ni byed par
157a1(rgyud): 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//byag rgya chen po ye sheso//'khor lo bsgyur ba rgyal po che//kun mtshogs yi dang phyu/ni//rdo rje sbyor bas bsgobs nas ni//mnyam
157a2(rgyud): 'khor lo bsgyur la mtshungs//bzi brjid phreng ba phyag rgya che//lag par mnyam par gzhag pa posgoms//'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs shing mdzes/pad+ma rA ga mtshung ba mi 'od//rdo rje'i sbyor//
157a3(rgyud): bas bsgoms nas ni//rang bzhin gzi brjid 'phreng bar 'gyur//bdugs dkar rgyal TIg tsug tor gyis phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni//'od zer gsal ba'i sbyor ba yis//son
157a4(rgyud): dag pa nyid du 'gyur//rnam par gsal ba'i gtsug tor rgya//ral gri 'bar ba'i 'od kyis 'khrugs//zag pan+de l+le sbyor ba yis//mnyam med gsal ba'i gtsug tor mtshungs//
157a5(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bcug tor phyag rgya che//legs par mahe rang gzhag pas sgom//rgyal ba'i gtsug trong sbyor ba yis//de yi rnam pa'i spyod yul 'gyur//rdo rje dam tshig ye shes che/2
157a6(rgyud): par mnyam par gzhog pos sgom//kun tu bzang po dam pa'i gzugs//mnyam med rdo rje som+ba dpa ma chud/zla blo dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa//rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa'
157a7(rgyud): che//byang chub sems dang mtshungs pa'i 'o//gtsug tor lnga ldan stobs po che//rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom pa yis//rdo sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur//rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya che//
157b1(rgyud): de yi don du bsgom nus ni//'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed na//skye bo gzhan /smos kyi dgos//rdo chags pa'i phyag rgya che//legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom//skye dgu thams cad chags 'gyur na//
157b2(rgyud): bud med bzhin ste smos ci dgos//rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya tsho//dam pa'i don du bsgoms par bya//legaso ba nr-i rab gsol bas//bud med thang tshim par byed//byang chub sems kyi phyag rgya'i ye
157b3(rgyud): rdorje rin ched phyag rgya che/'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od//dpral ba'i phyogasu gnas pa bsgom//de yid thod dbang bskur thob//rje gzi brjid phyag rgyatsho/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'o/
157b4(rgyud): 'od//snying khor gnas pa bsgom par bya//kun mkhyen ye she ster bar byed//rin chen te gi phyag rgya che/legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom//sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa mchog/sgrub po ngan/
157b5(rgyud): pas rdzogs par byed//rdo rje bshad pas phyag rgya che//legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom//rdo rje bzhad pa ltar gyur te//de ni skye dgu dga' byeng 'gyur//dpyod bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i ye
157b6(rgyud): sheso//pad+ma yi ni pad+ma rje//dge ba'i chos na mnyam gzhag pas//dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya//mnyam med rje rje chos dang chungs//shes rab yis rdo rje rdo//bsgoms pas de ni rdo'i cheng //shos rab byas/
157b7(rgyud): byin dag pa//stong nyid sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni//dam pa'i don du bsgom bye ste/mnyam med 'jam dbyangs dang ni mchung //rdo rje rgyu yi phyag rgya che/legs par mnyam par gzhag bsgo
158a1(rgyud): nas rdzas kyi 'khor lo kun mchog na//mdor bsdus nas ni de y-i banar//rdo rje smra ba'i phyag //dam pa'angan du bsgoms nas ni//rdo rje bzlas pa'i nub pa yis//rnam po'i ngag nid/
158a2(rgyud): yis 'chad//chos kyi phyag rgya'i yaM so//rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya che//dam pa'i don du bsgoms na ni//kun nas kun nas rang nyid kyis//rdo las ni byed par 'gyur//rdo rje srung ba byams pa che//rdo rje chos zhes
158a3(rgyud): grags pa ste//chos kyi sbyor bas bsgoms na ni//rdo rje srung ba dang mtshungs 'gyur//rdo gnod sbyin brtson 'grus che//khro bo chen po stobs po che//dam pa'i don gyi bsgom par bya//rdo rje gnod sbyin dang
158a4(rgyud): mtshungs 'gyur//rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che//lus ngag yid kyi de bzhin du//rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni//rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin par 'gyur//las kyi phyag rgya'i yis//sgeg mos mngon pa ro dga'
158a5(rgyud): dzar-iri ster//phreng ba yang ni dbang bsgyur ba//glu mas mdzes pa'i sgra dbyangs byed//gar mas rdza phrul thob par 'gyur//dri mas bzang po'i dri yin te//me tog byang chub yan lag nyid//sgron mA
158a6(rgyud): mtha' dag gsal ba'o//'dug pa bdag pa dag la brtson//lcags kyus dbang phyug 'gug byed na//skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos//zhags pas dbang po 'ang 'tshang 'gyur na//gdug pA sin/
158a7(rgyud): slom ci dgos//sdug sgrog gis ni 'brog byed dang //tshangs sogs dang phyug chen po'ang 'ching //'bebs pas thams cad 'bebs 'gyur na/dman pa'i mi dge smos ci dgos//'di nyid
158b1(rgyud): kyi ni sbyor ba yi//chos kyi yi ge dang ldan pa'i//phyag rgya'i ye shes dang bcas pas//de dag thang myur du 'brug/ ya d+hAr ba shus par bya'o//phyag rgya'i 'khor la khyad par+yaH//spyi gtsug nas ni rkang pa
158b2(rgyud): bar yi ge yis ni yongs grang bar/gzugs bstan gcig gis go 'phang gyur//sems ni rtse gcig 'gyur bar bsam//sa la rab gnas pad+ma ni//dbang chen gyi ni ga
158b3(rgyud): zhes bshad//dbang po gnyis ni mtshur sbyor bas//dbang phyug kyang ni bsgrub par bya//dbang chen dag ni gru bzhi pa//dbang chen dag gi legasu bshad//chu ni zlum par shes par bya bar ma'i 'dab mas
158b4(rgyud): rnam par mtshan//zhi bar byed pa'i las dang ldan//zhi ba'i don du de bshed/mau na gru gsum shes par bya/bzhi mdo yi ni gnasu bshadade/dbang du bya ba bsgrubs don du//pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i 'od//
158b5(rgyud): mngon spyod la ni brtson 'grus che//rlung gi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste//ral gri yi ni phyag rgya'i dbyibs//dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od//ser dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar//nag po yang ni khyad
158b6(rgyud): bapar du//dang po'i dkyil 'khor na sbyangs te//tha ma'i bar du rab tu brtag/dang po rdo rje rab tu bzhog//de yi rnaM su rin chen te//pad+ma dang ni las rnal 'byor//grub pa'i go 'phang rim par bshad//phyag rgya
158b7(rgyud): thad kyi ye sheso//de nas bcom ldan 'das brtag pas de bzhin gshegs pa dzad kyi phyag rgya'i yis bka' stsal la//gnyis dang gnyisu med pas yongasu dag pas chos thams cad rnam por
159a1(rgyud): grol ba'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o//rtag pa dang papa yo sra /pas chos thaMd ni bdang mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas ba ba pa'o//zad pa'i sgo dang zad pa'i mthar dang bad pa'i mur gyu
159a2(rgyud): dang ldan pas ches zade zod pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//munyal ba nyid kyi latha/ rnam par dag pas chos thaMd la skur ba mi 'dengs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//
159a3(rgyud): mig lnga las yang dag par 'das pas chos thad na mkha'i phyog rgyas rgyas bab pa'o//son thams cad na mkha'i khams thaMd dang ldan pa'i phyir chos thaMd na mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas
159a4(rgyud): btab pa'o//chos kyi dbyings yongasu khyab pas chos thaMd dbyer mi byed pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//chos thang byang chub kyi sems dang tha mi dad pas chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag
159a5(rgyud): rgyas rgyas bas pa'o//chos kyi dbyings mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas chos tha~Md kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad stong po nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas
159a6(rgyud): btab pa'o//'tsho ba med pa'i chos tha~Md bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//skad cig ma nyid pas chos thaMd mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//skye ba dang /rga ba dang /
159a7(rgyud): pa'i mtha' dang ldan pas chos thaMng sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mi'i mtha' de bzhin nyid pas chos thaMd de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgyas
159b1(rgyud): rgyas btab pa'o//gdad ma nas yongasu dag pas chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'i byad rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad stong pa nyidatu
159b2(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//spros pa'i dmigs pa rnam par bral bas chos thaMd mtshan ma med po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'i//ro ba thaMd las rnam por grol bas chos thad smon pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyab btab
159b3(rgyud): pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo nyid kyis na chos thaMd mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//phung po lnga yongasu 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na chos thaMd sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//rang bzhin gyi bdag
159b4(rgyud): med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir chos thams cad zhi pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//don dam pa'i bden pas yongasu khyab pa'i phyir/chos
159b5(rgyud): thad bden pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//'tsho ba rnams par mi gnas pa'i phyir chos tha~Md dri ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//shin tu gdon mi za bar gnas pa'i phyir/chos thad 'khrug po med pa'i
159b6(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyasau btab pa'o//sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' band pa'i phyir chos thaMd ji lta ba bzhin gyis phyag rgyas rgyas pa'o//mi rnams kyi gzhi gzhi med pa'i phyir//chos thaMd sgo 'dogs pa med pa phyag/
159b7(rgyud): rgyas rgyas btab pa la//byed pa pos byas pa'i phyir chos thad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir//chos thamaso cad 'byung ba yod pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas//
160a1(rgyud): btab pa'o//rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas pa'o//'gag pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas skye ba
160a2(rgyud): med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas pa'o//rnam par spyod pa kun tu spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//gzugs rnam par lta ba med pa'o/
160a3(rgyud): phyir/chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//gnas yongasu bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad nye bar skor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//mi mthun
160a4(rgyud): pa'i phyogs nye bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'dengs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir chos tha~Md las kyi rnam par
160a5(rgyud): smin po med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//skye ba dang gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir/chos thams cad 'dus ma byas po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//na mkha' dang khyad par med
160a6(rgyud): pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos tha~Md gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgyas
160a7(rgyud): rgyas btab pa'o//snying po med pa'i phyir chos thams cad phung po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//snying po dang bcas pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cang khams dang skye mchod kyi phyag rgyas rgyas
160b1(rgyud): btab pa'o//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas chos tha~Mng khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//mtha' gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos
160b2(rgyud): thams cad 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//lha'i rjesu byed po'i phyir chos tha~Md phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//mtha' gcig tu chos la phan
160b3(rgyud): 'dog pa'i phyir chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//thams cad kyi las sna tshogs byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//thams cad
160b4(rgyud): dam tshig thams cad rje su sgrub pa'i phyir chos thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'i//sangs rgyas gyi chos thaMd rab tu mi gnas pa'i phyir/chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi
160b5(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /theg pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//gsang sngags kyi
160b6(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang //phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /rdo ye
160b7(rgyud): shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /ye shes thad kyi phyog rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /thaMd mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas
161a1(rgyud): btab pa dang /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi
161a2(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyus btab pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyu'o//muH'jam
161a3(rgyud): dpal phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi tshig/de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshig/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par
161a4(rgyud): byed pa theg pa chen po'i tshig ste/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyi phyag rgya'i tshig rnams la 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i bac+doMs rnams dang chos kyi phung po brgyad
161a5(rgyud): khri bzhi stong dang byang chub kyang byung ba yino//a aM aHAM/sngags pas phyag rgya 'di rgyas btab na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya yang dag lnga 'du'o//hUM myur du ma skyes
161a6(rgyud): pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par 'gyur//baM/de nas da ni de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sbyor ba thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes gyur pa'i//snying gi dbusu rtag
161a7(rgyud): rta sgom//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par//pad+ma'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od//pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa//'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'ang //de yi stang du rtag sgom pa
161b1(rgyud): yi ge yi ni gtso bo mchog/thog ma tha ma med zhi ba//kha bab mo'i 'od 'dra 'od//dang ro kun da zla ltar dkar//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lhur 'od gsal//zhi ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin sku/
161b2(rgyud): kun mkhyen ye shes kyi gang ba//de bzhin gshegs pa gnas kyi gsang //ra sa ya na dang mtshungs mchog/khaM yig mkha' 'drar shes par bya//thig len ngas rnam par spras//gsang
161b3(rgyud): ba chen po mchog tu mdzes//thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/de yi steng du rdo rje che//rtse mo lnga dang yang ngag ldan//de yi steng du sgron me che//'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od//de yi
161b4(rgyud): steng du rtag bsams pa//yi ge mchog gi go 'angango //man ngag mchog las shes bya ste//gzhan du na ni dri mi smra//sangs rgyas mkhas pa thad kyi//mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsungaso//rnam
161b5(rgyud): par grol pa gsum thob pas//thob 'gyur 'di ni gzhan du min//lce ni rkan las sbyar bas bya//sna yi rtse mar yi ge hUM//dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas//phyag rgya'i go 'phang
161b6(rgyud): tshig gis ni//shes rab ldan pas rang sems sgom//snang ba med cing spros med pa//shin tu mchog tu phrang shes bya//khyab bdag bsod nams ye shes dngos//byos ma bya bsam
161b7(rgyud): gtan gcig bya ste//mig dang sgron ma'i 'od bzhin du//kun tu 'bar ba dang ldan pa//mgrin pa 'bad pas bcum nas ni//dkar po ser po sngon po 'od//dmar po yang ni zed du//
162a1(rgyud): 'bang ba 'ad dag/'bad pa yas//srub pad+mal pas mtshan par bya//smyung khar gsol bar byas na su//de bzhinams cad skye bar srung //gnas da la ni 'thon rnas
162a2(rgyud): kyang /de dbang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur//de la 'thon nis 'jig rten ni//mtshungs par kun nas tha~Md du//slar yang de ru 'ongs nas ni//de ni 'jig pa rab tu bsam//yid kyis
162a3(rgyud): de ltar bsgoms na ni//rang nyid 'khor lo sbyar lta bu//dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyong bas//legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom//dbang po lngas ni dmigs nas yang //mi rnams
162a4(rgyud): lus ni dge par 'gyur//ji snyed bud med skyon dang //ldan pa kun tu gnas pa ni//bkug nas bcug skye bcings nas//dbyeng du bya ste bsgrub par bya//de rnams lhan cig yongs
162a5(rgyud): bsnyen nas//sngags pa mchog gi dngos grub thob//gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na//shes rab pha rol phyin pa che//zhi ba'i chos kyi rim pa ni//shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa sgom/
162a6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che//de 'grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos//mchog ni rtag par shes par bya//bar mas phun sum tshogs pa ste//stong pa nyid dang mtshan med mchog
162a7(rgyud): smon pa med pa zhesu grags//chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs par byed//sa bcu yi ni stobs dag gis//pha rol phyin pa thaMd thob//rdo rje sems
162b1(rgyud): dpa' mchog bsgoms na//rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur//de nyid 'di ni bcud ste len//gnyi su med pa'i ye shes mchog/theg chen mchog tu yid 'ong ba//stong nyid sgom pa'i
162b2(rgyud): bdag nyid can//gnyi su med pa'i ye shes mchog/gang gis rtag tu sgom byed no//de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po//ston mchog las skyes par 'gyur//bud med gang zhig sngo bsangs ma//
162b3(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//lus ngag yid kyi sbyor ba yis//yongs reg A ling ge tsum pas//mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//bud med kha dog ljang ku gang //rgyan
162b4(rgyud): rnams kun gyis rnam par rgyan//de tshe de ni sngags pas bston//mnyam med gsang ba'i ye shes mtshungs//bud med gang zhig kha dog dkar//pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i 'od//de dang lhan
162b5(rgyud): sngags pas bsdad//dam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur//bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar//ut+pa la yi rgyan 'chang ma//sngags pas di dang lhan cig gnas//shes rab pha
162b6(rgyud): rol phyin mtshungs 'gyur//bud med in dr-i nI lce mtshungs//gsang ba rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis//sngags pa cho ga shes pas bsten//rig 'dzin rnams kyi stobs chen 'gyur//gsang chen
162b7(rgyud): ma ra kau ta mtshungs//gang gis rtag tu bstan pa ni//de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po//myur du gsang po'i dam par 'gyur//bud med pad+ma rA ga 'dra//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyad//
163a1(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas//rdo rje 'dzin ma lta bu sgrub//spangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//gnyis myed pa rje ye shes mchog/gang gis rtag tu smra
163a2(rgyud): pa ni//mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs//dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi//mchog gi gnus kyis bsgoms pa ni//rnal 'byor mchog gi mi ring bar//rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'gyur//
163a3(rgyud): yang dag spong ba rnam pa bzhi//legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom//dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas//mnyam med 'jig rten dbang phyug mtshungs//so sor yang dag rig pa/
163a4(rgyud): bzhi//shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni//zhen med rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs//mnyam med 'jam pa'i mchog dang 'dra//mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi//rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgo bar bya//
163a5(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas//rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu ste//rdzu 'phrul gyi ni rkang pa bzhi//shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni//dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas//rdzu 'phrul/
163a6(rgyud): ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur//tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi po//chad med po yi sems kyis ni//rdo rje sbyor bar bdag bsgoms na//rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'grub//sbyor ba'i bdag nyid
163a7(rgyud): dbang ngo lnga//dam pa'i don gyis bsgoms na ni//dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas//mnyam mod rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs//yid kyi stobs ni rnam pa lnga//shin tu ma
163b1(rgyud): gang+gAg bsgoms na ni//'khor lo sgyur ba brtson 'grus che//stobs 'dzin lta bu taud du 'gyur//byang chub yan lag rin cher bdun//gsang sngags bsgoms pos sgom na ni//rtog
163b2(rgyud): pa'i ye shes spor ba yis//khyab bdag chos kun 'dzin par 'gyur//'phags pa'i yan log brgyad kyi lam//kun mkhyen ye shos rdzogs byed pa//de ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis na//
163b3(rgyud): 'jig rten shes las rab tu 'da'//rje su dran pa rnam pa drug/bdug nyid rtse gcig gis bsgoms ni//sngags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ru//sngags pa dug mi ring bar 'gyur//stobs bcu
163b4(rgyud): po ni yang dag bsgoms//sgom pa'i rnal 'byor de nyid kyis//bsod nams ye shes yongs rdzogs te//rtag tu stobs bcu'i dam par 'gyur//pha rol phyin bcu yongasu rdzogs//
163b5(rgyud): stobs rnams dang ni dbang rnams dang //sa rnams kun ni nges bskyed nas//myur du mtshan ma dag par 'gyur//bud med nu ma shin tu bsnun//rjes ngar rjes ngar de bzhin du//mchu
163b6(rgyud): yis mchu ni yongasu bzung //'byed pas dam du A ling ga/rnam grol gos kyis bsgribs nasu//byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya//rdo rje ye shes brtson 'grus che//rdo rje dbyingasu
163b7(rgyud): bdag bstan pas//rnam pa sna tshogs kang ni//rnal 'byor shis pa de bsten bya//sngar bzhin thaMng byas na su//bud med rnams kyi dam tshig sgrub//rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs
164a1(rgyud): /par 'gyur//bud med rnams kyi nyer nas bsnun//ling grwa myur du gang bar 'gyur//sbyor ba 'di ni mkhyen pa yis//stobs chan sa sa rgyas rab tu gyu//gsang
164a2(rgyud): pa'i 'dri ni dam pa ste//sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o//gsang ba 'di yi sbyor ba yis//yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur//sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i//cho su grags pa
164a3(rgyud): gang yin pa//de rnams sgom byed gtso bo no//dngos grub thams cad rab rdzogs pa//ma 'dres pa yi chos bco brgyad //sangs rgyas chos grags pa ste//de rnams sgom pa dang
164a4(rgyud): ldan pas//sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed//bsam gtan bzhi po thob nas ni//gzugs med pa yi rtag par yang //'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug ldan pas//sangs rgyas byang
164a5(rgyud): chub sgrub pa po//byang chub phyogs ni sum bani bdun//chos ni mchog tu rmad byung ba//de rnams sgom pa dang ldan pas//byang chub sems dpa'i skyob pa'o//sngags rnams thaMd rab
164a6(rgyud): 'breb cing //sbyor ba thams cad thang du'o//de nas 'bad pa thams cad kyis//sangs rgyas chos nyid bsgom par bya//'jog rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam//ye shes rin chen rab
164a7(rgyud): rnyed dka'//mchod dang dbang bskur byin rlabs pas//rnyed 'gyur gzhan du ma yino//zhu zhing gsol ba btab pa dang //bdag nyid dbul ba de bzhi no//sangs rgyas sogs la yi rang
164b1(rgyud): gnan//da zhan m+b+hi swa bab+hU ba dang //byang chub sems ni yang dang baspyad//khyad par du nA dus kun du//tshig ma par dang rgyum du/bkun du rnaMs pasgrims pas//sangs
164b2(rgyud): thaMd bsgrub bye ste/'di la ji tshom yid ma yin//'gro ba sems kyis spyi nga na//brtan po'i snying po legs par bshad/stong nyid de bzhin nyid las byung //rdo rje sems dpang
164b3(rgyud): bshad//'gro ba thams cad bkug nasu//sangs rgyas byang chub sbyar bar bya//don yod ye shes dag pa ste//rdo rje rgyal po mchog ces bshang //rdo rje tshogs de ste chags gyur nas//
164b4(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis ni brtan par 'gyur//'gro ba ma lus lus med do//de yi sems ni chag par bshad//chos rnams kun ni rang bzhin gyis//rnam par dben zhing gnyi su med//
164b5(rgyud): gang tshe dag pa'i bdag nyid mthong //de tshe rdo rje legs par bshad//rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yis//ming dang brda ni sbyar ba'o//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//sdom po mchog
164b6(rgyud): tu ngom pa'o//khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che//tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byas pa ste//sa dang pha rol phyin mchog gtso//rdo rje dbang bskur las byung ba//de bzhin gshegs
164b7(rgyud): kun ye shes te//rnyog pa me cing yi ge med//'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid mchogabartan pa rtag pa nyid du 'gyur//nam pa'i mdzad ni mdzod chen po//chos rnams thaMd legs
165a1(rgyud): gnas pa yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje che//rdo rje tog ni bla na med//ye shes snang ba rin+da chen che//yongasu skye ba yongasu blta//de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ni//
165a2(rgyud): rdo rje bzhad pa zhesu bshad//chos kyi bdag med las byung ba//gnyisu med pa'i ye shes mchog/chos nyid dam pa bsam du med//rdo rje chos zhes rab tu grags//rdo rje blo gros snang ba
165a3(rgyud): che//shes rab ye shes dri med mchog/zag med shes rab chen po pa//de ni rdo rje rnon por bshad//sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos 'khor lo//gnyisu med las byung bar mtshon//yan
165a4(rgyud): lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel med//rdo rje rgya zhes nges par bshad//dgongs pa'i skad ni spros pa'i mchog/yul rnams kyis ni bshad pa de//sangs rgyas kun gyi bzas pa che//de ni rdo
165a5(rgyud): smra bar bshad//so na kun gyi don la sbyar//sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che//gdod nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor che//de ni rdo rje lusu bshad//bra na med pa'i byams pa che//bsrung
165a6(rgyud): ba'i bya ba grong ma med//dga' ba'i chos ni brtson chen po//rdo rje srung ba zhesu grags//shes rab thabs kyi khro bo che//sangs rgyas kun dang rjes 'thun pa//nyon mongs thud za bo che
165a7(rgyud): de ni gnod sbyin chen por brjod//lus ngag yid ni yang dag sbyor//sgrib pa med cing yi ge bral//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang //de ni rdo rje mtshems sbyor bshad//rdo ye shes
165b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor che//sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs po che//thog ma tha ma med zhi ba//rig pa mchog ces bya bar bshad//de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi
165b2(rgyud): rdo rje'i blos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs par mchod nas glur blangs pa/oM sarba bud+d+ha pa ra me shwa ra bud+d+ha shud+d+ha/la li ho su b+ha ga su ri te mAt+ta mahA a d+hi ma hA bud+d+he bud+d+ha/yo g+ha
165b3(rgyud): shwa ra ta b+h+r-i d+hU b+hA bi twA ta ma ka ta thA ga ta/byang chub sems bskyed las 'khrungs pa//sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshalo//mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'i chos//gdod nas zhi bi l-i'i phyag 'tsha
165b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa po//rdo rje can kun la phyag 'a tshul//de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che//sangs rgyas byang chub la phyag 'tshal//mi dmigs go 'phang la gnas pa//mtha'
165b5(rgyud): yis 'das pa la phyag 'tshal//'dren pa rnams kyi stobs po che//hUM gi yi ge ma lus pa//thams cad mkhyen pa mtha' dog dang //shin tu yongasu mya ngan 'da'//'jig rten dbang
165b6(rgyud): byug mgon bzang po//rdo rje ye shes dri ma med//rnam par dag pa rdo rje mchog/dngos grub thams cad rab gsol byed//rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi mchog/dus gsum
165b7(rgyud): bsam pa dbang gyur pa//sems can rnams la phan don du//khyab pa khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud//rdo rje snying po rgyan las dkyil 'khor chen po yo su rdzogasaso///
166a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dra bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te/bcom ldan 'das rna
166a2(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje'i snying po'i rkyen gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i don du zhu ba zhus pa/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste//rdo rje snying po
166a3(rgyud): zhes grags pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi po//rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes//sgo khyud rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan dang //phyag rgya dang ni rab tu mdzes//
166a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni//'khor lo gnyis ni rab tu gnas//rtsibs brgyad pa dang bcu drug rtsibs//rnam par dbye ba legs par brtag/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor nang gi ni//lce/
166a5(rgyud): ba'i gan su legs brtag pa//pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa//ge sar bltams pas rab tu mdzes//nga yi lte ba'i dbus ni//khyab bdag rnal 'byor dbang phyug che//rnam par snang mdzad brtson//
166a6(rgyud): chen po//sems can rnams la rjes brtse bas//de yi nye 'khor kun tu ni//de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad rnams drigang //shar du dgod bya 'khor lo can//gtsug tor dkar po nub
166a7(rgyud): tu ste/gzi brjid phung po lto ru'o//rnam par rgyal ba byang du gnas//dbang ldan rnam par gsal bar bri//mer ni steng du dgod par bya//steng 'gro chen po bden bral du//rlung
166b1(rgyud): du rgyal ba chen po gnas//sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa yi//rnal 'byor ldan pa 'di dag bri//mi bskyod pa ni shar du dkad//lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan no//nub du 'od dpagra med/
166b2(rgyud): par 'gyur//byang du don yod grub pa'i ming //zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ston pa'o//dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni//rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bri//thams cad zla ba'i
166b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnams//'khor rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o//phreng ba rnam par dgod bya ba//rang gi phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar//rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i//lha mo 'bad pas dgod
166b4(rgyud): par bya//rdo rje gdug pa la sogs bri//de bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs//rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa//sgo srung 'bad pas bri bar bya//phyi yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa//kun tu
166b5(rgyud): bzang sogs rims bzhin bri//rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor rnams dang //pho nya yi ni 'khor dag dang //khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang //de bzhin po nya pho nya ma//rgya mtsho yi ni dkyil 'khor ni///
166b6(rgyud): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'o//phyi ru phyi rol rdo yi ming //dkyil 'khor la ni 'bad pas bri//dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams na su//'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po bri//tshangs pa
166b7(rgyud): khyab 'jug dbang chen ming //dbang po la sogs lha thams cad//ma mo kun dang sring mo rnams//rgyal chen rnams dang klu dang bcas//de bzhin lho rnams thams cad dang //brtson
167a1(rgyud): 'grus chen po namakha' lding //'dad pa yis ni bri bar bya//de lta'i dkyil 'khor dris na su//khyad par dun mchod par bya//me tog bdug sbas rol ma dang /
167a2(rgyud): de bzhin bza' dang ston mo sogs//phreng ba'i rkyen ni sna tshogs kyis//de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod par bya//dkyil 'khor kun gyi cho ga yis//mchod pa kun gyis thams
167a3(rgyud): cad nas//'khor lo kun gyi cho ga yis//sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya//de nas slob ma thams cad bzhugs//yongs su dag pa khyad par du//byang chub sems
167a4(rgyud): ni bskyed nas su//byang chub bslab pa rjes spyod pa//cho ga shes pa'i sngags pas gzhug/'dren pa rnams la mchog tu gzhug/rdo rje'i dbang bskur sbyor ba yis//dbang
167a5(rgyud): bskur ba ni do nas sbyin//seng ge'i khri yi steng du ni//dar dang me tog rkun pos spras//dkar po'i gdugs dang rin chen che//bla bre rgya che 'bar ba dang //de yi g.yas kyi
167a6(rgyud): drung du ni//mkhaskye ba yis ni bzhag par bya//ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang //sna tshogs ras las yang dag sprul//g.yon gyi drung du thams cad nas//'bad pa yis ni
167a7(rgyud): bzhig par bya//rin chen sman kun gyis gong ba'i//bum pa legs par bzhag byis te//rdo rje chu sogs da bang bsgyur gyis//de la rang gi dbang bskur bye//rdo rje ming gis
167b1(rgyud): dbang bskur ba//mkhas pa yis ni slar yang bya//kun gyi cod pan dbang bskur gyis//yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya//chos kyi cod pan dbang bskur dang //sangs rgyas kun gyi
167b2(rgyud): pab ni//sna tshogs las kyi dbang bskur sbyin//chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mtshungs pa'o//chos kyi sku yi dbang bskur ba//sangs rgyas kun gyi sgron mo'i sbyin//de ltar slob ma dbang bskur
167b3(rgyud): ba//khyad par du ni dbang bskur ba//khyed par du ni sngags paso byas//de la dam tshig cho ga yis//sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyin par bya//slob dpon brnyas par mi bya zhing //sgrub po kun la
167b4(rgyud): smad mi bya//sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad la//'da' bar mi bya smad mi bya//'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang //grub mtho'i rigs pa thams cad la//smad par mi bya brang mi bya//de la
167b5(rgyud): mngon por dga' ba spangs//sdig pa thams cad rnam spang zhing //de bzhin bsod nams thams cad bsdu//bza' dang ston mo du ma la//bza' bar mi bya smad mi byi/'dod pas bcom ldan sems
167b6(rgyud): dpa' ste//sangs rgyas kun gyi sras bdag skyes//thog ma tha ma med zhi ba//nam yang dor bar mi bya'o'i//sangs rgyas thams cad chags las 'khrungs//de bzhin zhe sdang rmongs las
167b7(rgyud): 'khrus//mnyam dang mi mnyam chom rkun dang //dbu ma'i gnas la gnas nas su//de nyid dam tshig shes nas su//sangs rgyas byang chub yongs mi spong //lus
168a1(rgyud): can kun la 'tsho mi bya//khyod kyis ser sna ma bya ste//phrag dog bya bur mi bya'o//dam tha'i chos ni spang mi bya//byang chub sems ni mchog tu bde//chang gi btung ba
168a2(rgyud): spud bya ste//pha rol bud med rnam par spangs//thams cad mkhyen pa yong po ma dor//rtag tu srog tshogs bsad mi bya//sems can rnams la snying rje dang //byams pa yang ni rnam par sgom//
168a3(rgyud): son rnams la phan pa ni//yang dang yang du yongasu bya//sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa//dam tshig 'di nyid 'di dag ni//slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas//mkhas pa yis ni bstan par bya//
168a4(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya rjes bcings pa//go rims bzhin du bstan par bya//phyag rgya 'di dag khyad par gyi//mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya//me tog zum pa'i tshul bzhin du//thal maM legs pa
168a5(rgyud): bsdams par bya//sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi//pad+ma'i thal mo zhesu bsgrag so//sems dpa' mchog ni legs brkyang ba//pad+ma'i phyag rgya zhesu brjod//re re'i mtshams nges
168a6(rgyud): bcings pa//de ni rdo rje thal mor brtags//sor mo tha~Md nges bsdams pa//rdo rje bsdams pas legs bcings pa//sror mo brkyang ste steng du bstan//sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol
168a7(rgyud): byed//khu tshur nang du byas nas ni//gnyi ka sbyar bas yongasu brtag/'khor lo sgyur sogs phyag rgya'o//dam pa sbyin pa yin par bshad//sangs rgyas dpa' bo tha~Md kyi//dam tshig
168b1(rgyud): phyag rgya 'ad yin//ming med nang bcug khu tshur gyis//kun gyi gtso mor yongasu brtag/rdo rje'i rnam par legs par sbyar//rdo rje chen po zhesu bsgrags//mthe'u chung sran lag khu tshur las//
168b2(rgyud): gung mo legs par bskyungs nas//mdzub mos mthe bong yongasu sgyur//'khor los bsgyur ba nyid gsol byed//brkyang ba'i rtse mo sbyar ba ni//gdugs dkar zhes ni rab tu grags//srin lag
168b3(rgyud): dang ni mthe bong sbyar//gung mo gnyis ni brtag par bya//gzi brjid phreng ba phyag rgya che//gzi brjid phyeng bo nyid gsol byed//de nyid ral gri lta bur sbyar//rnam par rgyal ba zhesu grags//de nyid
168b4(rgyud): rgyal ba zhes bya ba//rdo rje ldan pa de bzhin gshegs//khu tshur snying po ldan byas pas//gtsug tor rnam pa'i 'byung gnas te//thub dka' sangs rgyas thaMd kyis//steng du 'gro ba zhes
168b5(rgyud): bshad//rdo rje bsdams pa yongasu sbyar//dam tshig kun gyi 'byung gnas te//gung mo'i rtse mo mchog tu gnas//mthe'u chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang //lcags kyu mda' yaM sbyor ba yis//
168b6(rgyud): legaso ba ni sbar bar bya//gung mo rdo rje rin chen rtse//phye ba gzi brjid mchag gi mchog/rgyal mtshan gnasu nges par sbyar//bzhad pa'i gan su sbyar bar bya//rdo chos kyi phyag rgya che//
168b7(rgyud): dbu ma pad+ma lta bus bskum//ral gri'i chos ni 'jam po'i dbyangs//'khor los bsgyur ba'i 'khor lo 'dra//kha ru phye ma'i phyag rgya che//rdo rje smra bo nyid 'gyur//las kyi rdo rje'i phyag/
169a1(rgyud): rgya ni//kar mtshungs rdo rje sna tshogs can//chos yongs bsdud pa'i sbyor bu yis//rdo rje srung bar brtag par bya//mche ba gnyis ni rnam par gtsigs//
169a2(rgyud): rdo rje gnod sbyin zhesu bshad//khu tshur bcangs pa khu tshur gyis//rdo rje thal mo snying khar bzhag/rdo rje sgeg mo zhesu grags//yongasu sbyar ba spyi bor bzhag/rdo rje phreng ba zhes
169a3(rgyud): brjod//thal mo sbyar ba gdong du sbrul//rdo rje glu mar rje su bsgrags//'gyed cing 'dud pa'i sbyor ba yis//de ni rdo rje gar mar bshad//pad+ma'i thal mo gdong du dbye//spyi bor
169a4(rgyud): yongasu sbyar la bzhag/snying khar mthe bo gnyis po las//gdong ni legs par brkyang bar bya//lag pa steng du yongs brkyang ba//gzugs kyi phyag rgya nyi du 'gyur//lag
169a5(rgyud): gnyis rno ba'i lam du bzhag/sgra yi phyag rgya nyid du bshad//dri ni byug pa'i sbyor ba yis//dri yi phyag rgya zhes brjod//gdong du snyim pa phye ba ni//ro yi phyag rgya zhesu bsgrags//
169a6(rgyud): mkha' la myur ba'i sbyor ba yis//reg pa reg pa zhesu bshad//mthe'u chung gnyis ni yongasu sbyar//mdzub mo lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las//de nyid zhags pa'i dbyibs dang ni//
169a7(rgyud): lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par brtag/bzhi pa rdo rje dril bu zhes//rdo rje 'bebs par rnam par brtag/phyag rgya kun dang nye ba'i rgya//blo gros ldan pa rang gi brtag/thal mo yongasu sbyar la bsdus
169b1(rgyud): /mdzung mo gnyis po bskums nas ni//rin po che yi rnam pa ra bcing //kun tu bzang po blo ldan gyis//de las rtse mo rtse mo bskum//sems kyi byams pa bsgoms nasu//mdzub mo sbyar la
169b2(rgyud): bcug nas ni//ral gri'i rnam par brtag pa ste//'di ni na mkha'i snying po yi//phyag rgyar sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags//de nas ral gri'i mtshon ma ye//rnam pa ru ni nyer gnas pa//phyag
169b3(rgyud): rgyurgya 'od ni rnam 'gog par//thaMd kyis ni yongasu brjod//gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis//rdo rje thal mo rab tu brkyang //pad+ma'i lta bur rnam par brtag/pad+ma'i lag pa blo ldan gyis//de nyid
169b4(rgyud): me tog zum tshul dang //ud pa la rnam pa ltar mdzes pa//'di ni pad+ma sgrol ba'i rgya//pad+ma'i mgon po zhesu grugs//mche ba gtsigs pa dang ldan pa'i//kha dang 'dre bar legs par
169b5(rgyud): brtag rje 'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste//kha yi phyogasu rab tu brtag/pad+ma'i thal mo dpral ba yi//khro gnyer du ni nye bar sbyar//rdo rje thal mo 'bebs pa che//dpal gyi snying po rin chen ldan//
169b6(rgyud): yid bzhin nor bu'i rnam pa bzung //thal mo legs par rab tu brkyang //mi bzad blo gros phyag rgya che//sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtag/gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis//rin chen rdo rje
169b7(rgyud): snying khar bzhag/na mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste//na mkha'i mdzod nyid ster bar byed//rdo rje chen po legs par brkyang //mthe chung mthe bong nges par bcing //log pa gnyis ni nges par brtag/
170a1(rgyud): b+h+yo gros rgyu ma'i phyag rgyar 'gyur//rdo rje thal mo stong du skyong //mdzub mo gas po spyad dor b+ha//dran du spyong pa rgya//rdo snying ngos paga' stsal to//
170a2(rgyud): tshur nang du byas nas//mdzub mo gnyis po rtse mo sbyar//'di ni 'jam dpal byeg rgya ste//rdo rje ral gri zhe su da~M ti //de nyid sha ti'i rnam pa ni//'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi'o//
170a3(rgyud): gau shin rje mthar byed mdung rtsir 'gyur//mdung rtse chen por rab tu brtag/mdzub mo bskum par byas nas ni//nga mau steng du yongasu bzhad//zhags pa'i rnam pa rab ldan pas//gshin
170a4(rgyud): rje yang ni 'jigs par byed//de nyid ral grir byis pa ni//skra can gyi ru rab tu bshad//khu tshur thams cad nges bcings te//mdzub mo gcig ni bskum par bya//'di ni nye ba'i skra can rgyur//
170a5(rgyud): 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal to//rdo rje bsdams pa steng bcings te//dbu ma gnyis ni rnam par spang //mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam par bya//mthe chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang //'di ni rdo
170a6(rgyud): 'dzin chen po'o//phyag rgya don kun sgrub byed yin//mdzub mo mthe bong bsdams pa ni//mA ma kIr ni yongasu bshad//mdzub mo lcags sgrogs rnam pa las//gung mo'i dbu mdze
170a7(rgyud): rje bya//'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog rgya//rdo rje lta bur yongasu bshad//rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa//khro bo gzigs mar rnam par bshad//mchog gi rtse mo rtse gcig bya//rdo rje rtsemo
170b1(rgyud): nyid kyi ba shad//lcag na rin rgyun phyug d+hA ni//lag gnyis legs par btang bar bya//ser mo pad+ma'i dbyi su bya//bskul byed lha mor yongasu bshad//thal mo yongasu skur ba las//
170b2(rgyud): mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong dag/mig gi tshul du sbyar bar bya//sangs rgyas sbyin gyir rnam par bshad//bkra shas kyi ni skyil krungaso btsa'//rnal 'byor rig pas lus srang ste//lag
170b3(rgyud): gnyis lhung bzed 'dzin 'dra ba//bsam gtan phyag rgyar rab tu bshad//'di ni rnam par snang mdzad rgya//sangs rgyaso kun gyi don mdzad pa'i//mi bskyod pa yi sa la reg/rin chen tog
170b4(rgyud): gi mchog sbyin bshad//bsam gtan phyag rgya 'od dpag med//ngo bo nyid kyi don rtogs byed//don 'od gzigs pa'i phyag rgya ni//mi 'jigs pa ni med pa sbyin//blo ldan rnal 'byor
170b5(rgyud): skyil krung gi nas//sangs rgyas kun gyi rong bzhin bdag/mnyam par gzhag pas phyag rgya kun//'ching ba 'am ni 'tshong du gzhug/'jig rten pa yi phyag rgya la//log pa gcig ni
170b6(rgyud): rob brkyang ste//dbang ldan gyi ni rtse gsum pa//mthe bong mtho chung mnan par bya//lha yi dbang po'i rdo rjer gyur//lag pa g.yas pas bteg par bya//mye yi oM yig lag pa dag/
170b7(rgyud): mthe bong gung mo nyid la bzhag/gshin rje'i rdo rje dbyug pa ste//mdzub mo dang na mthe bong sbyar//de nyid khyab mjug 'khor lo ste//'khor lo'i yo ga dgod par bya//lag pa gcig
171a1(rgyud): gis thod pa ni//ma myo rnams rjer yang dag bshad//sor mo gnyis skyong ral gron//sngon po'i bdag nyid na rna ba'i'o//mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba ni//chu lha'i
171a2(rgyud): zhags pa nyid bshad//mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dag/rgyal mtshan lta bur legs par brkyang //rlung lha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya ni//lag pa gnyis kyi rab tu rtog/dbu ma gcig pu
171a3(rgyud): legs brkyang ba//dbyug zo'i phyag rgya rab tu bshad//gnod sbyin kun gyi dbang phyug ni//lus ngan bdag nyid chen po'o//mchod phyir thogs kyi phyag rgya no//tshangs pa yi ni lags/
171a4(rgyud): par bshad//drag po'i gsalo shing shes bya ste//lha mo'i pan+ti sa~M rI brjod//tshogs bdag gi ni sA ru bo shad//zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor//nyi ma'i 'od zer stong phrag no//
171a5(rgyud): lhag pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya//'od kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis//dbang po'i rdo rje mtshan cha ltar//'di ni lha rnams kun gyi rgyu//dpa'o kun gyi rab tu gnas//dri za rnams
171a6(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya ni//glu len lta bur rab tu bsgrags//dga' byed dbang phyug phyag rgya che//rdza rnga'i sgra dbyangs rab tu 'bar//sangs rgyas tha~Md rab mchod phyir//don chen pos ni rab
171a7(rgyud): tu brtags//ting ting cag 'dzin sbyor ba yis//dri za rnams kyi rab tu bsgrags//pi wang spring po'i sbyor ba yis//dbyangs can gyi rini rnam par bo shad//rtag tu dun du
171b1(rgyud): skyog pa//rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyir brjod//lag gnyis gdongs ka'i tshul byas pa//klu rnams kying ni legs par bashrad//gAr ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis//'gyod dang 'dud pa'i
171b2(rgyud): de bzhin//lag pa zhags pa'i nges bcings pa//de ni phyag rgyar rab tu bshad//'di rnams dam tshig phyag rgya ru/de bzhin gshegs rnams legs par gsungs//las kyi sbyor ba
171b3(rgyud): 'bad pa yis//'di rnams kyang ni phyag rgyar bshad//phyag rgya dor nas sems kyi ni//rin chen yang dang yang du bsam//rnam par rtog med gdod nas zhi//chos dbyings mnyam zhing
171b4(rgyud): mi mnyam pa//steng pa mkha' 'drar shes na su//mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya//'di dag thams cad ma skyes shing //rmi lam lta bur rab tu gnas//dri za'i grong khyer lta bur snang //
171b5(rgyud): 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten yang dang yang //mig 'phrul lta bur shin tu ni//'gro ba thaMd rab tu gsal//mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa ru//srid pa thaMd mdor sdus pa//bdag
171b6(rgyud): med pa zhes mthong nas ni//spangs rgyas kun dang dpya'o yi//sgyu ma smig rgyu brag cha dang //sbu ba chu yi chu bur dang //gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten ni//de ltar sangs rgyas rnams
171b7(rgyud): kyis dgongs//thaMd 'gal mo'i 'khor lo ltar//zo chun khyad mo je bzhin du//gar gyi gnas kyi tshul 'dra bar//zla ba gnyis dang mtshungs par blta//rtag tu glog gi phreng ba 'dra//
172a1(rgyud): /sbrang bu'i sgra dang mtshungs par bshad//'khor ba shin tu brlang ba ste//rkang ma'i lha dang 'dra bar gnas//'di ltar shes shing rtogs nas ni//sgom pa'i
172a2(rgyud): stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis//sems ni legs sgrub rnal 'byor pa//de la phyag rgya rab tu bshad//stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang //smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin lus//lus dang //
172a3(rgyud): ngag dang yid kyis ni//dam tshig gsum ni brtags pa'o//phyag rgya sngags dong lha nyid dang //de nyid gsum ni rab tu gnas//bdag nyid sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis//mtshan nyid
172a4(rgyud): gcig tu rno bar gnas//de 'di dam pa'i phyag rgya ru//sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal to//phyag rgya yi ge bral ba ste//rnam pa med tsong snang ba ste//dngos po med pa'i tshe Da rnam
172a5(rgyud): la//dngos po'i de nyid nyi du bshad//dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin yin//dngos medo nyid kyang dngos po yin//dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol//rnal 'byor ye shes mchog/
172a6(rgyud): tu bde//rtog ge med cing snang ba med//'khrul pa med cing yi ge med//stong pa na mkha' mtshungs pa'i sems//gang tshe de ltar nyid 'gyur ba//de tshe phyag rgya rnams dang sngags
172a7(rgyud): ti du yang rab tu brtag/sdigs las phyag rgya ma mthong zhing //phyag rgya las kyang sngags min cing //rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor no//gnyis mdo sngags dang phyag rgya
172b1(rgyud): brtags//de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba'o//de nas brjos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang /
172b2(rgyud): 'dus par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sbyor ba chen po rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi rigs bskyed
172b3(rgyud): par mdzad gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/'og min gyi gnas nas byon te dga' ldan gyi gnasu bzhugs nas
172b4(rgyud): dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la chos bstan nas zas gtsang gi rigs la mngon par gzigs te/mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub kyi snying po dag la nye bar gnas na/
172b5(rgyud): nye bar 'khod/bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal bar bstan nas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par gyur te/bzhugs nas kyang kun nas 'phro ba'i ting 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba'i ting nge
172b6(rgyud): 'dzin bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te/snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje se gol gyi slas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md
172b7(rgyud): spyan 'dren cing gsang sngags 'di gsungaso//oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa mA dza a kaR+Sha ya sarba ta thA ga tAn d+h+we/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil
173a1(rgyud): 'khor chen po rnams legs par byon te/chos kyi dbyingasu spros nus phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab pa'i rgya mtsha'i sprin rnams
173a2(rgyud): bkang ste/nam mkha'i khams na gnas pa thams cad til gyi gang bu lta 'o dzam bu'i gling du 'khod par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bkun
173a3(rgyud): nicing bcug ste bcings nas dbang du mdzad/de nyid kyi thugs khang rab tu bzhag par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gnyi su med pa'i sbyor/
173a4(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs te/sngags 'das rang gi sems so sor rtogs par mdzad//oM tsit+taM pra ti bi d+haM kA ro mi/de'i rjes thogs nyid la sangs rgyas tha~Md kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par/
173a5(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi thugs khar long spyod rdzogs pa dang /sprul pa'i sku las chos sku rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba sems rin po che nges par 'byung ste spros par mdzad//de nyid sems
173a6(rgyud): 'od gsal ba/thug rje chen pos khyab pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnyog pa spangs pa ni mkha' ltar gdod nas zhi ba de las/
173a7(rgyud): thugs rje chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas nas san gyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzigs te/mi shes pas rga ba dang /'chi bas rnam par khyab par 'jig rten la gzigs
173b1(rgyud): nam sgyur yang sngags 'das rgya chu kyus pas bar 'byung ba ba nga/AHd+hUr+m+ma ud pa du ma/ chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rdzus bags nyid la da sgron gzhugs pa pad mngan/
173b2(rgyud): thugs khang sems 'od gsol ba de yongasu sgo//b+hizla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar byin gyis 'arlabs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs khar rnam par bzhag/legs par rnam
173b3(rgyud): dbye pa'i nar kha'i ltar dri ma med pa/spros pa thams cad spangs pa me long lta bur brtan par byas nas gnas te byang chub kyi sems chen po la sngags 'di brjod//AM dz+nyA na rasmi bi sr-i b+hA NA~M/
173b4(rgyud): dede'i rjes thogs nyid la 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par byang //de phyung nas kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du zhugs te/shes bya'i dkyila'i khang zad dus
173b5(rgyud): bar byas nas son thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse mo bsnyil te rab tu rtogs par byas nas gcig tu 'dris te/rdo rje'i sku chen po rnams bac+doMs kyi thugs khar rje su zhugs nas zla ba'i dkyil
173b6(rgyud): 'khor gyi dbus rab tu gnas//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'di byin gyis brlab so//oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra pA ra d+ya b+hU ya pan+taM mud+ha/slar yang sngags
173b7(rgyud): 'dis spros pa/oM m+ba badz+ra/slar yang sngags 'dis bsdus//oM sa tar badz+ra/de nas de bzhin gshegs brjid kyis ye shes rdo rje'i drang po 'di tshad brjid pa/oM dz+nyA na ba
174a1(rgyud): na na lu na du tu chu cu rgyun tu rgyu na d+hA na /
174b1(rgyud): byang chub bstan te/sems can thad kyi don mdzad pa nye bar bsgrungs nas de thugs kha las rdo rje phyung ste nyid kyi phyag du bzhag par gyur to//de nas 'od zer rnam par phyung ste/'jig rten gyi Sha b+ban
174b2(rgyud): snang bar mdzad nas slar log ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs khrir zhugs nas byang chub sems da pa'i chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur byin gyis brlabs te mtshan nyid thad yongasu rdzogs pa
174b3(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/dar dang phreng bas dbang bskur ba zla ba'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer can du byin gyis brlabs te rnam par gnaso//de nas thugs kha nas phyung nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
174b4(rgyud): la brten te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga dang /rgyab dang drung du rdo rje sems dpa' dang /rdo rje chos dang /rdo rje rin chen dang /rdo rje las la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po
174b5(rgyud): phreng ba rnam par gnas//de bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang /bdug pa la sogs pa khyad par du nges par bskyed cing gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang /lcags kyu lnga sogs pa'i lha
174b6(rgyud): rnams bskyed 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa//sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis//rdo rje snying pozhesu gsungs
174b7(rgyud): gru bzhi po yi sgong zhipa//dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan//sgo logs dang ni rig byed dang //rta dbas kyis ni so sor gas//de yi dbusu khri chen po//kun nas yongasu grubazhi paM//de yi steng du
175a1(rgyud): pad chen po//go sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa//de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni//sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgod par bya//sangs rgyas kyi ni drung kun tu//sangs rgyas tha~Md dgod par/
175a2(rgyud): bya//sangs rgyas kun gyi nye 'khor du//'khor los sgyur ba la sogs bri//phyi yi gnas ni thad du//sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod//kha dog ser po gzi brjid che//dbang chen dkyil
175a3(rgyud): 'khor rab 'bar ba//thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan//brgyan pa de dag dgod par bya//rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//
175a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi slar yang chu'i lha'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa//chos kyi
175a5(rgyud): 'khor lo 'dra bas na//chos kyi 'khor lo zhesu brjod//de yi phyi rol gnyis pa la//zlum po ru ni rtogs par bya//ri mo rnam pa sau tshogs pas//sgo dang sgo logs brtag par bya//rta babs
175a6(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs pa//dar dang me tog phreng bas rgyan//de yi dbusuM pad chen pos//ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa//'dab ma brgyad kyi ka ba la//dkyil 'khor brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o//
175a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni//rgyal ba thaMd dkar po mchog/khang ba zho ltar dkar gsal//shel dang zla ba lta bu'i 'od//kun da zla ba ltar dkar bstan//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
175b1(rgyud): son par//de yi nye 'khor thams ca//sangs rgyas smras po rnam par dgod// zla ba ltar dkar zhing //zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa//mtshon chadasna tshogs zla ba 'dra//zla ba 'bur
175b2(rgyud): mtshungs mnyam med pa//chu yi ming zhes bya ba yi//dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid du 'dod//rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las chu lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o///de nas bac+doMs
175b3(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos me lho zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//dkyil 'kho ched po mchog gyur pa//rdo rje ye shes gzi brjid
175b4(rgyud): mtshungs//rdo rje gzi brjid cesu brjod//gru gsum rnam pa nyid bya//shing rta'i rnam pa dang mtshungs shing //'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs 'jigs pa'o//kha dog dmar po stobs po che//'jig/
175b5(rgyud): pa'i dus kyi me 'dra ba//rtag tu pad+ma rAg mtshungs//de yi dbusu gzi brjid che//nyi ma'i kha dog stobs po che//rdo rtse gsum sna tsho Da pa//shing rta'i snying khar bzhag pa bya/ngal po se'u'i me tog ma tshu
175b6(rgyud): ya ba'i me tog dag dang 'dra//pad+ma pad+ma rA ga mtshungs//sangs rgyas dpa' bo yang dag 'bar//bzang po tshal dang mtshungs 'dra ba//rgya skyegs bcud dang 'dra bar gnas//de yi nye 'khor
175b7(rgyud): thad du//de bzhin sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras//khro bo dang ni mngag pa dag/mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya//de dag thaMd kha dog dmar//gzi brjid khams la 'od ldan pa//'od zer dmar
176a1(rgyud): be rab 'phyo ba//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus sen par//thams cad dumang po tshon cha can//dmar po'i rgyun gyis rnam par brgyan//dmar po'i gos kyis dkab
176a2(rgyud): pa'i lus//phreng ba dmar po mchog 'dzin pa//'di ni gzi brjid gter zhes bya//dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba'o//rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las maM lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor/
176a3(rgyud): chen po rjeg so///de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//dkyil 'khor chen po mchog
176a4(rgyud): gyur pa//rlung gi khams dang 'dra bas na//rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhesu bshad//zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra//dbyar gyi sprin gyi 'od dang mtshungs//a tA si yi me tog 'dra//in+d+ra nI ya'i
176a5(rgyud): 'di dang mtshungs//de yi dbusu pad chen po//baiDUR+Ya'i 'od dang 'dra//shin tu gnag pa'i mig sman mtshungs//sngon dmar gyi ni rnam par gnas//de yi lte ba'i dbus ni//sangs rgyas
176a6(rgyud): dpa' rab 'bar ba//rgyal po la khyil ba 'bar ba'i gzi//mtshan mo nag mo lta bur gnas//u pal sngon po 'dab ma'i tshul//stong pa na mkha' lta bur gnas//de yi nye 'khor thaMd du//
176a7(rgyud): rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras rnam bri//khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang //de bzhin po nye pho nya mo//thaMd sna tshogs rkyen gyis brgyan//de bzhin nag po'i gos gyon pa//ba dan rnam pa sna tshog bsdam//
176b1(rgyud): Sha dag nag po thams cadadu//gdugs ni rnam pa du ma'i dbyings//kha dog sna chags legs 'bar bya//bla de rgyus pa mnyam pa ni//kha dog nag po sna tshogs pa//dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi//
176b2(rgyud): mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya//dkyil 'khor chen po 'di lta bu//sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa//bris nas shes rab can gyis sgom//gal te dngos grub rang 'dod na//rdo rje snying po rgyan
176b3(rgyud): gyi rgyud chen po las rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis slar yang ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/bac+doMs rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
176b4(rgyud): chen po la gsol ba btab pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/do nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'gro
176b5(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga mchog tu gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa/sgeg mo sogs pas mchod pa kun//yod
176b6(rgyud): dag mdor bsdus byas nas ni//sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen por//bdag gi rtag tu bsgom par bya//sngags kyi yi ge yang dag ldan//'dod pa ster ba'i sku ru bya//sgra dang gzugs dang de
176b7(rgyud): bzhin sbyor//yi ge'i phreng ba de bzhin te//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//sngags pas tha~Md rnam par bsam//hUM/sngags pas snying khar son pa sgom//gsang sngags dge
177a1(rgyud): ba brjod nasu//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa//dung gi sgra ru rab tu brjod//dril bu'i sgra ni rashA gsal ba//pad+mo rnal 'byor dbang phyu'o//dus min smin N+yai d+hA na/
177a2(rgyud): sgra//tsaT tsa Ta'i sgra 'phro ba//rdo rje rin chen dbang phyug gis//sgra ru de bzhin gshegs rnams gsungs//nor buM las kyi rigs kyi yang //rnga chen sgro ru rab tu bshad//pi wang gling drud/
177a3(rgyud): bzhin glu//gar gyi rgyun gyi sgra dang ni//rdza rnga'i ngar sgra hUM gi sgra//spyi yi nyid rab tu bshad//rtog pa kun las rnam par sbyar//sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las rnams dang //de nas gzugs kyi
177a4(rgyud): bzlas pa mchog/go rims ji bzhin rab tu bshad//dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang //lha rnams dbang du bya ba ste//de la rang gi tshul rab sbyar//sngags dang phyag rgya rab tu sbyar
177a5(rgyud): de rjes rnam pa kun gyi mchog/rtag tu lus chen bsam bya bsam//lha yi sku gzugs bsgom par bya//lag pa'i phyag rgya rab nges pa'i//phyag rgya 'ong snying khar son shes bya//rang gi
177a6(rgyud): rigs rim cho ga yis//de yi lus ni 'od gsal zhing //sgron ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba'i khyim//de ltar kun nas tha~Md du//kun nas ba spu'i rtse dag nas//'od zer 'byor ba'i phreng
177a7(rgyud): dge bas//gzugs kyi bzlas pa zhesu bshad//de nas sbyor ba'i bzlas pa yis//gsang sngags sgrub pa brtsam par bya/mchod dang byin rlabs dbang bskur mchog/spro la sog+ha rI
177b1(rgyud): ru//sbyor ba'i bzlas pa gtso ba nyid//'bad pa yis ni rab tu bshad//snying kha mgrin pa mchu lho m+bin//rkan dang skye bo nyid ma yin//nang min phyi dang gnyis par min//chos ni 'ba' sha na/
177b2(rgyud): kho na la//bzlas pa'i sgra yang 'byung ma yin//'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che//shes rab pha rol byin gsal ba//sgom pa'i sngags pa de nyid ni//rnal 'byor pa yi gan su bshad//da
177b3(rgyud): rjesku mdor bsdus te//snying kha'i dkyil 'khor rab zlum pa//zla ba gang ba ltar bsam bya//dri ma med cing legs par gnas//de la yi ge rnam par dgod//tshig gi phreng ba ma chad pa//
177b4(rgyud): mu tig phreng ba ltar rgyus pa//char sprin gyi ni me 'dri'i 'od//de tshe tha~Md gsal bar byed//lha yi lus ni snang byed cing //ji lta ji lta yi ge'i phreng //mchog gi lus la rab 'jug pa//
177b5(rgyud): de lta de ltar sngags kyi lus//lha yi bdag nyid nyid 'gyur//mthu stobs lta dbang zad ni//tshangs pa khyib 'jug las chen lhag/bzlas pa'i de nyid mchog 'di ni//sangs rgyas kun
177b6(rgyud): gyi bsngags pa'o//ji ltar rnam par sems ni sgom pa yi//de ltar dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur//rdo rje'i snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las bzlas pa'i de kho na nyid kyi le'u'o//
177b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa rin po che bka' stsal pa/mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi
178a1(rgyud): chos nyid can//thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad//lhan mtha' yus pa su grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa//dri med mi g.yom
178a2(rgyud): med dam pa'i mchog chos can//ston shin tu phra ba'i tshala'ang chad med//dpe ni na mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin//dngos grub mtha' yaso mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams//
178a3(rgyud): son khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol//rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs las byung //smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can//'gro ba'i don grub
178a4(rgyud): rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa//thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang //tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi//bde bar gshegs pa go 'phang dam pa
178a5(rgyud): brnyes gyur kyang //khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi//thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gags par yong mi 'gyur//e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos
178a6(rgyud): nyid mchog dang ldan//mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pa//khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad//mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa
178a7(rgyud): med pa rab mkhyen pas//dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la gsol//'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//yang dag ston rgyas pa ste//lan cig tsam zhig
178b1(rgyud): brjod pas klung //gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni//de bzhin gshegs de kun bskyod nas//rabya yangs dngos grub stsol gyur to//bskal
178b2(rgyud): par gnas shing bskal par bskul//lus ni g.yo ba med pa ru//bdag nyid brtan par byas pa yis//mgon po chen po rnam snang mdzod//mi bskyod rin chen 'byung gnos dang //rgyal po
178b3(rgyud): dag pa 'od dpag med//don yod rgyal ba thaMd du//dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang //mchog kyang rab tu gsol bar byed//dngos grub yid kyi me lus la//rgyas pa'i don dang phun sum
178b4(rgyud): tshogs//re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa//yid la 'dod pa ster bar byed//ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs//mchog tu dge ba gsol bar mdzad//de bzhin gshegs bzad
178b5(rgyud): kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzog so////de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bka'
178b6(rgyud): skyal pa/chos grangs med cing rgyu skar med//sbyang bar gnas pa'i cho ga med//ji ltar bshad pa cho gas bslab pa'i gnas nye bar bzung skye gung yang rung ba'i yid dga' bar ji ltar rung
178b7(rgyud): bo'i nakyi pa 'khor byas te/me tog sil me bkra bo la bdug spos kyis bdug ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ji ltar nus pa'i me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas te/sngags

180a6(rgyud): na sgril pa rnams kyid bsgril ba lta //yi dgas rnams kyang ye dgas kyi stug bsngal las rnam par grol bar b+h+yo// bsgral zin ma kyis sems rnams la 'dud pa ma

180b1(rgyud): dang /ye shes thob pa dang /kha dog dang /chu dang /stobs dang /shugs dang /dIbang phyug la sogs pa'i lton dang ldan pa dang /'jig rten glo khams rgyu ba dang /'khor lo sgyur ba ltar cha/

180b4(rgyud): sprin gyi legs par mchod cing grub pa thams cad 'od kyis lhung por 'gyuraro//brgya byin dang /tshangs po dang /'jig rten spring ba'i stan phyed ster bar 'gyur//gzi brjid dang /gzugs dang /

180b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /byams pa dang /'jamo dpal dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ste dang po'o//
181a1(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par byas te/pri wang dam ldeng sa pad+ma'i sno du bzhag la ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum

181a3(rgyud): brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par sgra li zhing 'khyil bA dang /gdu gu dang ldan zhing lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing rig pa 'dzin pa'i grub pa tha~Md kyis yongasu bskor ba dang /bskal

181a5(rgyud): na tshangs par 'gyu ro//'khor los khyab 'jug du 'gyuraro//grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i sa bzung ste sa srung gri bu byos la de la zhon te bzlas na dbang por 'gyuraro//nyi ma'i dkyil

181b2(rgyud): bas lhung ba dang /rgya mtsho skams pa dang /ljon pa drung nas 'byin pa dang /bum pa na mkha' lo phan pa dang /glang po che rangs par byed pa dang /pha rol gyi sde mngon par 'joms par byed

181b6(rgyud): bdun bzlas nas 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o//rim pa 'dis lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang /stod g.yogs dang mkhar bsil las gang yang rung ba bzung nas ji srid rig pa
181b7(rgyud): 'dzin par gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'gro ba dang /sprul pa du ma byed pa dang /'dod na 'chi ba dang /skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thaMd du/
182a1(rgyud): 'gro zhing de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi nye bar gnas par byed//sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang byed //sgrub pa'i thabs
182a2(rgyud): gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad kyi mchod rten 'bum phrag gcig byos te/rma med pa'i ral gyi blangs la cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la nye bar spyod pa tha~Md kyis mchod brgya
182a3(rgyud): pa 'am/bcu bzhi pa'am/nya grang ba la skyil bkrung bcas te ji srid ral gri 'bar ba dI srid bzla bar bya'o//de'i rjes thogs nyid la rnga bo che rnams kyi sgro grago steng nas me tog gi/
182a4(rgyud): char 'bab par 'gyuraro//lhan cig pa ji snyed pa dang bcas pa steng du d+mo'o//rig pa 'dzin pa tha~Md kyis mchod par 'gyur//rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur//ral gri
182a5(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa chen po'i 'khor lo sgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chos gos dang rgyan 'chang ba 'dod dgur rgyu ba skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams tha~Md du rnam par spyod pa dang /

182b7(rgyud): brgya de brgyad bzla bar bya'o//tha~Md la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la tha mang me tog can gyi lcags la 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa mthe gang tsam pa bzung ba la cho 'phrul gyi zla ba byed//

185a1(rgyud): 'gyuraro//de bzhin du sgrub thabs kyi le'u la bris sku dang shing l+h+wam dang /mu tig pi phreng ba yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i tsho gas bsgrub par bya'o//thams
185a2(rgyud): cad du 'grub par 'gyur//sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang mchod rten bye ba phrag stong byas te/'dum phrag bdun bzla bar bya'o//yongasu rdzogs pa dang /me tog can gyi lhag
185a3(rgyud): sam lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa sor bcu'i tshad dam bod bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsa mo//cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la mtshan thog thag khri'i steng du lag pa
185a4(rgyud): bkab la ji srid bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o//de bzung nas rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor los sgyur ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya phrag dang rje su 'tsham pa rdo rje 'chang ba
185a5(rgyud): ltar gzi brjid dang ldan zhing 'od gsal bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu zhing dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la ci bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur/lha
185a6(rgyud): ma yin rnams skrag pa dang /srin po rnams 'joms pa dang /sems can tha~Md de'i ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi 'khor 'o///
185a7(rgyud): bskur ba chen po de skad ces bka' stsal to//rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzas kyi bya ba bslab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u yongs su
185b1(rgyud): rdzogs so////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang ting 'dzin la mnyam pa rgya gzhag ste/bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa de
185b2(rgyud): rnal 'byer gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab paM/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi gsung ba chen po ka kA sbyar ba ste/mtha' yas pa kha sbyar ba zhes bya ba
185b3(rgyud): bka' stsol du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po gsang sngags kyi kauk+Sha pu Ta bka' stsal pa/de nos yang dag bshad
185b4(rgyud): bya ba/sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes su skyob//gsang sngags ka k+Sha s+phar zhes bya//gsang chen mchog tu rmad du byung //gru bzhi pa li che de mdzes po//kun nas yongasu bzang zhing
185b5(rgyud): dog/re mig bzhi bcu zhe dgu pa//mdor bsdus nas ni sngags pos bya//dang po'i phreng bzang gnyis lan//a sogs blo gos ldan pas dgod//ka sogs lhag ma'i
185b6(rgyud): ra mig la//sngags bes ma de ru bsdus te bri//skor ba dzaM bzhin yi gaM kun//go rims bzhin du dgod par bya//re mig stong pa dge la ni//k+Sha yig dang ni rdo rje bri//rim
185b7(rgyud): pa de dag bkod nas ni//rang sde'i 'ge tu 'bar ba mchog/dang po dbyangs la de'i rjes su//yi ge phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa//ka tsa Ta ta pa ya shA//dag cing chu yi dkyil
186a1(rgyud): 'khor ldan//'di rnams myur du 'grub par byed//pad+ma'i rigs kyi lha'i nyid do//don kun grub par yang dag ldan//me yi dkyil 'khor
186a2(rgyud): zhesu bshad//'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs pa'i 'od//kha tsha the tha phyar Sha//dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor ldan//ga dza Da da ba la sA//dngos grub kun byed rlung gzugs ldan//
186a3(rgyud): dbyar gyi sprin ltar shin tu 'jigs//g+haM d+hi D+ha d+ha b+ha wA hA//steng 'gros dngos grub byed par brjod//slar yang nga nya Na na ma//chos kun dbang du byed pa mtshig/thog ma'i
186a4(rgyud): dbyangs yog gang yin pa//de na de bzhin gshegs stobs bcu//khyad par yan lag bcu gnyis bshad//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis//ma ning yi ge bzhi
186a5(rgyud): po spong //r-i ro l-i l-I zhes bya ba//dbyangs dang sa bon de bzhin sngags//de dag yi ge ru yang bshad//dbang du byed pa'i sde tshan kun//thig le sgra gtsug zla phyed ces//sna ldan/
186a6(rgyud): kyi ni phreng zhes bshad//sangs rgyas de bzhin byang sems kyis//yi ger brjod pa de bzhin zhing //gsal byed ces kyis gsal ba'o//de bzhin ya ra la ba rlung //me dang dbang
186a7(rgyud): ldan bdag po ste//'byung ba chen po'i khams rnamaso//rlung me bdud rtsi'i bcud ces bshad//mnyam dang mi mnyam cha dbye bas//thad nyid kyi lam zhes bya//phyag rgya dang ni
186b1(rgyud): kyi 'khor sngags//ting 'dzin mdor bsdus bshad pa'o//mo rtag spug bsngal stong bdag med//chos kun las ni gton nas ster//stong pa mtshan med smon med pa//rnam par thar
186b2(rgyud): pa gsum du bshad//phung po khams dang skye mched rnams//mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya//da ni sngags kyi ka k+Sha'i sbyor ba las//rab tu btus pa sbyar ba dang //phral ba bshad
186b3(rgyud): par bya'o//yi ge rnams kyis byang chub dpyod//sangs rgyas nyid kyang mya ngan 'das//lha ni cig nyid du skyer bar bya//dbyangs rnams kyis ni bsdus pa bshad//mtshan nyid kyang ni rab
186b4(rgyud): bshad bya//dbyangs ni byang chub gzugs nyid//gzhan dang lhan cig sbyor bar bya//de la nges par sangs rgyas nyid//ster pa nyid du legs par bshad//thog mar sangs rgyas tha~Md kyis///
186b5(rgyud): gsang sngags dri ma med pa 'byung //thog mar dbyangs ni thig ler ldan//rdo rje'i steng du yang dag gnas//'bar ba'i phreng can rab zhi ba//rnam par 'phro ba nyid du gnas//zla ba'i dbusu
