186b6(rgyud): bsgom bye ba//kun gyi ye shes 'od po che//kun tu 'gro ba rab tu thob//thad du yang rnyed par dka'//de ni gdod nas gnas rtag pa//yi ge med cing dbyer med pa//byang chub sems zhes
186b7(rgyud): rab tu bshad//dung dang kun da zla ltar dag/gnyis pa'i sgra dang yang dag ldan//de ni shin tu ring por shes//sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa ste//sa dang pha rol phyin po rnams//u sma rnams/
187a1(rgyud): kye rnam pa ni//mya ngan 'das pa zhesu bsgrags//dablangs dang yi ge byung bar can//mtshan nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya//rang gi phyag rgya thogs ldan pa//sangs rgyas byang
187a2(rgyud): chub rab gsol byed//da ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//sngags kyi de nyid 'di bshad bya//thog mar spyod pa byas nas ni//gnyis pa smra ba po ru bshad//zhi ba'i dbyangs kyis kun nas
187a3(rgyud): mnan//gsum pa'i ming ni yid ces bya//rgyu med pas ti cung zad pa//bzhi pa yis ni gsal bar byas//drug pa'i sgra dang ldan pa la//de yi steng du thig le gnas//chos kun
187a4(rgyud): na mkha' dang mtshungs par//yang dang ying du bshad pa yin//de ni lnga par shes par bya//yi ge lnga pa stobs po che//yi ge lnga yi stobs lnga'i bdag nyid las skyes gtso//mthu/
187a5(rgyud): stobs chen po khyab bdag srid pa'i bdag nyid skyes//mthu stobs chen po srid gsum las rab grol byed pas//yi ge lnga ni 'gro ba drug las grol ba'i bdag/mngon shes
187a6(rgyud): drug kyang rab tu stor byed dri ma med//de nyid bcom ldan spyod pa ste//mi bskyod pa zhes rab tu grags//byang sems rdo rje sems dpa' ste//brtan pa'i sems dpar rab byung ba//
187a7(rgyud): chos kun gyi ni de bzhin nyid//gang bsgrags de ni thams cad du//me yi sa bon dang ldan pa//dpyad pa yi ni steng du gnas//de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni//rin chen 'byung ldan
187b1(rgyud): gosu bshad//chos rnams kun gyis byed pa ni//med pa nyid du'ang bshad pa'o//ma yi sa bon yang dag ldan//bzhi bya'i dpyas kyi spyi bo ru/mnan pa rgyal ba 'odra dpag med//
187b2(rgyud): nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni//sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa kun//drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan//don yod po yi snying por grags//sde lnga pa yi bzhi pa ni//dngos dang /
187b3(rgyud): dngos med rab rtogs byed//me yi sa bon rab tu ldan//'khor lo'i dbus su rab tu gnas//drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan//thig le sgra yis rnam par spras//'khor los
187b4(rgyud): bsgyur ba ye shos che//rnam par rgyal ba'i nor ster byed//gang zhig sde lnga pa yi mtha'//sgyu ma'i chos la rab tu gnas//de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni//gdugs dkar shaM su bshad pa'o//
187b5(rgyud): brgyad pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan//byams po zhes ni grags pa ste//de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni//spyi bor thig le mnan pa'o//'jam pa'i dbyangs dang yis che//mA ma ki ra de bsgrubs
187b6(rgyud): so//lnga yi dpyad dang yang dag ldan//'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags//spyod pa'i gar mkhan rab rtogs ming //sdig pa thang rangs byed//rnaM par sel ba zhes bya ba//sdig kun rnam par
187b7(rgyud): sbyong byed pa//sngo chen lnga pa'i gsum pa ni//phyag na rdo rje stobs chen dang //gshin rje mthar byed khro bo che//yi ge gsum ni stobs chen po//thog mar dgu pa yi ni dbyangs//de yi dbus spyod pa
188a1(rgyud): bzhag/tha mar sna tshogs zhes bya sbyar//sku gsum du ni rnam par sgrom//tha ma'i sde tshan gsum pa ni//gang yin kun tu bzang por bshad//sde tshun dang de'i gsum pa ni//
188a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba'o//de nyid bcom ldan mgon pa ni//ni mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags//rdo rje khro bo stobs po che//de nyid rab tu grags pa'o//'di kun thaMd stong pa ste//rgyu ni
188a3(rgyud): rab tu spangs pa'o//dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dge ldan//rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM mdzad//gang zhig bzhi pa'i sde dang po'o//me dang rab tu ldan pa dang //bzhi pa'i dbyangs dang yang drag ldan//gza
188a4(rgyud): brjid phung po stobs po che//de nyid gang dang ma skyed //sgril ma zhes rab tu grags//bzhi pa yi ni gnyis pa dang //shes rab pha rom phyin par nges//thig le lhan cig yang dag ldan/
188a5(rgyud): sgra dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gyur//sde chen gnyis pa'i gsum pa gang //me nyid dung ni yang dag ldan//bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyi yang dag mnan//khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog
188a6(rgyud): de nyid bcom ldan zhes bya bar//spyod pa'o gar mkhan zhes bya'i mtshan//de yi rjes nyid la ni me//dgu pa'i dbyings dang yang dag ldan//gsum pa'i dbyings kyis mnan pa yi//
188a7(rgyud): sde chen dang po'i dang bro s+ho//de nyid bcom ldan mgon pa ni//'jig rten mgon po thub pa che//ye shes rgya che ba sgrub par bya//sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed//sna rgyun /
188b1(rgyud): la rin chen mchog/bzhi pa'i sa blon dam pa ste//'og tu mo yi yan lag ldan//khro gnyer can zhes rab tu grags//dbang chen yi ge drag pa la//thig le sgra yi rnam par rgyan//sangs
188b2(rgyud): rgyas rgyan zhes rnam grags pa//sdig pa tha~Md 'phrog par byed//sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni//na mkha'i spyan zhes brjod pa'o//sgyu ma'i chos la rab gnas nas//gsod pa'i don du rab tu
188b3(rgyud): gsal//mA ma kI zhes bya ba'i ming //rig pa mchog tu gsang bya ste//rgyu mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams kyis//dri ma med pa stsol ba byed//gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang yang dgra ldan//'ophags
188b4(rgyud): pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya//dbang chen sa bon yang dag ldan//'gro ba'i rdo rje rangs byed na//gdug pa gzhan kun smos ci dgos//rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyar byas pa//rang gi se bin gnas
188b5(rgyud): shing 'phro//'gro ba thaMd skrod byed na//gdug sems can gzhan smos ci dgos//de nyid me dang ldan pas na//dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams dang //bgegs dang dgra rnams zhi ba ni//khyad
188b6(rgyud): par mi g.yo ba yis byed//don dam bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs//rnam par snang mdzad gnas las byung //gzhan gyi dmig dpung 'joms pa ni//ma dang ldan pa nyid kyis bya//drug pa'i
188b7(rgyud): dbyangs dang yang dag ldan//thig le sgra yis rnam par rgyan//rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis grangs pas//'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed//ti si man dar la sogs//de yi phye
189a1(rgyud): mar rlog par nges//rdo rje la gnas 'khor la yi//dbus nas 'gro kun rus par byed //gnas nas bskyed par byas pa yis//'byung po rnams ni dbang du byed //
189a2(rgyud): rtag pa'i gzugasu gnas nas ni//mi g.yo ba yi snying khar son//chos kyi dbyings mtshungs thob nas ni//bdag gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya//rlung gi sa bon rin po che//spyod pa'i steng du
189a3(rgyud): yang dag ldan//me las byung ba me la gnas//'gro ba thams cad 'bebaso par byed//sde tshan dang po'i dang po gang //sa yaM yi ge sbyong du mnan//sde tshan lnga pa'i tha ma ni//drug pa'i/
189a4(rgyud): sgra yi steng du gnas//'og tu me yi sa bon ldan//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ste//se gsum thams cad 'bar bar byed//me yi phyogasu gnas nas ni//phyag rgya'i bdag nyid
189a5(rgyud): thams cad sgom//rlung lha ma lha yang dag sbyor//rgyu ni byed pa mtshungs pa'o//rnam par snang mdzad ye shes che//de nyid kho na bsgrub par bya//dbang chen mon sbyor ba las//'khor lo
189a6(rgyud): sgyur ba'i go 'phang gnas//ye shes rgya chen bsgrub par bya//yang na phun sum tshogs pa'i don//rig pa 'dzin dang sangs rgyas nyid//rnal 'byor ye shes phun sum tshogs//
189a7(rgyud): skye ba 'di las 'grub 'gyur te//'di la the tshom mi bya'o//dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad la//sbyor ba'i dbye ba rnam par gnas//tshi go dang ngag gi tshad rnams dang //ting
189b1(rgyud): 'dzin rnams thang du//slob dpon man ngapa shes bya ste//gzhan du bya ba ma yin//rdo rje snying pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las rdo rje ka kA'i sbyar ba mdor bsdus te bstan pa
189b2(rgyud): ste/rgyas par slob dpon gyis mngon par dpyad par bya'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur pas/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor
189b3(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug la gsung ngag gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba btab pa/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/de rnams kyis gsal ba btab pa'i tshig gi rjes nyid la/'brug
189b4(rgyud): gi sgra mtha' yas pa'i legs par bsgrags pa na mkha'i mdzod kun nas rdo rje rgya che ba tshangs pa chen po'i sgra yongasu rdzogs pa'i don dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi gsung gi 'khor lo'i
189b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor so sor yongasu rtogs pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//gsung
189b6(rgyud): gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor cha//zlum po kun nas bzang po ste//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas//de yi steng du pad chen po//'dab ma brgyad la ge sar can//da ye lte ba'i dbus
189b7(rgyud): su ni//yi ge mchog ga go 'phang nyid//bdag gi dngos grub bsgom par bya//ngag gi dbang phyug 'od chen po//snying khar zla ba dang pad+ma//de yi steng du dung brtag bya//dung gi dbus
190a1(rgyud): sA lha yin te//rdorje'i rang bzhin dge ba'o//de yi s+yAd du rin chen pad//yang na sangs rgyas gzugs ban+d+hanA yang //'bar zhing rgan gyi mthar khyab pa//
190a2(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab 'bab pa//pA yi yi ge spyi tshugs pa//sangs rgyas kyi ni steng du gnas//bdud rtsi'i thig pa 'dzag pa ni//go rims bzhin du bsam par bya//zla bo phyed
190a3(rgyud): dang zla ba gcig/yang na zla ba bzhi 'am ni//zla ba brgyad du rab mchog bsgoms//dkyil 'khor bzang po bsgrub par bya//skyil dkrung gi ni nyer gnas te//dang po'i sbyor ba'i
190a4(rgyud): dbang phyug skyes//chos kyi dbyings ni mtha' dag tu//thams cad du ni yongasu gang //sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya//chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//sangs
190a5(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa'i//ji snyed rig pa thams cad ni//lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis//phyag rgya do rnams bdag nyid mchog/de rnams thams cad bdag nyid kyis//
190a6(rgyud): lus kyi 'khor lo la 'jug bsam//dung gi sgra ni gsal ba bsam//pad+ma'i khams la yang dag rten//pad+ma'i ge sar thig le las//sgra yi rang bzhin rdul phran rnams//mgrin
190a7(rgyud): par son nas sgra gyur te//de las kyang ni ji ltar gyur//slar yang lce ru sen pa dang //yi ge mchog tu dge ba'o//lce yi yi ge cher 'bar ba//gcig nas cig tu rdo rje'i tshul
190b1(rgyud): kun nas rab tu 'od gsal ba//rdo rje'i ngag ni dam pa'i don//sgra yis na mkha'i kun gang bar//sgrub pas mdo ru bsdus te bzla//de bzhin du ni snying khar sgra//lce la 'od zer nges 'dres na//
190b2(rgyud): mchu 'am saM las rab bkra ba'i//gal te 'od zer mthong na ni//de tshe grub par rnam par shes//grub pa'i ngag ni dam pa'i don//yang na lha ni gzhan pa yis//ngag gi sgrub thabs chen po mchog/
190b3(rgyud): rang lce rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam//bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i rang //'bar ba'i sgron ma dang mtshungs pa//rang gi snying gi dbus kyi tsha//yi ge mchog tu phra ba yis//a yi yi ge
190b4(rgyud): mnga' bdag mchog/rnam par bkra ba nyi ma bzhin//rang gi sde pa'i mthar thug mtshungs//yi ge yi ger yongasu gzhol//phra mo mnyam pa'i mthar thug ni//'bar zhing thig le dang mtshungs
190b5(rgyud): shing //snying gi dkyil 'khor gsal byed pa//de yi 'bar ba rab phra ba//ji srid rkan gyi bar du son//slar yang yi ge thams cad ni//yang dang yang du gsal byed cing //rdo rje 'bar ba
190b6(rgyud): stong phrag dang //yang dang yang du rnam par 'don//'jig rten kun tu de song ste//chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//yi ge'i rang bzhin rnam bkra ba//rAng gis 'gro ba rnam byas te//
190b7(rgyud): slar yang 'ongs nas rang gnas//'jug pa ru ni yongasu brtag/de nas sgra dang yi ge ni//lte bar song ste yongasu gnas//lte ba ru ni pad+ma mchog/pad+ma rdo rje dri med mdzes/dam
191a1(rgyud): stang du dung chen po//rab tu 'phro ba nyid du gnas//de las 'bar ba'i rnam pa'o sgra//brang blo gnas nas yongasu byung //slar yang mabyon pa
191a2(rgyud): song nas//rdo rje lce la yang dag rig/'bram pa sbyar ba'i dbus ni//sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma mang //khya ba bye zho ltar dkar 'od /btsud len bdud rtsi'i thogs bA
191a3(rgyud): rdo rje lcen mtha' dag rnams//yang dang yang du gsol bar byed//ting 'dzin gyi rtsa rA sin te//slar yang snying kha nyid du song //thig le las ni gug skyeng gyur//gu skyed ri mo ring /
191a4(rgyud): can cha shas rnam bzhi 'dus pa las//don yi ger rnam par shes//yI gr-i las ni sgra skye zhing //sgra las nA da de las dbyangs//dbyangs las ngag tu rnam par 'gyur//yi ge/
191a5(rgyud): las na cha shas tshigs//tshig rkang dang ni ngag du 'gyur//tshig rkang las ni tshig bcang dang //de bzhin du ni bA thA dang //phreng 'dzin rgyun chags de bzhin te//'di ltar sngag
191a6(rgyud): dang rig sngags dang //rang gi snying por rab tu 'gyur//de nas bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor che//blo gros ldan pas brtan byas te//dbug dang gzhug dang btsang ba dang //
191a7(rgyud): dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya//bzlas pa 'di mos sbyor ba yi//thams cad du ni brtan par bya//yid bzhin gyi ni ngag 'gru'o//rmang byung mchog tu rnyed dka' ba'i//
191b1(rgyud): yang dag stan gzhan pa yi//dag 'grub thams cad skyob rnams kyi//yi ga gar+b+hag pa gsang chen pa//dag gi zla ba thabs mchog d+ha //sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid na/
191b2(rgyud): legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom//rang snying zlo bar rdo rje che//'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od//de las bstan bcos thams cad ni//nges par gadren pa nyid du
191b3(rgyud): ngag grub pa yi ye shes 'das//thams cad mkhyen pa thob par byed//bstan bcos thams cad rab 'don cig/de nyid kyang ni 'chang par byed//sems can kun gyis tham
191b4(rgyud): cad du//dngos po cung zad gang bsams pa//de dag thams cad rnam shes te//skad cig tsam la smra bar byed//rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba las dgra gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs
191b5(rgyud): /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs mchog gi dbang phyug la gsol pa
191b6(rgyud): btab pa//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi tshi ga rgyas pa sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'dra
191b7(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis de dag gis gsol ba btab pa/nye bar shes na nas de de bzhin zhes bka' stsal nas/de bzhin gi zhigs pa thams cad kyi gsade snga
192a1(rgyud): kyi mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim par skyo ba'i cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/dro nas yang dag bshad bya bya//'khor los bsgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i
192a2(rgyud): thabs//'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rnam par bri//yang na bcu drugu rtsibs kyang dro//ste byar de bzhin gshegs pa dgong //'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par D+yan+ya//mtha'
192a3(rgyud): rin chen rnam pa bdun//mkhas pa yis ni spel bar bya//de yi lte bar bdag nyid ni//'khor lo sgyur ba stobs po che//sangs rgyas gyen gyi sku chen po//chos kyi dbyings
192a4(rgyud): dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/de yi phyag rgya bgang pas 'das//skad cig ma ni nyid la 'thon//'gro ba thams cad snang byas nas//sngags kyu dbang phyug nyid la gzhug/'khor
192a5(rgyud): lo'i dngos grub gzi brjid che//'khor los bskur bar bdag nyid 'gyur//chub dang tshe dang dbang phyug dang //rang dbang 'dod dgur spyod pa dang //kun tu 'gro ba nyid
192a6(rgyud): dang ni//kun gyi dbang phyug phran tshogs 'bras//rga dang 'chi bo med thub cing //nges par 'khor las bsgyur dang mtshungs//gser gyi 'khor lo rin po che//de bzhin
192a7(rgyud): dngul dang shol nyid dang //me tog can gyis lcags kyang rung //rang gi lag gis bzung nas su//dbang cheni dkyil 'khor dbus ni//sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par
192b1(rgyud): byed/'khor los bsgyur ba gzi brjid che//mtshan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan//de ltar bdag nyid bsgoms nas ni//'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du 'gyur//de la de'i sngags kyi
192b2(rgyud): tshig tu gyur pa ni//oM sarba tab+hA be two Sha U bA lo ki ta/mu dz+r-i Nikra wadz+nyo dzAM l+yA dz+nyA laM d+hA na bi d+hA na tA mA ra ya mA ra ya/uts+tsha TA ya ho na b+hany+dza mr-i khA ni kuN+DA li ni a pu rA dze tAsmA d+ha
192b3(rgyud): d+hI/d+h+r-i d+hu pan+d+ha pan+d+ha swAhA//rtsa ba'i sngagaso//oM a~M a pa rA dzi tA d+h+ri ka swAhA//sgying po'o//na miHsan+d+hi bud+d+hA nAM/a pra ti ha ti shrI sa na oM pa~M dI dzi ta d+h+r-i ka swAhA//mchog gi b+h+r-i
192b4(rgyud): po'o//'khor los bsgyur bar rab glu ster//sangs rgyas nyid ni thob nas ni//ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs//yang na dbang phyug dam pa kun//dpa'i' bo thams cad stor byed
192b5(rgyud): nadadangos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos//'khor los bsgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thab so//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//na mkha' lA nI yongasu sgom//gzi brjid phung po ye shes//
192b6(rgyud): che//sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur//gnyis meng 'byung sems kyi mchog/dkyil 'khor mchog tu rmad 'byung ba//de ni mye yi shes par bya//sangs rgyas byang chub
192b7(rgyud): rab drub byed//de yang 'khor lo 'dzin rgyal po//'khor los bsgyur ba legs 'bar ba//de la de bzhin rin cheni 'dun//'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//'khor la
193a1(rgyud): nadakyil 'khor dbus danas par//ti myur ra'i bkra shis sbrum//baN+Di badz+rId phung ba sku chen po//snyam cu rtsa gnyis madz+nyAn 'chung ba//'bar pa'i drung
193a2(rgyud): 'khrugs dpa' bo ni//snang ba shar ba lta bur gnas//de yi phyag rgya rtag tu bsam//na mkha'i rnam par legs par gnas//chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa//'od zer
193a3(rgyud): breng bas rnam par khyab//de dang bdag nyid rdo rjer sgom//sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed//kun tu kun nas thams cad du//dngos po kun las 'byung bar 'gyur//me
193a4(rgyud): shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs//kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni//sangs rgyas thams cad nyid dag dang //rdo rje can kun nyid dang ni//gzi brjid mchog kun thob gyur nas//ba
193a5(rgyud): rung po 'dra bar 'gyu/de seM byas kyi tshig tu gyur bA ni/oMt+pASh+T+rA ga lam+b+ha pA l-i ka tanad+hI smr-i la d+hAs+yAd+h+ya kad+ha ka/d+hI d+hA bi b+h+rU~M Sh+Tha/
193a6(rgyud): hUM hUM baT baT swAhA/rtsa ba'i sngagaso//oM to dzo rA si swA hA/snying po'o//oM dz+wa la ti dzi ra si hUM phaT swAhA//nye ba'i snying po'o//dag pa'i gsang sngags 'di rnams kyis/
193a7(rgyud): nyi ma'i ye shes rab tu gsal//kun tu 'gro ba 'grub par bya//rig pa 'dzin pa nyid thob 'gyur//gzi brjid phung po gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa'i thabs//kun nas snang
193b1(rgyud): /ba zhes bya mchog/spyi go gsum pa stobs po che//gser gyi khwa dog legs 'bar zhing //gtsug tor steng na 'ad gsal ba//sngags pa rang bdag gis bsgom bya//kun nas sngang
193b2(rgyud): ba lta bur 'gyur//oM AHhU~M/gsod sngags rtse mo//dam pa 'di//bsgoms pa tsam gyis thams cad du//brtan pa dang nI g.yo ba yi//'gro kun kun nas snang bar 'gyur//
193b3(rgyud): kun nas snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thab so//chos kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya che//legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom//sangs rgyas kun nyid kun gyi mchog/chos kyi
193b4(rgyud): 'khor lo rab bskor byed//'khor lo 'di ni rtsibs bcu gnyis//rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs gnas//rnam gsum gsum ni yongs bskor ba//bya ba'i don du dag pa ste//
193b5(rgyud): spangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po//nam khri'i khrugs na gnas pa ste//chos kyi dbyings ni khyab pa ni//legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom/'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba ni//
193b6(rgyud): 'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung ba//'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya che//sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed//de yi sngagasu gyur pa ni//oM d+h+yA na satwA ya ts+tshin+da tsakra Na/badz+ra Ni hUM/gsang
193b7(rgyud): sngags 'di ni dpal ldan mchog/chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis med 'tshor//skad cig tsam gyis thams cad du//dam pa'i chos ni stobs ldan byed//chos kyi 'khor lo sgrub
194a1(rgyud): blo'i thab so//chos kyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa 'dra//sangs rgyas sgra gzugs lenas 'byar Ta//rdul 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog bslabasnu na//nyon mongs rdo rje dang //
194a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur//snying nas rdo rje gzugs brnyan 'dra//'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'dra//de yi snying la rdo rje me//dri ma med pa skyes par 'gyur//nyon mongs rtag rgya yongs zad/
194a3(rgyud): kyi//dgra rnams kun las rgyal bar byed//bden pa bzhi ni rtogs pas na//bden pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur//sngags ni oM kle sha A sha ni hU~M phaT/'di ni nyon mongs
194a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i sngags//drag cing drag po'i gzhan gnon pa'o//sangs rgyas nyid kyang ster byed na//dngos grub gzhan lto smos ci dgos//nyon mongs rdo rje sgrub pa'i thebs//dbang chen
194a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i//sangs rgyas rang bzhin stobs po che//bdud bzhi las ni rnam rgyal ba//legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom//bden pa bzhi yi khu
194a6(rgyud): tshur che//lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid//khu tshur sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//gnyis medo skye ba'i mtshan nyid do//rdo rje'i dbus bsgom par bya//rang nyid sangs rgyas
194a7(rgyud): yin no zhes//brtan dang g.yo ba'i 'gro ba ni//'di dag thams cad ma skyes por//rdo rje khu tshur bsgoms nas ni//rdo rje khu tshur 'dri bar 'gyur//de la sngagasu gyur pa ni/
194b1(rgyud): a bo dza ye hAHde bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur che//shes rab pa la phyin gsal ba//sngags pas rtag tu desgoms na ni//shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'thob//de bzhin gshes
194b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sgrub pa'i thabs//dngos grub las byung 'od gsal ba//gdod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med//sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po//dkyil 'khor
194b3(rgyud): po'i dbu su'o//rdo rje'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid sgom//'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis//'di yis 'jig rten thams cad kyi//'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du ni//'jig rten kun gyi thaMd
194b4(rgyud): du//kun nas phun sum tshogs pa kun//bkug nas gus pas sbyin par bya//sngags ni oM dz+wa lA dz+wa la dI pya dI pye ud ga toSh+NI ShA d+hu naM d+hu na hU~M/snying 'gro'i gtsug tor zhes/
194b5(rgyud): bya bar//sangs rgyas dpa' bo kun gyi gsungs//'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni//sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' mi na//de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug to
194b6(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs//sangs rgyas rang bzhin phyag rgya che//legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom//tshad skyob gdugs dkar chen po na//chos dbyings mnyam dang ma mnyam
194b7(rgyud): po//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//zla ba'i kha dag cher 'bar zhing //chu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa//dri med bun de ri kar gnas//ri mo bdun gyis yongs
195a1(rgyud): gang //bcud len wA bur+yA bsgom par bya//dngos grub 'di yi sbyor ba yis//sems can rnams la byams du//re bya thams cad yangs rdzogs pa//dUr+Ya//
195a2(rgyud): gtsug tor gdugs dkar tshe//sngags ni oM ma ma ma mA hU~M ni//'di ni bsgrubs po tsam gyis ni//ye shes tshe dang stobs mgyo gas 'gro/dpa' bo thams cad thob 'gyur zhing /
195a3(rgyud): sangs ng+yas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min//gdugs dkar ba yi sgrub thabs//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lha gnas par//'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs ral bri ni//sngags pa
195a4(rgyud): snying khar bsgom par bya//rang gi bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes//sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin chen pos//na mkha'i mthongs rnams yongs gang ba//bdag nyid gnyis med
195a5(rgyud): po yis//rnal 'byor gcig tu bsgom par bya//sngags kyi yi ge 'khor lo che//'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od//sngags pas snying khur bsgom par bya//rgyal
195a6(rgyud): dam pa nyid du 'gyur//sngags ni oM dz+wa la dz+r-IM raSh+Ta~M Sho dz+wa la dz+wa la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha da ma dam dru ma drA ma da ha da ha nA d+hI/rgyal ba'i gtsug tor ral-i gri che//shes rab ye shes dI ma
195a7(rgyud): med//sngags pas kun nas bsgoms nas ni//rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'dra bar 'gyur//rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thab so//sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin
195b1(rgyud): su da 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrubs pa'i 'ad//sod na ShAdz+nyA yo spyang du byas ma//yang nu dzad+hA'i gdan la banas//kun tu gtsug tor tshur 'bar ba//sbrang khar yongasu bsgom par bya/
195b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni//yi ge dam pa yi ni gnas//thog ma tha ma med zhi ba//chos kyi sku ni mchog tu che//'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni//kun tu gtsug tor
195b3(rgyud): stobs po che//skad cig de la 'grub 'gyur te//rdo rje sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhi no//sngags ni/oM badz+ra ban d+ha hUM/gsang sngags 'di ni dam pa gtso//sangs rgyas thaMd
195b4(rgyud): dbang bskur byed//rtag tu rdul 'byor pas bsgoms ni//de ni kun gyi dbang bskuro//rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
195b5(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi cho ga nus pa'i rim par phye ba yongasu rdzug so/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur te/
195b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsung sngags kyi sgrub pa rgyas pa bka' stsal
195b7(rgyud): du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang thug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
196a1(rgyud): bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi rim par phye ba bka' stsal pa/shes rab ye sheswA d+ha/
196a2(rgyud): snying khar yongasu bsgoms nas//ral gri 'bar ba gzi brjid che//mtha' klas pa la rnam par gnas//'jam dbyangs zhes bya bsgom par bya//gur gum gyi ni rnam
196a3(rgyud): paM 'dra//gtsug na zur phud lnga ldan pa//gzho nu byas pa'i gzugs can ni//mtha' yas rgyas pa'i rlabs che bo'i//rnam par 'phro ba lto bur gnas//ud bral
196a4(rgyud): sngon po phyag na bsnams//dpa' chen dang ni me las 'khrungs//ye shes chen po gzi brjid che//'khrulnga pa med cing yi ge bral//sangs rgyas kun bdag shes
196a5(rgyud): rabye mchog/nyonr-i mongs thams cad zad par byed//rdo rje kun bdag bkod pa po//kun tu 'gro ba'i dam pa'i don//dbyer med mchog tu gsang ba po//rig pa
196a6(rgyud): mchog gi bdag nyid 'di//zhal drug pa la phyog drug mchog/mngon shes drug ldan yi ge drug/rjes dran drug gi sbyor ba yis//phyag rgya dam pa stobs po rje//
196a7(rgyud): gzi brjid yang na stobs kyis kyang //kun nas yongasu gsal ba po//gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste//na mkha'i khrums na rnam par gnas//yang ni phyag gnyis
196b1(rgyud): shos par bya//ting 'dzin gnas sdig pa bcom//dpa' bo pad+mal gnas pa//zla ba'i mdog can nga po che//rnal 'gyur pa ma ye shes pa//shes rab par la byon pa 'ang
196b2(rgyud): da nas ma skyes pa zhes pasam//sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed//sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog/'dzom dpa'i dbyangs shes rab tu grags//de'i sdugs ni/
196b3(rgyud): oM Sh+NI ts+tshe da na moHgsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gos //gsung chen rje ni dam par gnad /rnam par gams kyi sgro mar gnas//pha rol phyin drug rab tu gsal//rang nyid shes
196b4(rgyud): rab yon shes//sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya//dbang po drug ni rab bsgyur te//sangs rgyas nyid ni rnal 'byor lngas//pad+ma rA gau lce de'i mdog/ston zla lta
196b5(rgyud): gsal ba//sems dpa' chen po gser gyi mdog/stobs po che ni bsgom dAr bya//'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis nI/shes rab dri ma med par 'gyur//bstan bcos
196b6(rgyud): thams cad dbu smra zhing //dbang phyug thams cad mdun na gnas//rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang //byang chub kun gyi phyi rol son//dbang phyug kun dang bde ba//chos
196b7(rgyud): rnams kun gyi yon tan mchog/rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang //yang na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//kun tu 'gro ba thob 'grub na//dngos grub gzhan lta smos
197a1(rgyud): dgas//dngul chu bcud len+da de nyid dang //rkang pas spyod pa de nyid mchog/rnyil bu dang ni mi snang ba//thams cang du ni ster bar 'gyur//dpal
197a2(rgyud): ldan 'jam pa'i mchog 'din+de//sa~M d+d+hi dung gyi mchog lus 'byungs//sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshangs pa'i dbyangs//'jam pa'i dbye ste zhes rabaN+DI grags/
197a3(rgyud): 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni//bsams pa'i phun sum tshogs kun gyis//sangs rgyas kun tu brtan 'gro na//gzhan pa'i lha lta smos ci dgos//'jam pa'i
197a4(rgyud): dbyangs kyi sgrub pa'i thab so//snying khar pad+ma chen po la//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongasu gnas//'jig rten dbang phyug dpa' bo che//thugs rje chen po'i thugs ldan pa/
197a5(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa//dung dang kun du zla ltar dag/chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung //chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po la//bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug lces//
197a6(rgyud): de la gnas pa dge ba sgom//rang bzhin gyis ni 'di kun dag/gdod nas ma skyes ma byung ba//gsang sngags chen po 'di yis ni//snying khar yongasu bsgom par bya//'jig rten
197a7(rgyud): dbang phyug 'khor lo che//kun tu rnam par 'gro ba yi//'bar po'i phreng bso 'khrigs shing ni//rale pa'i bor chugs 'dzin pa po//ral pa'i dbus dpa' ba che//'od dpad//
197b1(rgyud): ldan /bdag ldan//rmya ba lta du gas//kun+da dz+nyA na mkha' yongs srung gA/gas sngags sbyor bdag sto rlom par \u0f7f//ra jog rten gas m+b+ha maN+Dag
197b2(rgyud): sa kyi mtha' smras pa//pad+ma'i lus kyi yang dag gang //kun tu pad+ma rnams la ni//khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sku//khyad par du dge dgang par bya//'gri bA brtan dang dum
197b3(rgyud): ba kun//snang dang mi snang dngos po ni//yang dang yang du blta bar bya//gdul bya ma lus sems la ni//stobs po ches ni dgang bar bya//rtsa dron dbyis ni 'di bzhin du//sna
197b4(rgyud): gzugs la cher 'bra ri ba//kun nas yongasu bsdus nas no//sngags pa'i mngon du bzhag par bya//de nas sngags pas de ma thag/blor yang rtse gcig sems kyis ni//dgug
197b5(rgyud): dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang //dbang du bya ba bsgrib par bya//'jig rten dbang phyug thub chen po//bcom ldan rnal 'byor can grub na//dpa' bo thams cad stsol 'gyur zhing //
197b6(rgyud): rang gi dngos grub mchog rnams dang //rnal 'byor thams cad 'dzin nyid dang //rnam par rgyas pa'i nor ste ru 'gyur//rig pa 'dzin dang 'khor lo can//saM dang phyi rol byin
197b7(rgyud): sogs dang //sangs rgyas rnams kyang stsal 'gyur na//dngos grub gzhan lnga spros ci dgos//de'i sngags ni oM A~M ro li ka/gsang sngags dpal ldan mchog 'di ni//rong
198a1(rgyud): nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal//longs spyod thams cad bkug nas ni//skad cig tsam gyis rnam par ster//pad+ma'i sgrub pa'i sbyor ba yi//bdag nyid/
198a2(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub//'jig rten gsum gyis rgyal rnams ni//srid pa bkug nas rnam par ster//'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thib so//thams cad rdo rje'i
198a3(rgyud): rang bzhin gzugs//me yI dkyil 'khor dge ba ste//de yi dbusu bya ba ni//dkyil 'khor rlung dang rab mtshungs pa//de yi dbus de 'dra bsam//nyi mA yi ni dkyil
198a4(rgyud): 'khor ro//de yi dbu gu gzi brjid che//'bar bA lta bu'i gzi brjid can//rdo rje'i lag pa gzi brjod che//rgyun rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//tshangs pa'i yul sa thaMd
198a5(rgyud): du//kun nas yongasu gsal bar byed//hUM gi yi ge sgra zab mo//dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od//rgyal po 'khyil ba dang mtshungs pa//zar ma yi ni me tog 'dra//
198a6(rgyud): 'bar ba dmar pos 'khrigs shing 'jigs//bskal pa'i me dang 'dra bar gnas//zhal bzhi pa las mche ba bzhi//'jigs pa'i dus kyi thal pa 'dra//d+h+r-i ga
198a7(rgyud): ge bzhi dang ldan//sprin 'khrugs pa dang rab tu 'dra//rdo rje hUM mdzad ces bya ba//rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu sgom//sngags kyi tshig ni/oM sum b+ha ni mum sbyini hU~M/(
198b1(rgyud): /g+hAh+NA pa ya gr-id+d+ha pa yats+tsha/A nA yA ha~Mr+dz+dzag wAn+ta/d+harAdzahU~M phaT/rdo rje 'dzin par rgyal po 'di//kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gas//'jig rte gsum ya
198b2(rgyud): 'gugs byed na//bud med gzhin lta smos ci dogs//tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen sogs//chung ma dang bcas phyag rgyar bcas//de dag thams cad 'gugs byed na//sdug
198b3(rgyud): bsngal can gzhan smos ci dgos//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//rdo rje'i gzugs snyan skying khar son//dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas//rdo rje can gyi sngon du sgrub/
198b4(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa//bcom ldan rdo rje can 'grub 'gyur//rgyal po thams cad sbyin 'gyur na//dngos grub gzhan lta smos tso dgos//sngags ni 'dir a Tak+ki
198b5(rgyud): dzaHgsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis//dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya//long spyod ji snyed thams cad rnams//de skyed thams cad rnam par ster//rdo rje 'dzin pa sgrub pa'o//dbang
198b6(rgyud): chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i//byams pa chen po'i bdag nyid sku//snying khor zla zhing gzugs brnyan 'od//rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng ba ldan//'jig rten khams ni 'byam klas
198b7(rgyud): pa//rang bzhin gcig tu byas nas ni//rdo rje yis ni spro ba dang //dbang bskur ba yi rang bzhin dge/gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar ba//ral pa'i thor tshugs 'dzin pa'o//
199a1(rgyud): ral pa'i dbus su mchod rten rgyo//dung dang kun du zla 'od bzang //b+harnams nas snyoms can thams cad la//brtan pa'i dan+da du dbang bskur bya//yang na sa
199a2(rgyud): can thams cad la//bu gcig lta bur rnam par spro//baisgoms pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni//gnyis med ma rgyal ba las rgyal//spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang //gnas sogs dpya
199a3(rgyud): bas rnam par dbye//byams pas kun tu rnam par spro//chos dbyings mo nyam dang mi mnyam pa//thams cad bdog drang bdag gi bar//shin tu dri ma med par gnas//ri rab
199a4(rgyud): lta bur brtan pa'i sems//'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral//de ltar sems ni brtan byas nas//mnyam med sems n+dan kun dang mnyam//bdag nyid byams pa yin zhes
199a5(rgyud): dga' ldan gnas pa'i tshul 'dzin pa//cung zad li zhing 'khyil ba'i sgra//pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od//rin chen sems ni rnam dag pAs//bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom par bya//
199a6(rgyud): 'di'i gseng sngags rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni//oM a dzi tany+dza yA sarba satwA sa ya nu ga tA swAhA/gsang sngags bdag nyid rgyal po 'di//byams pa zhes ni glags pa s+ho//
199a7(rgyud): chos kyi dbyis dang mtshungs par khyab//byams pa'i thugs ni yid du 'ang //da pe'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis//sgrub pa'i thabs mchog poskam par bya//oM mai tre ya
199b1(rgyud): 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis kyang //dga' ldan du ni gnas par 'gyur//slob pa kun dang bral ba'i bdag/rang nyid lha yi bu dang mtshungs//byams pa'i sbyar bas bsgoms na no//28/
199b2(rgyud): ni byams pa lta bur 'gyur//byams pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du ni//rang bzhin gyis ni skye bar 'gyur//de mdun chos ni ljags mnyan nas//sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang //dbang dang //
199b3(rgyud): tIting 'dzin thob nas ni//de ni byang chub sems dpar 'gyur//mthar yang sangs rgyas thams cad ni//byams pa'i yid kyis thob par 'gyur//byams pa'i sgrub pa'i thab so//rang
199b4(rgyud): gi lus ni thams cad ni//na mkha' mtshungs pa nyid du sgom//chos bdag med pas bskyed nas kyang //rang nyid na mkha'i snying por 'gyur//gsung sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis//
199b5(rgyud): mkha' mtshungs dpe las rnam par 'das//na mkha'i 'odi zer gyur pa yis//rang gi sems can sems la sgo/kun gyi sems las spros nas ni//slar yang rim gyis bsdu bar
199b6(rgyud): byad na mkhar su ma ny+dzarA blta//rlung gi de nyid kyis sbyar bya//rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//rkyen chen kha dog 'od po che//rgyan rnams kun gyis lus brgyan pa/
199b7(rgyud): log na rin chen stobs po che//rin chen sbyor bas bsgoms pa yis//na mkha'i dam pa 'brub pa yin//mo A ke sha gar+b+hA ya swAhA/na mi kha'i snying po stobs po che//ba
200a1(rgyud): ldan rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur//rang gi dngos grub thams cad ni//ster bar 'gyur te dpyad mo dgos//dpa' bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//dngos
200a2(rgyud): grub ji snyed bka' stsal pa//na mkha'i snying po bsgrubs pa yis//de dag thams cad myur du ster//na mkha'i snying po sgrub pa'i thab so//sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/
200a3(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis//kun tu bzang po'i 'od bzang ba//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni//sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya//dngos grub mchog ni thob
200a4(rgyud): par 'gyur//rang gi lus ni ji snyed pa'i//rang gi phra rab rdul rnams kyis//de dag thams cad mtshungs par bya//sangs rgyas sku yi sku nyid du//yang na ba spu'i khung rnams su//
200a5(rgyud): rang gi 'khor los yongs bskor nas//sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs byas te//bdag ni kun tu bzang po zhes//yi ge lnga pa zhesu bshad//'di yi sngags chen bzla bar bya//
200a6(rgyud): yang na 'dir ni lha gzhan gyis//rtag tu sngagasu gyur pa'o//e s+t+waM hriMHkA yu swA hA/gsang sngags rgyal po che gsang zhing //gdod nas dag cing rang 'byung ba//grub pa gosang
200a7(rgyud): sngags 'di yis ni//de ye shes rab dri med cing //gzugs mdzes pa ni de dang mtshungs//bstan bcos thams cad rab smra ba//kun bzang mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro//
200b1(rgyud): kun tu babang po'i sgrub pa'i thab po//rna ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa//dz+nyAn rnams kun gyis brdzun pa so//slob pa thams cad rnam sol bya//da pa'i don du bsgom par bya/
200b2(rgyud): smras du sngags 'di yi b+h+yor+ya ba dang //bcud kyi ljin gyis dang blag tu/ nyid du mi rigs par//sgrib pa rnamasas mtshungs par 'gyur/oM sad+hin war mai d+hAk+Sha
200b3(rgyud): oM ni sa rA ya swAhA/the tso bo gsang sngags 'di 'dzin la//rnam par sel bar grags pa ste//thams cad sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis//phyag rgya kun gyi thams cad du//gdid nas
200b4(rgyud): med rang bzhin gyis//gdod nas dag cing 'gyur ba med//de ltar chos 'di shes nas ni//lha nyid dang ni mnyam byas nas//rnyog pa me nga bgro med pa'i//rje mu rna ma 'byo
200b5(rgyud): bsgrub bya//ud pal sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar//gsal ba'i rnam par gnas pa'o//me yis yongasu bskor ba yis//phyag rgya ral gri gzi brjid che//yang nas yang du sems
200b6(rgyud): byed cing //dngos grub 'di ni gzi brjid che//rnam sa lnga mchog gi dbang phyurag ni//mtha' las 'das pa'i dngos grub mchog/thams cad nus ni rtsom pa nyid//rnam par sel ba
200b7(rgyud): sprob pa'i grangs//dab chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni//rdo rje yi ni dbus ni bzhugs//gser gyi mdog can sgra chen po//'bar ba lta ze'i gzo brjid cani//snying khar dri ma
201a1(rgyud): rgyu gnas//maSh+Ta spring zhes byar bdag nyid sgom//rang gi lhag pa'i lhor sbyor ba//rang gi gsang rdzogs brjod par bya//mkha' skyid zlas byur bdag bsgoms ma
201a2(rgyud): sngags kyi yi ge mchog bde 'di//oM k+ShaM bAHrA dzAHswA hA/bras ma yas sngags mchog 'di yis ni//dngos grub thams cad rab gsal mdzad//swa yi snying po zhes grags pa//
201a3(rgyud): dam pa'i don du rnal 'byor pas//sa'i snying po'i sgrub pa'i thab so//zad pa med cing 'khrul pa med//zad meng mchog gi shes rab can//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus garma
201a4(rgyud): par//shes rab rdo rje'i bdag nyid dge//blo gros mi zad rnyed dka' ba//'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya//me yi dkyil 'khor dbus ni//gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa'i
201a5(rgyud): gzugs//rgyal po chen po zla ba'i 'od//'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal//sngags ni a~M a k+Sha ya ma ti swA hA/sngags kyi yi ge gsang ba 'di//thams cad blo gros gsal
201a6(rgyud): bar byed//ye shes mi zad 'dod pa yis//'brad pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste//dngos grub kun gyi mchog ces bya//shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes//sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob
201a7(rgyud): 'gyur ni//dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos//blo gros mi zad po'i sgrub thab so//kun nas shes rab chen po can//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brtan par//gser gyis/
201b1(rgyud): /dag gaN+DI brjid cho//rgyun rnams thams cad kyisna brgyan pa'i//gzhon nu'i gzugs can rtag tu bsam//re ba thams cad rdzogs par mdzod//rang blo lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba//
201b2(rgyud): na mkhwa'i bdagra po bdag yin zhes//lus ngag yid kyi thams cad du//thams cad rig pa su brtan par bya//shin tu dri med byang chub sems//rang skying mi long lta bung bsam//
201b3(rgyud): nas yi ge'i tshig bkod de//mkha' mdzad bdag ces bdag nyid kyis//bsgoms nas rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag/mkha' la rin chen 'byung gnas dang //yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam
201b4(rgyud): shing rnan de bzhin bum pa bzang po srogs//'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug gyis//nye bar 'kho ba thams cad 'bab//'jig rten kun gyi rdzas thams cad//ji snyed yod pa de dag kun//
201b5(rgyud): 'dir ni skad cig tsam nyid la//dngos grub dam pa stsol bar 'gyur//a~M ga gra na gany+tsa graM swA hA/na mkha' mdzod kyi dngos grub che//nor gyi rgyun gyi rab 'bebs pa//na mkha'i
201b6(rgyud): mdzod ni stobs po che//skad cig ma la byed par 'gyur//nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thab so//rin chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba//rin chen phung po cher rab 'bebs//
201b7(rgyud): rin chen gzi brjid mchog tu rol//lag na rin chen de bsgrub bya//lag na rin tshon phyag brkyang ba//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//rdo rje sbyor bas bsgom par bya//
202a1(rgyud): bdag nyid rin chen zhes bya dang //rin chen thams cad stsol bar mdzod//thams cad rdo rje bzhin bdag nyid//pri yang sgyu ma dag stobs sa 'od//dbang
202a2(rgyud): chen dang ni me las byung //phyag ni rin chen tshe rigasalnga ba//rab tu 'bad de byi sgom par bya//A~M rat+na pA Ni ri muHs+ye hA/gas sdigs 'di ni brtson 'grus che//rab tu
202a3(rgyud): 'bad de bsgrubs nas ni//'gro ba kun gyi lag tu ni//rin chen thams cad rab stsol byed//log na rin po che bsgrub pa'i thob so//chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems//
202a4(rgyud): bdud rtsi tshu las rabri ga bA//stong gsum zhes ni bsam par bya//pad+ma gcig gi stong na gnas//de yi steng du gauzi brjid che//chu lha yau ni gzugs na mchog/de steng du ya
202a5(rgyud): gsong chen po//me yi dkyil-i 'khor dam pa yin//de yi steng du brtson 'grus che//ts+tsho mo brgya pa'i rdo rje byung //de yi steng du pad chen po//'dab ma brgyad pa 'od gsal/
202a6(rgyud): de ste d+hA tu byasam pa ni//byang chub sems dpa'i stobs po ma~M// thos na pa grags pa//'ab ba'i phreng ba la khrigs pa'i dzad//du kun de zla ba'i mdog
202a7(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//de yi lag na phyag rgya che//rdo rje steng du rab tu grags//rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas//rang nyid rdo rje yin zhes//rgya mtsha
202b1(rgyud): glos shes rab che//skur yang gsang sngags bzla bar bya//sngags na A swa gar ma ti sa ra swAhA//sngags 'di mchog dang gtso bo ste//shes rab ye shes dri mod mdzes//
202b2(rgyud): sbyor byas myangs nas ni//shes rab rgya mtsho'i blo gros mtshungs//rang nyid sangs rgyas 'jam pa'i dbyings//thub rten 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal//dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci na
202b3(rgyud): rgyo mtsho'i blo gros kyi sgrub pa'i thab so//dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i//ud pal sngon po 'dab 'dra'i 'ad//rdo rje snying po brtson 'grus che//zla ba'i dkyil 'khong dbu
202b4(rgyud): sku ni//ji skyid sa stong sa mtha' dag tu//khyab la sdug cing mtho ba yis//skye zhing snying po rnam dag pa'i//mchog gi yi ge 'gyur med pa'i//sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po
202b5(rgyud): ni//chos kyi sprin la~M spyod mdzad pa//bsam yas su ni yang dag brnyes//ts+tshin dA nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od//de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni//yi ge mchog ni steng du 'gyur//
202b6(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje cher gsol ba//rang nyid rnam par 'phro ba bzhin//sngags ni oM badz+ra gad+hA hUM/'di ni sngags mchog gtso bo ste//sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed//ye shes
202b7(rgyud): yangs pa stsal mdzad cing //rnam pa kun tu phun tshogs kun//sangs rgyas nyid kyang stsol mdzad na//dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos//dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang /
203a1(rgyud): dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed//bdag nyid rdo rje ldan zhes//nga rgyal rab tu bskyod nas na//dzA spyod pa bzhin du gzhan//'drug glornam 'byod bsgom pa
203a2(rgyud): bya//thugs kyi rdo rje nyid gyur nas//chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa thob//des na rnam pa thams cad kyis//rdo rje snying pos yang dge byung //rdo rje snying po mkha'i rdo rje//sbyin pa/
203a3(rgyud): byed pa de yis sgrub//rdo rje snying po sgrub pa'i thab so//dbang chen me lus yang dag byung //nor bu rin chen 'dra ba'i 'od//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa yi//nyi ma'i dkyil
203a4(rgyud): 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od//rin che ni 'byung ba sems chen po//'gro ba snang byar byed de gnas//pad+ma mkha'i 'dra'i rnam pa can//phyag rgya de yi snying khar gnas//rin chen
203a5(rgyud): sbyor bas bsgom par bya//rin chen char pa 'bab par 'gyur//sdigs ni oM rat+na kA ra/hrIHrat+na na di da swA hA//rin chen 'byung gnas rgyal po 'di//mchog rnams kyi ni
203a6(rgyud): so yi phyag/sbyor ba kun gyis bsgrub par bya//rgya che'i nor rnams stsol bar 'gyur//rin chen 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
203a7(rgyud): snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thab so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang
203b1(rgyud): 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i gsol la btab pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khro bo bcom
203b2(rgyud): ldan 'das bskyed du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'khor los bsgyur ba chen pos de skad ces gsol ba btab ma thag kho nar rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsang bya las ches
203b3(rgyud): gsang ba bka' stsal pa/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/rlung khams rab tu gsal ba la//me ni dbus nas dbu su'o//de yi dbus rdo rje che//'od
203b4(rgyud): zer lnga yi phreng bas mdzes//de yi mdun du bya ba yang //mdung rtse 'bar ba chen po yi//de yi geyas kyi gdun la ni//rdo rje chen po 'bar phreng can//g.yon nyid du ni bai con can//
203b5(rgyud): rig pa'i phreng bas rnam par spras//rgyab tu ral gri'i phyag rgya ni//rin chen 'bar bas rnam par rgyan//phyi ngos rnams su rnam khros pa'i//khro bo thams cad dgod par bya//de yi
203b6(rgyud): sngags kyi yi ge gsang //gsang chen mchog tu 'bar ba'o//gzhan du med cing grangs med mchog/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//yi ge gcig pa gsung chen po//
203b7(rgyud): rgyu yi don du rtogs par byed//dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan//thig le sgra yis rnam par rgyan//de nyid gsang ba'i mgon po ni//dbyangs bdun pa ni bshad pa yin//he ru/
204a1(rgyud): ka dpal rdo rje che//'jigs pa'i bskul ba can thal bas//sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i bdag/'bar ba mi yi dkyil 'khor bzhin//'jigs pa
204a2(rgyud): chen po'i dus mtshan gyis//char smin dang ni 'dra ba'i 'od//pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra//'bar ba kun gyis rnam par d+han//dur khrod me bzhin shin tu yang //gsal ba'i
204a3(rgyud): sgra ldan stobs po che//rno ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba//thod pa'i ts+tsha pan steng du 'bar//'jigs pa chen po'i dus mtshan gyis//rgod ma kha yi me wAr gnas//smin
204a4(rgyud): 'khyog rnam par 'khrug pa can//ge ya swA brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//khro bo la sogs nyams dang ldan//rnam pa sna tshogs 'khrug pa'i gdong //grwar dang sdud
204a5(rgyud): par yang dag ldan//'jig rten snang ba'i gor mdzad pa//phyag ni brgya phrag stong dang ldan//gcig tu gyur cing rnam pa ming //rnam mang zhal ldan de dag gi/smyo sa
204a6(rgyud): la sogs tha dad ldan//zhabs kyi rnam pa du ma ldan//sna tshogs mdog ldan rnam par 'khrug/de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te//khro bo'i rgyal po stobs po che//
204a7(rgyud): shin tu gdug cing drag rnams la//skye 'phrul dra ba zhes byar gnas//phyag drug zhabs drug snang ba can//zhal drug pa ste gsus po che//char sgron mchog 'dra cher
204b1(rgyud): gnas pa//dus mtha' ma dang 'dra bar gyunas//mdog tshun rgyal po 'khyol ba 'dra//zar ma yi na me tog mtshungs//khro bo zad pa'i phreng ba 'chang //gshan rje'i mthar
204b2(rgyud): mdzad stobs pa che//de la sngags kyang oM AHhUM phaT/oM ya ma ma tha na hU~M/phaT/oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i tA nA na hUM sarbA sha trAn na shA ya stam+b+ha ya hUM phaT/sngags kyi rgyal po'i bdag
204b3(rgyud): nyid 'dra//khyab bdag gdul dka' 'dul ba po//gshin rje mthar mdzad khro bo che//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gci//sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren cing //dbang du
204b4(rgyud): yang ni mdzad par gnas//rtag tu gdul dka' 'dul mdzad cing //rdo rje snang mdzad legs par 'dul//shin tu gdug pa drag rnams la//zhi bo'i nye bar mi sbyar te//
204b5(rgyud): shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis//de bzhin gshegs rnams khro bor mdzad//thugs rjes khro bo'i ngang tshul can//'jig rten gsum kyang nges sreg mdzad//de bso 'bad pa
204b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis//shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sku//thugs rjes khro bo ma lus mchog/gdug pa 'dul bar mdzad pa bskyed//gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub pa'i thab so//de nyid
204b7(rgyud): bcom ldan rnal 'byor te//khro bo gzegs ma zhesu grags//rin chen 'bar ba'i khro bo che//'jigs pa chen po'i dus dang 'dra//ud pa la sngon po'i mdab ma bzhin//de yi
205a1(rgyud): 'di rnam par gas so// rgyun na na ban pa//2 namadzad//na pa la na/drug
205a2(rgyud): la mchog tu 'bar//me yaM khams dang 'dra ba'i mdog/la khri'i mdog ltar shin tu dmar//de yis khro gnyer bskor ba yis//gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'byin
205a3(rgyud): byed//khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis pa ni//yang dang yang du bsum par bya//mA lus pa rnams thams cad du//son pa'i bdag nyid chen po des//'gugs pa dang ni dbang byed na//
205a4(rgyud): skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos//sngags ni oM ka Ni ka Ni hUM phaT/khro bo 'di yi sngags 'dzin pa//'jig rten gsum mchog stobs po che//sa rnams thams cad sreg
205a5(rgyud): byed na//skye bo gzhin lta smos ci dgos//khro bo gzigs mi sgrub pa'i thab so//de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//pad+ma gar
205a6(rgyud): dbang phyug gyur//rta mgron zhesu bshad pa yin//rtag tu 'ja ro ka'i mdog 'dra ba//rgya skyegs mdog ltar dmar ba'o//chu dang gzi brjid can dag pa//me yi dkyil 'khor
205a7(rgyud): dag dang ldan//'dod ldan rnams la gdod pa 'byung //gdug pa can rnams gdug pa 'byung //zhi ba la yang zhi ba 'byung //stobs ldan rnams la stobs kyis sbyor//
205b1(rgyud): zhal bzhi pa la zhabs bzhi pa//bsam gtan bzhi dang mnyam par ldan//phyag bzhi pa la brtson 'grus che//steng ge ltar gnas mcho ba bzhi//rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ni//dam
205b2(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug bsgrub par bya//skad cig nyid la gnas nas ni//thams cad lhung ba bsgrub par bya//sngags ni oM a mr-i tod+b+had+ho b+ha be hUM phaT/oM a mri tod b+ha ba hUM phaT/g.yas dang
205b3(rgyud): g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis//g.yon brkyang ba ni rab tu sbyar//khro bo'i skyil krung byis nas ni//'jig rten thams cad rab tu mnyes//pad+ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po 'di//sa yi dbang
205b4(rgyud): phyug kun gyo mchog/rta yi mgrin pa stobs po che//stobs kyi sbyor ba bsgrub par bya//dbang phyug chen po la sogs lha//tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang //mi dang gdug pa'i
205b5(rgyud): bsam pa can//sa rnams thams cad dgug par bya//rta mgrin gyi sgrub pa'i thab so//de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor de//gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha//shes rab thabs kyi bdag
205b6(rgyud): nyid gyur//khro bo mchog tu mi 'gyur ba//kun sbyor bdag gi rnal 'byor gyis//thugs rjes khro ba'i dbang du song //de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//sna yi rtse mor yid kyis/
205b7(rgyud): ni/nigayo ba med par bsam par bya//slob dponi mi g.yo khro bo che//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan//ral gra gags po 'dzin pa gsam//thog ma tha ma med pa'i
206a1(rgyud): mchogs/br-i yang kA ru sngo ba'i gzugs//'khrigs shrI b+hIs pa lta baR+Sha gnas//ma lus pA yau sa rnams kun//chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam/
206a2(rgyud): pa khro bo mngag pa bran dang ni//pho nyas kyang ni rnam par rgyan//skye bo kun gyis yongasu gang //sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga na//bka' lung yang ni yongasu stsol//sngags
206a3(rgyud): ni/na maHsa man+ta badz+ra ts+tsha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/tr-i ka hAM mo/khro bo gzi brjid chen po 'di//gzugs mang mda' ba stobs po che//'gro ba thams cad 'gugs
206a4(rgyud): par byed//dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas//rlung dang me las yang dag byung //'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can//sngags dang phyag rgya sogs kun mchog/lus
206a5(rgyud): dang ngag yi de bzhi no//dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang //dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed//de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/nam mkha'i khams kyis mtha'
206a6(rgyud): klas mchog/khro bo'i phyag rgya rang byung ba//drag po thog ma tha ma med//rnam par 'phro ba bzhin du gnas//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi
206a7(rgyud): rgyud las//khro bo'i dkyil la 'di yongs su rdzogs so////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs
206b1(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzungs thams cad kyi dbang phyug gri rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/bcom ldan 'das gzungs
206b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//gzungs
206b3(rgyud): rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor dge/glu bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs kyi ni rnam par mdzes//thog bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bshad//de yi
206b4(rgyud): dbu su pad chen po//lo ma kun gyis shin tu mdzes//nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'dab ma ldan//rdo rje rin chen legs par rgyan//de yi dbusu rtag bri ba//dpag med shes rab pha rol/
206b5(rgyud): phyin//de yi nye 'khor thams cad du//sna tshogs las ni 'bar rnams la//nyi shu rtswa lnga'i dbye ba yis//shes rab pha rol phyin ma bri//shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te//
206b6(rgyud): thig mtha' nyid kyang brtag par bya//phyag rgya'i yi ge ci rigs par//go rims bzhin du rnam par dgod//phyogs cha'i dbye ba tha dad kyis//kha dog dbye ba thams cad du/
206b7(rgyud): rnam dbye mchog tu sna tshogs pa//chos nyid mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//de las 'od zer bsam mi khyab//sngo ser la sogs dbyi ba yis//shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis
207a1(rgyud): 'gro po thams cad gsal bar bya//'dus par gyur nas de dag kun//lha nyid kyi nu gzugs ji bzhin/shes rab chen po gzugs chen po//'bar bcas
207a2(rgyud): mdzes pa'i gzi brjed can//de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni//sngags kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rten//sku ni gser gyi mdog dang 'dra//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//
207a3(rgyud): rang gi ting 'dzin la zhugs//du ma'i gzugs kyi gzugs ldan ma//shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni//sems can khams ni rnam sbyong mdzad//kun nas sems can rnams kyi
207a4(rgyud): yum//sems can kun gyi thams cad du//thams cad lus la mnyam par khyab//sems kyi rgyun bzhin legs par bzhugs//zag pa med cing bsam mi khyab//dri ma
207a5(rgyud): med cing ngang gis stong //na mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba//dngos dang dngos mod rnam par spangs//thog ma tha ma med cing zhi//chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug sku//sdig pa
207a6(rgyud): kun las rnam par grol//bden pa gnyis la rnam par gnas//kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don//chos kyi sku ru de bshad do//dbang po kun kyang rnam par shes//sems
207a7(rgyud): dang thams cad thams cad du//yid kyi rnam shes zhes su bshad//shes rab blo dang blo gros dran//lhag mthong dang ni ye shes kun//kun nas nyon mongs mi mthun phyogs/
207b1(rgyud): /rtag dang chad pa'i mtha' dang ldan//mtha' pany+dzis pa ni rnam par spangs//kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don//rnam pa gahi du de rabya brtags//ji ltar bud shing la brten nas//rma
207b2(rgyud): yi sa bon gnas pa dang //tI la la til mar ji bzhi no//bur shing ro bzhin rab tu brtag/me tog dri ni ji bzhin nam//zho la mar sar dzi bzhin du//rnal 'byor pa yi ye
207b3(rgyud): shes srub//bdud rtsi lta bu'i snying po 'byung //gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan las//ji bzhin gtsubs pas me 'byung ste//de bzhin ye shes rnal 'byer pas//bsrungs
207b4(rgyud): pas yongasu brtag par bya//shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la//yang nas yang du bsrab par bya//mun pa thams cad rnam sel ba'i//nyi ma'i 'od zer ji bzhin
207b5(rgyud): bdag/na mkha' dri ma med brten nas//nyi ma zla ba ji bzhin gnas//'char ba yi ni gasngal byed pa//'bar ba stong phrag gi ni sdod//mun pa kun 'joms skar ma la//kun
207b6(rgyud): nas kyang ni mdzes pa yin//rnal 'byor pas ni ji ltar sems//mkha' bzhin shin tu dri ma med//gzung 'dzin las ni nges par grol//mnyam dang mi mnyam dngos po kun
207b7(rgyud): der gnas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis//ye shes nyi zla mtshungs pa'i 'od//shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms te//gsang sngags 'di ni bsam par bya//rang bzhin gyis ni
208a1(rgyud): dag pa'i dngos//rang bzhin med par rnam par gnas//rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal kun//gdod nas ma skyes rlog pa med//yi ge de nyid de lta bu//gnas//
208a2(rgyud): dang mi gnas rnam par stangs//sde mtshan bzhi pa'i gnyis pa la//thig le sgra yis rnam par rgyan//de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ste//shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad//
208a3(rgyud): oM dz+ha swA hA/aM swA hA/aM shru ti smai ti bI dza ye swA hA/sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab 'dis//bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed//'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi yum//de
208a4(rgyud): nyid 'khor los rnam par bsgyur//'dis ni dngos grub thams cad dang //grub pa nyid ni byed par gnas//bstan bcos rab tu 'tshod byed dang //shes bya thams cad khyad par
208a5(rgyud): du//thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kun//dbang phyug dam pas shes par 'gyur//shes rab pha rol phyin ma'i sgrub pa'i thabaso//shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis pa//rdzu
208a6(rgyud): 'phrul chen po mkha' dang mnyam//gser gyi mdog can 'bar ba can//zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs//brtson 'grus chen po bsam gtan bya//sngags kyi yi ge
208a7(rgyud): rnam par rgyan//mchog tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis//sangs rgyas spyan zhes btags pa yis//de yi gsang sngags rab bshad bya//nyon cig sa rnams 'dod pa rnams//
208b1(rgyud): sngags ni oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/'di de mchog tu gsang ba ni//rnal 'byor ma la mchod du bshad//dam chen yi ge'i mthar thug pa//bsgom
208b2(rgyud): pes dge ba rab tu ster//chos kyi phyag rgya 'di shin tu//sems can thams cad dbang du byed//dpung dang bcos pa myur bkug ste//bran du gyur nas nye bar gnas//phyag rgya gcig
208b3(rgyud): pa'i lha mo che//rol cing g.yo ba'i zhal mnga' ba//sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan//rol cing snang ba'i gAr mdzad pa//sangs rgyas spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur//mig gi
208b4(rgyud): phyag rgya rab tu sbyar//mig gi phyag rgya 'di shin tu//'jig rten gsum yang gar byed do//sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa'i thab so//chu yi dkyil 'khor dges pa na/
208b5(rgyud): bcud kyis len dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/mtha' yas rgyas shing yangs pa yi//dri ma med pa'i mkha' lo gnas//dkyil 'khor de yi dbusu ni//lha mo mchog tu mdzes pa
208b6(rgyud): mo//'dam bu 'da' rgya'i mdog ltar dkar//grub ma ral po'i cod pan 'chang //'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad ma//rtag tu na mkha' bzhin du gnas//sngags ni/oM ka Te bi
208b7(rgyud): ka Te ka TaM ka Te swA hA//gos dkar mo yi phyag rgya che//dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra//sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba che//pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas//'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad ni/
209a1(rgyud): nasgrub pa pos ni bsrub par bya//dam pa'i lha mo 'grub par 'gyur//pad+ma dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs//zhi ba'i yi ge mnyam par ldan//zhi ba
209a2(rgyud): mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi//sa gsum sgrub par byed pa'i babs//gos dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i zab so//sngo bsangs dkar mo sna tshogs gzugs//rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis
209a3(rgyud): brgyan//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ga nus pa//skyeg pa'i nyams kyi sgra yongs gang ba//'gro ba mtha' dag skyob mdzad mi//thugs rje'i thugs dang ldan pa can//rab tu
209a4(rgyud): 'bod de bsgrub par bya//rol pa yi ni yi ges mchod//sngags ni/oM tA re tut+tA re tu ra swA hA//chos kyi phyag rgya mtha' yas mchog/spel mas legs par rnam par
209a5(rgyud): gnas//gsang chen bzhin du thams cad la//bcud kyis len dang 'dra ba'i mchog/kun tu kun tu thams cad du//dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad//sgrol ma'i
209a6(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thab so//dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus ni//rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo mchog/phyag bzhi spyan ni gsum pa dang //ral pa'i cod pan dag gis brgyan/
209a7(rgyud): 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar//dpa'i ba la sogs nyams kyis brgyan//brtson 'grus chen mo 'jigs sel ma//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//
209b1(rgyud): rab tu 'bar ba'i me bzhin du//shin tu gasngal bya'i gzi brjid can//hUM gi yi ge zab mo'i sgra//sna gsum po ni 'khrugu par mdzad//khro g+h+ranyerA n+dan zhes legs par glags/
209b2(rgyud): /sngags kyi phreng bas rnam par rgyan//sngags ni/oM b+ha ya nA sha ni/trA sa ni trA sa/trA sa yAM/r+t+r-i ku Te ta Di be ta be ri De shwe tA dzi Ti ni/au Ta ki hUM dzaHswA hA//gsang sdigs 'dri ni
209b3(rgyud): brtson 'grus che//gsang sngags kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/'gro ba kun kyang mgu byed na//gdug pa'i sems lta smos ci dgos//khro gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabaso//nyi ma'i
209b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje ldan//rdo rje'i phreng bas yongasu bskor//gzi brjid dkyil 'khor kun nas dkris//der gnas rtag tu lha mo ni//stobs
209b5(rgyud): chen pr-i yang ku ltar ldang //phyag bzhi pa der bsam par bya//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//rnal 'byor ma rnams cher zhi ba//dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ma//
209b6(rgyud): sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba che//rdo rje'i dbus song rab tu gnas//khro bo hU~M mdzad gang ba'i mtha'//dpa' ba'i nyams la sogs par ldan//lha mo 'jig rten gsum rmongs byed/
209b7(rgyud): dngos grub chen po rab stsol ma//skad cig tsam gyis 'gro ba kun//nges par dbang du byed par 'gyur//rdo rje'i rlung gi phreng ba che//rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu gnas//'jigs
210a1(rgyud): pa chen po'i me ltar drag/snang ba chen po stobs po che//pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra//rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par rgyan//mtshan nI mA ma k+Sha zhes bya//lA mo
210a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod//sngags ni oM ku la d+hA tI ye na maHshaM ka re/shIn+tiM ka ra/g+hun+na g+hAn+na g+ha ta ya g+hun+di ni/b+ha ta ya g+hun+d+hi swA hA/oM ku lan+d+ha ri/ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/
210a3(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di ni don gyi mchog/gsang sngags kun gyis gsungs pa yin//sa gsum po ni 'gugs byed cing //tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kun//'gro ba thams
210a4(rgyud): cad 'gugs byed la//rang gi dbang du gnas pa'ang yin//mA ma kI'i sgrub pa'i thab so//rlung gi dkyil 'khor drug po la//rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bskor//de yi dbus su
210a5(rgyud): snang ba che//zla ba'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyan//de spros pa las bdag nyid ni//rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sku//phyag bzhi ma la lha mo de//rdo rje yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan//
210a6(rgyud): dmar po 'bar ba de yis ni//sa gsum po ni 'ching bar mdzad//tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che//bkug nas dbang du mdzad par gnas//dngos grub thams
210a7(rgyud): cad 'dzin pa dang //de yi thugs kar rdo rje che//'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od//de yi 'bar ba lcags sgrog gi/rnam pa rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan//nges
210b1(rgyud): par phyung nas de dag kun//chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i//'jig rten khams ni mtha' dag tu//kun nas rnam par bkang nas kyang //bsgom bya rdo rje thams cad du//
210b2(rgyud): khro bo dang ldan spro ba'i zhal//lte ba 'phyang zhong sku che ba//mche ba bzhi yis rnam par rgyan//'bar ba yi ni phreng ba gsal//gzugs mdzes drug po'i gzugs dang ldan//
210b3(rgyud): sngags ni/aM badz+ra shr-i kha lA ya d+hi po ta ye/ma hA ba lA ya/ma hA bid+yA ra dzA ya twe pro dz+wa li ta/hastA ya na mo ni la kar+N+Na ya ki ra ta rU pa laM bo da rA ya/b+h+r-i b+h+r-i ku nI mu khA ya/
210b4(rgyud): mA dzA ra mu kha la/tsa tu ra daMSh+Ta ka rA lA yA/e h+ye ti a s+ya ra sha ri ra/ma nu pra wi sh+ya shi raM gr-ih+Na/gr-I ba gr-ih+Na/hastaM pA daM gr-ih+NA gi ShaM/A be shA yA ki pA ya kr-i pa ya//
210b5(rgyud): b+hU ma b+h+ra mA ya/maN+Da la ma d+h+ye/bi kurba bi kurba/tsUr+NatsUr+d+ha/kun+da kun+na/s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta yA/mAr+m+ma Ni ni krAn+na ya/hr-i da ya/ts+tshin+da/ba la bA la/kiny+dza rA ya si/de ba
210b6(rgyud): nA ga/Ak+Sha/rAk+Sha saM/pi shwo tsa tsan+na yA/sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/dzA ti ma nu sma ra hra hwe/kAni d+hi ni d+hi/ni ShI ni She/badz+ri shaM ka la/adz+nyA pA ya ti sA hA//oM badz+ra ra Ni hU
210b7(rgyud): phaT/oM badz+ra Ni hUM phaT/i badz+ra kI li hUM phaT swA hA//gisang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis//bcud kyis len ni bde ba dang //'gro ba thams cad 'bebs pa dang /
211a1(rgyud): gdug pa rnams ni 'ching ba dang //tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams dang //lha dang lha min lto 'phye che//'jig rten skyong dang klu rnams kyang //rang gi
211a2(rgyud): gnas nas bskyod nas ni//grub pa kun gyi dngos grub ni//dngos grub 'gugs par 'dod pa yis//thams cad gus pas sbyin par byed//bud med gzugs kyis
211a3(rgyud): bsgrub par bya//rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i sgrub pa'i thab so//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//pad+ma dmar pos rab tu gnas//phyag bzhi pa la du ma'i gzugs//
211a4(rgyud): dung dang kun de zla ba 'dra//thugs kyi rdo rje'i de nyid yin//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbu su ni//zhi ba'i la sogs nyams dang ldan//chos rnams kun gyis bdag skyes
211a5(rgyud): mchog/rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu sgom//sangs rgyas mtha' las yang dag 'byung //der bdag yang dag sgom pa ni//bskul byed ma zhes yongasu grags//sngags kyi
211a6(rgyud): phreng ba'i yi ge ni//kun nas 'phro ba mu tig 'dra//na mkha'i khams ni yongs gang bya//ji srid de yi spyod yul yang //de srid de yi 'od zer sgom//rnal 'byor ye shes
211a7(rgyud): kyis rab sprul//sngags ni/oM tsi le tsu le tsun+da swA hA//'di yi sngags kyi mchog gtso bo//sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod pa po//mtshungs pa med pa'i dngos grub ster//
211b1(rgyud): lho dang lha min bcas pas mchod//'di yis sdig kun mdzad byed cing //phun sum tshogs kun rab stsol mdzad//pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan//sangs rgyas nyid kyang sbyin par
211b2(rgyud): mdzad//bskul byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thab so//gseng po mchog go dgyes pa ni//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//sangs rgyas kun bdag dgyes pa ni//rdo rje sems
211b3(rgyud): dpa' bde ba'i mchog/'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das//gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom//'dod chags
211b4(rgyud): med cing chags bral med//dbu myur dmigs par mi 'gyuraro//bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgyu//'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/sgyu ma dag ni thams cad de la//bud med
211b5(rgyud): sgyu ma khyad par 'phags//rang bzhin nyid kyis de grub pa//nus pa yis ni rang bzhin gyis//'jig rten gsum gyi bud med 'di//bkur bar bya bar 'os pa yin//dan
211b6(rgyud): spyod rnams kyis kyang 'grub ste//rnyed pa kun dang bad dang spro//thams cad bud med sgyu mas 'grub//rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur ba//sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di//shes
211b7(rgyud): ribo pha rol byin mar bshad//kun la sna tshogs byeg rgya ni//kun la sna tshogs sdom pa yis//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor//stong pa nyid kyi de nyid bskul//
212a1(rgyud): kun la kun nas thams cad du//kun tu kun nas rang nyid kyis//sang+yas rgyus thams cad byurtan dang gAyo//thams cad dngos po rang nyid 'gyur//
212a2(rgyud): sems dang sems can ting 'dzin dang //byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid//sa dang pha rol phyin spyod pa//dbang nyid du yang de bshad//bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid//
212a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje de bzhin gshegs//thog ma tha ma do zhi ba//byang chub sangs rgyas bcom ldan do'o//rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid//pad+ma de bzhin pad+ma 'dzin//nor bu nor
212a4(rgyud): 'dzin pa nyid//sna tshogs de bzhin sna tshogs 'dzin//ral gri ral gri 'dzin rgyal po//'khor lo de bzhin 'khor lo 'dzin//'jig rten gsum rgyal nyid dang ni//
212a5(rgyud): 'di rnams kyi yang rigs nyid 'gyur//de nyid tshugs dang chags bral ba//'dod dang thar pa ru yang 'gyur//dus gsum dang ni srid gsum mchog/'jig rten gsum
212a6(rgyud): dang khams gsum pa//brtan pa thams cad de nyid de//rnam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur//g.yo ba kun nas sna tshogs pa//thams cad du ni de 'gyur ro//de la sogs pa
212a7(rgyud): sna tshogs mchog/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//na mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa//dngos po kun tu de 'gyuraro//de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te//gcig pu
212b1(rgyud): nyi ni lhag pa'i lha//numapa' kun gyi skabs na dngul//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//bya sa ldan rgyu mtshan pa 'chang //rnam snang rtag pa thams cad du//rnal
212b2(rgyud): 'byor dbang phyug gtso chen khyab//sangs rgyas 'khor lo can mi bskyod//tshe dang rin chen 'byung stobs che//tshwa dpag med pa kun nas mchog/don yod sna tshogs mdzad pa
212b3(rgyud): dang rdo rje sems dpa' lto na sdug/dgug pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang //legs par mdzad pa de nyid yin//rin chen sgron ma dro bzhin rtog/rdo rje bzhud pa snang ba che//rdo rje
212b4(rgyud): chos dang rno ba che//rgyu dang sgyu mchog bdud rtsi dang //las dang go cha gnod sbyin che//khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa kun//de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te//rdo rje sems dpal
212b5(rgyud): stobs po che//rdo rje hU~M mjed hUM mdzad dang //rta mgrin zhes ni rnam par grags//he ru ka dpal rdo rje che//mchog gi gshin rje ga shi ne rje gshed/khro bo gzugs ma snang ba
212b6(rgyud): tshe//rdo rje me ni 'od chen po//gzugs rnams kyi ni mchog cig tu//ting nge 'dzin las dbang sgyur ma//shes rab pha rol phyin pa gtso//sa dang pha rol phyin pa'i thabs//tshangs
212b7(rgyud): pa'i gnas pa chen po bzhi//dbang ni mchog du 'bar ba dang //dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi//dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang //rjes dran drug por gyur pa dang /
213a1(rgyud): bsgom par bya ba rab tu gnas//de nyid bcom ldan gcig pu ste//byang chub yan lag bdun brtags pa//mthu' gcig yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/
213a2(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan//'jig rten 'das pa'i lam po che//'phags la ma yan lag brgyad brtags pa//stobs bcu yi ni bcu pa nyid//sangs rgyas cho ba
213a3(rgyud): kyi bdag nyid gnas//byang chub phyogs kyi chos chen po//rnam par dbye ba sum cu bdun//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug ni//dgu la gnas par 'gyur pa dang /
213a4(rgyud): bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po bzhis//sems can bsdu bas sdud pa dang //so so yang dag rig pa bzhi//de bzhin srung ba mi mnga' ba//skal pa chen po'o mi 'jigs pa//
213a5(rgyud): mchog tu byur pa nyid dang ni//bsam gtan gzugs med bzhi phrag gnyis//tshad med pa yang de bzhin//byang chub kyi ni skye mchog gtso//bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po//
213a6(rgyud): nyon mongs can gyi mi mthun phyogs//zag bcas zag pa med pa'i mchog/de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te//dbang phyug mchog gi dbang phyug dang //spyi dgu'i
213a7(rgyud): bdag po skye dgu'i mgon//mchog gi bdag nyid dbyangs bdag po//kun rdzob brjod pa thams cad dang //sgra rnams kyis ni spyod yul 'gyur//brjod du med nang spros
213b1(rgyud): pral//stong pa mkha' mnyam mtshungs pa med//tshig mtha' sgra yi rnam dgod pa//'jig rten tha snyad tshul du gtogs//de tshe lus sogs dbye ba yis//sa rnams kyi ni
213b2(rgyud): yongasu brtags//sku ni sprul pa nyid du 'gyur//longs spyod rdzogs pa yang dag brnyes//rdo rje'i sku dang de bzhin du//ye shes sku sogs yongasu brtags//mtha' yas sku
213b3(rgyud): ngadang/chen po//rin chen sku ni 'od byed pa//pad+ma'i sku ni snang ba tshe//thams cad sku ni las bzang byed//rtog par bya ba las kyi sku//rnam pa gsum du'ang dbye bar bya//de nyid bcom
213b4(rgyud): ldan rnal 'byor te//byang chub sems ni 'odadi gsal ba//kun tu 'od kyi sa chen po//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid ldan//gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya//zla ba'i 'od ni 'od
213b5(rgyud): gsal bya//gsum pa na mkha' 'od ces bya//mkha' bzhin legs par rab tu gnas//rdo rje'i 'od mtha' gang zhigs//bzhi pa de ni yid 'ong ba//bsam pa brtan pa'i
213b6(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//rdo rje zhes ni yongasu bsgrags//lnga pa'i rin chen 'od ces bya//dbang bskur pa ni rab tu gnas//drug pa pad+mo 'chang zhes bya//pa pa bzhin rab tu rnam par snang //
213b7(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis ni chos nyid dag/bdag gi med cing yongs bzung med//bdun pa las kyis zhes bya//sangs rgyas phrin las mdzad pa che//brgyad pa dpe mang ba zhes bya//
214a1(rgyud): dpe ni de la yod ma yin//dgu pa dpe dang bral zhes bya//dpe rnams thams cad rab 'jug pa//bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bya//sangs rgyas sa na
214a2(rgyud): bla na med//bcu gcig kun mkhyen nyid ces bya//sa chen po ni 'od gsal pa//bcu gnyis so sor bdag rig pa//rnal 'byor ye shes yongs rdzogs nyid//sa chen po ni 'di
214a3(rgyud): dge rnams//sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du//sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos//rnal 'byor ye shes gang brjod pa//thams cad nyid ni mtha' yas mchog/chos
214a4(rgyud): dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las sngags kyi de kho na nyid do////de nas bcom ldan 'das
214a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyis bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/
214a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi de ma thag nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du
214a7(rgyud): dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa'i de ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje la rdzi su gtsug nas
214b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid du byin byas brlabs nas mnyam par bzhugaso//de nas bcom rdzun 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
214b2(rgyud): chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid rtogs nas tI nge 'dzin las gzhengs te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di ska/ rjes bka' stsal to//'jam dal
214b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yodo zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to//de nas
214b4(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar
214b5(rgyud): dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/thal mo sbyar nas btud de 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs kyi
214b6(rgyud): theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang du zhugs pas sems can rnams thabs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos
214b7(rgyud): grub thob par 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal
215a1(rgyud): khyod gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes zhugs pa ni 'jam dpal khyod legaso lag so//de lags par rab tu skyon la spyod la rlu
215a2(rgyud): shig dang theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin ga
215a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa theg po chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba
215a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'di bka' stsal pa/de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba//dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog/snying po chen po'i rgyan ces bya//
215a5(rgyud): gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya//thig bzhi dang ni mnyam par ldan//'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od//rdo rje snying po yongs
215a6(rgyud): btsug pa//byang chub shing gis nye bar mdzes//rdo rje dkyil 'khor glu rnams dang //sgo yi logs kyi mtshams rnams//rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras//rdo rje bad+ma
215a7(rgyud): thams cad du//las kyi rdo rje thams cad du//'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od//dril bcas sna tshogs mchog dang ldan//rgyal mtshan sbreng ba rlung bskyod pa'o//
215b1(rgyud): gos dang me tog chun pas smras//zla ba phyed byas bar mdzes//ral gri lta bur ud pa la//lcags kyu lA sngags sna rdzogs rgyan//chu yis dkyil 'khor yongs bskor ba/
215b2(rgyud): mu khyud bzhin du rnam par gnas//de lo'ang sgo logs la sogs pa//mkhas pa yis ni spro bar bya//de yi nang du bri byug//'khor lo chen po rab tu gnas//cha brgyad dang na
215b3(rgyud): yongasu ldan//dkyil 'khor legs pa rnam par spras//rdo rje'i thig dang yongasu ldan//rdo rje'i 'khor lo cher 'bar ba//de yi dbusu snying po che//rdo rje'i snying po zhesu bshad//
215b4(rgyud): de yi steng du rdo rje che//rdo rje pad+ma rab tu gnas//pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje che//'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag gis rgyan//dung dang kun du zla baM dkar//sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan du
215b5(rgyud): bshad//de yi steng du legs bzhugs pa//khyab bdag rnam par sna mdzad che//zla ba'i mdog ldan 'dzum bcas pa//ting 'dzin ldan na sdig pa bcom//rdo rje'i phreng bas
215b6(rgyud): rnam par spras//sna tshogs 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od//rin chen chen po'i phreng ba ches//smras pa rnam par dgod par bya//de sngags rtag tu shes bya ba//yi ge yi ni
215b7(rgyud): mchog gtso bo//si yi steng dang ldan pa g.yas//mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu gcig po//drug pa'i dbyangs kyi legs gsal ba//thig le nA das legs par rgyan//rten
216a1(rgyud): cing 'brel 'byung 'khor lo yis//don can rab tu bskyod par bya//de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor can//gcig pu nyidra na lhag pa'i lha//chos kyi
216a2(rgyud): sku ni ye shes che//rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bshad//de nas yang de bzhin goshegs pa mi bskyod pa ye shes kyi 'od zer dang /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs
216a3(rgyud): dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nyid du rang gi bdag
216a4(rgyud): nyi byin gyis brlabs te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shakya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir 'khod do//dbang chen
216a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mi bskyod pa//me yi dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od//chu yi dkyil 'khor 'od dpag med//rdo rjes rnam gnon rlung dkyil 'khor//de nas bcom ldan
216a6(rgyud): 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i dam tshig las 'byung ba sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya bo'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
216a7(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po'i rkyen gyi snying po 'di nyid kyi/
216b1(rgyud): thugs kha nas myong ba'o//oM badz+ra satwa/de nas 'di rnam par byung ba tsam gyis de dranon gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kanas rdo rje'i 'di por rnams byung d+he/rdo rje'i 'od drung //
216b2(rgyud): de rnams kyisu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te gsal bar gyur nas/de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rted kyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang
216b3(rgyud): mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus 'jig rten gyi khams rnam bu gshegs nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad de/sems can thams cad
216b4(rgyud): kyi don mngon par rdzogs nas slar yang gcig tu 'dus te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur nis/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi
216b5(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po'i thugs kar gnas te tshad du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/e ma ho rdo rje snying po bdag/sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med//snying po ye shes rnam dag pa//rdo rje
216b6(rgyud): sems dpa' nyid gyur nas//byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed de//sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med//gang zhig brtan phyir lus min yang //sangs rgyas sku nyid du gyur to//de nas
216b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i sku byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas 'thon nas/bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i nye 'khor thams cad rnam pa bzhis bya ste/dkar po/
217a1(rgyud): snod ga su na na dur sma//ra na na rgyu ma nas na dran sa ma ngas ston tu na ra/
217a2(rgyud): nanA~M/e dz+re /chags padzin no/oM bA rtswa snron ga shegs pa pams n+na lA legasu~M pA~M mAd+hid+hA A~M hU~M 'dun /
217a3(rgyud): d+hI/oM ng+gak+ShAH gas pa mas N+DiThA du n+dan pa'i
217a4(rgyud): na/brtson 'grus kyi bar ba tu byin pa na ni/ //deb na ni shi sa
217b1(rgyud): kye khra bo'i ting 'dzin ni/oM badz+ra yak+Sha/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur bcad pa'i ting 'dzin ni/oM badz+ra san+d+hi/de nas bcom ldan 'das
217b2(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam+b+hi tshig rdo rje'i dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
217b3(rgyud): nyid kyi thugs kha nas 'di byungango //oM badz+ra d+hA tu hUM/rang gi rigs pa mchog ni/oM badz+ra d+hU tI sha ri hUM/badz+rINi/de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas//de bzhin gshegs
217b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob paM zhes bya ba'i tIngange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/nyid kyi thugs kha nas rang gi rig
217b5(rgyud): pa mchog 'di byung ba/oM ak+Sho b+h+yaHAHoM dz+nyA na mASh+Ti tsit+ta bAdz+ro Ni hUM/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye
217b6(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs kha nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/oM badz+ra rat+na saM b+ha ba
217b7(rgyud): d+hI maM ba~Mdz+dza dz+nyA na gar d+hA n+ti hUM/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'a dpag med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
218a1(rgyud): byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs kha nasta rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pA/oM a mr-i tA d+hU tA
218a2(rgyud): oM badz+ra d+hA ri NI hUM/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gnon pas de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd rdo las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob
218a3(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/oM sar+b+ba a mo g+ha sid+d+hi aM/oM badz+ra ma hA bi lI hUM/de nas bcom ldan 'dra
218a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshogs pa rnam par snang mdzad yul la rnam par gzigs shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i snying po 'di bka' stsal gyi
218a5(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA dz+nyA na badz+ra hU~M/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di dag bshad pa tsam gyis/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil
218a6(rgyud): 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to//de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i bdag nyid rtogs nas rdo rje mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po bka'
218a7(rgyud): stsal pa/oM badz+ra sa ma tA dz+nyA na bud+d+he hUM/de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnams phyag na rdo rjer mthong bar 'gyu ro//de nas phyag
218b1(rgyud): nArdo rje'i thugs lda nas chos thams cad mnyam pa tud spros pa'i snying po 'ad byu //oM sar+b+baHrmAs ma tAdz+nyAn ban+na d+ha/donas 'di rnam par byung ba tsam gyos kyang sgyur yang byug
218b2(rgyud): rje'i thugs khar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad byin byis brlabs par mdzad nas/dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'khod par mthong //de nas de bzhin
218b3(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thugs kha nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di byung //oM sar+b+ba sa twa sa mai tra pra pany+tsa bud+d+ha hUM/de nas 'di phyung
