218b4(rgyud): ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas phyag na rdo rje rnam par phyung ste slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na gnas nas bka' nod cing 'khod//
218b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la byin gyis rlob par byos shig/
218b6(rgyud): de de bzhin zhes gsol nus bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs te brtan par
218b7(rgyud): gyur nas rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lcelha rnams phyung ste/lha mo de rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi grwa rnams de bzhin du rnam par gnaso//sgo rnam su sgo skyo ma rnams dang /
219a1(rgyud): mtsham s+thA rnams gzugs dang /sgra dang /dr-i dap+ta/rau dang /reg byu rnams ba shudo//de drag gi sngags gyur pa ni/oM badz+ra me b+hai To n+yA/'khor tshwa d+hA/
219a2(rgyud): mtshamasu gzhag par bya'o//oM sni ha badz+ra No he/oM badz+ra sha rad badz+ra aM aM/oM badz+ri No kI li kI li hUM/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa chen po'i mchod pa phyi'i
219a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor b+ha gra dang /mtshams rnams dri rdo rje lnga stsogs pa'i lha mo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar gnas par dgod par bya'o//oM badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/oM ma d+hu badz+ri
219a4(rgyud): ni hUM/ b+hu g+h+nAM/oM ma nod b+hA ba badz+ri Ni hrI/oM byAdz+re shi shi re ho hU~M//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rol pa chen po'i lha mo'i sgo'i mtshams rnams gzugs la
219a5(rgyud): sogs pa'i oM badz+ra d+hU pye/oM badz+ra shab+de/oM badz+ra gan+d+he/oM badz+ra ra se/oM badz+ra s+phar she/mnyes par byed pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dga'
219a6(rgyud): bde rdo rje'i snying po ni/oM sa ma ya hoHse ra tA s+t+waM/dga' bde chen po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun nas mnyes pas dkyil 'khor tha~M/
219a7(rgyud): la brtan par gyur nas dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzod//dgug dang legs par rab gnas dang /ji bzhin gnasu sbyar ba nyid//kun nas dgyes mdzad sangs///
219b1(rgyud): rgyas kun//dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin dge/sngags kyi tshig rnams kyang //oM o h+ye hi b+ha gA wAn badz+ra A k+sha shA dzoHoM prA pA sha trUM/sar+b+ba tA b+hA ga ta/oM sa ma yo bon+d+ha tir+Na
219b2(rgyud): ga wan/a tu Sh+yo haiH/b+ha ga wan badz+ri A paM she aH'di dag na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sgo'i phrin liso//de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la byams pa dang /'dzam dpal
219b3(rgyud): dang /kun tu bzang po dang /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgod par bya'o//sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tsho gas slob
219b4(rgyud): ma bcug te dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas slob ma dang bcas pas thabs gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lo nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o//de la
219b5(rgyud): dang po kho nar re shig dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon ni dam tshig thams cad shes pa/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos dngos grub thams cad
219b6(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa/rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug lta bu/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
219b7(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya la bslab par bya'o//de nas 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar 'gyur ba ni skyil krung bcas nas dri la sogs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu bsgrub
220a1(rgyud): par bya'o//lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsnams pa byas te sor mo phan tshun bcings nas skyal krung gi dbu sa rdo rje bsdams pa bzhan pa na de bzhin gshegs pa
220a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni gar gyi sbyor bas so//rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid de rked pa'i phyogasu bzung ba ni/rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o//
220a3(rgyud): rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar bzung ba ni rdo rje'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid mda' 'phen pa lta bu'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje mdo'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las legaso
220a4(rgyud): ba sbyin pas rgyab du 'jog pa ni/rdo rje legs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi phyog rgya'o//rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid dpral bar 'jog pa ni rdo rje rin tshon gyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bsdams
220a5(rgyud): pa lo 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor ba ni rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor sbyar ba ni tog gi phyag rgya'o//kha'i thad du bskor ba ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya'o//
220a6(rgyud): rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid kha'i thad du bskor ba ni rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid snying khar byas pa ni rdo rje ral gro'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid 'khor lo ltar yongasu bskor ba ni rdo rje
220a7(rgyud): rgyu'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid snying khar sgreng ba ni rdo rje smra ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bsdoms pa de nyid gar nyid du ston pa ni las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis
220b1(rgyud): skye bo dang stong kha dang mgrin par 'jog pa ni rdo rje srung ba'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bsdams pa 'gram pa gnyis 'jog pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid byung
220b2(rgyud): khor bcangs pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du sgeg mo dang /bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i sbyor pas lha mo tha~Md kyi phyan rgyo tha~Md rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//rol cing rnam par dgod pa
220b3(rgyud): dang /sgeg dang snying rje'i bdag nyid dang //dpa' dang khro sogs chos bdag nyid//rang nyid zhi ba'i bdago nyid nyams//phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar//gal te dngos grub
220b4(rgyud): mchog 'dod na//bdag 'od rdo rje'i gar byed dam//skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//phyag rgya bcing po rab tu sbyar/thams cad grub par 'dod sogs kyis//skyi
220b5(rgyud): krung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//de phyir gnyis med rdo rje can//spangs rgyas rnams kyi drang po'i sku//sgeg pa'i sbyor ba'i rdo rje can//sangs rgyas rnams kyi drang po spyan//snyoms
220b6(rgyud): bcus rdo rje can gyis dgongs//sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje can//ting 'dzin dbye ba las shes bya//'khrugs bri'i lta stangs khro rnams kyi//btsun mi rnams kyi rol pa nyid//
220b7(rgyud): 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang //bsdigs spyod rnams kyis lta ltungs te//chos rnams kun gyi rjes 'jug pa'i//shugs kyi lnga stangs bya ba rgya'o//sna tshogs dang po nya pho nya mam
221a1(rgyud): lta stangs rnam pa sna tshogs nyid//mchu yi phyag rgya yongs ldan pa//g.yo ba med ning mi 'bul ba//spangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/sangs
221a2(rgyud): rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byung //mtshams sbyor cung zad yang drag ldan//rnam 'gyur med cing mtshungs med gnas//rol pa'i yi ge yang dag ldan//mchu yi phyag rgya
221a3(rgyud): rdo rje con//rnam 'gyur can dang 'khor btson//khro bas su ni yongasu bsdams//'di ni khro bo'i phyag rgyar bshad//mchu yi phyag rgya gzugs mdzes can//'dzin
221a4(rgyud): rten pa rnams mchu'i phyag rgya//rnam 'gyur 'jig cing gzugs dang bral//shin tu gnag dko'i 'dod chags dang //sdang dang rmongs las thams cad du//rol cing
221a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor dang ldan po//de yo bcas rab tu 'phro ba yang //mchu yi phyag rgyar shes par bya//lha mo pho nyi tshogs kyi yang //de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/
221a6(rgyud): lte stang ma mtshul mams pa'i ming //phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdu bo//skyob pa rnams kyi kun shes bya//ji srid sku yi dbye ba dang //dbang po la sogs rab
221a7(rgyud): bye dang /de dag phyog rgya sna tshogs mchog/sangs rgyas kun gyi rtags pa nyid//sna tshogs sku ni gzi brjid che//tshad med yon tan 'byung ba'i
221b1(rgyud): gnas//sma sa rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed//rdo rje snying po rgyun gyi rgyud chen po las dam chag tshon pa'i de kho na nyid gsang ba zhes bya ba'i dkyu
221b2(rgyud): 'khor chen po yong su rdzogasaso///de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dbang bskur ba zhes bya
221b3(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bka' stsal pa/de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs pa zhes ni mdzes par bya//
221b4(rgyud): sna tshogs khams ni bsam yas mchog/dar dang me tog chun pos rgyan//rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras//sna tshogs pad+ma de bzhin gzhan//dkyil 'khor de yi dbu su ni//sangs
221b5(rgyud): rgyas sku gzugs yid 'ong ba//mgon po sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan//'bar ba mchog gis rgyan pa po//dri sngags rtag su shes bya ba//dang po'i dbyangs dang gnyis pa'o//de yi
221b6(rgyud): nye 'khor brgyad du ni//'bram du rtsibs brgyad pa yi yang //'khor lo dag ni bri bar bya//dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni//'khor lo kun tu 'bar ba bzhug/'khor lo'i lte ba'i
221b7(rgyud): dbun ni//pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas//sgeg sogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni//ji ltar sngon bzhin bri bar bya//nye bar mkho ba'i mchod kun gyis//de bzhin gshegs pa
222a1(rgyud): mchod par bya//dgug sogs cho ga'i sbyor ba ni//dkyil 'khor snga ma ji bzhin no//dkyil 'khor nye bar spyod pa kun//cho ga 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur//
222a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i rtog pa'o//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba//'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal zhes//bya ba rdo rje hUM mdzad grags/
222a3(rgyud): gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babras bzhis ni mdzes par byas//de yi nang du 'khor lo ni//dkyil 'khor brgyud pa lta bu'o//de yi dbusu khro bo che//'jig rten gsum las
222a4(rgyud): rnam rgyal yang //khro gnyer ldan zhing smin ma 'khyog/spyan gsal 'bar ba chen po pa//cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal//rnam par dgod cing slar khro pa//g.yas brkyang
222a5(rgyud): ba yi zhabs kyis ni//bka' bzlog dbang phyug chen po gnon//sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras//in dra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od//phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa//
222a6(rgyud): zhal bzhi pa la thub par dka'//be con dang ni zhags par mdzod//dang so na ni rdo rjer bshad//gnyis pa zhags pa bsdigs mdzub can//phyag gnyis khu tshur dam pa
222a7(rgyud): mchog/khu tshur gnyis ni rab tu brtag/mthe chung gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba'o//lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par smre la//snying khar phyag rgya legs bzhag nas//bsdigs mdzub/
222b1(rgyud): gnyis kyis bsdigs par mdzad//'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya ba'i//phyag rgya mchog tu thub par dka'//sngags ni ming gi de nyid ldan//'bar ba'i phreng bas mnyam par 'khrigs//
222b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dri yi gnas rnams//cha rnams kun tu thams cad nas//phyag rgya thams cad mnyam par bri//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam gnas par//ral gri 'khor lo gzhu dang /
222b3(rgyud): mda'//de bzhin du ni dgra sta nyid//de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas mchog/mdor bsdus nas ni phyag rgya dgod//de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dkod nas nye
222b4(rgyud): bar 'kho ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o//'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang dag rab tu
222b5(rgyud): bshad bya ba//sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis//'gro ba 'dul ba zhi su bshad//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//dar dang me tog chun pos rgyan//de dbus dkyil 'khor chen
222b6(rgyud): po ni/chu zhes bya ba'i ming tsA no//de yi dbusu pad chen po//mdab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba//de yi lte ba'i dbusu ni//'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba//zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i
222b7(rgyud): mdog/ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa can//phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po//sangs rgyas phreng po sogs pas sbas//sku rnams thams cad
223a1(rgyud): kun nas spro//mtha' yAs rab 'byam rgya che ba'i//chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam la//de yi sngagasu yongs grags pa//sha Sha'i sde yi mtha'/
223a2(rgyud): dge ba//k+Sha yig don ldan sngon byung ba//rgyu yi don du rab sgrub byed//bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis spyi bor mnan//me yI sa boni gsal bar byed//thig le sgra ni mchog tu
223a3(rgyud): sbyi na 'jig rten dbang phyug zhes bya'i mtshan//de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad//pad+mo'i thal mo rab tu brkyang //bris pa'i phyag rgyar yang dge bshad//dbyug gu'i
223a4(rgyud): ril ba spyi blugs bri//mdun du bgrang phreng pad+ma yi//rgyal po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhig/de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/phyag rgya mchog tu 'bar de dag/'gro ba
223a5(rgyud): 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du//ji ltar rigs pa dgod par bya//'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba//dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyal po'o//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/gzhan//
223a6(rgyud): ni rang tu bshad par bya//dpa' ba rin chen snying po yi//rdo rje rIn chen zhe su bshad//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas//de yi dbusu
223a7(rgyud): rin chen che//yan lag brgyad pa mchog tu 'bar//de dbus rin chen pad+ma ni//rin chen phreng bas rnam par mdzes//de dbus ma ra ka ta 'dra//rin chen rdo rje cher
223b1(rgyud): 'byung ba//spangasargyas lnga yi ts+tshed pan+da can//rin chen byung bas rnam par mdzes//mdun du kun gyi dbang bskur gtso//rin chen de yi gtso bo mchog/ga yas pad+ma dag ste//rlung
223b2(rgyud): tu in+d+ran+ti la'o//yid bzhin nor bu rin chen g.yon//phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs mchog/sna tshogs rin chen rnam par brgyan//dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa bzhi na//gnas rnam sa
223b3(rgyud): ni bzhag par bya//sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis//dri yi sngagasu yongs grags pa//bzhi pa'i sde yi dang po gang //me yI sa bon gyis gsal byas//dbyangs kyis gnyis
223b4(rgyud): byas na nas mun na//dbong bsgyur bla ni steng du gnas/ ye phyag rgyu yang dag pashad//rin chen sgrim pa rgyab bsnams te//rin chen rnam pa legs byung //de ni rdo rje rin
223b5(rgyud): chen no//rdo rje rjen po che'i dkyil 'khor//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po man+dog/yang dag rab tu bshad bya bya//zla bIshrI pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/
223b6(rgyud): thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par mdzes//de yi dbusu zhal bzhi pa'i//'khor lo bzhi ni yongs bskor ba'o//de yi dbu su pud chen po'o//kha dag
223b7(rgyud): sna tshogs yongs 'bar ba//de yi dbu su brtson chen po//rdo rje'i gzugs ni yongasu bri//rdo rje khur 'dzin mdzes pa ni//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po//kha dog sna tshogs
224a1(rgyud): gzi brjid che//sangs rgyas phreng bar rnam par mdzes//de yi sngags ni yang dag bshad//bcu gnyis pa yi dbyangs kyi mtha'//mya ngan 'das don leg
224a2(rgyud): gsal bya//sgeg sogs rig ma thams cad kyis//de bzhin rang gi phyag rgya yis//rdo rje'i thig laM yongasu ldan//sna tshogs bkri ba mchog du 'bar//de yi dbang bskur
224a3(rgyud): phyag rgya yis//mchod pa kun gyi thams cad nas//kun nas yongasu bskor ba yis//las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//las kyi dkyil 'khor ro//de nas dkyil
224a4(rgyud): 'khor chen po mchog/yang drag rab tu bshad bya ba//shes rab ye shes 'khor lo che//sngags kyi yi ges rnam par rgyan//de yi dbus pad chen po//'dab ma
224a5(rgyud): brgyad ba shin tu mdzes//de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni//gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa//sku mdog dmar zhing 'dzum bcas pa//sna tshogs gzugs can ral
224a6(rgyud): gri can//phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa//ral gro'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//gsang sngags chen po yi ge lnga//de yi drung du legs par gnas//dbyangs dang smra ba
224a7(rgyud): kun nas de'i//thugs kha ru ni yang dag gnas//phyi rol nyid ni gru bzhi mdzes//thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//rta babs bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor//sgo gcig gis
224b1(rgyud): nA shin tu mdzes//shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyid//de la dkyil 'khor dbus ni//galpA tI pA ma brub mchog 'dod na//'bad pa yis na bye bar bya//sngon du bya shad pa'i nan
224b2(rgyud): yi da ni mchod sogs tshig rgyas pa nyid//gzhug pa'i cho ga de bzhin du//rje ltar dkyil 'khor 'dir mthong bzhin//shes rab yAM shes dkyil 'khor ro//de nas dkyi
224b3(rgyud): 'khor chen po mchog/yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba//glu bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas//thig bzhi yis ni yang dag ldan//phyi yi dkyil
224b4(rgyud): 'khor bri bar bya//de yi nang du ze bya ba//chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med//rten cing 'grel 'byung breng bu ni//'byung ba ya si ni b+hI bar bya//'khor lnga'i dbus brtson chen po//rdo rje
224b5(rgyud): rgyu ni stobs phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o//kha dog nag po gzi brjid che//chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor mdzad//de yi sngags kyu
224b6(rgyud): mes pa ni//rgyu yi don du sor bskyed//dbyangs drug dang ni yang dag ldan//thig le phyi mos rnam par rgyun//yi ge chen po'i phreng bya can//'khor lo gnyis kyis rnam par d+hun//
224b7(rgyud): de yi mdun du drung yin la//rgyab du zhags pa brjod par bya//rdo rje'i thal mo phyag rgya che//'khor lo bzhin du rab tu gnas//mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag/ji ltar
225a1(rgyud): 'khor snga ma bzhin//de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med//thog mar chos kyi 'khor lho bskor//dngos grub thams cad yang
225a2(rgyud): dag 'bar//chos kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba//thog ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis//dkyil
225a3(rgyud): 'khar kun gyi thig gdab bo//de yi dkyil du snang ba che//mkha' bzhin shin tu 'od gsal ba//sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i mdzod//pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu bzhugs//
225a4(rgyud): zla ba'i mdag can gzi brjid che//sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog/gzho nu rab tu brjid pa'i zhal//na mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu gragis//sangs rgyas phreng ba
225a5(rgyud): sogs pas spras//rdo rje dkyil 'khor rgyan par mdzad//'di yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che//dbyangs dgu pa la thig le dang //nA dra yis ni rnam par rgyan//sde chen
225a6(rgyud): dang po'i gsum pa la//thig le nA das rnam par rgyan//gtso bo de ya sngags pa yang //na mkha'i mdzod ni rab bskor mdzad//de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/
225a7(rgyud): sngags kyi phreng ba mchog ldan pa//ma lus pa yos rnams kun//thams cad nas ni na mkha'i tshul//tog ni phyag rgyar gyur pa de'i//de bzhin du ni nges par
225b1(rgyud): tsung //do wA t+ta 'khor b+hIm+b+ha nA sa nA~M//namakha' yon mdzad do la//bal+yA twe bdug ni grub 'dod na//mudzod pa kun gyis rnam par mdzad//namakhwa'o mdzod kyi rgyal 'ang
225b2(rgyud): ro/de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang dag rab tu ba shad bye ba//dkyil 'khor mo'i sbyor ba yas//dkyil 'khor thams cad thig dab bo//dkyil 'khor nga
225b3(rgyud): dbus ni//khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa//der yang rdo rje 'di yi mchog/dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'dod//de yi dbus gzi brjid che//rdo rje gnod sbyin bla na med//phyag bzhi
225b4(rgyud): ba la zhal bzhi pa//pad+ma'i rgyal po la rab gnas//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i lus//bdud rnams thams cad rab 'joms mdzad//de sngags yo ger gyur pa no//
225b5(rgyud): Sha'i sde tshan mthar dge bi//rgyu yi den du legs gsal bya//khro bo'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskor//sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba che//'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya//de lta'i dkyil
225b6(rgyud): 'khor bres nas ni//rdo rje gdod sbyin de yi ni//gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na//sgyum thams cad gzhom par bya//rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o//de nas dkyil
225b7(rgyud): 'khor chen po mchog/yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas//de yi dbusu 'khor lo che//lcags kyu yis ni rnam par
226a1(rgyud): mdzes//dbus bcom ldan rdo rje rgyal//lcags kyu la ni rab tu bzhugs//phyag bzhi pa lnga zhal bzhi pa//rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu 'bar//rdo rje
226a2(rgyud): lcags kyu khu tshur che//'bar ba 'phro bas rnam par rgyan//'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par mdzad//sngags kyi yi gles legs par sbyar//sha Sha'i sde yi drung gnas pa//
226a3(rgyud): byed pa'i rgyu ru legs par gnas//dbyangs drug pa yis legs par phye//zla phye thig les leg par rgyan//lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas legaso par sbyar//'gugs par byed la
226a4(rgyud): don yod pa'o//de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//rdo rje lcags kyu mchog tu dge/dgug pa laM sogs thams cad la//'gro ba 'dul ba yongasu bsdu//don yod rgyal
226a5(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khoraro//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta bebs bzhis ni mdzes par bya//thig bzhi
226a6(rgyud): dang ni yang dag ldan//dngos grub dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//dkyil 'khor de yi dbusu ni//dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i rnam pa can//de yi dbusu gru gsum grags//
226a7(rgyud): lcags kyu mchog tu dge ba'o//de yi dbusu sems dpa' che//rdo rje rgyal po stobs po che//phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o//
226b1(rgyud): kauzo brjod rnon po dkar dang dmar//zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin dgo pa//de yi gsad sngags stong dag bshad//don yod 'bras bu stsol bya'o//sgra chen gnyis par+Na/
226b2(rgyud): gsum bA nI//gnyis 'gyur nyid du rnam par gnas//de ye big le mya ngan 'das//sngags kyi phreng ba gzhan rjes bskor//sgeg mo la sogs mchid pa che//'dud
226b3(rgyud): pa yis ni b+hA bar bya//sgo sbyong ba deng mchod pa yang //sbyar ba ji bzhin rnam par dgod//de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//mchod pa thams cad yongasu sgrub/
226b4(rgyud): rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba//sangs rgyas dpa' ba thams cad kyis//rdo rje chags pa zhes bshad//
226b5(rgyud): bzhi pa la sku bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas//thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//chags pa'i dkyil 'khor byi bar bya//thams cad dmar pos rab dregs pas
226b6(rgyud): dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin//de yi dbus pad chen po//'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas//de yi lte ba'i dbus ni//rdo rje chags pa bri bar bya//pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od//
226b7(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa//spyan gsum 'od kyi phreng ba can//de yi phyog rgya mchog tu ni//mdzes pa yis ni mda' gzhur 'gyur//rgyan rnams kuni gyis mdzes pa'i lus//
227a1(rgyud): 'gro ba kun la chos mchog 'gyur//de yi gsang sngags mdzes gyur pa//rdo rje chags pa mchog tu bde//sha Sha'i sde yi mthar thug pa//k+Sha yi yi ge'i
227a2(rgyud): sngon du gnas//dbyangs dgu pa dang yang dag ldan//sngags kyi phreng bas yang dag rgyan//me tog mnga' ni yongasu 'ben//re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad//de lta'i
227a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod byed//rdo rje chags pa'i dkyil 'khor ra//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang dag rab tu bshad bya
227a4(rgyud): ba//rdo rje legs pa zhes grags pa//gnyisu med pa'i dga' ba'ang 'phe lnga//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas//de yi dbus cher mdzes pa'i//
227a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa gru bzhi pa//de yi dbus pad chen po//ze 'bru yis ni nye bar mdzes//de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni//zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang dag 'bar//der gnas
227a6(rgyud): dpa' bo bsam par bya//rdo rje phyogs pa stobs po che//dung dang kun da zla ba dkar//kha ba bya zho'i 'od ltar mdzes//leg so stsa lnga ba tshim par mdzad//ting 'dzin
227a7(rgyud): dbang mang po sgyur//rdo rje sgeg mo sogs mchod pa//de bzhin me tog bdug pa sogs//sgo yi skyong ba nyid kyang ni//rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya//de yi sngags gyur mdzes
227b1(rgyud): pa ni/gsang ba chen po mchog tu 'bar//lha mo yi ge sngon gang de//sems can dron ni rab sgrub byed//thig le gnyis dang yongasu ldan//legs stsol bas ni rnam par gnas//
227b2(rgyud): de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//mchod pa thams cad rab tu bskor//bdag nyid dag pas gzhug pa sogs//thams cad yongasu spyad par bya//rdo rje legs pa'i dkyil
227b3(rgyud): 'khoro//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba//rdo rje gzi brjid zhesu grags//rdo rje nyi mas blo gros ldani//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs
227b4(rgyud): bzhis ni mdzes par byas//thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya//de yi nang du bre bya ba//rdo rje nyi ma 'od po che//rdo rje nyi mar steng du ni//
227b5(rgyud): bru gsum rnam pa las byung ba//de yi dbusu gzi brjid che//'bar ba yi ni me lta bu//pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa//ze 'bru yis ni shin tu mdzes//de yi lci ba'i
227b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje gzi brjid stobs po che//bzang po'i mtshal dang mtshungs pa'i 'od//rmyi skyegasA khu tshur mtshungs pa'i mdog/phyag bzhi pa la zhalnga bzhi pa//
227b7(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyi brgyan pa'o//de yi sngagasu yongs grags pa//kun nas sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i nyid//dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yi mtha'//nyi ma'i dkyi
228a1(rgyud): 'khor dbus ni//sngags kyi phreng bas yongasu bskor//rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ldan//de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//sangs rgyas tha~Md
228a2(rgyud): rab mchod bya//rdo rje gzi brjid dkyil 'khor//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang dgra rab tu bshed bya ba//yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ming //
228a3(rgyud): bdag nyid tshon po rdo rje rtog/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas//thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//
228a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni//mchog tu 'bar ba yi ni rlung //zla ba phyed pa'i rnam po 'dra//rin chen rgyal mtshan yongs sgreng ba//de yi dbus sems dpa' che//
228a5(rgyud): rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po//zhal bzhi pa lnga gzi brjid che//in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od//rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs//phyag bzhi pa la snang ba che//
228a6(rgyud): de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che//sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la//me yis rab tu gsal byas pa//tog gi phyag rgyas yongasu bskor//sngags kyi phreng bas rnam par
228a7(rgyud): brgyan//de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya//rdo rje tog gi dkyil 'khor ro//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang
228b1(rgyud): dag rab tu bshad bya ba//rdo rje bzhad pa zhes grags bA//rdo rje bzhad pa mtshungs pa'i 'od//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas//thig bzhi dang ni
228b2(rgyud): yang dag ldan//dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya//dkyil 'khor dri dbus zlum po ni//in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od//de bzhin tshu ni gzi brjid can//phyag rgya 'khor los rnam
228b3(rgyud): par mdzes//dkyil 'khor de yi dbusu ni//sten ka'i zla ba 'dra ba'i 'od//'gro ba mtha' drig snang mdzad pa//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po//phyog bzhi pa la zhal
228b4(rgyud): bzhi pa//dbang phyug thams cad yang dag ldan//de yi gsang sngags gsang chen po//rgyu yi don du bsgrub par bya//stong pa mngon brjod bsam mi khyab//rang ming rtogs
228b5(rgyud): pas mtshan pa'o//de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya//rdo rje bzhad pa'i dkyil 'khoro//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog
228b6(rgyud): yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas//thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//dngos grub dkyil 'khor yang dag
228b7(rgyud): bri/de yi steng du'ang pad+mo che//pad+ma me las yang dag byung //gru gsum mchog tu mdzes pa po//thor cog dag gis rnam par rkyen//chos dbyings yi ge'i de kho na//
229a1(rgyud): mas nad gzo brjod 'drug nyid dag/de yi mdog gli nyid ni//'bru b+hUSh+To mAn+ta kA tA'ang //byub ban pa la zhal bzhi pa//rgyun rnams dun/
229a2(rgyud): gyis brgyan pa po//gnyis pa'i mdog tu gyur pa ni//pad+me rAg ma tshungs pa'i 'od//ji srid dge gi 'khor la ni//smra ba'i dbye bas rab tu gnas//khams cad so sor
229a3(rgyud): gsal bar byed//sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog rmad byung //de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya//rdo rje smra ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//
229a4(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba//dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor bu yis//dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya//de yi dbus go
229a5(rgyud): rin chen kun gyis rnam par rgyun//de yi dbus brtson chen po//rdo rje srung bar yang dag bri//phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa//rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bo//kha dog
229a6(rgyud): sna tshogs gzi brjid che//thams cad srung ba mchog tu dge/phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan//gsang ba chen po go 'phang mchog/de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che//sha
229a7(rgyud): Sha'i sde yi mthar gnas mchog/mgon po'i rgyur ni mngon par brjod//steng du nA ngas brgyan par bya//kun nas kha don du ma yis//yongs bskor ba bsgom pa
229b1(rgyud): bya na sngags kyi phreng ba yongasu ldan//glog gi phreng bas rnam par rgyan//dri lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//mchod pa thams cad rab bsgrub bya//rdo rje srung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//dri nas
229b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang dgra rab tu bshang bya ba//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta bebs bzhis ni mdzes par bya//thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//khu tshur dkyil
229b3(rgyud): 'khor bri bar bya//dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni//rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ba//gzi brjid chen po gser gyi mdog/'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba//de yi steng du gzo brjid che//
229b4(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che//phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po//kun de dung dang zla ba dkar//khu tshur de bzhin gshegs kun gyi//sku
229b5(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur//rdo rje nyid du mnyam nyid mchog/gnyisu med pa mchog gsang ba//kha tshur gyis ni sdud par bshad//de sngags mchog tu dga' ba ni//
229b6(rgyud): brjod du medad nyid stsol mdzad pa//sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni//'byur ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can//sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku//'dri yi sngags la rnam par gnas//
229b7(rgyud): de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//rdo rje khu tshur mchod par bya//rdo rje khu tshur dkyil 'khor ro//de la sogs po'i mtha' yos mechog/dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar/
230a1(rgyud): bA nI//chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' gas pa'o//sangs rgyas byang chub stsol bar mdzad//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor
230a2(rgyud): mchog/de bzhin gru bzhi bris nas ni//sgo khyud la sogs rnam par spangs//rtse gsum snam bu nyid dang ni//dung dang pad+ma sogs pas rgyan//thog mar dbang phyug chen
230a3(rgyud): po dgod//rtse gsum pa yi phyag rgyar ldan//khyu mchog la zhon mig gsum pa//stag gi lpags gyon phyag bzhi pa//thal bas byugs shing mgo bo la//ral po'i tshogs
230a4(rgyud): ni rab 'phyang ba//chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus ni//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la//phyag 'tshal ba ni de bri'o//de'i sngags ni/oM tri sa suM hUM phaT/gsang sngags
230a5(rgyud): 'di ni cher gsang ba//bdag nyid chen po dbang phyug che'i//dbang phyug chen po'i sgrub pa'i thab so//dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid la//dbang phyug chen po'i gnasu nag pa
230a6(rgyud): chen po gzhag par bya'o//lag pa stong gi grar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dga' byed dbang phyug dang lhan cig phyag bzhi pa lag pa stong gis gnas pa'o//rang gi sngags ni/

230b1(rgyud): dkyil 'a b+hu bzhi thob pa bu bya//dUr ni pud+ma yang dag bri//pad+ma'i dbus spyang rdzi byed//la sogs mthar byed spyan bri'o//ba yi phyug+sa t+yA yong su 'dzin//sbrang rtsi byed dang rtu
230b2(rgyud): byedad /nyid kyi sgrub thabs de bzhin no//me tig mda' dad yongasu ldan//rang gi ming rtogs mtshan ma can//sngags nI/ma d+h+yA kr-it+to sr-i/oM swo d+ha na sAM/gsang sngags 'odi ni 'dod
230b3(rgyud): gzugs can//dbang du byed pa thams cad sgrub//sbrang rtsi rdo rje la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i thibs so//dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bris nas dbus thig bzhi ga po//dbus tum bu
230b4(rgyud): ru'o//shar gyis 'dab mar rgyal ba'o//lho ru rnam par rgyal ba'o//nub tu mi thub pa'o//byang du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o//de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bris nas/go rims
230b5(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags dgod par bya'o//oM tuM pu ru hUM/oM dza ye hUM/oM bi dza ye hAM/oM a dzi te hUM/oM a pa rA dzi te hAM/dga' ba 'di drag lag g.yon du//
230b6(rgyud): khu tshur g.yon pas rab sgrub stsol//'di yi phyag rgya nyid gyur pa//sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags//log pa dgod par rab bshad bya//gro rims ji lta ba bzhin/
230b7(rgyud): dudad tum bu ru ni mthe ba r-i dgod//bsdigs mdzub la ni rgyal ba gnas//rnam rgyal gung mo nyid la'o//mi thub de bzhin ming med la//bzhan gyi mi thub mthi chung la//

231a3(rgyud): rings byed la sogs go rim sa bzhin//los rnams dag ni thams cad du//sngags pas mnyam par bzhag ste byo//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
231a4(rgyud): thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mtshan

232a1(rgyud): dang por rnal 'byor dbang phyun mchog/legs rdor can rnal 'byor na//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dge/snying pa'i rgyan zhes mtshan gsol pa//'di

232b3(rgyud): khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes rab dang ye shes rnam par sbyangs te/byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas bkug cing rjes mnyes par byas

232b6(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams la'ang thugs brtson par mdzad de/sdong su dag nas yang pad+mo'i sems dpa'i tI 'dzin la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid gzhi med pa la sbyor nas
232b7(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i las kyi bdag pos kyang sems can yongs sbyin cing sbyang ba'i khyo bos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba rnams son
233a1(rgyud): b+h+rUM khams mtha' dag yongasu smin pa dang /byin gyis brlabs te rmar lcog nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rje su zhugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa
233a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la zhugs nas tshad du brjod pa 'ad ched du brjod//e ma ho zag med shes rab na//sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi//shes rab shin tu
233a3(rgyud): dri med sems//sems dpa'i lusu bdag gyur to//dri med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad na//e mo ho chos ni bsam med nyid//bdag gi

233b3(rgyud): stsal pa/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni nang gi lus dang /phyi'i lus dang /phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjesu lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/dran pa dang ldan
233b4(rgyud): pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//lus la kun 'byung ba'i rje su lta zhing rnam par spyod do//lus la zad pa'i rjesu lta

233b6(rgyud): nang gi sems dang /phyi'i sems dang /phyi nang gi sems dang /nang gi chos dang /phyi'i chos dang /phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjesu lto zhing brtson 'grus shes bzhin dang ldan//
233b7(rgyud): pa/dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi tshogs sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod//chos la kun 'byung ba'i rje su lta zhing rnam pa re spyod do//
234a1(rgyud): chos la zad pa'i rjesu lta zhing rnam par spyod do//chos la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa medado//rtag tu shes
234a2(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lus dang drug dang sems dang /chos mnyam pa nyid kyis gnaso//oM k+ShaM/oM tsi t+tA ra smr-i d+h+ya pas+yA nA nA hUM/yang dag par spong pa bzhi ni sdig to mi
234a3(rgyud): dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsolo//brtson 'grus rtsom mo//sems kyi mthu bskyed//smon lam yang
234a4(rgyud): dag par 'debaso//sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams sbyang ba'i phyir//'dun pa la sogs pa dang /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed po'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed///

234b1(rgyud): a d+hiny+dzi te AHraHhUM/yang dag par spong ba brjod pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni mos pa'i ting 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i

234b4(rgyud): d+hi pA da pA ra mi ta la ba pa ra hUM hUM/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//dbang po lnga ni dad pa'i dbang
234b5(rgyud): po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po'o//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la

234b7(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//stobs lnga ni dad pa'i stobs dang /brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /dran pa'i stobs dang /ting 'dzin gyi stobs dang /shes rab kyi stong so zhes bka'
235a1(rgyud): sprul to//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa stobs thams cad rtogs pa/spros pa thams cad dang bral ba 'dod ma nas
235a2(rgyud): dag pas 'di bka' stsal pa/oM sar+b+ba ta thA ge tA be la aHhUM hUM baHstobs 'arol ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhini/byams
235a3(rgyud): pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang //btang snyoms pa'o//oM brah+ma bi hA rA d+hiSh+ThA na kaM maM druM k+Sha~M hUM trAM/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
235a4(rgyud): 'di bka' stsal to//tshangs pa'i gnas pa byin gyis rlob pa'o//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni spobs pa so sor yang dag par rig pa dang /nges pa'i tshig so so yang
235a5(rgyud): dag par rig pa dang /don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du so so yang dag
235a6(rgyud): par rig pa'i phyir shes rishA kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to//oM pra ti sam+bi daHswAhA/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid//rje su dran pa drug gang

242a3(rgyud): da ldan mdzod btsun te 'di'i sbyin ma dgag dbus nai ram+b+ha skud khebs pa lta bu dang brtag pa'i mdag tson g.yas phyogasu 'khyil bar 'gyur te/mdzod spu nyid kyis sa

242a6(rgyud): leg so so mnu ro rnams myong bar byed//tsaM ste bsta na//ro bya ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid de na rnams yin la de rnams kyi mchog tu rlung dang /mkhris pa dang /

250a2(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//oM 'gog po med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//
250a3(rgyud): oM skye bar 'gyur ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//aM rnam par shes pa thams cad/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//oM 'bar ba chen po'i chos
250a4(rgyud): nyid doshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//oM brtson 'grus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//oM thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//
250a5(rgyud): oM rdo rje thams cad brtan pa'i sems/shes rab phyi rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//au de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//
250a6(rgyud): oM rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid ye shes rnam par dog pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//oM las rnam par sbyong ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
250a7(rgyud): sgo'o//oM nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can pha Da/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tsA/oM 'dod pa la 'dod chags rnam par dag pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//oM
250b1(rgyud): mgyogs pa'i rdo rje can/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//oM hU~M thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//oM hrIHshos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pA'i s+ho//au a zhes
250b2(rgyud): bya ba'i sgo//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//oM ai bA hUM/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//oM oM shes
250b3(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo//oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam pa/
250b4(rgyud): dag pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi rdo rje/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de
250b5(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /
250b6(rgyud): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
250b7(rgyud): byin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa ces bya ba/theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya gu h+ya ma Ni tI la kA nA ma swA hA/
251a1(rgyud): bod skad du/'phags pa gsang ba nor bu thig le zhes bya ba'i mad//bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi rdul rnyog pa med pa la gus par phyug
251a2(rgyud): 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna chags
251a3(rgyud): pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/de bzhin gshes
251a4(rgyud): pa thams cad legs par khong du chud pas las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i son+da gyi khams kyi bsdam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par mdzad pa
251a5(rgyud): thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad rtag pa dus gsum gyi dam tshig la rnam par gnas pa'i sku/de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi sgra dang /gsung dang /thugs rdo rje de bzhin
251a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsten cing bstod pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i rtse mo khang pa brtsegs pa/kha dog rnam par bkra bi'i dril bu dang ldan pa/rlung gis bskyod pa'i ngang
251a7(rgyud): gyi ba dan dang /me tog gi chun po dang /dra ba dang dra ba byed pa dang /zla bas nye bar mdzes pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i khang bzang na bzhug so//byang chub sems dpa'
251b1(rgyud): bye ba phrag d+hag bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /na mkha'i snying po dang /rdo rje khu tshur dang /
251b2(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang ldan pas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /namakha'i mdzod dang /bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon
251b3(rgyud): nor gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de ba'i
251b4(rgyud): gshegs pa gzhal du med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dri lta ste/dper na til gyi gang bu ltar dzam+bu'i gling yongasu gang por mthong ngo //
251b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang gzhal du med cing grangs las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing mthong bar gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na yang chos
251b6(rgyud): kyi tshul 'dri nyid ston par mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad na mkha'i khams tha~Md la sku dang gsung dang /thugs rdo rje rtog tu zhugs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa/
251b7(rgyud): thams cad kyis yang dag par bgrod pa'i rdo rje'i dbyings thaMng thug su chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' namakha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i
252a1(rgyud): shes kyi snying po na mkha'i khams thams cad la 'phro ba'i rang bzhin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par yongasu mkhyen pa/de bzhin
252a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag gi rang bzhin dag pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa na mkha' thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad legs par gzigs
252a3(rgyud): pi'i ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i ye shes
252a4(rgyud): mdzad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i thugs/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam tshig/de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd
252a5(rgyud): rjes chags pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang /de bzhin gau shebs pa thams cad kyi legs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi rin po che chen pos dbang bskur ba'i
252a6(rgyud): rin po che dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rin po/
252a7(rgyud): che'i rtog dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad gad chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa chen po'i chos dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
252b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi shes rab dang /ye shes chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi 'khor lo chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gsung chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs
252b2(rgyud): pa tha~Md kyis las sna tshogs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis srung ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yongasu skyong ba'i rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
252b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dgongs pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes dang ldan pa ste/kun tu bzang po don yod pa//'chi med rab tu dga' ba'i gno//nam mkha'i snying po
252b4(rgyud): gzi brjid che//rin chen tog ste cher 'dzum pa//skyon+da ras gzigs dang dbang phyug tshan//'jam dpal kun gyi snying po dang //brjod bral sna tshogs pa yis las//dpa' bo gtum
252b5(rgyud): po dam par 'dzin//rdo rje lcags kyu mda' tshim pa//rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum//chos mdzod mdzes pa'i 'khor lo gsung //las dring chos dang 'jigs byed 'dzin//thog ma
252b6(rgyud): tha ma med zhi ba//ma rungs khro dang bzod pa che//gnod sbyin drin po dam pa brtan//gzi chen dpa' bo khyab bdag che//u ma'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon//'jug sred rgyal 'dod thub
252b7(rgyud): pache//'jig rten skyong dang mkha' dang sa//'jig rten gsum dang kham gsum pa//'byung chen sen don rab mdzad//thams cad sems can po chen po//'khor ba mya ngani l+la/
253a1(rgyud): dang brtag/yang dag mtsho dang mtshad chen po//sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa chu//srid pa gsum po'ang da bzhin//de dag la sogs pa'i yon+tan bya ba
253a2(rgyud): brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor te dkyil 'khor chen po de la bzhugs nas chos ston par mdzad//de nas byang
253a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po phyagan rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khar la rten
253a4(rgyud): 'khod nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/bcom ldan 'dus mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i thig le zhes bgyi ba'i ting 'dzin gyi khyod
253a5(rgyud): bar bka' stsal du gsol/gang gis sems can rnams la gsang ba'i de kho na nyid dam tshig de bdag gis bshad par bgyis lag so//de nas bcom ldan 'das
253a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje gas
253a7(rgyud): ba'i dam pa gang gis sems can thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de bshad par bya'o//de nas byang chub
253b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po gang gis bdag gsang ba'i
253b2(rgyud): bdag por 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan
253b3(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad mi phyed par mdzad/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad dang mi byed par gyur nas
253b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid la ched du brjod pa 'das ched du brjod pa/e ma'o bdag ni thabs chen po//rab tu gsang ba thig le yi//ting 'dzin gang phyir grub pa yang //gsang ba
253b5(rgyud): nyid ni zhu bar byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas phyag du 'khod par gyur pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
253b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rab tu gsang ba'i thig le zhes bgyi bci lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjel
253b7(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lag na rdo rje rab tu gsang ba'i thig le 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'o//ches shin tu gsang ba'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa'o//de bzhin ga
254a1(rgyud): pa thams cad nyid sbyin pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byed pa'o//de bzhin bshags pa thams cad kyi 'dra ba dang /yid ba brjes
254a2(rgyud): rlig pa'i don du de bzhin bra shegs pa thams cad kyi thugs byin pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yu mo//'di ni gsang ba'i mdzad do//'di pad+ma'o//'di nyid rdo rje'o//
254a3(rgyud): 'di nyid dam tshig ste/de nyid kyis na lag na rdo rje/dam tshig mi shes pa'i mdun du smra bar mi bya'o//de'i phyir lag na rdo rje ngas 'ga' la yang ma bshad do//de nas byang chub
254a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lag ni rdo rjes slar yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir gang 'ga' zhig la smra bar bgyi/de nas
254a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la legaso zhes bya ba gnang ste/legs rdo rje sems dpa' khyod//rdo rje rin chen khyod legs
254a6(rgyud): leg so rdo rje chos khyod kyis//rdo rje las khyod rab leg so//mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa//rdo rje theg pa bla na med//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //theg pa
254a7(rgyud): chen po mdor bsdus pa//dag pas rnam par bsgrubs tsam gyis//bde blag du ni sangs rgyas thob//bde ba zad med mi zad pa//skye ba 'di la 'grub par byed//zheso//lag
254b1(rgyud): na rdo rje des na shin tu gsang ba'i thog le las kyang mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo ste 'di legs par sba bar bya/sems can gang kha cig nye bar skrag pa dang
254b2(rgyud): bcas pa yod la/gang kha cig dad pa dang ldan pas theg pa chen po glang po che'i phrag tu zhon pa dag yod do//de dag las dang po la ni gsang sngags dang phyag rgya dang gsang ba thaMd bshad/
254b3(rgyud): par mi bya zhing gsang ba thams cad bstan par mi bya'o//dad pa can dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa dag la de dag thams cad bshad par bya'o//legs par gsang ba'i
254b4(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyi theg le 'di ni ches shin tu gsang ba rab tu gnas pa'i slob dpon la bshad par bya'o//gang zhig rgyud 'di bshad pa tsam na sems can dad pas rje su 'brang ba dang /gang
254b5(rgyud): dag ches shin tu dga' ba skye ba de dag ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan par shos par bya'o//de dag la 'bad pas gdams pa dang bcas pa bstan par bya'o//seMn
254b6(rgyud): gang kha cig nyan thos kyi theg po dang ldan pa de dag la lo rgyus tsam yang mi bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
254b7(rgyud): to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir de dag la lo rgyus tsam yang mi bgyi/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
255a1(rgyud): smras na/lo rgyus tsam gyis kyang dmyal bar rab tu ltung bar 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lag ra rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
255a2(rgyud): kyang rdo rje kun nas 'bar rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa'i ngas rigs thams cad sreg par byed//bcom ldan 'das de dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus
255a3(rgyud): bgyid par bgyi'o zhes//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi theg pa
255a4(rgyud): de dag gi nang du bshad par mi bgyi lpags na/de ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis shin tu ches gsang ba'i thig le zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i snying po dkyil 'khor chen
255a5(rgyud): po'i dam tshig ji srid bde ba dang /yid bde ba thams cod bskyed pa'i don du bka' stsal du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'ongs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
255a6(rgyud): po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos spro ba'i sbyar ba'i dpa' bo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thaMd gcig tu mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg/
255b1(rgyud): phams gnas tu 'dzin do las banod sanas/de bzhin ga/shegs pa thams cad spyan ldan pa mchog rjezhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin po khyad par du ma la nanyam d+hA/
255b2(rgyud): nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyin 'dren pa'i dmatshig ma lus shing lus pa sems can gyi khams thams cid 'gugs pa bde ba dang yid bde ba bskyed pa'i don du
255b3(rgyud): ting 'dzin dam pa 'grub pa'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/sa sa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rgya che bas mngar bsdus te/tshi ga
255b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ba ni lngazhin rdo rje dang pa re shig sngags pas lag pa gnyis A'i rnam pa lngas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsam par bya'o//A'i rnam pa de d+hI ma med pa'i gzug so
255b5(rgyud): dkur po bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin can te/de nyid yongasu gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen pa lag na rdo rje lci phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil khar
255b6(rgyud): 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol po/bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir lag pa gnyes zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du blta bar
255b7(rgyud): /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam po grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par du
256a1(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/'dir lag pa gnyis zla ba la rdo rje phra mo nas kyi tshad tsam dkar po 'od zer dang ldan pa sngags
256a2(rgyud): 'dis bsgom par bya ste/hUM/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag ni rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la gsal ba/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'chal bar bgyi/
256a3(rgyud): rdo rje des ci zhig bgyi/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lag na rdo rje nyon cig/rdo rje thal mo dam du bcing
256a4(rgyud): nas gsang sngags 'dis rang gi spyi bor dgrol bar bya'o//i swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+maHswab+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/de nas bdag nyid shel drag pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med cing gsal
256a5(rgyud): ba'i gzugasu sngags pas bsgom par bya'o//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol/bdag ming che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas
256a6(rgyud): bzung ste/ji srid snying po byang chub la thog gi bar du/ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams//byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i//byang chub sems ni bla na med//dam pa
256a7(rgyud): dag gis bskyed par bgyi//tshul khrims kyis ni bslab pa dang //dge pa'i chos ni sdud pa dang //sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum//so sor brtan par bdag
256b1(rgyud): gis bzung //sangs rgyas chos dang dpe 'dun to//bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i//sdom pa dang nas brtan por bzung //rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya
256b2(rgyud): yang //de nyid so sor bzung bar bgyi//slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bgyi//rdo rje rigs mchog chen po lnga'o//sbyin pa rnams bzhi rtag tu sbyin//nyin de bzhin ni dus drug tu//
256b3(rgyud): rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor gyi//dam tshig yid du 'ong ba'o//byang chub chen po las byung ba'i//pad+ma'i rigs tshon dag pa la//phye nang gsong ba theg pa gsum//dam chos so/
256b4(rgyud): sor bzung bar bgyi//las kyi rigs mchog chen po la//sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni//de nyid so sor gzung bar bgyi//mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus pas//las kyis rigs
256b5(rgyud): mchog chen po yi//byang chub sems ni bla na med//dam pa rab tu bskyed pa dang //sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//bdag gis bsdoms pa ma lus bzung //ma bsgral ba rnams
256b6(rgyud): bdag gis bsgral//mi grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol//dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
256b7(rgyud): mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sdom pa bzla ste phyag rgya chen po la gnas nas
257a1(rgyud): sngags pas chos thams cadu bdag med par narnam par darga/'dri dag bam na phyus dang dang du rtobya pas btags pa las kuzhan 'ba' yang du
257a2(rgyud): gnas//zhes de ltar snying la bzhag ste 'dre skad ces/'du byed thams cad na mi rtag cing rang dazhin gyis 'od shes la lha gdod ma nas mi smras pa nyid de//zhes brjod pa
257a3(rgyud): bya'o//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/bcom
257a4(rgyud): ldan 'das sems rang bzhin gyi bong gsal ba dzi l+lIr sgom par bgyi ba cung zad bka' skyem du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bdag po

260a1(rgyud): na gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la legaso zhes gnang ba/legs rdo rje sems dpa' bo/

261a1(rgyud): ta he badz+ra nA ma/sems da' gang gi ming du gyur pa'i med de la brjod par bya'o//de nas brtan par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa dang /'did sangs rgyas thams cad de/rje

262b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo/
262b6(rgyud): rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/'di dag thams cad rgyud gzhan la sa bshad pa
262b7(rgyud): na 'od mo dor bsdus pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzod chen po/rdo rje 'ching de bzhin gshegs pa
263a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi yab/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' de rnams nyid kyi
263a2(rgyud): thugs kar bcug nas gcig tu mi phyed par gyur nas spro ba dang /smra ba'i sbyor bas phyag na rdo rje mdun du bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpa' bo'i ting 'dzin gyi

263a6(rgyud): na theg pa chen po'i tshul gyis lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par sbeng mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'

263b1(rgyud): 'khor gyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas nyid sgrub bam/'on te gsang ba'i tshul gyis lpags/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos
263b2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas nyid sgrub par bya ste/lag na rdo rje ngas kyang gsang ba'i tshul des dbang bskur nas lag na
263b3(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba'i tshul des nga yang yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
263b4(rgyud): 'das khyod slob dpon gang gis dbang bskur ba lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lag na rdo rje gsang ba zhes
263b5(rgyud): bya ba'o slob dpon des dbang bskuro//gang gis gsang ba de thob nas sangs rgyas nyid brnyes par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag ni rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di
263b6(rgyud): skad ces gsol to//gsang ba de'i rang bzhin gang lags/de chos gang gsung bar mdzad/ci sbyar ba gzhan gsungs sam/'on te zab mo'i tshul khyod la bstan pa lags/bcom ldan
263b7(rgyud): 'das gsang ba de'i rang bzhin ma 'tshal pas ci zhig lags/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'
264a1(rgyud): stsal te//lag na rdo rje 'dis chos ma bstan cing cung zad kyang ma bshad//'on kyang lag na rdo rje rang gi shes rab kyi tshul dang shes rab kyi khyad par gyis bdag nyid
264a2(rgyud): gsang ba bsnyen par brtsam par bya'o//de nas gsang ba bsten pa las gang dga'o//ming thigs pa 'od zer dang bcas par gyur pa dang /de nas 'od zer gyi phreng ba las de bzhin gshegs/
264a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku rnams rnam par phyung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de rnams las 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs dang /khro bo'i gzugs rnams dbyung bar

264a5(rgyud): pas 'grub pa legs/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lag na
264a6(rgyud): rdo rje dang po re shig ji ltar bya ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya yi nyon cig/sngags pas re shig bdag gi ting 'dzin mngon du 'gro bar bya ste/bdag nyid bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa

264b2(rgyud): can 'ga' zhig dad pa dang ldan pa yod pa de dag ni rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis badrag sgrub par 'dod la/de dag sbyor ba mi shes shing nus pa dang mi ldan pas/de rnams kyi tshe zad

264b7(rgyud): legs pa bdag gsang ba'i bdag po ma lags pos bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gsang ba dang sngags rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur ba de ltar mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das

265b1(rgyud): 'das ji lta bu'i rnam pas lham du sgrub par sh+tsA/bkaku' stsal du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rdu la bka' stsal to//lag na rdo rje rnam pa gzhan las rnam pa dang /

266a1(rgyud): rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje 'di ni mnyes pa'i gsang sngags kyis ma yin te/lag na rdo rje sor bya ba'i dbang gis de rnams bsgrub par

269b6(rgyud): po chen po 'dis 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyang skrod lags na gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/lago na rdo rje thog
269b7(rgyud): pa chen po'i tshul 'das cung zad bsgrubs pa de thams cad gdon me za bar 'grub par 'gyur/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsil ba

270a3(rgyud): ba de rnams kyis skye ba du mar sangs rgyas nyid thob par mi 'gyur te/gas te de rnams kyis grub kyang 'dir rgyal po'i longs spyod la sogs pa thob par 'gyuraro//gang dag theg
270a4(rgyud): pa chen po'i shing rto la yang dag par zhon pa de rnams kyis nyin gcig tsam gyis kyang 'di ltar sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyuraro na/nyi ma mang pos dngos grub gzhan lta smras

270a6(rgyud): theg pa chen po yang dag pa'i rjesu gdams pa dang legs par ldan pa gang du yang mi gnas par 'gro bas ni rnam par snang mdzad nyid dam/rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/gzhon nyid du
270a7(rgyud): phyin par rig par bya'o//lag na rdo rje de'i phyir theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas pa la ni rnam par rtog pa cung zad dang mi 'gyur ro//de nas chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog par
270b1(rgyud): yongasu bzung bar bya'o//de'i phyir lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha mo thams cad kyi bdag po rang yi no//zhes bsgoms pas bsgom par bya'o//lag na rdo rje
270b2(rgyud): de bzhin du lha mo thams cad kyi rdo rje la sgoms pa'i khyad par gang gis las thams cad byas te sangs rgyas nyid sgrub par byed pa slar yang bshad par bya'o//lag no rdo rje nyon cig/khro ba
270b3(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i sngags pa cung zad tsam byed pa na tshul 'dis bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje g+han d+hA ra'i b+ha ga ra bzhugs te/phra mo'i sbyor bas rtsa brgyad gau cig tu byas te/rtsa gcig lnga
270b4(rgyud): 'dzag pa dang ldan par rnam par bsam par bya'o//sngags pas lag te dbang du bya bar 'dod na des kho ga mar por rnam par bsamo//zhu ba dmar po de las bdag nyid rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi
270b5(rgyud): gzugasu rnam par bsam par bya'o//rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi gzugs des sems can thams cad dbang du byed//thogs pa med par 'gro bar 'gyuraro//gal te gsod par 'dod na nide nas
270b6(rgyud): de'i rtsa kha dog nag po sol ba'o rnam pa lta bur bsams la de zhu ba dmar po las bdag nyid rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi gzugasu sngags pas sgom par byas te/rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis de las
270b7(rgyud): rdo rje dang /de las rtse gsum dang /de las ral gri dang /de las zhags pa dang /de las lcags kyu dang /de las mda' dang /de las mdung thong rnams kyis gang gsod par 'dod
271a1(rgyud): pade bsang par byul//bstu pa la ya di da kyis bya'o//gal te rdzab rgyas nyid sgrub par 'ad na rtswa de dag khyu dak+Sha dkA d+mor bsams la/de'i zhu bar myad
271a2(rgyud): mtshungs pa las bdag nyid \u0f7fd+hu mdzod kyi zugs pa skams te/denamo spangs rgyu da da /nA ma bIR+Ya snang mang rnyed ma/rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid bsgrub par byu //ya na bcom ldan
271a3(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad gang yin pa deny+tsi sangs rgyas sbyin la/rdo rje sem sto pa'i gang yin pa de nyid sangs rgyas yin pas dri'i phyir la kun rdo rje gcig nyid bzab pas las thaMd

271b1(rgyud): skyotsa mo dosau ts+tshin+da thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi nang du 'khod par mi bya/gnas par mi bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dad pas rje su 'brang ba de la theg pa chen po sun 'byin pa'i phyir//
271b2(rgyud): de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'dis la 'od skad ces gsol to//bdag nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi nang du gnas par mi brtse la/gal te gnas na yang theg pa chen po'i rgyul
271b3(rgyud): 'das lcags kyis/phyi rol gyi tshul gyis ma lags//de nas yang lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang la la theg pa chen po'i

272a1(rgyud): bshad pa'i tshul khyad par du 'phags pa 'am/brjod pa tsam khyad par du 'phags pa dang mi ldan yang gang la ltar 'ga' shig ni ba 'gal bar yod kyis soms

272a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje des lha mo sgrol ma'i phyag rgya bcings te spyan drangs la mdun du bzhag ste/de nas

272a7(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing yid du 'ong ba rol cing dgod la rnam par blta ba mthong ste/de nas des smras pa/khyed kyis bde ba 'di zung la des sangs rgyas nyid du byos

272b2(rgyud): gsang ba shes par 'dod na des 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ti nge 'dzin gyis 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugasu byas te/lag pa gany+dzi sau brkyang la lag pa g.yas ha'i yi ge la zla ba'i

272b6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje'i sgor bdag nyid bsgoms te/de'i rtsa dang zhu ba'i sbyor ba dkar po las bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bskyed de lha mo de bsten pa'i sbyor ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags

273a3(rgyud): sgrub par 'dod na des den yod pa'i zhags pa'i ting 'dzin gyi dor b+ha ga'i dbus kyi rtswa'i gdong du sngags pa bdag nyid don yod zhags pa'i gzugasu bsgoms te/de das don yad

274a1(rgyud): bsams te/bsten pas gal te de bsams pa na sngags pa de'i zhu ba red par gyur nas dngo grub 'thob par shes par bya'o//gal te zhu ba brtan par gyur na

276b1(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i ngo bos rnams 'dzin pa de bzhin du des kyang sems can rnams 'dzin pa'o//sems can med pa rnams kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dang ldan pa gzhom pa'i don gyi yum rnams kyis
276b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsang ba bskul ba 'dis bstod pa/leg so dpal mchog rdo rje mchog/sangs rgyas kun gyi yab chen po//
276b3(rgyud): legs pa'i rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog/legs pa'i mchog rab bstod phyag 'tshal//legs pa'i sngags mchog phyag rgya'i mchog/ye shes mchog rab rab kyi mchog/legs

276b7(rgyud): tshig chen po dang //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor chen po gsang ba'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor zab mo'i chos yum rnams kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/
277a1(rgyud): snying po'i phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams//tha snyad tsam du rnam par gnas//de las byung ba'i sngags bdag gis//dbye ba bzhin du brtag par bya//snying po
277a2(rgyud): phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams//gzhan du tha snyad mthong ma yin//rig pa'ang ni tshor ba'i rnam pa yi//mtshan nyid du ni shes rab ba shad//gsal byed kyis ni legs gsal
277a3(rgyud): glonas//snying po tha snyad tsam du bshad//yum rnams kun gyi shes bya ba//go rims ji lta ba bzhin du//dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lor bzhag/shes rab sa bon dbyangs
277a4(rgyud): yig bzhi//rtsibs la yum gyi sa bon no//yab kyi sa bon 'dab ma la//lhag ma phyi rol shes par bya//dpyod pa lte ba ru bshad//de nas spyan drangs de nyid kyis//chos kyi
277a5(rgyud): dbyings ni brjod par bya//dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la//slob dpon cho ga rig pa yis//de tshe ji lta'i chos zhugs te//dkyil 'khor dam par 'jug par bya//chos kyi rang
277a6(rgyud): bzhin dag brjod de//'gro ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam//chos kyi de nyid rjes dran pas//me tog sgrim pras dor bar bya//de nas rang nyid dbang bskur te//rang nyid kyang ni tha snyad tsam//
277a7(rgyud): chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal//dam pa'i dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur//'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi//gsang sngags tha~Md 'grub par 'gyur//sngags pa zhugs
277b1(rgyud): pa tsam gyis te//dbang bskur bas ni smos ci dgos//'di nyid kyis ni sbyor ba yis//slob ma'i dam pa gzhug par bya//chos kyi de nyid bshad na su//dkar po'i ras kyis gdong g.yogs

284b2(rgyud): byedo snyam//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin bshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thal ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba de la thal bas

284b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams der dbang bskur ba tsam gyos songo //de nas lha mo de de'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa rang gis mthong nas slar yang smras pa/'di'i bran mo mchog tu 'gyur ram
284b5(rgyud): ma yin te de'i chung ma mchog tu 'gyur/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes mdzes ma de blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gnas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
284b6(rgyud): skad ces gsol te//bdag gi bla ma'i yon bcom ldan 'das bzhe su gsol/khyod la bdag gi mdzes ma 'di dbul ba bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag ni rdo rje la bka'
284b7(rgyud): la pa/khyod nyid la zhog shig/de nas lha mo de slar yang 'di snyam du sems par gyur to//gal te de bzhin shegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di la bdag bla ma'i yon du 'dis
285a1(rgyud): phub ba de lta na 'di'i bran nyid du gyur kyang bdag skal ba dang ldano snyamo//de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mdzes
285a2(rgyud): ma 'di bzhesu gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje da ltar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzung ste rnam par brtags nas rdo rje'i chus dpang
285a3(rgyud): bskur te/brla zung gi steng du bzhag nas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi lha mo chen mo khyod yin//de nas lha mo des 'di lta bu'i
285a4(rgyud): bka' nye bar thos nas dga' zhing rangs pa'i yid kyis gnaso//de nas yang lha la sogs pa dang gza' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dang bcas pa phyag na rdo rje dang /

285a6(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/theg pa chen po 'di 'bad pas shin tu srung bar byos shig/de nas lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang
285a7(rgyud): la la dag theg pa chen po la smod cing theg pa chen po sun 'byin po'i sems can dag byung na de bdag cag rnams kyis tshar bcad par bgyi lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
285b1(rgyud): /bka' stsal pa/thog pa chen po sun 'byin pa rnams ji ltar nus pas tshar bcad par byos shig//de nas lha'i bu de dag ca co'i sgras bcom ldan 'das la log so zhes gsol te song ngo //
285b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos mdzes ma de deng sang nas brtsams te rdo rje gar ma zhes rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskuro//g.yon gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi glar rnam
285b3(rgyud): bar bzhag ste/de dang lhan cig rtse ba'i sbyor bas byan so//de nas lha mo de la/sangs rgyas des bka' drin dam pa mdzes bya'i yon+da tan stong phrag dang ldan par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan
285b4(rgyud): /'das de dang thabs gcig tu A li dang tsum pa'i sbyor bas shin tu bde bas dge shing gnas//de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing khri stan
285b5(rgyud): bzang po dang /glu dbyangs snyan pa sgrogs pa dang lhan cig lhags te/rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi char chen po phab par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
285b6(rgyud): lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rnam pa sna tshogs shing bkra ba'i me tog gi char sus phab po lags/khri stan brgya stong phrag
285b7(rgyud): du ma dang lhags pa 'di su zhig lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos kun tu bzang po'i ting 'dzin la
286a1(rgyud): rloms par zhugs te rnam par gazlas so//gags te de nas 'ag na rdo rje la bka' stsas pa/yang n+na d+hI lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin de banan/

286a3(rgyud): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar ba 'dis de'i stobs gzhom par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/lag na

286a6(rgyud): kyil 'khor chen po 'dir gzhug tu gsol/gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid skyob par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi
286a7(rgyud): dbang po brgya byin dkyil 'khor du bcug ste/bcug nas 'khor dang bcas pa de la rdo rje'i chus dbang bskur te/de nas byung nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin theg pa chen
286b1(rgyud): bor sems bskyod du bcug go//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs te//skyabs gsum bzung nas bcom ldan 'das la b+h+ra ma
286b2(rgyud): yon dbul ba ro sems nas bcom ldan 'das ci zhig dbul por bgyi/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te rang
286b3(rgyud): gi mdzes ma blangs nas phu lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bud med 'di khyod nyid la zhog shig/de nas lha rnams

286b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mdzad de blangaso//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin tshim zhing rab tu dga' bas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang phyag na rdo rje'i
286b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po la lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas te 'khor dang bcas pa song //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd
286b7(rgyud): kyi bdag pos mdzes ma de rnam par brtags nas rdo rje'i chus dbang bskur te/shin tu sgeg pa nyid du gzigs na rdo rje sgeg mo zhes ming du btag so//de nas rdo rje gar ma phyung ste de la
287a1(rgyud): ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/e ma'o theg pa chen po'i tshul 'di ni ngo tshar che ste/gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thob nas mdzes ma shin tu gzug
287a2(rgyud): dang ldan pa chen po ster ba rnyed par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo gzhan yang phyung ste dkyil 'khor de yongasu gang bar mdzad//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po
287a3(rgyud): brgya byin slar yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas pa der lhag so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa
287a4(rgyud): dang bcas pa de gzigs te yid rab tu 'khrugs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi
287a5(rgyud): tad+ya bcas te lhags pa 'od su ji lta bru zhig ljags/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs te phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje 'di ni bdud sdig to can 'ongs pa ma
287a6(rgyud): yin gyi/'on kyang 'di ko'u shI ka yin//de nas phyag na rdo rje rab tu khros te rdo rje gsor zhing bcom ldan 'das ci phra dog gi sems kyis 'ongs na rdo rje 'dis de dag sreg par bgyi'o/
287a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis leg na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje de ltar ma byed cig/bla ma'i yon gzhan yang dbul ba'i phyir lhags pa yino//de nas lha rnams kyi
287b1(rgyud): dbang po brgya byid der 'ongs te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bla ma'i yon gzhan yang dbul bar 'tshal na bzhes gsol/bcom ldan 'dra/

287b4(rgyud): pas //de nas pad+mo'i lus can la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyang lhags te mchod nas song //nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyang lhags te mched nas song //rgyas par rgyud gzhan rnams

287b6(rgyud): rgyas pa mdor bsdus te mdzad lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje gang gis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lo rgyus ma bshad lags/de'i ting 'dzin bsgom pa

288a1(rgyud): rgyu gang gi phyir dran patsam yang mi bgyi lags/bka' stsal pa/phag na rdo rjeji sbed nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtum byas pa de srid du du ma rgyun 'joms pas
288a2(rgyud): de'i phyir gsang ba'i theg pa la mngon par brten pas de dag ring du yongasu dor bar bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
288a3(rgyud): 'das nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams ji ltar sun dbyung bar bgyi/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa//lag na rdo rje gang la la dag gsang ba'i theg pa chen

288a6(rgyud): skad ces gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa ji lta bus nus pa bstan bA kyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya ba'i rig pa yod de/

288b1(rgyud): da nau/mA ra ni/kar+t+ti na/ma hA in+d+ra dzA pa kA raN+DaM/de wan A na ya/a su rA nA kat+ta ya/yak+Sha rak+ShA sa bAn+taH/kin+d+hA ra/bI d+ha d+hA ra Na/A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/daR+Sha yA daR+sha ya/briSh+NA/da/

289a7(rgyud): mkha' la stor nas sprin 'bab pa bstan par bya'o//sgo steng du bskor na slar de dag thams cad med par 'gyuraro//gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/thal ba la cung zad bzlas te grong dang
289b1(rgyud): grong khyer la sogs pa'i dbusu gtor na grong la sogs pa sreg pa bstan par bya'o//sgo steng du bskor na slar zhi bar 'gyuraro//lag na rdo rje gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/gang gi cha sngags/

289b5(rgyud): khro ba dang bcas pas de'i ming nas brjod cing bskor bas 'chi bar 'gyur zhing slar 'chi bar 'gyuraro//sgo de nyid kyis ji ltar bsam pa'i rdzas 'ong bar 'gyuraro//de nyid kyis pha rol gyi sngags

290a1(rgyud): byedado//rtag tu bzlas na 'chi bA las rgyal bur 'gyuraro//lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya ba'i rig pa sgrub pa'i thabs dang bcas pa ste tshul 'di nyid

290a3(rgyud): zhig gis sangs rgyas nyid sgrub par byed pa cung zad kyang med la 'on kyang sgom pa'i rim pas yin//gsang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i sgom pa'i rim pa des 'grub par 'gyur ro///
290a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje des na 'jog rten pa dpya' ba'i phyir dngos grub phra mo 'di sngags pas bsgrub par bya ste/sangs rgyas kyi phyir me yino//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag
290a5(rgyud): nAn rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te sngags kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas nyid bgyid par mi nus na rnam pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas
290a6(rgyud): nyid bgyid par rtogs par 'tshal//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas nyid bsgrubs nas bla na med
290a7(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyu ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub
290b1(rgyud): snyoms dang tshan phyug na rdul ka' sprul pa/lagan du rgyun cig gsang ba mchog dbang phyug thog pa chen bye dar nas d+ha pa gnar thos bsgrusmra pa b+h+yo ban+d+har yang sma sa rgya

290b3(rgyud): gang gis sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas nyid sbyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje theg pa chen po zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i mdzod nyon cig
290b4(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol po/bcom ldan 'das mdzod ces bgyi ba'i don gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje 'di la
290b5(rgyud): mdzad ces bya ba ni b+ha ga'i gzhi'i gnas//zhu ba can dang de'i mdzod gcig tu byas te rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugasu bdag nyid bsam par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam
290b6(rgyud): par snang mdzod chen po lag na rdo rje dang //rdo rje gar ma dang /rdo rje sgeg mo dag dang thabs gcig tu rnam pa du ma a ling ga dang tsU Sha nA l-i sogs pa mdzad cing bsten nas chung
290b7(rgyud): bar mdzad//de nas lag na rdo rje sngags pa'i tshul 'di ltar tsu Shan dang /tsum pa na la sogs pas b+ha ga'i nang du song bar bya ste bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugasu mngon pa
291a1(rgyud): byang chub pa rnam lngas bskyed par bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lcags/
291a2(rgyud): phyi rol tu gnas nas mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga bgyi bar mo nus lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje phyi rol tu gnas pa 'am/phyi rol
