291a5(rgyud): chub zla ba'i tshul dang rtsa thams cad gcig tu byas te/bdag nyid byang chub zla bar bsgom par bya'o//'o ma de las bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugasu bsams la/dr-i las yang rdo rje
291a6(rgyud): sems dpa'i skur rnam par bsgom par bya'o//yang thams cad lhan cig gcig tu gyur pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bsgom par bya'o//de de bzhin
291a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen po dang mtshungs par 'gyuraro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la
291b1(rgyud): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/rtswa'i sbyor ba 'ad dag ma gtags par tshul gzhan gyis mngar par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga snyam par mi nus pa lagasus ma//danas brdas kya/
291b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po log na rdo rje la bkra' stsal pa/lug na rdo rje rtsa'i sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga bsgom par bya'i gzhan gyis
291b3(rgyud): ma yin//gsal ba ci'i phyir/bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje phyi rol gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pas mngon par byang chub pa de mi nus te 'badu ba chen pos kyang cung zad tsam
291b4(rgyud): yang bya bar nus pa ma yin//dper na na mkha'i chu skyes rnam pa gang gis kyang sgrub par nu sa ma lcib bzhon/de'i phyir gsang ba zhes pa shad//gsang ba'i tshul 'dis ngal ba med par sa
291b5(rgyud): rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba dang //sbyor ba gzhan gyis ma yin//de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa'i thig le'i nyi mas phyogs rnam par gsal
291b6(rgyud): ba des sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir gsang bri'i sbyor ba 'di nyid gsal bar mdzod//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
291b7(rgyud): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de lta na'ang gsang bo'i tshul gyis rnam pa yang dag par bdag la ma gsungs lhag so//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen
292a1(rgyud): pos phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje mchog tu gsang ba'i mdzod kyi thig le zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad sbyin par byed pa/de bzhin gshegs
292a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bskyed pa po nyon cig/ngas kyang tshul 'dis sangs rgyas nyid mdzad la/khyod kyis kyang tshul 'dis sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra
292a3(rgyud): sprul pa/lag na rdo rje ji srid pa spu'i bu ga yod pa de sred pa la rtswa rnams rdul phra rab kyi gzugasu bsgom par bya'o//de nas rdo rje gar ma'i gzugasu bsgoms nus de'i b+ha ga'i dbus
292a4(rgyud): rdorje gar ma'i gzugs rtsa'i rang bzhin lngas u la sogs pa'i yi ge 'bab pa'i ngo bor bsam par bya'o//de nas mi 'bab pa'i rtsa lnga ka la sogs pa'i gzugasu bsam
292a5(rgyud): par bya'o//de yongasu gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/de'i 'o ma las bdag nyid b+ha go'i dbus rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bsgom par bya'o//de nas phyag na rdo rjes
292a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rtsa de'i gzugs dang rang bzhin ji lta bu legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/log na rdo rje
292a7(rgyud): rtsa de rnams kyi nang nas gcig ni rtsa chen por gtso bor gyur pa ste/rtsa gzhan thams cad ni de la rnam par gnas pa'o//de'i rang bzhin ni bsil ba'i rang bzhin te/de rnyed na/
292b1(rgyud): rdorje 'dzin pa nyid dam rnam par snang mdzad zab par 'gyuraro//gang yung cung zad dro ba na de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgra thob+ha par 'gyur//gang yang shin tu dro ba dang ldan na de bsgoms
292b2(rgyud): na rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi skur 'gyuraro//de nas khro bo'i gzugs gyur nas ji skyid khro bo'i gzugasu gyur pa de srid bsgom par bya ste/zhi ba'i sku dang lhan cig gcig tu byas nas de nas nyi ma'i dkyil
292b3(rgyud): 'khoraro//de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci lags bud med bsten pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob pa lags sam/'on te
292b4(rgyud): gzhan pas kyang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i bud med bsten pa de ma gtogs pa gzhan gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob par mi 'gyur te//
292b5(rgyud): gzhan thams cad ni rnam par g.yeng ba yino//lagra na rdo rje de phyir sngags pas lha mo gang rnyed pa de brla zung gi steng du bzhag la/tsum pa dang /a ling ga la sogs pa byas te/
292b6(rgyud): yongasu bsten pa de nas 'thungs te de yang so sor 'jib tu gezhug/de nas b+ha ga'i dbusu rtsa de'i 'o ma bdag nyid bang gcig tu byas la rang gi sngags kyi rgyal pos bdag nyid 'dod/
292b7(rgyud): pa yin//zhes bsgoms te/rdo rje sems dpa'i sku dkar po'i rnam pa dang bar bsgom par bya'o//lag na rdo rje de'i phyir rtsa gcig po de ni sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi yum ste/phyi rol gyi
293a1(rgyud): tshul can la de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bshad//de las nges par 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad do//de'i phyir lag na rdo rje khu ba'i
293a2(rgyud): rgyun 'thungs pa tsam gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i sku yong su thob par 'gyur ro//lag na rdo rje gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/ba spu'i bu gar gnas po'i rtsa rnams las 'dzag
293a3(rgyud): pa dang ldan pa'i thigs pa gnas gsum du khyad par du 'phags pas gnas te spyi bor bum pa'i gzugs la bcud rtsa'i tshul can bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin bdud rtsi 'dzag pa/
293a4(rgyud): bsam par bya'o//gzhan yang snying kha'i gnasu pad+ma'i rnam pa kha dog dkar po mor sar dang mtshungs shing yongasu gzhan pa la bum pa'i bdud rtsi 'dzag pa tsam gyis
293a5(rgyud): pad+ma gtas par byed par bsam par bya'o//de nas gsang ba'i gnasu yi ge e'i rnam par gru gsum pa kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pas smras pa/ka lo sogs pa'i yi ge
293a6(rgyud): yongasu gyur pa las rtsa lnga'i sgo las byung ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gcig 'bab par bsams te/bdud rtsi'i rgyun des las bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i sku bdud rtsi'i ngo bo mi
293a7(rgyud): phyed par bsgom par bya'o//lag na rdo rje de'i phyir rtsa thams cad kyi nang nas gcig po de gtso bo yin te/de nyid sangs rgyas nyid ster bar byed pa yin//de'i phyir rnam pa
293b1(rgyud): 'di ltar du bsgoms na bdud rtsi'i ngo bo dang mi shigs par 'gyuraro//lus 'di nyid kyi sgra dkar dang gnyis ma ngar nas bde bar gshegs pa'i sgra rnams mthung bur bsgom par
293b2(rgyud): bya'o//bdag nyid kyang gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong bar 'gyur ro//'dir gnas nas kyang skal pa'i las rnams kyang shes par 'gyuraro//lag na rdo rje de'i phyir 'di bsgom
293b3(rgyud): por bya'o//lag na rdo rje des na tshul 'dis bud med sgom pa na gal te rmi lam du rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur bar mdzad na de nas zla ba byed tshun chad du 'grub par shes par bya'o//
293b4(rgyud): gal te yang slob dpon du gyur d+ha ston pa mdzad de nas zla ba drug na 'grub par shes par bya'o//'ga' zhig tu lha'i gzhal med khung du bcug nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzug
293b5(rgyud): brnyan mthong na de nas lo gcig na 'grub par shes par bya'o//de nas lha'i gzhal med khang du bsdad nas ts+tsho Sha na la sogs pa'i sbyor bas bdag nyid 'bar ba mthong na de nas
293b6(rgyud): myur du 'grub par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o//'ga' zhig tu snang ba mthong na skye ba 'dir 'brub par shes par bya'o//yang na rmi lam du b+ha gar a ling ga dang ts+tsha Sha na mthong /
293b7(rgyud): ni de nas skyes bu de grub par shes par bya'o//'bad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyuraro//lag na rdo rje de'i phyir tsU Sha na la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i/
294a1(rgyud): rim pas sngags pas rtsa'i sbyor ba la sbyar bar bya'o//rang gi phyir a'i rnam pa na ste ji ltar kha dog dmar po rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis gzugasu bsnams na don
294a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad dbang du byed//de nas bsad par 'dod na de'i tshe rtsa nag po'i rnam pas rdo rje hUM mdzad kha dog nag por bdag nyid bsgoms la des bsad par bya'o//de nas bskrad
294a3(rgyud): par 'dod na bdag nyid rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi gzugasu sngar bshad pas sgoms la bsgrub bya rnga mo la zhon par bltas na de nas bskrad yul gzhan du gtong bar byed//lag na rdo rje de'i phyire/
294a4(rgyud): las thams cad gsang ba la yong su rten pa yino//des na 'di gsang ba las kyang gsang ba nyid du reg par bya'o//rtsa'i sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid
294a5(rgyud): bsgrub par bya'o//gang yang phyi rol gyi tshul la gnas pa de dag rnams ni bong bu dang mtshungs pa ste khur khur ba las 'bras bu med par shes par bya'o//lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod
294a6(rgyud): kyis 'di dag shes par byos la sen gyi don gyis shig/nga yang tshul 'dis gnas pa yin//lag na rdo rje de'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes par byos la chos
294a7(rgyud): ston par gyis shig/gzhan du ni khyod kyang mi mthun pa spyod par 'gyur na sems can gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/rgyud gzhan du e'i yi ge 'di don du bshad//'dir phyi rol gyi
294b1(rgyud): tshul la rtsa bcu'i tshul gyis de kho na nyid bcu shes par bya'o//don dam par ni de kho na nyid bcu yang ma yin la lnga yang ma yin te gcig nyid don dam pa yin//dang rtsa'i gtsog/
294b2(rgyud): ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sangs rgyas nyid sbyin pa po ste gang zhig thob pas sangs rgyas nyid du song zhing 'gro ba 'gro bar 'gyur ba yi no//rgyud gzhan du rgyas par bra shwa //lag na
294b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'di ni rnal 'byor dang shin tu rnal 'byor dang //gsang chen dang /gsang ba'i rtsa'i sbyor ba dang bcas pa bya ba khyod la gsang bar byas kyis ngal bla mo'i yon byin cig/theg pa
294b4(rgyud): chen po rab tu ston pa po 'phags pa ma yin pa gzhan la'ang ci nas kyang bla ma'i yon bdog nyid kyi bar du'ang dbul bar bya ba yin na gzhan lta smos kyang lag na rdo rje sems gzhan
294b5(rgyud): du ma byed cig/rab tu myos par 'gyur ro//de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci zhig dbul bar bgyi/khyod la yongasu ma rdzogs pa
294b6(rgyud): 'ga' zhig mchis lags sam/bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje thams cad yongasu rdzogs mod kyang dbul bar bya ba yi no//gsol pa ci zhig dbul bar bgyi/bka' stsal pa/'di dag
294b7(rgyud): dbul bar bya ba ste skal ba dang me ldan pa'i sems can rnams la 'di'i dgongs pa bshad par mi bya'o//nyan thos kyi theg pa can la rgyud 'di'i glegs dam tsam yang nam yang bstan
295a1(rgyud): par mo b+hA s+t+wa~M/de'i mdun du mod tsam+ba yang gsal bar ma bya'o//lag na rjes gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyis nyan thos kyi thob pa can rnams la bshad
295a2(rgyud): par mi bgyi zhing de'i gan su'ang 'jug par mi bgyi ste/de'i gan su 'jug pa dang /bshad par bgyi bas bdag la ci zhig bgyi/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de dag la gsal
295a3(rgyud): par mi bgyid/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lag ni rdo rje thog pa chen po'i rang bzhin krung ba shad pa khyod brjidadapa/lag na rdo rje nyan nas kyi zag pa baM khA na man seM
295a4(rgyud): gzhon yang sngags pa rnams dang /thun de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang gsang ba 'di shes na de dus 'di nyid la rdo rje sgeg mo dang rdo rje gar ma las skyes pa skye ni 'dra ba dang
295a5(rgyud): khyad ci 'dra ba de 'drar shes par bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'odas shin tu zab pa'i tshul
295a6(rgyud): gsang ba thams cad gnas pa/rtsa za'i sbyor ba de sems can rnams kyis ji ltar 'tshal bar 'byung /bdag gis de dag la bstan par bgyi'am 'on te ma lags/de nas
295a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje khyod kyis kyang slob ma rnams sam sngags pa rnams la rgyud 'di gangal bar mi rgyas
295b1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i sngags pa rnams la yang gsal bar mi bgyi'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lag na
295b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems can gang la la dad pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa rgyud 'di shes par 'dod pa de dag la bud med mnyan pa tsA Sha na la sogs pa'i sbyor bas gsang ba chen po'i
295b3(rgyud): mchod pa byas te rje su gdams pa dang bcas pa de dag thams cad 'bad pas bshad par bya'o//gang la la rgyud 'di la sdang bar byed na de dag la de ltar rdo rje hUM mdzod kyi skur gnas te/rdo rje
295b4(rgyud): hUM mdzad kyi tshul gyis yongasu khros te 'bar ba dang ldan par spros la de'i gnas 'bar bar bya'o//de nas de'i 'khor dang bcas po rlag par 'gyur ro//gal te sngags pa gos par 'dod na de'i
295b5(rgyud): gnas phyed tshig pa la bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams bsams na de dag 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//lag na rdo rje de'i phyir 'di gang su la yang bshad par mi bya'o//mchog tu gsang ba thag
295b6(rgyud): lo'i mdzod kyi rtogs pa las gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sbas pa mtha' dag gi cho ga rgyas pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
295b7(rgyud): brtan par mdzad nas/phyag na rdo rje'i lus de dag gcig tu gyur nas rgya mtsho de'i 'gram dzam+bu'i gling gi byang gi mtsham su rdo rje sgeg mo dang rdo rje gar ma dang thabs gcig tu sngon
296a1(rgyud): bshad pa'i num dran dang a ling ga lnga sogs pa'i sbyor bar rgyal par lnga pas de/bla ma dang /rdo rje gar ma'ogo 'phang la gnas pa'i khro lnga brnyanan
296a2(rgyud): lnga'i btsun mo stong phrag rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so//de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/'di dag gi ming ci lags/
296a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di dag rnam pa bzhis gnas te/'di ltar gzhon nu ma bzang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug kha dog dkar mo lo brgya phrag
296a4(rgyud): gnyis kyi rnam pa'i gzugs can rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug khri phrag cig gis yongasu bskor nus dza lanA d+ha rarI zhing ni ri bo zhes bya ba la gnas nas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das
296a5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje bzhugs pa drir rtag tu 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byed//gzhan yang 'dod pas myos ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug kha dog sngo bsangs mig rnam paradu rgyas pa rnal
296a6(rgyud): 'byor ma'i dbang phyug khri phrag phyed dang gsum dang thabs gcig tu lho phyogs kyi rgyud ri bo ki ki na d+hi ri 'jug pa'i sgor gnas nas gang gi tshe phyag na rdo rje gsang ba'i chos ston pa
296a7(rgyud): de'i tshe rtag tu 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byed//gzhan yang gser gyi mig can zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug de yang kha dog dkar ba khri phrag gsum gyi 'khor dang lhan
296b1(rgyud): tsig ka ma ru ba'i sgor gnas nas de bzhin du rgyun tu 'phro ba dang 'ang bar byed//gzhan yang bde ba thams cad la dga' ba zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug thams cad du gnas pa tha~Md kyi
296b2(rgyud): gzugs can thams cad la byams pa'i tshul du gnas pa khri phrag brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang lhan cig gang gi tshe sngags pa gsang po ston pa na de'i mdun du de gnaso//de'i phyir bde ba thaMd/
296b3(rgyud): la dga' ma zhes bya'o//de nas gzhon nu bzang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byar ma'i dbang phyug de phyag na rdo rje'i tshul ji srid mngon sum du sangs rgyas nyid ster bar gyur pa de yis bsten par bya'o/
296b4(rgyud): de nas bsad par 'dod na lha mo de nyid 'byur ba dang ldan pa mdog nag mo lag na mtshon cha thams cad 'dzin pa bsgoms na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa yang gsod por/
296b5(rgyud): byed do//gal te bskrad par 'dod na de nyid cung zad dmar zhing sde ba'i kha dog can rlung dang lhan cig ma sbyor ba de nyid kyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu rten par gyur pas skad cig de nyid la skrod
296b6(rgyud): par byed//gal te dbang du bya bar 'dod na de nas kha dog dmar por bsams la de bkug te skad cigo de la rkang pa'i drung du 'ong bar 'gyur ro//de nas rengs par bya bar 'dod na lha mo kha dog
296b7(rgyud): ser mor bsams la des bsgrub bya lcags kyi ris rdzis par bsams la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi yang rengs par byed//'di dag thams cad yid kyis bsams par byed do//
297a1(rgyud): 'di dag thams cad yid kyis bsam par bya'o//lag na rdo rje gzhan yang bza' ba bshad par bya ste/gang zos pa tsam gyis skra dkar dang gnyer ma sel bar
297a2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing lo brgya phrag stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//'di lta ste bya rog chad bzang po snum pA bzung la lpags pa dor to zhib tu byas la de'i sha lcags kyi snod du til mar dang btso bar
297a3(rgyud): bya'o//ka ra srang bcu dang 'o ma srang nyi shu dang lhan cig gcig tu byas la slar yang ji srid bya rog mi drag pa de srid du btso bar bya'o//de nas mar dang ki ra dang lhan cig nag bdun
297a4(rgyud): du bza' bar bya'o//lo brgya'i skra dkar dang lus kyang bung ba lta bu dang /stobs dang ldan zhing shin tu sra bar 'gyu ro//lo l-I brgyar mtsho'o//slar yang bcud lan gyi cho ga
297a5(rgyud): bshad par bya ste/sngags pa mnyam par gzhag par gyur pas rdo rje sgeg mo'i 'o ma sbyor ba de nyid kyis bsams la bdag nyid tshim pa dang ldan pa bas par bya'o//de nas nyon mongs pa
297a6(rgyud): thams cad zhi bar 'gyu ro//'ga' zhig tu rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug tu bsams lo de'i zhu ba btung bar bya'o//'ga' zhig tu mngon sum du gyur pas bud med bsten te nyid
297a7(rgyud): kyi ting 'dzin gyis de dang rang gi zhu ba lhan cig tu btung bar bya'o//de nas rdo rje'i lus dang mi phyed par 'gyur ro//bcud len gyi cho ga rgyas pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
297b1(rgyud): snong mdzad chen pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug de dag thams cad dang /phyag na rdo rje'i sku dang gcig tu mdzad nas phyag na rdo rje'i skur byung
297b2(rgyud): de nas rgyal po chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha mo de dag thams cad la dgyes pa dang bcas pa'i spyan byas gzig so//de nas rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug de dag thams cad kyis phyag ni rdo rje la brnyas
297b3(rgyud): nas 'di skad ces smra so//bcom ldan 'das sems can gang gsang ba'i tshul la zhugs no dag bris ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur legs/de nas
297b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sngon sdud pa'i gsang ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub par bya'o//de nas gzhon nu ma bzang mo zhes
297b5(rgyud): bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//sems can de dag gis b+ha ga bston pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas nyid bgyid
297b6(rgyud): dom/yang na de'i gsang ba bsgoms pas lags/de nas rgyal po chen po phyeg na rdo rjes de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sgom pa'i rim pas bsgrubs te phyin nas rnam par rtogs
297b7(rgyud): po med pa'i sems kyis bsten nas bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje'i sku'am/rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku 'am/'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku 'am/rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sku 'am/'dod pa'i lha'i sku
298a1(rgyud): bskur bar bya'o//de'i 'o ma las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bya/mas la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de las bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i sku 'am rang /
298a2(rgyud): ge lha'i skur bsgom par bya'o//rtsa de nyid kha dog nag por bsams nas de las bdag nyid rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi skur bsgom par bya'o//rtsa de nyid dmyur skya'i rnam pa'i rim pa de
298a3(rgyud): nyid kyis bsgoms nas bdog nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi skur las kyi dbye bas bsgom par bya'o//rtsi de nyid kha dog sngo bsangs na mkha' lta bur bsgoms nas rdo rje rnon po'i skur
298a4(rgyud): bsgoms na de nas las kyi dbye bas rtsa de dag gi sbyor bas bdag nyid bsgoms na des gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas sngags pa des thun 'tshams bzhir sems
298a5(rgyud): gzhan du ma yengs par bsgoms pa nyid kyis zla bo drug nyid na 'grub par 'gyuraro//de nas gzhon nu ma bzang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug des rgyal po chen po
298a6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can de rnams kyis dgug pa la sogs pa'i las bgyid po lags de nas byang chubo sems dpa' chen
298a7(rgyud): daphyog na rdo rjes de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gal te sngags pas skyes bu dbug por 'dod na de nas de'i b+ha ga'i dbus bdag nyid cung zad dkor ba'i rnam pa khro ba dang //
298b1(rgyud): bcas pa'i bzhin can phyag drug pa sbyor ba de nyid kyi phra mo'i sgras bsgoms na rdo rje des bsgrub bya'i snying kAr bsan cing dgas pas mgrin pa bcings te lcags kyus bkug la bcug
298b2(rgyud): nas bsgom par bya'o//de nas rgyal po yang 'gugs par byed na skye dgu grong gi me la sogs pa lta ci smos/rig pa 'dzin pa 'gugs na rgyal po lta ci smos/de nas bud med dbang du
298b3(rgyud): bya bar 'dod na de nas b+ha ga'i dbus phra mo'i sgra'i sbyor med nyid kyis bdag nyid rta mgrin gyi gzugs kha dog dmar por bsgoms te rdo rje des lha mo chen mo'i snying kar bsnun na de nas de rnam
298b4(rgyud): par myos pas dpag tshad ba rgyar byed na gnas pa rnams kyang 'ong bar 'gyur na grong gi mtha' dang khyim gyi mtha' na gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/de nyid kyis rig pa 'dzin pa'i chung ma mi/
298b5(rgyud): dri za'i chung ma 'am/gnod sbyin gyi chung ma 'am/'jig rten gsum gyi badrag po'i chung ma 'am/brgya byin gyi chung ma'ang 'gugs par byed na rgyal po che'i lha mo chen mo 'am/
298b6(rgyud): gi bu mo lta smos kyang ci dwags/mchog gi sbyor bas dman pa la mi bya zhing dman pa'i sbyor bas mchog la mi bya ste dam tshig nyams par 'gyuraro//dman pa'i sbyor bas mchog
298b7(rgyud): sgrub par nus pa'ang ma yin te yan lag ma yin pa'i phyiraro//de nas phyogs 'ga' zhig tu gnas te nyin mtshan du gsang ba sten par byas na zla ba drug kho na la 'grub par 'gyur
299a1(rgyud): zhing bskal pa'i dngos po dag kyang mthong zhing ring du gnas pa'i ngag dag kyang zhing thos la ji srid sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ba 'di la the tsom med
299a2(rgyud): ji ltar rdo rje sgeg mo'i rigs kyi lha mo'i sgrub thabs ltar rdo rje sgeg mo'ang de bzhin du thams cad sngon gyi rim pas bsgrub par bya'o//sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug
299a3(rgyud): de rnams kyang bkug la bsten par bya'o//de nas rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa de dag phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la gtugs te phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol
299a4(rgyud): to|bcom ldan 'das tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag cag kyang 'grub par 'gyur lagaso//de nas 'dod pas mos ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyag gis phyag na rdo rje la 'di
299a5(rgyud): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag rdo rje'i zhu bas rtag tu bsten par bgyid na/de'i sngon du mchis te sngags pa des bdag po bgyis te de'i rje su mchi bar/
299a6(rgyud): bgyi'o//de nasaM gser gyi mig chen zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug gis de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag b+ha ga'i dbusu bdag nyid
299a7(rgyud): zhugs nas rtag tu bstan par bgyid na bdog de'i bran mor gyur te rtag tu der gnas par 'gyi zhing nam bu yang 'ong ba dang 'gro bar mi bgyi lagaso//de nas skyes bu tha~Md kyi yidu
299b1(rgyud): gzhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das thob ma dang bla ma med pa la 'di skad ces bla la to//bcom ldan 'das kyang gis bdag rtag tu gas /
299b2(rgyud): tshul gyis sems shing dran par 'gyur ba 'am/dran par bgyid na de la bdag gdon mi za bar ster bar gyur cig/de nas phyag na rdo rjes rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug de rnams la
299b3(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//se ni gang theg pa chen po'i tshul 'di la zhugs par gyur bya de la/bcud len gyi sbyor ba 'das stobs dang ldan par bya'o//lcags kyi phye ma dang
299b4(rgyud): taM ba la mad+hU ba laM'i rtsa bya'o ma dang lhan cig sbyar la kar dang ldan par byas te mche bad bya'o//de nas tshogs rnal 'byor bsuM bza' bar bya'o//sha dang mi gyi bana'
299b5(rgyud): bya'o//de nas stobs chen po drung ldan par gyur nas sdig pas gos par mi 'gyuraro//da ni gzhan yang bshad par bya sten mkha'i yul la mo yul gzhan du rdo rje'i 'khor
299b6(rgyud): rdo rje brgyad dang ldan pa bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur bdag nyid stobs dang ldan par bya ba'i don du bsgom par bya ste des stobs dang ldan par 'gyuraro//
299b7(rgyud): de nas bsad pa'i don du rdo rje'i 'khor lo de nyid 'bar zhing gsal ba'i rnam pa me rtag 'phro ba can de'i khang pa yul lam grong khyer du bab par bsgom par bya'o//de nas
300a1(rgyud): de'i skad cig la rigs dang bcas pa brlag par 'gyuraro//de nas dbang du bya ba'i don du 'khor lo de nyid kha dog dmar po bAn d+hu ka 'am/dzA ba'i ma
300a2(rgyud): to bi kha dod lta bu yis sa phyogs thams cad khyab pa po 'dis bsgrub bya bkug par bsgoms pas de dbang du 'gyur//rdo rje 'khor lo'i sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis rgyal
300a3(rgyud): po dang mdun na 'don pa la sogs pa rnams kyang dbang du 'gyuraro//de nas rgyal po'i lha mo chen mo dgug par 'dod na rdo rje 'khor lo de nyid do mar por lta bar byos
300a4(rgyud): la de 'khor lo bzhag ste rlung gis bsnun tas rang gi rkang pa'i drung snga su gtugs par bsgoms par byas pas de nas nyin mtshan de na de 'gugs par 'gyu ro//de nas
300a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rgyal po phag na rdo rjes slar yang 'das par 'gyur te/rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
300a6(rgyud): to//sngags pa gang la la rgyud 'di'i don ma sgom pa de lta na yang glegs bam du gyur pa'ang khyim du bcang bar bya'o//gang yang tshul 'di la gnas par shes par bya'o//gang zhig
300a7(rgyud): yang gus pa sngon du 'gro bas sgom par byed na rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya'o//'di gang su la'ang bshad par mi bya ste/ci'i phyir zhe na/gdugs pa can
300b1(rgyud): /soms can gang zhig yod pas dri'i mdun du bshad par mi bya ba yin//slob dben gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu la yang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba sngon du song bas slob mar byas nas
300b2(rgyud): bshad par bya ste gzhan du ni ma yin//slob ma des kyang tsan+dan lo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byas te der slob dpon bzhug su gsol la rgyan la sogs pa thams cad kyis brgyan par byas te/
300b3(rgyud): /bcom ldan 'das rnam par mdzad ji lta bu de ltar byas nas bstong pa la sogs pa dag bya'o//de nas nyan thos kyi theg pa can la sogs pa rnams la nam du yang lo rgyus tsam yang mi bya
300b4(rgyud): zhing glegs ba ma tsam yang bstan par mi bya'o//theg pa 'di pa dang lhan cigacig tu long spyad par bya zhing gcig tu gnas par bya ste/rnam par rtog pa tsa yang mi bya'o//'di ni bac+doMs phyag
300b5(rgyud): na rdo rje la bka' stsal to//mchog tu gsang po'i mdzod ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sbas pa'i mchog thib le zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i 'byung gnas rjeg so//
300b6(rgyud): dam pa'i rgyud 'di gangs can 'di na sngon//rnam pa kun tu bsgyur ba ma rnyed nas//mkhas pa bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal dang ni//sgra rarig kun dga' rgyal mtshan bdag gis rgyud//dam
300b7(rgyud): pa'i bkas bskul nas ni gus pa yis//dpa ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur//dge ba de yis sems can tha~Md kyis//gsang don rtogs nas sangs rgyasa? sar 'gro shog/
301a1(rgyud): rdo rje'i na thams cad 'dug de bzhin/shegs pa mos pas rnam par rnam pa metha' byeng dadu sa myed cing ma lan te/rin pa rgya'i tshul pa ba
301a2(rgyud): rgyan pa 'byung ba'i khang byang chen po rin po che'i rgyal po'i nang na/byang chub sems dpa'i lus gyi seng ge'i khril ba zhugs te/'di lta ste/rdo rje 'dzin namakha'i drim mang ba dang /
301a3(rgyud): rnamapa' mirnam byung 'gro ba dang /namada' 'byung ba dang /zhes sno tshogs byon pa dang /sna rmug+sas rgyub dang /sa thams cad de nyim pa nyid la gnas pa dang /
301a4(rgyud): mtha' yas ze mong bu skyob pa'i rdo rje dang /skyed med kyi bu'i d+habs cani dang /phrad med kyi bu chen za'i stongs can dang /rdo rje yang dang /rdo rje mchog thugs can dang / mcho
301b1(rgyud): 2rdorje dang /rdorje mchog 'anang dang /dri bzhin gshegs pa'og Na dang /da zhin gshegs pa'i ga 'byung du 'byung ba dang /spros pa rnyed pal gnas pa dang /de bzhin du shwe sa
301b2(rgyud): stobs bcu las nges par skyes pa dang /dri ma med pa'i mig dang /gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang /de dag la sogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rdo rje
301b3(rgyud): 'dzin rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /byams pa dang /'jam dpag dang /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par la
301b4(rgyud): ba la sogs pa dag gis kyang bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa la/'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma dus gsum las 'das par byin gyis brlabs nas sku dang gsung dang
301b5(rgyud): zhugs mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'i ches ston to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa de dag dang /gsang ba pa'i bdag po la sogs
301b6(rgyud): pa rdo rje 'dzin de dag bcom ldan 'angs rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sku mnyam pa nyid bkod pa mi zad pa'i mdzod rnam par bsgyings pa la zhugaso//de bzhin du
301b7(rgyud): gsung dang /thugs mnyam pa nyid bkod pa mi zad pa'i mdzod rnam par bskyangs pa la zhugs te/'on kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku 'am/gsung ngam
302a1(rgyud): mtshan ka mthamamam cacamaHsasamam mthas mtham/amam na thas mamatha thas tsanatha/a mkha tham tha'asal gas camam yasa.a kasas tham ba bcam tham ama' ya tham bams tham maya
302a2(rgyud): thugs lnga ni 'jug pa'am ldog pa mi dmig so//thams cad du yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i phrin las thams cad dang /gsung gi phrin las/
302a3(rgyud): thams cad dang /thugs kyi phrin las thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad la kun tu gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi tshig 'di dag gis chos bstan pa mthong ba ni/'di lta ste/
302a4(rgyud): sems can las kyi tshe rnam par bskyed pa rnams sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/sa bcu pa'i bar la gnas pa 'di nyid la yong su rdzogs par bya ba dang /las kyi tshe
302a5(rgyud): bkag pa rnams kyang srid pa'i myu gu mngon par 'grub par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lus dang 'dra ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /phyag na pad+ma'i lus
302a6(rgyud): badra ba phyobs bcu na gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi tshig rnam par dag pa'i tshig dag gis chos ston pa dag kyang mthong //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang po pa'i bdag po phyag
302a7(rgyud): na rdo rje 'khor 'dus pa de nyid ni 'dug pa des 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
302a8(rgyud): kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de sems can rnams la rnam par bya ste/tshul sna tshogs dang /bsam pa sna tshogs
302b1(rgyud): bas kyi tshogs drug gos stan cing /kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi thog pa'i mul//bcig la ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sral/khacag la ni theg pa chen po'i tshul//kha zlog la ni mngan
302b2(rgyud): par shes pa lnga'i tshul/khaM cig la ni lhur skye bar bya ba dang /kha cig la ni ming skye bar bya ba nas lto 'phye chen po dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yan dang /
302b3(rgyud): namamakha' ldeng dang /mi 'am cir skye bar bya ba'o bar du chos ston pa lags/de la sems can la la sang rgyas kyi 'dul bar bya ba dag gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyis gzugasu mthong /
302b4(rgyud): la las ni nyan thos kyi gzugs/la las ni rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs/la las ni byang chub sems dpa'i gzugasu/la las ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs/la las na tshangs pa
302b5(rgyud): gzug su/la las ni srid med kyi bu'i gzugasu/la las ni rnam thos kyis bu'i gzugs nas/la las ni lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du mthong ste/rang rang gi tshig
302b6(rgyud): brjod pa'i tshul dag dang /spyod lAm sna tshogasu mthong la/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de yang /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par bral ba'i ror ro gcig pa
302b7(rgyud): lag so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/na mkha'i khams ni rtog pa dang /rnam par rtog pa thams cad bral ba ste/mi rtog pa rnam par mi rtog pa lag so//
303a1(rgyud): ma ldan 'das de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rtog pa thams cad dakhyen pa'i ye shos kyang rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/me rtog rnam
303a2(rgyud): bar mi rtog pa lag so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper 'gyi /sa chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi gsosu gyur pa lag so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ny-id pakhyen
303a3(rgyud): pa'i ye shes kyang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi gso su gyur pa lag so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na me'i khams ni bud shing zed
303a4(rgyud): sreg pas nam yang yongasu bas par mi 'gyur lag so//de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mi shes pa'i bud shing thams cad sreg pas num yang yongasu pas
303a5(rgyud): par mi 'gyur lag so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na rlung gi khams ni rdul thams cad sel bar bgyid pa lag so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thams cad
303a6(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mi shes pa'i rdul thams cad sel bar bgyid pa lagaso//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na chu'i khams ni sems can thams cad kyi lus sim/
303a7(rgyud): par bgyid pa lagaso//de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rab tu sim par bgyid pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das ye shes 'di'i
303b1(rgyud): nga skags du Sh+TA m+b+haSh+Ta/myur blun pa ni gang lagrus/deskad ces ba skal bu dang /com ldan 'das rnam pad+ma sna ma phyug na la 'din sa d+haka spru /
303b2(rgyud): l+r-i ni migs ldog go//labanA de rjeg kyi dang ledun 'de ni yang lanas//de khyer nyon la legs par rab tu thaM la rgyu shog dang /rjes khyod la ba shA//rgyun
303b3(rgyud): kyi ma so//rtsa ba ni snying rje chen po'o//mthar thugs pa ni zab so//gsang ba pa'i bdag pa de la byang chub gang zhe nA/rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yang su shes pa ste/
303b4(rgyud): du yang thar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/gsang ba pa'i bdag pa de la na cho ste du lo tsam yang med cing mi dmigs//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub den na ma kha
303b5(rgyud): nyid/de la byang chub par byed pa yang med la/byang chub par bya ba yang 'ga' yang med//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub lnga mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir te/gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos
303b6(rgyud): thams cad kyang mtshan nyid med pa ni 'di lta skye no mkha'i mtshan nyid//de nas yang bcom ldan 'dastso la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid
303b7(rgyud): ni gang nas yongasu btsal bar bgyi/gang gis ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub
304a1(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang gi sems las yongasu btsal bar bya'o//'i phyir shrI na/sems de ni rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa yin te/de na
304a2(rgyud): nang na yang med/phyi rol na yang me gnyi ga'i bar na yang mi dmig so//gsang ba po'i bdag po sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
304a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gzigs mi gzigs/gzigs par mi 'gyur te/sngon por ma yin/ser por ma yin/dmar por ma yin/dkar por ma yin/kha dog leb rgan
304a4(rgyud): du ma yin/shel gyi kha dog tu ma yin/thung ngur ma yin/ring por ma yin/zlum por ma yin/gu bzhir ma yin/snang bar ma yin/mun par ma yin//skyes par ma
304a5(rgyud): yin/bud med du ma yin/ma ning du ma yin//gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems de ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin/gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin mi yin
304a6(rgyud): gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin//lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tso dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /
304a7(rgyud): mi dang /mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba sems can ris 'thun pa'i rang bzhin ma yin//gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems de ni mig la mi gnas/rna ba la mi gnas/sna la ma yin/
304b1(rgyud): lA ma yin/lus la ma yin/yid la mi gnas//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems dri ni na mkha'i mtshan nyid//de'i phyir rtog pa dang /rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o//da ci'i//
304b2(rgyud): phyir zhe na/na mkha'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni sems kyi rang bzhi no//sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na/sems
304b3(rgyud): dang /na mkha'i dbyings dang /byang chub 'di ni gnyi su med/gnyi su byar me do//de yang snying rje'i rtsa ba can thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba ste/gsang ba pa'i bdag po dbra
304b4(rgyud): na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang du chos gang dang gang ston pa de thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems yongs su dag par bya ba dang /sems
304b5(rgyud): yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir yin par rig par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas ni rags kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo byang chub yongasu shes par 'dod pas rang gi sems
304b6(rgyud): nyid yongasu shes par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po ji ltar rang gi sems yongasu shes par bya zhe na/'di lta ste rnam par ram/kho dog tu 'am/dbyibasu 'am/yul du 'am/
304b7(rgyud): gzugasu 'am/tshor bar 'am/'du shesu 'am/'du byed du'am/rnam par shes par 'amo//bdag tu 'am/bdag gir 'am/gzung bar 'am/'dzin par 'am/dag par 'am/
305a1(rgyud): ma dag par 'am/kham su'am/skye mched du 'am/rnam pa thams cad kyi bar du yongasu bcal kyang mi dmigs pa yino//gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni byang chub
305a2(rgyud): sems dpa'i sems rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba chos snang ba'i sgo chos snang ba'i tshul dang pa ste/gang la gnas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshegs chung ngus sgrib pa tha~Md
305a3(rgyud): spong ba'i ting 'dzin thob cing /de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad dang lhan cig 'grogs pa thob par 'gyur/mngon par shes pa lnga dag kyang thob
305a4(rgyud): par 'gyur/skad dang /sgra dang /dbyangs mtha' yas pa'i gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur/sems can gyi bsam pa rje su shes pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin
305a5(rgyud): brlabs shing 'khor ba na yongasu mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur/sems can gyi don bya ba dag la yongasu mi skyo bar 'gyur/'dus ma byas kyi tshul khrims la rab tu gnas
305a6(rgyud): pa dang /log par lta ba rnam par spangs pa dang /yang dag par lta ba rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba yin//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang sgrib pa thaMd spong ba'i ting/
305a7(rgyud): 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mos pa'i stobs bskyed pas tshegs chung ngus sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed/gsang ba pa'i bdag po
305b1(rgyud): mdor na rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes yongasu zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ji nyar
305b2(rgyud): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zhes bgyi ba lags/byang chub 'byung ba'i sems skyes pa'i//mtshan nyid ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi//sems mkhyen pa ni rnams kyi mchog/dpa' chen
305b3(rgyud): ye shes las byung ba//ji snyed cig las 'das nas ni//skye bar 'gyur ba bstan du gsol//mgon po sems kyi mtshan nyid dang //dus kyang rgya cher bstan du gsol//de dag bsod nams
305b4(rgyud): tswi 'dra dang /spod pa ci 'drar 'gyur ba dang //sems la sems kyis khyad par yang //thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol//de skad gsol nas de yi tshe//bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad
305b5(rgyud): kyis//phyag na rdo rje char 'byung la//legaso bu zhes 'di skad gsungs//theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog/sems kyi rgyud kyi mtshan nyid ni//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsang ba'i mchog/
305b6(rgyud): rtog ge kun gyis mi shes pa//thams cad khyod la bshad par bya//yang gcig bsdus la mnyan par gyis//sems ni brgya rtsa drug cu las//'das dang byang chub nyid kyi phyir//bsod nams
305b7(rgyud): chos 'byung snying po ste//byang chub 'byung ba skye bar 'gyur//nam mkha' lta bur dpag med cing //gos pa med de ji bzhin gnas//chos kun gyis ni mi sgul te//bzod nas zhi zhing mtshan//
306a1(rgyud): nyid med//dpag med ye shes kyis bsgrubs pa//yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas ston pa//mchod dang spyod pas bsgrubs pa'i phyir//byang chub phyir nI dang por/
306a2(rgyud): 'dod//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yor 'dzin pa la mngon por zhon pas bdag gi khyad
306a3(rgyud): par grangs med par rab tu brtags te/gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la bdag gi ngo bo nyid la ma dpyad par bdag go zhes ngar 'dzin pa kun nas spong //gzhan dgani sul
306a4(rgyud): byung po dang /'dzin pa pos sprul pa dang /nges par byung ba dang /'di lta ste dbang phyug dang /'byin pa po dang /dus dang /gtso bo dang /byed pa po dang /byed pa po
306a5(rgyud): ma yin pa dang /rnal 'byor dang /tshad ma dang /dag pa dang /ma dag pa dang /nang gri bdag dang /skyes bu dang /khyab bdag dang /srog dang /gang zag dang /rnam par//
306a6(rgyud): shes pa dang /kun gzhi dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po dang /gzung ba dang /'dzin pa dang /shes pa dang /shes bya dang /zla bar bya ba /da las skyes pa dngag shed bu dang /
306a7(rgyud): brjod par bya ba dang /brjod par bya ba ma yin par rtog ste/gsang ba pa'i bdag po bdag gi khyad par 'di lta bu lo sogs pa rnol 'byor 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor
306b1(rgyud): dag gis thar pa 'dod pasdu sngon brtags pa yino//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byis pa so so'i skye bo phyugs dang mtshungs pa rnams la sna/brgya lAm na rIs 'ga' zhig chos
306b2(rgyud): 'du shes 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/bsnyung bar gnas pa la gnas pa bya'o zhes bya ba des de tsamra zhig sems la byas te mgu ba bskyed nas phyi phyir zhing de nyid la goms par byed//
306b3(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i badrag po de ni dge pa'i las skye ba'i sa bon lta bu ste sems dang po'o//de rgyu de nyid kyis mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i nyi ma de dag la pho mo dang /bu dang /bu mo dang /mdza' bi shAM/
306b4(rgyud): dang /nye du dag la sbyin pa sbyin par byed/'di ni myu gu lta bu ste gnyis pa'o//gzhan yang sbyin pa de nyid mi shes pa dag la yang sbyin par byed/'di ni sdong bu lta bu ste gsum pa'o//gzhan
306b5(rgyud): yang sbyin pa de nyid snod du rung ba yongasu tshol zhing sbyin par byed/'di ni lo ma lta bu ste bzhi pa'o//gzhan yang sbyin pa de nyid bla ma'am/rol mo mkhan dag la dga' bzhin du sbyin par byed//
306b6(rgyud): 'di ni ni/tog lta bu ste lnga pa'o//gzhan yang sbyin pa de nyid yid dga' ba dag la sbyin par byed/'di ni 'bras bu lta bu ste drug pa'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang mthe ro suM skye bor
306b7(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims srung ste/'di ni gso su gyur pa lta bu ste bdun pa'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang sems de lta bu nyid kyis 'khor bar rgyu ba na dge ba'i bshes gnyen la la
307a1(rgyud): /zhig las tshig 'di skad thos te/lha 'di dag ni lha chen te/thams cad la ni bde ba ster//de la khyod kyis gus mchod dang /thams cad 'byor pa nyid du 'gyur//de da
307a2(rgyud): kyang ni 'di lta ste//dbang phyug dang ni tshangs pa dang //de bzhin khyab 'jug bde byed dang //drag po skem byed bzhin du//nyi ma zla ba chu lta nyid//lus ngan nor sbyin brgya byin dang //mig mi
307a3(rgyud): bzang dang sna tshogs 'byung //gshin rje dus mtshan mya ngan 'das/'jig rten gtso zhes bya ba dang //me dang rnam par 'dud pa'i bu//de bzhin lha mo dko' thub bzlog/pad+mo dang ni 'jog
307a4(rgyud): /po klu//nor ldan dang ni dung zhes bya//kA ra ko TA ka pad+ma che//rigs can dang ni gdengs ka mang //rtag tu mtha' yas thog ma'i lha//de bzhin lha dang drang srong mchog/rig byed rig byed
307a5(rgyud): skyes bu yin//sa pas mchod pa gyis shig ces//de las de 'dra'i tshig thos nas//yid ni yang dag mgu gyur te//de tshe rab tu gus ldan pas//de dag la ni nan tan byed//gsong ba
307a6(rgyud): pa'i bdag po 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo 'khor ba na kun tu 'khyams pa rnams kyi dbugapa 'byin pa'i mchog yin te/'di ni stobasu gyur pa ste/sems brgyad par rgyal ba rnams kyis
307a7(rgyud): bshad//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhon yang khyad par rtogs pa ji skad du yongasu bsgrags pa'i khyad par de dang de dag la khyad par du gnas pa rnams la 'ba' zhig pa nyid kyi don du
307b1(rgyud): zlob+he zhing /dri yang myong zhes stong pa nyid kho na lnga dngos por sems te/gsang bya ba'i bdag po de dag gis ni stong pa nyid dpra tu mo shes//stong pa nyid ni dngos po yang ma yin/dngos po dang /
307b2(rgyud): pa yang ma yin/yod pa yang ma yin/gnyis ka yang ma yin te/de la rtog pa 'am mi rtog pa yang med na/de la ji ltar stong pa zhes brtag par bya/gang dag stong nyid mi shes pa/
307b3(rgyud): de dag mya ngan 'das mi shes//de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa'i//'jigs pas stong nyid shes par bya//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag mardo rjes gsol ba btab pa/bac+doMs
307b4(rgyud): kyi khyad par de dag bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems
307b5(rgyud): kyi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid nyin cig/gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la sems ni 'dod chags kyi sems dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems dang /zhe sdang gi sems dang /byams pa'i sems
307b6(rgyud): dang /gti mug gi sems dang /shes rab kyi sems dang /gtan la phab pa'i sems dang /the tsom gyi sems dang /mun par gyur pa'i sems dang /snang bar gyur pa'i sems dang /sdud pa'i
307b7(rgyud): sems dang /'thab pa'i sems dang /rtsod pa'i sems dang /mi rtsod pa'i sems dang /lha'i sems dang /lha ma yin gyi sems dang /kluri sems dang /mi'i sems dang /dur med kyi sem/
308a1(rgyud): dang /dbang phyug go sems dang /tshor ba sem pa dang /nong pa'i sems dang /rgyu bo'i sems dang /lteng gA'i sems dang /khron pa'i sems dang /kun tu drung /
308a2(rgyud): ba'i sems dang /ser sna'i sems dang /khyi'i sems dang /byi la'i sems dang /na mkha' lding gi sems dang /byi ba'i sems dang /ku'i sems dang /gar bye sems dang
308a3(rgyud): sil snyan gyi sems dang /khyim gyi sems dang /seng ge'i sems dang /'ug pa'i sems dang /bya rog gi sems dang /srin po'i sems dang /tshor ma'i sems dang /sa

308a6(rgyud): sems dang /ri rab lta bu'i sems dang /rgya mtsho lta bu'i sems dang /phug lta bu'i sems dang /skye bar 'gyur ba'i semaso//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la 'dod chags kyi sems
308a7(rgyud): gang zhe na/chags pa can chos kun tu sten pa'o//'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems gang zhe na/'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kun tu sten pa'o//zhe sdang gi sems gang zhe na
308b1(rgyud): spang bas chos kun tu sten pa'o//byams pa'i sems gang zhe na/byams pa dang ldan pas chos kun tu sten pa'o//gti mug gi sems gang zhe na/grang mi spyod par chos ston pa'o//shes rab
308b2(rgyud): kyi sems gang zhe na/khyad par las khyad par gzhan rtogs par byas te chos sten pa'o//gtan la bab pa'i sems gang zhe na/bka' dang bla ma'i tshig bzhin byed pa'o//the tshom gyi sems
308b3(rgyud): gang zhe na/ji ltar yongasu bzung ba nges pa dag la sem nyi bsten pa nyid//mun par gyur pa'i sems gang zhe na/som nyi med pa la som nyir shes pa'o//snang bar gyur pa'i sems
308b4(rgyud): gang zhe na/som nyi med pa la som nyi med par sten pa'o//sdud pa'i sems gang zhe na/du ma gcig tu byed pa'o//'thab pa'i sems gang zhe na/phan tshun rtsod pa nyid//rtsod pa'i
308b5(rgyud): sems gang zhe na/gang dag bdag nyid dang bdag nyid du rtsod pa'o//mi rtsod pa'i sems gang zhe na/mnyam pas mtshungs par lta ba'o//lha'i sems gang zhe na/yid kyis bdag nyid la
308b6(rgyud): rlom semasu byed pa'o//lha ma yin gyi sems gang zhe na/gang 'khor ba nyid la smod pa'o//klu'i sems gang zhe na/gang lang spyod chen po nyid du bya ba'i phyir sems pa'o//mi'i sem/
308b7(rgyud): gang zhe na/de nyid kyi don du sems pa'o//bud med kyi sems gang zhe na/'dod pa kho na'i phyir chos ston pa'o//dbang phyug gi sems gang zhe na//gang bdag gis thad bsams
309a1(rgyud): snyam du rlom sem su byed pa'o//tshong ba'i sems gang zhe na/gang bsdu ba d+hAs twe rnam gyur sbrel nas phyis ston pa'o//zheng pa'i sems gang zhen/gang thos
309a2(rgyud): brnam pa du ma tshol zhing phyis rten pa'o//chu bo'i sems gang zhe na/gang mtha' gnyis la ltos shing sbyin pa'o//lteng ka'i sems gang zhe na/gang sred pas sten pa'o//khron pa'i
309a3(rgyud): sems gang zhe na/gang mi thob pa la zab par sems pa'o//kun tu srung ba'i sems gang zhe na/'dri nyid bden b+h+rUM gzhan gti mugo snyam du sems pa'o//se ra~M sna'i sems gang shen
309a4(rgyud): bdag nyid ston cing gzhan la mi ster ba'o//byi lA'i sems gang zhe na/gang mchod pa la ltos te sten pa'o//khyi'i sems gang zhe na/gang chung ngus kyang mgu bar 'gyur ba'o//
309a5(rgyud): na mkha' lding gi sems gang zhe na/gang phyogs 'dzin pas chos la ston pa'o//byi ba'i sems gang zhe na/bcings pa thams cad bcad pa'i phyir sems pa'o//glu'i sems
309a6(rgyud): gang zhe na/bdag gi dbyangs sgra sna tshogs kyi glus sems can rnams bzung par bya'o snyam pa'o//grwar gyi sems gang zhe na/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyis gzhan dag yang
309a7(rgyud): dag par 'dzin du gzhug snyam du sems pa'o//sil snyan gyi sems gang zhe na/bdag gis chos kyi rnga brjod snyam pa'o//khyim gyi sems gang zhe na/bdag gi lus kun tu srung
309b1(rgyud): ba'i phyir ster pa'o//seng ge'i sems pad+ma 'on+da/gang thams cad zil gyis gnon pa sten pa'o//'ug pa'i sems da zhe na/gang mtshan mo sems pa'o//bya rog gi sems gang //
309b2(rgyud): zhe no//thams cad skrag par sems pa'o//srin po'i sems gang zhe na/dge bas mi dge ba rnams sgrub pa'o//tsher ma'i sems dang zhe na/gang thams cad du 'gyong pa sems par
309b3(rgyud): sa 'og gi sems gang zhe nanu grang sa 'og gi don du sems pa'o//rlung gi sems gang zhe na/gang thams cad du thams cad sgrub pa'o//chu'i sems gang zhe na/gang mi dge ba thung
309b4(rgyud): bkru ba'i phyir sten pa'o//me'i sems gang zhe na/gang dka' thub nyid kyis gdung byar byed pa'o//'dam gyi sems gang zhe na gang bdag gi nyes pas gzhan la spyad pa'o//rnyog pa'i
309b5(rgyud): sems gang zhe na/gang pha rol gyi nyes pa 'dzin pas sems la rnyog pa skyed pa'o//tshon rtsi'i sems gang zhe na/gang de la chags pa nyid du sten pa'o//shing leb kyi sems gang zhe
309b6(rgyud): nAn/gang dge ba gzhan spong bas ston pa'o//nor pa'i sems gang zhe na//gzhan gzung zhing gzhan kho nar sems pa'o//dug gi sems gang zhe na/gang shin tu dngos po med pa'i
309b7(rgyud): nyid sems pa'o//zhags pa'i sems gang zhe na/gang thams cad du bdag nyid bcings shing 'dug pa'o//lcags sgrog gi sems gang zhe na/gang rkangar pa gnyis la 'dug ste sems pa
310a1(rgyud): pa'o//sprin gyi sems gang zhe na/gang chu dag la sems pa'o//zhing gi sems gang zhe na/rang gi lha nyid yongasu skyong bar byed pa'o//lan cha'i sems gang zhe na/gang zhen
310a2(rgyud): gang gis sems par byed pa de la yang sems pa'o//spu gri'i sems gang zhe na/gang rab tu byung ba tsam la sten pa'o//ri rab lto bu'i sems gang zhe na/gang mtho bar gyur nas
310a3(rgyud): sems pa'o//rgya mtsho lta bu'i sems gang zhe na/gang rang gi lus nyid la mchog tu 'dzin cing 'dug pa'o//phug lta bu'i sems gang zhe na/gang sngar nges par gyur la phyis de
310a4(rgyud): nyid kyi 'gyur ba sten pa'o//de la skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems gang zhe na/gang gi sems 'du byed gang kho na dang skyes pa kho na dang lhan cig 'gro ba'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po
310a5(rgyud): de ltar na gcig/gnyis/gsum/bzhi/lnga/gnyi su bsgyur ba byas na 'jig rten pa'i sems brgya drug cu bskal po gsum gyis 'das nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems skye
310a6(rgyud): ste/'di lta ste/'di ni phung po tsam nyid de/bdag ni nam yang yod ma yin//dbang po grong khyer khams rnams kyis//'jig rten don med rnam par nyams//yan lag bcu gnyis

310b1(rgyud): shes par dka'//nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa//sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon bstan pa'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems la gnas pa rnams la yang
310b2(rgyud): phung po dag la yod//snyam pa'i blo nye bar skye'o//nam phung po dag la 'dod chags dang bral ba bskyed pa de'i tshe/slu ba dang /chu'i chu bur dang /sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /mtshungs par
310b3(rgyud): 'jigs pas rnam par grol bar 'gyur te/'di lta ste phung po dang /khams dang skye mched dang /gzung ba dang /'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/chos nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo zhi ba'i dbyings rtogs/
310b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//gsang ba'i bdag po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems phyin ci log dang /phyin ci ma log pa'i sems kyi khyad par brgyad dang 'brel ba las dang nyon mongs pa'i dra ba dang
310b5(rgyud): bral ba 'di ni rnal 'byor pa dag bskal pa gcig gis 'da' bar byed//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang theg pa chen pos bgrod pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams la chos la bdag
310b6(rgyud): med pa'i sems skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag sngon spyad pa spyod cing phung po'i gnas rnam par 'jig pa na/ngo bo nyid yongasu shes pa'i phyir sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /gzugs
310b7(rgyud): brnyan dang /brag che dang /mgal me'i 'khor lo dang /dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i 'du shes skyeso//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de'i phyir de dag gi sems kyi dbang du byas pas chos la bdag

311a2(rgyud): med pa nyid kyang spang bar bya ste/rang gi sems ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngo bo nyid yongasu shes pa'i phyir sems la
311a3(rgyud): sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs te/rnal 'byor pa dag 'di yang bskal pa gnyis kyis 'da' bar byed//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
311a4(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par bsod nams dang ye shes kyis tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags
311a5(rgyud): pa rnams la shes rab dang thobs dpag tu med pa yongasu bzung ba/lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag byas pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi sa las
311a6(rgyud): yang dag par 'das pa/brgya byin dang /tshangs pa'i dbang po dang //nye dbang la sogs pas phyag byas pa/'di lta ste stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rdzas med pa/mtshan nyid med
311a7(rgyud): pa/mtshan ma med pa/spros pa thams cad las 'das pa/na mkha' ltar dpag tu med pa/chos thams cad kye go skabasu gyur pa/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams/
311a8(rgyud): dang bral ba/las dang bya ba med pa/mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid dang bral ba shin tu ngo bo nyid med pa'i sems skye ste/gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni
311b1(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems dang po zhes rgyal ba rnams kyis gsung so//de dag nyon mongs las las grol//las dang nyon mongs ldan pa 'dra yin//de dag 'jig rten sbyin gnas te//de dag rtag mchod
311b2(rgyud): ri mor bya//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang //mos pa yis ni spyod pa'i sa//sems gsum rnam par sgom pa ste//pha rol phyin rnams spyod pa dang //bsdu ba dag ni bzhi po yis//mom pa/
311b3(rgyud): yis ni mtshungs pa med//dpag tu med cing bsam mi khyab//dpag med ye shes 'byung ba ni//sems bcu dag gis thob par 'gyur//ngas gang cung zad brjod pa ni//thams cad 'di yis
311b4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//de phyir thams cad mkhyen pa yis//mos pa zhes ni bya bar bshad//blo ldan bskal pa gcig gis ni//sa las yang dag 'da' bar 'gyur//'di yi yang ni bzhi
311b5(rgyud): cha yis//mos pa las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//mgon po khyab bdag khyod kyis ni//sems kyi mtshan nyid bstan
311b6(rgyud): lags na//dbugs 'byin rnam pa du thob nas//mchog skyes de dag dbugs byin 'gyur//de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das//rnam par snang mdzad chen po yis//de tshe phyag na rdo rje
311b7(rgyud): la//yid bslus 'di ni nyon zhes gsungs//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la nam byis pa so so'i skye bo dag ni dge ba'i las spangs te dge ba'i las byed pa de'i tshe dge bas dbugs phyin
312a1(rgyud): pa yin//nam bdag gi de kho na nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de'i tshe bdag la brten nas dbugs phyin pa yino//nam phung po yongasu gzung ba
312a2(rgyud): byas te/rang gi ngo bo la rnam par dpyang nas bdag la rten pa yongasu gtong ba de'i tshe bdag med pas dbugs byin pa yino//nam phung po rnams spangs nas chos kyi dmigs pa la gnas
312a3(rgyud): pa de'i tshe chos kyis dbugs phyin pa yin//nam chos rnams spangs nas mi skye ba la gnas pa de'i tshe chos la bdag med pas dbugs phyin pa yin//nam phung po dang /khams dang //
312a4(rgyud): skye mched thams cad dang /gzung ba dang /'dzin pa dang /bdag dang /srog la sogs pa dang /chos dang mi skye ba dag kyang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du yang ngo bo nyid me do zhes stong pa'i ye she
312a5(rgyud): skyes pa de'i tshe/chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis dbugs byin pa yino//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems
312a6(rgyud): dedro'i spyad pa spyod pa bzhi bcus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams bsgoms te/gsang sngags kyi tshul rtegs par khong du chud par 'gyuraro//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste sgyu ma dang /
312a7(rgyud): smig rgyu dang /rmi lam dang /gzugs brnyan dang /dri za'i grong khyer dang /brag cha dang /chu zla dang /chu'i chu bur dang /'khrul pa dang /mgal mi'i 'khor lo lta bu raM rnam par sgo mo//

312b3(rgyud): sngags kyi sbyor ba byed pa dag gi sbyor ba las dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs mig dang yid 'phrog pa sngon ma mthong ba dag kyang ston te/de dag ni phan tshun phyogs bcur 'gro ba dang /

313a3(rgyud): bdag po gzhan yang zla ba shar ba na chu'i nang du gzugs brnyan mthong nas chu zla zhes brjod pa de bzhin du/sngags pa de nyid chu zla bzhin du rigs sngags 'chang zhes brjod//gsang

314a3(rgyud): par zhugaso//bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sku'i yan lag thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/sa bcu'i bar du

318b1(rgyud): rung snod mi rung //bor ba nyid la s+ya brtag par bya//de nas lag pa g.yon pa la//skud pa mdud pa gsum ldan pa//bdag nyid mnyam parA bzhag pa yis//logs pa ru ni bcing bar bya//
318b2(rgyud): de ltar yongasu bzung ldan pa'i//slob ma nyes pa med rnams la//bsam pa brtan par bya ba'i phyir//'di ltar spro ba bskyed par bya//bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis//rnyed pa mnyam

318b4(rgyud): sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur//gal te rmi lam dag tu ni//gtsug lag khA da kun dga' bzang //khang pa bzang po sna tshogs dang //de bzhin du ni yang thog dang //rol gri yid bzhin nor bu dang //

318b7(rgyud): ba'i tshig/'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba grag/de la sogs pa'i rmi lam ni//bzang po zhes ni bya bar brtag/mkhas pas de las bzlog pa yis//rmi lam ngan par shes par bya//'artul
319a1(rgyud): zhugs bzang po khyed rnams kyis//nang par thams cad ngal zlos//blong ma do dag rnams la ni//de skad bsgo nas chos kyang bshad//theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'o//
319a2(rgyud): lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan//khyed rnams drer ni dong bas na//rang byung skal pa chen po pa//'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi//de bzhin gshegs pa rnamasu 'gyur//yod//
319a3(rgyud): dang med las rnam par 'das//nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med//zab mo rtog gi thams cad kyis//rab tu mi rtogs gnas med pa//spros pa kun dang bral pa ste//spros pa rnams kyi rnam
319a4(rgyud): par spros//las dang bya ba la sogs bral//bden po gnyis la gnas pa yis//theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni//tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das la
319a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin spros pa med par rnam par gnas pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dus gsum du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa gang la byang chub sems dpa'/
319a6(rgyud): rnams gnas na sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'dzin spros pa me
319a7(rgyud): par gnas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu lus dang /ngag dang /yid gcig tu 'jug cing chos thams cad la rtsom pa med cing bya ba med pa'i sdom pa gang
319b1(rgyud): yin pa de rigs kyi bu nyon cig/de yang gang zhe na/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag gi lus yongasu gtong ba gang yin pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang gis bdag gis lus
319b2(rgyud): yongasu btang ba des ni dngos po gsum yongasu btang ba yin te/dngos po gsum yongasu btang ba de yang gang yin zhe na/'di lta ste/lus dang /ngag dang /yid de//rigs kyi bu de lta bas na
319b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpas lus dang /ngag dang /yang gsum gyi sdom pas bsdam par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus dang /ngag dang /yid gsum yongs ma btang
319b4(rgyud): par bslab pa 'dzin pa mi byed//de nas phye de nyin par bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang modzad la phyag byas te/bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la/bum pa spos chus bkang ba la
319b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas mngon par bsngags te sgo dang por bzhag la/mkhas pas skye bo kun la des bsang gtor bya'o//de nas sems sbyang ba'i phyir spos chu gtsang ma
319b6(rgyud): blud do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces bsol to//dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon dag rtagasang sngags sgrub la 'bad pa na//gang gis dusu dkyil 'khor dag/sems
319b7(rgyud): pa chen po byin rlob pa'i//dus dang tshod ni kun mkhyen pa//smra ba'i mchog gis bka' stsol cig/de skad gsol nas bcom ldan gyis//rdo rje 'dzin la bka' stsal pa//dkyil 'khor
320a1(rgyud): don kun dar pa la//rtag tu mtshan mo bro bar bya////bam po gnyis pa//lag na rje lnga slob dpon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag dang
320a2(rgyud): la mtshon sna lnga'i srad bu thogs te/bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la//shar du srad bu bI ba na//lte ba'i thad kar bzung nas ni//ba ro snang zhe na
320a3(rgyud): bzung bar bya//de nas lho phyogs song nas//byang phyog su ni bri bar bya//de nas srang bu gnyis pa ni//rang gis blangs nas de nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa rdzas dran zhing //shar phyogs bstis/
320a4(rgyud): to bri bar bya//de nas lho phyogs song nas ni//byang phyogasu ni bri bar bya//blo ldan de nas slar log nas//bden bral phyogasu gnas nas ni//byang phyogasu ni bri brar bya//de nas g.yas bsgyur//
320a5(rgyud): bar bya//bsgyur te de ru 'dug nas//lho phyogasu ni bri bar bya//de nas gnas de btang nasu//me yi phyogasu gnas nas ni//sngags pa gsang sngags cho gar gnaso//shar du srang bu bri bar
320a6(rgyud): byad/de nas de bzhin dbang ldan phyogs//seng nas nub tu kha bltas te//rlung gi phyogs kyi bar du ni//byang phyogasu ni bri bar bya//sngags pa yis ni de lta bur//kun nas gru bzhi
320a7(rgyud): lham par bya//de nas debu su zhugs nas//dal chen gsum du brtags//rnam pa thams cad kun tu yang //tshe gsum dag tu brtags na ni//cha rnams kyang ni re re lo//tshe gsum
320b1(rgyud): du ni rab tu brtags//nA gtsug gos ni bskor ba yi//'khor bar byas d+he wA rA ma yi//cha gnyis po ni lha nyid kyi//gan su bsngo par bya ba yin//blo dang ldan pas phyogs bzhir//so so'i
320b2(rgyud): phyogs char sgo khyud ni//sdom brtson can gyi nan tan du//lha rnams gtso bo'i gnas bya//de ltar rim par legs phye ba//'di dag thams cad byas nas ni//dbusu pad+ma dkar po mchog/de
320b3(rgyud): ni snying po zhes bsgrags//dkyil 'khor snying po 'byung ba kun//des ni snying po can du byas//de yi tshad kyang sor bcu drug//yan chad du ni bshad pa yin//'dab ma brgyad pa legs par rdzogs//
320b4(rgyud): za bar ldan pa shin tu bzang //'dab mo'i bar ni thams cad du//kun nas rdo rje bri bar bya//de yi snying po'i dbusu ni//rgyal mchog gtso bo gsar gyi mdog/'bar bcas thor tshugs
320b5(rgyud): dbu rgyan can//'od zer drag gis kun nas bskor//mgon po nad dang bral ba ni//ting nge 'dzin du gnas par bri//de ye shar du blo ldan gyis//sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya ni//gru gsuM/
320b6(rgyud): thams cad thal dkar nyid//pad+ma'i steng gnas 'khor yug tu//'od zer dkar pos yongasu bskor ba//rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya//de yi byang du mkhas rnams kyis//skyob pa dag
320b7(rgyud): ni kun gyi yum//gser gyi mdog can 'bar dang bcas//na bza' dag ni dkar po banabs//kun tu rnam par snang mdzad pa//ting 'dzin du gnos par bri//mgon po de yo byad phyog
321a1(rgyud): su na spyan ras gzigs dbang dpa'o ni//pad+ma dkar po'i stan la 'dug/dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra//dbu la 'od dpag med bzhugs pa//bzhin rje bag tsam 'dzum
321a2(rgyud): bar bri//de yi g.yasu lha ma ni//sgrol ma grags pa chen mo de//dge zhing 'jigs pa sel ba ste//sngo bsangs mo la sna tshogs gzugs//bud med dar la bab pa'i tshad//thal sbyar
321a3(rgyud): me tog ut+pal thogs//'od zer dag gis kun bskor cing //gos ni dkar po gyon par bri//g.yon du lha mo khro gnyer can//sngags de'i phred pa lag na 'chang //mig gsum pa
321a4(rgyud): la thor tshugs can//kha dog mdog ni dkar mo la//'od zer dkar po ser po dang //dmar po rnams kyis bskor bar bri//khro gnyer can dang nye bar ni//mthu chen lag na pad+ma thogs//
321a5(rgyud): brtse ba chen po gos dkar gyon//'od zer dag gis bskor ba yis//dpa' bo yang dag bi bar bya//de yi pad+ma kha mra bye//de yi drung du blo can gyis//rigs sngags lha mo grigs
321a6(rgyud): ldan ma//gser gyi kha dog lta bu can//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste//lag pa g.yon pos pr-i y+yang ku'o//sde ma yid 'ong 'dzin par bri//sgrol ma yi ni nye 'khor du//blo dang
321a7(rgyud): ldan pas gos dkar mo//thor tshugs can la gis dkar gyon//lag na pad+ma thags par bri//de yi 'og tu sngags pa yis//rigs sngags rgyal po stobs po che//kha dog nyi ma
321b1(rgyud): 'char ka bzhin//pad+ma dkar po rnam par rgyan//'byar ba'i phreng can mi bzad cing //sgyu dag sebs ltar 'dug pa//spyan ras gzigs dbang blo ldan gyi//rta mgrin can zhes grags pa bre//sang
321b2(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi lho phyogasu//byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams kyi//phyag rgya yid bzhin nor bu zhes//grags pa skal po chen po can//re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa//pad+ma ga la 'dug par bri//
321b3(rgyud): mgon po rnam snang mdzad chen gyi//lho yi phyogasu rdo rje 'dzin//re ba thaMd skong byed pa//mdog ni phyi yang ku lta bur//ljang ser ram ni ma rgad ltar//sngo bsangs mgon po dbu rgyan can//
321b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rgyan kun gyis//rnam par rgyan cing mtha' yas par//'jug pa rgya chen rdo rje bcas//'od zer dag gis bskor bar bri//de yi grA ya su lha mo'i ming //mA ma kI zhes bya/
321b5(rgyud): bra de//rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste//lag na rdo rje thogs par bri//de yi 'og tu lha mo bri//rdo rje'i rtse mo stobs chen te//pho nya rnams kyi yongs bskor cing //bzhin ni bag tsam 'dzum pa /
321b6(rgyud): byi//g.yon rol du ni ljags pa yis//rdo rje lu gu rgyud ces pa//lag na rdo rje lu gu rgyud//rang gi pho nya rnams kyis bskor//pri yang ku ltar ljang ser mdog rdo rje'i mtshan mas legs mtshan/
321b7(rgyud): dri lag na rdo rje'i 'og logasu//khro zla gi tso bo zhes bya ba//bgegs chen dgra no zhi byed pa//khro bo 'jig rten gsum du grags//phag gsum mche ba bzhi pa ste//kha dog dbyar gyi
322a1(rgyud): char sprin 'dra//rab tu rgod pa'i sgra yang 'byin//rdo rje'i rgyan byos rnam par brgyan//'khor ni mtha' yas khro bo yis//dbang phyug rnams kyis yongs bskor ba//
322a2(rgyud): lag pa stong phrag brgya pa ni//mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs shing gdengs//khro bo chen po 'di 'dro ba//pad+ma'i steng na 'dug par bri//de yi nub tu song nas ni//rdo rje 'dzin pa mang po byi//
322a3(rgyud): lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs//kha dog sna tshogs stobs po che//'od zer dag gis yongs bskor ba//sems can kun don byed pa bri//gsang sngags mgon po'i 'og logs
322a4(rgyud): su/bden bral gyi ni phyogs kyi char//mi g.yi zhes bya lag na ni//ral gri zhags pa legs par thogs//zur pud spyi bo g.yon du 'byung //rab tu rgyan cing mig gcig yo//rang gi
322a5(rgyud): 'od kyi nang na gnas//khro dang bcas pa brag la 'dug/bzhin ni khro gnyer rab tu bster//byis pa'i gzugs can mkhrang bag can//bris nas blo ldan rlung phyogs//song nas bac+doMs//
322a6(rgyud): kyi nan khro bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal//'bar ba'i phreng can mi bzad pa//lag na rdo rje rtse bran rgyar//bka' lung nod pa ltar 'dug cing //zad pa'i dus dang 'drar gnas pa//
322a7(rgyud): nan tan nyid du bri bar bya//de ltar nang du bri ba ni//rgyan dang bcas par bshad pa yin//de nas sngags pa phyir byung nas//nges par gnyis pa'i cha dag la//shar gyi phyogs/
322b1(rgyud): kyi nang du ni//chu ni gnyisu phye ba la//sgo khyud kyi ni nang rol du//sngags pas rgyal ba shAkya thub//gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas//mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan//mgon po
322b2(rgyud): na bza' ngur smrig pa nabs//khyab bdag bstan pa'i don mdzad pa//pad+ma dkar po'i stan la bzhugs//chos 'chang tshul du bzhugs par bri//de yi ga yasu lha mo ni//sangs rgyas spyan
322b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba ste//lha mo cung zad 'dzum pa'i zhal//'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang po//mtshungs med sku ni rab tu dngas//de ni shAkya thub pa'i yum//de yi g.yasu lha mo ni//rigs
322b4(rgyud): sngags mdzod spu zhes grags pa//pad+ma'i steng na 'dug pa ste//dud zla kun da lta bu'i mdog/lag na yid bzhin nor bu thogs//re ba kun rdzogs byed pa bri//de nas sngags pas g.yon/
322b5(rgyud): rol tu//shAkya sing ge skyob pa yi//gtsug tor gzi can brtson 'grus che//gdugs dkar po dang rgyal ba'i gtsug/gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba nyid dang //gzi brjid phung po skal chen dang //
322b6(rgyud): rnam par mthor zhes rnam grags pa//lnga po yang dag bri bar bya//shAkya thub ni mthu tshan b+hi//gtsug tor lnga po 'di dag ni//granas rnams lnga rnams nyid du ni//rab tu bsgrims
322b7(rgyud): te bri bar bya//de yi byang du song nasu//gnas gtsang rnams ni bri bar bye//dbang phyug kun tu me tog dang //'od kye phreng ba nyid dang ni//yid ma phyogs dang ni rnam grangs te//de dag thaMd
323a1(rgyud): d+ya'ogs //mngadu du man gams sa//nag dz+nyAn b+bar+sha byung ba//de nan sngon du 'byung da du//sgyu sa pa sa phyung /
323a2(rgyud): s+t+waM gtsug tor gsum po khA na ni//bsgrims te yang dag bri bAr+ya/gtsug tor lnga po stobs can rnams//da//dI bi ser skye ser bar bya//mthu chen gtsug
323a3(rgyud): hUM po yi//gsum pa gzhan ni dkar po dang /ser ba dang ni dmang por bya//kun kyang 'di zer mang po can//rgyu ni rnams kun gyis brgyan ro phrin//dI dag smon la ma stabasacan de//
323a4(rgyud): ro ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o//de nas sngags pas me phyogs//maM ni drang srong rje rnams dang //bcas shing ma yinadu ni 'dug/rdol ba'i stsolA s+yai gasbyim gyis mthun//
323a5(rgyud): thams cad rab tu dam 'o//snying ka gsum mdo ris mtshan can//me skye 'bar ba'i dbus na 'dug/bgrang phreng kun d+he thogs par bri//de nas lho ye phyogs kyi char//gshin
323a6(rgyud): lhag pa ni//byug pa blags shing ma ho zhon//khyu dog dpar gyi char sbyin 'bru//ma mo rnams dang dus mtshan dang //'chi bdag rnams kyis bskor bar b+he//bad na bral byang chu bden pa
323a7(rgyud): ni/ladan gyi dri 'dzin pa //dam khyen mo ldan po//sbyang du bya phyogs so ste//lha mo rgyal po rab la//'dun cing lharnams kyis bskong ga/lan na rje cing
323b1(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par blo//de nas da yo shar du na//rgyu lnga lag na zhugs thags bri//d+ha yo yang na shar byags//nyo ma shang d+hAr stong 'dug go//de yA g.yas dang nan//
323b2(rgyud): du ni /rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba bri//de yi grwa yas tshangs pa ni//gdong bzhi pa la thor tshugs can//oM zhes bya ba l+lIr ljon pa//ngang pa pad+ma'i stan 'dug /de yi nub tu bye ba ni/
323b3(rgyud): sgo yi lho dang dbyangs can dang //khyab 'jug skem byed de bzhin rlung //bde byed de bzhin zla ba ste//nub kyi phyog smo gnas nas nI//rab tu nanA ta nI bya ste bri//des nas sngags pas de nas ni//
323b4(rgyud): yid la 'khrul po med pa ru//gsang sngags mgon po'i 'og logs//khro chen gzhan gyi mi thub ces//bye bo nyid dang lha mo ni//gzhan gyis mo thub ma dang ni//sa bdeg lag na bum
323b5(rgyud): thogs//gus par yang dag gnas par bri//klu chen dga' bo bsnyen dga' dag/shAkya sang ge skyob pa yi//sgo drung gnyis mngon phyogs par//rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya//gzhan yang
323b6(rgyud): shAkya thub pa yis//rgyud rnams kun las dkyil 'khor du//sngags dang phyag rgyas gang bshad pa//de dag kyang ni mkhas pas bri//sngags pa de nas phyir byung nas//cha gsum pa ni nges pa la/
323b7(rgyud): rdo rje dam pa sbyin pa ni//phur gum lta bu'i mdog can de//skye bor zur phud lnga dang ldan//byis pa gzhonu'i gzugs can la//ut+pal sngon po rdo rje can//lag pa g.yon na thogs pa ste/
324a1(rgyud): pad+ma dkar pa'i stan la 'dug/rab tu 'dzum pa bzhin du gnas//'od zer mtshan nyid bzang po yis//kun tu 'khor bar sngags pas bri//de yi byad du gzhan nu na//d+hA
324a2(rgyud): paba'i 'od can lag pa na//rin chen dra ba thogs pa ste//sna tshogs pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan//pad+ma dmar po'i stan la 'dug/rgyal ba'i sras la lte bar bri//rdo rje dam pa sbyin pa yi//g.yon
324a3(rgyud): du pho nya mo lnga bri//skra can dang ni nye sgra can//sna tshogs ma dang nor can ma//de bzhin 'gugs ma zhes bya ba//'di dag blo ldan pho nya mo//de dag gi ni pha zad du//phyog brnyan ma ni lnga
324a4(rgyud): rnams dang //gzhon nu dra ba'i 'od can gyi//'khor gnyis po yang bri bar bya//de nas sngags pas lho phyogasu//byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po//sgrib pa tha daM rnam sel gtso//
324a5(rgyud): yid bzhin nor bu thogs par bri//de yi cha gnyis bor nas ni//dpa' bo ngo mtshar can dang ni//sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin//ngan song tha~Md spong ba dang //de bzhin skyong sems blo//
324a6(rgyud): gros dang //blo can snying rjes gdungs pa dang //byams pa sngon du 'byung ba dang //gdung pa thams cad zhi byed dang //de bzhin blo groso bas ma yas te//mkhas pa brgyad po bro bar bya//
324a7(rgyud): bya shi phyogasu song nas ni//sa yi snying po 'bar dang bcas//bzod dang nges pa phun tshogs bri//de yi stan ni mkhas pa yis//'byung khung kun dang ldan pa yis//rin chen kun gyi
324b1(rgyud): mkhan mamamam camamamasasamamamams mtham/mthasams sam tham masasam tshan mas gathas ma la mas mang yal/a kams tham mal
324b2(rgyud): ra rgyan pa//de yi steng na rin chen bzhi'o//pad+ma yang dag gnas pa yi//yid du 'ong ba bsam bya ste//byang chub sems dpa' glags chen po//de yi steng na 'dug par bri//de yi 'khor ni
324b3(rgyud): yon tan sgo//mtha' yas shing ni grangs med//de yi nang nas byang chub sems//rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen lag/sa 'dzin nyid dang lag dang ni//rin chen phyag rgya can dang ni//
324b4(rgyud): lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa nyid//grags chen 'di dag bri bar bya//de bzhin sngags pas nub phyogs//dpa' bo na mkha'i snying pa ni//gzi brjid chen po gos dkar gyon//lag na
324b5(rgyud): ral gri thogs bsam ste//rgyal sras pad+ma'i stan steng na//legs par 'dug pa bri bar bya//bdag nyid chen po de 'khor du//grags pa dag kyang bri bar bya//de 'khor dpa' bo chen
324b6(rgyud): po ni/na mkha' dri med blo gros mkha'//blo gros rnam dag nyid dang ni//spyod pa yi ni blo gros dang //blo brtan pa zhes bya ba ste//de dag du ni bsgrims bri zhing //rtag tu dpa' bo 'od rnams dang /
324b7(rgyud): lhan cig gi rims bzhin du bsam//de nas gsang ba pA'i bdag pa la gau na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la bltas nas/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang la ring zhig du
324b8(rgyud): ni mig mi 'dzums par bltas te/ched du gleng ba 'di gleng zhi tshig tu smras pa/'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams//u du me ba ra'i me tog bzhin//rgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig/'byung 'gyur
325a1(rgyud): yang na mi 'byung //gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba//dbas kyang ni dkon pa ste//bskal pa b+ha bA dum du//sdig pa bgyid par gyur pa gang //de kun dkyil 'khar
325a2(rgyud): 'di 'dra ba//mthong bas byang bar 'gyur lags ni//bregs pa mtha' yas sngags spyod par//tshul laM gnas na smras ci dedes//sgro pa'i gsang sngags bzlas nas ni//go 'phang blan
325a3(rgyud): med par 'gyur//gang dag spyad pa mchog 'di la//blo gros shin tu mi g.yo ba//de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun//sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad//de'i tshe tha~Md dang ldan pa'i
325a4(rgyud): 'khor de dag dang /rdo rje 'dzin de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'thun pa'i tshig smras pa/gsang sngags skyed pa'i dbang gyur pa//dpa' bo chen po legaso legs//khyod kyi yid la
325a5(rgyud): gang bsams pa//mnyam med thams cad mkhyen la zhus//sngags rgyud rtogs par shes pa yis//byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams dang //sngags spyad 'bras bu la gnas pa//
325a6(rgyud): bdag cag thams cad dbang du gyur//de nas yong bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//tshon zhes bgyi ba de gang lags//ci smod 'dir ni tshon zhes bgyi//
325a7(rgyud): tshen ni ji ltar dgye bar bgyi//gang zhig thog mar btang bar bgyi//rta babs rnams dang de bzhin du//sgo khyud rnams kyi tshad dang ni//sgo yi tshad kyang ci 'drar bgyi//mgon po yis
325b1(rgyud): /da du gas//rgyu nganas pa ston 'dun tho dang //ma pa rnams ca rdzus pa ga smras//thob ma do snang rlung pa dang /2 gyur dbang bsgyud dang //rnam ldan yon 'dus dang//
325b2(rgyud): sbyin sr-ig+sa gi nas kyang bdag la gsungs//bsang sngags mtshan nyid kyi 'dra lags//ting 'dzin du shAn pa gang //de srid gsol nas bcom ldan 'das//chos kun dab t+t+ra ga thub pa ra/
325b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs//yid gcig tu de tshul nyon cig/thig rgyun 'bras bu 'byung ba yi//gsang sngags spyang ba'i tshul gyi mchog/sems dpa' tshun pa da ma na//glang ngas
325b4(rgyud): dri pa bshad pa bya//sems can khams ni zhen byed cing //'di ni chos dbye ster yin par//sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs te//de phyir 'din tshon zhes bya//chen ni nang nas
325b5(rgyud): deci bdu//byung ba nas ni tshun //da ba zlogro par btang bar hU~M//de mi 'og tu dmyur bde nas ser pa bad+ma ba // 'og tu lda
325b6(rgyud): kun gyi nod pa la nag pa ste//rkyen gyi cho ga da ltar bshad//rta babs rnams kyi tshad kyang no//dkyil 'khor dbu ma dang mnya mo//sgo khyud dag kyang de dang mnyam//pad+ma sbyor bcu drug tu
325b7(rgyud): ri ngo'i sgon sring po yi//dkyil 'khor dang ni mnyam zhes bya//'jigs med dag gis rim gyis na//bskyed de de bas lhag shes bya//sgra rnams kyi ni bar bar du//sgo srung rnams ni bzhin
326a1(rgyud): mtshan ka thamamamamams samamabacas macam/amams thas mamam thasamanyam amal yang gsas macan sa thakha khalas ba mam ma yams sa yas kham sa ma mal/
326a2(rgyud): par+ya d+ha/ 'dzin na mdar na sems/yang dag mgu pa yin par bshad//sems dpa' tshon pa ldan par na//yod gcig bsdus la mnyan par bAHsa//
326a3(rgyud): sa sa rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin no//stong pa nyid ces rgyal bas bsungs//de nas sems yongs shes pa la//thob par 'gyur gyi gzhan las min//de dag nyid ni smras pa ste//rdzogs sa
326a4(rgyud): rgyas kyi yin par 'dod//stong pa chen po zhes bya ste//kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa'o//de bas rnam pa thams cad du//stong nyid rtag tu dran par bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
326a5(rgyud): mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad dang thabs gcig tu yang dag par mos nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting 'dzin so so'i tshul gsung so//
326a6(rgyud): de'i tshe yang sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud gcig pa'i stobs kyi shugs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag
326a7(rgyud): na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/byang chub snying por 'dug na su//bdud ni rnam pa bzhi bcom pas//de nas dpa' bo chen po zhes tshangs pa la sogs pa lha tshogs rnams//'jigs pa tha~Mng mod
326a8(rgyud): pa'i sgra//dga' bzhin du ni sgrogs par byed//de phyin chad ni nga dga' bo//dpa' bo chen po zhesu grags//skye ba med par ngas rtogs pa//tshig gi spyod yul rnam spangs shing //nyes pa/
326b1(rgyud): thams cad med pa ste//rgyu dang rkyen dang bral ba yin//stong bya'i ye shes mkha' 'dra ba/mun pa kun dang bral gyur cing //shin tu dri mede kho na//ji ltar 'byung ba nga la byung //kun mkhyen tsam
326b2(rgyud): gyi tshul du gnas//kunI mkhyen sangs rgyas mtshan nyid do//nga yi de nyid dam pa 'di//'jig rten snang bar byed pa ste//byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis ni//yig 'bru rnamasu bstan nasu//
326b3(rgyud): sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir//ngas ni thams cad rab tu bshad//de nas dang ldan rdo rje 'dzin//ngo mtshar gyur nas mig gdangs te//thams cad mkhyen la mgo bos yis/
326b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas ni tshig 'di smras//sas rgyas kun gyi thabs dang ni//shes rab bsam yas ngo mtshar che//spros pa kun dang bral ba yis//chos rtogs nas ni rang byung rnams//'jig
326b5(rgyud): rten kun gyi re ba kun//longasu rdzogs par byed pa ste//gsang sngags mtshan nyid de lta bu//bden pa gnyis la legs gnas pa//sems can kun gyis shes nas ni//'jig rten gyi ni
326b6(rgyud): mchod gnas 'gyur//de nas gsang ba pi'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes tshigasu bcad pa de dag gsol nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mig mi 'dzums pa'i lta bas bltas
326b7(rgyud): nas/cang mi smra bar 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems
327a1(rgyud): dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa rnams kyis ting 'dzin gyi tshul ni/dgos pa dang ni bral ba ru//'jig rten mtshan nyid shes
327a2(rgyud): nas ni//dgos pa'i sa la gnas de rnams//sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa'i dbang phyug rnams
327a3(rgyud): kyi ting 'dzin gyi tshul ni//chos rnams thams cad mi dmigs shing //srid dang skye ba rnam spangs pa'i//'jig rten sgyu ma ltar shes nas//'jig rten 'jig rten dbang du 'dod//
327a4(rgyud): gsung ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang nyan thos dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams skye ba dang /'jig par rtog nas mtha' gnyis bshig pas rgyu mi daphigs
327a5(rgyud): ba'i phyir shin tu dngos po med pa'i ye shes mi spyod/'di ni nyan thos rnams kyi tang 'dzin gyi chu lo//gsang ba pa'i bdag po rang sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par
327a6(rgyud): bashr-ig nas brjod du med tshul la gnas pa rnams ni chos thams cad brjod du mdo//snyam pa'i ye shes 'jug ste/ngag shin tu 'gog pa'i ting 'dzin la yang dag blare
327a7(rgyud): par byed pa 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gyi tshulo//gsang ba ba'i bdag po gzhan yang 'jig rten pa rnams rgyu las 'bras bu dang /las las 'byung ba 'a
