328a1(rgyud): sogs ldan//ting 'dzin ni rtogs pas mtshan//zhi ba'i yi ge rnam par dag/re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i//gsang sngags sangs rgyas thams cad dang //byang chub/
328a2(rgyud): /sems dpa' skyob pa'i yin//nyan thos rnams kyi gsang sngags ni//gcig pu gzhi ni gcig la gnas//rang sangs rgyas kyi'ang de bzhin te//khyad par dag ni bshad bya ni//ting 'dzin
328a3(rgyud): gyi khyad par las//las tshe rnam par sbyong zhes bya//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang //gsang sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni//sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/byed du ma
328a4(rgyud): bcug/rje su yi rang ba ma yin//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid//de ltar de bzhi ni gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /ma byung yang rung //chos rnams kyi chos
328a5(rgyud): nyid de ni ye nas gnas pa ste/de yang 'di ltar gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi chos nyid do//gsang ba pa'i bdag po dri la gang dag gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i spangs rgyas tha~Md
328a6(rgyud): mkhyen pa/thams cad gzigs pa 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe/chos nyid de tshul sna tshogs dang /dgongs pa sna tshogs kyis sems can bsam pa sna tshogs pa rnams la tshig sna chags/
328a7(rgyud): dang /yig 'bru sna tshogs dang /yul gyi nges ba'i tshig tu brjod pa sna tshogs dang /dbyangs sna tshog su go bi rnam su byin gyis brlabs te gsang sdigs kyis tshul 'tshad//ji ltar
328b1(rgyud): nade bzhin gshogs pa rnams gsang sngags kyi tshul yig 'bru dag tu byin gyis rlob ce na/gasdang ba pa'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de//
328b2(rgyud): rnamar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bden pI tshig gang yin pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /de bzhin gshig
328b3(rgyud): pa'i stobs bcu dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che bdun dang /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi tshe sde ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang dag yin pa
328b4(rgyud): dang /gsang ba pa'i bdag po mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyid kyi bsod nams dang /
328b5(rgyud): ye shes kyi stobs dang /sngon gyi smon lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas sems can rnams la skal pa ji lta bzhin du
328b6(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi cho ga yang dag par rab tu ston to//gsang sngags kyi cho ga de yang gang zhe na/bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir a ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//dgongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir
328b7(rgyud): ka ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//nam mkha' dang 'dra bar dmig su med pa'i phyir kha ni chos tha~Md kyi sgo'o//'gro ba thams cad dmigasu med pa'i phyir gi ni chos thaMd kyi sgo'o//gcig tu 'phung pa
329a1(rgyud): /dmigasu myod du'i phyir g+hu ni chos tham+b+ha \u0f7fda kyi sgra'o//'chi'abo rnams cad dang bra lnga pa'i phy-ir nAn+ti r+m+mas thams cadaHk+ko'o//sgrib pa thams cad dang mdun
329a2(rgyud): phyir tshwa ni chos thams cad kyi sgra'o//skye bo dmigs med pa'i phyir dzi na chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//dri ma dmigasu mrid pa'i phyir dz+nyA ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//nga rgyal dmigs med/
329a3(rgyud): pa'i phyir na ni chos thams cad kyi sgor//bskyed pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//'khrug pa dmigs pa'i phyir Da nI chos thams cad kyi sku'o//smra ba dang yongs

329a5(rgyud): 'dul ba du mig su med pa'i phyir da ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//khams dmigasu med pa'i phyir d+ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//don dam pa'i bden pa dmig su med pa'i
329a6(rgyud): d+hir pa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//dan ba 'dra bur snying po med pa'i phyir ni chos thamos cad k+Shi sgra'o//drug gi lam dang b+ha bya bya'i phyir bai ni cho sna thams cad
329a7(rgyud): r-i/srid pa thams cad dmig su med pa'i phyir b+ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//'chi ba dmigs med pa'i phyir ma ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//thog pa chen po thams cad dmigs
329b1(rgyud): med pa'i phyir ya ni chos tha~Md kyi sgo'o//rdul thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir rA ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//mtshan nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyir la ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//rang bzhin
329b2(rgyud): gyis zhi ba'i phyir sha ni chos thams cad kyi sgra'o//rang bzhin gyis bems po'i phyir Sha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//bden pa thams cad dmigasu med pa'i phyir sa ni chos tha~Md kyi sgo'o//
329b3(rgyud): rgyud mig su med pa'i phyir ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po nga dang /nya dang /Na dang /na nI ting 'dzin thams cad la dbang sgyur ba ste/mthu thams cad dang ldan pa rab tu myur
329b4(rgyud): par dgos pa'i don rab tu sgrub par byed pa yino//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi tshul te nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di ni re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd
329b5(rgyud): kyi rnam parasmin pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi don nges pa/dus gsum las shin tu 'das pa/
329b6(rgyud): nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa ste/bsam yas sems kyi sa la gnas//las dang bya ba dag las byung //spyad pa'i sa ni rjes thob nas//bsam yas 'bras bu smin par byed//'di ni de nyid///
329b7(rgyud): dam pa ste//sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bstan//gsang sngags cho ga 'di shes na//sngags pa dngos grub thob par 'gyur//sgra zhes bya ba de nyid mchog/gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngag/

330b4(rgyud): bya bzang po dang //pu ri ka dang ka ri ka/de bzhin mthu shir dang //phe na a shog par ti dang //pa pa ta~M yang dbul bar bya//de la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang //shing tog rnams ni sgra
330b5(rgyud): tshogs dang //hwags dang li kha ra rnams dang //bu ram sbrang rtsi mar dag dang //btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang //zho dang 'o mo rgyas par dbul//mar me rnam pa sna tshogs pa//gtsang zhing
330b6(rgyud): shin tu bzang po yi//'bru mar rab tu dri zhim pas//rab tu bkang ste dbul bar bya//phyogasu gdugs dang ba dan rnams//kha dog sna tshogs rab tu bsgrags//rta babs bzang po rnams kyang ni//
330b7(rgyud): dril bu dang bcas rab tu dbul//yang na yid kyi mchod pa ni//thams cad nan tan bskyed bya//de nas bum pa brgyad dam ni//bcu drug rgyas par blangs nasu//sman dang rin chen thaMd blugs//

331a1(rgyud): kyis bani rnas pa rnams//mkhas pas rnam par dpyod par bya//lha yi btso bo rnams la ni//ras ni rlu re zung de dbupa//sems dpa' chen po phul rnams la//ya re dang
331a2(rgyud): bar rab tu bsgrags//mchod pa de ltar byas nas ni//slob ma dkyil 'khor drung bkug ste//sngags pas chu yis bsang gtor byas//dri dang me to/sbyin par bya//de bzhin gshegs pa dran byas//

331a4(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo'ang bcings nas ni//rdo rjes sems par byin gyis brlab//de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi ni//dam tshig sdom brtson can gyis bcings//de tshe sngags kyi cho ga bzhin//ras la lan gsuM

331b3(rgyud): song bzhi'i tshad du bya//dbus rdo rje rab tu brtag/de nas sngags pa'i g.yas logs//sbyin sreg gi ni yo byad bzhag/g.yon gyi phyogs slob ma rnams//tsog cig por ni 'khong du gzhug

331b5(rgyud): ru bri bar bya//ku sha dag gis g.yas phyogs nas//thams cad khor yug dgram pa ni//mang pos bskor ba'i tshul du dgram//spos kyi chu yis bsang gtor byas//de nas son phan byed

331b7(rgyud): re nas//blangs pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis//g.yas pa'i mthe bong bzung nas su//mnyam par gzhag pas sbyir sreg bya//yid ni mnyam par gzhig na sa//sregs blugs ri ralas
332a1(rgyud): mkhan ka mthamamamacamamamasasamam mams mtham/samamathas mamathas sa tsathatha amakha tham masas gamatsham ma ma khams tham mam tham yam ya.a khams ma mal

332a4(rgyud): ba dang ma he gas//gzhan yang dngos po ci yang rung //de tshe slob mas gus par ni//dad pa rab tu ldan pa yis//sems la dga' ba bskyed nasu//bla ma la ni yon dbu'o//yang na ci nas bla ma

332a6(rgyud): kun gyis gsungs//rnam dag yon tan rgyas pa yi//dge 'dun la ni kun gyis byin//dge 'dun la phul 'bras bu che//skyes bu mkhas pa gang dag gis//dge 'dun la ni yon phul na//
332a7(rgyud): longs spyod chen po mi zad pa//'jig rten pa la skye bar 'gyur//de bas thams cad 'thun par no//sems dpa' dga' ba bskyed nasu//sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i dge 'dun la//ci nus
332a8(rgyud): par ni mchod ston bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/sems dpa' chen po dbang bskur
