332b2(rgyud): du bar khru do bor nas phyi rol gyis la dkyil 'khor gnyis pa gru ni pa la sgo gcig pa bri bar bya'o//grwa bzhir rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhi dgodade/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste spros pa med par gnas
332b3(rgyud): pa dang /na mkha' dri mo med pa dang /dri ma med pa'i mig dang /gos sna tshogs gyon pa rnamaso//dbusu pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang bcas pa bzhag ste/'dab ma bzhi la byang chub
332b4(rgyud): sems dpa' grogasu gyur pa/sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu can du gyur pa bzhi bri bar bya ste/'di lta ste gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang dran pa dang shes bzhin can dang /phan pa'i lhag pa'i
332b5(rgyud): bsam pa can dang /snying rje cano//'dab ma gzhan rnams la ni phyag brnyan bzhi bri ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lnga ste sems kyi khyad par la smod pa dang /'dod pa yongasu rdzogs byed dang /
332b6(rgyud): ma chags pa dang /rnam par grol ba'o//dbusu ni chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs bzhag/de nas rin po che'i bum po bzhi rin po che dang /sman tha~Md blugs pa/kun
332b7(rgyud): tu bzang po dang /byams pa dpe /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /ngan song thams cad spong ba rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur//pad+ma 'dab ma de
333a1(rgyud): la ni/sngags pa bdag gis de bzhi ga nas//spos dang me tog bris mchod//mur me mchod yon sbyin par bya//gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //
333a2(rgyud): dzasgra yid du 'ong ba dang /bAkra shis rgya chen snyan pa yis//tshig bris legs par mngon dgar bya//skyob pa rnams kyi spyan sngo ru//de ni bsgrims te dbang bskuro//spyos dang me tig bzad/
333a3(rgyud): po yis//de la yang ni mchod pa bya//de nas gser gyi thur ma ni//thogs te mdun du 'dug nas//slob ma'i snying la dbab pa'i tshig/'di skad ces ni smra bar bya//sngon gyi rig mkhan
333a4(rgyud): rgyal po yis//'jig rten ling tog bsal ba bzhin//bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i//ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal//de nas me long byung sten mu//chos kyi mtshan nyid bshad par
333a5(rgyud): byu/chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste//dang zhing dag la rnyog pa med//gzung du med cing brjod du med//rgyu dang las las byung ba ste//ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa//de ltar chos 'di
333a6(rgyud): shes nas//sems can don ni mnyam med byos//'on kyang sangs rgyas sras bu skyes//de nas rkang pa'i bar 'og tu//chos kyi 'khor lo bzhag par bya//de nas lhag pa g.yas par yang //
333a7(rgyud): shin tu bzang po'i dung byin te//chos kyi dung ni bla med po//kun tu rgyas par bus na su//de ring phyin chad 'jig rten la//skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor//som nyi yid gnyis me bya
333b1(rgyud): tshan ka thams canaHsa samam mas ma/thaH/yamam tha samamanyan Sha sa naHam ma thas ka' na sa ga ma pa mtha 'a am ya ma mas sa
333b2(rgyud): /zhing //dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis khyod//gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi mchog/'jig rten 'di la rab tu shod//da ltar byas na sangs rgyas la//phan thogs byas pa gzo zhes bya//
333b3(rgyud): rdorje 'dzin pa de kun yad//khyod la rnam pa kun tu srung //dri nas slong me dwe slang la//sngags pa snod rjer ldan gyur ba'i//da kyis rlung du btsug nas ni//de la dam tshig bstan par
333b4(rgyud): de ring phyin chad bu khyod kyis//dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems//sreg gi phyir yang dri byin chad//yongasu bting bar mi bya'o//khyod kyis ser sna dang ni gang //sems can gnad pa mi bya//
333b5(rgyud): dam tshig 'di dag sangs rgyas kyis//brtul zhugs bzang po khyod la bshad//ji ltar rang gi srog srung ba//de ltar khyod kyis 'di dag bsrungs//slob mas bla ma'i rkang pa la//dad cing gus par
333b6(rgyud): phyag byas nas//shin tu nges pa'i yid kyis ni//de dag thams cad khas bla //de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'du
333b7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang snying rje chen po 'thung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po 'di'i dam tshig la zhugs par gyur pa de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig mngon par 'dus
333b8(rgyud): bgyis par rig par bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
334a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'dus byas pa ji tsam do rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bsod nams mngon par 'dus bya
334a2(rgyud): pa yang de tsam du rig par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhol
334a3(rgyud): dang thugs las skyes pa'i sras yin par rig par bya'o//rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag phyogs gong na gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa des chen po dgongs mi dgos par
334a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis de dag la mchod par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs
334a5(rgyud): pa la blta bar 'dod pa rnams kyis de dag la blta bar bya'o//de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin de dag dang /kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
334a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po de rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/bcom ldan 'das dang slan chad rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de rnams la rim gro ro bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi'o//
334a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamasu blta bar bgyi ba lagaso//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
334b1(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyis tha~Md dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang /rdo rje 'dzin de rnams dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la bka'
334b2(rgyud): stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas par 'jug pa rgya chen po las byung ba sna tshogs kyi gzug kyi/
334b3(rgyud): nor bu dang 'dra ba ra ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags pa/thogs pa med pa'i rtogs pa la gnas pa/dus gsum du chags pa med
334b4(rgyud): pa'i stabs dang ldan pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag yod do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang /rdo rje 'dzin de rnams dang /thams cad dang ldan
334b5(rgyud): pa'i 'khor de dag gis mgrin gcig tu tshig tu smras pa/bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab po/bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshad la bab po//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lhags/
334b6(rgyud): kyi dbang po 'dor pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par rnam par sprul pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu g.yogs nas/chos kyi rgyal mchen gyi tog rgya chen po yong
334b7(rgyud): dag pa'i rtse mo la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs mi thag tu de nas 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis chos
335a1(rgyud): malan mamamamamamacamasasacam macas mtham/amam thas mamatham sa mnyam sa maka ma mas/kham mam yam sa khas nyam ma mam sa am a tas bamag ma mal/
335a2(rgyud): kyi dbyings khyab pa/sems can gyi khams ma lus pa rnams yongasu bsgrub pa'i sgra 'byin pa/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stobs chen mo/srung ba chen mo 'di gsungs so//
335a3(rgyud): namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hA ya bi ga te b+h+yo/be shA mu khe b+h+yaHsad+g+ha thA khaM rak+Sha ma hA ba lo sar+b+ba thA ga ti pu r+d+ha nirdza twe hU~M d+d+hi/tra ta trata/a pra ti ha te swAhA//sangs rgyas
335a4(rgyud): mkhas pa thams cad kyis//rig sngags 'od gsungs mod lo ni//de tshe sangs rgyas zhing 'di dag/rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i de kun gyis//ngo mtshar gyur pa'i
335a5(rgyud): mig gdangs nas//sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar ni//yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smras pa//e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//srung po rab tu stobs chen 'di//sems can thaMd srung ba dang
335a6(rgyud): bskyab cing sba ba'i phyir gsungs te//gang gis snying la srung gnas pa//de dag la ni 'jigs pa med//gsang sngags mthu chen dran byas na//bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang //smin pa
335a7(rgyud): 'dzegs pa'i gzugs can ni//de dag thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbyings rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs nas/de'i tshe chos kyi mdzod kyi snying po
335a8(rgyud): can zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//bcom ldan 'das ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dam tshig lo 'jug pa'i rig sngags byung //na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/
335b1(rgyud): as mye tri sa me sa ma ye swA hA/de nas de ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thang du dam tshig la 'jug pa'i rig sngags kyi sku gang
335b2(rgyud): zhig thos na mkhas pa rnams chos thams cad las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgra blugs por gyur to//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings kun du 'byung ba'i gsang sngags
335b3(rgyud): gsungs pa/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/chos kyi dbyingasu byin gyis brlabs pa'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nAn/badz+ra It+ma ko&hU~M/rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis
335b4(rgyud): brlab pa'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nAM ni/badz+rAM ka pi tsa hU~M/rdo rje gau cha'o//na maHsa man+to bud+d+hA nAn/ta thA ga ta tsak+Shur+N+Na a ba lo ka ya swA hA//de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/
335b5(rgyud): bi shud d+ha gan d+ho b+ha ba swA hA/byung/spos kyi sngag so//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA ne/ma hA mai traM byAd ga te swA hA//me tog gi sngag so//na maHsi man+ta bud d+hA nAn/d+harma d+hA tu a nu ga ta swA hA//bdug rtsi
335b6(rgyud): kyi sngags//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/sarba ta thA ga ta ra tsi sA rA NaM a paM b+hA sA ge ga net+ta raM b+h+yaHswA hA//mar me'i sdug so//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/ga gai na sa ma swa ma swA te//mchod yin
335b7(rgyud): kyi sngagaso//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ga ga na nen d+ha s+pha ra Na/bi shud d+ha d+harma nir dza ta swA hA/gtsug tor gyi sngag so//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA naM/pra tsaN+Da badz+ra dz+wa la bi s+phu ra trUM/de bzhin
336a1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i do cha'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/dz+wa la mU li nA ta thA ga ta ra tsi swA hA//kun tu 'bar ba'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hAn+dan/ma hA ta thA ba ta dzaM ha s+yAd kyi/
336a2(rgyud): d+harma pra tiSh+Thi ta swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyi'o//dkyi li 'khor du dgod pa'i gsang sngags kyi mdzad///bam po gsum pa//de nas yang bcos
336a3(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad la phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i tshe na ni//bshegs rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba lags//gsang sngags sgrub pa'i tshe nA yang
336a4(rgyud): leg 'dren rnams ni ma mchis 'gyur//gsang sngags rnams kyang ji ltar sgrub//de yi 'bras bu ci 'drar 'gyur//de skad gsol nas de yi tshe//bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad chen gyis//
336a5(rgyud): 'di skad ces ni bka' stsal pa//sems dpa' chen po leg so legs//khyod kyis yongasu dris pa gang //thams cad khyod la bstan par bya//sngon chad ser sna bsnyen pa'i phyir//bgegs
336a6(rgyud): ni rang gi sems las byung //de yi rgyu ni gzhig pa'i phyir//gang du sems dang sems byung ba'i//rtog pa thams cad spong ba dang //rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i//spros po tha~Md 'gag
336a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i//byang chub sems zhes bshad pa yin//sngags pas byang chub sems dran zhing //mi g.yo ba ni yid la bzlas//de yi phyag rgya bcings na ni//bge bas rnams thams
336b1(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur//gsang ba pa'i bdag po da la//rlung ba ning ba 'di nyon cig/a zhes bya bar bdag bsgyur te//he zhes bya ba yid la bzlas//rlung gi phyogasu gnas nas ni//sa la rlo kyi theg
336b2(rgyud): le dag/bdun nyid legs par byas nasu//kham phor gyis ni dgab par bya//kham po ro ri rab chen po ru//yang dang yang du bsam par bya//de yi steng du a zhes pa//klad kor bcas pa
336b3(rgyud): rgyas par bsam//rlung bcing chen po de lta bu//sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad//sems dpa' chen po chu yi yang //yid gcig bsdus te mnyan par gyis//sngags pas ra zhes
336b4(rgyud): bya ba ni//thams cad dmar po stobs chen bsam//'bar ba'i phreng can mi zad pa//khra bo lag na ral gri thogs//sa la sprin gyi gzugs bris nas//ral gri phyag rgyas dbab par bya//
336b5(rgyud): phyogs kun nas ni langs pa'i sbyin//de ma thag tu 'jig par 'gyur//yang na sngags pa mi g.yeng bas//de dag pur bus gdab bya ste//mkhas pa rdo rjer gyur na su//thaMng rdo rje phur bus/
336b6(rgyud): grang ba//yang na bgegs rnams thams cad ni//zhi bar bya ba yang bshad//sngags pa dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas//mi g.yo stobs chen gsung sngags no//shin tu mi zad bdug
336b7(rgyud): nyid kyi//dkyil 'khor dag la gnas par bsam//de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni//rkang pa g.yon pas spyi bor gzir//'on tang de ni zhir 'gyur ba 'am/dogs pa med
337a1(rgyud): /par 'chi bar 'gyur//de'i gzugs brtan byas nas//rkyen duH/khrag bzlos pa su//thugs pas smras ngas bskams na na//gdan de myur du nag dU 'gyur/
337a2(rgyud): de ni me la bskams pa dang //dug gis bslus na nges par ni//tshangs pa 'am 'on te brgya byin yang //de yi mod la myur du 'tshig/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di
337a3(rgyud): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'chal po ltar na bdag gis 'di ltar mdzel to//bcom ldan 'das rang gi dkyil 'khor lo gnas na lha
337a4(rgyud): rnams byin gyis rlob par bgyid//de nyid du gnas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las kyang 'gal bar mi bgyi do//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rang gi rigs la
337a5(rgyud): gnas pa de ni gsang sngags thams cad kyi dam tshig lag so//byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis kyang rang gi nas la gnas
337a6(rgyud): nas/don thams cad bsgrub par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gsang ba pa'i bdage po de de bzhin te/ji skad smras pa de de bzhin//gsung ba pa'i bdag po gzhin
337a7(rgyud): yang gang gi kha dog gang gsungs pa de nyid de yi dkyil 'khor te//lha yi gzugs ni de lta bur//sngon gyi sang ba rgyas rnams kyis bstan//de la gsang ba pa'i bdag po ma 'ongs pa'i
337b1(rgyud): dus na/sems can blo zhan pa ma dad pa gang bstan pa 'di la dad par mi 'gyur zhing yid gnyis dang som nyi mang ba/thos pa tsam snying por 'dzin pa/sgrub pa la mi phyogs pa dag 'byung bar
337b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/de dag ni bdag nyid kyang ma rung la gzhan yang phung bar byed pa yin no//'di skad du 'di ni phyi rol pa rnams la yod/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ni ma yino//zhes smra bar 'gyur
337b3(rgyud): gyi mi blun po de dag gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/chos thams cad la mnga' brnyes pa//sems can+da gyi don rtogs par thugasu chud pa des sngon seMn rnams la
337b4(rgyud): phan par bzhed nas 'di dag thams cad bshado zhes bya bar ni mi shes//chos rnams kyi ni chos kyi mtshan//blun po des ni de mi shes//chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni//stong pa nyid du/
337b5(rgyud): yang dag gsungs//sngags pa rtag tu der gnas nas//rab tu nges par las bya'o//bgegs zhi bar bya bar mi par phye ba ste rgyas pa'o//de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag dang
337b6(rgyud): kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal nas/snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po
337b7(rgyud): 'dir chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgo ji ltar rtogs pa rang rang gi tshig tu brjod pa'i tshig gis gsang sngags rnams smra bar 'dod nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab bo//
338a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /rdo rje 'dzin de dag la mi nyams pa'o chos nyid du byin gyis brlabs nas bka'
338a2(rgyud): stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi dbyings ji ltar rtogs pa bzhin sems can gyis khams rnam par sbyong ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams smros shig/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems
338a3(rgyud): dpa' kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stobs thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags smras pa/na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nA na/
338a4(rgyud): sa mAn+ta nu ga ti ba ra dza d+harma ni ra dza tA ma hA ma hA swA hA///kun tu bzang po'i 'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byams pa chen po kun tu mngon par 'byung ba zhes
338a5(rgyud): /bya bi'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi snying po smras pa/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAn/i dzi ta na dza ya/sar+b+bo sa twa ya shau yA nu ga ta swA hA/byams pa'i 'o//de nas
338a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' nA mkha'i snying po rnam par dag pa'iyul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags smras pa/na mnos man+ta bud d+ha nAn/A
338a7(rgyud): kA sha sa ma tA nu ga ta bi tsid+d+haM ba ra d+ha ra swA hA/na mkha'i snying po'i'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thaMd rnam par sel ba/snying rje chen po'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
338b1(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags smras pa/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/U s+yAd ta hr-i tA/a b+hu ga tA/d+hU d+hA r-I rA swAt+ma/sgrib pa tha~Md rnam par sel ba'i'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
338b2(rgyud): kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kun tu spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi snying po 'khor dang bcas par smras pa/na maHsau man+ta bud d+hA nAn/sar+b+ba ta/
338b3(rgyud): thA ga ta a pa lo kI ta/ka ru NA mA yA ra ra ro hUM dzaHswA hA/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/dzang dzang sa swA hA/mthu chen thob pa'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hi nAn/ka ru
338b4(rgyud): Na da b+ha be tA re tA ra Ni swA hA/lha mo sgrol ma'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/sar+b+ba b+ha ya//trA sa ni hUM s+pho Ta ya swA hAM/khro gnyer tsan ma'i 'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ta thA ga ta bi shwa ya/saM b+haM be/pad+ma
338b5(rgyud): mA li ni swA hA/gos dkar can gyi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAn/hUM kha de bin d+ha s+pho Ta ya swA hA/rta mgrin gyi'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po rdo rje mi shigs pa/rtog pa'i yul zhes bya ba
338b6(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/gsang sngags smras pa/ni maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/hi he ha/pu tA nu swA hA/sa'i snying po'i 'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/
338b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi snying po smras pa/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA na/he he he/ku mA ra ka/bi muk+ti/sa rir+tha ti/
339a1(rgyud): saraH pra tan /'jam dngal stsal//da nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyug nad rnam 'dum pa nas bya ba'i Sh+Ti 'dzin la snyanas bya bcugs nas//rang gi snying po 'dra/
339a2(rgyud): /dang bcas pa smras pa/na maHsa man+ta badz+rA tA ne/tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha tA hUM/phyag na rdo rje'i'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra nAn/tri Ta tri Ta/dzA ya na ti swA hA/mA ma kI'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/drA ba ni//
339a3(rgyud): d+ha ya bar d+ha ya~M/mo Ta yA mo Ta ya/badz+ro b+hA be saMrba tA/a pra ti hi te swAhA/rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nAne/hi hUM badz+ra swA hU~M/khro zla gtso bo'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bid+d+hi nAni/sar+b+ba/
339a4(rgyud): d+hIHnir d+hi ni/brje skye che bar de swA/rdo rje mo'o'o//na maHsa mAn+ta badz+nyA na/d+d+hi b+h+yo/hU~M baT dzang dza s+thAH/rdo rje 'dzin pa kun b+he'o//na maHsa nAn+ta badz+nyA nAn/he hUM ny+tsi sa
339a5(rgyud): gr-id+d+ha/khAd khyed/pa ra~M b+hu ra ya sa pre tidz+nyA na swA hA/phyag brnyan thaMd kyi'o//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rin po che'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa'i
339a6(rgyud): grags nas nyid kyi snying po 'khor dang bcas pa gsungs pa/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/sar+b+ba kle sha ni shud d+ha nA~M/sar+b+ba d+harma ba shi prAp+ta ga ga na sa ma sa ma swA hA/shUk+Shathub pa'o'o//nAm
339a7(rgyud): siman+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ba ra de bar bAb+he hUM/mdzod spu 'o//na maHsa ran+ta bud+d+hA rA ni/pheM bo hUM hUM phaT swA hA/gtsug tor thams cad kyi'o//no maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/d+h+r-i d+hI/r-i ra~M/ dzI swAhA/khro bo
339b1(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi thub pa ces bya bdi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/a pa ra dza ta/dza lan te/dar+Na te swAhA/gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/pre thi bye sa swA hA//sa'a'o//
339b2(rgyud): nAmaHsa pan+d+ha byed d+hAd+hAn/dUSh+Ta be swA hUM/khyab la zlo//na maHsa man+ta bung d+ha nA ma/rba drA ya hU~M/blun pa'i lo//ni maHsa nAn shud+d+hAd+hAn/d+hA /rgyu sbru laro//nam
339b3(rgyud): man+ta budad+hA nAnAM/sau sitwA yai swAhA/dbyangs n+dan kI'o//na maHsa man+ta br-id d+hA nAMna~M/rat+na s+yA d+d+hi bi ta ya~M swAhA/bden bral gyi'o//ni maHsa man+t+ri byAd d+hA nA~Mni/ba~M ba sa twA ya swAhA/
339b4(rgyud): gshin rje'i'o//na man+tas+ya man+ta bud d+hA nA~Mr/mr-i ta ye swA hA/'chi ba dag gi'o//nA maHsi men+ta bud d+hA nAn/kA la rA tI ye swA hA/dus mtshan g+hi'o//ni maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/mUt+sI
339b5(rgyud): rgyuswAng+ga/ma mo rnams kyi'o//ni maHsaM man+ta bud d+hA nAn/she krA ya swAk+Sh+ma/brgya byin gyi'o//na maHsa man+ta bid d+hA nAne/oM paM pa te ye swAts+tsha/chu'i lha'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud dz+nyAn na/Id-i
339b6(rgyud): d+h+r-i ya sne hA/nyi ma'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/pye dz+nyA pa ta yai swA hA//tshangs pa'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hAn+sanaM/tsan+d+rA ya swA hA/zla bo ra 'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nun/me g+ha shi nI ye
339b7(rgyud): dga' bo dang /bsnyen dga' bo'i'o//de nas yid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bstan pa de ni yod por grub par bzhed nas/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thor gyi /
340a1(rgyud): gas kyi lam sas pa//dam na ku na //rgazhan sum na san+dan ma sa na du/
340a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum na mkha'i spyan gyi'i//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bgegs thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gzi brjid
340a3(rgyud): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bgegs chen po 'joms pa'i gsang sngags 'di gsungaso//na maHsa n+ta badz+ra NAn/tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha naM s+pho Ta ya/hUM trag
340a4(rgyud): ha mA/'phags pa me g.yo ba'i'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAn/ha ha ha/bi smA ye/sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/bi Sha ya saM b+ha traM lo kya pe dza ya hUM dzaHswA hA/khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i'o//
340a5(rgyud): /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/he tu pra t+ya bi ga te d+hArma no rA dzi ti hUM/nyan thos rnams kyi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA na/rangadwa sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/sar+b+ba bud d+hA nAn/
340a6(rgyud): sar+b+ba bud d+ha bo d+hi sa tI/hr-i da yAn be sha ni/na maHsar+b+ba bi d+hA swA hA/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyi'i snying po'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/l-i ka lo ka ka rA yaM/
340a7(rgyud): sar+b+ba daH/nAM ga yak+She/gan d+harma/a su ra/ga ru Da/ki na na re/maM ho ra ga/sdod yAn n+yo ka ra Sha ya be tsi tra ga ti swAhA/lha le sogs pa spyi'i snying po'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/sar+b+ba thA/
340b1(rgyud): bI ma te/ba ka ra Na/d+harma d+hA tu ner dzA ta/sa sa swA hA/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kye'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAnA/dur d+ha ri Sha ma hA ro Sha N+Da/khA Da ya sa b+hAn/ta thA ga ti/A dz+nyA ku ru swA hA//swA/
340b2(rgyud): srung rdul dka' ba zhes bya'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/he ma hA prA tsaN+Da a b+he mu kha br-ih+Na khA dA ya kauny+tsi rA yaM si ma ma ya ma nu sma ra sA hA/sgro srung mngon du phyogs pa zhes bya ba'i'o//na maH
340b3(rgyud): sa man+ta bud d+ha nAn/sar+b+ba tra a nu ga te ban d+ha/si mni ma hA sa ma ya ni ra dza te sma ra Ne a pra ti hA te/d+ha ka d+ha ka/tsa ra tsa ra/ban d+ha ban d+ha/da sha di shan/sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a nu te/pra brta d+harma laM
340b4(rgyud): d+ha bi dzaM ye/b+ha ga bi ta/be kA ri bi ku le le lu bu bi swA hA/mtshams chen po gcod pa'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/a byang chub kyi'o//a spyod pa'i 'o//oM rdzogs par sangs rgyas
340b5(rgyud): ba'i 'o//a/mya ngan las 'das pa'i'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAn/ha/'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal ba'i 'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAn hAM/'phags pa mi g.yo mgon gyi'o//na maHsa
340b6(rgyud): man+ta bud d+hA nAn/a/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i 'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/sa/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugi'o//nA maHsa mAn+ta bud d+ha nAn/pa/phyag ni rdo rje'i'o//na maHsa
340b7(rgyud): /man+ta bud d+hI nAMn/maM/'jam dpal byi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/ga/na mkha'i spyan gyi'o//na maHsa nan+ta bud d+hA nAn/raM/chos kyi dbyings kyi'o//na miHsa man+ti bud d+hA nAn/kha/dpa' bo
341a1(rgyud): tshalan mamam canaHsa samam mas mtham/amamam/thasamathas a ma ma sa/ka mtshan sa a ma a[।] kam sal
341a2(rgyud): chen po'i //nA maHsa man+ta byAd+yA d+hA nan/dza/chu'i dbang po'i'o//na maHsa mAn+ta bud+yA d+hA nAn/tAM/lA mo sgrar ma'i'o//na maHsa mAn+ta byAd d+hA nAn/hrI zla nyer can mtshan
341a3(rgyud): namaHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/baM/gos dkar can gyi'o//ne maHsa mAn+ta bud d+hA nAn/sAM/mthu chen thob pa'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/taM/rta mgrin gyi'o//na maHsa maMn+ta bud d+hA nAn/yaM/
341a4(rgyud): grags 'dzin ma'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/sid phyeg na rin chen gyi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/dzA/dra ba'i 'od kyiro//ni maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/b+ha/shAkya thub pa'i'o//na maH/
341a5(rgyud): sa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/hAM t+yad ruM/gtsug tor bsum gyi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAnaM/l-i/gdugs dkar po'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA ni/shaM/gtsug tor rgyal ba'i'o//
341a6(rgyud): na maHsaM man+ta bud d+hA nAn/saM/gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA na/trid gzi brjid phung po'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/hUM/rnam par 'thor ba'i'o/
341a7(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bud d+hI nAn/hUM/gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA naM/b+hI/sa'i 'o//na maHsA man+ta bud d+hA nA ni/kai li/ske can ma'i'o//na maHsa man+ta
341a8(rgyud): bud d+hA nAn/di le/nyi sla can kyi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/mi le/sna tsho des ma'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/nyi li/nor ldan ma'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn
341b1(rgyud): d+hAsanAnA/ngo mtshar can gyi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nan/rA se nAn//sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i 'o//na maHsa mAn+ta bud d+hA nAn/d+hu sa nAn/ngan song zad sa/
341b2(rgyud): ba'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/ba hi sa nAn/yongasu skyong sems blo bros kyi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~Mn/dzaM/byams pa chen po mngon par 'byung ba'i'o//na many+dzus
341b3(rgyud): man+ta bud d+hA nAn/yaMsnying rjes gdungs pa'i'i//na maHsa mon+ta bud d+ha nA na/igadungs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i 'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/ang/bsam gyi
341b4(rgyud): me khyab pa'i blo gros can gyi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/dr-i/rin chenI 'byung gnas kyi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud dz+nyA nAn/Sha/phyag na rIn chen gyi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/
341b5(rgyud): TaM/sa 'dzin gyi'o//na maHma man+ta bud d+hA nA naM/oM/gzugs theb pa'i 'o//nA maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/D+hi/phyog na rin chen phyag rgya'i'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/Ni/
341b6(rgyud): bye sram pa brtan po'i 'o//na maHsa man+ta budaM d+hA nA na/haM/na mkha'i dri ma med pa'i'o//nA maHsa men+ta bud d+hA nAn/r-i na mkha'i blo gros kyi'o//na mAHsa man+taM bud d+h+waM nIn/ga tang/
341b7(rgyud): blo bros rnam par dag pa'i'o//na maHsa man+taM bud d+hA nAn/d+hI/spyod pa'i blo gros kyi'o//na maHsa man+ti bud d+hA nA na/hUM/brten pa'i blo gros kyi'o//naM maHse man+ta bud
342a1(rgyud): dz+nyAnan/d+hi/tsa br-i/phyag bAn+d+hanA rnams kyi'o//namaHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/k+Sha da ta rU so+o kau/byang chub sems dpa' dzi skad gsung grams kyi/
342a2(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/nA mo mA ye/d+har+m+ma sa b+haM be bi b+h+ya be/ka ta ne/saM sa ne/gnas gtsa dA ma pa rnams kyi'o//na mauHsA mun+ta bud d+hA nAn/kr-i ke ri/srin po rnams kyi'o//
342a3(rgyud): na maHsu man+ta bud d+hI nA na/hrIHha/mkha 'gro rnams kyi'o//num+b+haHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAn/yak+Sha bIr+ya d+ha ri/gnod sbyin rnams kyi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nA na/mi tsi mi tsi/
342a4(rgyud): sha za mo rnams kyi'o//na miHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA na/guM guM/ai i/'byung po rnams kyi'o//ne maHsa man+ta bud d+h+r-i nAn/ra To ra TaM/br-i Ti ShAM TaM/lha ma yin rnams kyi'o//
342a5(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAnra/ga ra la na phyi ra li ni/lto \u0f85 phye chen po rnams kyi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA naM/ha se nAM na bI a sa nAn/mi 'am ci rnams kyi'o//na maHsa
342a6(rgyud): maN+Da bud d+hA nA naM/ai taM tse lA ran ma no me//mi rnams kyi'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la sogs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags ngas bshad/de la gsang
342a7(rgyud): sngags thams cad kyi/snying po nges pas mnyan par gyis/a zhes bya ba sngags kun gyi//snying po yin par yang dag bshad//de la gsang sngags kun gnas te/
342b1(rgyud): mam mamamamams samamasacas mtham/masamamasamatham mthag yang la lamams yas ma mams ya bas la yang mamam mams a lam la yang ma
342b2(rgyud): dri ltar sngags rnams rnam par nges//rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las spyi'i gsang sngags kyi mdzod rim par/
342b3(rgyud): phye ba rgyas pa'o////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po/gsang sngags ji ltar
342b4(rgyud): bsgrub pa dang //sgrub pa'i 'bras bu gang yin nyon//yi ge dang ni yi ger sbyar//de bzhin bzhi las gzhir 'gyur ba//shin tu bsdams pa yid la ni//bzlas brjod 'bum phrag gcig bya'o///
342b5(rgyud): yi ge byang chub sems yin te//gnyis pa sgra zhes bya ba yi//bzhi ni rang gi lhar gzhag pa//rang gi lus kyi gnas la bya//gzhi gnyis pa ni rdzogs sangs rgyas//rkang gnyis mchog tu shos
342b6(rgyud): par bya//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag la//sngags pas de la gnas par bsam//yi ge rnams ni go rims bzhin//de yid busu legs par bkod//sngar sdud pa yi tshig gis non//srog
342b7(rgyud): deng rtsol ba rnam par sbyangs//sreg ces bya ba rlung du bshad//rtsol ba dran pa zhes bya ste//de gnyis bsdams pa byas na su//sngon du bsnyen pa legs par bya//de nas sngags pa zla gcig/
342b8(rgyud): tu///shin tu bsdams te bzlas pa byas//gsang sngags sngon du spyad pa ni//gzhi gcig nas ni gcig tu 'jug/grags chen sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi//sngar spyod pa zhes bshad pa yin//
343a1(rgyud): de phyin cad ni gang cung zad//me tog spos la sogs dbul zhing //sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bya'i phyir//de tshe byang chub tu yang bsngo//sngags pas 'jigs med do//
343a2(rgyud): lta bur//zla gnyis pa la bzlas brjod bya//de nas zla ba nye ba'i tshe//mi de sgrub la 'jug par bya//ri rtse dang nI ba long lhas//de bzhin 'bab chu'i mdo dag dang //lam gyi gzhi
343a3(rgyud): mdo mtshan gcig dang //ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnasu//dkyil 'khor nan tan bri bar bya//thams cad rdo rje'i khang par byas//des ni der gnas bsrungs byas nas//sgrub pa la
343a4(rgyud): ni nAn tan bya//der ni mtshan mo nam phyed dam//yang na nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe//'di lta'i ltos rnams 'byung 'gyur te//blo dang ldan pas de shes bya//hUM zhes pa dang rnga sgra dang //de
343a5(rgyud): bzhin sa ni g.yo ba dang //yid du 'ong ba'i tshig kyang rung //de ni nam mkha' las grags nas//mtshan ma dag ni de rnams kyis//yid bzhin rjes grub shes bya ste//sangs rgyas rkang
343a6(rgyud): gnyis mchog rnams kyis//de yi 'bras bur yang dag bshad//de ltar sngags kyi tshul gnas pa//de ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur//de bas rnam pa thams cad du//sngogs nyid//
343a7(rgyud): rtag tu dran par bya//sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//de ni dran par bya ba'ang bshad//rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin
343b1(rgyud): kyis rlob pa las 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rim par phye ba'o////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'du
343b2(rgyud): ba la gzigs nas/rlo ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/dus gsum mtha' yas pa'i sgo nges pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i chos kyi tshig rnams gsungs//
343b3(rgyud): mkha' ltar dri med ngo bo nyid med pa//rnam mang ye shes sna tshogs sbyin par byed//ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong pa nyid//rkyen la rag las zab cing blta bar dka'//khyad par 'gro ba/
343b4(rgyud): rnams la rtag pa ru//rnam par bsams pa'i 'bras bu mchog sbyin byed//ji ltar na mkha' tshogs med spyod yul can//'gro ba kun gyi gnasu gyur pa ltar//de bzhin rnam par
343b5(rgyud): drag pa'i chos nyid 'di//srid gsum mA lus 'byor par 'byung bar byed//mchog skyes mkhas pa gang zhig 'dir spyod na//rgyal ba kun dang spyad yul gtsug par gyur//rgyal bas
343b6(rgyud): ji skad gsungs pa'i chos nyid ni//shin tu rnam dag thams cad snang byed pa//de ltos gos 'phang rnyed dka' gzhan medado//yangs pa'i chos ni zab la 'grib med cing //mnyam med/
343b7(rgyud): 'jig rten phan byed de la ni//rnam rtog rnam par spangs te spyad par gyis//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par dwang mdzad chen pos tshigs bcad pa de dag gsungs nas/thams cad
344a1(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'khor tshogs pa la gzigs nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin rnams la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag gang gis ni san rnams mthong ba
344a2(rgyud): chos kho na la dga' ba dang mgu ba thob nas bde ba la reg par 'gyur ba rang rang gi chos kyi dbyings kyi mthu rlab su gyur dngos grub sgrub pa'i tshige rnams stan cig/de skad ces
344a3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa dang /rdo rje 'dzin rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal nas chos kyi rjes bka' ji skad stsal pa bzhin 'tshalo//zhes gsol te bcom ldan
344a4(rgyud): 'das nyid la gsol ba btab pa/bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du dngos grub sgrub bya'i tshig rnams bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bstan du gsol/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom
344a5(rgyud): ldan 'das gang bdag cag rang gis rtogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bshad pa de ni rab tu dka' lag so//de lta lags pas ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang
344a6(rgyud): bde ba'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis legs par rab tu bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/rdo rje 'dzin de dag
344a7(rgyud): thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag leg so leg so//de bzhin gshegs pas bsrung ba'i chos 'dul ba 'di la ba ni yon che ba'i chos gcig yod pa ni/
344b1(rgyud): 'di lta ste ngo tsha shes pa'o//ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo ni mthong ba'i chos 'di la chos gnyis rab tu myur bar 'byung ste/gnyis gang zhe na/mi bya ba'i lnga/
344b2(rgyud): mi byed pa dang /dam pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'o//yang gnyis te khong du ma chud pa khong du chud pa dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs pa thob par
344b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o//yang gnyis te tshul khrims la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba dang /lha dang mi rnamasu skye ba thob par 'gyur ba'o//de bas na legs par rab tu yod la zung shig dang /'di
344b4(rgyud): lta ste sgrub par sbyor ba'i tshig gang rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams gsang sngags rnams las myur du gsang sngags
344b5(rgyud): kye dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags sgrub pa 'grub par sbyor ba'i tshig rnams bshad//de la re shig dang por dkyil 'khor mthong ba/bla mas gsang sngags sgrub par gnang ba/
344b6(rgyud): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/dad pa can/ser sna med pa/snying rje can dul ba/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa/sdom pa bzung ba//rang gi bslab pa la gnas pa/
344b7(rgyud): thabs la mkhas shing rob tu brtan/dus dang dus mi yin pa'ang shes//'jigs pa med cing mkhas la gtong //bzod dang ldan zhing byams pa'i yid//gsang sngags spyod la rab tu btso ni//
345a1(rgyud): glosang sngags de nyid don la mkhas//bsam gtan byungad la dga' ba yi//sgrub pa po ni sgrub la shes//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la myos par
345a2(rgyud): byebyad pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags yod//des 'dod pa na spyod pa'o lha'i bu the myos pas brgyal bar byed cing me tog mang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs nyams dga' ba rnams kyang ston
345a3(rgyud): la yongasu spyod pa dang nye bar spyad pa rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyang mngon par sprul nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang sbyin la bdag nyid kyang yongasu sbyong //'di lta ste lha'i bu
345a4(rgyud): dag dbang phyug chen po la yid mgyogs zhes bya ba'i rigs sngags yod/des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu sin gyi dgos pa byed cing /nye bar spyod pa dang yongasu spyad pa
345a5(rgyud): thaMthod kyang mngon par sprul nA gnA gtsang ma gyi rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams la yang sbyin la/bdag nyid kyang kun tu spyod do//'di lta ste dper na mig 'phrul mkhan ni gsang sngags rnams kyis kun
345a6(rgyud): dga' ra ba dang /mtsho dang /'bab chu dang /mI la sogs pa rnam pa tha dod pa sna tshogs ston to//'di lta ste dper na lha ma yin rnams ni gsang sngags kyis sgyu ma rnams ston to//'ad
345a7(rgyud): ste dper na gsang sngags dag gis ni dug dang rims la sogs pa med par 'gyuraro//'di lta ste ma mo zhes bya ba'i lha mo rnams ni/gsang sngags kyis sems can rnams la nad 'go ba
345b1(rgyud): gtong //'di lta ste/dper na gsang sngags kyis ni me'i tsha ba med par byas nas grang ba byed par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dag dpe'i tshig 'di dag rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi mthu la mngon//
345b2(rgyud): par dad par bya'o//gsang sngags kyi mthu de yang gsang sngags rnams las byung po yang ma yin/rdzas las 'jug pa yang ma yin/sbyar ba posA las dmigs pa yang ma yin
345b3(rgyud): mod kyis//rigs kyi bu dag 'on kyang gsang sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis chos nyid 'byung ba las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur te/dus gsum laso 'das pa'i phyir dang /rten cing
345b4(rgyud): 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na chos nyid kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par khong du
345b5(rgyud): chud pas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gsang sngags kyi tshul gyis rjes su 'jug par bya'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dus gsum du chags pa med pa'i stobs kyis gzhi byin
345b6(rgyud): gyis rlob pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rkyen rnam par dag pa'i snying po can zhes bye ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//bcom ldan
345b7(rgyud): 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa ji snyed yod pa de dag rnam par rig par byed pa'i sgra rnams las chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi stobs
346a1(rgyud): mi mnyam po dang mnyam pa'i stobs/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nong pa las byung ba/gnas skabs gzhi dbyangs gcig las byung bas chos
346a2(rgyud): kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par byas te na mkha' dang mnyam par gyur nas byung ba/na maHsAd+d+hiM ta thA ga te b+h+yo/bi shrI mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA a As oM lnga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
346a3(rgyud): kyi snying po de dag byung mo thag tu de nas yang chos kyi dbyings thams cad nges par sgrogs pa'i sgo dag nas yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po tshig gis mtshan pa rnam
346a4(rgyud): par rig pa'i dbyangs kyi sku gcig nas gcig tu mngon par grago/byang chub sems dpas de thos nas/ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig phyed ste/kun mkhyen bsnyun dang bral ba la//tshig
346a5(rgyud): snyan 'di skad ces gsol to//e ma'o gsang sngags skyed pa las//sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog rnams kyis//gang gis 'di kun khyab pa yi//ye shes yangs pa chen po 'byung //
346a6(rgyud): de bas rnam pa thams cad du//sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i snying po la//nang gi bad nyid rnam dag pas//rtag tu mngon par brtson par bya//de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
346a7(rgyud): kyi snying po 'di rnams kyi sgrub pa 'byung ste/bskyed mos tshal lam/gtsug lag khang ngam/phug gam/yid gang du dben pa der byang chub kyi sems sgom zhing mtshan ma ma byung gi bar
346b1(rgyud): de srid du 'dug par bya'o//de nas snying po de dag las gang yang rung ba gcig bzung ste/the tsom med par gyur gyi bar du gzhi bsgrub par bya'o//de nas snying khur bzhag nas yid bsgrub par/
346b2(rgyud): bya ste/shin tu rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa/brten pa rab tu mi g.yo ba/rnam par mi rtog pa me long lta bu/rab tu phra bo la mngon du blta zhing rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor bas ring gi
346b3(rgyud): lus rang gi lha'i lusu mthong gi bar du bya'o//gzhi gnyis pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me long gi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po lo bzhugs pa/
346b4(rgyud): phug na bzhugs pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/thor tshugs dang dbu rgyan can//'od zer mtha' yas pas bskor ba/rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang
346b5(rgyud): bral ba/na mkha' bzhin gzod ma nas zhi ba ste/de la sgra gnas par bsam zhing mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas brjod bya//de nas sngon du bsnyen pa ni/'bum phrag gcig bya bar
346b6(rgyud): bshad//de nas zla ba gnyis pa la//me tog dri la sogs pa dbul//son rnams la rnam mang po'i//phan pa nye bar grub byed cing //rnyed dang ma rnyed rnam spang ste//zla ba gzhan las bzlas brjod bya//de
346b7(rgyud): la de ru sbyor ba 'di//mnyam par gzhag pas bsam par bya//bdag gis bsod nams mthu yis ni//sems can thams cad bde gyur cig//thaMd nad kyang med par shog/yang na de bzhin
347a1(rgyud): mtshan ka thamamamatshams samamamams mtham/am thas mamathas mamanyam am la yang gal mams yam thas masa' tham bamacam yang yamal sa sa yang dbas sa ya mal
347a2(rgyud): /sh+logs su / sa chagasas/ na soms na na nga // mas pa gyu gas //spring pa 'ad pa'i tshul na
347a3(rgyud): mu~M thogs pa na byu ba//du gro gcig pa gcig po de'i//sgra hU~M sbrul nam yang rgyu ma gyur//maud ga smra rnams la nas sgom sogs//khogs pa myed pa 'byung
347a4(rgyud): son dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang //mi bi ra rnam pa sna tshogs pa//bdag gri bsad nams mthu yos ni//de dag myur du zhi bar gyur//sems can sdug bsngal dzad las//snying rje chen po skye
347a5(rgyud): nas no//bsgrubs pa de dang gzhan dag kyang //des ni yang deng yang du bsam//ji ltar bsams pa 'grub bya'i phying //byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gsum gyis//de dag thams cad byin chu cing //
347a6(rgyud): yid la sngags kyang bzlas brjod bya//bdag gis bsod nams stobs dang ni//de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin stobs dngong //chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs kyi su//sems can rnams la bon 'dod
347a7(rgyud): pas//den rnams gang dag bsams pa kun//sems can khams ni mya lus 'dir//de dag thams cad ce rigs par//thogs pa med par 'byung gyur cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
347a8(rgyud): nga'i tshe rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo stobs na mkha' dang 'dra ba na mkha'i mdzod 'byung ba gsungs//na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/khi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tad khe ud ga ta s+pha ra Na ti me ga ga na
347b1(rgyud): swAhA/'di lan gsum bzlas na ji ltar bsams pa'i don thams cad thogs pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur//de nas zla ba nya ba'i tshe/mi de sgrub la 'jug par bya//rwa rtsa dang nI ba lang
347b2(rgyud): skyes//chu mdo'i ma ya na dur khrod dam//lam gyi gzhi mdo 'am shing gcig drung //ma me'i gnas sam zhig gnas//bgegs rnams tha~Md myos 'gyur ba'i//dkyil 'khor
347b3(rgyud): nges pas mnyan par gyis//kun tu grung zhi lham pa ste//sgo gcig pa la mu rani can//thams cad kha dog ser po la//rdo rje dkyil 'khor mo chog bris nas//rdo rje sbrel ba'i
347b4(rgyud): tshul gyis su//rdo rjes phan tshun 'bral par bya//sgor ni sgo srung gnyis bri ba//gdul dka' dang ni mngon phyogs gnyis//mig dmar khro dang bcas pa la//khros shing bsdig pa
347b5(rgyud): byed pa bri//mdung rtse gsum pa grwa rnamasu//nan tan du ni bri bar bya//dbus rdo rje'i gdan yid 'ong //kha ni kun tu lte bar bri//de'i steng pad+ma chen po ni//'dab ma brgyad pa ze bar btsos//
347b6(rgyud): rgyal bkun la byug byas nis//sprin lam nye bar sgrur byed cing //phyag ni rdo rje blo can gyis//rdo rje'i bya rgya bcings na su//de nas dad+ma sa byis der 'dug ste//spangs pa'i rdzas ni blangs
347b7(rgyud): nas su//nang gi dog nyid rnam dag pas//mkhyen go cig thal byung bzlas brjid bya//de nin mo gyi byed dus sum//ring ni nyi ma 'cha /rdzas de yongs su
348a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni//'bar phreng can gyis gzi brjid bzhin//sngags pa rang gis de drangs na//na mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur//bskal par gnas shing gzi brjid che//
348a2(rgyud): rgyal sras de ni 'dod na mchi//'jig rten khams ni gzhan du'ang 'gro/gtso bo sna tshogs gzugs 'chang ba//rdzas las byung ba'i sngags bsgrubs pas//dpal ldan mchod par rab tu byed//
348a3(rgyud): 'di ni nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i//rdzas kyi dngos grub yin par bshad//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la brtag pa 'di rgyu mtshan du mdzad nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs
348a4(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par thugasu chud pa rnams kyis rtag pa de nyid rang bzhin gyis stong par
348a5(rgyud): mkhyen kyang thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs kyis 'dus ma byas pa gdags par brtags te/yongasu bsgyur ba'i tshul du mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi
348a6(rgyud): dbyings kyi mthu rlabs po che sems can rnams la nges par ston to//des de rnams yid rab tu dga' zhing tshe ring po yang rab tu thob nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gi rtse dga' yongasu
348a7(rgyud): spyod la/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i lam 'di 'grub par 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub seMdal
348b1(rgyud): mkhan ka mamamamacamams samam mams mtham/amam thas mam sa mtha sams tham sa/mtshan mas gsa' ma mams ma al as thasas tham sa la
348b2(rgyud): rnams kyis kyang don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi cho ga thugs dgyes bzhin du 'chada'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang bskal pa du mar rtsol zhing 'bad de bya dka' ba rnams brtsams
348b3(rgyud): kyang thob par mi 'gyur ba de byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis tshe 'di gcig kho na la thob par 'gyuraro//gsang ba pa'i bdag po
348b4(rgyud): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas de bzhon du rgyal mtshan nam/ral gri 'am/gdugs sam/mchil lham mAm/yid
348b5(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu 'am/lig bu mig gam/gi wang blangs te bzlas brjod sum 'bumo byas la da ltar bsgrubs na de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyuraro//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
348b6(rgyud): 'am/rigs kyi bu mo thabs dang ldan pas yid la 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams bsgrubs na de dag rang go sems kyi dbang tsam kho nas yong su 'grub par 'gyur ro//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag
348b7(rgyud): rgyu las 'bras bu mngon par 'dod pa'i mi blun po de dag ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rgyu ni byed par ma gsungs
348b8(rgyud): 'bras bu'ang de la yod ma yin//rgyu ni rgyu yis stong pas na//de ni ji ltar rgyur yang 'gyur//de bas gsang sngags 'bras bu ni//rgyu dang las bral shos par bya//gang tshe mtshan ma med pa
349a1(rgyud): yi ti 'dzin ji lta bzhin rig pa// cha sngags pas dngon grub no//yid las yang dag 'byung ba thAg//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la bya na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gnam/
349a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzhi rnams dngos grub tu sgrub pa'i tshig gang gis rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo rnams mthong ba'i chos nyid la rab tu dga' zhing
349a3(rgyud): bde ba la reg par gnas la chos kyis dbyings kyang 'gal bar mi 'gyur ba de yang bshad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das da ci'i slad du zhe na/chos kyi dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings/
349a4(rgyud): lags te/de yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan to//bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpa' gsang spor
349a5(rgyud): kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas na chos kyi dbyings dbyer med rtogs par khong du chud par bgyi 'tshalo//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la
349a6(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/gsang ba po'i bdag po logaso leg so//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongasu dri bar sems pa ni yang leg so//de'i phyir nyon la liDa
349a7(rgyud): par rab tu yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad//bcom ldan 'das lagaso zhes gsol nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la mnyan po dang /bcom
349b1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gsang ba pa'i bdag pa de la a zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa byung ste/gtsug lag khang ngam/phug gam/gnas gang du yang rung ste/yan lag rdo
349b2(rgyud): e zhes bya ba bzhag la bzlas brjod gsum 'bum bya'o//de nas zla ba nya ba'i tshe ci 'byor pas ma chod pa byas la/de srid du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'am/'jam dpal lam/
349b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin chen po gang yang rung ba gcig 'ong ste/mag la nyug gam legaso zhes zer gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas phyag byas te mchod yin phul nas byang chub kyi sems mi brjed
349b4(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur//de bzhin du sems yang ba dang /lus yang bar goms par bya zhing bzlas bod+d+had byas ni de'i lus rnam par dag pa dang /sems rnam par dag par 'gyur//
349b5(rgyud): a zhes bya ba rnam par bzhag ste bzlas brjid byas na rna ba rnam par dag par 'gyur//'on te srog gzung bar 'dod no A zhes bya ba srog dang lhan cig tu byas la dus gsum du bsams pa
349b6(rgyud): byas na yun reng du gnas par 'gyur//de nyid kyi steng du klad kor bzhag na gnas pa dang /'gro ba'i dug thams cad 'byin to//de nas gzi con dbang du byA bar 'dod na/a zhes bya ba bdag
349b7(rgyud): tu byas pa las de bzhin mi dbang po//gcig la pad+ma bzhag par bya//gzhan la yang ni dur bzhag ste//gcig lo gcig ni gdong bltas na//de yi mod la dbang du 'gyur//de nas
350a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pA la gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje de bzhin na
350a2(rgyud): pa rnams kyi thugs las byung ba zhes bya ba las dang bya bas rnam par rol pas/spyod pa'i rol mo rim par phye ba rgyas pa/khams bzhi yang dag par bsdu bar bsdus pa sems kyi rgyal ba la/
350a3(rgyud): gnas pa na mkha' ltar kun tu khyab pa/mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu mong ba nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon sum po/gsang
350a4(rgyud): sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/las sna tshogs dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa yod
350a5(rgyud): kyis/de nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad//lag na rdo rje de la spyod pa'i rol mo las dang /bya bas mngon par 'grub pa'i bras bu phal che ba lus can
350a6(rgyud): kun gyi mngon sum pa gang zhe na/cho ga shes pas thog mar ni//bdag gi de nyid rims bzhin bya//sngags pa snga ma bzhin 'dug la//de bzhin gshegs pa dran byas te//bdag nyid
350a7(rgyud): oM zhes bya ba ni//klad kor bcas dang rgyas byas pa//thams cad shin tu ser zhing bzang //gru bzhi rdo rje mtshan byas te//sngags pas der gnas rdzogs pa yi//sangs rgyas kun gyi ga
350b1(rgyud): bo bsam//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//bdag gi de nyid yin par gsungs//nam zhig sngags pas bdag gis ni//de nyid dogs pa med 'gyur ba//de tshe 'jig rten thams cad la//phan pa
350b2(rgyud): byed pa nyid du 'gyur//ngo mtshar sna tshogs dag dang ldan//mig 'phrul can gyi gnas la 'dug/sngags pa nam zhig mnyam bzhag na//srid pa rab tu dogs pa na//thogs med dus nas mi shes pas//
350b3(rgyud): bsags pa'i las de kun zad 'gyur//bla na med pa'i byang chub sems//sems de nam zhig sgom byed pa//de'i tshe'ang sngags pa rnal 'byor pa//chu yis pad+ma lta bur ni//dge dang mi dge 'bras
350b4(rgyud): 'byung ba'i//las kyi rtag par migs ni//'di bdag nyid ni rgyal mchog tu//bsgyur na smos kyang ci zhig dgos//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bdud bzhi las rgyal ba rdo rje rna ri rol
350b5(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig bdud bzhi las rgyal bar byed pa/rgyud drug las grol ba byed pa/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par byed
350b6(rgyud): ba 'di rnams gsung so//na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAn/A bI ra hUM khaM/de nA lnga gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang /rdo rje 'dzini de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa de
350b7(rgyud): dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag tha~Md ngo mtshar du gyur nas mig mi 'dzums par thams cad mkhyen pa la spyi bos phyog 'tshal te tshig 'di skad ces brjod//byang chub
351a1(rgyud): sems dpa' skyob rnams dang //sangs rgyas kun gyi nor gyi dbyig/'dis ni gang dag sangs rgyas dang //byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang //rang sang+yas dang nyan thos
351a2(rgyud): pa/mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'dir//sangs rgyas ye shes bla med pa//dpe med ye shes thob na su//rdzu 'phrul sna tshogos rnam 'phrul pas//sa steng kun tu rnam par spyod//de bas
351a3(rgyud): 'di dag so so yi//cho ga rgyas pa dag dang las//sna tshogs dgod pa thams cad kyang //bstan pa 'di la bshad du gsol//des ni gsang sngags spyod pa yi//theg tshon bla na med
351a4(rgyud): pa la//sems can rnams ni dga' bzhin du//mthong ba'i chos la gnas par 'gyur//de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/'jam pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/khyed
351a5(rgyud): rnams 'thun par rtse gcig tu//mnyam par zhog la 'di nyon cig/de'i tshe sa gzhi rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs te nyid kyi sku las byang chub kyi snying po can nye bar bstan par bzhed nas
351a6(rgyud): gsungs pa/a ni mchog tu shes bya ba//dbang chen dkyil 'khor ldan pa ste//phyi rol dang ni nong du yang //rdo rje dkyil 'khor shes par bya//der 'dug nas ni thad bsam//rnal 'byor
351a7(rgyud): gnas shes bshad pa yin//a ni srog gi dam pa ste//'gug par byed pa'i mchog tu bshad//nam zhig klad kor gyis mnan na//lus can kun gyi sel bar 'gyur//sngags/
351b1(rgyud): pas nam zhig zla gcig tu//rdo rje can gyis rgya bcings nas//dus gsum bzlas brjod byas na ni//mi shos grong khyer 'joms par 'gyur//lha dang lha min rnams kyis kyang //mi phyed shin tu brtan par//
351b2(rgyud): 'gyur//bdag gi rnyed pa grub bya'i phyir//rgyas pa'i las ni gang cung zad//de kun rtag tu sngags pa yis//dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbusu bya//gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas//thor tshugs dbu
351b3(rgyud): rgyan 'chang ba yi//rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas ting 'dzin bzhugs//dbang chen gyi ni gzhi zhes bya//rdo rje pad+ma ral gri dang //de bzhin dang par bshad pa dang //gser dag dang ni sa dag dang //yang
351b4(rgyud): nr-i yid bzhin nor bu'ang rung //de la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni//dbang chen du ni bsgoms te sgrub//mnan pa dag kyang bshad par byas//'di ni khyed kyis mnyam bzhag nyon//sngags pas mdor na
351b5(rgyud): re re ba ni//rtse mo brgyad pa bsam par bya//de'i steng bar du pad+ma bzhag/de yi rjes la rdo rje'o//der steng rnal 'byor pa yis ni//yi ge dam pa gtso bo ste//de yis spyi bor mnan na ni//de ni mi g.yo
351b6(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur//sman la yang ni lan brgya ru//bzlas brjod byas te mis 'thungs na//sngon gyi las los byung ba yI//de yi nad rnams 'byung bar 'gyur//de nas gzhan yang nges pa yis//ba
351b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba dam pa nyon//gangs dang 'o ma dung 'dra ba//lte ba'i dbus nas byung ba ste//pad+ma dkar por 'dab ma no//de yi dbus na rab tu gnas//mgon po dam pa rab tu zhi//ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od
352a1(rgyud): /dang 'dra//de yi dkyil 'khor ngo mtshar can//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad//kun tu dkar por bsam par bya//khyud khor rim pa dgus kyang bskor//gdungs pa
352a2(rgyud): thams cad zhi byed pa//smug zil 'dus pa'i nang na gnas//'o ma mu tog 'phreng dkar dang //shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba'i//chu rgyun rnams kyi 'khor yug tu//kun nas rab tu 'bar ba bzhin//
352a3(rgyud): sngags pas yid la bsams na ni//gdung ba kun las thar bar 'gyur//mnyam par bzhag pas dngos 'di rnams//dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bsgrub par bya//mar sar 'o ma mu tig phreng //de
352a4(rgyud): bzhin khyu mchog shel kyang rung //'o ma 'am yang na chu yang rung //de la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni//dngos grub sna tshogs 'grub phyir sgrub//tshe na ring por 'gyur ba dang //gzugs ni ngo
352a5(rgyud): mtshar tshor 'gyur dang //nad rnams kun las thar pa dang //skal ba bzang po mchog 'gyur dang //yid rno 'dzin par nus pa dang //shes rab shin tu dri med dang //bsgrubs pa'i rdzas ni
352a6(rgyud): 'di rnams kyis//de dag thams cad myur du 'grub//dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa 'dis//zhi bar byed par bshad pa yin//klad kyi 'khor dang bcas byas na//sel bar byed pa'i mchog
352a7(rgyud): tu 'gyur//ra zhes bya ba yang dag mchog/'ad can rnams kyi 'od ces bya//des ni las rnams gong cung zad//mtshams med lnga las byung ba yang //rnal 'byor shin tu mnyam bzhag
352b1(rgyud): nas//bsams na de kun zad par 'gyur//yid 'ongs thams cad rab tu dmar//gru gsum pa yi tshul du gnas//zhi ba 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs//sum mdo'i ris mtshan snying kar gzhag/
352b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa ni der 'dug nas//rwa no kled kor bcas par bsam//mi 'jigs pas ni tse rigs par//dngos po 'di dag der sgru'o//nyi ma dang ni gza' kun dang //de bzhin bsgrims te me dang ni//dbang
352b3(rgyud): du bya ba'i rdzas rnams dang //yang na khon par 'gyur ba dang //bskams pa dang ni bsad pa dang //de bzhin dgar dang gnod pa dag/me dang lhan cig 'di sbyar na//de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur//
352b4(rgyud): ha zhes bya ba dam pa mchog/rlung ni thams cad yang dag 'byung //rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu dang //gang gis sa bon rnams skye ba//'di ni klad kor bcas sbyar na//de dag thams cad 'jigs par
352b5(rgyud): byad//de yi gzugs kyang bshad pa ni//kha dog gnag la 'od po che//mi bzad 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs//kun tu yong ni rnam par 'phro//mkhas pos smin ma'i mtsham su ni//dkyil
352b6(rgyud): 'khor la ni gnas par bsam//de ni mthing ka zla gam 'dra//rtog dang bcas par ba dan g.yo//yi ge rab tu mi 'gyur ba//sngags pas der gnas bsam par bya//dkyil 'khor de yi dbusu
352b7(rgyud): ni//gang gis mthong ba kho na la//sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i//dngos grub rnams ni de tshe sgrub//mkha' la 'gro ba nyid dang ni//yang na rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang //lha yi mig dang rna ba dang //
353a1(rgyud): sngags pas de ngabazhin 'thob pa dang //mi snang ba la sogs kun dang //dbye bA dag kyang gang gsungs pa//sngags par mnyam par bzhag pa yis//kyil 'khon gnas na de kun
353a2(rgyud): byed//'di ni rnying pa byang chub 'dir//byang chub sems dpa' glegs chen rnams//rgyu kun dmig su med sgo nas//bdud las rnam par rgyalta bar byed//rgyu med pas na 'bras bu nga med//las kyi
353a3(rgyud): yid pa ma yin te//dngos po de gsum med pas na//stong pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthu chen gyis//de'i gzugs yang dag bshad pa ni//klad kor bcas par
353a4(rgyud): ldan pa ste//khams ni stong pa'i mchog ces bya//ral gri phyag rgyar ldan pa yis//bsgrub par bya ba nges par sgrub//ral gri zhags pa 'khor lo dang //lcags mda' de bzhin tho ba ste//
353a5(rgyud): rdzas de rnams dang ldan na ni//go 'phang dam pa sgrub par byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gseng ba pa'i bdag po phya bra na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po nam
353a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas bdag nyid i zhes bya ba'i rang gi ngo bor bsgyur nas phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i dngos po thams cad la me lha
353a7(rgyud): bar gyur cing /bong ba dang /rdo ba dang /gser du mtshungs pa la/'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyes pa rnams dang sdig po'i las rnam par spangs pa de tshe de ni ngag gyur pa/
353b1(rgyud): thub pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin//des nA las rnams thams cad nus//nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs//de nas gzhan sngags rnal 'byor la//gzhol zhing chog shes pa yis//son rnam
353b2(rgyud): la phan 'dod pas//ba zhes bya ba'i las bya'o//snying rje las byung sems kyis ni//'jig rten sdug bsngal la dmigs nas//mgon po de yis bdag nyid kyi//lus ni thams cad nyid du yang //
353b3(rgyud): grangs dang ba yi 'o ma ltar//dkar ba'i rgyun gyis yongasu dgang //de tshe nges pa bskyed na bu//yan lag rnams ni thams cad kyi//ba spu'i bu ga kun nas kyang //shin tu dri med chu rgyun 'byung //chu
353b4(rgyud): yis sa ni ma lus pa//'di dag yangasu dgang bar bya//gang gis chud de 'thungs pas 'ang //dag pas kyang ni reg kyang rung //de kun nges par byang chub tu//'gyur te 'di la dogs pa med//yan
353b5(rgyud): lag kun tur zhes pa//'bar ba'i phreng ba zhi bas 'khrigs//kun tu rnam par 'phro ba ni//shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsams//de tshe rnal 'byor pa yis phyir//'bar ba kun tu snang byed pa//
353b6(rgyud): btAng na ra yas rnam sprul pas//sngags pa 'dod pa bzhin du byed//ra zhes bya ba ro stong du//ba zhes bya ba lte ba khung //'bar ba dang ni chu 'bab pa//ngo tshe cig char sngon par 'gyur//dmyal ba grang
353b7(rgyud): nga'i sdug bsngal rnams//ras ni shin tu zhi bar byed//sngags pa sngags kyi tshul gnas pas//bas kyang tsha la sogs pa bzhi//ha zhes bya ba ba dan bcas//ra zhes bya ba'i 'og tu gzhag/
354a1(rgyud): sdig dang ldan pa'i mi rnams kyang //de yis las rnams myur du sgrub//sngags pa dbang chen la 'dug nas//chu yi las ni brtsams par bya//sel ba la sogs tha~Md kyang //
354a2(rgyud): byed 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//rlung ni kun tu 'gro bar gsungs//thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'ang de//rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i//las rnams dbye ba las byung ba//gzugs kyi
354a3(rgyud): kyil 'khor dbus ni//cho ga 'di yi rab tu bya//yid yo u sbyong zhing bzlas brjod byas na yid rnam par dag par 'gyur//lus yang bar goms par byed cing 'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod
354a4(rgyud): byed na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thab par 'gyur ro//tsog pur 'dug lo a zhes bya ba rno por bzhag ste/zla ba gcig tu bzlas na lha'i rna ba thob par 'gyuraro//gsang ba pa'i bdag po dngos grub
354a5(rgyud): kyi go 'phang de lta bu la sogs pa dag na yid las byung ba yin//gsang ba pa'i bdag po rnam par bsams pa tsam kha nas dngos po gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyi 'du byed rnam pa tha dad
354a6(rgyud): pa sna tshogs las thams cad pa'i sa bon gyi bya ba chog tu brjod pa tsam las byung ba la ltos/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad dang rje su 'thun pa/
354a7(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi bsams pa dang 'thun pa/sems can thams cad la yang dag par mgu bar mdzad pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' las thams cad dang /gsang sdig spyad pa
354b1(rgyud): spyod pa rnams kyi mdun na gzugs brtan lta bur bzhug so//de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rnam par mi rtag cing yid kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa dus dang /yul dang /bya ba dang /las
354b2(rgyud): ches dang /chos ma yin pa rnams spangs kyang //gsang sngags spyod pa lus byung ba'i//thams cad mkhyen pa'i go dzi stsol//de bas kun mkhyen rnaMs grub dang //gau lang mchog kyang bsgru
354b3(rgyud): bya//de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin//ngo mtshar gyur nas myig bgrod//de tshe rdo rje 'od zer ni//me stag 'phro ba 'dra gsor zhing //sangs rgyas zhing ni 'di thams cad//kun tu snang bar byas nas//rgyas
354b4(rgyud): kun dbang phyug thub pa la//tshig snyan 'di skad ces gsolo//sngags kyi 'jug pa bshad lags na//'jug pa de yang ma gtogs nas//gsang sngags gang nas 'ong ba dang //gang du 'gro ba
354b5(rgyud): gtso khyod kyis//de kun bdag la bshad du gsol//go 'phang dam pa khyod las med//khyod ni ji ltar chu rnams kyang //rgya mtsho bzhin du chas kun gnas//de skad ces gsol pA dang /brjes
354b6(rgyud): kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sems dpa' chen po dkyil 'khor gyi//gnas ni yid ces bshad pa yin//snying ni gsang sngags gnas yin papa/
354b7(rgyud): na 'bras bu thob par 'gyur//dkar po ser po dmar po gang //yid kyis sems par byed pa ste//de la yongasu gcod pa gang //de ni sems kyis byed pa yin//sems ni mgunas nges
355a1(rgyud): gyur pa//de ni snying zhes bshad pa yin//der gnas pa yi gsang sngags rnams//'bras bu rgya chen stor bar 'gyur//de ru bad+ma bsam pa ni//'dab ma brgyad par rma
355a2(rgyud): bapar bcas//A zhes bya ba 'bar phreng 'khrigs//bzang po dri ru gnas pa ni//zhi ba kun tu rnam par g.yo//gtso ba sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba//glog stong dag ni 'khrug pa bzhin//snang
355a3(rgyud): pa kun tu ston pa ni//me long phug na gnas pa bzhin//chu yi zla ba'i rnam pa bzhin//thams cad na yang mdun na gnas//sngags pa gsang sngags gnas 'dug pas//yid ni da ltar shes
355a4(rgyud): nasu/de nas sngags pas stong du yang //klad pa'i rgyas kyi dbus no//klad kor bcas pa'i mtshan ma can//aM zhes bya ba dor bsams te//shel dang zla ba gangs 'dra ba//dro med dag pa
355a5(rgyud): mthong ba ni//zhi ba chos kyi rang bzhin sku//thams cad kyi ni gzhi zhes bya//de las gsang sngags dngos grub ni//sna tshogs gzugs can thob par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
355a6(rgyud): gnas mthong na//mtho ris dang ni byang grol thog/ra zhes bya ba mar me bzhin//'bar ba mig tu bzhag nasu//mgrini pa cung zad rgu bor byas//lce yang dkan la bcar nas ni//snying kwa'i
355a7(rgyud): /gnas rnam blta zhing //mnyam por gzhag ste yid la ngolta//dri med shin tu rnam dag pa//rtag tu mi lang bzhin du gnas//de nyid yid kyi yang dag par//sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyi
355b1(rgyud): gsungs/de yid kyis snang byas lam la ni//rnam par shes pa snang bar 'gyur//de nas sngags pas rdzogs sangs rgyas//rkang gnyis gtso bo mthong bar 'gyur//de mthong sngags pas dngos grub ni//ya t+ta/
355b2(rgyud): rtag pa thob par 'gyur//de nas gang du bsgyur na su//yi ge yongasu bsam pa ni//la zhes bya ba klad kror bcas//mig gi gnasu bsam par bya//'od kun stong par mthong na ni//go 'phang me nyam+ba/
355b3(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//ye shes rlabs po che'om ni//yang na mngon shes lnga po dang //rigs sngags 'chang 'gyur dngos grub dang //tshe ring gzhon nur 'gyur po gang //gal te thob par 'dod na ni//
355b4(rgyud): ji srid 'di ni ma bstan par//de srid thob par mi 'gyuraro//gsang sngags ye shes las byung ba//'di ni de nyid ye shes mchog/byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa dang //sangs rgyas kun gyi nor
355b5(rgyud): gyi dbyig/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //nyan thos nges pa dag dang ni//sangs rgyas ye shes mchog gyur pa//ye shes dpe meng thob nasu//dri yos sa steng thad du//gnas shing de
355b6(rgyud): ni gtam yang zer//rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las dngos grub sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o///
355b7(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzugs gang gis byang chub sems dpal gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang
356a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams lha'i gzugs la dmigs nas bdag nyid rang gi lha'i gzug su bsgyur nas the tshom ma mchis par dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i skul
356a2(rgyud): gzugs byin gyis rlob pa bshad du gsol//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gsang
356a3(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po gang khyod nga la don 'di yongasu 'dri ba ni leg so lag so//de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad//bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshalo//
356a4(rgyud): zhes gso nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsol to//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la lha'i gzugs
356a5(rgyud): ni rnam pa gsum ste/yi ge dang /phyag rgya dang /gzug so//de la yi ge yang rnam pa gnyis te/sgra dang byang chub kyi semaso//phyag rgya'o gzugs la'ang rnam pa gnyis te/gzugs dang bcas
356a6(rgyud): pa dang /gzugs dang bcas pa ma yin pa'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po lha'i gzugs kang rnam pa gnyis te/yongasu dag pa dang /yongasu ma dag pa'o//de la yongasu dag pa ni rtogs pa'i ngo bo
356a7(rgyud): ste mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'o//yong su ma dag pa ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i gzugs te/kha dog dang dbyibs//de la lha'i gzugs rnam pa gnyis kyis dgos pa rnam pa gnyis
356b1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur te/mtshan mdang bcas pas ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa'o//mtshan ma med pas ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i dngas gru kyang 'grub par 'gyur//mtshan mar bcas pas mtshan bcas s+ho//
356b2(rgyud): grub rgyal ba dam pa bzhed//mtshan ma med la gnas ngas ni//mtshan ma tsan yang sgrub tu rung //de bas rnam pa thams cad//mtshan ma med pa bstan par bya//rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon
356b3(rgyud): ra rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las lha'i ting 'dzin gtan la dbab pa rim par phye ba'o////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag
356b4(rgyud): na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/gsang ba po'o bdag po de la byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin sgrub par 'dod pas 'di ltar
356b5(rgyud): bsam par bya'o//mtshan ma rnams glang nas byung /ci bdag gi lus sam/bdag gi sems sam/bdag gi yid las byung /de la lus ni las las skyes pa ste/rtsa dang shing dang bong ba lta bu ngo bo
356b6(rgyud): nyid kyis bya ba med pa/blun pa 'am phyi rol gyi rnam pa lta bu la bzos byas pa'i gzugs lta bur brtag par bya'o//'di ltar bzos byas pa'i gzugs de la mi zhig gis khros te me 'am/dug gam/
356b7(rgyud): mtshon tam/chu'am/rdo rjes bshig gam/bsregs sam/bcad kyang mi dga' ba cung zad kyang med la/bza' ba 'am/btung ba 'am/bkru ba 'am/byug pa'i spos sam/phreng ba 'am/
357a1(rgyud): gos sam tsan dan nam/ga bur la sogs pa lha dang mi'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod kyang mi de la dga' bar 'gyur ba yang medo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang ngo bo nyid kyis
357a2(rgyud): stong pa'i gzugs de la rang gi nga rgyal kun nas bslang ba'i phyin ci log gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa las byung ba'i mchod pa 'am/gnod par byed pa'i ming gang yin pa de ni byis pa'i rang
357a3(rgyud): bzhin can yino//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar lus la lus kyi rjesu song ba'i dran pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa bsgom par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang sems ni ngo bo nyid med pa
357a4(rgyud): mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba/ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bsam par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems la ni dus gsum medo//dus gsum dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid kyis
357a5(rgyud): mtshan ma dang bral ba'o snyam du bsam par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams yid mtshan ma dang bcas par rtogs te/'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
357a6(rgyud): kun tu rtogs pa'i tshig bla dag so//yang dge ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni ma skyes pa'o//zhes bya bar ni rab tu mi shes//gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo
357a7(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas de ltar bsams na mtshan ma med pa'i tingange 'dzin thob par 'gyuraro//gsang ba pa'i bdag po nam mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas par gyur///
357b1(rgyud): pa de'i tshe de la de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsang sngags rnams mngon du phyogs shing gzhol bar 'gyur ro//rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa
357b2(rgyud): byin gyis rlob pa las mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin rim par phye ba'o///gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang bzlas brjod gsang ba bshad par bya'o//gcig pus
357b3(rgyud): gcig gam gcig gis gcig/yid kyi bzlas brjod bya ba 'am//yang na shu pu rnam gnyis pa'o//rnal 'byor mchog gis brtag par bya//sngags pa yan lag nyam sbyar bar//bzlas brjod
357b4(rgyud): gzhan du mi bya'o//phyi dang nang gi sbyor ba yis//yan lag bzhi pas ngas bshad pa//de yang 'jig rten pa yi ste//dmigs pa can ni bla med pa//slar sdud pa yi tshigs non//lha yi rje su song
357b5(rgyud): ba'i yid//gau shubs te bzlas brjod byed pa'i mchog/dmigs pa can la bstan pa yin//yid kyi 'jig rten 'das shes bya//slar sdud la sogs rnam par spangs//lha dang gcig tu byed pa dang //
357b6(rgyud): tha dad ma yin 'dzin pa yis//yid kyis rang bzhin dbyer med bya//gzhan du bya ba ma yino//gsang sngags grangs ni sum 'bum du//bal tsher ngas ni bshad pa dag/lus can sdig dang bral ba yi//
357b7(rgyud): sngags pa rnam par dag pa la//bzlas brjod grangs 'di bstan pa ste//gzhan du bya ba ma yino//rnam par snang mjed chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa lnga//
358a1(rgyud): 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas brjod kyi de kho na nyid ma par phye ba'o//de nam yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa
358a2(rgyud): 'dus pa la gzigs nas byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i spyan gnyis kyis kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad la gzigs te/bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par 'u
358a3(rgyud): sobacom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu yan log thams cad nas dus gsum du ma chags pa'i stobs can zhes bya ba'i rog sngags kyi rgyal me b+h+yo //tad+ya thA/ga ga nas me/a pra
358a4(rgyud): tis me/sarba te thA ga ta sa ma tA na ga ga te ga gan ba ra la k+Sha Ne swA hA/rigs kyi bu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gnyi su med pa'i spyod yul can
358a5(rgyud): te/'di yis byin rlabs sangs rgyas dang //byang chub sems dpa'i grags chen rnams//gang du sdug bsngal 'gag 'gyur ba'i//chos nyid chags med 'grub par 'gyur//de nas bac+doMs
358a6(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjesu dgongs nas bdag nyid dang phyag na rdo rje gnyis ka gzod ma na snga ma skyes pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs te/phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa/
358a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin rnams la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad po spyod pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa so sor nye bar
358b1(rgyud): gnas pa yi ge'i 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor spyad pa rim par phye ba rgyas pa nyon cig/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal te/rdo rje pad+ma'i stan
358b2(rgyud): de las rdo rje 'bab pa'i tshul gyis babs nas bcom ldan 'das lo mngon par bstod pa/phyag 'tshal byang chub sems khyod la//phyag 'tshal byang chub 'byung khyod la//spyod gzugs khyod dang sa dang ni//
358b3(rgyud): pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshalo//phyag 'tshal thog mar byed khyod la//stong pa nyid la 'dud phyag 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces mngon par bstod
358b4(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di spyod ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje bdag cig la thugs brtse ba'i skadadu gang dag dang ldan na bdag cag rnams sems can gyi don bgyid par 'gyur
358b5(rgyud): ba dang /gsang sngags spyad pa ji skad gsungs pa bzhin yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba bsha du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag
358b6(rgyud): lho phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//nga ni 'jig rten dang po yi//'jig rten mgon zhes bsgrags pa yin//bla med gzod nas zhi ba ni//mnyam pa med pa'i chos bshad//de nas bac+doMs
358b7(rgyud): kyimo tshig su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas/byin gyis brlabs gang gis byin gyis brlabs na/byang chub sems dpa' de rnam pa dang /rdo rje 'dzin de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi

359b6(rgyud): gyi gzugs/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs stong pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs la/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa mngon du byed cing srad bu bres la phyi rol gyi dkyil

360a1(rgyud): nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du ni phyag rgyas byon gyis brlangs pa/chos kyi dbyings rgya chen por byin gyis brla sa twe/thog ma mtshan ci dkar po blas la 'di/

360a3(rgyud): blo can gyis bsams nas//der ni ra zhes bya ba yang //zhi ba 'bar ba phreng can mdog/dung zlo kun da 'dra ba bsam//de nas tshon rtsi gnyis pa ni//dmar po blangs nas nan tan du//yi hri/

361a1(rgyud): dri'aM/a shar phyogasus su rgyas thams cad kyi a zhes bya ba klad kar dang bcas dA'o// dadang ldan gyi phyog su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum bcom ldan 'das rnam pa'i spyan
361a2(rgyud): bri'o//yang na yi ge gi zhes bya ba dri'o//ga me'i phyogasu byang chub sems dnga'i thams cad kyi phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'am/yi ge ka zhes bya ba bri'o//ka byang phyogasu lag na pad+ma 'khor byang

361b1(rgyud): nas phyogs pa nir srung ba chen po bzhi dgad do//de pA shar byag du mi 'jibs pa zhes bya ba'i srung ba chen ma gsar gyi kha dog 'dra ba/gos dkar po ljon pa/yid tsam khra ba'i gdong //lag na

364a1(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal mo thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs can/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i stobs can/dam tshig la 'jug par byed pa stobs gsum dang ldan pa byu //na maHsa
