364a6(rgyud): d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo thams cad bzlog ste/bsnol la mthe bong gnyi spyadado//phyag rgya dpal dang ldan pa 'di//chos kyi 'khor la zhe su bsgrigs//
364a7(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi//'khor lo rab tu 'di bskoraro//gsang sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/badz+ra At+ma ko&ho/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar/
364b1(rgyud): la mdzub mo gnyis mthe bong gnyis kyi steng du bzhag ste ral gri lta bur bya'o//sangs rgyas skyong pa thams cad kyi//phyag rgya chen po ral gri'i rgya//'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa yi//'jig tshogs lta ba
364b2(rgyud): gcod par byed//gsang sngags na/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ma hA khaR+YA bi ra dza d+harma san d+ha ri sha ko sa ha dza sad ka ya d+huSh+TaM ts+tshi da kaM/tab+hU ga tA d+hi muk+to ni ra dza ti ba rA ga d+har+m+ma nr-i r-i dza ta hUM/de bzhin du lag pa gnyi
364b3(rgyud): khong stong du sbyar te/mdzub mo gnyis kyi mthe bong gnyis la dung lta bur bya'o//phyag rgya dpal ldan dam pa 'di//chos kyi dung zhes rnam par bsgrags//'dis ni 'jig rten 'di dag na//sa d+yas byang chub
364b4(rgyud): /sems dpa' rnams//zhi ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba//rdul dang bral ba'i chos 'chad//gsang sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/sar+b+ba thA oM/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo kun thal mo sbyar ba las
364b5(rgyud): brkyang ste dril bu ltar byas la/mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung rtse gcig tu sbed mdzub mo gnyis dang gung mo sprad//pad+ma dam pa dpal ldan 'di//sangs rgyas skyob pa thaMd kyi//mi shigs rdo rje'i gdan yI//
364b6(rgyud): te dang ni 'dren pa 'tshong rgya zhing //rgyal ba'i sras ni thams cad ni//'di la skyes dang byang chub 'gyur//gsang sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/a/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung
364b7(rgyud): mo gnyis gshibs te sgreng la/mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste ngos gnyi su bzhig la rdo rje ltar bya/mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis sgreng ste bzhag/srin lag gnyis lag pa'i nang du bzhago//phyag rgya
365a1(rgyud): can pa rdo rje'i rgya//ma shos grong khyer 'jig pa ste//sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'di//nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te bstan//gsang sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM hU~M/de bzhin
365a2(rgyud): du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gshobs te sgreng /mdzub mo gnyis ngos nas bkug ste sbyar//gtsu gau tor phyag rgya rgya chen te//gtsug tor zhes ni bsgrags pa yin//'di ni bcings
365a3(rgyud): btsam gyis kyang //rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur ba yin//'di'i sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/hU~MhU~M/lag pa gsus par khu tshur bcangs pa smin mtsham su bzhigo/rgyal ba dam pas phyag/
365a4(rgyud): /rgyurgya'adi//mdzod spu zhes ni rab tu bsgrags//'di ni bcings pa tsam gyi su//rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur ba yin//'di'i sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/a he dzaHblo rnga ni rnal 'byor tshul gonas
365a5(rgyud): /te/lag gnyis lci ba'i thad kar no//lhung bzed 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya//lhung bzed phyag rgya zhesu bsgrags//rgya 'di shAkya thub pa'i ste//lhung bzed chen po zhes bya'o//'di'i sngags ni/nA ma
365a6(rgyud): sa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/b+ha/de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa gyen du sgreng la mi 'jigs po sbyin pa lta bur bya'o//sems can kun+da la mi 'jigs pa//de yis rab tu sbyin par 'gyur//gang gis rgyu
365a7(rgyud): chen de bcings na//mi 'jigs phyag rgya zhes bsgragaso//'di'i gsang sngags ni/no maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/sar+b+ba thA dzi na dzin b+hi k+Sha yan+da shAn sAhA/de bzhin du log pa g.yas pa smad dam pa/
365b1(rgyud): sbyin pa ltar bya'o//'di ni dam pa sbyin rgya zhes//'jig rten mgon po rnams kyis bsgrags//'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis//rgyal mchog dam pa stsal bar 'gyur//'di'i gsang sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta
365b2(rgyud): bud d+hAnAM/ba r-i da badz+ra At+ma ko&haM sta~Mdz+dza/lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo brkyang la dpral bar khro gnyer lnga bur bya'o//phyag rgya chen po rgya chen 'di//sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi//
365b3(rgyud): bdud ni rnam par bsdigs shes bya//phung byed thams cad 'jigs par byed//'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis//bdud sde shin tu mi zad dang //bgegs dang log 'dren gzhan dag kyang //the tshom med pa
365b4(rgyud): /rab tu 'byer//'di'i gsang sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ma hA ba liM bi ti da sha ba la te dzod b+he be ma hA maM t+ya b+hU da ga te swA hA/de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur b.rangs la gung mo dang srin
365b5(rgyud): lag gnyis brkyang ste mthe bo'i drung du bzhag/'di ni sangs rgyas mgon rnams kyi//thugs rje las byung spyan yin te//mig gi steng du mkhas pas bzhag/de las sangs rgyas spyan du 'gyur//'di'i
365b6(rgyud): /gsang sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ga ga na ba ra lak+Sha NAM kA ru Nam+ba ya ta thA ga ta tsak+ShaHswA hA/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol po'i khu tshur bcangs te/
365b7(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis sgreng la bkug ste sbrid la zlum por bya/'di ni zhags pa mchog ces grags//sdang ba thams cad 'jigs par byed//sngags ngas 'di bcings de yi tshe//rtag tu sdang ba bcings pa
366a1(rgyud): d+ha /'gyur/di'i gsung sugs ni//nam a man du rmA/hoHmat+mad+ha sha pras pa ba matsaka/d+hAHga ta mar+d+harmAk+ShAn d+hArmAH/de bzhin du lag dag
366a2(rgyud): tu sbyar te/khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo sbrang te tshigs gsum pa bkug la/lhag ma rnams gdu bu'i tshul du gnas par bya'o//sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi//lcags kyu zhes ni 'di
366a3(rgyud): bshod//byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid tshe//sa bcu dag la gnas pa dag/sdang bar sems pa gzhan dag kyang //thams cad rab tu 'gugs par byed//'di'i gsang sngags ni/na maH
366a4(rgyud): sa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/sarba thA/a pra ti ha ta thA ga ta aM ku sha bo d+hi ts+tshar+ya pa ri pU ra ka swA hA/lcags kyu'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis bkug ste de nyid du sbyararo//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
366a5(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/dz+nyA nod b+ho ba swA hA/phyag rgya de nyid las srin log gnyis sgreng la lhag ma rnams de bzhin du bzhig/de bzhin gshegs pa'i lte ba'i phyag
366a6(rgyud): rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa mAn+ta bud d+hA nAM/a mr-i tAd b+ha ba swA hA/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis kyang sgreng la lhag ma rnams de bzhin du bzhago/rked pa'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngagaso la/
366a7(rgyud): namaHsa man+ta bud d+hA rmA/ta thA ga ta ti sa~M b+ha ba swA hA/de bzhin du lag pa gaunyis khong stong du sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste nang du gzhug/srin lag gnyis kyang de bzhin du bya//mthe bong dang
366b1(rgyud): mams samamams mtham/thasam/am ma sa/ na ma ma mamal
366b2(rgyud): mthe'u chung gnyis cung zad bkug/gung mo gnyis gshings te slo //'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste/'di'i gsang sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA/ra ra~M swAH/phyag rgya de nyid las
366b3(rgyud): srin lag gnyis phyung la sbreng ste bzhag/mtshams chen po bcad pa'i phyag rgya ste/'di'i gsang sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/be lu du ri/bi ku ri bi ku la~M swA hA/mtshams chen po btad pa'o//de
366b4(rgyud): nyid las gung mo gnyis bkug la mthe bong gnyis sgre //srung ba chen mo'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ta thA ga te b+h+yo/sar+b+ba b+ha ya bi ga te b+h+yo/bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA hi khaM
366b5(rgyud): /k+Sha ma hA ba lA sarba ta thA ga pu N+ya nir dza ti hU~M hU~M tra Ta traT/a pra ti ha te swA hA/mi bzod pa zhes bya ba srung ba chen mo'o//de bzhin du mdzub mo gaunyis brkyang la mthe bong gnyis nang du gzhog/kun tu 'bar/
366b6(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/gsod sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/dz+wA la mA li ti ni ta thA ga ta artsi swA hA/kun tu 'bar ba'o//de bzhin du lag po gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la mdzub mo
366b7(rgyud): gnyis kyis ngos nas dkri'o//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i go che'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/pra tsaN+Da badz+ra dza ya bi s+phu ra hU~M/de bzhin gshegs po'i cho ga'o//phyag
366b8(rgyud): rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis dang /mthe bong gnyis gcig tu sbyar//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags kyi phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ta thA ga ta dzi hA sid d+hi d+hAr+m+ma pr-i/
367a1(rgyud): tiSh+Thi to swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljag s+ho//phyag rgya de nyid la mdzub mo gnyis dang /srin lag gnyis bkug la nang du sbyar/mthe bong gnyis sgreng la cung zad bkug ste/rtse mo gung/
367a2(rgyud): mo la phyogs par bya'o//mthe'u chung gnyis ni snga ma bzhin//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal chen po'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ta thA gA ta mahA b+hAk+Sh+ma bi dz+nyA na ma ho
367a3(rgyud): da ya swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zha'o//phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkrol la nang du bcug ste/rku bor byas la bstod de bzung ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i mche ba'i phyag rgya ste/
367a4(rgyud): gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ta thA ga ta ma hA daMSh+TA sa ra sa ra sA grA saM pra b+ha ka sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bi ShA ya saM b+ha ba swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mche ba'o//phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo
367a5(rgyud): gnyis sgreng ste bzung la tshigs gsum pa dgug go//de bzhin gshegs pa'i so sra yang dag par rig pa'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/a tsin t+ya ad b+hU ta ru pa pA
367a6(rgyud): ga saM pra ti pad+hi bi shud d+hA swa ra swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu thal mo khong du sbyar te/mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis
367a7(rgyud): nang du bcug le gcig tu sprad//'di ni stobs bcu'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/da sha ba la ga d+ha ra hUM saM dzaM swA hA/stobs bcu'i phyag rgya dang sngagaso//phyag rgya de
367b1(rgyud): nyid las mtho bong gnyis kyi rtse mor mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste sbyararo//dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA rA/ta thA ga tap+l-i ti satratwa hi ta ad b+hU ta ga gnas ma sa ma
367b2(rgyud): snahA/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags//phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis mthe bo'i steng du bzung //gsang sngagasi la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/sar+b+ba d+harmA ma tA b+hA pA ta thA ga
367b3(rgyud): taMte a nug ta swA hA/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngagaso//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te/mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mi dkris la lhag ma
367b4(rgyud): rnams na de bzhin du bzhag/kun tu bzang po'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/sa man+ta nug to ba rI go d+harma nir dza ta ma hA ma hA swA hA/yid bzhin gyi nor
367b5(rgyud): bu'i gsang sngagaso//phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi nang du bkug la bzhag/lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no//'di'i gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/a dzi tany+dza
367b6(rgyud): ya sar+b+ba trA sha yA nu ga ta swAhA/byams pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngagaso//phyag rgya de nyid lngas mthe bong gnyis nang du gzhug/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/A kA sha saM ma tA nu ga ta bi
367b7(rgyud): tsitrai ba~M r-i d+ha ra sA tI/na mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags//phyag rgya nyid las srin lag gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis nang du bcug la/mdzub mo gnyis gung mi dang lhan cig tu sbyar/
368a1(rgyud): mamamamamatshams samamamacas mthamasamasamamathal ya al mas la ma khams ya lamasam mala' mas la lams yang ma

368a3(rgyud): po lnga pa//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyo ra la sor thams cad dril bu 'dra bar /mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis gcig tu sbyar le lha ma rnams ni pad+ma lta bur bya'o//
368a4(rgyud): gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te kA ru tA mA ya ra ra ra hU~M dzaHswA hA/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngagaso//de bzhin du log pa
368a5(rgyud): gnyis thel mo khong rdzong du sbyar la/zla ba ma bye ba lta bur bya'o//pad+ma phyug rgyu dang gsang thog si le/no moHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/rdo dzi swAhA/mthu chen po thob pa'i pad+mo phyag rgya dang gsang sngags//
368a6(rgyud): de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo can du sgreng ste/mthe bong gnyis kyang de'i drung du bzhag/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/tA re tA ra Ni ka ru Nod b+ha baM swA hA/

368a8(rgyud): mi'i'o//de bzhin du log pa gnyis thag mo khong stong du sbyar la srin lag gnyis dang mthe bong gnyis nang du gzhug/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ta thA ga tA bi Sha ye saM b+ha be pad+ma mA la
368b1(rgyud): ni spun gos dar can gyi'o//phyag rgya nyid las mtho dang gnyis byin du skyong la mdzub mo gnyis kyi mo de'i drung du bar nas gang tsam gyi sachod pa bzhi'o//gsang sngags la//na maHsa man+ta d+yad d+han+tu//rlung
368b2(rgyud): b+huny+dza s+thi Ta ya swA hA/rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngagaso//phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyang gyen du sgreng la lhag ma rnams de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs pa'i tshul du bzhi'o//

368b5(rgyud): dz+nyA naM swA hA/'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags//lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo dgugo/dra ba'i 'od kyi lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/he he ku
368b6(rgyud): mAM ra ya ga ta swa b+hA ba s+thi ta swA hA/dra ba'i 'od kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags//phyag rgya de nyid las sor mo thams cad chu bor bya'o//gzhon nu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ut+pa la'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/
368b7(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/he he ku mA ra bi tsi tra ga tiM ku m+ba ra pra tidz+nyA na me nu sma ra smr-i hA/dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngagaso//de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa/khu tshur bcings la mdzube mo dang
369a1(rgyud): gung mo gnyis gshibs te gyen du sgreng //sgra gcan gyi phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hAnA/he he kum+bA rakle shats+tshe da ya ar+d+harmA/s+phA ra pra ti dz+nyA na swAt+ma/sgra can gyis
369a2(rgyud): phyag rgya dang gsang sngagaso//de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gyen du sgreng ste mdung rtse gsum lta bur bya'o//nye ba'i ske can gyi mdung rtse'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa
369a3(rgyud): mon+ta bud d+hA nAM/bin+d+ha ya adz+nyA he ku ma ri ke swA hA/nye ba'i skra can gyi mdung rtse'i phyag rgya dang /gsang sngagaso//lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs te/gung mo gnyis brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis ngosu sbar/
369a4(rgyud): sna tshogs ma'i dbyug pa'i phyag rgya ste/gseng sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/haM ku mA ri ke Adz+nyA nA pur bid+yA na sa ni swAhA/de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la srin lag dang mthe'u chung /

369a6(rgyud): /khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo sgreng ste rtse mo dgugo/'gugs ma'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags li/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/A kaR+Sha ya sar+b+ba na ku mA ra s+ya swA hA/'gugs ma'i lcags kyu'i phyag
369a7(rgyud): /rgya dang gsang sngagaso//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis sgreng ste tshigs gsum pa dgugo/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/a basmai ya ni ye swA hA/phyag brnyad
369b1(rgyud): mi rnams kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sdug so//de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khun+dar+ya brdungs te gung mo smyung la tshogs gsum pa smra//ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i byug rgya ste/gsang sngags lnga/na mas+thA man+ta d+ha/
369b2(rgyud): d+hA nA/bi ma tin+na da ka swA hA/ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngagaso//de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa bstod la 'ag pa mi 'jigs po sbyin pa lta bur bya/mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i
369b3(rgyud): phyig rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/a b+ha yan+nata swA hA/mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngagaso//lag pa de nyid mAs yar gyon du 'dran pa'i tshul du bya'o//nga na song spong
369b4(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsaM man+ta bud d+hA nI/a b+h+ye d+ha ra sa twa da du na swA hA/ngan song sbyong ba'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngagaso//lag pa de nyid brang du gzhag/yongasu skyong sems blo gros kyi phyag
369b5(rgyud): hUM b+h+yo/gsang sngags la/ne maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ti ma hA ma~M d+de s+pha ra br-i ti dz+nyA na sA hA/yong su skyong sems blo gros kyi phyog rgya dang gsang sngags//lag pa gnyis me tog 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya'o//gsang /
369b6(rgyud): lan maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/sa tre badz+rod b+ha ba swA hA/byams pa 'byung ba'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngagaso//log pa de nyid snying kar bzhag la gung mo nang du dgugo/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/
369b7(rgyud): ka ru tod b+ha ba swAhA/skang rjes brnyan pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags//de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du bya'o//gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/he he ba ra da ra dI b+hU
370a1(rgyud): /m+bu gdung ba thams ca zhi bar byed papa'o//mug par nyid 'a man ra du 'dzin pa'i tshu //smang sngags pa/nam a mAn+tha nA//sat+sub+hU ba rIT+TarAkAr+dz+dzarmASh+Ta
370a2(rgyud): brogros bsam gyis me khyab pa dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngag so//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo'i sor me gnyis phyung ste brkyang //sa'i snying po'i me tog gi phyag rgya ste/
370a3(rgyud): gsang sngags la/na moHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ha ha ha bisma ye swA hA/sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags//lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la sor mo gsum brkyang //rani chen 'byung ldan
370a4(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/hi he ma hA ma hA swA hA/rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngagaso//lag pa de nyid las srin lag brkyang ste gyen du sgrengo //gsang
370a5(rgyud): sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/rat+no b+ha ba swA hA/phyag na rin chen gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngagaso//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis bsnol te rgyab sbyar la g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung gis g.yas pa'i
370a6(rgyud): mthe'u chung 'khyudade/de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pas kyang g.yon pa khyud la lhag ma rnams rdo rje lta bur bya'o//sa 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/d+hA ra tI pAr+d+ha
370a7(rgyud): sa 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngagaso//phyag na rin chen gyi phyag rgyani rdo rje rtse lnga pa ste snga ma bzhino//gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/rat+na nir dza te swAhA/phyag na rin chen gyi bya/
370b1(rgyud): rgya dang gsang sngag so//phyag rgya de nyid las sor mo rnams dgod par bya'o//bsam pa brtan pa'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA rAM/badz+ra saM b+ha ba swA hA/bsam pa brtan pa'i phyag rgya dang /

375b7(rgyud): lus pa nges par 'byung bar byed pa'i sgo ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du las dang /tshe dang /rnam par smin pa 'bras bu za ba dang /zar 'jug pa'i gzugs dang /kha dog dang /
375b8(rgyud): dbye bas dang /nga ro dang /'phro ba dang /spyod pa dang /nges pa'i tshig brjod pa sems can thams cad so so so sor yang dag par mgu bar byed pa chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par bskyed pa'i sku rnams
376a1(rgyud): byung bar gyur to//byung nas kyang namakha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byas rnam su sma dpyas gcig gis chos kyi dbyings khyab par rnam par rig par byed pa de
376a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshogasu bcad pa 'di sgrogs par gyur to//chos kyi mtshan nyid gang las ni//chos rnams dag ni thams cad dang //sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos
376a3(rgyud): dang //rang rgyal skyob pa rnams dang ni//byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang //de bzhin rgyal ba mchog rnams dang //sems can snod kyi 'jig rten dang //btags pa rim pa bzhin 'byung zhing //
376a4(rgyud): chos rnams skye dong gnas pa dag/gang las rtag tu 'byung 'gyur ba//shes rab thabs dang ldan gyur cing //yid gnyis som nyi dang bral ba//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'i//lam 'di khyor
376a5(rgyud): kyis sgom par gyis//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos kyi dbyings las byung ba de dag gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang gi sku rnam par rig par byed pa sprul pa'i sprin gyis yongasu gakang
376a6(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kyi dbang tsam gyis ba sprir bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig nis gcig tu brgyud nos byin gyis brlabs te/rang rang gi chos
376a7(rgyud): kyi byis kyi shin tu zhugs par gyur to//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag rdordo rjel bka' stsal pa/gsang ba ba'i bden pa gsong ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par na /
376b1(rgyud): po lha rnams kyi gnas yang dag par gnas par bsam pa sa bon dang bcas pas mtshan pa yod kyis/de nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang /ngas khyod la bshad//de skad ces bka stsal pa/
376b2(rgyud): dang /gis ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan to//bcom ldan 'das kyis nga la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dang por sngags pas dkyil 'khor de//rang gi lus la dag bye ste/
376b3(rgyud): rkang pa nas ni chu so la//thug bar dus yi bas me//de nas gong du snying ka'i bar//sdom brtson can gyi chu yi bsam//chu yi yon chad ma yi ste//me yi yan chad rlung yin//bsams nas de nas rming+ge
376b4(rgyud): pa yis//sa la gzugs brnyan bzhag par bya//de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgra dang /gsung dang /thugs kyi sa la zhugasunas chos mnyam pa nyid la bstas te/
376b5(rgyud): 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la brtags nas reg sngags kyi rgyal po the tshom thaMd gcod par byed pa 'dre smras//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/a sa ma ba te/d+harma d+hA tu kAR+Sha ga tA~M gra tA nAM/sarba thA/aM khaM aM a/si sa/haM hA/
376b6(rgyud): r-i ra/baM ga swAt+ma/hU~M ma hA swAt+ma/ra~M ra g+hA ta/gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes gsang sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di smras ma thag tu de nas phyugs bcu'i 'jig rten b+h+rUM khams na bzhugs pa'i do
376b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag gi yas pa brkyang ste/phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor bzhag nas leg so zhes bya ba byin te/'di skad ces gsungs//rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyis bac+doMs rnam par snang mdzad/
377a1(rgyud): k+Sha sku dang /gsung dang /thugs kyis la zhugs nas thams cadadu gsang sngags kyi tshul la mnyam pa nyi gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang bar bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/
377a2(rgyud): gsung sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras pa leg so leg so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub
377a3(rgyud): kyi snying po la bzhugs te/tshig bcu gnyis po 'di dag gis chos kyi dbyings rnam par spyad cing bdud ba ni pham par byas nas chos kyi dbyings las byung ba 'di dag gnas gsum nas byung ste bdud
377a4(rgyud): sdig can rnams brtul bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang /gsung thugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes nas na mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir sku tshad med pa brnyes par gyur/de bzhin du gsung dang //
377a5(rgyud): thugs tshad med pa yang brnyes par gyur to//de ltar ye shes tshad med pa dang ldan zhing /chos thams cad la dbang thob pas 'di ltar gsong sngags kyi rgyal po tshig bcu gnyis po 'di dag nyid la
377a6(rgyud): brtsams te chos 'chad//rigs kyi bu khyod kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang /gsung dang /thugs mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pas na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin du snang //thang
377a7(rgyud): mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs rgyas//bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la//sngags skad tshig mchog zhus shig dang //che ga rgyas par bka' stsal to//nged kyang sngon ni 'di rnams kyis//bla med byang chub
377b1(rgyud): sa su/myu na 'as lam 'tho mo//nyam pa rjod pa chos pa shang pa//'ad+mo/ masman pam/ pa//rdzogs sas rgyus rnams dadung dugyur//da s+yAd dung //ngan
377b2(rgyud): mchog tsom gu gyur pa//rdzogs sa sa rgyan kyis sbyi rnangs pas//'di skad rgyas ni tshig tu smras//rnaMs di rnams ni mtshan nyid med//de ma nyid med gnas myed pa//las dang tshilas rnam pa sa
377b3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i dngas rgyas 'dra bar 'dod//thugs rjes mnga' ni mdzad pa yi//mgon po rnams kyi thabs kyis ni//rnam par sprul nas chos kyi ni//mtshan nyid 'di dag rtags par 'gyur//de nas gas
377b4(rgyud): ba ba'i drug pa byugan sarjes tshigasu pacad pa de smras ngas/ma myed dus kyi 'gro ba rnams la basbyin te/na pa byung po'i tha la na pa
377b5(rgyud): bcad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la zhus pa/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//kun+ta mkhyen bskrun dang bral ba ba// tsam thams cad gcod mdzud pa//dren pa khyod la zhu ba
377b6(rgyud): m+b+hi byini sngon medu/cizhig bgyi ba 'dren pa'i gsung //thub pa chen po slob pon dang //slob ma'i rnam pa du ru bshad//swA gni ci 'drar 'tshal bar gyi//de yang ji ltar byung
377b7(rgyud): //ji ltangs ni dag par 'gyu//rdo ltar den brten pa lags//slob ma'i dgos pa gang gis bgyi//byung ba'ang 'dren pas bka stsol cig/dag pa'i mtshan ci 'dra dang //gang gis ded/
378a1(rgyud): srung bar bgyi//sa ni gang gis byin gyis brlab//der ni drang por gang gis brtag/sa yi cha las thig gdab pa'i//srad bu rnam du 'chal bar bgyi//mchod pa rnam pa du 'tshal//
378a2(rgyud): me tog bdug spos ci 'dra dang //me tog dang ni bdug spos dag/ji ltar dbul ba 'dren pas gsungs//lha bshos sbyin sreg las rnams kyang //gang dag la ni ji ltar bgyi//lha rnams
378a3(rgyud): kyis ni gdon dag kyang //gang la gang gis bkye ba gsungs//kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams kyang //go rims bzhon du mgon pos gsungs//lha rnams dang ni phyag rgya dang //gdan gyi
378a4(rgyud): tshad kyang bshad du gsol//phyag rgya rnams ni gang nas byung //ci phyir phyag rgya zhes kyang bgyi//dbang bskur rnam pa dur 'tshal bgyi//dam tshig rnam pa du zhig mchis//sngag spyad pa la brtson pa yi/
378a5(rgyud): sngags pa byang chub sems dpa' dang //thams cad mkhyen par ji ltar 'gyur//ji ltar bden pa mthong bar 'gyur//dngos grub rnam pa dur 'tshal bgyi//grub pa'i dus kyang bka' stsol cig/
378a6(rgyud): grub nas ni mkhar 'gro ba dang //ji ltar mi snang 'gyur ba dang //gtso bo lus 'di ma bor bar//ji ltar lha yi lus thob 'gyur//sprul pa rnams ni sna tshogs la//de la gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur//
378a7(rgyud): te zla ma dang phyogs rnams dang //rgyu skar gzi' dang skar ma dang //yud tsam dang ni thang gcig dang //rga dang 'chi dang rgud pa dang //ltas ngan dag ni thams cad kyang //de la ji ltar 'byung mi
378b1(rgyud): 'gyur//rkang gnyis bcu pa sangs rgyas dang //sngags pa ji ltar 'bral mo 'gyur//sbyin sreg las dang ma dag dang //tshim par bgyi ba dur 'tshal bgyi//lha rnams kyang nis so yi//dra ba nyid ni 'dren/
378b2(rgyud): pas gsungs//'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams dang //de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa yi//ched dang 'bras bu grangs rnams dang //ting 'dzin gyi khyad par dang //las kyi rnam par gang du smin//ji lta
378b3(rgyud): rnam par smin mi 'gyur//sngags pa rnams ni nam zhig na//las dang tshe las rnam grol 'gyur//de nas kun mkhyen rdzogs sangs rgyas//bcom ldan bskrun dang bral ba yis//rdo rje 'dzin lo 'di
378b4(rgyud): skad gsungs//snying rje chen po'i rtsa las byung //gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dgod pa//lha rnams kyi ni gnasangs pa//theg pa chen po'i glo 'phang mchog/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rab gas
378b5(rgyud): dpa'i'o cher 'byung khyod kyis gang //yongasu dris pa de leg so//lag na rdo rje stobs chen la//mdor ni bsdus nas bshad par bya//dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngon rol du//bya ba rnams ni nges pas nyon//sa
378b6(rgyud): so'i las rnams 'dod pa yi//tshul shes pas ni ci rigs par//rang gi ting 'dzin la gnas te//rig sngags rgyal po stobs po che//yan lag bcu gnyis tshig 'byung ba//go rims bzhin
378b7(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya//gsang sngags phyag rgya rtogs shes pa'i//slob dpon rnam pa gnyis zhes bya//zab dang ma zab bye brag las//de yi mtshan nyid shes par bya//zab mo rgya cher shes par bya//
379a1(rgyud): lus can rnams ni yid mi rton//sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras mchog ste//mthong ba'i chos ni rnam par spungs//gnyis bla mthong ba'i chos rnams kyis//myos par gyur pa dmigs/
379a2(rgyud): pa can//sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog rnams kyis//'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor kun//de yis bri bar bya ba'i phyir//rjesu gnang zhing dbang yang bskur//dus dang dus min bye brag las//sla
379a3(rgyud): ma rnam bzhir shes bya ste//gcig ni de yi mod la sgrub//gnyisu sgrub dang gnyis gar min//mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa yis//slob ma de ni rgyal ba'i mchog/sa ni dang por shes par bya/
379a4(rgyud): sems kyis sar ni bshad pa yin//sbyang ba sngar ni bstan pa ste//de yis de ni yongasu sbyang //nam zhig nyes dang bral ba na//sems kyis sa ni mi 'jigs pa//de tshe de ni dag pa ste//nyes pa thod//
379a5(rgyud): rnam par spangs//mngon par byang chub mthong bas na//de ltar de ni brtan zhes bya//de las gzhan du sa sbyong ba//de ni dag par mi 'gyuraro//sngags pa rtog la gnas na su//gang zhig sa sbyong byed pa ni///
379a6(rgyud): byang chub sems ni rnam spangs pa//gsang ba'i bdag po de mi 'dag/de bas rtog pa rnam spangs nas//so kun rnam par sbyangs par bya//de yis dkyil 'khor rnams kyis ni//cho ga rgyas por gang
379a7(rgyud): bstan pa//de dag thog mar bstan pa ni//rmongs pa rnams kyis mi shes te//rtog pa sdug bsngal rgyur 'gyur ba//ji srid mo spangs bar du ni//'jig rten 'di nas sangs rgyas min//kun mkhyen ces
379b1(rgyud): kyang mi bya'o//slob ma rnams la nan tan du//byang chub sems kyi sbyang bar bya//srung ba mi g.yo mgon po 'am//khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas bya//slob mnam zhig dmigs pa yis//nam yang g.yos
379b2(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ba//de tshe dri med na mkha' bzhin//yang dag par ni dag par 'gyur//sa byin rlab pa dang po ni//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bya bar bshad//gnyis pa sems kyi dbang gis te//'dir ni gzhan du///
379b3(rgyud): mi bya'o//srang bu rnam pa bzhir bshad//dkar ba ser po dmar po dang //nag pa zhes ni bya bar brjod//lnga pA ni mkhar lta bur bshad//bar snang la ni bzung nasu//der ni dkyil 'khor brtag par bya//srid
379b4(rgyud): bu dag ni gnyis pa yis//sa la kyil 'khor dgod par bya//sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang //de'i sras blo can rnams kyi gdan//pad+ma yid las byung ba'i mchog/bkra shis 'jig rten rnam
379b5(rgyud): kyis bsngags//rang rgyal dang ni dgra bcom pa//phyogs gcig shes par gang grags pa//de dag stan du shes bya ba//pad+ma las byung 'dab ma'i//'jig rten gyi ni lha rnams gang //tshangs la sogs pa
379b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyangs//de dag stan ni pad+ma dmar//rgyal po rnams kyir bsngags pa'o//phal pa rnams ni ci rigs por//sa yi bye brag dag las bsam//mchod pa rnam bzhir shes bya ste//phyag 'tshal
379b7(rgyud): thal mo sbyar ba dang //de bzhin byams dang snying rje dang //me tog bdug spos 'jig rten pa'i//sor mo las byung me tog rnams//skyob pa kun la dbul bar bya//yan lag kun 'byung phyag rgya ni//
380a1(rgyud): Na na du rgyu tu/ mnan pa sgyum dag/smra sa na //sum+WA na na
380a2(rgyud): kyidabyis kyi ston shing rnams//rgyal ba mchod pa'i phyir byung ba//ting 'dzin dbang gis bsgyur ba yi//sngags kyis de dag byin rlabs na//chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi//sprin med rgya cher dam pa
380a3(rgyud): rnam so//sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan m+b+har mi//de rtag ton de bzhin 'dug/sbyirnams pal po gzhan /me tog 'di rnams bsgrags pa ste//ra g-i sngags rgyu rgyus shes pas//rdo ltar rigs
380a4(rgyud): bIr dbul bar bya//de bzhin mo to bdug sa sa rnams//ji ltar rig par rnam pa dbas ma//mi po sprin lag sbyang ba ni//bkra shis pa zhi sa bshad bs+t+wa~M//de las me t+to b+h+r-i tha yin no// na
380a5(rgyud): snying gA'i phyogs nas dbul//'jig rten pa yi skye rnams la//sna ba'i thad kanas zhes bya//bdug spos rdo rje la rdo chung 'am//yang ni pad+ma'i phreng ba yos//bar snang la ni bzung nas//'jig rten
380a6(rgyud): shin sbyo rnams la sa//de las gzhan 'i jig d+he du 'i smya na nani/da dngag tu zlog gis//sbyi sag rnam pa gnyis skyes glu/las dang rnal na
380a7(rgyud): sran//slong yangs pani 'byung ba ste//las 'dod pa las sbyi skye //rang gi sbyi skye //mgyon gsums //gnas gsu ni gsum la gnas//las hU~M
380b1(rgyud): gyo ni las grub pa//'jig rten pa yi sbyin srog mchog/sbyin sreg las ni mi shes pas//gang dag gzhan du byed pa ni//sngags kyi shes pa spangs pa ste//glon des 'bras bu mi thob//de bzhin gshegs
380b2(rgyud): pas gsang sngags dang //de bzhin rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs//dkar dang ser du shes par bya//phyag na rdo rje'i thams cad pa//'jig rten dbang phyug gsong sngags ni//las kyi bye brag dag
380b3(rgyud): las dkar//kun tu gru bzhi lham pa dang //go rims bzhin du zlum po dang //gru gsum dang ni zlo gam 'dra//dbyibs ni legs par bshad pa yin//gzugs ni gnyis shes bya ba//bud med dang
380b4(rgyud): ni skyes pa nyid//yang na kun tu thams cad kyi//kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams te//bsam yas ye shes las byung bas//de bas de rnams bsam yas te//ye shes mkhyen gyi ye
380b5(rgyud): shos ni//sems can don phyir tha dad gyur//yid kyi rgya ni ji tsam pa//bstan dang phyag rgya dag dang ni//lha yi tshad kyang go rims bzhin//de tsam du ni shes par bya//sangs rgyas gang nas byung ba
380b6(rgyud): nas//phyag rgya rnams kyang de nas byung //chos las byung ba'i slob ma rnams//chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab par bya//de bas mdor na chos kyi dbyings//mtshan ma phyag rgya yin par bshad//dbang bskur
380b7(rgyud): gsum du shes bya ste//de bas nan tan mnyam par gyis//phyag rgyas gang zhig dang ngo bskur ba//las dang bya ba spangs pa ste//skyob pa rnams kyi dbang bskur po//de ni mchog ste dang po yin//
381a1(rgyud): gnyis pa las dang bya ba yis//kun nas bslang bar yang dag bshad//gsum pa yid kyis shes bya ste//yul dang dus ni spangs pa'o//bla ma logs par mgu byas na//
381a2(rgyud): phan par byed pas gang smras pa'i//dbang bskur 'di ni mchog yin par//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrags//sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdor na ni//dam tshig can rnam ldor bshad
381a3(rgyud): kyil 'khor 'di ni mthong ba las//dam tshig shes pa gcig ces bya//de la phyag rgya mi bstan cing //sngags kyang sbyin par mi bya'o//byang chub sems kyi bye brag las//sngags dang phyag rgya
381a4(rgyud): yongasu gzung //dkyil 'khor mthong zhes bya ba 'di//dam tshig can gnyis shis par bya//dkyil 'khor dang ni phyag rgya mthong //las dang bya ba la yang sbyor//bla mas lung ni ma byon pa//
381a5(rgyud): de yang dam tshig shes par bshad//phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bri ba rnams//de tshe cho ga bzhin du bstan//gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung ba yi//dbang bskur med po'i sngags pa'ang yin//gsang ba'i
381a6(rgyud): kyil 'khor dbusu ni//sngags pa cho gos dbang bskur ba//dam tshig shes pa lngar shes bya//dam tshig can zhes gzhan mi bya//brtul zhugs bzang po byang chub phyir//gang zhig sems ni
381a7(rgyud): sgom pa ni//sngags pa gnas gsum mi dmigs pa//de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin//thabs kyi snying stobs bskyed na so//sems can don la sbyor ba na//dmig su med pa'i spyod 'jom
381b1(rgyud): du rgyu ba tu shes pa bya// na man //ngab na pa// sa spyan dun//gad pa na don // don yang ///
381b2(rgyud): nimo skyog//ji ltar srings rgyas bdon gzugs pa//de lenan sngon rnyings mdzong ngo'i//byang chub sems thob gang yin de//sa gyu ba de las gzhan gyi dgos//de las gzhin du'ang dngos spya nI/
381b3(rgyud): rnam pa dag ni sngar 'dod//spyod pa'i rje su 'jug pa dang //de bzhin smra ni gnon pa dang //'jig rten mngon shes lngar 'dod dang //sangs rgyas nyid dang gang gzhan//rgyud las rgyud gyur pa yi//
381b4(rgyud): lis ni ji srid ma nyams shing //rnam smin rnam par ma smin te//dngos grub dag gi dusu 'dod//mngon na gang tshe dus gcig tu//las dr-i skye bI 'phangs gyur pa//de chi'ang sdigs pas sa
381b5(rgyud): sa byed pa//ji ltar mig chen pa bzhin//gangasasas dang shA med pa// na //de zhin pa spyod / sa //ni na gnas pa yin//
381b6(rgyud): rmil mo na//sum cu rtsa gsum gnasu phyin//lus kyang spangs pa ma yin la//de nyid kyis kyang de ma song //de bzhin rnal 'byor ny-id kyis kyang //sngags pa sngags la gnas pa dag/bsod
382a1(rgyud): nams byas pa'i las rnams kyis//'ja' dang 'dra ba'i lus kyad 'khor//lum dang ngag yid las rung ba'i//gsang sngags snyed bzhin nor bu 'dra//de las rnam par
382a2(rgyud): bsams pa'i don//ma brtags par yang 'byung bar 'gyur//ji ltar na mkha'i phyogs rnams//'dus byas spyod yul thams cad kyis//mi gos de bzhin sngags pa yang //rtogs
382a3(rgyud): pa'i spyod yul kun gyis//'di kun 'du shes tsam du ni//nam zhig de ltar bsgoms gyur cing //rnam par bsgoms na sngags pa de//rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lhan cig dga'//sang+yas
382a4(rgyud): rkang gnyis gtso bo yis//sbyin sreg gnyi su bshad pa ni//phyi rol gyi dang nang gi ste//de yang tshim par bya dang bcas//lha rnams kyang ni so so yi//rang bzhin yongasu mkhyen nasu//
382a5(rgyud): 'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams kyi//tshad dag legs par gsungs pa ni//dbang phyug la sogs mthu chen rnams//bkur ba'i lha rnams gang yin pa//de dag gis ni gang byas pa'i//
382a6(rgyud): dang phyag rgya stobs chen rnams//'bras bu phal cher 'phral du ster//tshad ni bshad pa de yino//'on kyang skye dang 'jigs pa yi//chos can de dag brtan pa med//'dzag rten 'das pa'i
382a7(rgyud): sngags rnams ni//thog ma'i byed pa med pa'o//las dang skye ba kun bcad pa//nyes pa gsum bral rgyal ba dang //rang rgyal bse ru lta bu dang //de bzhin rgyal ba'i nyan thos dang /
382b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang //gsang sngags tshad ni sngon bshad pa//dus gsum las ni shin tu 'das//rten cing 'brel pa las byung ba//mthong dang ma mthong 'bras bu'i tshad//ngag
382b2(rgyud): yid lus las 'byung ba'o//'jig rten pa yi 'bras bu'i tshad//bskal pa gcig tu bshad pa yin//yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi//gsang sngags 'bras bu bskal pa 'das//
382b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas drang srong chen po dang //rgyal sras rnams kyi ting 'dzin ni//mtshan ma med cing dag pa'o//'jig rten pa yi mtshan mar bcas//rnam par smin pa 'di nyid la//las
382b4(rgyud): kyi 'bras bu smin 'byung ba//nam zhig dngos grub thob pa na//de tshe las kyang bzlog par 'gyur//sems ni ngo bo nyid med phyir//rgyud dang 'bras bu rnam spangs shing //las
382b5(rgyud): dang tshe las rnam grol na//nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur ba yin//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang phyag rgya'i gzugasu dgod pa rim par phye ba lha rnams gnas par byin gyis rlob pa/
382b6(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin lnga rtogs pa/byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/chos kyi dbyingasau rtogs pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa/sems
382b7(rgyud): can gyi khams ma lus par bsgrol bar yi dam bcas pa rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyirasngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon por rdzogs par sangs rgyas
383a1(rgyud): rdzun na rgyu na na tu kun du ma smras / ma ga dug
383a2(rgyud): maud kyim ba'i chog /su d+ha b+hU snyam pa la//zlo ga tsug pa ni stegs par bcas//bzang ba rnams san/ngas su /de da /
383a3(rgyud): so ban dang bcas rgyas par byas//de la hU~Mng nga bid+d+ha//phyag rgya dkar gyis mdzes d+has/dadam brgyad rnams legs par rtags/hU~Mbang badzis pa na tu /
383a4(rgyud): rnams ni rba l+ya//yan lcog sa ga tshig da pa//spri rna mas dngas nam gan btsugs pa//rdugs pa'i sangs rgyas rka ge/sa //de sbrul da rgya shel
383a5(rgyud): /li dzugs su da/ sngalas byu kyi la //tshig tu shes par bye ba ste//lung bzhin dkyil la rnams du ni//las sa ma
383b1(rgyud): dang //dgod pa rnams kyang des pa yis//'di las 'byung bar shes par bya//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khrur ni/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/
383b2(rgyud): 'dra zhing mdog/dung lta bu yi dbus na ni//sangs rgyas kun gyi gru gsumo pa//pad+ma dkar po'i steng na gnas//klad kor bcas pa'i mtshan gyis btab//rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan pa
383b3(rgyud): ste//dpyad mi dgos par kun nas ni//'od zer dag ni gnyis byas pa//gsang sngags mgon las byung nas su//de ni phyogs bcu rnamasu song //gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang ///
383b4(rgyud): srin ras gzigs dkyil 'khor ni//nges pas nan tan mnyan por gyis//kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la//dbus su'ang dang 'dra bzhag par bya//de yi steng du'ang pad+ma ni//sa bon bcas
383b5(rgyud): byas rgyas par bri//de yI steng du'ang rdo rje che//rdo rje las kyang pad+ma che//thams cad sa bar rnams kyis mtshan//rang gi sa bon legs par sbyar//sgrol ma dang ni khre gnyer can//de bzhin
383b6(rgyud): gos dkar can dang ni//rig sngags longs spyod can ma dang //mthu chen thob pa'ang nan tan bya//dpal rnams kun dang phyag bstan ma//dkyil 'khor 'di yi dbus su no//phyag rgya'i
383b7(rgyud): mtshan ma dbang thob rnams//khyad par du ni bri bar bya//rta mgrin can gyi bya ba ni//gru gsum tshul du 'dug pa ste//dkyil 'khor mtshan ma bzang pos btab//nyi ma 'char ba'i khaM dog
384a1(rgyud): 'dra//rig sngags rgyal dang bcas par ni//mkhas pas rnam par dgod par bya//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang khyod nyid kyi dkyil 'khor mdor bshad par
384a2(rgyud): bya'o//kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la//rdo rje'i mtshon m+bu rnams kyis mtshan//thaMd srer pa yid du 'ong //dbus na pad+ma rab tu gnas//rdo yi dbus su bya ba ni//bum pa zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba//
384a3(rgyud): 'di ni mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshan//kla dkor gyis kyang rnam par rgyan//de yi steng du'ang rlung chen ni//dbyar gyi churaM sprin 'dra ba'i mdog/ba dan g.yo bar sngags pas bya//kla kor gyis
384a4(rgyud): kyang rnam par rgyan//de yi steng du'ang gru gsum pa//rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can de//'jigs por byed pa'i me 'dra ba//sum mdo ris mtshan mtshan gyis btag//'bar phreng
384a5(rgyud): 'khrigs pa 'jigs 'jigs lta//nyi ma 'char ba'i gzugs 'dra ba'o//de yi dbus su pad+ma che//dus mtha'i me 'od 'dra ba'o//pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje ni//'bar ba'i phreng ba 'phro ba can/
384a6(rgyud): hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra dang ldan//dam pa sa blon rnams kyis mtshan//dpa' bo khyod kyi dkyil 'khor 'di//rgyal bu'i gtso bo rnams kyis gsungs//mA ma k+Shi ni lu gu rgyud//de bzhin rdo rje rigs
384a7(rgyud): las byung //rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje rtse//rigs sngags rgyal mo mthu chen dag/dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du ni//kun kyang khongasu chud par bya//las rnams shin tu 'grub bya'i phyir/
384b1(rgyud): mamamasasam mas mtham/thas mas am ma sa/ma ma mams gams ma
384b2(rgyud): phyag rgya dkyil 'khor sa bon dang //kha dog khyad par go rims bzhin//de dag ji ltar rigs par bya'o//de nas gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin//chen po gtsor bshad 'di rnams te//na mkha' dri
384b3(rgyud): ming rdo rje 'khor//rdo rje mche ba des pa dang //rnam par grags pa skal chen dag/rdo rje mgon po mchog 'dzin dang //rdo rje zhi ba rdo rjetshe//rdo rje mthong ka de bzhin gzhan//rdo rje pad+ma yangs
384b4(rgyud): pa'i mig/rdo rje bzang po rdo rje nyid//spros pa med par gnas pa dang //nam mkha' mtha' yis 'gro ba'o//de rnams dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni//dkar po ser po dmar po dang //nag po yin
384b5(rgyud): par yang dag bsgrags//de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya'i gzugs//rtse gsum pa dang rtse gcig dang //gzhan yang gnyis dang gnyis mA yin//phreng ba lta bu de bzhin gzhan//kha
384b6(rgyud): dog bye brag las shes bya//'di rnams kun kyang mthu chen te//rnam par rgyal dang ldan pa'o//mi g.yo mgon gyi dkyil 'khor ni//rlung dang me yi yin par 'dod//nga yi
384b7(rgyud): dung ni 'og logasu//bdon bral gyi ni phyogs char bri//rang gi snga bon mtshan mor ldan//ral gri phyag rgya legs par sbyar//yang na zhags pa bya yang rung //blo ldan de yi byi
384b8(rgyud): bar bya//'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyi'ang //bye brag tu ni rlung gi dbus//rdo rje can gyi mtshan dang mtshan//gan so gsum dag la 'dug pa'o//gsang ba po'i bdag gi
385a1(rgyud): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum gyi gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor dgod pa 'byung ste/de la re shig dkyil 'khor ni//gsor gyi kha dog gru bzhi pa//
385a2(rgyud): rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan pa ste//'di ni dkyil 'khor dam pa yin//de nas gzhan yang lha mo'i gzugs//de dbus pad+ma che//thams cad ser po 'bar dang bcas//de yang ga
385a3(rgyud): tI bzhag pa ni//chu gsum la ni gnas par bya//dbus ma'i chun po nas ni//der yang sbyin ni bri bar bya//rang gi 'di 'bar dbus na gnas//mdor ni sna bon ldan par bya//byang chub
385a4(rgyud): sems dpa' grod kyi//yid bzhin nor bu rgyu lo bas gsungs/de yi dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni//chu yi yin te thams cad do//shin tu dri meng rab tu zhi//re pe the rdzogs byed pa'o
385a5(rgyud): de nas shUHs+yAd+d+hi yang //des pasad kyil 'a khor mnyan par gyis//da ni dadang chen zhes bya ba//kha dag ser pos nye bar brgyan//kun tu zla bAzhi l+h+wam pA la//dbus su dz+haiM rje ma
385a6(rgyud): bzhin//de yi steng du pad+ma ni//kun tu kha dog ser po bzhag/de steng lhung bzed chen po ste//rdo rjes mtshan pa 'bar dang bcas//yang na chos gos khar bsil dge/ga ri ma
385a7(rgyud): bzhin du bzhag par bye//gtsug tir sde po gang bsgrags po//de rnams phyag rgyu zhes byeg/gdugs dkar po'i ni gdug su bya//rgyal ba'i gtsug tir blo ldan pa//
385b1(rgyud): mtshan ma ral grir bzhag pa ni//'od zer rnams ni 'phro bar bya//rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo yin//rnam par 'thor ba'i ljags kyur 'dod//gzi brjid phung po skal chen gyi//
385b2(rgyud): gtsug tor bzang po yin par 'dod//cher 'byung ba ni rdo rje yin//mngon par 'byung ba'i pad+mar 'dod//dung ni mtha' yas sgra dbyangs kyi//kha dog bye brag las shes bya//mdzod/
385b3(rgyud): spu'i yid bzhin nor bu yIn//spyan gyi yang+ga ni 'di nyon gcig/gtsug tor thaMd ser po ste//rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan par bya//gzhan gyis mi thu bo ma yi ni//lag po ngo mtshar
385b4(rgyud): pad+ma can//gzhan gyis mi thub zhes bya ba'i//kha che pad+ma gnag la gnas//gtsang mar gnas pa gang grags pa//gtsang mar rtogs pa'i spyod yul can//de dag gi ni phyag
385b5(rgyud): rgya yi//mtshan nyid dgod pa nges pa nyon//sems dpa'i lag dang dge ba'i lag/'dzum pa'i lag kyang de bzhin gzhan//lag na me tog na mkha'i lag/cho ga rgyas par bri
385b6(rgyud): bar bya//sa yI lha mo bum pA ste//chu yi dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan//gnyer ba'i lag pa me yi ste//drang srong rnams dang bcas par bri//'od srung dang ni glo'u tA ma//mArgad da dang
385b7(rgyud): gargo dang /ba sistaM dang ang gi ras//me yi gnas kyi nang na 'khod//rig byed lag par nan tan du//de dag gi rims bzhin du bri//gshin rje'i be con bri ba ni//rlung gi dkyil
386a1(rgyud): mtshan mamamamamatshamasasamamamacas mthama.amam thas mamams mamanyam amal yang shal mamaman mam mas mamasa' tham ba macam mang yamal sa sa ya dbas sa ya mal
386a2(rgyud): /'khor nang na 'dug/'tshong dag ga ni rdul bu yin//dus mtshan phyag rgyu ba dad do//drag po'i chud ma'i mdung rtse gsum//tshangs pa'i chung ma'i pad+ma d+han//gzhan
386a3(rgyud): chung ma'i mdung thung yin//khyab 'jug chung ma'i 'khor lo nyid//gshin rje'i chung mo'i tho bar shes//'jigs byed chung ma'i mi thong yin//de dag rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi//rlung du
386a4(rgyud): chung par bya ba ni//bya rog bya rgod de bzhin khyi//wa rnams kyis kyang yongs bskor bar//las rnams grub par 'dod pa yis//ji ltar rigs par bri bar bya//bden bral gyi ni ral
386a5(rgyud): bring bri//khyab 'jug gi ni 'khor bar bya//skem byed kyi ni mdung thung yin//dga' bo nye dga' gnyis kyi sprin//gnyis ka'i glog dang btsas par te//gzugaso ni mdog sngo chu dang bcas//
386a6(rgyud): shAkya seng+ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi//sgo yi phyogs ni gnyisu dgod//bde byed kyi ni mdung rtse gsum//bka' bzlog rtse gsum gdengs par bshad//bum pa dkar po pad+mar bcas//zla ba'i
386a7(rgyud): phyag rgya yin par dran/nyi ma'i dbang tshon dkyil 'khor la//gnas pa'i shring rta yin zhes bya//rgyalnga dang rnam par rgyal ba yi//dbang chen mtshan ma'i gzhu can no//rlung gi phyogasu
386a8(rgyud): rlung rnams kyis//ba ngan phyag rgya bri bar bya//dbyangs can gyi ni pi bing yin//chu yi zhags pa 'dzin par bri//bdag nyid chen po de'i dkyil 'khor//chu yi yin par shes par bya//
386b1(rgyud): sa bon rnams kyis btab pa dang //mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshan par bya'o//shAkya tog gi dkyil 'khor du//de la sogs pa'i mtshan rnams kyis//dkyil 'dor rnams ni go rims bzhin//
386b2(rgyud): sa don rnams dang bcas par bya//gzhan yang mchog sbyin rdo rje yi//dkyil 'khor nan tan mnyan par gyis//kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la//rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan pa ste//de yi dbus su
386b3(rgyud): bya bA ni//dkyil 'khor me los byung ba'o//de dbus phyag rgya gzhag pa ni//ut+pal zhes bya gzugs bzang ba//'jam dbyangs blo dang ldan pa yi//rang gri sngags kyis gzi bskyed pa'o//
386b4(rgyud): de yi gnas ni cho ga bzhin//rang gi sa bon nyid kyis btab//tha ma kho ra khor yug tu//ut+pal rnams kyis khebs por bya//de yi dbus su bri ba ni//dpa' bo 'di rnam so go rims
386b5(rgyud): bzhin//de la dra ba can gyi 'od kyi phyag rgya ni lcags kyu'o//gzhon nu rin chen cod pan gyi ni rin che'o//gzhon nu dri med 'od kyi ni ud pA la kha ma phye bar bya'o//'jam dbyangs blo dang
386b6(rgyud): ldan pa yI//mngag gzhug mar ni gang grags pa//de rnams kyi ni 'jigs med pas//de ltar rigs par shes bya ba//sgra can gyi ni phyag rgya ni//rol gri yin par shes par bya//
386b7(rgyud): nye skra can gyi mdung rtse gsum//sna tshogs ma'i ni dbyug pa bshad//nor ldan ma'i ni rgyal mtshan gsungs//'gugs ma yi ni lcags kyi yin//de dag thams cad ut+pa la'i//mtshan
387a1(rgyud): /ma dag gis mtshan mad bya//ji skad gsungs pa'i phyag rgyan ma//de drug phrag /rgyu gang ga no//y-i phyog sunan tan du//sbyi rnam sa brtson 'grus //spyukar+m+ma m+b+ha/
387a2(rgyud): par bri ba ni//yid bzhin no bu zhes bya ba//me yi kyil 'dzin na drug 'khod sa ga ma bzhin//'khor rnams kyi ni rgyas po du//phyag rgya 'di rnams shes pa ra//margya can gyi phyag
387a3(rgyud): rgyan//bum pa'i steng na rdo rje rje gnag //mi 'jigs pa skye na ni 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i lag pa'o//den slong rnams cad srung ba'i ni lag pa g.yas pa gyen du 'dren pa lta bur byas
387a4(rgyud): skyong sems blo gros kyi na s+thits+li'i lag pa brang du bzhog pa'o//rnams po chen po gyen du 'byung ba mi ni me tog 'dzin pa'i lag pa'o//blo can snying rjes gdungs hU~M oM n+da las
387a5(rgyud): pasting gang bzhag la gung mo nang du bzhug pa'o//gdung ba thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ni lag pa michog sbyin pa'i snor mo rnams las tshwa'i rgyun 'ang//thi gas sam+b+ha gyis mi
387a6(rgyud): pa dang ldan pa'i ni lag pa yid bzhin ner bu thogs pa'o//de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma la gnas shing dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud par bya'o//byang blog su sa'i snying po'i phyag rgyu ni//
387a7(rgyud): dbang ce ni dkyil 'khor nang gnas pa//spyan ni snga ma bzhin du bzhig//de'i steng pad+ma chen po ste//kha dog kun ldan 'bar bar bcas//de'i steng ba dan chen po ste//rtse la rin chen
387b1(rgyud): mtshan thamamamaHsasamam mthas mtham/mamanathasamamathas ma.a mal tham masas khas cam yas ka ma thal amam sa kams tham sa
387b2(rgyud): chen po bzhag/de ni gzugs kyi mchog yin te//phyag rgya'i gzugasu 'dir bA shud//de yi 'khor ni grangs med pa//gtso bo snron mtha' yas te//de la de rnams phyag rgya yang //nan tan
387b3(rgyud): bskyed de bre ba ni//rin chen 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje rje gsum po rin po che'i steng ni 'dug pa'o//rin chen lag gi ni rdo rje rtse gcig pa rnon po che'i steng na 'dug pa'o//sa 'dzin gyi
387b4(rgyud): ni rdo rje kha gnyis pa rin po che'i steng na 'dug po'o//phyag na rin chen phyag rgya ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa rin po che'i steng na 'dug pa'o//bsam pa bstan pa'i ni rdo rje rgya gram rin po che'i steng na 'dug pa
387b5(rgyud): pa ste/phyag rgya thams cad kyang dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud par bya'o//nub phyogasu na mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya na/chu yi dkyil 'khor yid 'ongs par//pad+ma dkar po'i stan chen la//de'i
387b6(rgyud): dbus ral gri bzhag pa ni//so ni shin tu rno ba'i mchog/rang gi sa bon rnams kyis btab//mkhos pas der ni bzhag par bya//de yi 'khor rnams bri ba ni//phyag rgya'i gzugs
387b7(rgyud): rnams go rims bzhin//de la na mkha'i dri med kyi phyag rgya ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor lo'i mtshan ma dang bcas pa'o//na mkha'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ni rlung gi dkyil
387b8(rgyud): 'khor gyi dbus na dung ngo //rnam par dag pa'i blo gros kyi phyog rmi ni pad+ma dkar po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dadus na 'dug pa'o//spyod pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ni rlung gi dkyil
388a1(rgyud): /'khor gyi dbus na dung gi steng du ut+palA bzhug pa'o//blo brtan gyi phyug rgyu yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nA rdo rje pad+ma'i steng na 'dug pa'o//rnam par snang mdzad
388a2(rgyud): chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/gsong ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang
388a3(rgyud): 'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug dri'i cho ga gsungs pa/kun tu rlabs pa'i sngags pa ni//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la mkhas pas/de tshe slob ma'i sdig pa kum//cho ga bzhin du bsreg
388a4(rgyud): par bya//ci nas slar yang mi skye bar//de yi 'tsho ba'ang bsreg par bya//bsregs te thal bar gyur nas kyang //de ni slar yang gso bar bya//yi ge yis ni mi 'gyur sreg/'tsho bas
388a5(rgyud): slar yang gso bar bya//'tsho bos thams cad gsos nas ni//kun tu dag cing dri ma med//yan lag bcu gnyis tshig rnams ni//de yi mod la dgod par bya//byang chub sems dpa'
388a6(rgyud): skyob pa rnams//sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam tshig 'di//sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos dang //'jig rten rnams kyis bskur ba yin//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
388a7(rgyud): po'i//dam tshig 'di ni sus rig pa//rgyud rnams kun tu zhugs pa dang //dkyil 'khor kun la dbang ba yin//sngags 'chang de ni nga dang 'dra//dam tshig ces ni gzhan mi bya//
388b1(rgyud): gsong ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa rim par byed pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas byang chub sems
388b2(rgyud): dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams cho ga gang dag gis bdag nyid
388b3(rgyud): lha'i gzugasu brtan par gyur par shes pa dang /shes nas kyong rang gi lha'i tshul du gnas ni sde dngos grub thong par 'gyur bya gsang po'i phyag rgya brgyad po gsang ba dang bcas pa/lha'i glan
388b4(rgyud): byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba/rang gi gsang sngags kyi mtshan pa dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du bya ba yod de/phyag rgya brgyad pa de yang gang zhe na/lag pa gnyis khos
388b5(rgyud): stong du sbyar la mthe'u chung gnyis dang mdzub me gnyis 'bar ba lta bur 'gyed do//bcom ldan 'das nyid kyiso gzi brjid 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ste/de'i dkyil 'khor ni gru gsum pa gsum
388b6(rgyud): nga'i chos mtshan can 'bar dang brnyas pa'o//gsang sngags nI/nams sa mAn+ta bud+d+hA nAM/raM r+ye swAhA/phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste mthe bo'i steng du bi dan lta bur bzung //
388b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rdo rje mi shigs pa'i phyag rgya ste/dkyil 'khor ni yo go bi 'dra ba rdo rje 'bar ba dang bcas pa'o//gsang sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/be ba swA hUM/phyag rgya
389a1(rgyud): lanamamamamamamasasamam thacas mtham/amathasams mam a mas ma ma gamamam mkha' tham gathasas tham la ma sa maman mama.a ma khams ma mal
389a2(rgyud): de nyid las gung mo dang srin lag gnyis brkyang la lhag ma rnams snga ma bzhin du bzhag/pad+ma'i sbubs kyi phyag rgya ste/dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/
389a3(rgyud): 'dra ba pad+ma'i mtshan mas mtshan pa can no//gsang sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta dud d+hA nI/saM se swA hA/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe'u chung gih+Na sa 'og tu gzhugo/sangs rgyas kyis
389a4(rgyud): gsungs dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan gyi phyag rgya ste/dkyil 'khor ni zla ba kham pa lta bu ba den dang bcas pa klo dkor hi gnyis pas mtshon pa'o//gsang sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/
389a5(rgyud): haM ha swA hA/de bzhin du log pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la mthe bong gnyis so sor phye ste lhag ma rnams cung zad tsam snyim pa lta bur bya'o//'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yin
389a6(rgyud): lag thaMd 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ste/dkyil 'khor ni bum zla ba dang 'dra ba rdo rjes mtshan pa'o//gsang sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/aM a swA hA/phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis
389a7(rgyud): bkug la lhag ma rnams de bzhin du bzhago/'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs kyi phyag rgya ste dkyil 'khor ni 'ja' 'dra ba mtshan ma thaMd dang ldan pa rdo rje'i ba dan 'char ba'o//
389a8(rgyud): gagasang sngags ni/ne maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/bud+d+ha d+ha rA Ni smr-i ti ba la d+ha daN+Di kaM ri d+ha ra d+he ra/dzA ra ya d+hA ra ya/sa ra ban b+hi ga ba te/a kA R+Sha b+hU ti/a sa mai swA hA/phyag rgya de nyid
389b1(rgyud): las gung mo gnyis phyung ste mthe'u chung gnyis gung mo gnyis kyis bkug la spyi bor sbyar//'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi chos gnas pa'i phyag rgya ste/dkyil 'khor ni na mkha'i/
389b2(rgyud): kha dog thams cad dang ldan pa glad kor gnyis kyis mtshan po'o//gsang sngagasA nau/na moHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/a be da bi di a swA hA/phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis phan tshun
389b3(rgyud): bsnol mar bzung //'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rnal 'byor 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste de'i dkyil 'khor ni na ma kho'i ste khyad par du sngo la gled kor tsan snyoms pa dang bcas pa'o//gsung
389b4(rgyud): sngags ni/nA maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ma hA yo ga yo gi no yo ge bA re kha na dza re kaM swA hA/gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di dag ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rab
389b5(rgyud): tu gsang ba yin gyis dbang bskur ba dang /cho rigs btsun pa dang /spro ba can dang /yi dam la brtan pa dang /bla ma la gus pa dang /byas pa gzo ba dang /gtsang sbra che ba dang /bdag gis lus dang srog
389b6(rgyud): la mi lta ba ma gtogs pa gzhan su la yang ma sbyin cig rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las gsang ba'i phyag rgya brgyad
389b7(rgyud): rim par phye ba'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod chen po de'i tshe ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la gzigs nas thams cad kyi rje su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin/
390a1(rgyud): la snyoms par zhug so//bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par granas shing sgo
390a2(rgyud): khyud dang /rta babs rin po che sna lnga las rab tu rnam par skyes pas rgyun pa/ba de ni kha dog du ma dang ldan pas skying brgya tsho glu/rin po che chen po'i bla re bres pa/rin po che'i dril bu dang /
390a3(rgyud): rnga ma dkar po dang /dar dang gos mang pos sbyongs pa/rin po che'i kau pa phyogs brgyad du btsugs pe pad+ma ri 'tsho'o chu dri zhim po yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas yongasu gang ba dang /
390a4(rgyud): rang pa dang /ngur pa dang /bzhad kyi sgra grag pa/dus thams cad pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pas phyogs brgyad du rgyan pa/rin po che sna lnga'i phreng ba dang /srad bus legs/
390a5(rgyud): par bskor bya/sa gzhi kra tsa lin da 'jam po ltar rog na bde zhing rab tu 'jam pa/rnga s+tha dang sil snyen gyi sgra yid du 'ong zhing ston pa rnam pa du ma grag pa/byang chub sems dpa'i

390a7(rgyud): pa las byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i mtshan mas mtshan pa yang byung bar gyur to//de'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba/son gyi
390b1(rgyud): bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mgu bar mdzad pa bzhugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i yan lhag thams cad nas sku cis kyang mi tshugasdu pa'i stobs dang ldan pa stobs bcu la

390b3(rgyud): dang bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsod nams kyis rnam par bskyod pa dag byeng bar gyur to//de dag byung nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams

391a2(rgyud): gyis brlabs te rdul tha~Md dang bral ba ba dag dang /sems can dang /srog dang /'gro ba dang /shad can dang /shed las skyes pa dang /byung pa po la sogs pa'i zug rngu'i skyon dang brel

392b6(rgyud): zla ba gnyis pa la//chu yi dkyil 'khor dang ldan par//pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings na su//de tshe za su chu 'thung ngo //de nas zla ba gsum pA la//me yi ngos la gzhol bya ste//ma bsrungs

393a1(rgyud): /de nas 'khor lo'i rgyas bcings la//mnyam par gzhag ste gsang ljags bzlas//dbang chen dang ni chu'i dros la//rnal 'byor gzhol ba 'dug nasu//zla ba yar
393a2(rgyud): gyi ngo la ni//de nas zla ba lnga pa la//rnyed dang ma rnyed rnam spangs te//sngags pa kun tu chags med na//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin du 'gyur//rlung dang ming ni ldan byas nas//nyes

393a5(rgyud): rnams dang gsang sngags kun//ci dag bgyi zhes tshig smras zhing //de yi drung na 'khod par 'gyur//bgegs dang lo go 'dren ma rungs dang //srin po dang na ma mo rnams//gsang sngags

395b7(rgyud): brjen du smra ba dang /ngag rtsub po dang /phram zeng ba dang /tshig khyal pa smra ba las slar ldog par bya'o//brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log par lta ba las slar ldog par bya/
396a1(rgyud): bla sang ba pa'i budagra pa da la bslabs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang spyod pa mtshungs par bslangs par 'gyur
396a2(rgyud): ba byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni 'di dag yin//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das le gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos
396a3(rgyud): kyi thog pa la yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di rnams bshad/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa mu stegs byed rnams kyang dge bya bcu'i las kyi lam 'di rnams yang dag par blangs te/
396a4(rgyud): 'dug na/bcom ldan 'das 'di la khyad par ci zhig mchis/tha dad du bgyi ba ni ci zhig mchis/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag ni rdo rje
396a5(rgyud): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gsang ba pa'i bdag po legaso legaso//gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod kyis gang de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhus pa ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po
396a6(rgyud): khyod yang legaso//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de'i phyir rab tu rnam par dbye ba'i tshul dang tshul gcig tu bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan gyis nyon cig/gsang ba pa'i bdag po
396a7(rgyud): de la ngas gang nyan thos rnams la bslab pa bstan pa gang yin pa de ni thabs dang shes rab tu mi ldan pa bka' grub par byed pa phyogs gcig shes pa rtogs pa ste/de bas na de dag
396b1(rgyud): tshal na mthamamamacacasa.acam macas mtham/am thas mamathas sa mtham samaka ma mas/kham mam yas ma gathas ma ma mam sa am a sa lamag tham mal/
396b2(rgyud): da dge cu'o las kyi lam de dag marmus par mi 'gyur-I//'jig rten pa rnams nI bdag gang+gA bu lnga mngon par zhon pa dang /gzhan b+hU r+m+mAn b+h+yos dz+rag//thog partson pos ng+gA NA/
396b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ches thod kyi mnyam po nyid la 'jug par bye ba'i phyir gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing thabs dang shes rab kyi sgo yongasu zin par bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i
396b4(rgyud): don byed pa la 'ju'o//de bas ni gsang po 'i'i bdag pa byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i tshun pas shes rab dung thabs kyis yongs sbyin par chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i
396b5(rgyud): brtson par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byams pa chen po dang /thugs rje chen po'i spyan gyis sems can gyi khams rnams lnga gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na
396b6(rgyud): rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/de la byang chub sems dpa' ched du bsams te srog gcad pa la slar ldog par bya'o//dbyug pa sbrengs zhing khon du 'dzin pa sbyang bar bya'o//nges ba ga
396b7(rgyud): lce rje lta ba bzhin du gzhan gyi srog kyang 'byung bar bya'o//ga~M zhan+da du na gang zag de lta bu dang dngos po de lta blo la bdag gis sdig pa khas bli smra pa las da pya bo ni ma gtogs te/de la
396b8(rgyud): khon du 'dzin pa med cing rting rdzir gyur pa'i yid kyis bya'o//ma byin par len pa las slar ldog par bya ste/des gzhan gyis sang su bzung ba'i longs spyod la chags pa skyod

397a2(rgyud): ga par ga yam pa las snying hU~M pa bya ste/des gzhan gyis yong sa bzung ba'i mu ma dang /rigs dang /mtshan ma dang/chos kyis pa smra su pa rnamasal tshogs pas
397a3(rgyud): smyed pa ma b+h+yan/yun mamayin pa da pa rna/da ga pa sa kyi dkris bla b+h+ri DU shul hrI pa // du sa
397a4(rgyud): rdzog pa rgya //des ched du bas mas kyi gang gis sas rgyas kyi byang chub sgos par 'gyu gyig zlog gi phyi 'i smreb ma na/
397b1(rgyud): rgyun las 'dara' bar gyur pa de ni gsung ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i brdzun chen po yin no//gsang ba pa'i bdag po rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis
397b2(rgyud): 'di ltar bden pa'i tshig yongasu mi btang bar rig par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang tshig rtsub mo las slar ldog par bya ste/des sems can rnams la mnyan pa dang /
397b3(rgyud): 'jam pa dang /yid la 'bab pa'i tshig de lta bu'i tshig smra bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems can tha~Md kyi don bya ba'i thog
397b4(rgyud): mer 'gro ba ni tshig yin pa'i phyiraro//gzhan du na sems can 'gro ba mi bzad pa'i rgyu can rnams la gnasra de dang de dag tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshig rtsub por smra ba ni mi gtog so///
397b5(rgyud): grasang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang phra mar smra ba las slar ldog par bya ste/des na ci nas kyang dbyen du mi 'gyur ba dang /gnod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bsgrub par bya'o//byang chub
397b6(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams ni sems can dbye ba la zhugs pa ma yino//gzhan du na sems can rnams lo lta ba'i gnas de lta de lta bu dag tu bying bar gyur pa mthong nas tso nas kyang sems
397b7(rgyud): de dag 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gcig pa 'di la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i rnam pas rab tu 'byed par byed po ni ma gtog so//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan
398a1(rgyud): /yang byang chub sems dpas chog ltul par sgru ba sa sA du lkok+Sha par b+h+ya ste/des yul dang /dus dang /don du ldan pa/don g+h+r-ir+d+ha su 'jug pa/sems can da/
398a2(rgyud): kyi yid du 'ong ba/rna ba'i lAm rnam par spyod pa de lta bu'i tshig smra bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe no//byang chub sems dpa'i ni tshig sna tshogs dang ldan pa yin//gzhan dun byang chub
398a3(rgyud): sems dpas srung gtam gleng ba sngon du b+h+yo ste/sems can rnams mgo bar byas nas sangs rgyas kyi chos la rab tu dgod par 'dod pas don dang mi ldan pa'i tshig kyang smra bar
398a4(rgyud): bya ba ni ma gtogs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba na rgyu yang bor du gcod pa med par 'gyuraro//gAse b+he pA'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas brdam
398a5(rgyud): sems las slar rdzog par bya ste/des gzhan gyi longs spyod dang gzhan gyi nor la chags pa'i sems kyang bskyed par mi bya'o//de ci phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'
398a6(rgyud): ni sems zhum pa ma yin no//gal te byang chub sems dpa' bdag la sems chags par gyur na thams cod mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo'i phyogs gcig las nyams par 'gyur//
398a7(rgyud): gsang ba po'i bdag po byang chub sems dpas rab tu dga' ba skyed cing des 'di ltar bsam par bya'o//gang dag gis bya dgos pa de dag gis rab tu 'byor par gyur pa de legs snya
398b1(rgyud): nas sems can de dag gis longs spyod de dag chud mi za ba la yang dang yang du dga' ba bskyod par bya'o//gsang bya ba'i bdag po gzhan yang gnod sems las slar ldog par bya ste//
398b2(rgyud): des thams cad du bzod pa mang ba dang /byams pa dang /khong khro ba med cing sems snyoms par bya'o//des mdza' bo la ji lta ba bzhin du dgra la de bzhin du bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang
398b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' ni yid kyis gnas ngan len dang ldan pa ma yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis bsam pa yongasu dag pa yino//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na byung
398b4(rgyud): chub sems dpas gnod sems dang bral bar bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas log par lta ba med par bya ste/des yang dag par lta ba dang /'jig rten
398b5(rgyud): pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba dang /g.yo med pa dang /gya gyu med pa dang /sgyu med pa dang /drang ba dang /sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la bsam pa nges par bya'o//de ci'i phyir
398b6(rgyud): zhe na/gsang ba pa'i badrag po log par lta ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i kha na ma tho ba chen po ste dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur ba'o//'di ni mi dge bo'i rtsa ba thaMd kyi
398b7(rgyud): phyi mo'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na tho na bzhad gad tsam du yang log par lta ba bskyed par mi bya'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i
399a1(rgyud): bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di rnams kyi sdom pa nyams pa
399a2(rgyud): dang /shin tu rtsa ba nas chad par 'gyur ba dang /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi khyim dang /chung ma dang /bu dang /bu mo dang /nye du dang /skrag
399a3(rgyud): gi gnyen mtshams kyis yongasu bskor cing lha dang mI'i bde ba myong bar bgyid kyang ji ltar ltung bar mi 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
399a4(rgyud): 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gsang ba pa'i bdag po legaso legaso//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de'i phyir nyon la legs
399a5(rgyud): par rab tu yid la zung shig dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dul ba'i ltung ba rnam par nges pa la mkhas par ba shwad+d+ho//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lo byang chub sems
399a6(rgyud): dpa' ni rnam pa gnyis te/gnyis gang zhe na/'di ltar khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni khyim na gnas shing bslab pa'i gzhi lnga gzung ste/
399a7(rgyud): thabs dang tshul sna tshogs kyis rgyal srid la dbang byedado//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub sems dpa' yul dang dus kyi dbang gis thad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod pa
399b1(rgyud): ni 'di ltar thabs kyis yong su zin par gru dang /rol mo dang /mig 'phrul la sogs pa bzo'i gan ste rnam pa sna tshogs ston cing thabs drang tshul de dang de dag gis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis
399b2(rgyud): sems can rnams yongasu sdud de/de yang bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir de yi srog gcod pa dang /ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pas log par g.yem
399b3(rgyud): ba dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /lag par lta ba rab tu spangs pa yin te/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas bslab pa'i gzhi de lnga gzung nas bslab pa ji skad bstan pa rnams la slob cing dad
399b4(rgyud): pas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rje su bslab par bya'o//'dus ma byas kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs phas bsngags pa la gnas te/'dus byas
399b5(rgyud): kyi tshul khrims la thabs dang shes rab kyis yongasu zin par spyod cing ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi ni srog gi phyir yAt+pa yongasu nyams par mi bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste dam pa'i chos slong
399b6(rgyud): ba dang /byang chub kyi sems gtong ba dang /ser sna byed pa dang /sems can la gnod par byed pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di dag ni thabs dang /shes rab tu mi ldan pa rang bzhin gyis nyon
399b7(rgyud): mongs pa can te/slang gsor mi rung ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang dag 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang /gang yang da lta'i mgon po rnams//thabs dang sha
400a1(rgyud): /dang ldan pa la//bsgyangs nas rma med byung chub ni//'dus ma byas pa dos 'thob bo//thabs dang mi ldan ye shes dang //mapa pa dag kyang bshad pa ni//dpa'
400a2(rgyud): po chen po nyan thos rnams//de la gzud pa'i phyir bshad//rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis rlob pa las byang chub sems dpa'i
400a3(rgyud): bslab pa thams cad dang ldan pa rim par phye ba'o////bam po bdun pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la gzigs
400a4(rgyud): te bstan pa don yod par grub par bzhed nos/gsang sngags thams cad kyi dbang phyug gsang sngags kyi rgyal po/gsang sngags thams cad kyi mgon po gzi brjid chen po dam tshig
400a5(rgyud): gsum la gnas pa lam gsum yongasu rdzogs par byed pa bshad pa'i phyir/phyag na rdo rje stobs chen lo//'jam pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/gsang sngags rnams kyis
400a6(rgyud): gsang sngags mgon//dpa'i bos ma yongs yid kyis nyan//de'i tshe yo shes dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ye shes sna tshogs 'byung ba'i 'od zer
400a7(rgyud): brgya 'phro ba'i gsang sngags 'di gsung so//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM i a bad/lag na rdo rje 'di ni gsang sngags thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mgon po gzi brjid chen po ste/
400b1(rgyud): dri ni bdag nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas//chos kun dang da phyug thub pa yin//mI shes mun nag kun 'joms pa//nyi ma shar ba bzhin du snang //thub pa chen po bdag nyid kyis//'di lta bur//
400b2(rgyud): ni byin rlabs te//sems can rnams la phan bzhed phyir//sprul pa rnams ni sprul par mdzad//'di ni sems can rnams bdag gis//sems can 'byung ba ji snyed pa//de stedade rkyen
400b3(rgyud): stsol pa yi//pheM 'phang dam pa mdzad par 'gyur//de bas rnam pa thams cad du//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi thabs 'dod du//nang gi bdag nyid dag pra ta/tum d+hA m+b+ha brtson pa bya/d+hi pA sna mdzo chen
400b4(rgyud): mngon pa rngon par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las yi ge brgya'i byung ba bstan pa rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o//de nis yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par
400b5(rgyud): mjed kyis gsang ba po'i bdag po phyag ni rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/gsang ba po'i ba dag po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe ye shes chen po mngon par shes pa dbang
400b6(rgyud): bskur ba dang ldan pa'i sa thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag nyid dam tshig gsum gyi lam la gnas par gzigs so//gsang ba pa'i bdag
400b7(rgyud): po de'i tshe yang bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po mngon par shes par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa gzungs kyi tshul du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa nye bar ston to//de nyid kyi tshe sangs
401a1(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas dmachog gsum gyi lam ston pa nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro//grasang ba
401a2(rgyud): pa'i bdag po nga'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa rgya chen po 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par khyab pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo sems can thams cad dang ji lta ba bzhin
401a3(rgyud): du mgu bar byed pa/chos kyi dbyings so sor rnam par rig par byed pa'i sgo ni de lta 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha'i khams kyis klas pa ma
401a4(rgyud): lus par sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa la zhugs kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la sems can rnams kyis 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba
401a5(rgyud): ste/sangs rgyas kyi gsung rnam par bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sku sems can re ba ji lta ba bzhin du mgu bar mdzad pa byung ba yino zhes bya bar
401a6(rgyud): rab tu mi shes pa la ltos/'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho snyed kyi sgor chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba la
401a7(rgyud): brtson pa/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa las byung ba rnams 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ris rgya mtsho me tog go gzhi'i snying po'i rgyun can 'dir ngas yongs su
401b1(rgyud): bzung bas bsam pa sna tshogs pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ni yongasu sbyong /byang chub kyi snying po ni mngon par sgrub/byang chub tu ni mngon par rdzogs par
401b2(rgyud): 'tshang rgya/chos kyi 'khor lo ni bskor/sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni byin gyis rlob cing de'i grong du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang 'dod pas sems can tshad med pa'i
401b3(rgyud): phyir lus tshad med/lus tshad med pa'i phyir ye shes tshad med ye shes tshad med pa'i phyir sems can tshad med/sems can tshad med pa'i phyir na mkha'i khams tshad med pa rab tu
401b4(rgyud): 'thob bo//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na sems can tshad med pas tshad med pa bzhi rab tu thob par 'gyur//thob nas kyang stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/bdud bzhi las
401b5(rgyud): rgyal ba/khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyu su 'gyur//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yi//snying po sgo brgya 'di bzlas nas//go 'phang
401b6(rgyud): dam pa 'di dag kun//dpa' bo de dag rnams kyis rtogs//rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las 'bras bu'i sbyor ba

402a1(rgyud): kyi mgon po 'di bshad pa//ngo mtshar che'o dracom ldan 'das//thub pa chen po gnas gang du//gang gi ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi//de la sngags rnams 'byung ba ni//
402a2(rgyud): gang gis ji ltar bdag la gsungs//mgon po smra ba rnams kyi mchog/'di kun bdag la bshad du gsol/de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das//chos kyi dbang phyug thub pa che//
402a3(rgyud): kun mkhyen bcom ldan snang mdzad kyis//de tshe 'jig rten khams kun tu//yongasu khyab par gyur pa'i tshig/'jam pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje mthu bo che//
402a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po legaso legs//sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'i mchog//ngo mtshar chen po rab tu gasdang //rtog gi kun gyi mi shes pa//thaMd khyod la bshad par bya//
402a5(rgyud): gang dag thag chen dkyil 'khor 'dri//snying rje 'byung bar dbang bskur cing //gang dag drang zhing mnyen pa dang //rtag tu snying rje gang che dang //gang dag nam yang byang chub la//dmigs
402a6(rgyud): pa can du mi lta ba//de dag rnams kyi snying po ni//bdag nyid chen po shes par 'gyur//'dren pa gang na bzhugs pa yi//de yi gnas ni snying ka ste//pad+ma yid las byung ba ni//'dra ba
402a7(rgyud): ma brgyad pa rab mdzes la//dkyil 'khor zla ba lta bu ni//dri med me long 'dra ba la//de la gsang sngags mgon po ni//mthu chen rtag tu gnas pa bzhugs//gser gyi kha dog
402b1(rgyud): lanamamamamamamamasasamam mams mtham/amathas mthan sa mnyam sa mas mas/mamam mam a khathas nyam ma ma sa am mas bas tsam mal/
402b2(rgyud): 'drar dang cas//skyog dang dral nga'i ting 'dzin gnas//nyi ma bzhin du rtag par dka'//dri yis 'gro ba 'di dag kun//phyi rol dang ni nang du yang //kun du khyab par byin gyis brlabs//nA rba
402b3(rgyud): yid du shes par byos//shes rab mig kyang de nyid do//sngags pa shes rab mig gisu//me long la ni rnam bltas na//de ni rang gzugs rdzogs sangs rgyaso//mtshan nyid rab tu zhi bar
402b4(rgyud): mthong //de tshe lu so la lus kyis gzugs//yid la yid las byung ba ni//dag cing rnam par mdzes pa dag/bdag gi las kyis byung bar gyur//de nas de yi 'od zer ni//gang gis sdug

402b6(rgyud): pa ni//thams cad byed par 'gyur ba nyid//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas 'di ltar lus
402b7(rgyud): lA lus kyi gzugs bskyed par bya'o//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas los lhag pa ni gang yang med de/ji ltar bdag mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dong /lho dang /lus dang /
402b8(rgyud): yid la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i nang du gtogs pa yin la/de dog kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa ming tsam gyis bsdus pa na mkha' dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba/gzung du med pa/
403a1(rgyud): rgyu dang las las byung ba ste/gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshogs pa rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso//de dag kyang phan tshun rten
403a2(rgyud): cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rgyun mchod par 'brel pa ste/gling brten nas skyes pa dri ni/gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar 'byung //de lta bas na phan tshun rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir
403a3(rgyud): lha gang yin pa de bdag yin/bdag gang yin pa de ni lha yin zhes de ltar lus kyi gzugs lha'i skur bskyed par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos la brten nas rtogs pa
403a4(rgyud): 'byung //rtogs pa la brten nas kyang chos 'byung ba la ltos/de gnyis kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir phan tshun byed pa po dang las su rnam par 'jog par yang mi byed do//gsang ba
403a5(rgyud): pa'i bdag po ji ltar na yid las byung ba'i gzugs bskyed par bya zhe na/gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di lta ste/dkar po 'am/ser po 'am/dmar po yid la byas na yid de'i rnam pa la
403a6(rgyud): zhen par gyur te/de na de lta bus dgos pa yang de lta bu kho na mngon par sgrub par byed//gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di lta ste/yid la dkyil 'khor bsams na su//rims nad can
403a7(rgyud): la bzhag na ni//de yi med la skye bo ni//rims las thar 'gyur dogs pa med//yid med par yang dkyil 'khor yod pa ma yin la/dkyil 'khor med par yang yid yod ma yin
403b1(rgyud): deci'i phyir zhe na/dkyil 'khor dang mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir//gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di lta ste/sgyu ma mkhan gyis sgyu ma'i mi gzhan zhig sbrul na/g+hasang da pa'i bdag po de ji snyam du/
403b2(rgyud): sems/de la khyad par ci zhig yod/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phye ga na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//mi de gtig la yang khyad pa
403b3(rgyud): ma mchi so//bcom ldan 'das de tsi slad du zhe na/mi de gaunyi ka yang yang dag pa ma yin pa las byung ba dang sgyu ma yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag pa de bzhin du
403b4(rgyud): yid las 'byung ba'i dngos po dang /yid gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang rnam par brtags pa yin pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o//rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par bya
403b5(rgyud): pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las yi ge brgya pa rnam par dgo de pa sgrub po rim par phye ba'o////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sde gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la ba
403b6(rgyud): stsal pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi mgon po'i sku dang lus su dbyer med pa nyon cig/yid las gyur pa la sa byeng zhing //yid kyang shin tu rnam sbyangs na//mgo nam

404a3(rgyud): nor bu ni//dpal ljin 'dod pa'i don sgrub bo//de bzhin 'jig rteni sgren ma yi//sku yad don rnams thams cad sgrub//gsang ba po'i bradag po chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtogs pa
