404b1(rgyud): pa'i ye shes ji ltar skye//brang tshe chos zhes bya ba de//ngo bo nyid kyis mi rnyed pa//de tshon mkha' 'dra ba'i sems//byang chub 'byung ba skye bar 'gyur//de tshe 'jig rten kun 'thun pa'i//snying rje
404b2(rgyud): dag kyang skye bar 'gyuraro//ming tsam gyi ni tshul du gnas//sangs rgyas ming du 'di brjod//de tshe stong dang mi stong zhes//yang dag du ni ming du 'dogs//de la gcig gnyis gsum la sogs//
404b3(rgyud): grangs kyi dbye ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur//de ltar dpa' bo stong pa de//rang 'byung rnams kyi byin rlabs las//a la sogs par rim bzhin 'phel a bak+ka khA ga g+ha/tshe dzi dz+nyAM/TA rba Dan+tu/
404b4(rgyud): ta thad d+ha/pa pha ba b+hU ma/ya war la/sha Sha sa ha/da nya Na naM/rnams ni gsang ba po'i bdag po a zhes bya ba'i mtshan mas byin gyis brlabs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi mthu bas ti nge 'dzin

404b6(rgyud): par ston to//kha cig tu ni brjod du med pa'i don du nga'i gzugs kyis ston to//kha cig tu ni chos thams cad dgos pa dang bral ba'i don du ka'i gzugs kyis ston to//kha cig tu ni chos thaMd
404b7(rgyud): namakhang dang 'dra'o//zhes Sha'i gzugs kyis ston to//kha cig dun chos thams cad 'gro ba med par ga'i gzugs kyis sbyin to//cig tu ni gcig 'phungs po med par g+hi'i gzugs

405a6(rgyud): s+ya thams cad sbyin pa dang bral ba'o//zhes de'i gzugs kyi ste ston to// cig tu ni chos thams cad khams dmagasu med pa'i phyir d+ha'i gzugs kyis ston to//kha cig du ni chos
405a7(rgyud): mdod dam pa' bdon pa dmigasu med pa'i phyir ba'i gzugs kyis ston to//ba cig du ni chos thams cad dbu ba star snying po med pas zhes pa'i gzugs kyis ston to//kha cig tu ni
405b1(rgyud): chos thams da pa srid pa dmigs mdad pas b+ha'i gzugs kyis ston to//kha cog dun chos thams cadas 'tsho ba migs med do zhes mya'i gzugs kyis ston to//kha cog du rjes stongapa
405b2(rgyud): theg pa dmag su med pa'o zhes pa'i gzugs kyis sbyin to//kha cig dun chos thams cad rdul dang bral la zhes rwa'i gzugs kyis ston to//kha cig du ni chos thams cad mtshan nyid dmigs
405b3(rgyud): med do zhes la'i gzugs kyis ston to//kha cag du ni chas thams cad zhi ba dang bral ba'o zhes sha'i gzugs kyis ston to//kha cog du ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis bems pa'o zhes

405b5(rgyud): kyis ston to//gsang ba ba'i bdag po de ltar na ting 'dzin sgrub pa'i sgo re re la yang /ting 'dzin sgrub pa'i sgo sum cu rtswa gnyi su reg par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po skyes bu chen po'i mtsha
405b6(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis gang yin pa de dag kyang 'di dag nyid las byung ba la ltos/nga dang /nya dang /Na dang /na rnams ni ting 'dzin thams cad la dbang byed pa ste/de rnams las yang dag par rje
405b7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po rnams kyang mngon par 'grub par lta'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i
406a1(rgyud): spyad pa spyod pas 'a ltangs su rgya kyi dgongs pa mthar phyin pa sems bcu rnam pa bcur bskur ba tshad las yo go ts+tsha 'byung ba 'o ma chog bstan par
406a2(rgyud): shes par bya//rdzogs sa sa rgyas kyis 'di dag kun//chub par byas shing rgyas par byas//de li 'a thams cad yod pas mngoni rgyal mchog ku ni sangs rgyas//rnam snang bdung
406a3(rgyud): chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las bdag nyid sgrub pa'i rim par phye ba'o////gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang 'di rnyeg dzang
406a4(rgyud): ni/ting 'dzin gyi tshul sgrub pa'i tshi ge rnams te/stong pa nyid 'dis byin gyis brlabs na chos thams cad la dbang mdzad pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur//

406a7(rgyud): las 'khris su 'byung bar yang //skyob pa rnams ni kun gyis gsungs//smin stong nas h+yi ste//des ni 'di ku ni stong pa yin//me tog bzhin du ji lta bas//des na
406b1(rgyud): 'dri kun sdong par bya//stong min sgra yang yod ma yin//sbyor ba dag kyang kun tu bstan+tha//sgra de rtogs par gyur pa ni//lha yi gnas dang nga 'dzim/yi go dgod par sbyong ba dang //yi go rnams
406b2(rgyud): kyis kuni bstan pos//gsang sngags mang po zhes bya bar//tha snyad gdags pa'i gan su 'gyur//rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin
406b3(rgyud): gyis rlob pa las yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o////ji ltar na mkha'i phyogs rnams na//kun la rtag par mi gnas pa//de bzhin chos rnams thams cad la/

408a1(rgyud): po gang gi tshe sku gsum la mnga' mdzad pa de dag rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag 'di ltar dang por sprul pan/

409a1(rgyud): lag na rdo rje gzhan yang dus gcig gi tshe nad byang chub sems dang rwa gyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dug pa na tshangs pas
409a2(rgyud): ngal/kye tshangs pa chen po me la rnam pa du yod par shes par bya zhes dris pa dang /ngas de la 'di skad cesau smras so//kye nga rgyal con gang yin pa de ni rang byung ba'o//de'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i
409a3(rgyud): bu ste de las skyes pa yino//'jig rten pa yi me ba bA ka/tshangs pa'i bu ni dang po yin//de'i bu tshangs pa'i zas de yang //b+ha ra ta zhes bya bar bshad//de'i bu bai shwa na ra da//ha ban drang
409a4(rgyud): srog bya len//ngos bsrungs a ta ra ba na yi//bu yin par ni rgya mtshor grags//rlung zhes bya ba'i mi de ni//mdul du 'dug pa'i cho gor bshad//de nas mi khrus bya ba la//de bzhin//
409a5(rgyud): pa ba mau nar shes//bkra shis zhes bya mtshams kyi mthar//btsas pa'i las la pra gal po'o//mi 'dogs me ni bar ji ba//de bzhin dkan dbab pa la gtsang //shad bi zhes bya
409a6(rgyud): gtsug dud la//brtul zhugs sbyin po kun byung ngo //nyi ma zhes bya phyug sbyin la'o//bag mu len la sbyor byed bshad//ag+ne yas ni khyim khA bsgo//nye bar dbul la me nyid do//
409a7(rgyud): pa ba ka zhes bya ba'i me//sna tshogs lha la sbyar bar bshad//khyim bdag lan tshangs pa'i me//de bzhin nor 'bru ba la zhi//de bzhin phyogs ni bcings pa la//a ba ni ka zhes
409b1(rgyud): byi'i mo//ltung ba la nI bi tsits+tsha//gcos sbyin la ni s+yA ha sa//dus kyi mtshams la ha bor zhes//de bzhin zla bya gnas la gter//miT zhes byung gang zugs la//zhi ldang du nad 'dod do//
409b2(rgyud): byas mtha'i mi ni gshin rje'o//de bzhin rgyas la stobs sbyin pa'o//drag shul spyad pa thams cad la//khri bo'i me ni rab tu bsgrags//'dod las skyes zhes bya ba'i me//de ni dbang gi
409b3(rgyud): don du bshad//nags tshal sreg pa pho nya'i me//khong pa'i me ni dza tha ra//bza' bar bya ba sha zar bshad//rgod ma'i kha ni rgya mtsho na'o//zad tshe 'jig pa zhes bya ste//dus mtha' mer ni
409b4(rgyud): yang dag bsgrags//'di ni me rnams mdor bsdus nas//des pa khyod la bshad pa ste//rig byed thos pa spyod rnams kyis//tshangs pa'i bu drag brjod pa yin//bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi 'di
409b5(rgyud): dag ni//de yi tshe na ngas bstan to//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la maM rnams rang bzhin mi shes par//gang dag skyon sreg byed pa de//sbyin sreg ma yin legs byas min//las kyi 'bras/
409b6(rgyud): bu'ang yod mi 'gyur//ngas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ni me rnam pa bcu gnyis bstan to/de dag kyang gang zhe na/ye shes me ni drang po ste//de ni dbang chen zhes
409b7(rgyud): bsgrags//kha dog ser po'i mdog can la mdog dang rgyus dang stobs rab ster//'bar ba'i phreng can ting 'dzin gnas//ye shes rdzogs byed yin zhes bya//gnyis pa 'dzin
410a1(rgyud): byA ces bya ste//spyan ka zla ba'i 'od dang 'dra//dpal ldan gos ni dkar po dgos//skung drong rol ba snoru thugs thogs//gsum pa rlung gos bya ba sgo//rjonan
410a2(rgyud): gnas la rtsub pa'o//bzhi pa dmangar po zhes bya ste//nub ka'i mtshams kyi dmed thag 'dre//lnga pa mr-i Da zhes bya ba//spyan lo kha dog khamA pa ste//mgrin pa dang zhing gin brjid che//kun
410a3(rgyud): la phan ni 'dags par bshad//drug pa khro bo zhes bya ba//mig yon dud pa'i kha dog 'dra//gyen du skra rjes sgra chena'i byin//mche ba bzhi pa stobs pa che//bdun pa lto ba zhes bya ste//
410a4(rgyud): rno la kha dog kun dang ldan//brgyud pa brang po zhes bya bo//glog gi 'od zer 'gyur ba 'dra//dgu pa yid las skyes zhes bya//sna tshogs gzugs can stobs po che//bcu pa 'jig
410a5(rgyud): rten 'dzin pa yin//sha za'i me ni dri las gzhan//rmugs byed zhes pa bcu gnyis te//sems can thams cad rmugs byed pa'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar du/me yi
410a6(rgyud): gzugs ni byin rlabs te//bdag gi rang gi gzugs dang ni//rdzas kyang de yi ngo bor bya//'di ni phyi yi sbyin sreg te//dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin sreg bya//gas ba pa'i bre dag po
410a7(rgyud): nang gi rang bzhin gcig pa ste/gnas gsum gcig tu bya ba'i tshul gyis gsum dang ldan pa ni nang gi spyan sreg yi no//gsang ba pa'i bdag po byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po/
410b1(rgyud): dang ldan pa ni zhi ba'o//dga' ba dang ldan pa ni rgyas pa'o//khro bo'i mes ni drag shul spyad par bya ste/khro bo nyid brtsan par byas la/Ta dang pha'i bar du ming bcug s+ho/gzugs brnyan yang
410b2(rgyud): khra bo'i dkyil 'khor du bzhag la khro bo thul bas bya'o//dbus su ni rlung gi ma bzhog/gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar ji skad bsgrags pa'i gnas de dang de dag tu ji ltar rigs pa
410b3(rgyud): dang ji ltar ldan par sbyin sreg bya'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das me'i thab khung ji ltar bgyi//gsang gtor drag kyang /
410b4(rgyud): ji ltar bgyi//ku shau'i rtsa yang ji ltar dgram//ji ltar bsam pa bdag la gsungs//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phag na rdo rje la 'di skad
410b5(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to//gsang ba pi'i bdag po/de la me yi thab khung ni//kun tu khwa gang tsam gyi tshad//kha khyer sor bzhi'i tshad du bya//rdo rje'i mtshan ma dag gis mtshan//thab khung
410b6(rgyud): gi ni g.yas phyogs nas//ku sha'i rtswa ne rlon pa dgram//rtse mo dag kyang rtsa bas kri//rtsa ba dag kyang rtse mos dkri//'dir ni bsrang gtor g.yas phyogs nas//ku sha bskor ba bzhin
410b7(rgyud): du bya//byug spos me tog bdug spos dge/mr-i Da ri ma la dbul bar bya//zhugs thab dang na mr-i Da'i me//me tog gcig gis rang gi gzugaso//sngags pa sdom brtson can gyi
411a1(rgyud): gzhang //gsung gtor dag kyang de nas byas//dgung blugs rang gi gsang sngags kyis//mkhas pas de la dbul bar bya//de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gam//yang
411a2(rgyud): na rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya//'jig rten pa yi sbyin sreg ni//phyi rol pa zhes gsungs pa yin//gzhan yang nang gi sbyin sreg ni//las dang tshe dag bkag pa ste//de ni yid kying
411a3(rgyud): shes par bya//gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa spangs//mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus rnams ni yid las skyes pa sems kyi rgyal po la gnas pa ste/kun tu rtog/
411a4(rgyud): pas bskyed pa 'di dag dang /byang chub kyi sems dang /yul dang /mig la sogs pa dang /rlung gi me yang 'phro ba med pa'i shes rab kyis bkag ste/yid kyi me la sbyin sreg bya'o//
411a5(rgyud): de ni nang gi sbyin sreg ces//nges pa khyod la bstan pa yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa/khyed rnams kyis chos
411a6(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di la bag yod par gnas pas spyad par bya'o//nga yi sras rnams ma gtogs par/gzhan su la yang mi sbyin cig/de dag mtshan nyid bo shad par bya//thad
411a7(rgyud): kyis kyang mnyan par gyis//nyi ma'i rigs las skyes pa dang //nga rgyal can la blo yang zhi ba//byas pa gzo zhing chos kyang 'dod//chog kyang shes shing chos la 'bad//kha dog
411b1(rgyud): mtshan ka mamamam cacanaHsa samaman mas mtham/amaman thasamamathan thas mamanyam a mas tham mam gamatshan ma gas ma mtha tham am ma[।] ma mas ma ma
411b2(rgyud): drug kyang sngo bsangs la//bzhin yang shin tu bzang ba dang //sna dbyibs mtho la rtse mo no//mgo dang bral ba dbyes che ba//de kun nga yI sras yin te//bstan pa'i don la sems pa yin//
411b3(rgyud): de dag la ni nan tan tu//'di ni rtag tu sbyin par bya'o//de nas de dog thams cad yid rab tu dga' nas ston pos bka' stsal pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol to//de nas de'i tshe thad kyis
411b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te/mchod pa dag klu legs byas nas//spyan sdang 'khod nas thal sbyar te//'di skad ces ni tshig tu smras//chos kyi tshul 'di 'jig rten na//
411b5(rgyud): ji ltar yun ring kun gnas par//mgon po byin gyi brlabs kyi tshig/bston pa 'di la bo shad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis bcwa
411b6(rgyud): pi'i tshig gsungs pa/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha mAM sar+b+ba/shri shi traM traM/guM guM/d+hi ri d+ha raM/s+thA pa ya//bud+d+ha satwa bA kA d+harma/sa t+ya/b+hA ka/hUM hUM be da bi di swA hA/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
411b7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa dang /rdo rje 'dzin de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa de dag yi rangs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
411b8(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang
412a1(rgyud): t+ma/chung sems dpa rI spyad pa spyod pa'i cho ga ji rnyed par rim par bye ba nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogaso////rgyu gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge
412a2(rgyud): slong dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus to gtan la phab pa'o////mkhas pas rgyud rnams thams cad las/dngos grub ji snyed gsungs pa rnams//de dag thams cad mdor
412a3(rgyud): bsdu na//rnam pa bzhir ni ma lus 'dus//las kyi dang po zhi ba ste//de bzhin gzhan yang rgyas pa dang //dbang dang drag shul spyod pa'i las/rnam pa 'dri bzhir rab tu bsgrags//de la
412a4(rgyud): thar pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub dang /gdon la sogs pa'i gnod pa zhi bar bya ba dang /tshe ring bar bya ba ni zhi ba'o//yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /ral gri'i rig sngags 'chang dang /'khor
412a5(rgyud): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la sogs pa dang nor sgrub pa gang yang rung ste de dag thams cad ni rgyas pa'o zhes gsang sngags la mkhas pa rnams smra'o//skyes bu dang /bud med dang /
412a6(rgyud): khye'u dang /bu mo dang /rgyal po dang /blon po la sogs pa dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /gnod sbyin mo dang /lha ma yin mo dang /sha za mo la sogs pa dbang du bya zhing
412a7(rgyud): dgug pa ni dbang du bya ba'o//zhes rigs sngags 'chang rnams smra'o//bcing bar bya ba dang /gnod par bya ba dang /yan lag bcad pa dang /dgar ba dang sdang bar bya ba dang /
412b1(rgyud): bsrud pa dang /bskam pa la sogs pa mdor na sems can rnams kyi lus la gnod par bya ba gang yang rung ste/de dag thams cad ni drag shul spyad pa yin zhes rig sngags 'chang rnams smra'o//
412b2(rgyud): sbyin sreg tshim byed las rnams kyis//gsang sngags dngos grub myur du ste//lha rnams thams cad byin slong cing //dngos grub mchog kyang ster bar 'gyur//nyungs sam ma 'byor tshig
412b3(rgyud): nyams//yi ge gug skyed lhag ma chad//ma nan tam bgegs kyis brlams kyang rung //de dag thams cad sbyor bar byed//sbyin sreg med par las rnams las//dngos grub thob
412b4(rgyud): par yong mi 'gyur//skyon sreg las rnams nges pa ni//de bas nan tan bskyed de bya//zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang /drag shul spyod pa'i bye brag las spyan sreg gi bye brag dbye
412b5(rgyud): bar bya'o//de la re shig zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg nges pa ni grong gi byang phyogs rgyang grags gcig tsam du song los gzhi legs par brtag pa ni chu bo gang+gA'i ngogs sam/pad+mo'i ma
412b6(rgyud): 'gro ma mam/'babachu'i 'gram mam/mtsho'i gling du yang rung ste/sa gzhi kha dog dkar po la bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs te/sa la bskul ba dang sbyang ba la sogs
412b7(rgyud): pa gyes te/yar gyi de'i chos lnga 'am/bzhi 'am/bcu'am/zla ba nya la dkyil 'khor brtsam pa 'di ltar bya'o//skar ma khrums smad dang /gre dang /skag dang /mchu ni zhi ba'i skar ma
413a1(rgyud): maman mamamamacamamamamasamam cas mtham/samams thas mthas mtham sams tham mams/mtsham mas gsas ma mams ma yams a sa thams ma mal/
413a2(rgyud): yin//gza' zla bA 'am/pA ba sangs dbang ba la dang por las brtsam par bya'o//de nas bdag nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bsgyur la/bac+doMs rnam
413a3(rgyud): par snang mdzad ral gle phyag rgya 'am/yi ge A'i 'brur pad+ma la gzhago/A/dwe n+na byang phyogasu sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya gru gsum pa 'am/yig 'bru pad+ma'i steng du gzhego/e/
413a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi nub phyogasu na mkha'i snying po ral gri phyag rgya 'am yi ge'i 'brur gzhag/A~M/na mkha'i snying po'i nub phyogasu 'jam dpal te/de yang ut+pa la'i phyag rgya'i/
413a5(rgyud): yi ge 'brur gzhag/mA~M/de'i nub phyog su na mkha'i spyan phyag rgyo 'am/yig 'brur gzhago/gA/sangs rgyas rnams kyi shar phyogasu shAkya thub pa lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya 'om/
413a6(rgyud): yig 'brur gzhago/b+hU/de'i drung du mdzod spu yid bzhon gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya 'am/yig 'brur gzhago/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya
413a7(rgyud): yig 'bru dang bcas par bri ste de lnga 'di ni yi ge'i 'bru'o//ka/de nas rnam par snang ma da chen po'i g.yas rolnga du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'am yig
413a8(rgyud): 'brur gzhag/sa/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yon logasu mthu chen po thob pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'am yi ge 'brung gzhag/ma/mthu min po thob pa'i drung du khri
413b1(rgyud): gnyer tsAn kun da'i phyagA rgya'am yi ga 'brur gzhago/hI/pad+ma 'dzin gyi g.yas log pu lha mo sgrol ma ut+pa la'i phyag n+ya ma/yi gI 'brur gzhago/t+te/dwe'i drung du gos dkar
413b2(rgyud): can pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'am yi ge 'brur gzhag/paM/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon log su rdo rje 'dzin rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'am/yi ge 'brur pad+ma'i steng du gzhag/ga/de'i g.yas logasum
413b3(rgyud): ma kI rdo rje'i phyag rgya' mra yi ge 'brur gzhago/mA/de'i drung du rig pa'i rgyal po gnod mdzes rdo rje'i phyag rgya'amo yig 'brur gzhag/saM/rdo rje 'dzin gyi g.yon logasu bdud rtsi thub
413b4(rgyud): sbyar rdo rje'i phyag rgya'am yi ge 'brur gzhag/mr-i/de'i drung du rdo rje 'dzin thams cad rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'am yi ge 'brur gzhago/hUM/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og logasu me'i phyogasu mi
413b5(rgyud): g.yo ba rol gri phyag rgya'am yi ge 'brur gzhago/hU~M/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og logs bdun bral gyi phyogs su 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje be con gyi phyag rgya
413b6(rgyud): 'am/yi ge 'brung gzha go/hA/sgo drung gnyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo gnyis dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo zhes pa'i ming du bzhag/sgo khyud rnams kyi nang du
413b7(rgyud): srung ba bzhi dgod/shar phyogasu ralo gra dang yi ge 'bru'o//ce/byang byagasu ral gri dang yi ge 'bru'o//pa/nub phyogasu bo con dang yi ge 'bru'o//sa/lho phyog su be con dang
414a1(rgyud): yi ge 'bru'o//k+Sha/de nas phyi rol gyi ri po'i nang logasu gnas kyi dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas gtsang ma lnga rnams bri ba ni dkyil 'khor dang po la so so swA hA zhes bya'o//
414a2(rgyud): gnyis pa la ma no ma ya zhes bya'o//gsum pa la d+har+m+ma saM b+ha ba zhes bya'o//bzhi pa lA bi b+ha ba zhes bya'o//lnga pa la ka tha nA na zhes bya'o//yang na gnas kyi dkyil 'khor chung ngu la
414a3(rgyud): sa~M sAM swA hA/zhes bya ba gzhag tu ru //bdag gi lha ni rigs gang du gtogs pa de'i rigs kyi bdag po'i gnasu bdag gi phyag rgya 'am/yi ge 'brur gzhag par bya'o//de nas phyi
414a4(rgyud): rol gyi ri mo'i nang thog thag tu pad+ma bri'o//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i g.yas rol 'khor sa'i nang rol du me'i thab khung bya ba ni/kho ra khor yug zlum po 'a//khru tshad kyi ni
414a5(rgyud): tshad du bya//zabasu sor ni bcu gnyis tshad/de yi steng du kha ran ni//kun tu sor bzhi tsam du bya//de yi zhabs kyi dbus su ni//'khor lo 'phang du sor gcig bya//de nas
414a6(rgyud): 'dug la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/dam tshig gi gsang sngags brjod la yi ge sa dang pad+ma'i phyag rgyas bdag spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tu byin gyis brlabs te/
414a7(rgyud): yi ge a rang gi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa las rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku ji lta ba bzhin du'i gyur bar bsams la nyid kyi phyag rgya yang bstan to//de nas ral gri'i phyag
414b1(rgyud): mamamams sams mtham/amathasams ama.a ma bas/man a kas kha la ma.an masal
414b2(rgyud): rgya bcings la yi ge A las bdag rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i skur byin gyis brlangs te/dkyil 'khor gyi yi ge tha~Md so so'i lha'i gran su gyur par bsams la skyo so'i phyag rgya
414b3(rgyud): rnams kyang bstan to//de nas 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngags zlosra shi las kyi rdo rjes byas la/lha rnams so so'i dkyil 'khor na ji snyed bzhugs pa la byug spos dang /me tog
414b4(rgyud): la sogs pa dbul lo yi ge ras kyang rdul dang bral ba'o snyam pa'i ting 'dzin mngon du byas la/byug spos dang /me tog la sogs pa so so'i gsang sngags kyis mngon par bsngags te/
414b5(rgyud): byug spos la sogs pa la so so'i snying po'i gsang sngags kyis kyang mngon par bsngags la dbul lo//byug spros 'dri ba zhes te/bdag la thugs dpag mdzod cig ces so sor
414b6(rgyud): bskul bA yang bya'o//de bzhin du thams cad la sbyor//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA rAM/trata a mo g+ha tsaN+Da mahA ro ShA NA s+pho Ta ya hUM traT hI ma/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngag so//na maHsa man+ta
414b7(rgyud): budz+nyA nAM/bi shud+d+ha ga na d+hod b+ha bA swA hA/byug spos kyi gsang sngags//ni maHsaM mAn+ta bud d+hA nAM/ma hA ma tI bud+d+hi gA te swA hI/me tog gI gsang sngag so//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM d+harmA d+hA
414b8(rgyud): tA nr-i ge te swAhA/bdug spos kyi gsang sngagaso//na maHsa min+ta budz+nyA nAM/ta thA g+ha tsi s+pha ra Na e ba b+hA sa/ge ga no d+har+ya sA hA/mar me'i gsang sde gso//na maHsa man+ta br-id+d+hin/
415a1(rgyud): ya n+tik+ShAn+t+ra a /pa /bi pa da ba la d+hahU~M s+yAhA/ nga sngags//na maHsa mAn+ta sar+b+bAnA~M/bru bla nas mu sa ma swAt+ma/mchod yon gyo gas
415a2(rgyud): sngag so//thog ma dang tha mAr yang sbyang//snying po'i gsang sngags brjod pa'i cho ga ni/oM b+ha ga bAn bai ro tsan/I da~M g+ha d+hI/pra ti ts+yaiSh+ya/i di me kAr+yaM ku ru swA hA/de bzhon du zad la
415a3(rgyud): yang sbyar bar bya'o//zhi ba'i cho ga ni tsin+dan dkar po ga pud dang sbyar la dbul/ma 'byor na mkhas pas pu shel ci 'bu'o//de bzhin du me tog pad+ma dkar po dang /sna ma'i me tog dang /
415a4(rgyud): me tog man li ka dang /me tog yukA ti ka la sogs pa me tog dkar po dri zhim pa bkra shis pa gang yin pa de dag dbulo//zhi ba'i tshu gA la bdug spos ni ga pur dang /tsan+dan
415a5(rgyud): dang yang na shri ba sa ka dbulo//bshos kyang zho dang 'bras tshan la sogs pa dkar po dbu lo//mar me yang mAr gyi mar me snod dkar po'i nang du blugs te dbulo//dung la sogs
415a6(rgyud): pa snod dkar po'i nang du tsan+dan dang ga pur dang me tog dkar po sbyar ba'i chu blugs pa'i mchod yon dbu lo//de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i mchod pa byas nas de nas phyir byung ste bdag nyid
415a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug tu byin gyis brlabs la phyi rol tu phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin pa ni 'bras yos dang /til dang /chu dang /'bras chan dang /me tog dang /srin chen dang /
415b1(rgyud): pri sa rang bcas pa mang la snum bag can de lta bu'i gtor mo slob dpon gyis lag pas blangs te dga' bzhin du phyogs thams cad du gtor zhing bdug spos dang mchod yon yang dbul/
415b2(rgyud): thog mar dbang ldan phyogasu ni//gzhu can tshogs dang bcas la dbul//de nas dbang po'i phyogasu yang //mkhas pas dbang po nyid la dbul//de nas sngags pa mi 'jigs pas//
415b3(rgyud): me yi phyogs dbul bar bya//de nas gshin rje'i phyogasu yang //dbul bar sngags la mkhos pas bshad//bden bral phyogasu bden bral ni//tshogs dang bcas la dbul bar
415b4(rgyud): bya//chu lha'i phyogasu klu rnams la//'jigs byud gsang sngags zlos shing dbul//bdag dang bcas pa phul nasu//rlung gi phyogasu 'gro bar bya//sngags la mkhas pas dang song
415b5(rgyud): nas//rlung lha tshogs dang bcas pa la//rang gi ming nas smos na su//rang gi sngags kyis gtor ma dbul//byang gi phyogs song nasu//yid ni rab tu dang byas te//bdag gi dngos grub
415b6(rgyud): thob 'dod pas//gnod sbyin rnams la gtor ma dbul//srin po rnams dang sha za dang /'byung po rjen sha can rnams dang //sems can rnam pa sna tshogs la/mkhas pas gtor
415b7(rgyud): ma phyogasu gtor //sau phyogs de yi sems can ni//shing dang gel pa la gnas pa//blo la gad dang gang dran pa//de dang de la gtor ma sbyin//phyogs kyi gtor ma'i sngags rnam
416a1(rgyud): /dbang ldan gyi phyog su ru drA ya swAt+ma/dbang po'i phyog+sa su shak+ShA ya swA d+hAn mi ya phyogs ag+na yo star+tha/ga sh-in rje'i phyog su pa bstAH/bdun bral zla
416a2(rgyud): phyog swA rak+Sha sa a d+hi pa ta yai swAhA/rmu lha'i phyogasum g+hu shai nI ye swA hA/rlung gi phyog suM bA ya bi swAt+ma/ku bai ra'i phyog suM yak+Shi bit+tA d+hA ri swA hUM/kr-i ke re swA hU~M/srin po rnams kyi'o//
416a3(rgyud): mi tsi mi tsi swA hA/sha za rnams kyi'o//gu i gu i swA hA/'byung po rnams kyi'o//de ltar kun tu gtor ma gtor la lag pa bkrus te nye reg byas la de nas nang du zhugs te snangs
416a4(rgyud): rgyus thams cad la phyag 'tsha lnga la bsreg par bya ba'i rdzas gang yang rung ste cung zad ci yod pa de dag thams cad 'phyags pa mi g.yo bas bsongs te g.yas rol tu bzha go//g.yon/
416a5(rgyud): rol du ni mchod yin gyi snod gnyis rtswa ku sha dang spos chus sbyar te bzhag lnga gcig ni 'phags pa mi g.yo bzlos so//gcig ni rdo rje mchog gi bzlaso//zhugs thab kyi khor khor
416a6(rgyud): yug tu rtsa ku sha bskor ba'i thabasu dgra mo//bdag rang gar 'dug pa'i gzhir yang rtsa ku sha bskor ba'i thab su gding ngo //shing u dum bar dang /a shwad tha'i drag dru gzar dang /
416a7(rgyud): rmugs gzar dang /mar bzhus pa yang mdun du bzhago//de nas me'i thab khung tsan+dan gyis bskus te/me tog dkar po dri zhim po'i sol ma yang bkram la bram ze'i khyim nas mi
416b1(rgyud): blangs pa khro bo'i rgyal po sdu bsang gtod byas to shing blag sha dang /u dum ba ra'i shing rlung g.yab kyis mo swab+h+yo/nga kha byung phyogasu blta swA te 'dug lnga lag pa gnyis byug spos
416b2(rgyud): kyis bskus te dmau tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa bcings la bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ji lta bu bzhin du phyag rgya dang /gasnang
416b3(rgyud): sngags kyis byin gyis brla'o//de nas thab khung gi zhab su chu'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/chu'i dbus su yi ge snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa las me'i gzugasu gyur pa dung dang me
416b4(rgyud): tig kun da dang /zla ba'i mdog 'dra ba/thor tshugs can/mag gsum pa/lag pa bzhi pa/lag na baglang phreng dang /gun d+ha dang bai con thogs shing mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/
416b5(rgyud): gos dkar po bgos pa srad bu dkar po se ral khar thogs pa/snying ka'i sum mdo'i ris mtshan pa can/yi ge ras mtshan pa/me lce dkar po 'phro ba/ye shes kyi rang bzhin can
416b6(rgyud): de lta bu'i me lha bsams la/'phags pa mi g.yo bas bsngags pa'i chu sdar bshams pas me la bskor ba'i thab su bsang gtor bya'o//rdo rje mchog sbyin gyis kyang lan
416b7(rgyud): gsum du bya'o//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM maM swA hA/rdo rje mchog sbyin gyi'o//de nas me la rang gi gsang sngags kyi byug spos dang /me tog l-i sogs pa dbu'o//de nas mngar
417a1(rgyud): gsum las sreg blug gsum byin te dgang gzar chad bas bzung la mar gyi dragang thugs gsum sbyin//de nas shing u dum bya ra'am/a shwat+tha'i
417a2(rgyud): mo'i ya ma shing rtse gnyis mar la smyugs pa bdun srego/de nas yang mar gyi gang blugs gsum byin la bsang gtor yaung snu ma bzhin du bya'o//oM bar drag na ye sh+len+do ku ru
417a3(rgyud): swAhA/de bzhin du lha thams cad la yang so sor sbyin sreg byas la bsang gtor bya'o//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/hUM a ma hA shAn+ti ga ta/shAn+ti k+Sha pra shA ma d+har+m+ma nir dza ta/a b+hA ba
417a4(rgyud): swa b+hA da d+harma sa man+ta prAp+ta/a mu bA s+ya/swastI shAn+ti/baM ku ru swA hA/zhi ba'i gsang sngagaso//de nas so ngas rgyas thams cad dran par byis la bdag nyid kyis nang rnam par
417a5(rgyud): dag pas ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub kyi sems sgom mo//de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rang gis rig sngags bzhag ste rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcings la rang gi lha'i gzugs/
417a6(rgyud): su sgom mo//de nas yang sdo ma bzhin du dgang blugs gsum la sogs pa phul te bskor ba'i thabs su bsang gtor yang byas la bdag gis rgyud las byung ba'i rdzas rnams
417a7(rgyud): ji srid mi skyo'i bar du sbyin sreg bya'o//skye bar gyur na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bltas te yang byang chub kyi sems sgomo//de nas mchod yon phul la lha rnams la phyag
417b1(rgyud): byas te slar gshegasu gso ba 'o//lha rnams slar gshegasu gsol nas phyag rgya'i tshogs gos+dza snar pas g.yogs la phyi de nyin yang snga ma bzhin du lha rnams so so'i dkyil 'khor la/
417b2(rgyud): gnas par bsams te cho ga'i rim pa de nyid na pa zhi bar gyur gyi bar du bya'o//gang zhig cho ga 'di yisu//cho ga shes pa'i sngags sgrub pas//le l-i med par zhi byas na//zhi ba myur du
417b3(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//zla ba phyed kyi khams ris gcig/des pa nyid du zhi bar 'gyur//rgyal po la ni zhag bcu gnyis//yul phyogasu ni zhag bcu so//de la zhu ba'i cho ga'i las byed
417b4(rgyud): pas cho ga 'di ltar spyad par bya'o//gos dkar bgos shing gtsang la zhi//byang chub sems la rab tu gzhol//ku shwa bting ba'i stan la nyal//de las byas pa'i gsang byed thogs//nas
417b5(rgyud): tshal bcos pa'ang 'o ma thung //yid kyis sbyin sreg byed la 'jug/dus gsum sbyin sreg bzlas brjod kyis//zhi ba'i cho ga spyad par bya'o//zhal bsil rdo rje mchog sbyin gyis//bsang
417b6(rgyud): gtar mi g.yo mgon gyis bya'o//rnam par snod mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs las zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rim par phye ba'o///
417b7(rgyud): skal pa chen po de nas gzhan//shin tu rgyas byed sbyin sreg kyang //ma yengs yid kyis mnyan par gyis//sngon gyi sngags la mkhas pa yis//son rnams la brtse ba'i phyir//phan
418a1(rgyud): /bar 'dod pas bshad par bya//de bas rnam pa thams cad du//rgyas pa'i cho ga spyad pa bya//grong ngam yang na ljongs dag go/shAr b+h+yo b+h+yog su gnas banas nas//snga ma
418a2(rgyud): bzhin du nges pa yi//sa gzhi legs par brtag par bya//ri yi rtse 'am phyugs lhas sam//mchod rten ring bsrel can dag tu//rgyas pa'i las ni sgrub byed pa'i'o//dkyil 'khor shes rab
418a3(rgyud): can gyis bri//mkhas pas las kyi cho ga yis//sa ni legs par brkos nusu//dbus su rin chen bzhag pa ni//sman dang 'bru rnams bcas pa'o//der yang sa ni ser po yis//sa
418a4(rgyud): gzhi legs par dgang bar bya//mnyam zhing legs par bcags nasu//de yi 'og tu dkyil 'khor bri//'dir yang sngags pa mkhas pas rdo rje mchog sbyin rang gi dkyil 'khor la
418a5(rgyud): gnas par dro'i gsang sngags dang phyag rgyas bdag byin gyis brlabs la 'phags pa mi g.yo bas mtshams bcad pa dang yongasu gzung por bya'o//zla ba yang ngo'i/
418a6(rgyud): tshes gsum mam/lnga 'am/bdun nam/yang nA zla ba nya la lnga rung ste/gza' skar bzang po gza' lag gam/phur bu 'am/rgyu skar gro zhin dang /mon gru dang /snron dang /snang
418a7(rgyud): ma la bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen por byin gyis brlabs te/srad bu seng po blangs la chad sngar bstan pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo//de nas
418b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bskor te nang du zhugs la bcom ldan 'das mA shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklabs la phyag byas te/yang rnam par snang mdzad du bdug byin gyis brlabyas te/rngon rtsi sar pa
418b2(rgyud): blangs la der ni yi go bzhag pa//de tshe thub pa ge ser zla ba ni/gser gyi kha dog 'ber dang bcas//ting 'dzin gnas shing sdig bcom pa'i//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bzhi rta babs can
418b3(rgyud): du zi la nub phyogs kyi sgo rtag tu dbye'o//phyi rol tu ri ma gru bzhi pa/gsum gyis bskor la dkyil 'khor du b+ha rnams dgod pa snga mya bzhin du bya'o//de la khyad par ni 'di yod do//
418b4(rgyud): 'phrugs pa na mkha'i snying po'i gnasu kun tu bzang po rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya yi ge sa dang bcas par gzhago/sa mdzod spu'i gnasu ni 'phags pa dzam+b+ha la shing rtog pa
418b5(rgyud): pu ri'i phyag rgya dang /yi ge dza bdud rtsi'i man nyid can dang bcas par gzhag//'phags ma khro gnyer can gyi gnasu grags ldan ma me tog pri yang ku'i phyag rgya yi ge yA dang bcas
418b6(rgyud): bdag 'go/ye/'phags ma gos dkar mo can gyi gnas ni dpal chen mo 'phags ma dkar mo zhes bya ba pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang yi ge 'brung gzhago/shrI/'phags pa gnod mdzes kyi
418b7(rgyud): gsuni dathung ba rje'i phyag rgya dang yi ge 'byung na /hUM 'du 'i thab skyong gan smyen rdo rje'i sngo ste/rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang yi ge gyu ga/saM gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyi
419a1(rgyud): gan su ni brgya byin+da dang 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dgod do//de nas phyi rol gyi ma mo gnyis kyi nang logs khor khor yug dang grwa thams cad du rdo rje bri'o//de nas dkyi/
419a2(rgyud): 'khor gyi g.yas logs 'khor sa'i nang du me'o thag khung bya ba ni/gru bzhi lham pa khA ran can//rgyar ni khru do'i tshad du bya//rdo rje'i mtshan ma rnams kyis bskor//zab su khru grang
419a3(rgyud): tsam gyi tshad//kha ra na mtho gang tshad du bya//'jim pa ser po'i skyang nul bsku//pad+ma'i phyag rgya mdzub gang ba//'phang du sor bzhi'i tshad du bye//dus gsum du ba glang gi lci bus
419a4(rgyud): la ma lhung bas bsku'o//de nas snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bodag po'i lha la sogs pa rnam pa dang mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du bsams te/byug spos dang me tog la sogs
419a5(rgyud): bas mchod pu pa'o//de la khyad par ni 'di yod dri/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gnasu bzhugasu gsol pa dang /byug spos dang /me tog la sogs pas
419a6(rgyud): mchod pa de'i tshe bdag rdo rje mo chod sbyin du byin gyis brlabs ta bya'o//'dir byug spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i khyad par bshad par bya ste/gur gum ga pur bsres pa ni//
419a7(rgyud): rgyas pa dag la byug spos mchog/dri zhom kha dog ser po yang //de ma rnyed na sbyar bar bya//me tog tsam pa rab tu bzang //yu thi sna ma ser po dang //de las gzhan pa'ang dri
419b1(rgyud): zhim pa//ser po dag ni dbul bar bya//bur bum A gar+b+ha dang sbyar//sha khar dang sbyar ba dag/rgyas pa'i lus rnams 'grub pa'i phyir/bdug spos mkhas byas dngul bAr b+hu//gu
419b2(rgyud): gul dang ni tsan+dan kyang //mir dang sbyor la bdug spos mchog/g+han d+ha ra sa gur gum bsres//bdug spos sngags la mkhasngo pas dbul//mar me snod nI gi srer gyi bzang //yang
419b3(rgyud): na kham pa ser po'ang rung //mkhas pas ras ni ser po yi//me mar snying po ser po dbul//spos kyi 'bru mar bzang po yis//de yi snum ni dri zhim bya//yang na til gyi 'bru mar gyis//
419b4(rgyud): myur me gtsang ma dbul bar bya//'bras chan ser po sran tshod tsam//mar dang bcas pa shin tu bzang //tshod ma rnams kyang ser por bya//shing tig bag chos de bzhin//spos chu me
419b5(rgyud): tog ser po dang //de bzhin 'bras dang dUr ba'i rtsa//snod kyang ser por blugs pa dag/rgyas pa la ni mchod yon shis//de ltar mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/de nas rdo rje mchog
419b6(rgyud): sbyin du bdag byin gyis brlabs la phyi rol tu byung ste phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin//de nas nye reg byas te nang du zhugs la sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas te/me'i thab khung gi drung
419b7(rgyud): du bsreg par bya la sogs pa sngags kyi bsang pa rnams snga ma bzhin du bzhag la sa la rtswa ku sha bting ba'i steng du pad+ma'i skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la bdag nyid rnam par snang
420a1(rgyud): mdza chen po'i skur bsams te/thug spos sor pos zhugs thabs bskus te/me tog ser po'i sil ma yang bkram la n+d+ha ku sha d+ha ting sgra rgyal rigs kyi
420a2(rgyud): khyim ma mA/rgyal po'i pho byang nas me blangs la bsong gtor bya ste shing blag shwa dang /u dum ba ras me sbar la de nas me'i thab khung gi zhabasu dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsams
420a3(rgyud): te/de yang yi ge ya glang kor dang bcas par pad+ma la gnas pa bas mo//yaM/yi ger los thug pung gi nang nas me byung bar bsams pa ni gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i thor tshugs
420a4(rgyud): can mig gsum pa/gdong bzhi pa/lag na bgang phreng dang /gun d+hi thogs shing mchog sbyin pa/gos ser po bgos pa/s+yAd bu ser po se ral khar thogs pa/so ngas
420a5(rgyud): gsum gyis byugs pa/sum mdo'i ris mtshan can/yi ge ras mtshan pa/gser gyi kha dog 'dra ga me lce 'byung ba kun tu 'phro ba/mthu chen po dang ldan pa gsang sngags kyi
420a6(rgyud): rgyal po'i 'od zer las byung ba de lta bu'i me bsams te/de nas bsang gtor bya ba dang /kha bkru ba dang /mchod yon dbul ba byas la byug spos dang /me tog la sogs pa dang
420a7(rgyud): gi sngags kyi spyi mo//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ag+na yo swAhA/de nas 'o thug sbrang rtsi dang mar la sogs par sbyar ba 'am/til nag po mar dang sbyar ba'i bsrog blugs gsum byin te/
420b1(rgyud): de nas shing bi lnga ba 'di dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyis mar gyi dgang blugs bdun sbyin//de nas shing blag sha 'am/u dum pa ra'i'u dbus kyi cha las byung ba'i ye shing srog shing snyom su
420b2(rgyud): chad pa gang la srid du khru gang ba mA la myags pa'i sbyin sreg gsum byin la yang dang de thugs gsum sbyi no//de nas snga ma bzhin du lha'i gzugs rnams bsams te/snying po de dang des
420b3(rgyud): bsregs thugs gsum dbu'o//de nas sangs rgyas thams cad bsams te/byang chub kyi sems bsgoms la bdag gi lha'i gzugasu bsams te/snga ma bzhin du bsregs blugs
420b4(rgyud): gsum phul nas bdag gi dngos grub sgrub pa las bshad pa'i rdzas las sbyin sreg bya'o//thog mar oM zhes brjod la mjug tu grags pa dang /dpal dang langs spyod dang /dge ba dang nor la
420b5(rgyud): sU hA zhes bya ba sbyararo//yang na bdag gis ji ltar bsams pa'i dngos grub kyi rdzas la swA hA zhes bya zhing bsregs blugs dbulo//de ltar ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin sreg byas nas byang chub
420b6(rgyud): kyi sems lo sogs pa'i rim pa de nyid snga ma bzhin du bya'o//'dir yang sgrub pa pos cho ga spyod pa ni/gos ni ser po bsgo bar bya//gtsang byed ser po gtsang mo thogs//sems ni brtan
420b7(rgyud): zhing mthu yang che//shin tu mi smra ser sna med//byang chub sems la rtag tu dga'//dus gsum cho ga thog mar byed//nas chan bcos pa 'o ma gtung //rgyas pa'i las ni brtsam par
421a1(rgyud): dang //sdong nas mig 'bru wang dang //yid bzhin nong du rnam pa gos//na gyi char 'bab l+h+wam dag dang //gdugs dang shing nan pa dang //de bzhim dang pa rtsegs pa //
421a2(rgyud): bum ba mdu rtse gsum//bgra zlang tsun rkun rje dang //pi wang mdung thung mda' yang rung //nung bad dang ni gsag sheng dang //yang na rje sde ni glang 'dod pa//dkyil 'khor
421a3(rgyud): ni sgrib par bya//rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs pa byung chub pa rnam par sprulta pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa las rgyas pa'i las kyi sbyin sreg ge tshig rim par bye zhi/
421a4(rgyud): de nas gzhan yad sbyin sreg 'di//dpeng gi lus ni rab sgrub pa//'jog rteni sgron me mdzad pa yis//'tsho bar gyur pa'i thugs kyis gsungs//de na ma lus bshad par byas/
421a5(rgyud): par 'dod pas nga lo ton//thog mar sa gzhi brtag pa ni//grong ngam yong na ljongs dag gi//me yi phyogasasu gnas bcus te//'gro ba med pa'i khang stong ngam//shing go cig drung ngas
421a6(rgyud): dung khrod dam//yang na bde byed gan su 'am//ma mo'i gnas sam phyugs kyang rang /sngags pas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni//mar gyi nga'i chos dgu la//dbang ga las ni brtsams par

421b2(rgyud): brlabs la sa'i kha dog dmar po las sbyang ba dang /yongasu gzung ba la sogs pa byas te/de nas bdag rnam par snang mdzad chen por byin gyis brlabs la/'phags pa mi g.yo bas bzlas
421b3(rgyud): pa'i srad bu le ba rgan du btsos pa blangs te dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa ni gru gsum pa la sgo shar phyogasu btod pa/sgo khyud dang /rta babs dang /mu ran gyi cha legs par phye ste/de nas
421b4(rgyud): tshon rtsi blang ba ni//dmar po shin tu bzang po la//yi ge 'bar ba gzhag pa ni//ra yi yi ge glad dang bcas//nyi ma 'tshar ba 'dra ba ste//shin tu gdul ka rgyal ba'i mchog/de ltar tshon

421b6(rgyud): lha rnams dgod pa snga ma bzhin//mkhas pas rigs kyi bdag pos byas//lhag ma rnams ni ci rigs par//mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya//de la na mkha'i snying po'i gon su sla can
421b7(rgyud): dang nye sgra can gnyis be con dang zhags pa'i phyag rgyar gzhago/gnod mdzes kyi gnasu ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma de'i phyag rgyar gzhago/spyi bo skyes kyang mda'i phyag rgyar gzhag/phyi rol tu ni
422a1(rgyud): phyag brnyan mA bzhi zhags pa'i phyag rgyar bri'o//de nas snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad bya'o//byuglo spos dang me tog la sogs pa yang dmar po dbu'o//me'i thag
422a2(rgyud): khung yang snga ma'i gnasu byA ste srid du sor nyi shu'i tshod la/kha ran sor gnyis pa kha phar blta bar bya'o//zab su mtho chung ngu gang la dbus su rdo rje sor brgyad pa dmar pos bskus
422a3(rgyud): pa bya'o//me'i thab khung de ni gru gsum la zur gsum du bya'o//de nas bdag phyag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la phyi rol tu gtor ma byino//de nas btso blag mkhan gyi khyim nus
422a4(rgyud): me blangs la snga ma bzhin du bsang gtor bya ste/seng ldeng shing ngam/a sho ka 'am/shing ka ra bi rI'i me bus lo de bzhin du bdag rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlobs te/
422a5(rgyud): me'i thag khung gi zhab su me'i dkyil 'khor bsams la yi ge ra gzhago/yi ge ra de yang 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'phro ba las mo'i gzugasu gyur par bsams pa ni nyi ma 'char ba

422b2(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor du bkod pa'i lha rnams la bsregs blugs bdun phul te snga ma bzhin du bdag gi lha'i gzugs bsams la gzhag ste/de bzhin du po srogs blugs
422b3(rgyud): phul la cho ga las byung ba'i rdzas rnams sbyin sreg bya'o//mjug tu'ang byung ba'i rdzas rnams sbyin sreg bya'o//mjug tu'ang byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i cho ga de bzhin du bya'o//

422b5(rgyud): ldan gos ni dmar po dgros//byug spos phreng ba dmar pos rgyun//srang bu dmar po'i se rul thogs//byang chub sems kyi bye brag shes//zas su sran chung rtswa za//yang na zas
422b6(rgyud): shIng tog za//dga' zhing 'dzum tshul mi slu thub//sems dang sems ni rjesu sbyor//rtag tu bzlas dang sbyin sreg byed//lho yi gzugs ni sems pa yi//mi yis dbang du bya ba

423a1(rgyud): //sbyin sreg zla ba gnyis byas na//phyag brnyan po mos gnod ston ma//de bzhin sa 'og bu mod///sngags pas myur du zhugs par 'gyur//'di ni rI shidra mdo bsdus
423a2(rgyud): te//dbang gi sbyin srog bsgrags pa yin//rnam par snang mdzod chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs las dbang du bya ba'i sbyin sreg rim par
423a3(rgyud): phyi'o///da ni drag shul spyad pa yi//cho ga mA lus bshad par bya//gnod sbyin lto 'phye yi dgas gtum//lha min dri za mi 'am ci//sems can rnams la gnod byed dang //
423a4(rgyud): de bzhin shegs dang log 'dzing+ga dang //'byung po mA mo srin po dang //mkha' 'gro dang ni lus stsol dang //mi yang rgyags dregasna mthu ldan zhing //drag po'i las byed snang ba'ang ru /
423a5(rgyud): dag ga du' phyir sngags shes pas//drag shul las ni brtsam par bya//nyes pa chung dag la ni//drag po'i tshi ga mi brtsa mo//grong gi lho yi phyogs ni//brtul bas sa gzhi nag po la//
423a6(rgyud): du khrid dben pa'am dgon pa 'am//bskyed mos tshal ti zhi gnas//mar gyi ngo yI tshe sna brgyad dam//yang na chos ni bcu bzhi la//gza' ni srin po mig dmar dang //rgyu skar ru
423a7(rgyud): las byung ba dang //me bzhi dang ni nag pa dang //tha skar dang ni de bzhin deg//nab so dang ni sa ri dang //rgyu skar de dag drag po ste//de dag gang yang ru ba la//sngags pa khros pa ga shinad+ha //

423b3(rgyud): ba'i gzugs/ sbyi 'dri ba'i ma dag//ba ni mche ba gtsigs pa lug na rjod pan cam/ ni dzad dang //ldang ba rnams cad pa rdzogs byed gi//dzan sa

423b5(rgyud): pa bye//d+ha mo na pa bzhag pa ni//snga ma bzhin du brtag par bya//bying daphyogs rgan byanas su//lhag ma'i na rnams paca nga bya//de la 'phags pa rnam
424a1(rgyud): /ba rgyurgyu ba gzhan rje gshed gsal shing gi phyug rgyu zil//mdzad lta gnas khyi bar rgyal po 'phags pa gzhud chos mi thub pa zlos byu ba rjod gra ste phyu
424a2(rgyud): rgyu bris mthu chen thab dang 'phags ma khro ga n+d+ha can//'phags ma sgrol ma'i gnas rnams don yod zhags pa dang /ral pa cig ma dang /NAM mgrin rnams zhigs pa dang /dgra sta
424a3(rgyud): dang /rdo rje ton gyi phyag rgya rnams go rims bzhin du gzhag par bya'o//gnod mdzes gnasu khro zla gtso rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gzhag/'phags pa mi gA yo bri yang btson gyi phyag rgya
424a4(rgyud): gzhago/sgo drung du ni gdul dka' ba dang /mngon du phyogs pa gnyis be tsan gyi phyag rgyar gzhugo/gnas gcod ma pa rnams kyi gnasu gshin rje'i 'chi bdag dang /dus mtshan mo
424a5(rgyud): dang lhan cig tu gzhago/bden bral du yang ral gA'i phyag rgyar gzhag//'khor ma'i dbus me'i thab khung sgo la phyogs par bya'o//dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol khang khor yug tu bdun
424a6(rgyud): rnams bri'o//mi'i thab khung ni dbang gi las kyi me'i thab khung bzhidan du rtswa ste/bye brag du ni phyi rol gyi mA ran zlum po byas la bdan mang pos mtshan por bya'o//dkyil la
424a7(rgyud): lha rnams snga ma bzhin du so so'i gzugs bsams te mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o//de nas lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mchod nas de nas bdag phyagar rdo rje byin gyis brlabs
424b1(rgyud): lo ba tu phyogs kyi gtor+ya ma b+h+ra ma bzhin du sbyin//de la byug spyos la sogs pa'i khyad par nai ts+tsharmAn dmar pau dang /du ru ka dang sol pa bsgos pa'i byug+sa smos nag por dbul//me tog ut+pa
424b2(rgyud): la mthing ka dang /a ba rA dzi ta mthing ka'am gzhan yang me tog sngon po rnams dbu'o//bdug spyos ni sra rtse pog bu ram dang sbyar ba dbul//mar mi ni yungs kar tsha ba snying po ston pa can mar
424b3(rgyud): ma'i snod nag po'i nang du dbulo//bshos ni kri sa ra dang /gzhan yang rgyu ba dang /kha ba la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang tshod mo kha dog nag po rnams dbu lo//sran chan dang /kr-i sa r+ya dang/
424b4(rgyud): shA dang /nya sha btsos pa dang /rten pa rnams phyogs kyi gtor mar sbyin//gla tor mA'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas gdol pa'i khyim 'am/dur khrod nas maM blangs te/khro bo'i rgyal
424b5(rgyud): bos bsang gtor byas la dur khrod kyi shIng ngamo shing bA lA ta ka 'am/bai ru rI'i shing gis me bus la rnam par snang mdzad chen por bdagi byin gyis brlabs te me'i thab khung gi zhabasu rlung
424b6(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor posems la dang yi ge hUM gzhago//yi ge hUM de las ma'i gzugasu gyur par bsems pa ni kha dog dge bo shin tu mi bzad pa/mig gsum pa/gdong bzhi pa/
424b7(rgyud): g.yo bdud kha ro//blta dka' ba kham pa thor tshugs dud ka can char sprin sngon po lta bu'i mdangs can gsus po che gos sngon po gyon pa/srad bu sngon po'i se ral khar thogs pa

425a2(rgyud): kha nas mche ba bzhi gtsigs pa khro ba dang bcas shing kha gdangs pa/lag na ral gri dang zhags pa dang /be tsun dang /gun d+he thogs pa/snying kan sum mngag
425a3(rgyud): ris mtshan can/yI gI ras mtshan pa/gadrong khro gnyer bsgrer ba dang /hUM dang bcas pa 'bar ba gnag cing rtsub pa dang /zangs lta bu'i 'od 'phro ba'i 'phreng ba can 'jigs pa'i dus
425a4(rgyud): mngon du byung ba bzhin du 'dug pa dI lta bu'i me bsams nas bseng gtor byas te/byug spos la sogs pa rang gi rig sngags kyis dbu'o//oM ag+na ye dzA hitratra hUM phan+de/de
425a5(rgyud): nas yungs mar tsha ba dang sbyar ba'i kr-is ra'i bsregs blugs gsum byon la dug dang /khrag dang /skye che'i bsreg blugs bdun sbyino//yang na shing bi la ta kaM dang bair+ye ra
425a6(rgyud): shing gi yam shing rtse mo rnon por gzhogs pa yungs mar tsha ba dang /skye tshes byugs pa sbyin//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la sogs pa'i lha rnams snga ma bzhin du

425b2(rgyud): kyang rtsa mchog bzhin du sreg/'dir yang cho ga 'di ltar bya'o//dpal ldan gos ni sngon po bgros//byug spos phreng ba sngon pos brgyan/ad bu sngon po'i ser la thogs//byang chu
425b3(rgyud): sems la rab tu gzhol//tshe dang kha dang bsgre ba dang //k+shi sa ra'i kha zase zla//lha rnams dgod pa'i don la mkhas//gtsang zhing mchog tu tshul khrims ldan//sgo ba che zhing dpa'
425b4(rgyud): snying can//khros pa 'jig rten mthar byed bzhin//lho phyogs kha bltas mi smra zhing //'dug pa'i thabs ni tsog pur 'dug/sbyin sreg bzlas la rtag tu 'bad//srung dang bsgrub
425b5(rgyud): paM dag la mkhas//mtshan mo sbyin sreg byed pa yis//drag shul spyad pa tsam par bya//rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin

425b7(rgyud): spyod pa rnams la stong pa nyid gi nyi su med po'i spyod yul rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i snying po rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'thob pa'i rgyu spros pa thams cad dang bral po//
426a1(rgyud): /kasal zhing dag bla yod kyi mya bsgrubs grwa yong su rdzogs par byed pa/chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos bshad do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
426a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po snying rje chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug de'i tshe thaMd mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la smras
426a3(rgyud): pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul stong pa nyid kyi rjesu zhugs pa/gsang skyugs tha~Md kyi dngos grub stsol pa/gnas med pa/mtshan nyid med
426a4(rgyud): pa/ngo bo nyid med pa/mtshan gyi gzhi dang /mtshan nyid las 'odas pa theg pa chen po thob par byed pa/bdud rtsi sbyin pa de sngags kyi tshul la rnam par gnas pa'i rje su zhugs pa

426b3(rgyud): khams 'byung bar byed pa/stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi spyod yul gyi chos bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsolnga pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco

426b8(rgyud): gsungs//de rnams kyi ni 'gog pa'ang gsungs//de skad gsungs pa dge sbyong mchog/gzhan dbang yod pa ma yin zhing //yongasu grub pa'ang gzhan yin//gnyis po'ang yod pa

427a2(rgyud): tha dad pa dang blo gros tha dad pas tshig su bcad pa gnyis gsungs pa'i don ji ltar rje su 'thun par khong du chud nas byang chub sems dpa' do rnams kyis bac+doMs legaso lagaso

427a4(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur//de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis
427a5(rgyud): brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//rnam par rtog pa las 'das pa'i//ma 'dres sems nI nyid kyis kyang //bzlas pas dngos grub thob 'gyur na//
427a6(rgyud): chos kyi 'dus byas ci zhig smos//rta dang 'dra ba'i sems de ni//mnyam par bzhag pas brtul nasu//byams dang snying rje brtan byas na//dngos grub brtan pa 'phral du 'thob/
427a7(rgyud): nam zhig chos rnams ma skyes pa//de yi sa bon a yi mchog/rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyis gsungs//oM ni stong pa nyid ces bya//yi ge'i phyi mo phyi mo kun//de bzhin 'dren//
427b1(rgyud): pa gnyis dang ldan//mo 'byung mo ga dang yang ldan//de bAs bsam par bya ba yin//a dang u zhes pa dung ni//ri dang d+h+r-i dang a dudzam+b+ha/a dang ldan pa snang du'i mchog/'do las thor ba
427b2(rgyud): 'thob ces gsungs//ka yi ris dang tsa mi ris//Ta yi ris kyang de bzhin gzhan//ta yi rIs dang pa yi ras//ma dang ldan pa lnga pa'o//ya relA we shi lA sogs//bde rgyal mchog
427b3(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs//de dag rgya chen don gyi mchog/rnam pa mang po'i don rnams byed//a ni byang chub thob par byed//ni ni de bzhin dgug par byed//u ni gsod pa 'grub par byed//
427b4(rgyud): ri ni dbang gi las byed pa'o//oM ni srin po gsod par byed//bi ni 'chi ba yin par 'dod//oM ni klu yi snying po yin//kun kyang gzhan na ldan na mchog/yi ge mthu can tha~Md ni//
427b5(rgyud): dang glad kor bcas gyur cing //chos kyi dbyings dang rtag ljon par//bsam gtan bzlas byas dngos grub 'thob//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa'
427b6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sems dpa' chen po le gso lag so//sa bcu rtogs par khong du chud//bde gshegs yang dag mi zad pa//de nyid
427b7(rgyud): thams cad khyod kyis bshad//lago na rdo rjes smras pa yi//rab tu gsang ba khyod kyis rtogs//zhes legaso zhes bya ba byin//de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag
428a1(rgyud): du/na di skad ces gsol //dpa rjes dbyes nga bzhin no//pa la sgyur ba rgyam pa mchog/ga rten dpa' ba'i byug rgyu dang //ma sgrub pa
428a2(rgyud): yI gI yis//de bzhin 'drug nyid pa sems ldan sa//byang chub sems kyis shin tu bsnams//stong pa gnyi su mdo sbyor ba ste//yis rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya//sa
428a3(rgyud): dbyings rnam par dge bu'i bdag/sa bon yi ge dang ldan par//dad cing bzlas brjod mAnyamya gzhag pas//bsams na dngos grub thob par 'gyur//khrus dang bshegs la stsom
428a4(rgyud): pa dang //rab tu dben la sogs bya dang /phyag rgya bgrang 'phreng sems dpa'i ye//zlos pa'i dngos grub brtan pa 'thob//chos kyi dbyi sde dang ldan 'gyur bar//sngags 'di rnams kyis

429a5(rgyud): sa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/d+har+m+ma d+ha naM d+harma dz+nyA tu swa b+hA pra At+ma ko&he/de nas rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab//na mAHsa man+te bud d+hA nAM/badz+ra At+ma ko&haM/de nasau byang chub kyi sems bskyed
429a6(rgyud): par bya'o//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste nam byang chub kyi snying po la mi chis
429a7(rgyud): kyi bar du dngos po thams cad dang bral ba phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched dang /gzung ba dang /'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa chos bdag med pa mnyam pa'i phyir rang gi sems thob/
429b1(rgyud): mA nas ma skyes pa stong pa nyid bye ngo bo nyid du ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang
429b2(rgyud): sems bskyed//de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du bya'o//de nas gang de'i phyag rgya spyi bor bcings la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor thams cad du spos dang me tog le sogs pa'i sprin

429b4(rgyud): d+hA na maN+Da le ma ma prA Ni d+hi pu N+ya dz+nyAn pA le ne/sarba taT+Ta g+he a d+hiSh+ThAn+ta le nA d+harma d+h+waM tu oM d+hiSh+ThA na l+yo ni tsa swA hA///gang ba'i phyag rgya ni spyi bong pad+ma kha bye ba 'dra bar bya ba gang yin pa de

429b6(rgyud): pa rnam par rol po bstan yang yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bston par bzhed pas dbu'i gtsug nas chos kyi mdzod ces byi ba sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i sem
429b7(rgyud): po snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba byung ngo //de nas 'od zer chen po'i dra ba bkod pa de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs rgya chen po rnam par rol pas na mkha'i dbyings rgya chen po

430a3(rgyud): gnas rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stug po bkod pa'i khongs gtogs par ben gyis brlabs nas chos kyi dpengos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang de bzhin gshegs
430a4(rgyud): ba'i bsod nams kyi stobs bsam gyisnga mi khyab pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa rgyu 'thun pas byin du brlabaso//chos kyi dbyings kyi dgos pa ma rdzogs pas snying rje chen po'i snying po
430a5(rgyud): 'byung ba'i mdzod ces bya ba sems can gyi khams ma nges pa yongasu skyob pa'i snying po dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs//snyoms par
430a6(rgyud): zhugs nas kyang phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa snyed la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag seni gyi khams ma nges pa
430a7(rgyud): yongasu skyob pa'i snying po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa gang la rten nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams chog chung
430b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob par gyur cing chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba yod//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /phyag na rdo rje la
430b2(rgyud): sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa de dag gis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/bcom ldan 'das gung bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cig
430b3(rgyud): la thugs brtse ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa bshud pa de'i dus laM babra cing bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod la bya ba ste leg s+ho//bcom ldan 'dra//
430b4(rgyud): chos kyi rje chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi bdag po mthar 'byed pa dang bral ba/ye shes chen po la mnga' ba/ston pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug gcig pu/don grub pa/tshig grub pa/srid
430b5(rgyud): pa'i mtha' las rgal ba dang de kho na nyid mkhyen pa/sman pa'i rgyal po chen po/'gag pa med pa/chad pa med pa/mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa/de bzhin nyid dang yang dag bI/
430b6(rgyud): mtha' spros pa med pa/rtogs par khong du chud pa/skyong ba gnas gsum du gyur pa/gling du gyur pa/mya ngan las 'das pa/zhi bar gyur pa/grol ba thar pa/rims nad med pa/
430b7(rgyud): rdul dang bral ba/rnyog pa dang bral ba dang /smra ba dang kun tu smra ba med pa/dngos po thams cad rnam por 'dzin par mdzad pa bshad du gsol/'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin de dag thaMd rtag

431b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du 'di ni sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnamasu sbyangs rgyas 'byung ba'o zhes gsungs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ga

441a5(rgyud): bar byas te steng gi ni mkha' la gnas nas dam tshig chen po gsum gyis snang bas 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa snang bar byas nas sems can gyi

442b1(rgyud): rnam par spangs//gang zhig da ni rtogs 'dod de//de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin//sa bcu yongasu rdzogs byas nas//dbang rnams rtogs par khong du chud//chos rnams stong pa sgyu ma

442b3(rgyud): rnam par gzhag pa ni de dag yin//gsang ba pa'i bdag po rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang gi sems rnam par gzhag pa sgrub pa ni med par rig par

444a2(rgyud): yul yi ni snyam du bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brla po//de ltar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnyisu med pa'i sbyor bas bdag/

444a4(rgyud): ga sta mas rnam par dbye bar bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po de nas sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir gsang ba'i snying po'i dam tshig la 'jug pa'i cho ga
444a5(rgyud): bya'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa'o gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa
444a6(rgyud): rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shis kyang tshe 'di nyid cig pus thos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa mdzod//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

444b5(rgyud): sgrogs pa rnams kyis ye shes la mnga' ba ngo mtshor to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes

450a7(rgyud): dang /'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rang gi sems thog ma nas ma skyes pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du rtogs par bya'o//

450b7(rgyud): la gsang sngags spad pa'i tshul sgrub pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ma gtogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phan 'dogs pa med par rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/

451a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi tshe 'di nyid la bla ni med pa yod dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong d+ha

451a5(rgyud): rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po dkyil 'khyor dang phyag rgyu'i dam tshig 'od la 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di lnga ni rgyung ring du spang bar byis/

451b7(rgyud): zhe na/gsang ba pa'i bdag po dkyil 'khor 'di na sangs rgyas 'byung ba mthong ba'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni snying po gtso bo thams cad kyi mtha
452a1(rgyud): phyin pa ste/de'i sgong na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mdo//dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa/gan su gyur pa/skyang su gyur pa'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag
452a2(rgyud): de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod pas dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig la 'jug pa thob par 'gyur gang dpa dang

452a4(rgyud): rnams la yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang /pa'i 'du shes dang ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang lo rten nas/

452b1(rgyud): spyan ma thun po rdzogs pa can lhag/'jig chags pa ltung /nangan par nan tu gyur pa/bdag gi sems kyi gnas brgyad pam pags pa rnams rnam par sbrul nas 'di skad du/

454a7(rgyud): dri ma med//byams pa'i go cha legs par bgos//dga' ba dri ma med rtsal bral//srid pa'i rgya mtshor bying ba yi//sems can 'don pa rib tu brtson//'khor ba ni yang mi gnas shing //mya ngan

457a2(rgyud): la sogs brgyad kyis rgyan//sku mdog nag po'i gzugs can de//zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje bsnams//na bza' sngon po'i zer 'jol can//spyan gsum dmar mdzes gyen du 'jil//ral

457a7(rgyud): kun tu dka' la sogs pa dag/mi snang la sogs rab tu 'grub//kun rten rab tu spyad dog can//rten can sbyor ba rab tu deben//dngos grub mchog tu rab tu 'grub/dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud
457b1(rgyud): sa sa sgrub pa sgyu //nas nam ldan las pa byung chub sa nas sna sems su rdzun pa phyug sa spyad nasagasopa///na ldan stonapa//

463b2(rgyud): thams cad 'grub ste//phyig thams cad 'ching bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje tshur gyis//dam tshig thams cad sgrub po la ni rdo rje rab tu dngas pasdu so//sems can thams cad rjes su chags

463b7(rgyud): yang bzlas pa yi//nges pa 'dir ni bshad par bya//gang zhig dngos grub 'grub 'dod pas//dam tshig sdom dang rab ldan pas//bdag nyid las kyi ltar bsgoms te//ye shes
464a1(rgyud): zla ba spyan drangs te//dzaHd+hU ba hoHdgug sogs bya//rang nyid zla bar sngags kyi phreng //dngul skam lta bur rab bsams te//myur dalags pa dang migasal
464a2(rgyud): spangs//yid kyi bsgrims pa'i bzlas pa bya//mchid pa rnam pA lngas kyang mchod//rab tu bsgrims pa'i bzlas pa 'dis//gang 'dod dngos grub nges par 'grub//oM Ar+g+haM sku gsung
464a3(rgyud): /thugs byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so//oM badz+ra pA Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/dbang bskur ba'i sngagaso//oM badz+ra pA Ni tiSh+Tha hUM/thugs brtan pa'i sngags so//sku dang thugs kyi gsang
464a4(rgyud): ba dang //gsung gi gsang ba me lus pa//myur du byang chub la reg 'gyur//gang tshe sgrub la brtson ldan pa//cha gcig 'bras bu myur thob 'gyur//gnyis med rang bzhin rdo rje can//
464a5(rgyud): mkha' dbyings rdo rje kun tu khyab//brjod med rtog bral de nyid don//lhun grub dang la rab tu bzhag/hUM dang AHyi rnam pa cen//ji ltar chu yi zla ba bzhin//ma yengs sems
464a6(rgyud): kyis rgyun tu sgom//e ma'i mgon po bcom ldan 'das//mchog las mchog tu rnam par rgyal//e ma'i sprul pa'i rnam pa sku//sgra la rab tu dmigs pa med//dge chen kun
464a7(rgyud): gyi spyod yul yin//rang gsal nyid la rnam par dag/mchog gi byang chub tshul du gnas//rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las nges pa dang rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//
464b1(rgyud): de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang //'gro ba'i mgon la rab gzigs te//srung ba'i cho ga rab tu gsungs//lag na rdo rje rab tu nyen//'gro ba gdug pas zin gyur pa//zangs ma dag la dud 'dra
464b2(rgyud): gzugs//legs pa dag tu rab byas te//khong pa rdul la sogs pas dgang //gang nas 'dod pa'i sa phyogs sam//rang lus dag la legs sbas nas//srung ba dam par 'gyur ba'o//
464b3(rgyud): bde gshegs sku gdung ring bsrel can//rab tu gnas pa legs byas te//gang snod sar ni rab sbas ni//bden stobs brjod pas zhi bar 'gyur//bya la sogs pa'i byol seng tshogs//
464b4(rgyud): yid 'ong mdzes de'i dud 'gro la//sangs rgyas gang ga'i bye tshogs kyis//gsungs pa'i gzungs sngags dag gis no//skud pa sngon po dag dang ni//dr-ir la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te/
464b5(rgyud): bden pa bder la rab tu bsngos//gtor ma btang na zho bor 'gyur//kham par la sogs stod ga tsang ma ru//sman dang der sogs rab bcug ste//me tog skud sogs mchid byas te/
464b6(rgyud): sa la sbas na gnod pa rnams//zhi ba dag tu 'gyur ba yin//skud pa dkar po sum sgril la//mdud pa nyi shu rtsi gcig bya//sgrub dang bsgrub pa'i mchod pa bya//rgyal la rab tu mgul
464b7(rgyud): du btags//bar chad bzlog par 'gyur bar nges//yungs kair mar dang mu zo rnams/cha snyoms lus la rab byugs nas//gdug pas zin la thar bar 'gyur//ba gun
465a1(rgyud): me tog dang //'da' hu na da'i 'bras bu la//sman drug dus su rab bsgrubs na//gdug pa'i phyogasu mi gnaso//stag dang dred dang 'ja' thar gyis//spun na
465a2(rgyud): gdug pa las grol 'gyur//'bab chu rgya mtsho la sogs pa//lus srung bya ba mthar phyin par//byas na mchog tu srung bar 'gyur//rdo rje 'chang ba khyod kyis zung //mthar phyin
465a3(rgyud): zla ba sprin gza' las//grol ba lta bur 'gyur ba yin//dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////lag na rdo rjes legs smras pa//bsdu
465a4(rgyud): be sngags kyi cho ga ni//ji ltar legaso rdo rje 'chang //khyed la rab tu nyen par 'tshal//nyon cig rdo rje 'tshang ba khyod//sngags btu khyod la bshad par bya//gru gsum dkyil 'khor
465a5(rgyud): nyams dga' bar//pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa blo//'dod don thams cad rab 'grub pa//der ni gsang sdigs bdu bar bya//dbus su yi ge'i bdag po bzhag/bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la//
465a6(rgyud): yi ge i ni rab tu sbyar//mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la//lnga pa yi ni mtha' dang sbyar//de nas lnga pa'i bzhi pa bzhag/de nas mthar gnas gnyis pa bzhag/de nas bzhi pa'i
465a7(rgyud): bzhi pa bzhag/de nas mthar gnas gnyis pa bzhag/de nas lnga pa'i gsum pa dang //gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la//ra dang bcas pa bzhag par bya//de nas lnga pa'i dang
465b1(rgyud): na du//donas gam ma la//oM ba tu sgyu nag/bdun pa yin ban pa la//yo ga unI d+ha sbyar//stong bas mnan pas nyis gyur dang //lnga pa yin gnyis pa la//gsu /
465b2(rgyud): m-in dang ba snar//yi ge bcugs ma rig pa'i sngags//bsgre bste btsun par rab bzlas na//gleng 'dud de 'i klub sa par 'gyur//kye ma'o rdo rjen gyis smras ste//sngags kyi
465b3(rgyud): bo bla med lam//phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub thog/dpel rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las sngags btul ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o///de nas skyon po rdo rje 'ching //smyon
465b4(rgyud): mig 'od zer sprul mdzad nas//slob ma rab tu sbyin b+he'i b+hi //dpung bsgyur cho ga rab tu bshad//rdo rje slob dpon dkara' thub che//gsang dang ldan pa dbang byeb cing //rdul dang
465b5(rgyud): shes nyin tshe//g.yo chung dang bzed byung sems thob//dkyil 'khor tshig rab mkhas pa//slob ma dam pa dbang bskrad phyir//yid 'od gtsug lag khang sogs//brtul zhugs
465b6(rgyud): sngon du rigs spyad nas//de nas sa myi chog bya//brtag dang sbyid zhing bskrang ba dang //mchod dang gsol pa gdab pa dang //rmi lam mtshan ma'i sbyinas pabartag/zhi ba'i tshigs sbyin smi ni/
465b7(rgyud): brtse rtsa brgyad kyi chog bya//'byung po rnams la mtshang cing sgo//dkyil 'khor dbus su rab gnas te//hUM las rdorje chen po sgom// las gzhal las kha kyi
466a1(rgyud): gnyis sbyin 'ad zer gyis//bdogs rnams ma lus char gcod do//rdo rje chen po gar 'gros kyis//sa gzhil na gsum bskor bar bya//ba ma
466a2(rgyud): legs byugs te//tshom bu gcig gis lha dgod bya//mchod dang bstod drung spyan gsan dngab//bum pa lhag par gnas par bya//slob mo tshogs rab smin bya//thig dang chen
466a3(rgyud): gyi cho ga ni//las kyi cho ga bzhin du bya//gdong g.yogs dar ni sngon po yis//slob ma dag ni gzhug par bya//sdom ldan dbang bskur lngas bskur ro//bum pa dang
466a4(rgyud): rdo rje dang //dril bu dbu rgyan ming gi dbang //las kyi cho ga ji bzhin no//tshes bcu bzhi drung bcu gsum la//slob ma las la bzud par bya//byini brlabs rim pas 'pho ba dang /
466a5(rgyud): 'phrul du yid ches bskyod par bya//rin chen snying po dri med rgyud//rgyud rnams kun gyi rtsi ba ni//'dir dbyung ba sgyung ba dam pa yin//smin pa'i las la brten pa yi//dbang bskur
466a6(rgyud): chog gi rgyud gas sa pas//rab gnas dge bsgom po sbyin//dmig yin gyis mnyes par bya/grol ba bar sbyin tu nas//skyebu ma smin pa'i tshig//rdo rjes
466a7(rgyud): gi rgyud las slob ma la dbang bskur ba'i le'u skye bcu gnyis pa'o///de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyug na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
466b1(rgyud): tA/ma na mams nan khyod du rgyug/sgo nas ga smra//nas gso lag//ma ldan 'as s+ho kA snru /da
466b2(rgyud): bzud khyod//gzhan don drag brtson legs so logs so//gang zhig dus kyi sgrogs ma la//gdum dka'i sems can 'dul 'dod pas//dang po byang chub sems bskyed la//tshigs
466b3(rgyud): gnyis kun rdzogs mthar phyin pas//rin rten snyed du pa Sh+T+rI ter//dbus su gsang ba'i bdug po can//'dab ma brgyud lak+Sh+ma rkyen brgyad//sbru lo migs rgan pa dag par bya/
466b4(rgyud): sa spya ldan des//lu ky-i m+b+hi smi ma'i ra sa//de ni sbyi smra ba na myod sa//ba shA m+b+ha/ sa shi pa r+dz+dza s+yA sl-i/
466b5(rgyud): hU~M da hU~M gi thag ngas laste//bsgrub bya khyod kyi phung po bya//skad rgyag mas nA sto bskyed//oM bid+yAk+Sha d+hA a khyib zlas bdon las ngas kyil 'gyur//'gron
466b6(rgyud): ni//thugs kyis 'phro 'du gsang ba yin//bsgrub bya'i sa ni tshon gyis de//hU~M chen phreng ba'i 'phro 'dus btsod//rjes chen rnams la rab brtags nas//nges par gud da ngas
466b7(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur//gal ti ngas kyang ma grub na//sngags kyi phreng ba bzlog te bzlas//rdo rje phreng bas dpe ba cing na//the tsom med par 'grub par 'gyur//'og gi bshegs brjod
467a1(rgyud): ga/ na snang nga su/ m+b+ha m+b+ha //rgyu can ga sa / mas sas ra
467a2(rgyud): btsam sun du kyis na na la myu na/na rdo rje la sogs pa rigs kyil bar rnams da tshogs thams cad seM so/ma
